Genesis: Baale ɔɔwa e ɛɛnyca Jooi tammu taden ki looc.
Maje baale laadun e kaal dook alaŋ azedi kiyo inoko o, ma adala maama looc dook, maje muuri adala maam kizi koli tɛr. Aje Vɔŋizi o Joowo awɔ maam tadena ka kutugu liŋliŋɔn onin.
Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Abon abil vooritin tɔ,” ma didi anai vooritin wak.
Ma acin Jooi vooritin nico abon ɔrɔɔt. Ɛŋɛr ni niini vooritin kibeen muur.
Ma awo vooritin azi nɛ waazin, ma awo muur azi nɛ baalin. Nica baale iiten o oowu nɛɛn.
Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Abon anyak ŋinti aŋɛr maama lak ram.”
Ɛtɛɛnya ni niini tammu kɛŋ ka kɛŋɛr maam ci ɛɛl loota o kibeen maam ci ɛɛl tadena o. Ma agooni didi zɔɔz nici nɔkɔ.
Ma awo niini ŋinti aŋɛrɔn maama o azi nɛ tammu kɛŋ. Nica zin waanice iiten ween ram nɛɛn.
Ma bodo azi Jooi nɛ, “Abon aromɛ maama ci ɛɛl loota o dook ŋaatodoi ka keyelizyai ŋinti adɔi akɔm maam.” Ma didi agooni nɔkɔ.
Ma awo Jooi ŋinti akɔm maam o azi nɛ tɔdɔ, ma awo vitɛn ci anyak maam o azi nɛ liilok. Ma acin niini gi nico abon ɔrɔɔt.
Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Anyek tɔdɔ kuduntai kaal ci abiir kanyayit kɛbɛrɛ ci aduŋna bodo kiyo niigi o.” Ma agooni didi gi nici nɔkɔ.
Udunai didi tɔdɔwa kɛɛn kibeen artɛ ci abiirna gɔnɔgi ci ɛɛl kiyo niigi o. Ma acin Jooi kaal nicoko abon ɔrɔɔt.
Nica zin waanice iiten ween iiyu nɛɛn.

Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Abon anyak kaal ci atokol looc tammu kɛŋa ka keŋerit waazin ki baalin, ma buk aŋɛr looloyok ki tagizok, ki iinya been irkitok, ka buk kanycek niigi looc vooritin.” Ma didi agooni gi nici nɔkɔ.

Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Abon anyak kaal ci atokol looc tammu kɛŋa ka keŋerit waazin ki baalin, ma buk aŋɛr looloyok ki tagizok, ki iinya been irkitok, ka buk kanycek niigi looc vooritin.” Ma didi agooni gi nici nɔkɔ.
Ma ɛɛnyca niini ii kibeen nyelok, ka ii kizi ci waazinu, maje nyɛlɔyi ka kizi ci baalinu. Ma ɛɛnyca buk niini monyony.
Ma arek niini nɔɔgɔ dook tammu kɛŋ ka kataraanit looc, ka kuzuuti niigi waazin ki baalin, ka buk keŋerit niigi vooritin kibeen muur. Ma acin Jooi kaal nicoko abon ɔrɔɔt.
Ma arek niini nɔɔgɔ dook tammu kɛŋ ka kataraanit looc, ka kuzuuti niigi waazin ki baalin, ka buk keŋerit niigi vooritin kibeen muur. Ma acin Jooi kaal nicoko abon ɔrɔɔt.
Nica waanice iiten ween wec nɛɛn.
Ma azi bodo Jooi nɛ, “Abon anyak liilowa kaal ci meel arogi. Abon buk anyak kibaali ci akul tammu kɛŋa.”

Ɛtɛɛnya ni Jooi kɛlɛk o adikir abaak liilowɛ, ki kaal o liilu arogi dook ka kitirit gɔnɔgi ci ɛɛl kiyo niigi o. Ma buk ɛɛnyca niini kibaali ci akul, ma arita gɔnɔgi ci anyak taba kiyo niigi o. Ma acin Jooi kaal nicoko abon ɔrɔɔt.
Amayuk ni Jooi nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Itirit iziti mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt. Ibitizit maam ci liilu noko.” Ma anek buk kibaali nɛ, “Itirit iziti mɛɛlɛ.”
Nica waanice iiten ween tur nɛɛn.

Ma azi Jooi nɛ, “Abon anyak lɔɔci kaal ci arogi ci arita gɔnɔgi ci ɛɛl kiyo niigi o, kaal o kabal, ki kaal o ababat keŋtinɛ, ka kɛlɛk o too, ka kitirta gɔnɔgi ci ɛɛl kiyo niigi o.” Ma didi agooni gi nici nɔkɔ.
Ma ɛɛnyca Jooi didi kɛlɛk o too, ki kaal o kabal, been kaal o ababat keŋtine. Ma acin Jooi kaal nicoko abon ɔrɔɔt.
Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Abon kɛɛnyca eet ci deer kizi riritɔn cinai ka kabal kuluk ci liilu o, ki kibaali, ki kaal o kabal, ki kɛlɛk o loocu dook kurum kaal o ababat keŋtinɛ.”
Ɛtɛɛnya ni Jooi eet ci deer kizi riritɔn cin. Ɛɛnyca eet ci mac kibeen ŋaa.
Ma amayuk Jooi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Itirit iziti mɛɛlɛ. Ibitizit looc dook kɔkɔm gi ci animnyuŋ. Abalit kuluk o liilu, ki kibaali dook, kibeen kɛlɛk kɛbɛrɛ dook.”
Ma anek bodo Jooi nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kanyuŋ igeet kɛbɛrɛ ci abiirna kɛɛna o kibeen ci abiirna artɛ o dook kizi dayiin cugooc.
Maje kɛlɛk dook, kibeen kibaali, kibeen kaal o ababat keŋtinɛ kanyi nɔɔgɔ artɛ ki kɛɛn ci colai o kizi dayiin cigeec.” Ma didi agooni gi nici nɔkɔ.
Ma acin Jooi kaal ci ɛɛnyca o dook abon ɔrɔɔt. Nica waanice iiten ween tɔrkɔnɔm nɛɛn.
Nici zin gɔl baal ɛɛnycanɛ Jooi tammu taden ki looc been kaal dook e nɛɛn.
Ma iitene ween torgɛrɛm idica Jooi liŋliŋɔn onin. Uyubuz ni.
Ma amayuk niini iiten nico kizi iiten ci yubzento ci aŋɛryai kɔtɔɔ doon. Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o, eeci iitene ceen torgɛrɛm noko ayubuz niini liŋliŋonte onin ɛɛnycanɛ kaal.
Nici zin gɔl o ɛɛnycanɛ Jooi tammu taden ki looc nɛɛn.
Ma ɛɛnyca Jooi looc e, akɔm waanice rak kɛɛn ki artɛ ci aduŋna tɔdɔwai, eeci ŋaan kanyaak niini tiilɛz looc, ma buk ŋaan akɔm eet ci deer ci ka kɛɛv tɔdɔ.
Bar olla waanice anyak lɔɔci ziizi ci anyamat looc dook.
Ɛtɛɛnya ni Jooi eet ci deer tɔdɔwaca. Ma avoŋek nɔɔnɔ vɔŋiz o rogeto. Makacin didi urugun ɛɛti nici.
Ma agɔɔna Jooi mana libire ci jenu e ŋaati kazi Idan, ma arek eet ci ona ɛɛnyca o ŋinaante.
Ma anyek Jooi kudunta ŋinaante kɛɛna ci amedneket ŋaati kacini, ma abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci abon ŋaati kadayi. Maje mana kɔrgɛna anyak kɛɛt ci rogeto kibeen kɛɛt ci kagawi gi ci abon been gi ci gɛr.
Anyak zin liil ci ariiya Idana ka kanyamat mana, ma ŋinaante aŋeryi liili nici lak wec.
Liil codoi kazi zaar nɛ Picon. Nicini liil o ariik looce o kazi Avila nɛɛn.
Ma ŋinaante anyak warki ci abon, ki karkarɛt, kibeen buk biyɛn o alina kazi onik.
Ma liil ceen ram o kazi zaar nɛ Giyon ariik niini looce o kazi Kuc.
Ma liil ceen iiyu o kazi zaar nɛ Tigariz ariik niini looce o kazi Asiriya libire ci jenu e. Maje liil ween wec o kazi zaar nɛ Yuparatiz.
Arek ni Jooi eet ci deer o mana ci kazi Idan noko ka kozooti kɛbɛk.
Ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Olla niina dak kɛbɛrɛ ci arooŋ keene ci ɛɛl mana noko dook labak.
Bar zin má adei kɛbɛrɛ ci kɛɛt ci kagawi gi ci abon been gi ci gɛr o. Mã adei, akunakin koca daayiz.”
Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaati aavɛ ɛɛti ci deer niini doon. Abon kɛɛnyca laŋotin ci ka kitirit nɔɔnɔ.”
Ɛtɛɛnya ni Jooi tɔdɔwai kɛlɛk dook ki kibaali dook, ma alotak nɔɔgɔ eet nico ka kiiya kakatek niini nɔɔgɔ zaar. Akatewun ni ɛɛti nɔɔgɔ zaar o kaga o.
Ma didi akanek niini zaar kaal o kabal, kibeen kɛlɛk dook, ki kibaali dook. Maje eet ɛlɛ waanice ŋaan akɔm laŋotin ci ka kitirit nɔɔnɔ.
Anyewun ni Jooi nɔɔnɔ kɛtɛɛda ooŋnya. Mazi ŋaan ɔɔŋ nɔkɔ, aara onyit cin codoi, ma arigzek ŋinito idiŋ.
Ɛtɛɛnya ni Jooi onyite nico ŋaa, ma anyaak eet.

Mazi acin ɛɛti nɔɔnɔ, izi nɛ, “Inoko kanyawa eet ci deer ci katobona ki aneet. Amɛ ciginɛ o avu amene cigan o, ma idina ciginɛ o avu idine cigan o. Abon zin kakanei nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi ŋaa, eeci agɔɔnnyai niini eete ci mac.”
Nici zin gi o gɔɔn ooŋni ɛɛti baatin ki yaatin, ma aromɛn kibeen ŋaa onin o nɛɛn, ka kiziti niigi ɛlɛ codoi.
Waanice zin ɛɛti kibeen ŋaa cin o aavtiz ŋaḏinyiny, ma alaŋ aŋɔlɔ.
Mazi baale ɛɛnyca Jooi kɛlɛk dook e, agɛny kowat kelegene dook, ma een labjoi. Iiyak ni niini ŋaa mana, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim didi eeyuŋ Jooi igeet kɛɛn kɛbɛrɛ ci mano o ŋaati adaku?”
Abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Kadaka kɛɛn kɛbɛrɛ dook labak.
Olla bar kɛbɛrɛ ci kɛɛt ci abil mana kɔrgɛna o doon azi Jooi nɛ, Má adaku, ma buk azi nɛ, Má uumnyu. Eeci mã kadaka, karabɔŋ kuumnya, akunaket koca daayizi.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ kowat ŋaa anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ een nɛɛn. Alaŋ adaaknu been nɛɛn.
Olla aduwa Jooi gi nico o, eeci aga niini mã adaku, akolinuŋ koca kɛbɛrɛ otobtɔ ki Jook, ma agayu gi ci abon kibeen gi ci gɛr.”

Mazi acin ŋaa kɛɛt nico alina ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔ, ma buk aganɔ kɛbɛrɛ ciginɛ o ŋaati kadayi, ma acin niini buk anyek koca kɛbɛrɛ ci kɛɛt nico o nɔɔgɔ kegeny, odoca kɛbɛrɛ oogi, ma adak. Ma anyaak koogi eet onin, ma adak buk niini.
Taman nɔkɔ ɔkɔltɛ nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ ugeec, ma acin eleeti niigi aavtiyɔ ŋaḏinyiny. Utuluya ni bɔlɔk ci moneeco ka kubuŋti eleeti.
Ma yomana mazi azii niigi Jook ŋaati awɔyi mana kɛŋa, oroode kɛɛni eecitɔ.
Otowo ni Jooi eet ci mac o, ma anek nɛ, “Aavɛ ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kiziiknin uyen awɔ mana e. Kotoŋoliwin ni, ma karoodei ka calaŋ acinan, eeci kaavɛ ŋaḏinyiny.”
Ijin ni Jooi nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anekin nɛ, Aavɛ ŋaḏinyiny o? Adawu tɛ kɛbɛrɛ ci kɛɛt baal karicanekin calaŋ adei e?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaa baal anyaakan ka koromtewa e nɛɛn ci anyan kɛbɛrɛ ci keetu o, ma kadei.”
Ma ajin Jooi ŋaa anek nɛ, “Agɔɔn nɔkɔ naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kowat nɛɛn ci alabekan kadak o.”
Ɔtɔr ni Jooi kowat enek nɛ, “Giye o agɔɔnɛ gi nico katoryin ineet doon kelegene dook. Akatai zin inoko iitene nico ɛlɛ awɔ niina ŋaati ababatɛ kɛŋa, ma adei tɔdɔ iinya ci ŋaan arognɛ o dook.
Ma kanyin ineeta amartɔ kibeen ŋaa nɔkɔ, ma buk amarnɔ dɔlya cugooc. Arukuŋ gɔɔn tiŋeere niigi igeet ooti, ma aŋedetu niiga nɔɔgɔ zɔɔ.”
Enek ni Jooi ŋaa nɛ, “Kazaacekin ineet piryakzɛt nyayiinta, ma anyei balcɔn ci appe ɔrɔɔt ŋaati ookcanɛ. Arooŋ gɔɔn tiŋeere niina eet ɔrɔɔt, ma abalin ɛɛti ineet.”

Ma anek Jooi eet nɛ, “Giye o iziiyɛ niina zɔɔz ci ŋaa cun o, ma adayɛ kɛbɛrɛ ci kɛɛt baal kajurakin e, kator tɔdɔ. Akatai zin iitene nico ɛlɛ adɔi ŋaatun ŋaati ajowanɛ dayiin tɔdɔwai gaga nɔkɔ kiyo baale e. Apirna gɔɔn tiŋeere niina liŋliŋɔnta ɔrɔɔt ka jowa dayiin iinya ci ŋaan arognɛ o dook.
Aduŋna tiŋeere kɛɛna ceen bila been ciirɛn tɔdɔwai. Adei gɔɔn tiŋeere niina kɛbɛrɛ ci kɛɛn ci too.

Aliŋliŋ gɔɔn tiŋeere niina ɔrɔɔt zɛɛ ma amului ŋaati ɛɛvɛ tɔdɔ ka kudunai dayiin ci adei. Aliŋliŋ tiŋeere niina nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma amiironei tɔdɔ baal kɛɛnycanin e. Ma giye o ɛɛnɛ tɔdɔwa tiŋeere amiironei tɔdɔ.”
Akanek Adam ŋaa cin o zaar ci kazi Eev, eeci een niini yaati ɔl dook nɛɛn.
Ma agɔɔnak Manyi Jooi Adam ki ŋaa cin o rumanɛ ceen ruce ka kubuŋti eleeti.

Izi ni Manyi Jooi nɛ, “Inoko ɛɛti ci deer o ibilun kiyo naaga o. Anyawun gɛnyiz ci agawi gi ci abon ki gi ci gɛr. Alaŋ zin abon bodo ŋaati kanyekɛ nɔɔnɔ kadak kɛbɛrɛ ci kɛɛt o rogeto, ka korok rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.”
Ɔtɔɔk ni Manyi Jooi nɔɔnɔ mane o looc o kazi Idan, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kook kɛɛv tɔdɔ baal ɛɛnycanɛ niini nɔɔnɔ e.
Arek ni Jooi mana ci kazi Idan noko libire ci akɔ ki jen e toonnyai onin kazi Cɛrubim o anyak kabaz o wun amacuc looc, ma alanyit kalakalak ka kɛbɛk niini kɛɛt o rogɛt o abil kodot.
Oromtɛ ni Adam ki ŋaa cin kazi Eev noko, makacin anyawɔ, ma ookca logo onin kazi Ken. Ma azi nɛ, “Inoko kanyawa dole can tiritente o Manyi Jook.”
Bodo vurta otoyai niini logote o kazi Abel.
Mazi avɔ adikir lɔgɔz, izi Abel eet ci abal ɛɛza, aje Ken izi niini eet ci keevinto.
Ma iinyaye ogɛn anyaak Ken Jook kɛbɛrɛ ci kaal ogin aḏowa mana ka kiiya kidiŋdiŋani nɔɔnɔ taabinta.
Maje Abel anyaa niini morɛ ci nyɔɔn ceen abuu ɛɛzaye ogin, ma aku ataabi Jook. Atalɔ ni Jooi ŋaati Abel taabinte cin o.
Ma abor niini Ken ki taabinɛt cin o. Mazi acin Ken gi nico, onyooran ŋum, ma abor nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Enek ni Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abor nɔŋ naa? Naa anyooran ŋum o?

Waan tɛ tugu gi ci abona, kagama waan kaal cugun taabinto o labak. Mazi alaŋ agoon nɔkɔ, aaveekin oŋɛci ineet ceez tatoga, ma arɔɔŋ niini ka komogin ineet. Bar zin abon waan adoi ka mɔgɔ niina nɔɔnɔ.”
Mazi azii Ken gi nico enek gɔtɔni nɛ, “Abel, kɔtɔɔz di kɔɔtɔ tuuwa.” Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni. Mazi avɔ arum niigi balal, uruk niini gɔtɔni kadaak.
Iiya ni ijin Jooi nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Gotonu ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini Jook anek nɛ, “Alaŋ kaga. Matɛ ajinan o keen da naana bɛkcoi ci gɔtɔnɔna?”
Ma anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gitaz ci agoon noko? Kaga nɔkɔ uruwu gotonu kadaak. Inoko zin biyeta ci gotonon ona akana niina o aluwekan aneet arɔɔŋ cacinɛt.
Inoko niina anyei toriin, ma atooke tɔdɔwaye ci ona aḏuutonek biyeta ci gotonon noko, eeci umunyu gotonu niina maany.
Buk mã arooŋ ɛɛva mana, alaŋ abiir been nɛɛn, ka olla niina izi gi ci ayaŋyaŋ awɔ kɔkɔm yubzɛn loota.”
Ma anek Ken Jook nɛ, “Inoko niina apayeyan aneet payiin ci adɔi kak calaŋ kanim kanyak.
Cin di inoko ɔtɔɔyan ŋaati gɔɔn kabaayɛ o. Alaŋaan bodo naana kaganona ŋaati kabilnɛ ineet ŋuma, ma olla kayaŋyaŋ kawɔ kɔkɔm ŋinti kayubzɛ. Zin tiŋeere mã ajowanan ɛɛti oman aneet, arukan kadaak.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm. Mã arukin ɛɛti oman ineet daak, kacaca koca naana lak torgɛrɛm”. Arekɛ ni Jooi Ken bayen ka kɔkɔm eet ci aruk nɔɔnɔ.
Ɔtɔɔ ni Ken ŋaati aavɛ Jooi o, ma akɔ abaak looce o kazi Nad mana o Idan libire ci akɔ ki jen e.
Oromtɛ ni Ken kibeen ŋaa onin, ma arita logo o kazi Inok. Ma ɛɛnyca Ken kutur ci adikir, ma akanek zaar ci ŋɛɛrin o.
Ma arita Inok logo ci kazi Irad. Iiya ni Irad izi baati Mejal. Mejal izi baati Mezujal. Mezujal izi baati Lamɛk.
Ɔrɔca ni Lamɛk ŋaai ram. Kazi ŋaa codoi zaar nɛ Ida, bodo codoi kazi nɛ Zila.
Itira ni Ida Jabal o iiya izi jijiti ɔl o aluuk tiini.
Ma kazi gɔtɔni Jabal zaar nɛ Jubal o iiya izi niini jijiti ɔl o aruk kidorɛt, ma abo bɛɛlɛn.
Zila itira Tubalkin o adɛdɛ ziik. Ma anyak niini ŋɔɔni ci kazi Naama.
Ma iitene oman enek Lamɛk ŋaai cigin o beniinta nɛ, “Igeeta Ida ki Zila, iziiyit gi ci kaduwakuŋ ce ŋaai ogan. Mã anyak eet ci arookan aneet, karui koca naana nɔɔnɔ kadaak taman nɔkɔ.
Mã acacai ruwɛn o Ken lak torgɛrɛm, bar koca acaca ruwɛn cane o lak eet iiyu kamɔtɔ ki tiin torgɛrɛm (77).”
Bodo irkitowe ogɛn anyayit Adam ki Eev logo oma, ma azi Eev nɛ, “Inoko anyan Jooi logo oma ci ka kirigiz zɔɔ o Abel baal aruk Ken e.” Akatek ni niini nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Sez.
Mazi akɔ adikir Sez, itira niini ŋɛɛrin, ma akanek nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi nɛ Inos.
Akata ni ɔl waanice ween ci awoyi zaar o Joowo.
Keebinɛt ci dɔl o Adam nɛɛn ce. Baale ma ɛɛnyca Jooi eet ci deer e, ɛɛnyca kotobtɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
Ɛɛnyca niini eet ci mac ki ŋaa. Ma amayuk nɔɔgɔ, ma awo nɔɔgɔ kizi ɔl ci deer.
Mazi akɔ een Adam irkitowa eet tɔrkɔnɔm kamɔtɔ (130), itira niini ŋɛɛrin ci atobɔ ki nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ, ma akanek zaar ci kazi Sez.
Vurte ci Sez abaak Adam irkitok eet tur lak turge (800). Itira ni bodo lɔgɔz oogi been dɔl ci ŋaai.
Ma arogi Adam irkitok eet tur lak tɔrkɔc ki eetoma kamɔtɔ (930). Adaak ni.
Mazi akɔ abaak Sez irkitok eet tur ki tiin tur (105), itiryai ŋɛɛrin o kazi Inos.
Vurte o tiryan o Inos, abaak Sez irkitok eet tur lak turge ki tiin torgɛrɛm (807). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz oogi ki dɔl ci ŋaai.
Ma arogi Sez irkitok eet tur lak tɔrkɔc kamɔtɔ ki tiin ram (912). Adaak ni.
Mazi akɔ een irkitowa o Inos eet tur lak tɔrkɔc (90), itiryai ŋɛɛrin o kazi Kenan.
Ma vurte o tiryan o Kenan, abaak Inos irkitok eet tur lak turge kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (815). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Ma arogi Inos irkitok eet tur lak tɔrkɔc ki tiin tur (905). Adaak ni.
Mazi akɔ abaak Kenan irkitok eet iiyu kamɔtɔ (70), itiryai ŋɛɛrin o kazi Malalil.
Ma vurte o tiryan o Malalil, abaak Kenan irkitok eet tur lak turge ki eet ram (840), ma ariti bodo lɔgɔz been dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Ma arogi Kenan irkitok eet tur lak tɔrkɔc kamɔtɔ (910). Adaak ni.
Mazi akɔ abaak Malalil irkitok eet iiyu kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (65), itiryai ŋɛɛrin o kazi Jaret.
Vurte o tiryan o Jaret, abaak Malalil irkitok eet tur lak turge ki eetoma kamɔtɔ (830). Itira ni bodo lɔgɔz been dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Ma arogi Malalil irkitok eet tur lak turge ki eet wec kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (895). Adaak ni.
Mazi akɔ een irkitowa o Jaret eet turge ki tiin ram (162), itiryai ŋɛɛrin o kazi Inok.
Ma vurte o tiryan o Inok abaak Jaret irkitok eet tur lak turge (800). Itira ni bodo lɔgɔz been dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Ma arogi Jaret irkitok eet tur lak tɔrkɔc ki eet iiyu ki tiin ram (962). Adaak ni.
Mazi akɔ een Inok irkitowa eet iiyu ki tiin tur (65), itiryai ŋɛɛrin o kazi Mezuzala.
Vurte o tiryan o Mezuzala orkorit Inok ki Jook irkitok eet tur lak iiyu (300). Itira ni bodo lɔgɔz been dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Ma arogi Inok irkitok eet tur lak iiyu ki eet iiyu ki tiin tur (365).
Tup nɔkɔ ɔrkɔr Inok ki Jook, ma iitene oman izi niini ḏim. Ooyi Jooi nɔɔnɔ tamma rogɛtɛt.
Mazi akɔ een Mezuzala irkitowa eet tɔrkɔc ki tiin torgɛrɛm (187), itiryai ŋɛɛrin o kazi Lamɛk.
Ma vurte o tiryan o Lamɛk abaak Mezuzala irkitok eet tur lak torgɛrɛm ki eet wec ki tiin ram (782). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔ been dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Ma arogi Mezuzala irkitok eet tur lak tɔrkɔc ki eet iiyu ki tiin tɔrkɔc (969). Adaak ni.
Mazi akɔ een irkitowa o Lamɛk eet tɔrkɔc ki tiin ram (182), itira logoz.
Ma akanek nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Nowa, ma azi nɛ, “Atiritet tiŋeere logoti nici liŋliŋɔnta kibeen piryakzete o akunaket ageet giye o ɔtɔri Jooi looc.”
Ma vurte o tiryan o Nowa abaak Lamɛk irkitok eet tur lak tur ki eet wec kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (595). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz been dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Ma arogi Lamɛk irkitok eet tur lak torgɛrɛm ki eet iiyu kamɔtɔ ki tiin torgɛrɛm (777). Adaak ni.
Mazi akɔ een irkitowa o Nowa eet tur lak tur (500), itiryai lɔgɔz ciginɛ een iiyu kazi zaar cigeec nɛ Cɛm, ki Am, kibeen Javaz.
Baale akɔ mazi ɔɔt azaace ɔl loota kizi mɛɛlɛ, ma itiryai dɔlya ci ŋaaiye ŋaatineeŋ e, icinit lɔgɔz ci joowanɛ oogi kabarzɛ ci ɔl ci deer o alina ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔc niigi nɔɔgɔ.
Baale akɔ mazi ɔɔt azaace ɔl loota kizi mɛɛlɛ, ma itiryai dɔlya ci ŋaaiye ŋaatineeŋ e, icinit lɔgɔz ci joowanɛ oogi kabarzɛ ci ɔl ci deer o alina ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔc niigi nɔɔgɔ.
Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Alaŋ bodo vɔŋizi onane rogeto aavi eete ci deer kodot loota ŋina, eeci niini een gi ci adaai. Alaŋ niini arogi katayaŋ irkitok ceen eet tɔrkɔnɔm (120).”

Mazi waanice avɔ aromɛ lɔgɔz ci joowanɛ oogi o kibeen dɔl ci ɔl ci deer neke, itirta niigi ŋaatineeŋ baraknya ci appintik ɔrɔɔt loota ŋina. Baraknya nicigi iziti niigi olenya ci mootik ci agayi ɔrɔɔt iinyaye niceke.

Mazi acin Jooi izi gerzitin appe ɔrɔɔt eete ci deer loota, ma akɔ baabani o zinzeeti ugeec ki gerzitin iinya dook nɔkɔ, abadun niini mony giye ci ɛɛnycanɛ eet ci deer loota o, ma awucnyek nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz nici ziniza ɔrɔɔt.

Mazi acin Jooi izi gerzitin appe ɔrɔɔt eete ci deer loota, ma akɔ baabani o zinzeeti ugeec ki gerzitin iinya dook nɔkɔ, abadun niini mony giye ci ɛɛnycanɛ eet ci deer loota o, ma awucnyek nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz nici ziniza ɔrɔɔt.
Izi ni Jooi nɛ, “Abon kɛɛya loota ŋina eet ci deer baal kɛɛnyca noko, ki kɛlɛk, ki kibaali, kibeen kaal o awɔ keŋtinɛ. Inoko naana kabadi mony giye o kɛtɛɛnyayɛ nɔɔgɔ.”
Bar zin waanice Nowa doon ci atalnɛ Manyi Jooi ŋaatin.
Ceeni zin zɔɔz o akati Nowa. Niini eet ci abona ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Abona waanice niini doon ole niceke dook, ma ɔrkɔr niini ki Jook tup nɔkɔ.
Anyak niini waanice ŋɛɛrigin ceen iiyu ci kazi Cɛm, ki Am, kibeen Javaz.
Acin zin Jooi waanice ɔl ci deer o loota ŋina agɔɔn kaal ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt, ma anyawun lɔɔci yowonok ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Acin niini looc izi gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci ɔl o loocu dook abaayit baayiz ci gɛr.
Enek ni niini Nowa nɛ, “Inoko karooŋ kuulal ɔl ci deer o dook kibeen looc buk kizeectɔ, eeci adala gerzitin ci eet ci deer looc dook ɔrɔɔt.
Inoko zin niina tɛɛnya kavool ci appe aleenonu ki ineet keene ci adɔi kak aganɔ ki tɛɛnyinɛt. Tuguwa keŋti ci meelik kavoola eecitɔ. Dilɔ eecitɔ ki bawuca buk zooyɛni.

Yabiza corcoritin ci kavoolo o kizi mitirɛt eet tɔrkɔnɔm kamɔtɔ ki tiin iiyu (133). Yabiza kɛŋ eecitɔ kɔlɔɔlanɛ kizi mitirɛt eetoma ki tiin ram (22). Yabiza wunzɛt ci akɔ ki taden o kizi mitirɛt amɔnki iiyu (13).
Tɛɛny rukcok ci abuŋ kavool taden. Tɛɛnya buk kavool keŋti iiyu ci ataadizɔ. Arek kavool karogi kabanyca.
Kakɔ naana kitoona tawan ka kuruk kaal dook o arogi loota kadaayitɔ.
Ŋaan zin katerkedekin ineet terkediin ci ka kɛɛlayin. Bitɔ kavoola niina ki ŋaa unun kibeen dɔl ugun been ŋaai ci lɔgɔz ugun.
Biti buk kavoola eecitɔ gi ci mac ki gi ci ŋai kaale ci arogi noko dook ka oromtɛ ki ineet ka zooti nɔɔgɔ.
Biti buk kavoola eecitɔ gi ci mac ki gi ci ŋai kaale ci arogi noko dook ka oromtɛ ki ineet ka zooti nɔɔgɔ.
Biti buk dayiin keŋti dook ka adayit niina kibeen kaal ci arogi o dook.”
Utugu ni Nowa kaal dook eo aduwakɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ adicai kavooli tɛɛnyinta, enek Jooi Nowa nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ niina kibeen ɔl o kɔrɔk unun dook kavoola, eeci kacinin ineet doon een eet ci abona ole ci ɔɔ nico noko dook.
Kelegene o abal ɔl dook biti ŋaatineeŋ ci mac torgɛrɛm kibeen ci ŋai torgɛrɛm. Bodo kelegene calaŋ abal ɔl o biti ŋaatineeŋ ci mac codoi kibeen ci ŋai codoi.
Kibaalinɛ buk biti ci mac torgɛrɛm kibeen ci ŋai torgɛrɛm. Abon agoon nɔkɔ ka kitirit kaala nici kazaantozek looc dook.
Mã adicai iinya ceen torgɛrɛm, kitoona tammu kitiil waazin ki baalin iinya eet ram (40) ka kɛɛyai kaal o arogi dook loota.”
Utugu ni Nowa kaal dook eo aduwakɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
Zin waanice ma akunak tawani looc e een Nowa irkitowa oginɛ tiryanto eet tur lak tɔrkɔnɔm (600).
Ma akɔ kavoola niini ki ŋɛɛrigin ki ŋaa onin kibeen ŋaai o lɔgɔz ogin ka kajaarit niigi tawan o akuuwa looc dook.
Ma avɔ buk kavoola kelegiti ci mac ki ci ŋai kelegene dook, ki kibaalic ci mac ki ci ŋai kibaaline dook ebaal aduwakɛ Jooi Nowa e.
Ma avɔ buk kavoola kelegiti ci mac ki ci ŋai kelegene dook, ki kibaalic ci mac ki ci ŋai kibaaline dook ebaal aduwakɛ Jooi Nowa e.
Mazi adicai iinya baal een torgɛrɛm e, iiya tawani.

Ma irkite o ɛɛnɛ Nowa irkitowa oginɛ tiryanto eet tur lak tɔrkɔnɔm (600), nyelowene ween ram, iinyaye ween amɔnki torgɛrɛm (17), ɔbɔryai maama ci meelik ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ loota, ma atiilna tammu lɔmɛn ci appintik.
Ma atiil tammu waazin ki baalin iinya eet ram (40).
Maje iitene nice ɛlɛ aavtiz Nowa ki ŋɛɛrigin Cɛm, ki Am, kibeen Javaz, ki ŋaa onin, kibeen ŋaai ci ŋɛɛrigin ceen iiyu noko kavoola.
Ma buk anyak kavoola kɛlɛk ci mac ki ci ŋai kelegene dook.
Ma buk anyak kavoola kɛlɛk ci mac ki ci ŋai kelegene dook.
Agooni kaala nici dook ebaal aduwakɛ Jooi Nowa e. Onyoogek ni Jooi nɔɔgɔ kavool eecitɔ.
Ma atiil tammu iinya ceen eet ram (40) noko dook, ma azaaci maama, ma adɔŋ kavool kook ki taden.
Ma azaaci maama nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma adala looc dook. Maje kavooli ariit maam gilana.
Ma amɛna maama azaaci ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔ zɛɛ makacin ukuuwa biyɛn o wuntik dook loota.
Ma azaaci nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma ayaŋ biyɛn, ma een yabziin ci ayabzin maama ci ayaŋ biyɛn o doon mitirɛt torgɛrɛm.
Ma adaai kaala o arogi loota dook lai, kibaali, ki kɛlɛk, ki ɔl o deer dook loota.
Ma adaai kaala o arogi loota dook lai, kibaali, ki kɛlɛk, ki ɔl o deer dook loota.
Ma ɛɛya Jooi kaal o ɛɛl loota dook, ɔl ci deer, ki kɛlɛk, kibeen kibaali. Ma arogi Nowa ki o aromɛ ki nɔɔnɔ kavoola doon.
Ma abitiz maama looc iinya eet tɔrkɔnɔm kamɔtɔ (150).
Mazi akɔ adala maama looc e, ŋaan Jook kereyek Nowa ki kɛlɛk o aromɛ ki nɔɔnɔ kavoola dook. Anyaa ni Jooi ŋɔɔt ka kivaan maam ka kimiirte maama ki looc.
Ma ativani diizwana tiilɛza, ma ativani buk maama baal abɔryai loota e.
Ma amiiri maama ki looc zɛɛ mazi een iinya eet torgɛrɛm kamɔtɔ (150), owodjai.
Ma iinyaye ween amɔnki torgɛrɛm (17) nyelowe ween torgɛrɛm, agamɛ kavooli biyene o kazi Ararat ootinɛ, ibil ni ŋinaante.
Ma amiiri maama kidicilim nɔkɔ zɛɛ been nyelok ween amɔtɔ. Ma iitene o akanan nyɛlɔyi ween amɔtɔ eyelizyai biyɛn ooti kicinit.
Mazi akɔ adicai iinya ceen eet ram (40) bodo, ɔkɔl Nowa nyapildiŋ o kavoolo.
Ma itoon walaak kook kicin looc mã anyak ŋinti adɔi. Ma akul walaak, ma akɔ amalil tammu kɛŋa ka kɛrɛwɔ zɛɛ ma awodjai maama loota imin calaŋ abada.
Ma areyi Nowa zɛɛ makacin itoon yɛɛlac ka kook kicin maam mã owodjai, eeci alaŋaan walaak abada.
Bar acin yɛɛlac maam ŋaan akuuwa looc dook, makacin abadaak bodo kavool, eeci akɔm ŋinti ka kibili. Itoona ni Nowa aziit kavoola, ma agama yɛɛlac, ma anyaak kavool eecitɔ.
Ma aavi iinya torgɛrɛm. Itoon ni bodo yɛɛlac.
Mazi abada yɛɛlac yomana, anyaa boloyitot ci kiŋiroco colai otoga. Agawun ni Nowa izi maama kidicɛ loota.
Ma amɔn bodo iinya torgɛrɛm, ma itoon yɛɛlac Enico alaŋaan yɛɛlac abada bodo.
Mazi akɔ een Nowa irkitowa eet tur lak tɔrkɔnɔm ki irkit codoi (601), iitene o oowu nyelowe wodoi, owodjai maama. Ɔkɔl ni Nowa kavool, ma acin maam awodjai.
Ma iinyaye ween eetom ki tiin torgɛrɛm (27) nyelowe ween ram, ɛvɛɛc lɔɔci kɔdɔk kak.
Enek ni Jooi Nowa nɛ, “Udunta kavoola labak ki ŋaa unun ki lɔgɔz kibeen ŋaai ugeec.
Enek ni Jooi Nowa nɛ, “Udunta kavoola labak ki ŋaa unun ki lɔgɔz kibeen ŋaai ugeec.
Dunai buk kɛlɛk ki kibaali dook bitaala ka kivita kitirit loota zɛɛ ma adala looc dook.”
Uduna ni Nowa ki ŋaa onin kibeen lɔgɔz been ŋaa ugeec.
Ma aduŋna kɛlɛgɛ ki kibaali dook kavoola. Ono ni gɔɔn kelegiti ceeni gɔn onin atobɔ.
Ɛtɛɛnya ni Nowa ŋinti ka kidiŋdiŋani Jook. Ma anyaa kɛlɛk ci abon diŋdiŋanito ki kibaali ci abon. Ma akɔ avaat nɔɔgɔ ŋaati ona ɛɛnyca niini ka kidiŋdiŋani Jook o.

Mazi acɔɔk Jooi cɔɔlil nico, atalɔ niini, ma anek ɛlɛ maany nɛ, “Alaŋ bodo kator looc been nɛɛn giye ci akati gerzitin ci eet ci deer. Mayo nuun ɛɛti ci deer anyak baabani ci gɛr o, alaŋ bodo kadica kaalyan ci arogi loota noko dook been nɛɛn ebaal kagɔɔnɛ rak e.
Akatai zin inoko ka kanyak ḏowɛn ki teedinɛt, ma anyak tagiz ki lɔɔlɔ, ma anyak waazin ki baalin.”
Amayuk ni Jooi Nowa kibeen dɔl ogin anek nɛ, “Itirit. Azaace iziti mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt ka ibitizit looc.
Aŋolunuŋ gɔɔn tiŋeere igeet kɛlɛgɛ, ki kibaali, kibeen kuluk. Ma anyaku niiga dɔyiz ŋaatineeŋ looc dook.
Inoko kanyuŋ naana igeet nɔɔgɔ dook ka kizi niigi dayiin cugooc kiyo rak baale kanyuŋ igeet kaal o aḏoyai colai dook e.
Bar zin gɔɔn abon rak aaranu biye idiŋa maŋaan adayit. Abon agoon nɔkɔ o, eeci rogɛti abil biyɛtɛ.
Mã aruk ɛɛti gɔn kadaak, avavonek buk niini gɔn nico. Mã aruk kelegiti eet ci deer kadaak, avavonek buk niini.
Ɛɛnycai ɛɛti ci deer kotobtɔ ki Jook. Mazi amony ɛɛti ci deer gɔn oma, aruwe buk niini kadaak giye ci agɔɔn niini o.
Itirit zin iziti mɛɛlɛ. Azaace zɛɛ ma adalanu looc dook.”
Ma anek Jooi bodo Nowa kibeen dɔl ogin nɛ, “Inoko naana kaduwakuŋ terkediin onan igeet kibeen dɔl ci dɔl ci anowanuŋ igeet vurta e,
Ma anek Jooi bodo Nowa kibeen dɔl ogin nɛ, “Inoko naana kaduwakuŋ terkediin onan igeet kibeen dɔl ci dɔl ci anowanuŋ igeet vurta e,
kibeen buk kɛlɛk ki kibaali dook o aromenu ki igeet kavoola.
Katerkedekuŋ igeet gi calaŋ bodo kaala o arogi dook adaakni tawana been nɛɛn.
Ceeni zin bayen ci terkediin onan abil kodot o katerkedekuŋ naana igeet kibeen kaal o arogi dook.
Inoko kareya bɔrɔi onan kibil diizwani ka kizi bayen ci ayelza terkediin onan ki kaal o loocu dook.
Mã kanyaa diizwa, ma yelzai bɔrɔyɛ diizwani, kaada naana terkediin onan akati aneet ki igeet been kaal o arogi dook ka calaŋ bodo aku tawani kiiya kidica kaal o arogi loota dook.
Mã kanyaa diizwa, ma yelzai bɔrɔyɛ diizwani, kaada naana terkediin onan akati aneet ki igeet been kaal o arogi dook ka calaŋ bodo aku tawani kiiya kidica kaal o arogi loota dook.
Ma ayelzai bɔrɔyɛ diizwani, ŋaan kacin naana nɔɔnɔ, ma kaada terkediin onan abil kodot kaale o arogi loota dook.”
Ma anek Jooi Nowa nɛ, “Nicini zin bayen o terkediin onan kibeen kaal o arogi loota dook nɛɛn.”
Lɔgɔz zin o Nowa baal aduŋna kavoola e nɛɛn Cɛm, ki Am, been Javaz. Ma Am niini baati Kanan.
Lɔgɔz zin ci Nowa een iiyu noko nɛɛn o arita ɔl o loocu dook.
Nowa waanice niini eet ci keviinto. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o akana ḏowɛn o kɛɛn o anyak kɛbɛrɛ.
Ma iitene oman owot niini nyaan ci acoryai keberene ci keenu noko zɛɛ makacin abaayɛ, ma ɔɔŋ ŋaḏinyiny kɔkɔm gi ci abuŋi ɛlɛ.
Mazi acin Am ween baati Kanan baatin ŋaati ɔɔŋɛ ŋaḏinyiny noko, uduna ceeza, ma akɔ aduwak gɔtɔnɔgi ween ram bitaala rarya.
Odomta ni Cɛm kibeen Javaz rum, ma ataadek inyaati ugeec niigi dook ramantiya, ma awɔ eeci bawuco zɛɛ ma avɔ abuŋ baatineeŋ ci ɔɔŋ ŋaḏinyiny o calaŋ niigi acin nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ɔɔŋɛ ŋaḏinyiny o.
Mazi akɔ iŋaaz Nowa baayiinta, agawun gi o agoonek ŋɛɛrin o kazi Am nɔɔnɔ.
Izi ni niini nɛ, “Kator Kanan ween dole o Am ka kizi gabaren ci dɔl o yaatin.”
Ma azi bodo nɛ, “Abon bai Jooi amayuk Cɛm, ma abon anyek Kanan kizi gabaren ci Cɛm.
Ma abon azaac Jooi dɔl ci Javaz, ma abon abaak niigi kibeen dɔl o Cɛm. Maje Kanan abon buk een niini gabaren ci Javaz.”
Ma vurte o tawano abaak Nowa irkitok eet tur lak iiyu ki eet ram kamɔtɔ (350).
Ma arogi Nowa zɛɛ ma een irkitowa oginɛ tiryanto dook eet tur lak tɔrkɔc ki eet ram kamɔtɔ (950), adaak ni.
Ceegi zin dɔl ci lɔgɔz o Nowa kazi Cɛm ki Am kibeen Javaz. Anyayit niigi dɔl cigeec vurte o tawano.
Dɔl ci Javaz nɛɛn Goma ki Magok ki Midai ki Javan ki Tubal ki Mecek been Tiraz.
Dɔl ci Goma nɛɛn Akanaz ki Rivat been Togoma.
Aje Javan dɔl cigin nɛɛn Elica ki Tarca ki Kitim been Roda.
Ma ɔl nicigi dook abaak waanice liilok utugetinɛ kibeen vitɛnanɛ o aliya maama. Ma azaani niigi kizi boryok ki modɛn ci aŋɔrɔwɔ loocowa kibeen zoozok.
Dɔl ci Am nɛɛn Kuc ki Masir ki Put kibeen Kanan.
Dɔl ci Kuc nɛɛn Ceba ki Avala ki Cabta ki Raama kibeen Zabtaca. Dɔl ci Raama nɛɛn Ceba been Dedan.
Buk Kuc niini baati logo o kazi Nimad o iiya izi eet o adɔi ɔrɔɔt ɔrɔɔnta.
Ma buk amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ kizi eet ci ceeliinto agayi. Ma aruk ɔl olit ŋaati azɔɔzɔnɛ azi nɛ, “Amayukin Jooi ineet izi eet ci ceeliinto adikir agayɛ otobtɔ ki Nimad.”
Vitɛn ci baale abal niini ɔɔwa nɛɛn kuturyowa o kazi Babilan ki Irec ki Akad been Kalnet. Kuturyowa nicigi dook ɛɛl looce o kazi Cinar.
Ma vurte nice ook niini looce o kazi Asiriya, ma akɔ abaak ŋinaante, ma ɛɛnyca kutur o kazi Ninava ki Rebot ki Calak
been Resan o aŋɛr Ninava ki Kala.
Dɔl ci Masiro kazi zaar cigeec nɛ Ludim ki Anamin ki Labim ki Navutim
ki Patrosa ki Kaslu been Karit ween baati modɛn o kazi Viliztiya.
Ma Kanan niini baati Sidon ki Ititaz
ki Jebta ki Amorita ki Gagacatiz
ki Aavata ki Arketa ki Cinata
ki Arvadata ki Zemarata been Amata.

Ma vurta azaantɛ dɔl o dɔl o Kanan kɔɔt kurumit niigi baayiza loocok o kazi Kanan, ki Sidona, ki Gɛrar, ma avɔ kɔɔt kojoŋozit Gaza, ma avɔ ki jen zɛɛ ma avɔ ajɔŋɔz Sodom ki Gomora ki Adama been Zeboyim o ajɔŋɔz ŋino kazi Laaca.
Nicigi dook dɔl ci dɔl o Am. Dɔlya ci Am noko iziti buk niigi modɛn ci aŋɔrɔwɔ zoozowa, ma aŋɔrɔwɔ loocowa buk.
Cɛm niini abuu nɛɛn. Aje Javaz tutur. Ma Cɛm niini baati ɔl o kazi Ibiro.
Dɔl o Cɛm nɛɛn Ilam ki Acir ki Arpat ki Ludi been Arma.
Arma dɔl cigin nɛɛn Uziya ki Ulak ki Getar been Maacak.
Arpat niini baati Cela. Maje Cela iiya izi niini baati Eber.
Eber anyak lɔgɔz ram. Codoi kazi nɛ Pɛlɛk, eeci waanice aŋɛrɔ ɔl dook iitene nice. Gɔtɔni oma kazi zaar nɛ Joktan.
Zin Joktan iiya izi niini baati Almoda ki Celap ki Azarmiya ki Jɛra
ki Adoram ki Uzal ki Dikila
ki Obal ki Abimal ki Ceba
ki Opir ki Aavila been Jobab.
Abaak niigi biyɛn libire ci jenu e akana ŋaao kazi Mesa zɛɛ been Cepar.
Nicigi dook dɔl ci dɔl o Cɛm. Dɔlya ci Cɛm noko iiya iziti niigi modɛn ci aŋɔrɔwɔ zoozowa, ma aŋɔrɔwɔ loocowa buk.
Dɔl nicigi dook dɔl o Nowa. Vurte o tawano itiryai modɛna dook dolene ogin.
Baale laadun ɔɔwa e ɔl dook loocowɛ azɔɔz zɔɔz codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
Ma aluugonek niigi libir ci akɔ ki jen e zɛɛ makacin ivitak ŋinti een ŋɛwɔn looce o kazi Cinar o kazi zaar oogi nɛ Babilan, ma abaak ŋinaante.
Izitɔ ni niigi ŋinaante nɛ, “Ivita kutuguza tɛgɛrɛm ka kotoozit kodoyit ka kɛtɛɛnyci kutur cinai ŋina kibeen ceez ci wun kurum tammu taden.” Utuguza ni niigi tɛgɛrɛm ki robrobo ci ka kɛtɛɛnycɔi.
Izitɔ ni nɛ, “Inoko zin kitiŋgaz keteenyit ceez ci wun ɔrɔɔt kurum diizwa ka katanaaztɛ, ma kabaak naaga dook ŋaatodoi calaŋ kazaanonek looc.”
Iiya ni Jooi looc ka kiiya kicin kutur kibeen ceez ci wun ɛɛnyɛt ɛɛti ci deer o.

Izi ni niini nɛ, “Inoko mã adoye ɔl, ma azɔɔz niigi zɔɔz codoi, ma akana gi ci abil kiyo nici noko, bar tiŋeere vurta akɔm gi ci akɔmnek nɔɔgɔ ŋaati agɔɔni been nɛɛn. Abon zin inoko kalam nɔɔgɔ ka calaŋ agɔɔn nɔkɔ.
Kɔɔtɔ loota ka kuulalit zɔɔz cineeŋ azɔɔzi o ka calaŋ aziiŋnɔ.”
Iiya ni azaanek Jooi nɔɔgɔ looc dook, makacin ibil ceez uneeŋ tɛɛnyinta.
Akanonek zin kutur nice zaara ci kazi Babilan o, eeci waanice uulal Jooi ɔl ŋinaante calaŋ aziiŋnɔ zɔɔz. Ma azaanek niini nɔɔgɔ looc dook.
Ceegi zin dɔl ci dɔl o Cɛm. Mazi adicai irkitowa raman vurte o tawano, waanbaal izɔi Cɛm irkitowa eet tur (100), itira niini logo onin kazi Arpat.
Vurte nice abaak bodo Cɛm irkitok eet tur lak tur (500). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Mazi een Arpat irkitowa eetoma kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (35), itira ŋɛɛrin o kazi Cela.
Ma vurte nice abaak niini irkitok eet tur lak wec ki tiin iiyu (403), ma arita bodo lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Mazi een Cela irkitowa eetoma kamɔtɔ (30), itira niini ŋɛɛrin o kazi Eber.
Vurte nice abaak bodo Cela irkitok eet tur lak wec ki tiin iiyu (403). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Mazi een Eber irkitowa ogine eetoma kamɔtɔ ki tiin wec (34), itira niini ŋɛɛrin o kazi Pɛlɛk.
Vurte nice abaak bodo Eber irkitok eet tur lak wec ki eetoma kamɔtɔ (430). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Mazi een Pɛlɛk irkitowa eetoma kamɔtɔ (30), itira niini ŋɛɛrin o kazi Reyu.
Vurte nice abaak bodo Pɛlɛk irkitok eet tur lak ram ki tiin tɔrkɔc (209). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Mazi een Reyu irkitowa eetoma kamɔtɔ ki tiin ram (32), itira niini ŋɛɛrin o kazi Seruk.
Vurte nice abaak bodo Reyu irkitok eet tur lak ram ki tiin torgɛrɛm (207). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Mazi een irkitowa o Seruk eetoma kamɔtɔ (30), itira niini ŋɛɛrin o kazi Nayor.
Vurte nice abaak bodo Seruk irkitok eet tur lak ram (200). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Mazi een irkitowa o Nayor eetoma ki tiin tɔrkɔc (29), itira niini ŋɛɛrin o kazi Tɛrɛ.
Vurte nice abaak bodo Nayor irkitok eet tur kamɔtɔ ki tiin tɔrkɔc (119). Itira ni bodo niini lɔgɔz ki dɔl ci ŋaai oogi.
Mazi een irkitowa o Tɛrɛ eet iiyu kamɔtɔ (70), itira niini lɔgɔz iiyu kazi zaar nɛ Abram ki Nayor been Eran.
Ceegi zin dɔl ci dɔl o Tɛrɛ. Anyak niini ŋɛɛrigin iiyu o kazi zaar nɛ Abram ki Nayor been Eran. Iiya ni Eran izi baati Lat.
Mazi ŋaan arogi Tɛrɛ nɔkɔ, adaak Eran kuture onin aritan kazi Uur.
Ma arɔcɛ Nayor kibeen Abram buk. Kazi ŋaa ci Abram o zaar nɛ Sarai. Aje ŋaa ci Nayor o kazi zaar nɛ Milka. Niini tinati Eran ween buk baati Izka.
Maje Sarai awɔ koliin kɔkɔm dɔl.

Uluuk ni Tɛrɛ kuture o kazi Uur. Ɔrkɔr niini ki ŋɛɛrin o kazi Abram, ki Sarai ween ŋaa o Abram, ki Lat ween ŋɛɛrti logo onin kazi Eran arɔɔŋ kook looce o kazi Kanan, bar zin ŋaan kurumit. Arum niigi looc o kazi Giran, ma abaak ŋinaante.
Mazi akɔ een irkitowa o Tɛrɛ eet tur lak ram ki tiin tur (205), adaak niini looce ci kazi Giran noko ŋinaante.
Ma iitene oman enek Jooi Abram nɛ, “Tiŋa! Toŋ looc cun noko ki atenok ugun been kɔrɔk o baatun. Bitɔ looce ci ŋaan kakɔ kayelekin ineet.
Kanyin tiŋeere ineet dɔl ci meelik ŋinaante, ma eegin tiŋeere niigi bor ci appe ɔrɔɔt. Kamayukin tiŋeere ineet, ma kanyi zaar ugun kagaye ɔrɔɔt. Amayuwi tiŋeere ɔl dook zaare cugun.
Kamayui tiŋeere ɔl o amayukin ineet, ma kator ɔl o atoryin ineet. Kamayui katin naana modɛn dook ŋaatun.”
Itiŋawa ni Abram looce o kazi Giran ebaal aduwakɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ e. Ɔrkɔr niini kibeen Lat. Maje iinyaye niceke izi Abram irkitowa oginɛ eet iiyu kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (75).
Ma akɔyi niini ŋaa onin kazi Sarai been ŋɛɛrti gɔtɔnɔn ci kazi Lat o, ma avɔyi niigi kaal ugeecik dook, kibeen ɔl o aliŋliŋonek nɔɔgɔ buk. Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni zɛɛ ma avɔ arum looc ci kazi Kanan o.
Mazi avɔ arum niigi ŋinite, ook otonowa Abram looc zɛɛ ma aku arum kɛɛt ci appe kazi Mora looce o kazi Cekam. Maje iinyaye niceke ŋaan abaak ɔl o kazi Kanan looce nice.
Eyelzak ni Jooi Abram ɛlɛ, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nicini looc o ka kanyek dɔl ci dɔl ugun nɛɛn.” Ɛtɛɛnya ni Abram ŋinaante ŋinti ka kidiŋdiŋani Jook o ayelzak nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ.
Aluuk ni bodo, ma akɔ ŋaati kutul ajɔŋɔz kutur o kazi Bezal libire ci jenu e. Ma akɔ adɔdɔ kɛɛmanɛ ŋaati aŋɛr Bezal been Aya. Ŋinaante ɛtɛɛnya buk ŋinti taabinto, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook ŋinaante.
Uluuk ni bodo niini ook vitɛnane ogɛn libire ci akɔ ki tɛnɛt e. Iicak akɔ ki looc o kazi Negev.
Ma irkite oman anyawun lɔɔci ci kazi Kanan noko tarjo ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Makacin ɔtɔɔ Abram ook Masire ka kook kabaak rak ŋintimiliny ŋinaante, eeci appe magiz ɔrɔɔt.
Mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz Masir, enek ŋaa cin kazi Sarai o nɛ, “Inoko niina een ŋaa ci alina ɔrɔɔt.

Inoko tedec ma acinin ɔl ceen Masir noko ineet, ma agayin een niina ŋaa can, arukan koca tedec niigi aneet kadaak, ma uuŋnin ineet. Abon zin anei niina nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Alaŋ keen ŋaa ci Abram, gɛrzɛ ŋaan arukan kadaak, ka kootin ineet giye o alinanɛ niina ɔrɔɔt.
Bar abon anei nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Keen ŋɔɔni Abram gi. Mã agoon nɔkɔ, akɔm koca gi ci gɛr akunakan.”
Mazi akɔ arum Abram ki ŋaa Masir, icinit didi Masira ŋaa linat o alinan ɔrɔɔt.
Mazi acin ɔl ween inyaati o alaan o adikir kazi Vɛɛro ŋaa linat nɔkɔ, ɔɔt uduktak niigi alaan anek nɛ, “Anyak ŋaa ci alina ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ŋaato.” Iiya ni ooti ɔl Sarai ole o alaano.
Ma atalna Vɛɛro Abram juruŋ giye ci akati Sarai, ma ajowa Abram ɛɛza ki tiin ki zigire ki nyakalɛt been gabara ci aliŋliŋonek nɔɔnɔ.
Itoonek ni Jooi Vɛɛro kibeen kɔrɔk onin mɔɔriz ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ giye ci akɔyi niini Sarai ceen ŋaa ci Abram o.
Mazi akɔ aga Vɛɛro labiin ci alabɛkɛ Abram nɔɔnɔ ŋaa cin o, otowa nɔɔnɔ, ma aku anek nɛ, “Gitaz ci agoonekan noko? Naa alaŋ aduwakan anekan nɛ, Nicini ŋaa can, naa?
Naa alabanan azi nɛ, Nicini ŋɔɔna gi, makacin kooyɛ kizi ŋaa can o naa? Inoko zin ŋaa unun ce. Biti, tiŋa ŋina, tɔ.”
Ma aricanek Vɛɛro takirnya ogin zɔɔz ci ka kɔtɔɔkti Abram. Otooyit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ ki ŋaa cin o kooti kaal ugeec dook.
Uluuga ni Abram Masirɛ ki ŋaa onin ki kaal ogin dook been Lat, ma avunak bodo looc o kazi Kanan.
Zin inoko Abram izi kabaran ci anyak tiin ki ɛɛza, ma anyak buk warki.
Akata ni luuge ŋaa o kazi Negev, ma azɔp vitɛn ci meelik zɛɛ ma akɔ arum ŋin o aŋɛr Bezal been Aya baal rak abaayi niini ɔɔwa e.
Maje ŋinaante ɛtɛɛnya niini baale laadun ŋinti taabinto. Idiŋdiŋan ni niini Jook bodo ŋinaante.
Maje Lat o ɔrkɔr ki Abram anyak buk niini tiin ki ɛɛza ki atenok cigin been gabara ci aliŋliŋonek nɔɔnɔ.
Alaŋ zin kuturi nici anyak artɛ ci alɛɛnɔ ki tiin been ɛɛza ŋaati aromɛn niigi dook ŋaatodoi, eeci anyak niigi tiin ki ɛɛza ci meelik ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Zin giye nico ɔyɔktɔ ɔl ugeec towawiinto. Maje iinyaye niceke ŋaan ɔl o kazi Kanan been Periz abaak looce nice buk.
Enek ni Abram Lat nɛ, “Keegin naaga aten. Ɔl cugunɛ o kibeen ɔl cigan o alaŋ abon ŋaati ayɔwɔn.
Inoko ŋɛra libir ci olla arooŋ niina looce nico ka kɛŋɛrtɔ. Mã akɔ niina ki libir ci azo o, kakɔ naana ki libir ci kaŋeto o. Mã akɔ niina libire ci kaŋeto o, kakɔ naana ki libir ci azo o.”

Ataŋaamek ni Lat looc dook, ma acin Jordan een ŋɛwɔn ma anyak maam ci abona vitɛnane dook, ma atobɔ buk ki mana o Joowo kazi Idan, ma atobɔ ki looc o Masiro. Lɔɔci nicini akɔ zɛɛ been Zowar. Maje waanice iinyaye niceke ŋaan Jooi kilip kutur o kazi Sodom kibeen Gomora baal ɛɛl ŋinaante e.
Ɛŋɛrak ni Lat ɛlɛ onin ŋɛwɔn o kazi Jordan dook, ma aluugonek niini ŋinite. Ɛŋɛryɔ ni niigi.
Ma abaak Abram looce o kazi Kanan. Aje Lat abaak niini kuturyok o ɛɛl ŋɛwɔna kɔrgɛna ŋaati ajɔŋɔz kutur o kazi Sodom.
Maje iinyaye niceke agɔɔn ɔl o Sodom kaal ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt, ma abaca niigi oŋɛ ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ Joowa.
Ma vurte o uluugi Lat, enek Jooi Abram nɛ, “Dɔŋ di ɔɔ. Gɛlɛm looc nico dook. Cin baatikeri ki tɛnɛt ki jen been nyagi.
Inoko zin kanyin looc ci acin noko dook ineet been dɔl ci dɔl cugun ka kizi looc ci boryok cugun ka kabaakti niigi nɔkɔ izi nɛɛn.
Kanyi tiŋeere dɔl ci dɔl cugun kizi mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt kotobtɔ ki kazac kɔkɔm eet ci akɛɛp nɔɔnɔ. Mã anim ɛɛti ci deer kɛkɛɛp kazac, ŋaan akɛɛp buk koca niini dɔl ci dɔl cugun.
Inoko tiŋa. Bitɔ tonowa looc nico dook ka cin juruŋ, eeci kanyin ineet kizi cun.”
Uluuk ni Abram, ma akɔ abaak ŋaao ajɔŋɔz kɛɛn o kazi Mamra o ajɔŋɔz ŋino kazi Ebiron. Ma ŋinaante ɛtɛɛnya ŋinti taabinto.

Zin waanice anyak alaat ceen wec kazi zaar cigeec nɛ Kidolama alaan ci looc o kazi Ilam, ki Arik alaan ci looc o kazi Elazar, ki Amrava alaan ci looc o kazi Cinar, ki Tidal alaan ci looc o kazi Goyim.

Agaŋonek alaata nicigi gɔnɔgi ceen tur ci kazi zaar cigeec nɛ Bira alaan ci looc o kazi Sodom, ki Bica alaan ci looc o kazi Gomora, ki Cena alaan ci looc o kazi Adama, ki Cimba alaan ci looc o kazi Zeboyim, been alaan ci looc o kazi Bela.

Alotɛ alaata ci awɛ zaara cigeec vurta noko dook nyarate o kazi Sidim o liil o amokcar maama, eeci waanice abal nɔɔgɔ alaani ci kazi Kidolama noko irkitok amɔtɔ ram, ma irkite ceen amɔnki iiyu o ujurta niigi ŋaati abali Kidolama nɔɔgɔ.

Alotɛ alaata ci awɛ zaara cigeec vurta noko dook nyarate o kazi Sidim o liil o amokcar maama, eeci waanice abal nɔɔgɔ alaani ci kazi Kidolama noko irkitok amɔtɔ ram, ma irkite ceen amɔnki iiyu o ujurta niigi ŋaati abali Kidolama nɔɔgɔ.

Ma irkite ween amɔnki wec Kidolama ki alaat o aromonek nɔɔnɔ been takirnya ugeec ɔɔt akatit ɔl o Rivam abaak looce o kazi Atirkinam, ki ɔl o Zuzim abaak ŋaao kazi Am, been ɔl o Imim abaak balale o Kirima, ma ɔɔrɔ zɛɛ ma amɔk nɔɔgɔ.
Ma akat buk niigi ɔl o Orit abaak biyene o Edom, ma atɔɔk niigi nɔɔgɔ zɛɛ ma arumi Ilparan o ajɔŋɔz balal.
Abada ni niigi, ma avɔ amiironek Kadec, ma akat ɔl o looc o Amalikait kibeen ɔl o Amorit abaak looce o kazi Azazo.
Mazi azii alaata o Sodom ki o Gomora ki o Adama ki o Zeboyim been o Bela zɔɔz nico, olotit niigi takirnya ugeec ka kɔɔt kooryɔ ki Kidolama nyarate o looc o kazi Cidam.
Ɔmɔk ni Kidolama been laŋotigin alaan o Sodom been ɔl ogin.

Maje nyarati ci looc ci kazi Cidam noko anyak robrobo ci amardit. Mazi ka kivirit alaata o looc o kazi Sodom ki Gomora ɔrɔɔnta, iitazak niigi robrobo ci amardit noko, ma agam nɔɔgɔ robrobo nici zɛɛ makacin ivita uruktek ɔl ŋinito. Ma avir ŋaatineeŋ ogɛn avɔ biyɛnɛ.
Agamit ni Kidolama ki ɔl ogin kaal o kuturyok o kazi Sodom been Gomora dook.
Ma agam buk niigi Lat ween ŋɛɛrti gɔtɔni Abram o abaak kuture o kazi Sodom ki kaal ogin dook.

Ma avira ɛɛti codoi ole ci ona atɔɔk modo nɔɔgɔ o, ma aku aduwak Abram zɔɔz nico. Maje waanice Abram abaak ŋaao ajɔŋɔz kɛɛn ci eet o kazi Mamra ween modɛn o kazi Amorit. Maje Mamra anyak gɔtɔnɔgi ci kazi zaar nɛ Ecika kibeen Ana ween niigi dook laŋoten kibeen Abram.

Mazi azii Abram atenoi onin agamit modo, olota niini ɔl ci aganek ɔrɔɔn een eet tur lak iiyu kamɔtɔ ki tiin turge (318) ole o kɔrɔk onin, ma ɔrkɔr buk niini been laŋotigin ween modɛn abaawɔ ki nɔɔnɔ, ma avɔ ano modo niceke zooc zɛɛ been looc o kazi Dan.
Mazi avɔ arum niigi ŋinite, eŋerun Abram ɔl cigin noko, ma aliya modo nicoko baal, ma aŋozonek nɔɔgɔ, ma atɔɔk zɛɛ ma avɔ arumi ŋinti rɛɛn many kazi Iba libire ci baatikeri e kuture o kazi Damacik.
Ma abadaan Abram kaal o avɔyi modo e dook kibeen buk ŋɛɛrti gɔtɔnɔn o kazi Lat ki kaal ogin dook been ŋaai kibeen ɔl o agam modo e dook.
Mazi akɔ abada Abram ɔrɔɔnte ci ona amɔgi niini alaan o kazi Kidolama kibeen alaat o ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ noko, iiyak nɔɔnɔ alaani o kutur o kazi Sodom ŋaati ajɔŋɔz kutur o kazi Jerusalɛm.
Ma aku buk alaani o Jerusalɛm kazi Mɛlikizadɛk, ma anyaak niini Abram ḏɔkɛn ki nyaan. Maje Mɛlikizadɛk nici waanice niini alaan ci adiŋdiŋan Jook.
Amayuk ni niini Abram enek nɛ, “Abon bai Jooi o adikir ɛɛnyca tammu taden ki looc amayukin ineet.
Kanaatit Jook o adikir o atiritin ineet mɔk modo.” Eŋerak ni Abram Mɛlikizadɛk kaal oogi kaale ci ona anyaa ɔrɔɔnta o. Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o, eeci arɔɔŋ kaada Jook kaale o ɔɔra.
Enek ni alaani o Sodom Abram nɛ, “Biti kaal cugun ɔɔra o dook, olla nyan aneet ɔl cigan o doon.”

Bar abɛdɛkɛ Abram nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kɛtɛrkɛda naana zaare o Jook o adikir o ɛɛnyca tammu taden ki looc ka calaŋ kakɔyɛ kaal cugun, yo nuun een laamoc ci caavito alaŋ kakɔyɛ been nɛɛn, eeci alaŋ karooŋnyin ineet bitɔ bolol izi nɛ, Kanyeya Abram kizi arɔi.

Bar abɛdɛkɛ Abram nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kɛtɛrkɛda naana zaare o Jook o adikir o ɛɛnyca tammu taden ki looc ka calaŋ kakɔyɛ kaal cugun, yo nuun een laamoc ci caavito alaŋ kakɔyɛ been nɛɛn, eeci alaŋ karooŋnyin ineet bitɔ bolol izi nɛ, Kanyeya Abram kizi arɔi.

Alaŋ zin naana kagama gi ci ka kooyi ŋaatun been nɛɛn. Olla kagama dayiin ona adak ɔl ogane e doon. Aje ɔl ci kazi Mamra ki Ecika been Ana baal atiritan aneet ɔrɔɔnta o, abon aŋɛrai nɔɔgɔ kaal cigeec.”
Ma vurte nice enek Jooi Abram wunozyai nɛ, “Má anyei ŋoliin. Ŋaan keen naana kilip cun, ma ŋaan kanyin ineet gi ci appe ɔrɔɔt kadizikin.”
Bar abarzek Abram nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi Jook, gitaz ci ka dizikan aneet? Akɔmnan dɔl ci ka kavadawan. Bar kɔrɔk can o arigizi tiŋeere gabarɛnti onane kazi Ilizar een Damaciken.”
Bar abarzek Abram nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi Jook, gitaz ci ka dizikan aneet? Akɔmnan dɔl ci ka kavadawan. Bar kɔrɔk can o arigizi tiŋeere gabarɛnti onane kazi Ilizar een Damaciken.”
Ma azii bodo niini molok ci Joowo anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ Ilizar ceen gabarɛn o avadin ineet, bar avadin tiŋeere ineet ŋɛɛrun cunɛ maany.”
Ooyi ni Jooi Abram bitaala, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Cin di tammu kɛŋ. Kɛɛp di monyony ci ɛɛl tammo kɛŋa neke mã anim. Anyei zin katin niina dɔl ci dɔl cugun ci meelik kotobtɔ ki monyony niceke.”
Arek ni Abram ziniz Jook tuwɛnta ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma atal Jooi nɔɔnɔ giye nico.
Ma anek Jooi bodo nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aneeta Jook o kanyaanin ineet looce o kazi Uur nɛɛn, ka kiiya kanyin ineet looc nico ka kizi looc cun.”
Bar ajin Abram nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi Jook o abal kaal dook, mayo zin ka kaga izi ŋiniti ŋintan o ku?”
Ma ɛbɛdɛkɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan katerkedekin zɔɔz oma ce. Inoko rak nyayan mool ci ŋai een loŋorec, ki nyɔɔn ceen root, ki mirkic, been yɛɛla ram.”
Anyaak ni Abram Jook kaal nicoko dook, ma aku atɔdɔŋ, ma apak nɔɔgɔ dook kɔrgɛna kotobtɔ. Ma azɛt nɔɔgɔ dook kɛlɛbɛztɔ, maje yɛɛla alaŋ nɔɔgɔ aŋɛr kɔrgɛna.
Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ iitazɔ kuduvaana arɔɔŋ kadayit idi nicoko, ma aturan Abram kuduvaa nicoko.
Mazi atoltol ii loota, ɛtɛɛda Abram ooŋnya ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma acin nɔŋ ci kɔl wunozyai, ma anyak ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Enek ni Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Agamnyi katin dɔlya ci dɔl cugun kɔɔt kiziti mirɔk looce ci ɔl oogi. Ma avɔ agide niigi ŋinaante irkitok eet tur lak wec (400).
Bar zin ŋaan kapayei waanma ɔl ci anyek nɔɔgɔ kizi mirɔk o gerzitin. Ma vurta ŋaan abadaak dɔlya ci dɔl cugun o bodo ŋinito. Ma anyaa niigi looce nice kaal ci meelik ɔrɔɔt.
Bar zin abon rak aavtiz niigi ŋinaante irkitok eet tur lak wec (400), eeci ŋaan kizi iiten ci ka kapai gerzitin ci ɔl o Kanan. Aje zin niina alya ŋaan arugi ŋinti rɛɛn ɔrɔɔt zɛɛ ma adaai kanyatiz.”
Bar zin abon rak aavtiz niigi ŋinaante irkitok eet tur lak wec (400), eeci ŋaan kizi iiten ci ka kapai gerzitin ci ɔl o Kanan. Aje zin niina alya ŋaan arugi ŋinti rɛɛn ɔrɔɔt zɛɛ ma adaai kanyatiz.”
Mazi akɔ ii loota, eyelizai iju ci anyak burɛt kibeen goo ci alanyit, ma aku awɔ kɛlɛk ona apaki e kɔrgɛna.
Zin iitene nice ɛlɛ eterkedek bodo Jooi Abram zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Kanyi dɔl ci dɔl cugun looc nico akanai ŋaao ajɔŋɔz looc o Masiru zɛɛ ma akɔ arum liil o adikir kazi Yuparatiz.
Ma nici looc ci ɔl o kazi Kenatiz ki Kenizatiz ki Kadamonatiz
ki Ititaz ki Periz ki Rivam
ki Amorit ki Kanan ki Gagacatiz been Jebta.”
Waanice Sarai ween ŋaa o Abram ŋaan awɔ koliin. Ma anyak niini dole ceen Masiren kazi zaar nɛ Egar ci aliŋliŋonek nɔɔnɔ kizi gabaren cin.
Enek ni niini Abram nɛ, “Inoko acaban Jooi aneet kɔtɔɔ koliin. Abona di aromenu ki dole can een gabaren noko ka coma kavadjai naana ŋaatin.” Agama ni Abram zɔɔz ci aduwak Sarai nɔɔnɔ o.
Ma anyek Sarai nɔɔnɔ gabaren cin kazi Egar noko kizi ŋaa cin aavtiz. Maje Abram abaawun waanice Kananakti irkitok amɔtɔ.
Ataŋguzɔ ni Abram been Egar zɛɛ makacin anyawɔ. Bar mazi aga niini ɛlɛ anyawɔ nɔkɔ, ɔdɔŋi ɛlɛ Sarai, ma apɛz nɔɔnɔ.

Enek ni Sarai Abram nɛ, “Inoko pezinɛt nici akunakan gole cun. Kanyin Egar ineet, bar mazi acin niini ɛlɛ anyawɔ nɔkɔ, abawan aneet. Ŋaan zin aga gi nico Jooi doon aneeta ki ineet ŋɛnɛɛn ŋaatina ci alɛɛm.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Abram nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didi zin niini gabaren cun. Aavi niini dɔyize cun. Tugu niina olla gi ci arooŋ tuguwek nɔɔnɔ.” Otoborek ni Sarai Egar nɔŋ, ma ayɔk nɔɔnɔ, makacin uruk tuu.
Ma akɔ ajowa toonnyaiti ci Joowo Egar lamurḏenti ci abil balala gole ci akɔ Masirɛ.
Ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Egar ween gabarɛn o Sarai, agoon naa ŋina?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Karuwa tuu kavira ŋaati Sarai.”
Ma anek toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Miire bitɔ ŋaatin. Bitɔ liŋliŋozek nɔɔnɔ zinize ci alal.”
Ma anek bodo toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kazaaci waanma dɔl ci dɔl cugun kizi mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt kɔkɔm eet ci akɛɛp.”
Ma anek buk toonnyaiti ci Joowo noko nɔɔnɔ nɛ “Inoko niina anyake. Tiŋeere zin ookca logoz. Katek zin tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Ismayil, eeci iziik Jooi luwa unun.
Avaraciz zin katin niini kizi kelegit o too, ma amarnin niini ɔl dook, ma buk ɔl dook amarnin nɔɔnɔ. Ma abaak katin niini doon calaŋ aromɛ ki atenok ogin.”
Izi ni Egar nɛ, “Inoko kicina didi naana Jook o. Buk acinan niini aneet, ma bar ŋaan karugi labak.” Akatek ni niini Jook o azɔɔzɔ ki nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Jook o Acinan Aneet.
Gi zin ci awɛ ɔl ṯuuk nice zaar ci kazi Acinan Jooi Aneet o nɛɛn. Ma ṯuuwi nicana ŋaan abil ŋaao aŋɛr Kadec been Bɛrɛd zɛɛ been inoko o.
Mazi akɔ amiironek Egar kɔrɔk o Abram, ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ otowa niini ŋɛɛrin, ma akanek Abram dole zaar ci kazi Ismayil ebaal aduwan Jooi e.
Ma iinyaye ci aritan Ismayil neke izi irkitowa o Abram eet wec ki tiin tɔrkɔnɔm (86).
Mazi een Abram irkitowa eet wec kamɔtɔ ki tiin tɔrkɔc (99), eyelizak Jooi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ bodo, ma anek nɛ, “Keen Jook o kanyei dɔyiz dook. Ziiyan aneet tugu kaal ci abon.
Ŋaan bodo kagoon naana terkediin onan been ineet, ma kanyin ineet dɔl ci dɔl cugun kiziti mɛɛlɛ gɛr.”
Oloca ni Abram ɔɔ ŋaati adiŋdiŋani Jook, ma anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ,
“Inoko katerkedekin naana ineet gi ci ka izi niina jijiti boryok ci meelik.
Inoko ineet alaŋ bodo kazi zaar cugun nɛ Abram, bar kazi zaar cugun nɛ Ibrayim, eeci niina katin een baati ɔl ci meel.
Kanyin katin ineet dɔl ci dolenu kizi mɛɛlɛ kadala loocok, ma eegin katin ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ alaat ci adiŋdiŋ loocowɛ.
Kanyi tiŋeere terkediin onan kibil nɔkɔ kodot ŋaatun kibeen dolene ci dɔl cugun. Ma keen naana Jook cun nɔkɔ, ma keen buk Jook ci dɔl ci dɔl cugun.

Kanyin tiŋeere ineet been dɔl ci dolenu looc ci inoko ɛɛnɛ niina modɛn ci akɔm eet ci agayin noko. Ma lɔɔci ci kazi Kanan noko dook izi looc ci dɔl ci dɔl cugun izi nɛɛn, ma keen naana Jook cineeŋ nɔkɔ.”
Ma anek Jooi Ibrayim bodo nɛ, “Zin niina libire cun abon azoonɛ gi o karicanekin naana ineet tugu. Ma abon buk agɔɔn dɔlya ci dɔl cugun nɔkɔ.
Abona zin ɔl o macik ŋaatunooŋ dook ateedi.
Abona niiga ateedinu ka kizi teedinɛt nici bayen ci terkediin onan aneet kibeen ineet.

Utuguz gi nico nɔkɔ zɛɛ been bulok ci katin ŋaan aavu e. Ma aritai dole ci mac ŋaatunooŋ, mazi adica niini iinya turge, abon ateedu niiga nɔɔnɔ. Utuguzek buk gi nico gabara ci mac aritai ŋaatunooŋ been gabara ci ataalanu ole ogɛn.
Ɔl ci maci dook abon agɔɔn nɔkɔ ka keyelizai terkediin onane abil kodot teedinte cunooŋ o.
Ma ɛɛti calaŋ atɛɛdi, alaŋ akeebonek niini ɔl ogan, eeci alaŋ azooni niini terkediin onan.”
Ma anek bodo Jooi Ibrayim nɛ, “Inoko ŋaa cun kazi Sarai noko alaŋ bodo kazi zaar cigin nɛ Sarai, bar kizi zaar cigin nɛ Sara.
Ŋaan kamayui naana nɔɔnɔ ka kitirayin logoz. Ma buk kamayui naana nɔɔnɔ ka kizi yaati boryok ci meelik, ma aritai katin dolene ci dɔl cigin alaata ci adikir.”

Akati ni Ibrayim kozoŋti looc ŋaati adiŋdiŋani Jook, ma ararni ɛlɛ maany ziniza azi nɛ, “Ku ka kitira dole ŋaati kizɔyɛ matuwoc ceen irkitowa eet tur (100) o? Ku buk ka kitira Sara dole ŋaati izɔi niini matuwoc ceen irkitowa eet wec kamɔtɔ (90) o?”
Enek ni niini Jook nɛ, “Inoko mã amayui Ismayil, avadanan koca niini aneet labak.”

Bar anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Akɔm! Ŋaan aritakin ŋaa cune kazi Sara noko logoz, ma akanei nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Aizak. Ŋaan kazoonɛ naana terkediin onan baal kaduwa e nɔkɔ kodot ŋaatin kibeen dolene ci dɔl cigin.

Maje giye ci akati Ismayil kazii zɔɔz cun o. Ŋaan zin kamayui nɔɔnɔ, ma kanyi nɔɔnɔ dɔl kibeen dɔl ci dolenu kizi mɛɛlɛ. Ma een niini katin jijiti alaat ceen amɔtɔ ram, ma kagoon katin naana dɔl cigin kizi bor ci appe.
Bar zin ŋaan kagoon gi o kaduwa naana terkediinte onan ŋaati ŋɛɛrun o kazi Aizak o ŋaan aritai niini ŋaati Sara irkite ci ŋaan aku e.”
Mazi akɔ aṯornɛkɛ Jooi zooze onin ki Ibrayim, ɔtɔɔ niini.
Taman nɔkɔ iitene nice ɛlɛ ozooti Ibrayim zɔɔz o Joowo, ma atɛɛt ŋɛɛrin o kazi Ismayil been buk gabara o aritai ole onin, ki o ataalyai, ma ateedi maczɛt dook ɔlɔ.
Ma ateedi buk Ibrayim niinilya ŋaati izitɔi irkitowa eet wec kamɔtɔ ki tiin tɔrkɔc (99).
Aje Ismayil ceen ŋɛɛrin o izi irkitowa amɔnki iiyu waanci baal ateedinɛ niini neke.
Ma eteede niigi dook iiten codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ,
kibeen gabara o kɔrɔk onin dook.
Ma iitene oman eyelezak Jooi Ibrayim ɛlɛ ŋaati ajɔŋɔz kɛɛn o Mamra. Iitene nice aavi niini loota ceez onin een rum rɛɛrna waaz iilya ŋaati aburni kɔr.
Mazi adɔŋ ɔɔ, acin ɔl ceen iiyu ɛɛl. Bar tɛ codoi ŋaatineeŋ Jook gi, maje raman toonnyak. Maje Ibrayim alaŋ aga. Mazi acin niini nɔɔgɔ, odokonyozek ook urumek gɔl, ma akɔ azaa nɔɔgɔ ŋaati adiŋdiŋani.
Ma anek nɛ, “Manyi, mã areezaŋ niiga aneet, má adiceku. Ivita uyubuzit rak ole can o ŋaato.
Anycaŋ kanyaayuŋ maam ci ka otoonyci zɔɔ ka uyubuzit rak raa ŋina.
Ka buk kanyaayuŋ dayiin ci atiritu eleeti ŋaan awoyu.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi Ibrayim anek nɛ, “Abona. Tugu eci aduwa o.”
Iyiik ni Ibrayim ook kɛɛmawa, ma akɔ anek Sara nɛ, “Doma tela ci vɔɔr taman. Ŋɔɔny ka aayek kernok ḏɔkɛn.”
Ma adokonyonek Ibrayim tiin, ma akɔ acina ariz ci ŋaan een mɔr ci adii ɔrɔɔt. Ma anyaa, ma aku anyek gabaren kotodoŋek nɔɔgɔ.
Anyaa ni Ibrayim ŋoroc kibeen iira been idi, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ kadaktɔ. Ma arɛ niini nɔɔgɔ raa ŋinaante.
Ma ajin niigi Ibrayim anek nɛ, “Aavi ŋaa ununɛ ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Aavi kɛɛmawa ŋaate.”
Ma anek kernoiti codoi Ibrayim nɛ, “Didilɛ tiŋeere irkite ci aku e nyelowe nico ma kabada, kamɔda anyak Sara ceen ŋaa cun noko logoz anyɔtɔi.”
Maje Sara aziirar nɔɔgɔ kɛɛmawa eecitɔ.
Aje waanice Ibrayim been Sara iziti matuwo ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Sara alaŋaan anyak maam ugeec ŋaanu.
Atarari ni Sara ɛlɛ maany, ma azi ziniza nɛ, “Inoko naaga dook kizita matuwo. Ku oca ka kanyakta dole o?”
Ijin ni Manyi Ibrayim enek nɛ, “Naa arar Sara, ma azi nɛ, Didi dim ka kanyak dole ŋaati kizɔyɛ matuwoc o ku?
Anyak gi ci akɔmnek Jook tɔ? Inoko zin abil eona kaduwakin ineet e. Tiŋeere irkite ci aku e nyelowe nico ma kabada, kajowa Sara anyawun logoz.”
Zin giye o aŋolin Sara nɔɔnɔ, adaŋɔ niini izi nɛ, “Ŋaan katarar.”
Ma anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Atararu uyen. Má adaŋe gaga.”
Mazi awɔ kernowa nicigi, itoonek Ibrayim nɔɔgɔ gɔl. Mazi avɔ arum niigi ŋinti kutul, icinit Sodom.
Izi ni Manyi Jooi nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaati karɔɔdɛ Ibrayim gi ci karooŋ kutugu noko.
Eeci dɔlya ci dɔl cigin katin niigi eegin bor ci appe adɔi kak, ma amayuwi katin modɛna dook zaare cigin.
Eeci kɛŋɛra naana nɔɔnɔ ka kuduwak niini dɔl ci dolenu kiziiktan aneet ka kutuguzɔ kaal ci abon, ka kozooti naana terkediin onan ŋaatineeŋ.”
Enek ni Jooi Ibrayim nɛ, “Kazii kaviyak ci ɔl ci Sodom ki Gomora agɔɔn niigi kaal ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt, ma anyayit niigi oŋɛ ci gɛr appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Karooŋ zin kook kicin naanalya mã didi agɔɔn niigi kaal ci gɛr kiyo aduyai o, ka kaga.”
Idicek ni toonnyawa ɔɔt ki Sodom. Maje Manyi Jooi ŋaan ɛɛl niini ki Ibrayim.
Iicayak ni Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Anyak gi ci karooŋ kijinin. Didi dim niina akɔ uulal ɔl ci gɛr been ɔl o abon buk ŋinaante?
Mã ajowa ɔl ci abon een eet ram kamɔtɔ (50), uulal ni ŋinite, ma alaŋ uuŋ giye ci akati nɔɔgɔ?

Kagayin alaŋ agoon nɔkɔ. Alaŋ uulal ɔl o gɛr kibeen o abon buk, eeci alaŋ abon ŋaati apirnanɛ niina nɔɔgɔ dook gole codoi. Kagayin alaŋ agoon nɔkɔ, eeci een niina alaan o looc dook, ma apai niina kaal juruŋ keelit tɔp.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã kajowa ɔl ci abon een eet ram kamɔtɔ (50), kooŋ koca kutur nice giye cineeŋ calaŋ kuulal.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ bodo anek nɛ, “Keen naana eet ci deer labak. Olla kalayin ineet bodo karooŋ kijinin.
Mã ajowa niina ɔl ci abon een eet ram ki tiin tur (45), uulal koca kutur dook?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã kajowa ɔl ci abon een eet ram ki tiin tur (45), alaŋ kuulal kutur nice.”
Bodo ajin Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã ajowa ɔl ci abon een eet ram (40), uulal koca kutur dook?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã kajowa ɔl ci abon een eet ram (40), alaŋ kuulal kutur dook.”
Ilalek ni bodo Ibrayim Jook enek nɛ, “Má da abornekan nɔŋ mã kijinin bodo. Mã ajowa ɔl ci abon een eetoma kamɔtɔ (30), uulal koca kutur dook?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã kajowa ɔl ci abon een eetoma kamɔtɔ (30), alaŋ koca kuulal kutur.”
Ma anek Ibrayim Jook nɛ, “Nyan kɛmɛda kijinin bodo. Mã ajowa ɔl ci abon een eetom (20), uulal koca kutur dook?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã kajowa ɔl ci abon een eetom (20), alaŋ koca kuulal kutur.”
Ma ilalek bodo Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi Jook, má abornekan nɔŋ. Karooŋ kijinin bodo lak codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Mã ajowa ɔl ci abon een amɔtɔ (10), uulal koca kutur dook?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã kajowa ɔl ci abon een amɔtɔ (10), alaŋ koca kuulal kutur.”
Mazi akɔ odotiz niigi zɔɔza, idicek Jooi. Ma amiironek Ibrayim kɔrɔk onin.
Ma avunak toonnyawa ceen ram o Sodom yomana, maje Lat aavi kutur araana. Mazi acin niini nɔɔgɔ, itiŋa jena, ma akɔ arumek gɔl, ma azaa nɔɔgɔ ŋaati adiŋdiŋani.
Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Manyigi, ivita kɔrɔk can cɛlbɛz noko ŋaato ka otoonyit zɔɔ, ma ayubuzu baalin nico ole can o ŋina. Ŋaan aloku ŋeere ririwɔna.”
Bar abarzek niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Ŋaan koogina kutur kɛŋa ŋina.”
Ma ilalek Lat nɔɔgɔ kivitak kɔrɔk. Makacin agamta niigi orkorit ki nɔɔnɔ. Ma akɔ agoonek niini nɔɔgɔ dayiin ceen ḏɔkɛn alaŋ amokcar.
Mazi ŋaan acinɛ niigi nɔkɔ, ivita ɔl o Sodom macik dook, lɔgɔzɛt been ɔl o adikir buk, ma avu aliya ceez.
Ma awo Lat, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Aavtiz ɔl ona avunak kɔrɔk cun o e ŋaa? Dunaket nɔɔgɔ bitaala ŋaato. Karooŋnya ka kɔŋɔzta.”
Uduna ni Lat bitaalin, ma anyook karogi eci bawuco.
Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔl ogan, kilalekuŋ igeet calaŋ agoonu gi ci gɛr abil nɔkɔ.

Eelit di, kanyei dɔl ceen kabarzɛ ŋaan aavtiz baala. Anycaŋ kudunakuŋ nɔɔgɔ. Ŋaan agooneku nɔɔgɔ gi ci olla arooŋnyu niiga utuguzek. Alaŋ abon ŋaati agoonu gi ci abil nɔkɔ ole nicoko, eeci ivitayan niigi aneet ole can o.”

Bar anek niigi Lat nɛ, “Madayɛ ŋaatinaaŋ. Een niina modɛn ci rɛŋ. Niina ineet ŋɛnɛɛn ci ka duwayet gi ci kagoona o? Nyɛ ŋaatinaaŋ. Mã alaŋ anyeke, kagoonekin koca ineet gi ci gɛr bar kujuk ci ka kutuguzeya nɔɔgɔ o.” Ma ayɔɔt niigi Lat, ma uubunek karogi ka kooyoyit.
Enico ɛlɛ udunta toonnyawa, ma agurak Lat ceez eecitɔ, ma anyook karogi.
Ma atooza niigi ɔl o aavtiz ceez tatoga e dook kɛbɛrɛ kiziti rubenɛ calaŋ aga ŋinti abilni karogi. Ma adun niigi.
Enektek ni toonnyawa Lat nɛ, “Mã anyei ŋɛɛrugun ki bɛɛnyugun ki kavanɛ been atenok ci abaak kuture nico, viri nɔɔgɔ rɛɛna.
Itoonanet Jooi ageeta ka kivita kilipta kutur nico, eeci gerzitin uneeŋ izi appe ɔrɔɔt zɛɛ makacin otobor Jooi.”
Ook ni Lat ole o arɔɔŋ kirikti bɛɛnyigin, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Iyiikta ɛnyɛktɛ ŋina, eeci arɔɔŋ Jooi kuulal kutur nico.” Bar anyek niigi zɔɔz nico kizi bɔyɛn.
Mazi ŋaan arire lɔɔci, omolmolanek toonnyawa Lat kiyiik. Anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Iyiik taman. Biti ŋaa unun been bɛɛnyugun ween ram e ɛnyɛktɛ ŋina, gɛrzɛ ŋaan adaaknu tedec ma alibe kuturi nici.”
Mazi ŋaan miltiŋ Lat nɔkɔ, agamit toonnyawa nɔɔnɔ aziit ki ŋaa onin been bɛɛnyigin ween ram, ma avɔyi nɔɔgɔ zɛɛ ma aduŋni kutura, eeci awucnek niigi Jook.
Ma ŋinaante enek toonnyaiti codoi nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Odokonyit! Má abuudenu gɔla. Odokonyit ɔɔtɔ biyɛnɛ ka calaŋ adaaŋnu.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Lat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm Manyigi. Má anyet kutuguza nɔkɔ.
Inoko uyene itiritaŋu niiga aneeta laadun, ma ɛɛltawaŋu korok. Inoko zin biyɛn rɛɛnɛ ɔrɔɔt. Kaŋole karabɔŋ kadaai maŋaan kurum ŋinite.
Bar anycaŋ rak kook kuture ci miliny abil ŋaate neke ka kɛɛlyai daayiza. Ajɔn niini ɔrɔɔt.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abona. Kagama zɔɔz cun o. Alaŋ kuulal kutur nice.
Vir zin taman. Kareyin rak zɛɛ ma akɔ arum ŋinite.” (Zin giye o awɛ Lat kutur nice kizi kidic, akatozek ŋinite zaara ci kazi Zowar.)
Mazi akɔ aduŋna ii, urum Lat Zowar.
Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ iitai Jooi tamma goo ci appe ɔrɔɔt, ma iinak Sodom been Gomora.
Ma adica goo nici ŋinite dook. Ma adaai ɔl o abaak ŋinaante dook kibeen kaal o ɛɛl ŋinaante.
Bar gɔla mazi abuudi ŋaa o Lat, enico ɛlɛ otowɛ niini kizi kɔrtɔn ceen mɛlɛ.
Ma iitene ci ano gɔn o ririwɔna itiŋa Ibrayim ook ŋaa baal azɔɔzɔnɛ ki Jook e.
Mazi akɔ agɛlɛm Sodom kibeen Gomora been ŋɛwonok o libir nice dook, acin niini burɛt ci appe iŋaaz ŋinaante kizi dovol akɔ ki tammu kɛŋ.
Zin iiteni ci baal uulali Jooi kuturyok nicoko o, aada niini Ibrayim, ma aara Lat o abaak ŋinaante bitaala calaŋ adaai niini gooye nico.
Enico ɔtɔŋɔlɛ Lat looc ŋaati abaai kuture o kazi Zowar. Uluuk ni niini been bɛɛnyigin ween ram ɔɔtɔ biyɛnɛ, ma avɔ abaak bɔɔta ŋinaante.
Ma iitene oman enek dole ceen abuu o ŋɔɔni ci miliny o nɛ, “Inoko baatina izi matuwoc. Maje ŋina akɔm eet ci ka kataŋguz ki naaga kibeen nɔɔnɔ kiyo ɔl loocowe dook o ka kanyayit dɔl.
Inoko kanycek baatina nyaan ci abaayinɛ ka koromtɛ ki nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ coma kanyak dɔl ci avadanet ŋaatin.”
Ma baaline nice anycek didi niigi baatineeŋ nyaan ci awot. Mazi akɔ abaaki niini, iiya bɛɛnyin ceen abuu o, ma oogin ki nɔɔnɔ. Maje Lat alaŋ niini aga aromɛ ki bɛɛnyin o, eeci abaaki ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.

Ma iitene oman enek bodo dole ceen abuu o ŋɔɔni ci miliny o nɛ, “Kataŋguza ki baaba bilija. Inoko kanycek nɔɔnɔ kowot nyaan bodo baaline nico ka ataŋguz niina ki nɔɔnɔ ka kojokta naaga dook dɔl ci avadanet ŋaatin.”
Ma baaline nice anycek niigi baatin nyaan ci abaayinɛ bodo, ma aku oogin bɛɛnyin ci miliny o ki nɔɔnɔ calaŋ niini aga gi nico, eeci abaaki ɔrɔɔt.
Anyaktɔ ni dɔlya ci Lat een ram noko ŋaatin ɛlɛ.
Ma arita dole ceen abuu o ŋɛɛrin, ma akanek zaar ci kazi Mowab. Iiya ni izi niini jijiti ɔl o kazi Mowab dook.
Maje dole ci miliny o itira buk niini ŋɛɛrin, ma akanek nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Bɛnaami. Iiya ni izi niini jijiti ɔl o inoko kazi nɛ Amonata.
Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ uluuk Ibrayim ŋaa o kazi Mamra, ma iicak kidicilim akɔ ki ŋino kazi Negev, ma akɔ aal ŋaao aŋɛrɔn Kadec been Cur. Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ idicek ook abaak ŋaao kazi Gɛrar.
Ma ŋinaante enek niini ɔl nɛ, “Ŋaa ci kazi Sara noko ŋɔɔna gi.” Itoonek ni alaani o kazi Abimilek abal Gɛrar ɔl Sara kɔɔt kanyaaktak ɔl nɔɔnɔ.
Bar iitene oman baal eyelzak Jooi Abimilek ɛlɛ wunozyai, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Oowu niina ki daayiz, eeci ooyɛ ŋaa nico. Niini ŋaa ci eeto gi.”
Maje Abimilek ŋaan koromtɛ ki Sara. Enek ni niini Jook nɛ, “Manyi Jook, akɔm gi ci gɛr kabaca. Má aruket aneet been ɔl cigan o kadaakta gaga.
Ibrayim niinilya azi nɛ, Ŋaa nici ŋɔɔni gi. Bodo buk ŋaa alya azi nɛ, Ibrayim gɔtɔni gi. Kagoon zin gi nico zinize ci abon giye o kazii naana ŋaatineeŋ.”
Enek ni Jooi Abimilek nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt kagayin agoon gi nico zinize ci abon o. Gi zin calaŋ kanyin ineet uumi ŋaa nico o nɛɛn, eeci alaŋ karooŋnyin ineet baca oŋec.
Inoko zin miirɔi nɔɔnɔ kook eete onin, eeci ɛɛti cinɛ o nyakaŋan gi. Ŋaan aŋaryonekin niini ineet gɛrzɛ ŋaan adaai. Mazi alaŋ amiirɛnɛ, adaai koca niina been ɔl ugun dook.”
Ma ririwɔna ŋeertine co, otowa Abimilek ɔl ogin een inyaati dook. Mazi aku aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz nico, anyayit niigi ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Otowa ni Abimilek Ibrayim, ma aku ajin anek nɛ, “Gitaz ci agooneket noko? Gitaz ci gɛrzɛ kagoonekin naana ineet ka uulalan o? Agoonekan gi ci gɛr ci akɔm eet oma laadun ci utugu nɔkɔ.
Naa agoonekan gi nico naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Ibrayim Abimilek anek nɛ, “Kagoon nɔkɔ o, eeci kabaaban kizik akɔm ŋina ɔl ci aŋole Jook. Kaŋole zin karabɔŋ koca arukan niigi aneet kadaak ka kooti ŋaa can o.
Maje zin didi niini ŋɔɔna ci baaba gi. Alaŋ een ŋɔɔna ci yaai. Kiriyɛ zin naana nɔɔnɔ kizi ŋaa can.
Mazi akɔ aaranan Jooi aneet ole o baaba olla kiiya kɔtɔɔ balala e, keneya naana nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Gi ci abon agoonekan ce. Loocowe ci karɛwɔn ki ɔl enek niina nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Keen ŋɔɔni gi.”
Imiirɔi ni Abimilek Sara anyek Ibrayim, ma anyek buk niini nɔɔnɔ ɛɛza ki tiin been gabara.
Ma anek Abimilek Ibrayim nɛ, “Nici dook looc can. Inoko baak ŋaati olla arooŋ niina.”
Ma anek buk Abimilek Sara nɛ, “Kanyi gotonu ɛɛza ki tiin ci meelik ka kotoŋ niini gi o kagoonekin naana ineet, ka buk keyelizak ɔl o arumenu ki ineet dook akɔm niina gi ci gɛr agoon.”
Aŋarowɔ ni Ibrayim ijin Jook ka kɛɛla Abimilek oŋece nico. Orogoz ni didi Jooi nɔɔnɔ. Ma buk anyek ŋaa onin ki ŋaai o gabara ogin een mirɔk kanyaktɔ labak.
Eeci waanice onyook Jooi momɛt ci ŋaai o kɔrɔk o Abimilek dook giye ci akati Sara ceen ŋaa ci Ibrayim o.
Amayuk ni Jooi Sara ebaal atɛrkɛdɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ e.
Anyawɔ ni niini, ma ookcak Ibrayim ŋɛɛrin iinyaye baal aduwak Jooi nɔɔnɔ e ɛlɛ. Mã aritai dole e, izi Ibrayim matuwoc ci anyata.
Ma akanek niini ŋɛɛrin nico zaar ci kazi Aizak.
Mazi akɔ een Aizak iinya turge, ɛtɛɛt Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ kul ebaal aricanɛkɛ Jooi nɔɔnɔ kutugui e.
Maje ma aritai Aizak e, izi Ibrayim waanice irkitowa eet tur.
Atalɔ ni Sara ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma azi nɛ, “Inoko anyayan Jooi talniin ci kararnɛ. Buk ɔl o azii gi nico atalnɛ niigi kibeen aneet.”
Ma azi niini bodo nɛ, “Akɔm baale laadun eet ci abaaban gi ci azi nɛ, Anyak Sara dole katin ŋaati izɔi matuwoc. Bar inoko zin kanyawa naana dole matuwoczete can noko.”
Ma iroktai dole zɛɛ ma adikir. Mazi atɛɛt niigi nɔɔnɔ kezta, utugu Ibrayim kɔnyit ci doleco ci appe ɔrɔɔt iitene nice.
Ma iitene oman icinun Sara Ismayil o arita Ibrayim ŋaati Egar ween Masiren amomoz Aizak.
Enek ni Sara Ibrayim nɛ, “Tɔɔk ŋaa ceen miroi noko kibeen ŋɛɛrin kɔtɔɔzɔ. Alaŋ ka kozolit ŋɛɛrti ŋaa nico kɔrɔk kibeen ŋɛɛran Aizak.”
Ma avir Ibrayim ziniz giye nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci Ismayil buk ŋɛɛrin gi.
Bar anek Jooi Ibrayim nɛ, “Má anyi ziniz kitirany zooze ci Ismayil been Egar gaga. Tugu eci aduwakin Sara o, eeci katin niina anyei dɔl ci dolenu terkediinte onan ŋaaten Aizak.
Ŋaan buk katin kanyi Ismayil dɔl ci dolenu kiziti bor ci appe, eeci een niini dole cun buk.”
Ma iitene co ŋeere ririwɔna anyaa Ibrayim dayiin ki buru ci maamu. Ma aku anyek Egar, ma itoon nɔɔnɔ ki ŋɛɛrin kɔtɔɔzɔ. Ma awɔ Egar zɛɛ makacin ook elektu balale o kazi Biirsaba.
Mazi akɔ adicai maama burwa, uruk dole kɔr ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Otoŋek ni niini dole gi ceen lugurgoc.
Ma akɔ adɛyai niini ŋaaman, eeci anek niini ɛlɛ maany nɛ, “Alaŋ karooŋ kicin dole can noko ŋaati adaaŋni.” Ma akɔ alu ŋinaante.
Iziik ni Jooi dole luwa, ma awo toonnyaiti ci Joowo tamma Egar, ma anek nɛ, “Alu naa? Má anyei ŋoliin gaga. Iziiwun Jooi luwa ci doleco o ŋaa ona ooŋne e.
Inoko tiŋa jena. Bitɔ dɔŋa dole ka zoozek kajawɔ, eeci katin kamayuwi naana nɔɔnɔ, ma kanyi dɔl ci dɔl cigin kizi bor ci appe.”
Ɔkɔl ni Jooi Egar kɛbɛrɛ, ma acin niini ṯuuk ci anyak maam. Ook ni ibitiz buru, ma anyaak dole.
Ozooti ni Jooi dole, ma iroktai zɛɛ ma adikir. Ma abaak niini balale o kazi Paran. Ma ŋinaante izi niini eet ceen ceeloi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma ojowak yaatine nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante dole ceen Masiren, ma arɔcak nɔɔnɔ kizi ŋaa cin.

Maje iinyaye niceke abal Abimilek looc nice, aje Vikol alaan ci takirnyawu. Ivitak ni niigi dook ramantiya Ibrayim, ma aku anek Abimilek Ibrayim nɛ, “Kacinin naana ineet amayukin Jooi kaale o agoon dook.

Inoko terkedeyan zaare o Joowo baayiz ci kabaayi naana kibeen ineet yaak calaŋ alabanan aneet, karabɔŋ een dɔl cigan, karabɔŋ een dɔl ci dɔl cigan. Tuguweyet ineeta ki ɔl cigan o kaal ci abon, kiyo buk kagoonekin naana ineet kaal ci abon o.”
Ma anek Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abon ɔrɔɔt. Kagama zɔɔz nico.”
Oobek ni Ibrayim Abimilek zɔɔz ci ṯuuk o aama gabara o Abimilek gabara ogin dɔyiza, ma anyek kizi cineeŋ doon.
Ma anek Abimilek Ibrayim nɛ, “Alaŋ kaga eet ci agɔɔn gi nico o. Ŋaan niina duwayan, ma ŋaan kiziik laadun zɛɛ been nɛɛn ci kaziiknɛ noko.”
Anyaa ni Ibrayim ɛɛz been taŋ, ma aku anyek Abimilek. Utuguzɔ ni niigi dook ramantiya ganɔn ci ka kabaakti yaak.
Ma aŋɛra bodo Ibrayim nyɔɔ ci ŋai torgɛrɛm ɛɛzaye ogin.
Ma ajin Abimilek nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aŋɛra nyɔɔ nicoko naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Biti nyɔɔ ceen torgɛrɛm noko kizi cugun ka gawan keen didi eet ci kadawa ṯuuk nico o nɛɛn naana.”
Akatozek ni ŋinite zaara ci kazi Biirsaba.
Mazi avɔ adica niigi zɔɔz o akati ganɔn ŋaati kazi Biirsaba neke, imiirtozek Abimilek ki Vikol looc uneeŋ kazi Viliztiya.
Oḏowa ni Ibrayim kɛɛt ceen motoŋtoc Biirsaba, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook o abil kodot ŋinaante.
Ma abaak niini looce ci kazi Viliztiya neke ŋinti wun ɔrɔɔt.
Ma iinyaye ogɛn icina Jooi tuwɛn o Ibrayim. Awo Jooi nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Aavɛ ŋaaḏaŋ Ibrayim?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aneet ce.”
Ma anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Biti ŋɛɛrun ci kazi Aizak areez ɔrɔɔt noko. Biti looce o kazi Moraya ka bitɔ ruweyan nɔɔnɔ kizi todoyoi biye ci ŋaan kakɔ kayelekin ineet ŋinaante.”
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna iitene oman uduula Ibrayim areema ka kook kutuguwi todoyoi, ma arek kaal zigir. Ma akɔyi Aizak kibeen gabara ceen ram, ma avɔ ŋaa baal aduwak Jooi nɔɔnɔ e.
Ma awɔ niigi gɔla iinya iiyu. Mazi akɔ acin Ibrayim ŋinite rɛɛna kidicilim,
enek niini gabara ogin nɛ, “Aavtiz ŋina ebeyit zigir. Kavɔya naana ki dole ŋinaante ka koota kidiŋdiŋanta Jook. Ŋaan kabadana.”
Anyek ni niini ŋɛɛrin kanyak areema o ka kook kutuguwi todoyoi. Aje niinilya anyak kabaz ki kɛɛt ci gooyo. Ma ɔrkɔr niini ki ŋɛɛrin avɔ biyɛnɛ.
Ijin ni Aizak baatin enek nɛ, “Baaba, inoko kanyak areema ki goo ci ka kɔɔt kutuguzi todoyoi. Inoo zin ɛɛz ci ka kɔɔtɔ kutuguz kizi todoyoi o?”
Abɛdɛkɛ baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Dole onan, ŋaan akɔ anyet Jooi niinilya azɛt codoi ŋinaante.” Ma awɔ niigi dook ramantiya adicek avɔ ŋinaante.
Mazi avɔ arum niini ŋin baal aduwak Jooi Ibrayim e, utuguwa niini ŋinti taabinto, ma ataadek areema tadena. Ma acap ŋɛɛrin, ma akɔ ataadek buk areema taden.
Odoma ni kabaz ka kɛtɛɛdi ŋɛɛrin alɛm.
Taman nɔkɔ otowɛ Jooi tamma azi nɛ, “Bil di! Bil di! Má arui dole kadaak.
Inoko kagawin aŋolinan didi niina aneet, eeci alaŋ ajurakan ŋɛɛrun.”

Mazi adɔŋa Ibrayim ɔɔ, acin mirkic ci agam karada oto nɔɔnɔ bawuca. Ook ni adoma mirkic nico, ma aku atɛɛt alɛm, ma ataadek areema tadena, ma akanek goo ka kizi todoyoi ci arigiz ŋinti ŋɛɛrin o ka waan kuruk kadaak e.
Akatek ni Ibrayim ŋinite zaar ci kazi nɛ Ŋaan Anyan Jooi. Been nuun inoko o ŋaan awo ɔl bɛ nice zaar ci kazi nɛ Ŋaan Anyan Jooi.
Otowo ni Jooi Ibrayim bodo, ma anek nɛ,
“Inoko katerkedekin naana Manyi Jooi zɔɔz ci ka kamayukin ineet giye o alaŋ ajurakan ŋɛɛrun.
Ŋaan kamayukin ineet, ma ŋaan kazaaci dɔl ci dɔl cugun kizi mɛɛlɛ kotobtɔ ki monyony, karabɔŋ atobɔ ki kazac. Katin dɔlya ci dɔl cugun amɔk modɛn, ma ɔɔra kaalyan.
Modɛna dook ajowa katin mayuwɛnɛt dolene ci dɔl cugun. Kagoon nɔkɔ o, eeci azii niina zɔɔz onan.”
Ivitak ni Ibrayim ki Aizak gabara ogin, ma amiiri niigi dook avɔ ɔlɔ Biirsaba.
Ma iitene oman iziik Ibrayim itira gɔtɔnnya o kazi Nayor lɔgɔz cigin ŋaawe onin kazi Milka.
Aritai Uza ɔɔwa. Ma anowa nɔɔnɔ Buz ki Kemuwel o iiya izi baati Aram
ki Kesed ki Aazo ki Pildac ki Jidav been Bezuwel.
Bezuwel iiya izi baati Rebeka.
Ma buk arita Nayor ŋaawe cin aavtiz kazi Reuma lɔgɔz wec kazi zaar cigeec nɛ Teba ki Gaam ki Taac been Maaka.
Mazi akɔ een Sara irkitowa eet tɔrkɔnɔm ki tiin torgɛrɛm (127), adaak niini ŋaao kazi Ebiron looce o kazi Kanan. Ma iinon Ibrayim daayiz ci Sara o, ma aluwek nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ een Sara irkitowa eet tɔrkɔnɔm ki tiin torgɛrɛm (127), adaak niini ŋaao kazi Ebiron looce o kazi Kanan. Ma iinon Ibrayim daayiz ci Sara o, ma aluwek nɔɔnɔ.
Ma vurta itiŋa niini ŋaati ona aluwi noko, ma akɔ ole o kazi Ititaz raa, ma akɔ anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ,
“Inoko kabaai naana ŋinaanto keen modɛn ci rɛŋ. Akɔmnan tɔdɔ cigan ŋina. Karooŋnyuŋ zin ataaleyaŋ tɔdɔwaye cugooc noko ŋintimiliny ka kadawi ŋaa can adaai noko.”
Abɛdɛkɛ ɔl ci Ititaz noko Ibrayim anek nɛ,

“Manygɔn, ziiyet di. Kacinin naaga ineet een eet ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt ŋaatinaaŋ. Da ŋaa cun o boote ci olla ajowa niina abon bootwane cigaacak o. Akɔm ŋaatinaaŋ dook eet ci ajurakin ineet bɔɔt ŋaati adawɛ ŋaa cun o.”
Itiŋa ni Ibrayim, ma aloca ɔɔ nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna,

ma anek nɛ, “Mã iziikteyaŋ niiga ka kada ŋaa can o ŋina o, ijinteyaŋ Evron ween ŋɛɛrti Zowar ka kataaleyan bɔɔt o abil mane onin ŋaao kazi Makvila. Ijinteyan nɔɔnɔ ka kataaleyan ŋinite guruce ci aganɔ, ka gɔɔn kizi ŋintan dawiinto.”

ma anek nɛ, “Mã iziikteyaŋ niiga ka kada ŋaa can o ŋina o, ijinteyaŋ Evron ween ŋɛɛrti Zowar ka kataaleyan bɔɔt o abil mane onin ŋaao kazi Makvila. Ijinteyan nɔɔnɔ ka kataaleyan ŋinite guruce ci aganɔ, ka gɔɔn kizi ŋintan dawiinto.”

Aje Evron aavi buk tɔ ŋinaante. Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini Ibrayim ɔl dook kɔrgɛna anek nɛ, “Manygɔn, ziiyan di. Inoko kanyin ineet bɔɔt nice kibeen mana buk kɔkɔm guruc ci aruwekan. Kanyin ineet ɔl dook kɔrgɛna ŋina ka dawi ŋaa cun o.”

Aje Evron aavi buk tɔ ŋinaante. Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini Ibrayim ɔl dook kɔrgɛna anek nɛ, “Manygɔn, ziiyan di. Inoko kanyin ineet bɔɔt nice kibeen mana buk kɔkɔm guruc ci aruwekan. Kanyin ineet ɔl dook kɔrgɛna ŋina ka dawi ŋaa cun o.”
Itiŋa ni Ibrayim ɔl kɔrgɛna, ma aloca ɔɔ.
Ma anek Evron nɛ, “Inoko karuwekin guruc ci mano. Gama ŋaatan guruc nicoko ka kada ŋaa can o ŋinaante.”
Abɛdɛkɛ Evron nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ,
“Manygɔn, adak mana nici guruc ceen eet tur lak wec (400). Zin giye ci akanin ineet guruca nici ŋaatan kaal ci labak. Inoko bitɔ da ŋaa cuno ŋinaante labak.”
Agama ni Ibrayim zɔɔz ci Evron o, ma akɛɛbak nɔɔnɔ guruc ci ona aduwa niini eet eet tur lak wec (400) o, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ ɔl dook kɔrgɛna ŋina.
Gɔl zin ci ajowan Ibrayim mana ci Evron o nɛɛn. Abil mana nici ŋaao kazi Makvila ajɔŋɔz ŋin o kazi Mamra. Zin kaala o anyak mana nica dook izi ci Ibrayim.
Agawozek zin ŋinita Ibrayim ole o kazi Ititaz dook.
Adawun ni Ibrayim ŋaa onin kazi Sara boote o abil mane nice looce o kazi Kanan.
Zin mana baal een mana ci ɔl o kazi Ititaz e, ki bɔɔt o abil mana izi ci Ibrayim ka gɔɔn kadayɔi ɔl oginɛ.
Maje waanice Ibrayim izi matuwoc, ma amayun Jooi nɔɔnɔ laadun kaale o agɔɔn dook.
Mazi akɔ arɔɔŋ Aizak rociin, otowa Ibrayim gabaren onin adikir abal kaal ogin dook. Ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko karooŋnyin ineet tugu gi ci kaduwakin ce.
Abona amiire akɔ looce o baaba ka bitɔ jowak ŋɛɛran Aizak ŋaa cin atenowe ogan ŋinaante. Alaŋ karooŋ cinak nɔɔnɔ ŋaa cin dolene ci Kanan o ŋina. Didi karooŋnyin ineet tugu gi nico tammalya.”
Abona amiire akɔ looce o baaba ka bitɔ jowak ŋɛɛran Aizak ŋaa cin atenowe ogan ŋinaante. Alaŋ karooŋ cinak nɔɔnɔ ŋaa cin dolene ci Kanan o ŋina. Didi karooŋnyin ineet tugu gi nico tammalya.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ gabarɛnti nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã kajowai ŋɛɛrun ŋaa ŋinaante, ma ajura ŋaati akunakɛ Kanan ŋina, kutugu ku? Kiiya kitoon ŋɛɛrun kook kabaak ŋinaante?”
Abɛdɛkɛ Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ karooŋnyin tugu nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.

Jook o tammu tadenu nɛɛn o aduŋnanan aneet bitaala ole o baaba been looce o atenok ogan. Ma aterkedekan niini aneet gi ci azi nɛ, Ŋaan kanyi dɔl ci dɔl cugun looc nico kizi cineeŋ. Zin zooze nico ŋaan itoonakin Jooi ineet toonnyai onin tamma ka kotonayin ineet nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma akɔ anyaai ŋɛɛran ŋaa cin ŋinaante.
Mã ajura dole ci ajowa o, akɔmnin ineet gi cun. Maje naana alaŋ karooŋ toonek ŋɛɛran ŋinite.”
Agama ni gabarɛnti zɔɔz ci aduwak Ibrayim nɔɔnɔ o.

Ma akɔyi niini nyakalɛt ceen amɔtɔ, ma akɔyi buk niini kaal ci abon kaale o Ibrayim abon dook. Itiŋgazɔ ni niini kibeen gabara oogi ɔɔtɔ looce o kazi Mesopatamiya, ma avɔ zɛɛ been kutur o abaai Nayor.

Mazi avɔ arum niigi kutur nice, itikte, ma anyek gabarɛnti nici nyakalɛt kataŋguzɔ loota ŋaati ajɔŋɔz ṯuuk ci anyak maamu ŋinaante. Aje lɔɔci izi yoman. Izi ŋino gɔɔn ka kivita kotogoci ŋaai maam ṯuuwa.
Aŋarowɔ ni niini izi nɛ, “Jook o alaan onan Ibrayim, ɛɛlawan da. Nyan gi ci karooŋ o waanico. Yelizak bonat unun alaan onan Ibrayim.
Cinan aneet ŋaati kaavɛ ṯuuwe nico o. Mã anyak tedec dɔl ci avu agɔc maam ŋina,

Kajin tedec codoi ŋaatineeŋ kanei nɛ, Nyan da maam ci kawudi. Mazi anekan nɛ, Orɛ maam kodɛ, ŋaan buk kagɔcai nyakalɛt cugun o maam, anyek koca nɔɔnɔ kizi dole ci aŋɛrai niina Aizak ka kizi ŋaa cin nɛɛn. Mã agooni gi nici kibil nɔkɔ, kagawin koca naana didi eyelizayu niina bonat unun alaan onan Ibrayim.”
Mazi ŋaan aŋaryɛ niini nɔkɔ, iiya dole ceen kabarzec kazi Rebeka iilaya iju ci maamu ɔɔwa. Niini tinati Bezuwel ween ŋɛɛrti Nayor ki ŋaa onin kazi Milka. Nayor niini gɔtɔni Ibrayim.
Dole nici niini kabarzec ci alina ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ŋaan aavi baala. Iiya ni ook niini ṯuuwa, ma abitiz iju.
Odokonyozek ni gabarɛnti nici nɔɔnɔ, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Nyan da maam ci kawudi.”
Ma anek dole nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ija, kodɛ.” Ma adɔŋa maam, ma agamek nɔɔnɔ kowodɛ.
Mazi akɔ alal, enek dole nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nyan kanyaak buk nyakalɛt cugun o maam ka kuwude.”
Ma aḏuutek maam abala, ma adɔkɔny akɔ anyaa maam oogi bodo, ma awodɛ nyakalɛta dook zɛɛ ma alal.
Maje gabarɛntɛ nici olla aŋaamnek niini nɔɔnɔ liŋliŋonte ci agɔɔn o arɔɔŋ ka kaga mã een dole ci aŋɛrak Jooi nɔɔnɔ o nɛɛn.
Mazi akɔ odotiz Rebeka ŋaati awotzi nyakalɛt, aara gabarɛnti lawonyawoc ceen warki, ma arikɛ dole oŋec. Ma aborcɛkɛ bodo nɔɔnɔ warki ci appintik een ram azɛɛn.
Ma ajin niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een dole ci ŋɛnɛ? Karooŋ kook kataŋu baalin ole cunooŋ o. Anyak ŋinti kɔɔŋɛ ŋinaante tɔ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Keen tinati Bezuwel ween ŋɛɛrti Nayor been Milka.
Kanyaka artɛ ci adɔi ka kataŋguzɛ nyakalɛta been buk ci colai adak niigi. Ma buk anyak ŋinti ka ataŋguzɛ niiga.”
Oloca ni gabarɛnti ɔɔ, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook.
Azi nɛ, “Kanaatin ineet Jook o alaan onan Ibrayim, eeci azoonɛ zɔɔz unun aterkedu niina kibeen alaan onan. Ma ayitanan buk aneet zɛɛ ma didi arumnyan atenok o Ibrayim.”
Ook ni odokonyozek Rebeka ceez o yaatin, ma akɔ aduwak nɔɔnɔ zoozok o arumonɛ niini ki gabaren e dook.
Maje Rebeka anyak gɔtɔni ci kazi Leban.

Mazi acin Leban warki ci anyak ŋɔɔnnya oŋeca o been ci anyak azeene o, ma azii niini buk zɔɔz ci tɛ aduwak ɛɛti nici ŋɔɔni o ŋaati aduwakɛ ŋɔɔnnya yaatin o, itiŋa niini ook gabarente o Ibrayim ŋaa ona aali nyakalɛt ṯuuwa e.
Ma akɔ anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ija, kɔɔtɔ ɔlɔ. Kacinin ineet een inoko eet ci amayukin Jooi. Aavi bitaala ŋina naa? Kanyei ŋinti ka tikɔi ole can e, ma anyak buk ŋinti ka kaavtiyɛ nyakalɛta.”

Anyaak ni Leban gabaren kɔrɔk onin, ma aku aara kaal dook nyakalɛtɛ, ma aavetek nyakalɛt artɛ ci adɔi ka kataŋguzei been artɛ ci colai ka kadayit, ma anyaa maam ci ka kotoonyci gabarɛnti been ɔl ogin ɔrkɔr zɔɔ.
Ma anyaak niigi nɔɔgɔ dayiin. Mazi avu dayiin, anek gabarɛnti nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ rak kadake zɛɛ ma kaduwakuŋ igeet gi ci kakunɛ o.”
Enek ni Leban nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Duwa labak.”
Ma anek gabarɛnti nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Keen naana gabaren ci Ibrayim ween gɔtɔni Nayor.
Amayuwun Jooi nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kabalɔ kanyak ɛɛza ki tiin ki zigire ki nyakalɛt ki warki been gabara ci mac ki ci ŋai.
Itirak nɔɔnɔ Sara ween ŋaa onin ŋɛɛrin ŋaati izɔi matuwoc. Ma anyewun niini ŋɛɛrin nico kaal ogin anyak ɔlɔ dook.
Aricanekan zin alaani onanɛ aneeta anekan nɛ, Má acinai ŋɛɛran ŋaa cin modene ci Kanan karomena o.
Bitɔ ole o baaba een bor onan ka bitɔ cinak ŋɛɛran ŋaa cin ŋaatineeŋ.
Ma kanei naana nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Mã ajura dole ŋaati kɔrkɔrana, kutugu ku?
Abɛdɛkan niini aneet anekan nɛ, Jooi o kazoonɛ naana zɔɔz onin ŋaan itoonakin ineet toonnyai ci orkoryu ki ineet ka kitiritin zɛɛ ma akɔ ajowai ŋɛɛran ŋaa ole ogan een bor o baaba ɛlɛ.
Mã akɔ zɛɛ been bor onan, yo nuun ajurakin niigi ineet dole calaŋ anyaa, ɔkɔmawin koca ineet gi cun kina.
Mazi ona kaku karum ṯuuk nico waanico ŋina o, kiiya kijina Jook kanei nɛ, Manyi ween Jook o Ibrayim, tiritan. Nyan gi o karooŋ keronnye nico.
Inoko acinan niina aneet kabil ṯuuk nico otoga ŋina. Zin mã aku dole ceen kabarzec ka kiiya kɔtɔgɔcɔ ṯuuwa ŋina, kanei tedec naana nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Nyan maam ci kawudi.
Mazi agama niini, ma anyan maam kowodɛ, ma anyek buk nyakalɛt cigan o maam kuwude, izi koca niini ŋaa ci acinai niina ŋɛɛrti Ibrayim nɛɛn.
Mazi ŋaan kaŋaryɛ nɔkɔ, iiya Rebeka anyaa iju ɔɔwa, ma aku akɔ ṯuuwa ka kook kɔtɔgɔcɔ. Mazi kanei naana nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Nyan da maam ci kawudi,
ɔdɔŋa didi niini maam, ma agamekan anekan nɛ, Orɛ, kodɛ. Ŋaan buk kanyaai nyakalɛt cugun o maam ka kuwude. Kowodɛ ni naana, ma awodoz niini nyakalɛt cigan o buk.

Kijina ni naana nɔɔnɔ keneya nɛ, Baatun ŋɛnɛ? Ma abɛdɛkan niini anekan nɛ, Keen tinati Bezuwel ween ŋɛɛrti Nayor ki Milka. Mazi kakɔ kazii gi nico, karikɛ nɔɔnɔ lawonyawoc ceen warki oŋec, ma kaborcɛkɛ ci appintik een ram azɛɛn.
Koloca ni ɔɔ kidiŋdiŋana Jook o alaan onan Ibrayim giye o ayelzekan niini aneet gɔl zɛɛ ma kaku karum bor onin, ma kaku kajowai nɔɔnɔ tinati ŋɛɛrti gɔtɔnɔn ka kizi ŋaa ci ŋɛɛrin.
Inoko zin mã agamanu zɔɔz nico, ma arooŋnyu utuguzek alaan onan Ibrayim gi ci abon, uduktayaŋ. Mã alaŋ agamanu, uduktayaŋ ka kaga naana gi ci kagoon.”
Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni Leban been Bezuwel nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Zɔɔz nici aku Joowa. Akɔm naaga gi ci ka kuduktawa.
Rebeka ceeni. Biti nɔɔnɔ ka kook kizi ŋaa ci ŋɛɛrti alaan cun o, eeci aduwan Jooi o.”
Mazi azii gabarɛnti ci Ibrayim noko zɔɔz nico, oloca ɔɔ, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook.
Aara ni niini rumanɛ ci alina ki nyaziya been marakcak ceen warki, ma anyek dook Rebeka. Ma anyek buk niini gɔtɔni Rebeka been yaatin kaal ci ataalyai guruce ci meelik ɔrɔɔt.
Adaktɔ ni gabarɛnti ci Ibrayim noko been ɔl ogin ɔrkɔra. Ma oogin baalin ŋinaante. Mazi acinɛ niigi ŋeere, izi gabarɛnti nɛ, “Itoonteyaŋ gɔl kimiire kook alaane onan.”
Bar gɔtɔni Rebeka been yaatin azi nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ awoyu. Karooŋnya rak koromtewa ki dole ɔlɔ ŋina iinya amɔtɔ. Enice ŋaan awoyu.”
Bar anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má alamnyetu gaga. Ma anyewun Jooi keroni can o kobona o, anycaŋ kimiire taman kook alaane onan.”
Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nyet kutuyawa dole ka kijinta nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ kuduwa gi cin.”
Utuya ni niigi Rebeka, ma avu ajin anek nɛ, “Arooŋ niina ɔtɔɔz been eet nico inoko?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, kawoya labak.”
Anycek ni niigi Rebeka been ŋaa baal gɔɔn agam nɔɔnɔ kidikzɛta e ka korkorit ki nɔɔgɔ.
Ma amayuk niigi Rebeka anek nɛ, “Tɔ yaak. Bitɔ tira dɔl ci meelik gɛr. Ma abon amɔk katin dɔlya ci dɔl cugun modɛn.”
Acabtɔ ni Rebeka ki laŋotin, ma atɔɔt nyakalɛt, ma awɔ.
Aje Aizak iinyaye niceke iiya abaak looce o kazi Kanan libire ci akɔ ki tɛnɛt e ajɔŋɔz ṯuuk o kazi Acinan Jooi Aneet.
