Ma iitene oman yomana mazi akɔ awɔ olla niini tuuwa ŋaati vɔɔr, acin nyakalɛt ci avu, ma akɔ arumek niini nɔɔgɔ gɔl.
Mazi akɔ acin Rebeka Aizak, uduna niini nyakala.
Ma ajin gabaren ci Ibrayim o anek nɛ, “Eet ci ŋɛnɛ ci awoya ŋaati vɔɔr aku arumeket gɔl o?”
Anek niini nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Eet cun o nɛɛn nica.” Odoma ni niini rum, ma abuŋi ɔɔ.
Mazi aku Aizak, uduwak gabarɛnti nɔɔnɔ kaal o agooni dook.
Ooyi ni Aizak ŋaa cin o ceeze o yaatin Sara. Arɛɛz Aizak Rebeka ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ɛtɛɛdjai ni niini inoniinte o akoloni yaatin.
Ɔrɔca ni bodo Ibrayim ŋaa oma ci kazi zaar nɛ Ketura.
Ma aritak ŋaa nici nɔɔnɔ lɔgɔz ci kazi zaar cigeec nɛ Zimran ki Jokcan ki Medan ki Midiyan ki Acbak been Cuwa.
Iiya Jokcan izi baati Ceba been Dedan. Dɔl ci dɔl o Dedan nɛɛn o kazi Acurim kibeen Letucim been Leumim.
Ŋɛɛrigi Midiyan nɛɛn o kazi zaar nɛ Eva ki Ivar ki Aanok ki Abidi been Eldaa. Nicigi dook dɔl ci dɔl o Ketura.
Anyek Ibrayim kaal ogin anyak dook Aizak.
Maje waanice maŋaan arogi niini e anyek buk kaal oogi ŋɛɛrigin o arita ŋaane ogin aavtiz. Ma anyek niini ŋɛɛrigin ci arita ŋaane cigin aavtiz o kuluugit kɔɔt ki jen ka kedeyɔ ki ŋɛɛrin Aizak.
Inoko Ibrayim izi matuwoc ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ zɛɛ ma apirna niini ŋaati izɔi irkitowa eet turge kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (175).
Inoko Ibrayim izi matuwoc ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ zɛɛ ma apirna niini ŋaati izɔi irkitowa eet turge kamɔtɔ ki tiin tur (175).
Ma ada nɔɔnɔ ŋɛɛriginɛ Aizak been Ismayil boote o ŋino kazi Makvila o abil mane o ajɔŋɔz Mamra libire ci jenu e.
Nici ŋin baal ataala Ibrayim ŋaati Evron ween ŋɛɛrti Zowar ween borit o ɔl o kazi Ititaz e nɛɛn. Zin Ibrayim ki Sara ween ŋaa onin adaye niigi dook ramantiya ŋinaante.
Ma vurte o adaayi Ibrayim, amayuwun Jooi ŋɛɛrin Aizak. Maje iinyaye niceke abaak niini ṯuuwe o kazi Laroi. Kazi kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko nɛ Acinan Jooi Aneet.
Ceegi dɔl ci dɔl o Ismayil ween ŋɛɛrti Ibrayim o arita niini ŋaati Egar ween Masiren baal aliŋliŋonek Sara kizi gabaren e.
Iiya itira Ismayil ŋɛɛrigin ci kazi zaar cigeec nɛ Nebat ween abuu, ma ano Kedar ki Adbel ki Mibsam
ki Micma ki Duma ki Maza
ki Adad ki Tema ki Jetur ki Navic been Kedema.
Nɔɔgɔ zin nɛɛn o ivita iziti modɛn ween amɔtɔ ram, ma akanonek zaara ugeec vitɛn ci abaai niigi o dook.
Mazi akɔ een Ismayil irkitowa eet tɔrkɔnɔm kamɔtɔ ki tiin torgɛrɛm (137), adaawun niini.
Ma abaak dɔlya ci dɔl ci Ismayil o ŋaao aŋɛr Aavila been Cur. Ŋinti abaai niigi o akanai ŋaao ajɔŋɔz Masir, ma aku akɔ ki Asiriya. Adɛyai niigi vitɛnane o abaai dɔl o Aizak.
Ceeni zɔɔz ci akati ŋɛɛrti Ibrayim o kazi Aizak.
Mazi akɔ een Aizak irkitowa eet ram (40), ɔrɔca niini ŋɔɔni Leban o kazi Rebeka ween tinati Bezuwel o looc o kazi Aram.
Bar ɔtɔɔ Rebeka koliin, ma giye nico aŋarowɔ Aizak ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ajin Jook ŋaaten Rebeka ceen ŋaa cin o. Iziik ni Jooi ŋaryiin cin o, makacin anyawɔ Rebeka.
Anyak niini codɛ, ma amɔɔt codɛna nici nɔɔnɔ kɛŋa ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Izi ni niini nɛ, “Gitaz ci agoononekan noko.” Ma akɔ ajin Jook giye ci amɔɔni dɔlya kɛŋa ɔrɔɔt noko.
Enek ni Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyei niina boryok ram kɛŋa. Tiŋeere ma ookca niina nɔɔgɔ, mazi avɔ adikir, aŋɛrɔ niigi, ma ayɔwɔ. Codoi ŋaatineeŋ adɔi ŋaati gɔnɔn, bar abuuwi een katin niini tutur.”
Mazi akɔ ookcai Rebeka ookca codɛ ceen lɔgɔz een ram.
Adoma ceen abuu o meerik ɔrɔɔt, ma alɔ ɛlɛ cinɛ o ɔrɔɔt. Ma akanek niigi nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Esɔ.

Aje ci anowa gɔn o, agam gɔtɔni ginyginyec kɔkɔrkɔrantɔ niigi dook ŋaati aritan o. Ma akanek ɔl nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Jakob, eeci agam niini gɔn ginyginyec. Ma ookcai dɔlya e, een Aizak irkitowa eet iiyu (60).
Mazi akɔ adikir lɔgɔz nici, izi Esɔ eet ci ceeliinto ci arɛɛz weet ci awɔyi tuuwa. Aje Jakob ajaki niini, ma arɛɛz aavuzit ɔlɔ.
Arɛɛzɔ Aizak ki Esɔ, eeci anyaak niini nɔɔnɔ idi ci kelego. Aje Rebeka arɛɛzɔ niini ki Jakob.
Ma iitene oman aak Jakob dayiin cigin. Aje Esɔ aku ceela adaya nɔɔnɔ magiz ɔrɔɔt.

Ma aku anek niini Jakob nɛ, “Adakan magiz ɔrɔɔt. Tiritan taman. Nyan dayiine cugun meerik noko ci kadei.” (Gi zin ci ka kutuyi ɔl dɔl ci Esɔ kizi zaara cigeec nɛ Edom o nɛɛn nici. Kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko akati meeritin ci dayiin niceke.)
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã arooŋ kanyin naana ineet dayiin cigan o, anyan rak niina aneet abuuzɛt unun.”
Anek Esɔ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abona! Ŋaan kanyin labak. Inoko kɔjɔŋɔza daayiz. Zin yo mã kadaai, agoonekan abuuzɛt gitaz ci abon?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kutuguz rak ɔɔwa terkediin ci anyan aneet abuuzɛt.”
Utugu ni Esɔ terkediin ci anyekɛ nɔɔnɔ abuuzɛt onin.
Anyek ni Jakob nɔɔnɔ ḏɔkɛn been wuci ci cominto. Adawɔ ni Esɔ, ma awodɛ, ma iŋaaz, ma awɔ. Zin giye nico ɛcɛlbɛzan Esɔ abuuzɛt onin.
Ma iinyaye niceke anyak waanice lɔɔci tarjo ci appe ɔrɔɔt kiyo baal rak aku baale maŋaan arogi Ibrayim e. Ook ni Aizak ŋaati Abimilek ween alaan o ɔl o kazi Viliztiya ŋaao kazi Gɛrar.
Eyelizak ni Jooi Aizak ɛlɛ ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Má akɔ Masirɛ. Bar baak looce nico ebaal kaduwakin e.
Baak ŋina. Ŋaan karomɛ naana ki ineet, ma ŋaan kamayukin ineet. Ŋaan kanyin ineet kibeen dɔl ci dɔl cugun looc nico ka kɛlɛɛmnyai zɔɔz baal katerkedei naana baatun Ibrayim e.
Ŋaan kanyi dɔl ci dɔl cugun kiziti mɛɛlɛ kotobtɔ ki monyony, ma ŋaan kanyi nɔɔgɔ ŋinito dook kizi cineeŋ. Katin boryowa ci loocu noko dook amayuwi niigi ŋaaten dɔl ci dɔl cugun.
Kagoon nɔkɔ o, eeci baale baatune Ibrayim aziiŋnan aneet, ma azooni lotinok ogan.”
Abaak ni Aizak looce o kazi Gɛrar.

Ma iitene oman mazi ajin ɔl o Gɛrar Aizak gɔl ci Rebeka ween ŋaa onin, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Niini ŋɔɔna gi.” Aŋole niini ŋaati anɛ nɛ, Niini ŋaa can, eeci abaaban niini karabɔŋ ɔl nicigi aruk nɔɔnɔ kadaak ka kooti ŋaa cin o, eeci alina niini ɔrɔɔt.
Mazi akɔ abaak Aizak ŋinaante ŋinti wun, iitene oman icinun alaani o kazi Abimilek bitaalin ceez onin wun nyapildiŋa, ma acin niini Aizak abulbulanɔ kibeen ŋaa onin amici.
Otowa ni Abimilek Aizak, ma anek nɛ, “Nicini ŋaa cun gi. Alaŋ een ŋoonu. Naa azi nɛ, Niini ŋoonu o?”
Abɛdɛkɛ Aizak nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kabaaban kazi nɛ, Karabɔŋ koca arukan ɔl kadaak giye ci akati nɔɔnɔ mã kazi nɛ, Niini ŋaa can gi.”

Abɛdɛkɛ Abimilek nɔɔnɔ bornɛt nɔŋa anek nɛ, “Agooneket gi nico nɔkɔ naa? Karabɔŋ bar ɛɛti codoi ole cigan o oogin kibeen ŋaa cun o. Mazi agooni gi ci abil nɔkɔ, akunaket koca ageeta gerzitin ŋaaten ineet.”
Itilo ni Abimilek ɔl ogin dook anek nɛ, “Mã anyak eet codoi ŋaatunooŋ ci agoonek gi ci gɛr Aizak, karabɔŋ een ŋaa cin o, aruwe koca niini kadaak.”
Ma irkite nice ɛlɛ oḏok Aizak ḏowo cigin ŋinaante, ma abiir labina ciginɛ noko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci amayuwek Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
Ma azaaci kaala ciginɛ noko dook kizi mɛɛlɛ zɛɛ makacin izi niini aroi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma abal niini tiin kibeen ɛɛza, ma anyak gabara ci meelik gɛr. Mazi akɔ acin modɛna o kazi Viliztiya botorzɛt cin o, inyigitit niigi nɔɔnɔ.
Ɛmɛrɛŋɛnit ni niigi ṯuuwanɛ o Aizak baal adawa gabara o baatin Ibrayim e. Ajukek niigi ṯuuwanɛ nicoko biyɛn konyooktɛ.
Enek ni Abimilek Aizak nɛ, “Luuk kuture cinaaŋ o. Anyawu niina dɔyiz ci appe ɔrɔɔt juket ageeta.”
Uluuk ni Aizak, ma akɔ aal ŋewone o ŋino kazi Gɛrar. Ma abaak ŋinaante ŋinti wun.

Adaac ni bodo gabara o Aizak ṯuuwanɛ baal adayai baale irkitowe o baatin Ibrayim, ma ivita uulalit ɔl o kazi Viliztiya vurte o adaai Ibrayim e. Ma awo Aizak ṯuuwanɛ nicoko zaar baal akanek baatinɛ laadun e.
Ma iitene oman adaya gabara o Aizak ṯuuk oma bodo ci liilim maama ɔrɔɔt ŋɛwɔna ŋaao abaai niigi.
Adaŋtɔi ni niigi kibeen ɔl o looc o kazi Gɛrar towawiinto ṯuuk nico, eeci atarkat niigi gi ci azi nɛ, “Nicigi maam cigaacak.” Akatek ni Aizak ṯuuk nico zaar ci kazi Daŋɔn.
Adaya ni bodo gabara o Aizak ṯuuk oma, ma ayɔwɔn niigi buk ṯuuk nico. Ma akanek Aizak ṯuuk nico zaar ci kazi Yɔwɔn.

Uluuk ni bodo Aizak, ma akɔ adawa ṯuuk oma ŋaaman. Ŋinaante akɔma kɛzɔn. Ma akanek niini ṯuuk nico zaar ci kazi Ganɔn. Izi ni Aizak nɛ, “Anyet Jooi inoko aavuzit yaak ci ka kabaakti looce nico ka kazaace kaala ogaac dook.”
Bodo ŋinaante uluuk niini. Idicek ook looce o kazi Biirsaba.

Ma baaline nice ɛlɛ eyelizak Jooi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ, ma anek nɛ, “Aneeta Jook o baatun Ibrayim. Má aŋole looc, eeci karomɛ naana ki ineet. Ma ŋaan kamayukin, ma kanyi dɔl ci dɔl cugun kizi mɛɛlɛ giye ci akati Ibrayim ween gabaren onan.”
Ɛtɛɛnya ni Aizak ŋinti taabinto ŋinaante, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook. Ɔtɔdɔ ni niini kɛɛmanɛ ogin ŋinaante, ma adawa gabara oginɛ ṯuuk oma bodo ŋinaante.
Ma iitene oman iiya Abimilek Gɛrara arɔɔŋ kiiya kicin Aizak. Ma ɔrkɔra niini ki Yuzat o gɔɔn ilot nɔɔnɔ been Vikol ween alaan o takirnyawu.
Ma ajin Aizak nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Avunakaŋ bodo niiga aneet ŋinaanto naa? Baale ŋaan amartoyaŋ, ma atookaŋ looce unooŋ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko kagaya didi Jooi aromenu kibeen ineet. Kabaabanta zin kizita nɛ, Abon kanyak naaga dook ganɔn ci katɛrkɛt kibeen ineet.

Inoko zin terkedeyet niina ageeta gi calaŋ agooneket gi ci gɛr, eeci baale buk naaga ŋaan kutuguzeyin ineet gi ci gɛr. Bar waanice kagoonin ineet juruŋ. Ma abaai yaak zɛɛ ma aluuga kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr kagoonekin naaga ineet.”
Utuguwek ni Aizak nɔɔgɔ dayiin ci meelik ɔrɔɔt, ma adake niigi dook, ma awot nyaantanɛ.
Ma iitene co ŋeere ririwɔna utuguzɔ Aizak ki Abimilek terkediin ci ganonto. Mazi awɔ niigi, itoonek Aizak nɔɔgɔ gɔl. Idicek ni Abimilek ki ɔl ogin ɔtɔɔzɔ.
Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ ivita gabara o Aizak, ma avu aduwak niigi nɔɔnɔ ṯuuk oma ci bodo adawa niigi. Anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kɔbɔrtawa maam.”
Akatek ni Aizak ṯuuk nico zaar ci kazi Biirsaba, eeci agɔɔn niigi terkediin o ganonto ki Abimilek. Zin zɛɛ been noko o awo ɔl kutur o abilni ṯuuwi nici zaar ci kazi Biirsaba.

Mazi akɔ een Esɔ irkitowa eet ram (40), ɔrɔca niini ŋaai ram ole o kazi Ititaz. Dole codoi kazi zaar nɛ Judiz. Niini tinati eet ci kazi Beeri. Bodo codoi kazi zaar nɛ Basmat. Niini tinati eet ci kazi Elon.
Anyaaktak ni niigi Aizak ki Rebeka baabani ci gɛr appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci eegin niigi modɛn ci rɛŋ.
Mazi akɔ een Aizak matuwoc, otoozyai nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ kizi ruben. Otowa ni niini ŋɛɛrin ween abuu kazi Esɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Ŋɛɛran.”
Adɛc ŋɛɛrin anek nɛ, “Woo. Aneeta nici.”
Ma anek Aizak nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko kanyata. Alaŋ zin kaga iiten ci kadaaknɛ.
Inoko doma dilanya ugun, bitɔ ceel ka bitɔ ruweyan kelegit ci kaku kadei.
Ka ija aayeyan zɛɛ ma amoji juruŋ eo gɔɔn karɔɔŋɛ naana. Anyaayan ni ka kadak ka zin enice kamayuwin ineet maŋaan kadaak o.”
Ma azɔɔzɔ Aizak been Esɔ o, maje Rebeka aziirar nɔɔgɔ. Mazi awɔ Esɔ akɔ ceel, iiya enek Rebeka Jakob nɛ, “Kazii uyene baatun anek gotonu Esɔ nɛ,
Ma azɔɔzɔ Aizak been Esɔ o, maje Rebeka aziirar nɔɔgɔ. Mazi awɔ Esɔ akɔ ceel, iiya enek Rebeka Jakob nɛ, “Kazii uyene baatun anek gotonu Esɔ nɛ,
Bitɔ nyaayan kelegit tuuwa ka ija aayeyan ka kadak. Vurta ka kamayuwin ineet ŋume o Joowo maŋaan kadaak o.
Inoko zin ziik gi ci kaduwakin naana ce dole onan.
Tiŋa je. Bitɔ ɛɛzai ka bitɔ jai bawɔ ci ŋaan een nyɔɔ adii ram ka kiiya kaayek baatun naanalya, ma kagoon eo gɔɔn arɛɛzi niini.
Ka zin nyowozek niina nɔɔnɔ idiŋ nico kook kadak zɛɛ ka kamayuwin niini ineet maŋaan kadaak o.”
Bar anek Jakob yaatin nɛ, “Alaŋ niina aga Esɔ alɔ ɛlɛ, maje ɛlɛ cane o agirgir akɔm ima o?
Mã tedec ma uumnyan baaba, ma agayan kalaba naana nɔɔnɔ, alaŋ koca kanyaai ɛlɛ toriin, ma alaŋ bar kajowa mayuwɛnɛt?”
Abɛdɛkɛ yaatinɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Anyek toriin nico kiiyayan aneet. Bitɔ tugu eci ona kaduwakin naana ineet o. Tiŋa je. Bitɔ nyaayan bawɔ ci ŋaan een nyɔɔ.”
Ook ni niini, ma akɔ anyaak yaatin bawɔ ci ŋaan een nyɔɔ. Iiya ni aayek yaatinɛ baatin eo gɔɔn arɛɛzi niini.
Icina ni yaatinɛ rumanɛ ci abon rumanene o Esɔ itaŋnyi ceeza, ma aku aborcɛkɛ Jakob.
Ma aborcɛkɛ buk niini nɔɔnɔ ruce ci bawonu anyak ima azɛɛn been inyaa.
Anyewun ni niini nɔɔnɔ idi been ḏɔkɛn ona aak niini e kooyi ŋaati baatin.
Ooyi ni Jakob dayiin nicoko ŋaati baatin, ma akɔ anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Baaba, dayiin ce.”
Adɛc baatinɛ anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ineet ŋɛɛran jaŋ?”
Abɛdɛkɛ Jakob baatin anek nɛ, “Aneeta ŋɛɛrun ween abuu kazi Esɔ. Kutuguwa eona aduwakan e. Tiŋa je, dak idiŋ ci kanyaakin o ka mayuwan.”
Ma anek Aizak ŋɛɛrin nɛ, “Ajowa kelegit taman nɔkɔ ku ŋɛɛran?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Jook unun nɛɛn o atiritan aneet kojowa taman.”
Enek ni Aizak nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Iicaya di ajonun ŋaato ka kuumin mã een didi nici ineeta Esɔ gi.”
Iicayak ni Jakob baatin ajonun, ma uum baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Bar mɔlɔyi cune o kizik molok o Jakob. Maje azɛɛna azɛɛn o Esɔ ɛlɛ nɛɛn.”
Alaŋ iiyez Aizak Jakob, eeci azɛɛna ciginɛ o alɔ kiyo o Esɔ o. Ɔrɔɔŋ ni kamayuk niini nɔɔnɔ.
Ma ajin bodo nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Dim didi nici ineet ŋɛɛran Esɔ nɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, aneeta Esɔ gi.”
Enek ni Aizak ŋɛɛrin nɛ, “Abona. Nyan zin idiŋ kadawɔ ka kamayuwin.” Anyek ni Jakob nɔɔnɔ idiŋ been nyaan.
Mazi akɔ odotiz Aizak dayiinta, enek ŋɛɛrin nɛ, “Iicaya ijonun ŋaato. Ija cocowan ŋalyamoc logo onan.”

Iicayak ni Jakob nɔɔnɔ, ma acoco ŋalyamoc. Mazi acɔɔk Aizak rumanɛ ci Esɔ ona aborcek Jakob o, abaaban niini izi nɛ, “Coma didi nici een Esɔ gi.” Amayuk ni niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko didi niina aŋol kiyo tuu o amayuk Manyi Jooi o.
Abon bai anyin Jooi ineet maam tammu tadena. Ma anyek manɛɛn cugun kibiiritɔ ɔrɔɔt kanyak labi kibeen kɛbɛrɛ ci keenu meelik ɔrɔɔt.

Abon bai modɛna dook een gabara cugun. Ma akanekin ɔl dook ineet kozoŋtin. Abon bai abal niina gotonogu dook izi alaan cineeŋ. Abon bai akanekin ineet dɔl o yaatun dook kozoŋtin. Abon bai ɔl o atoryin ineet atorye buk niigi. Maje ɔl o amayukin ineet abon buk niigi amayuwi.”
Mazi odotiz Aizak mayuwɛnta, ɔtɔɔ Jakob. Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ iiya gɔtɔnnya Esɔ ceela.
Ma aku buk agoonek niini baatin dayiin ci amadi zɛɛ onyowozek ni nɔɔnɔ. Ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Baaba, tiŋa jena. Dak idiŋ ci kanyaakin ce ka mayuwan.”
Ma ajin Aizak nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ineet ŋɛnɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aneeta ŋɛɛrun ween abuu kazi Esɔ.”

Ma abarit Aizak ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ajine azi nɛ, “Mayo tɛ zin ona aruk kelegit, ma anyaakan e ŋɛnɛɛn? Anyaayan ɛɛti oman idiŋ ŋina, ma kadei ona ka ija noko, ma bar kamayuwa nɔɔnɔ. Didilɛ ojowa niini mayuwɛnɛt ci abil kodot.”
Mazi azii Esɔ gi nico, ɛgɛrɛny niini luwante ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma adak ɛlɛ ŋaati aborni nɔŋ. Ma anek baatin nɛ, “Ka zin yo naana kudun ku? Mayuwan buk aneet baaba.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Aizak nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm gɔl ci ka kamayukin bodo naana ineet. Iiya gotonu alabawan aneet ŋina. Ooyi zin niini mayuwɛnɛt unun.”

Izi ni Esɔ nɛ, “Inoko adakan Jakob aneet looc lak ram. Didi zin akanonek nɔɔnɔ zaara ci kazi Jakob o, eeci een niini labjoi. Rak baale akɔyi niini abuuzɛt onan. Bodo inoko iiya ooyi mayuwɛnɛt onan. Alaŋ nuun anyei mayuwɛnɛt ci miliny anyayekan aneet baaba?”
Abɛdɛkɛ Aizak nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyeya nɔɔnɔ kizi alaan ci abalin ineet. Ma kanyeya buk nɔɔnɔ labi ki kɛbɛrɛ ci keenu. Ɔkɔma bodo gi oma ci ka kutuguweyin ineet ŋɛɛran.”
Ma ilalek Esɔ baatin anek nɛ, “Anyei niina mayuwɛnɛt ci eet codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ? Abon ri buk amayukan aneet baaba.” Aduwa niini zɔɔz nico ŋaati aluwi.
Ma abɛdɛkɛ baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abaai katin niina looce ci gɛr alaŋ kaala abiirni. Ma buk akɔm tammu tiilɛz.

Abaai katin niina baayiz ci oroonto. Een katin niina gabaren ci gotonon. Bar zin katin ma ipira niina gidente cin noko, ma oroonu ki nɔɔnɔ giye calaŋ aziiŋnɛ niina zɔɔz cin, ɛtɛɛda koca niina ɛlɛ ŋaatin calaŋ bodo abalin niini ineet.”

Zin iinyaye niceke otoborek Esɔ Jakob nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, eeci anyek baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ mayuwɛnɛt onin. Abaaban ni niini izi nɛ, “Inoko iinya o ka kipirai baaba iziti ajɔnɛ. Zin tiŋeere vurte ci adaai baaba e, karui Jakob kadaak.”

Mazi akɔ azii Rebeka zɔɔz ci ŋɛɛrin ceen abuu kazi Esɔ o, otowa niini ŋɛɛrin ceen tutur kazi Jakob o, ma aku anek nɛ, “Ziik di gi ce. Arɔɔŋ gotonu Esɔ kuruyin ineet daak ka kacaca gi baal agoone niina nɔɔnɔ e.
Ŋɛɛran, inoko karooŋnyin ineet tugu gi ci kaduwakin ce. Tiŋa, vir bitɔ ole o gɔtɔna o kazi Leban looce o kazi Mesopatamiya.
Ka bitɔ aavu rak niina ŋinaante zɛɛ ma akɔ abada gotonu ziniz bornɛt noŋe cin noko.

Mazi katin ook ereyek nɔɔnɔ gi ci baal agoone niina nɔɔnɔ o, ŋaan kitoonekin naana ineet otok ka bada ŋinaante. Alaŋ karooŋ kukuluzuŋ igeet dook ramantiya iitene codoi, eeci mã arukin Esɔ ineet daak, aruk buk ɔl koca nɔɔnɔ kadaak.”
Ook ni Rebeka ŋaati Aizak, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Kabor naana ŋaai ci Esɔ een modɛn noko. Mã arɔcɛ Jakob buk modene ci kazi Ititaz noko, alaŋ koca kaga ka kabaak ku, bar koca ŋaatan maya daayizi.”
Otowa ni Aizak Jakob, ma aku amayuk nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Má arɔcɛ modene ci looc ci kazi Kanan o ŋina.
Abon akɔ looce o kazi Mesopatamiya ole o jijitun o kazi Bezuwel ka bitɔ rɔca niina ŋaa cun ŋinaante. Bitɔ rɔcɔ ŋaati malotun o kazi Leban.
Ŋaan Jooi o anyak dɔyiz dook amayukin ineet ka nyak dɔl ci meelik, ma een baati boryok ci meelik.
Abon bai amayukin Jooi ineet ki dɔl ci dɔl cugun kiyo baale amayuk niini jijitun Ibrayim e. Ma buk katin anyin Jooi ineet bal looc ci baal anyonek Ibrayim, ma inoko abaayɛ niina noko dook.”
Itoonek ni Aizak Jakob looc o kazi Mesopatamiya kook ŋaati Leban ween gɔtɔni Rebeka ween yaati Esɔ been Jakob.
Agawun ni Esɔ amayuwun Aizak Jakob bodo, ma itoonek niini nɔɔnɔ Mesopatamiya ka kook kojowa ŋaa cin ŋinaante. Ma buk aga ricaniin o anɛkɛ Aizak nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Má arɔca dole ci looc ci kazi Kanan o.”
Ma aga iziiwun Jakob zɔɔz o baatin been yaatin, ma akɔ Mesopatamiya.
Ma aga buk Esɔ alaŋ baatinɛ Aizak arɛɛz dɔl ci Kanan o.
Ook ni Esɔ ŋaati Ismayil ween ŋɛɛrti Ibrayim, ma akɔ arɔca bɛɛnyin ci kazi Malat ceen ŋɔɔni Nebat, ma azaaci niini ŋaai ogin baal ɔrɔca laadun e.
Itiŋa ni Jakob ŋaao kazi Biirsaba ɔtɔɔ ook looce o kazi Mesopatamiya.
Mazi akɔ ii loota, ataŋu niini gɔla ŋaaman, ma aruk ɔɔ biya.
Mazi akɔ atɛɛda nɔɔnɔ ooŋnya, uwunozɛ, ma acin wunozyai gɔl ci arumuz looc ki tammu taden. Ma awɔ toonnyawa ci Joowo gole nico. Abarcɔ niigi gole nico avɔ ceegi tamma, ma avunak ceegi looc.
Ma acin buk niini wunozyai Jook abilnek nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Aneeta Manyi Jook o Ibrayim been Aizak. Ŋaan kanyin ineet been dɔl ci dɔl cugun looc ci ɔɔŋɛ noko.
Ma ŋaan azaaci dɔlya ci dɔl cugun kotobtɔ ki kazac. Ma azaanonek katin niigi loocok dook. Ma kamayuwi katin naana ŋaaten ineet been dɔl ci dɔl cugun boryok dook.

Ga zin niina ŋaan kɔrkɔr naana ki ineet, ma kazuunin ineet ŋaati oola akɔyɛ zɛɛ ma kabadakin bodo naana ineet looc nico. Alaŋ kuuŋnin ineet doon, bar ŋaan kazuunin nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma kagoonekin kaal ci katerkedekin noko dook.”
Mazi acinɛ Jakob ooŋnyai, abaabanun niini izi nɛ, “Aavi didi Manyi Jooi tɔ ŋina, ma bar ŋaan naana kaga.”
Anyawun ni niini ŋoliin, ma azi nɛ, “Looc taz ci anyak ŋoliin noko? Inoko ŋiniti ŋinti Joowo gi. Inoko nici araan ci akɔ ki tammu taden.”
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna odoma Jakob bɛ ona arui ɔɔ e, ma arek looc kibil tɔp ka kizi bayen ci ŋinito, ma aḏuutek maal bɛ nico.
Ma akanek niini ŋinito zaar ci kazi Bezal. Maje baale laadun ŋinite kazi zaar nɛ Luz.
Enek ni Jakob Jook nɛ, “Eterkedeyan baale niina gi ci ka koromtɔi niina ki aneet, ma azuunan aneet keronnye can noko, ma anyan dayiin ci kadei been rumanɛ ci kaborcei.
Ma bodo katin kamiironei naana kɔrɔk o baaba yaak. Zin giye nico izɛ niina Jook onan kanuyin nɛɛn.
Zin bɛ nico kari ŋinito ka kizi ŋinti ka kidiŋdiŋantin ɔl ineet. Ma buk ŋaan gɔɔn kanyin lɛlɛn codoi lelenete ween amɔtɔ kaale o anyan niina aneet dook.”
Idicek ni Jakob keronnye onin zɛɛ ma akɔ arum looc o kazi Mesopatamiya.
Ma ŋinaante ojowa niini ṯuuk ci abil balala abuŋe ɔtɔgi biye ci appe. Ma anyak ŋinaante ɛɛza ceen tenyit iiyu ci oogin aliya ṯuuk nico. Areyi niigi ka kuwudi.
Gɔɔn tup nɔkɔ mã olotai ɛɛzana dook, apiya ɔl ci towawiinto o bɛ nico ṯuuk otoga, ma awodoz ɛɛza zɛɛ mazi odotiz, amiirɛnɛ niigi bɛ ŋaa onin.
Ijin ni Jakob ɔl ci towawiinto noko anek nɛ, “Gɔtɔnɔga, eeginu ɔl ci looc jaŋ?”
Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Keegina ɔl ci Eran.”
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Agayu ka Leban ween dole o dole o Nayor?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii. Kagaya.”
Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abona kini niini?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii. Abona. Cin di bɛɛnyin Recal nɛɛn ci aku anowa ɛɛzana ŋaate neke.”
Ma anek Jakob nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Icinit di ŋaan abil ii paŋ. Ŋaan kizi ŋinti ka kojowantɔi ɛɛzana. Naa alaŋ awuduzu ɛɛza ka uturanit kegeec o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Karooŋnya rak ɛɛza kivita zɛɛ ma alotai niigi dook ŋina ka kipiktawa bɛ ṯuuk otoga ka kowodozta nɔɔgɔ dook.”
Mazi ŋaan azɔɔzɔ Jakob ki nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ, anyaa Recal ɛɛza ugeec.
Mazi acin Jakob Recal ki ɛɛza o malotin Leban, ook niini ṯuuwa, ma apik bɛ kivurut, ma awodoz ɛɛza.
Mazi akɔ odotiz ɛɛzana kodɛnta, uduwak Jakob Recal ɛlɛ enek nɛ, “Keen naana atenoi cun libire ci baatun. Keen ŋɛɛrti Rebeka.” Ma acoco Jakob Recal ŋalyamoc ŋaati aluwi.
Ɔdɔkɔny ni Recal, ma akɔ aduwak baatin kaviyak o Jakob ween ŋɛɛrti ŋɔɔnɔn.
Mazi akɔ odotiz ɛɛzana kodɛnta, uduwak Jakob Recal ɛlɛ enek nɛ, “Keen naana atenoi cun libire ci baatun. Keen ŋɛɛrti Rebeka.” Ma acoco Jakob Recal ŋalyamoc ŋaati aluwi.
Ɔdɔkɔny ni Recal, ma akɔ aduwak baatin kaviyak o Jakob ween ŋɛɛrti ŋɔɔnɔn.
Mazi akɔ azii baatinɛ zɔɔz nico, ɔdɔkɔnya iiya urumek nɔɔnɔ gɔl. Ma aŋacu, ma acoco ŋalyamoc. Anyaak ni niini nɔɔnɔ kɔrɔk. Ma aku oobek Jakob Leban kaal o agooni dook.
Mazi azii Leban kaal nicoko, enek niini nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ een niina atenoi. Keegin naaga biye codoi.” Aavu ni Jakob ŋinaante, ma aliŋliŋonek niini Leban nɔkɔ nyelok dook.
Ma iitene oman enek Leban nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Yo nuun een niina atenoi can o, alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati kanyin ineet liŋliŋi nɔkɔ. Inoko duwayan gi ci arooŋnyan kuruweyin ineet liŋliŋonte ci aliŋliŋonekan aneet noko.”
Maje Leban anyak bɛɛnyigin ceen ram. Ceen abuu o kazi zaar nɛ Leya. Aje ceen tutur o nɛɛn Recal.
Leya anyak kɛbɛrɛ ci alal koc, aje Recal alina niini ɔrɔɔt.
Ɛrɛɛz ni Jakob Recal, ma anek niini Leban nɛ, “Ŋaan kaliŋliŋonekin ineet irkitok torgɛrɛm ka nyan bɛɛnyun ceen tutur kazi Recal o kiriyi.”
Enek ni Leban nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abona ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ŋaati kanyin Recal ineet riyi. Alaŋ abon ŋaati kanyekɛ nɔɔnɔ eet oma. Inoko zin koromtɛ baak ŋina.”
Aavu ni Jakob iliŋliŋ irkitok torgɛrɛm ka kɔrɔca Recal, ma acin niini irkitok nicoko bar kizik iinya ci kidic tɛr, eeci arɛɛz niini Recal.
Ma iitene oman enek Jakob Leban nɛ, “Inoko idicai irkitowa o liŋliŋɔn onan. Nyan dole kitivic.”
Utugu ni Leban dayiin, ma awo ɔl dook ŋinaante kivitak tiŋkawiin ci bɛɛnyin o.

Bar baaline nice ɛlɛ, ooyi Leban bɛɛnyin o kazi Leya, ma akɔ anyek Jakob, ma ɔrkɔra buk Leya kibeen dole ween miroi aliŋliŋonek nɔɔgɔ kazi Zilpa ka kizi gabaren cin. Ma aromɛ Jakob ki Leya calaŋ aga nicini Leya o.

Mazi akɔ aaliz tammu, acin Jakob bar da ci oogin ki nɔɔnɔ o Leya gi. Ook ni niini ŋaati Leban bornɛt nɔŋa, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Gitaz ci agoonekan noko? Kaliŋliŋ naana ŋaatun ka kɔrɔc Recal. Naa alabana naa?”

Mazi akɔ aaliz tammu, acin Jakob bar da ci oogin ki nɔɔnɔ o Leya gi. Ook ni niini ŋaati Leban bornɛt nɔŋa, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Gitaz ci agoonekan noko? Kaliŋliŋ naana ŋaatun ka kɔrɔc Recal. Naa alabana naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Leban nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Naaga ŋina keere cinaaŋ o alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati avici ɔl dole ceen tutur o maŋaan gɔn ceen abuu o aavi baala.
Má anyi ziniz kitirany gaga. Rɛwɔ zɛɛ ma adicai iinya ween torgɛrɛm ci tiŋkawiin ci Leya o. Ŋaan kanyin bodo ineet Recal tivic ka bodo liŋliŋ irkitok oogi ceen torgɛrɛm.”
Agama ni Jakob zɔɔz nico. Mazi akɔ adicai iinya o tiŋkawiinto, anyek Leban Jakob bɛɛnyin o kazi Recal kitivic kizi ŋaa cin bodo.
Ma anyek Leban Recal dole ceen gabaren kazi Bila ka kook kiliŋliŋozek nɔɔnɔ.
Ataŋguzɔ ni Jakob ki Recal, ma arɛɛz niini Recal ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk Leya. Iliŋliŋ ni bodo Jakob ŋaati Leban irkitok torgɛrɛm.
Mazi akɔ acin Jooi Leya alaŋ areezi niini kiyo Recal o, ɔkɔl nɔɔnɔ momu kitir, ma bar anyek Recal kɔtɔɔ koliin.
Anyawɔ ni Leya, ma ookca ŋɛɛrin o kazi Robɛn. Ma azi nɛ, “Icinan Jooi aneet gidente onan. Inoko ma kanyawa naana ŋɛɛran o, ɛrɛɛzan tiŋeere ɛɛti cane o.”
Ma irkitowe ogɛn anyawɔ Leya bodo, ma ookca ŋɛɛrin oma. Ma azi nɛ, “Anyan Jooi ŋɛɛran oma bodo, eeci acinan niini aneet alaŋ kareeze.” Ma akanek Leya dole zaar ci kazi Simiyan.

Ma irkitowe ogɛn anyawɔ bodo niini, ma ookca ŋɛɛrin oma. Ma azi nɛ, “Didilɛ agaman tiŋeere ɛɛti cane o kɔdɔk giye ci karitakɛ naana nɔɔnɔ lɔgɔz iiyu o.” Akatek ni niini ŋɛɛrin nico zaar ci kazi Livai.
Bodo irkitowe ogɛn anyawɔ bodo niini, ma ookca ŋɛɛrin oma, ma azi nɛ, “Abona kanaati Jook.” Akatek ni niini ŋɛɛrin nico zaar ci kazi Juda. Uŋuuk ni niini bodo.
Mazi acin Recal ɛlɛ ɔtɔɔ niini koliin kɔkɔm dɔl nɔkɔ, onyoor ŋɔɔni. Ma anek Jakob nɛ, “Mã alaŋ aritakan dɔl, kadaai koca.”
Otobor ni Jakob nɔŋ zooze nico, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ naana keen Jook ci ateedin ineet tiri o.”
Enek ni Recal Jakob nɛ, “Gabaren onan kazi Bila ce. Ataŋguz ki nɔɔnɔ ka kitirayan dɔl ci ka kavadawan.”
Anyewun ni Recal Jakob gabaren onin kazi Bila kizi ŋaa cin.
Anyawɔ ni Bila, ma aritak Jakob logoz.
Izi ni Recal nɛ, “Utuguyeyan Jooi gi ci abon payiinte onin. Iziik niini ŋaryiin onan, ma inoko anyan ŋɛɛran.” Akatek ni niini dole zaar ci kazi Dan.
Ma irkitowe ogɛn anyawɔ Bila bodo, ma aritak Jakob ŋɛɛrin oma.
Ma azi Recal nɛ, “Kanyei rɔwɔn ci karowona ki ŋɔɔna, bar zin inoko kanyeya naana nɔɔnɔ ḏony.” Ma akanek Recal dole nico zaar ci kazi Navtali.
Mazi akɔ aga Leya ɛlɛ alaŋaan arit bodo, anyek buk niini Jakob gabaren onin kazi Zilpa kizi ŋaa cin.
Itirak ni Zilpa Jakob ŋɛɛrin.
Ma azi Leya nɛ, “Iiyayan bonati.” Ma akanek niini dole zaar ci kazi Gad.
Ma anyakɛ bodo Zilpa, ma aritak Jakob ŋɛɛrin oma.
Ma anek Leya ɛlɛ maany nɛ, “Inoko katalnɛ ɔrɔɔt. Ma buk agayan ŋaai dook katalnɛ naana ɔrɔɔt.” Ma akanek niini dole nico zaar ci kazi Acar.

Ma iinyaye o gɔɔn atɛɛdi ɔl labi, ook Robɛn ḏorta, ma akɔ ajowa agɛrɔ ci kɛɛt ci kazi mandarek, ma anyaak niini yaatin Leya. (Baale gɔɔn ŋaai mã adak agɛrɔ ci kɛɛt nico, atirit nɔɔgɔ nyayiinta.) Mazi acin Recal agɛrɔ nicoko, enek niini Leya nɛ, “Nyan da buk agɛrɔ ona anyaakin ŋɛɛrun e ci miliny.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Leya nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kodi! Ma baale ooyɛ eet, alaŋ aleenonu niina ki nɔɔnɔ. Arooŋ bodo biti agɛrɔ ci anyaakan ŋɛɛran o?”
Ma anek Recal nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã anyan agɛrɔ ci ona anyaakin ŋɛɛrun o, kanyin koca Jakob ka ataŋguz ki nɔɔnɔ baalin nico.”

Mazi akɔ aku Jakob manɛɛni, ook Leya urumek nɔɔnɔ gɔl, ma anek nɛ, “Inoko baaline nico kavɔ koogin naana ki ineet, eeci kabaliwawin ineet agɛroye ci anyaakan ŋɛɛran uyene.” Ook ni ataŋguzɔ niini ki nɔɔnɔ baaline nice.
Iziik ni Jooi ŋaryiin o Leya, ma anyake niini, ma ookcak Jakob ŋɛɛrin o ano gɔnɔgi ween wec.
Ma azi Leya nɛ, “Agoonekan Jooi gi ci kaganona ɔrɔɔt, eeci baale kanyeya gabaren onan eet onan.” Akatek ni niini ŋɛɛrin nico zaar ci kazi Isikar.
Ma iinyaye ogɛn anyawɔ bodo niini, ma ookcak Jakob ŋɛɛrin o anowa bawuci ween tur.
Ma azi niini nɛ, “Agoonekan Jooi gi ci abon ɔrɔɔt. Inoko ɛɛti onane ɛrɛɛzan tiŋeere ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci kitiraya nɔɔnɔ ŋɛɛrigin ceen tɔrkɔnɔm.” Akatek ni niini dole zaar ci kazi Zibolon.
Ma vurte nice itira Leya bɛɛnyin, ma akanek nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Dina.
Aada ni bodo Jooi Recal, ma azii ŋaryiin onin, ma akɔl nɔɔnɔ momu.
Anyawɔ ni Recal, ma ookca logoz, ma azi nɛ, “Aarawan Jooi alyaan onan kaŋuuwɛ.
Abona bai bodo anyan Jooi aneet ŋɛɛran oma nɔkɔ.” Akatek ni niini dole nico zaar ci kazi Josev.
Mazi akɔ aritai Josev, enek Jakob Leban nɛ, “Karooŋ kimiire kook ɔlɔ looce ona.
Karooŋ kooyi ŋaai cigan o been dɔl cigan baal kaliŋliŋa ŋaatun noko. Aga ri niina kaliŋliŋonekin ineet juruŋ.”
Bar anek Leban nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko mã areezan niina aneet, abon aavɛ karomtɛ kibeen aneet ŋina, eeci kojowa ŋarizɛta amayukan Jooi aneet o, eeci karomɛ kibeen ineet.
Inoko olla duwayan kaal ci arooŋ ka kuruweyin.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Agayan niina kaliŋliŋonekin ineet juruŋ. Ma azaaci ɛɛzana cugune o aziite can o.
Baale anyei ɛɛza ci miliny. Mazi kakun naana, amayuwin Jooi ineet kazaace ɛɛzana ugune kizi mɛɛlɛ gɛr ŋaaten aneet. Inoko zin kɔrɔɔŋa naana kabal ɛlɛ can o maany.”
Ma ajin Leban nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko zin arooŋnyan kanyin naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ karooŋ kaal ci anyan. Olla karooŋ kuduwayin baabani can ce. Mã agama, kazoonɛ koca bodo ɛɛza cugun o.
Nyan waanico kook kɔtɔɔ ɛɛzaye ugun ka kook katakala ɛɛza ci kolik ki ci labacik ki ci buzenik ka kizi kaal ci aruwekan niina aneet liŋliŋɔnta nɛɛn.
Ka zin gɔɔn tiŋeere mã ajowa niina ɛɛzane cigan o calaŋ kolitɛ ki calaŋ labacɛ ki calaŋ buzɛnɛ, kizɛ koca naana agoryai.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Leban nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kagama. Ŋaan kagoon eci aduwanɛ niina o.”
Atakala ni Leban iitene nico ɛlɛ ɛɛza ci labacik ki ci buzenik ki ci kolik, ma anyek ŋɛɛrigin kotowaac nɔɔgɔ.
Ma aŋɛrya niini ki ɛɛza ogin ŋaati Jakob, ma akɔ rɛɛna ŋaati kawɔyi zɔɔnɛ iinya iiyu. Maje Jakob abal ɛɛza o Leban oogi.
Uduula ni Jakob kɛɛn oto, ma ayɛɛt kizi labacɛ.
Ma aku arek kilɔmɛt o gɔɔn awodɛn ɛɛzana, eeci gɔɔn ɛɛzana avu awoyɔ ŋinaanto.
Mazi awoyɔ ɛɛzana keene o ɛɛl nɔɔgɔ ŋuma, itirta niigi dook nyɔɔ ci labacik ki ci buzen ki ci tulkik.
Ɛŋɛra ni Jakob ɛɛza ci ŋai o, ma anyek ɛɛza ci macik kolik o ki ci buzen o kotoozi gɔnɔgi ci ŋai o. Ma ɛɛnyca niini teny cin doon ka calaŋ acanɔ ɛɛzana ciginɛ o kibeen ci Leban o.
Mazi arɔɔŋ ɛɛzana ŋaye adii o gɔnɔgi ci macik o wɔyɔnta, arek Jakob oto ci keetu noko ɛɛza ŋumti ŋaao wodento ka ma awoyɔ niigi ŋina, ka kanyayit nyɔɔ ci buzen.
Ma arɔɔŋ ɛɛzana ci ŋaye mɔdɔtik o gɔnɔgi wɔyɔnta, alaŋ arek niini oto ci keetu o nɔɔgɔ ŋuma. Taman nɔkɔ iziti ɛɛzana ci mɔdɔtik o dook ci Leban, aje ci adii o dook iziti ci Jakob.
Zin gole nico izi Jakob arɔi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Anyawun niini ɛɛza ci meelik ki gabara ki nyakalɛt been zigire.
Ma iitene oman iziik Jakob lɔgɔz o Leban anɔ nɛ, “Ooyi Jakob kaal o baatinai dook. Arɔkzɛt cinɛ o dook akunak nɔɔnɔ ŋaati baatinai.”
Ma buk acin Jakob Leban alaŋaan arɛɛz nɔɔnɔ kiyo baale e.
Enek ni Jooi Jakob nɛ, “Miire bitɔ looce o baatun been atenok ugun. Ŋaan kɔrkɔr naana ki ineet.”
Itoonek ni Jakob otok Recal been Leya ka kɔɔt kurumtɔ ki nɔɔnɔ ḏorta ŋaao ɛɛlni ɛɛzana oginɛ.
Ma akɔ anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kaŋaamnɛ naana baatunooŋ alaŋaan areezan kiyo baale e. Bar zin Jooi o baaba ŋaan karomena kibeen aneet.
Agayu niiga kaliŋliŋonei naana baatunooŋ dɔyize onan dook.
Maje bar niini adakan aneet looc. Ma alabanan lak amɔtɔ kaale o ka waan kuruweyan niini aneet. Bar zin Jooi ŋaan kanyek nɔɔnɔ kutuguweyan aneet gi ci gɛr.

Baale gɔɔn ma anekan Leban nɛ, Ɛɛzana ci buzen o dook kaal cugun aruwonekin ineet liŋliŋonte unun nɛɛn, bar ɛɛzana dook arita nyɔɔ ci buzen. Mazi acin niini gi nico, anekan bodo nɛ, Ɛɛzana ci labac o dook kaal cugun aruwonekin ineet liŋliŋonte unun nɛɛn. Ma azi nɔkɔ bar ɛɛzana dook arita nyɔɔ ci labacik.
Gole nico ɛŋɛrayan Jooi aneet ɛɛza nicoko ŋaati baatunooŋ kizi cigan.
Ma iinyaye o gɔɔn awɔyɔn ɛɛzana, kacin naana wunozyai kizik ɛɛzana ci macik awɔyi gɔnɔgi o iziti buzɛnɛ, ceegi labacɛ, maje ogɛn tulkɛtɛ.
Ma anekan toonnyaiti ci Joowo wunozyai nɛ, Jakob. Ma kawɛ naana kazi nɛ, Woo.
Eneyan ni toonnyaiti ci Joowo noko nɛ, Cin di ɛɛza o macik awɔyi gɔnɔgi o dook iziti buzɛnɛ, ceegi labacɛ, maje ogɛn tulkɛtɛ. Kagoon naana gi nico o, eeci kacin kaal o gɛr agoonekin Leban ineet dook.

Aneeta Jook baal kayelzakin ineet ɛlɛ ŋaao kazi Bezal e nɛɛn ŋaabaal adɔŋɛ bɛ kibil tɔp, ma aḏuute maal o kiŋiroco, ma kagɔɔni terkediin ki aneet e. Inoko zin lot kaal ugun ka miire bitɔ looce unun baal aritanɛ.”
Ma ɛbɛdɛkɛ Recal been Leya Jakob anek nɛ, “Akɔm gi ci ŋaan anyayeket baatinaaŋ ageeta.
Inoko ataaloyet niini ageeta kiyo modɛna o, ma adawun kaal o aruyai ŋaatinaaŋ dook niini doon.
Bar zin arɔkzɛt ci aara Jooi ŋaati baatinaaŋ, ma anyin ineet o arɔkzɛt cinaaŋ kibeen dɔl cigaacak o. Olla zin tugu gi ci arooŋ niina tugu eo aduwakin Jooi ineet, maje naaga kɔrkɔr ki ineet.”
Ma taman nɔkɔ ulutun Jakob kaal ogin ajowa ole o Leban dook ka kuluuk kimiire kook ŋaati baatin Aizak looce o kazi Kanan. Ma arek niini ŋaai ogin ki dɔl nyakalɛt. Itiŋa ni uluugi kaal ogin dook.
Ma taman nɔkɔ ulutun Jakob kaal ogin ajowa ole o Leban dook ka kuluuk kimiire kook ŋaati baatin Aizak looce o kazi Kanan. Ma arek niini ŋaai ogin ki dɔl nyakalɛt. Itiŋa ni uluugi kaal ogin dook.
Ma akɔyi buk Recal joowanɛ o kɔrɔk o baatin. Agɔrɔz niini joowanɛ nicoko ŋaati aduŋni baatinɛ Leban akɔ azɛɛci ɛɛza ogin ima ḏorta.
Ma anik Jakob calaŋ aduwak Leban weet cin o.
Ma akɔyi niini kaal ogin dook, ma ayiik. Ma akɔ abaayiz liil o kazi Yuparatiz, ma akɔ biyene o Gilid.
Mazi akɔ een iinya iiyu, uduktak ɔl Leban niyi ci Jakob o.
Ooyi ni niini ɔl o kɔrɔk onin, ma aviri Jakob zooc iinya torgɛrɛm zɛɛ ma akɔ amɔda nɔɔnɔ biyene o Gilid.
Ma baaline nice ɛlɛ iiyak Jooi Leban wunozyai, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gɛny! Má agoone Jakob gi ci agoone been nɛɛn.”
Maje Jakob aal biyene o Gilid, ma aku Leban ki ɔl ogin, ma avu adɔdɔ buk niigi kɛɛmanɛ ugeec kɔjɔŋɔztɔ ki nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante nɔkɔ.
Enek ni Leban Jakob nɛ, “Naa alabanan zɛɛ ma akɔyɛ bɛɛnyigan kiyo ŋaai ci agamnyi ɔrɔɔnta o naa?
Naa alabanan, ma ani calaŋ aduwakan o naa? Inoko da waan duwayan kanyin waan ineet tɔ mayuwɛnta ŋaati abenin ɔl talniinta, ma aruwɛn kidoŋwana ki kidorɛt.
Akɔ ma alaŋ buk bac anyan kamayuk dɔl ci dɔl cigan o been bɛɛnyigan ka kɔtɔɔzɔ yaak. Agoon niina gi ci kizik bar agɔɔn ɛɛti ci tarbal.
Kanyei dɔyiz ci waan kagoonekin ineet gi ci gɛr, bar zin bilija alaman Jooi o baatun aneet, ma anekan nɛ, Gɛny! Má agoone Jakob gi ci agoone.
Inoko kagayin ŋɛdɛt ineet awɔ o, eeci arooŋ miirozek kɔrɔk unooŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Mazin akɔyɛ joowanɛ o kɔrɔk onan naa?”
Abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kani o, eeci kaŋolinin naana ineet. Kabaaban kazi nɛ, Coma aamanan bɛɛnyugun.

Mazin giye ci akati joowanɛ ugun, ija rɔɔŋɔ zɛɛ mazi ajowa ŋaatinaaŋ eet ci anyak nɔɔgɔ, ruk nɔɔnɔ kadaak. Mã anyak gi cun ŋina, abona adoma ageeta dook kɛbɛrɛn ŋina.” Azi Jakob nɔkɔ o, eeci alaŋ aga niini ɔgɔrɔza tɛ Recal joowanɛ o baatin o.
Ook ni Leban ɔrɔɔŋɔ kɛɛmawe o Jakob, ma bodo akɔ arooŋnyi kɛɛmawe o Leya kibeen kɛɛmawete o ŋaai ween gabara een ram, ma ŋaan kojowa niini joowanɛ ogin. Ook ni bodo ɔrɔɔŋɔ kɛɛmawe o Recal.
Maje Recal arɔɔt joowanɛ ci kɔrɔk ci baatin o doŋowe o nyakalo, ma aavɛ niini doŋok nico loota. Ma arooŋnyi Leban zɛɛ been tɛr calaŋ ajowa.
Ma anek Recal baatin nɛ, “Má abornekan nɔŋ baaba. Alaŋ kiŋaanekin je o, eeci kanyei maam ogaacak ŋaanu.” Ma arooŋnyi Leban, ma ŋaan kojowa joowanɛ ogin been nɛɛn.
Otobor ni Jakob nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek Leban nɛ, “Gerzitin can o inoo? Gitaz ci gɛrzɛ kagoonekin ineet ka virayan zooc o?
Inoko ɔrɔɔŋɔ kaale ogan dook. Mã anyak gi ci ajowa, arek looc bitaala ŋina ka kapaket ageet ɔl cugune o ki ɔl cigan o buk ŋɛnɛɛn ŋaatina ci alɛɛm.
Karomɛ naana ki ineet irkitok eetom, ma arit ɛɛzana ugune ɔrɔɔt. Ma ŋaan kadak naana mirkic codoi ɛɛzaye ugun been nɛɛn.
Baale gɔɔn mã adak kelegiti ɛɛz codoi ɛɛzaye ugun, karuwekin ŋabolo. Mã agɔrɔz agoryaiti ɛɛz codoi ɛɛzaye ugun, karuwekin ŋabolo.
Iinyaye niceke dook avacan kɔr, ma awudan laju calaŋ kajez ooŋnyak ŋaati kowawɛ ɛɛza ugun.

Karomɛ naana ki ineet irkitok eetom. Ma kaliŋliŋonekin ineet irkitok amɔnki wec gole ci ka kiryi bɛɛnyugun. Irkitok tɔrkɔnɔm kuwaye ɛɛzaye ugun. Ma alabanan lak amɔtɔ ŋaati abalyɛ kaal o ka waan ruweyan aneet.

Baal da calaŋ karomena naana ki Jook o jijiya Ibrayim ki baaba Aizak, ɔtɔɔyan waan ole unun kɔkɔm gi ci kakɔyɛ kina. Bar zin Jooi icin piryakzɛt onan, ma acin liŋliŋɔn o kagoonekin naana ineet. Nɔɔnɔ zin nɛɛn baal agernyekin da ineet bilija ka calaŋ agoonekan gi ci gɛr e.”

Abarizek ni Leban Jakob enek nɛ, “Ŋaai cugune noko bɛɛnyigan gi. Dɔlya cigeec o kibeen ɛɛza akanan aneet. Kaal dook ci acin niina ŋina noko kaal cigan. Alaŋ zin naana inoko kataman gɔl ci ka kooyi nɔɔgɔ.
Abon zin inoko naaga kagɔɔn ganɔn. Ija kataadizit biyɛn ci ka gɔɔn kaadai ganɔn cinai o.”
Odoma ni Jakob bɛ, ma arek looc kibil tɔp.
Ma aduwak ɔl ogin kuluta biyɛn ka kataadizit, ma agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ. Ivita ni niigi dook adaktɔ ŋaati ona ataadizɔn biyɛn o.

Ma anek Leban Jakob nɛ, “Biyɛn nicigi ka kizi adaan ŋaatinai.” Akatek ni Leban ŋinite zooze uneeŋ zaar ci kazi Jegar Saaduta. Kɛŋ cin kazi nɛ biyɛn ci adaanto ataadizɔ. Ma akanek buk Jakob ŋinite zooze uneeŋ zaar ci kazi Galeed. Kɛŋ cin atobɔ kibeen we buk.

Ma anek Leban Jakob nɛ, “Biyɛn nicigi ka kizi adaan ŋaatinai.” Akatek ni Leban ŋinite zooze uneeŋ zaar ci kazi Jegar Saaduta. Kɛŋ cin kazi nɛ biyɛn ci adaanto ataadizɔ. Ma akanek buk Jakob ŋinite zooze uneeŋ zaar ci kazi Galeed. Kɛŋ cin atobɔ kibeen we buk.
Ma azi bodo Leban nɛ, “Abon bai acinet Jooi, ma anyet ageet kuzuuti ganɔn cina o ŋaati kaŋɛrɔn noko.” Ma akanonek bodo ŋinite ɛlɛ zaara ci kazi Mizpa. Kɛŋ cin kazi nɛ vaaco ci cinento.
Ma anek Leban Jakob nɛ, “Mã agidi niina bɛɛnyigan, karabɔŋ bar bodo arɔca ŋaai oogi, mayo nuun alaŋ kacinin naana ineet, ga nɔkɔ Jooi acinin ineet.
Cin di biyɛn ci ona kalot noko kibeen bɛ ona kanyi kibil tɔp e.
Niigi dook kɛɛk ci ka keŋeret ageet. Alaŋ naana kavardaŋ biyɛn nicoko ka kook kutuguweyin ineet gi ci gɛr. Ma buk niina alaŋ avardaŋa ka ija tuguweyan aneet gi ci gɛr.
Abon bai Jooi o Ibrayim been Nayor apak zɔɔz cinai o.” Ma atɛɛt Jakob terkediin zaare o Jook o baatin Aizak ka kagantɔ niini kibeen Leban.
Utugu ni niini todoyoi bɛ tadena. Ma awak ɔl ogin been ɔl o Leban dayiin, ma avu adake niigi dook, ma aavtiz ŋinaante zɛɛ ma aalnek tammu.
Ma ŋeere ococo Leban bɛɛnyigin ki dɔl ugeec ŋalyamɔ, ma amayuk nɔɔgɔ kɔtɔɔzɔ yaak kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr akunak. Ɔtɔɔ ni niini imiire ook ole onin.
Mazi ŋaan awɔ Jakob gɔla nɔkɔ, urumtɔ ki toonnyak ci Joowo.
Mazi acin niini nɔɔgɔ izi nɛ, “Nici ŋinti abaai Jooi.” Akatek ni ŋinito zaar ci kazi Maanaam. Kɛŋ cin kazi nɛ ŋinti aalyo.
Ma itoon Jakob ɔl karaktɛ kɔɔt ŋaati gɔtɔnɔn Esɔ ŋaao kazi Edom.
Ma aricanek niini nɔɔgɔ kɔɔt kenektek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manygɔn, aneeta Jakob o keen gabaren unun nɛɛn ci kitoonekin otok o. Kook kabaawa ŋaati Leban ŋinti rɛɛn zɛɛ been nɛɛn ci kakunɛ noko.
Inoko zin kanyawa tiin ki zigire ki ɛɛza been gabara. Manygɔn, kitoonekin zin ineet molok o kanɛ coma atalnanan.”
Ɔɔtɔ ni ɔl ci ona itoon Jakob o. Mazi avɔ abada, ivita enektek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Koota ŋaati gotonon Esɔ. Inoko zin aku ka ivita urumtɔ ki ineet. Ɔrkɔra niini ki ɔl cigin een eet tur lak wec (400).
Mazi azii Jakob zɔɔz nico, anyawun ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt. Ma aŋɛr ɔl cigin o lak ram. Buk ɛɛza ki tiin been nyakalɛt aŋɛr lak ram.
Abaaban niini azi nɛ, “Mã aku Esɔ, ma aŋozonek ɔl ci oowu e, ŋaan avir ɔl ci vurto o.”
Aŋarowɔ ni Jakob izi nɛ, “Jook o jijiya Ibrayim been baaba Aizak, ineet nɛɛn baal anekan nɛ, Miire bitɔ looce unun aavtiyɛ atenowa ugune. Ŋaan kagoonekin ineet kaal dook kɔtɔɔzɔ juruŋ e.

Ma naana keen gi ci cɛlbɛz labak, bar zin ineet nɛɛn o anyan aneet bonat ci appe ɔrɔɔt iinya dook. Iiten baal kabaakzanɛ liil o kazi Jordan e akɔm kaal ci kanyei, bar waanice kanyei kɛɛt ci omtinto doon. Bar inoko zin kanyawa burɛn ceen ram noko.
Kajinin zin ineet ka ɛɛlawan niina aneet ŋaaten gɔtɔna Esɔ. Kanyei ŋoliin, karabɔŋ tedec aku niini, ma aŋozoneket ageeta dook, ŋaanɛ kibeen dɔl buk.
Lam gi ci gɛr calaŋ akunaket. Aga niina baale eterkedeyan niina aneet gi ci ka tuguwi kaal dook kɔtɔɔzɔ juruŋ ŋaaten aneet, ma aterkedekan buk dɔl ci dɔl cigan meel atobɔ been kazac.”
Ɛŋɛra ni Jakob kaale ogin abal oogi ka kanyek Esɔ ceen gɔtɔni o.
Aŋɛra niini bawɔ ci ŋai een eet tur lak ram (200), been kɔnyi ceen eetom (20), ki aza ci ŋai een eet tur lak ram (200), been mirkici ceen eetom (20),
ki nyakalɛt ci ŋai eetom kamɔtɔ (30) been jɔrɔ cigeec, ki tiin ci ŋai eet ram (40), been olenya amɔtɔ (10), ki zigire ci ŋai een eetom (20), been ci macik amɔtɔ (10).
Ɛŋɛr ni niini nɔɔgɔ kizi burɛn, ma anyek gabara ogin kɛbɛk gɔɔn ceeni buri codoi. Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Araktɛ ŋaatan. Ɔtɔɔz edeyɔ ŋaati aluugju burɛn nicoko o.”
Ma aricanek Jakob gabaren ci oowu e zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Ma arumonu ki gɔtɔna Esɔ, ma ajinin azi nɛ, Alaan cun ŋɛnɛ? Akɔ ŋaaḏaŋ? Tiin ci ŋɛnɛ ci aluugɛ o?,
abona abɛdɛkɛ niina nɔɔnɔ anei nɛ, Kaala nici dook kaal cugun. Itoonakin gabarɛnti unune kazi Jakob. Ŋaan niinilya awoya ageeta vurta.”
Ma aricanek buk niini gabara o anowa gɔn nico vurta gi ci anek nɔkɔ.

Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abona aziyu nɛ, Gabaren unun Jakob ŋaan awoya ageeta vurta.” Abaaban Jakob azi nɛ, “Abon kadiziyi nɔɔnɔ kaale nicoko ka katalɔ ŋaatan ka ma tedec karumona ki nɔɔnɔ ka calaŋ agoonekan gi ci gɛr.”
Itoon ni niini kaal nicoko karaktɛ ŋaatin. Ma ɔɔŋ niini baalin vurta ŋinaante.
Ma baaline nice ɛlɛ icinɛ Jakob, ma itoon ŋaai ogin arɔca een ram ki ŋaai ogin aavtiz been dɔl ogin een amɔtɔ codoi ka kɔɔt kabaayizit liil o kazi Jabok.
Ma bodo vurta itoonun buk niini kaal ogin dook kɔɔt baagita.
Aavu ni ŋinaante niini doon.
Ma aku ɛɛti oman baaline nice ŋinaante, ma acɔdɔ ki nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ ma arire lɔɔci.
Mazi akɔ acin ɛɛti nici akɔmnek nɔɔnɔ Jakob ŋaati amɔgi, alaca niini Jakob wanoc kopocai.
Mazi ŋaan atorkot Jakob nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, enek niini Jakob nɛ, “Aalun tammu. Toŋawan kɔtɔɔ.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã ŋaan rak mayuwan niina aneeta, alaŋ kooŋnanin.”
Ijin ni ɛɛti nici nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Kazi ineet zaar cugun nɛ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kazi zaar cigan nɛ Jakob.”

Enek ni ɛɛti nici nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ bodo kazi zaar cugun nɛ Jakob. Bar akatozeyin ineet zaara ci kazi Israyil. Kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ acɔdɔ ɛɛti ci deer ki Jook, eeci acodonu niina ki Jook been buk ɔl o deer, ma amogi niina nɔɔgɔ.”
Enek ni Jakob nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Duwayan buk zaar cugun.”
Bar anek niini Jakob nɛ, “Naa arooŋ gawan zaar o?” Amayuk ni niini Jakob.
Enek ni Jakob ɛlɛ onin maany nɛ, “Kicina ŋum o Joowo naanalya, ma bar ŋaan karogi labak.” Ma akanek niini ŋinito zaar ci kazi Penal. Kazi kɛŋ cin nɛ ŋum o Joowo.
Mazi adɔŋnyai ii, ɔtɔɔ Jakob ŋaati kazi Penal noko, ma ayɛt eeci alacai nɔɔnɔ wanoci.
Zin giye nico alaŋ ɔl o Israyil adak korɔ o arom anyɔtɔn ki wanoc zɛɛ been inoko o, eeci korone nicoko opoca Jooi Jakob wanoc.
Ma awɔ Jakob zɛɛ mazi aara kɛbɛrɛ, acin Esɔ aku ɔrkɔra ki ɔl ceen eet tur lak wec (400). Eŋerek ni niini dɔl ogin yaatigeec.
Ma anyek ŋaai ogin aavtiz been dɔl ugeec karaktɛ ɔɔwa. Ma ano Leya been dɔl ogin. Aje Recal been Josev aṯornɛkɛ niigi vurta.
Arayɛ ni Jakob niinilya nɔɔgɔ dook ɔɔwa. Mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz gɔtɔni, oloca ɔɔ lak torgɛrɛm.
Bar Esɔ adokonyonek nɔɔnɔ arumek gɔl, ma akɔ atorkot nɔɔnɔ azɛɛnɛ dook, ma acoco ŋalyamoc. Ma adɔta luwa niigi dook ramantiya.
Mazi aara Esɔ kɛbɛrɛ, acin ŋaai ci avu kibeen dɔl. Ma ajin niini Jakob anek nɛ, “Ɔl ci ŋɛnɛ nici?”
Abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, nici dɔl cigan anyan Jooi bonate onin.”
Ivita ni ŋaai oginɛ aavtiz been dɔl ugeec, ma avu aloca ooti.
Ma aku Leya been dɔl ogin, ma aku buk Recal been Josev, ma avu aloca niigi dook ooti ŋaati Esɔ.
Ma ajin Esɔ Jakob anek nɛ, “Ma burɛna o karumona gɔla o burɛn ci ŋɛnɛ?”
Abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi onan, burɛn cugun. Kanyin naana ineet ka talɔ ŋaatan.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Esɔ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Dole o yaai, kanyei naana kaal ci kaleenona. Zooti nicoko nyak kizi cugun.”
Ma anek Jakob nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã areezan niina aneet didi, abon agama kaal ci kanyin naana ineet o. Ma kacin naana ŋum cun noko bar kizik kacin Jook, eeci inoko niina atalnanan aneet.
Ɛɛlawan gama kaal ci kanyaakin ineet noko, eeci uzuutan Jooi aneet bonate onin, ma anyan kaal o karooŋ dook.” Ma adaŋek Jakob nɔɔnɔ kaal nicoko zɛɛ makacin agama.
Enek ni Esɔ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Lot kaal ka kɔtɔɔz. Abon kɔrkɔr naaga dook.”

Bar abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko rayɛ niina labak. Ŋaan kanuyin kidicilim ka kiito dɔl been tiin kidicilim zɛɛ ma kakɔ karumnyin ineet ŋinaante. Aga niina kaal ceen dɔl noko ŋaan anyɛlnyɛl. Ma buk maala ceen gɔla noko ki nyɔɔ ci miliny noko ipirta weeta. Mã kadaŋek nɔɔgɔ weet mayo nuun kawɔ iiten codoi, adaai koca.”

Bar abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko rayɛ niina labak. Ŋaan kanuyin kidicilim ka kiito dɔl been tiin kidicilim zɛɛ ma kakɔ karumnyin ineet ŋinaante. Aga niina kaal ceen dɔl noko ŋaan anyɛlnyɛl. Ma buk maala ceen gɔla noko ki nyɔɔ ci miliny noko ipirta weeta. Mã kadaŋek nɔɔgɔ weet mayo nuun kawɔ iiten codoi, adaai koca.”
Ma anek Esɔ Jakob nɛ, “Nyan zin kotoŋeyin ineet ɔl cigan oogi ka kitiritin.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm dole o yaai. Ɔɔtɔ ki ɔl cugun o labak. Olla uyen karooŋnyin naana ineet talɔ ŋaatan.”
Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ imiire Esɔ ook Edoma looce onin.
Ook ni Jakob ŋaao kazi Sɛkɛs, ma akɔ ɛɛnyca ceez ceen ḏoor been buk luwayanɛ ci tiinu. Ma kɛŋ ci zaar ci kazi Sɛkɛs o kazi nɛ luwayanɛ.
Iiya ni Jakob looce o kazi Mesopatamiya yaak zɛɛ ma aku arum kutur o kazi Cekam aavi looce o kazi Kanan. Ma aal ŋaati ajɔŋɔz kutur nice.
Ma akɔ ataala niini ŋinti ka kabaayi ŋaati dɔl ci dɔl o Amor. Ataala niini ŋinite zurtenene ceen eet tur (100).
Ma ɛɛnyca ŋinti ka kidiŋdiŋani Jook ŋinaante, ma akanek ŋinito zaar ci kazi Ɛl Eloye Israyil. Kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ Jook o Israyil anyak dɔyiz.
Ma iitene oman itiŋgazɔ Dina ween tinati Jakob been Leya arɔɔŋ niigi kɔɔt kicinit dɔl ci looc ci kazi Kanan o.
Maje ŋinaante anyak alaan ci looc nice kazi zaar nɛ Amor ceen niini borit ci ɔl o kazi Avit. Anyak niini ŋɛɛrin ci kazi Cekam. Mazi akɔ acin Cekam Dina, oŋozozek nɔɔnɔ, ma anyek kizi ŋaa dɔyiza.
Bar mazi acin niini dole alinak nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, ereezun ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma arɔɔŋ kimiciz.
Ma anek baatin nɛ, “Karooŋnyin bitɔ ole ci baati dole nico, ka jinɔ nɔɔgɔ kanycin ka kiriyi nɔɔnɔ kizi ŋaa can.”
Mazi akɔ azii Jakob gi o agoononek bɛɛnyin, otobor niini nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, maje lɔgɔz oginɛ ŋaan aavtiz tiini tuuwa, ma akɔm niini gi ci agɔɔn zɛɛ ma abada niigi.

Mazi abada lɔgɔz towawiinta, iziiyit buk niigi gi o anyekɛ Cekam ŋɔɔni kizi ŋaa dɔyiza, ma abor niigi nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, eeci anyaak gi nici ɔl o Israyil alyaan ci appe ɔrɔɔt. Ma akunak Amor ceen baati Cekam o Jakob ka kiiya kɔzɔɔztɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.

Mazi abada lɔgɔz towawiinta, iziiyit buk niigi gi o anyekɛ Cekam ŋɔɔni kizi ŋaa dɔyiza, ma abor niigi nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, eeci anyaak gi nici ɔl o Israyil alyaan ci appe ɔrɔɔt. Ma akunak Amor ceen baati Cekam o Jakob ka kiiya kɔzɔɔztɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
Ma anek Amor Jakob nɛ, “Arɛɛz ŋɛɛran o kazi Cekam bɛɛnyun ɔrɔɔt. Inoko abon anyekan niina nɔɔnɔ dole kiriyi.
Abon karɔcɔ naaga dɔl. Nyet niina ageeta kirikta bɛɛnyugun, ma buk ariyɛ niina dɔl cigaacak o.
Ka zin baak niina ŋaatinaaŋ ŋina ka tugu kaal ci olla arooŋ niina tugu.”
Ma anek buk Cekam baati Dina been gɔtɔnɔgi Dina nɛ, “Abona anyaŋ dole kiriyi. Ŋaan kanyuŋ kaal ci olla arooŋnyu niiga.
Uduktayaŋ kaal ci olla arooŋnyu kuruwayuŋ, mayo nuun aŋabakaŋ kaal ci ka kuruwayuŋ, ŋaan kanyuŋ labak. Anycaŋ dole kiriyi.”
Maje giye o anyekɛ Cekam dole alyaan, abarzek gɔtɔnɔgi dole Cekam been baatin Amor gole ci alaban.
Anek niigi nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ kanimnya naaga kanyceya ŋɔɔna kiriyi ɛɛti calaŋ ateedi. Mã kagoona nɔkɔ, een oca gi nici alyaan ŋaatinaaŋ ɔrɔɔt.
Kagamana naaga zɔɔz nico ŋaati ateedinu niiga buk kiyo naaga o.
Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, kagamana koca naaga kɔrɔcɔ ki igeet dɔl labak, ma kabaaka ŋaatunooŋ ŋina kiziti ɔl codoi.
Bar mazi alaŋ agoonu nɔkɔ, kavoya koca naaga dole cinaaŋ o.”
Agamta ni Amor kibeen ŋɛɛrin Cekam zɔɔz nico.
Ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ Cekam kaavu ŋinti rɛɛn, bar arɔɔŋ kiyiik kook kutugu gi nico kataman, eeci arɛɛz niini tinati Jakob ɔrɔɔt. Ma buk adiŋdiŋ niini ole ween atenok ogin ɔrɔɔt.
Ɔɔtɔ ni Amor been ŋɛɛrin Cekam ŋaao gɔɔn aminyi ɔl zoozok. Ma avɔ aduwak niigi ɔl ugeec kuturo dook gi nico. Anek niigi nɔɔgɔ nɛ,

“Ɔl ci Israyil noko ɔl ci abon ɔrɔɔt. Inoko anycek nɔɔgɔ kabaayitɔ ŋina labak ka buk kutuguzɔ niigi kaal ci arɔɔŋ. Appe lɔɔci cinai o, ma aganɔ ki nɔɔgɔ buk ŋaati abaayi labak. Abon zin kavɔ karɔc naaga dɔl cigeec o, ma buk arɔc niigi dɔl cigaac o.
Anyak olla gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Mã kateedi naaga ɔl ci mac o dook kiyo niigi o, agama koca niigi baayiz ŋaatina kiziti ɔl codoi.
Mã kagɔɔn nɔkɔ, koca tiina cigeec o dook ki kaalyan ugeec oogi izi cigaac.”
Agamta ni ɔl o kuturo dook zɔɔz ci aduwak Amor been Cekam nɔɔgɔ o, ma ateedi ɔl o mac dook.

Ma iinyaye ceen iiyu ma ŋaan amɔɔr niigi nɔkɔ, itiŋgazɔ lɔgɔz o Jakob een ram kazi Simiyan been Livai ween gɔtɔnɔgi Dina o yaatin, odomta niigi dilanya, ma anik avɔ kuture nice, ma avɔ aruk ɔl o mac dook kadaayitɔ.
Ma aruk buk niigi Amor been ŋɛɛrin Cekam kadaayitɔ. Ma ajowa niigi Dina ole o Cekam, ma anyaak nɔɔnɔ kɔrɔk uneeŋ.
Ma vurte ci aruwɛn ɔl nici kadaayitɔ o, itiŋgazɔ bodo lɔgɔz o Jakob ogɛnɛ ɔɔtɔ kuture nice, ma avɔ anyaa kaal o kutur nice dook ka kizi cacinɛt ci alyaan o ŋɔɔni uneeŋ.
Anyaa niigi ɛɛza ki tiin ki zigire kibeen kaal o kuturo dook kurum o ɛɛl manɛɛni buk.
Ma anyaa kaal o abona dook, ma agama ŋaai ki dɔl, ma anyaa kaal dook ceezinɛ.

Enek ni Jakob Simiyan been Livai nɛ, “Anyaaktayaŋu niiga aneet gi ci gɛr. Inoko ɔl ci Kanan o ki ɔl o Periza ki ɔl ci loocok nicoko o dook amartɔyan tiŋeere niigi aneet. Maje naana alaŋ kanyei ɔl ci meelik. Mã arom niigi dook eleeti, ma agaŋnyakan aneet, adica koca niigi ɔl cigaac noko dook kezeectɔ.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ zin buk abon ŋaati agɔɔni ɛɛti nici ŋɔɔna kiyo waaŋnyaiti o.”

Ma iitene oman enek Jooi Jakob nɛ, “Luuk ŋina taman bitɔ kuture o kazi Bezal ka bitɔ baak ŋinaante. Bitɔ tɛɛnyayan ŋinti taabinta ŋinaante. Aneet Jook baal kayelzakin ɛlɛ iitene baal avirɛ niina gotonu Esɔ e nɛɛn.”
Enek ni Jakob ɔl o kɔrɔk onin been ɔl o aromɛ ki nɔɔgɔ dook nɛ, “Otoŋit joowanɛ o adilanu. Abon adaalu eleeti ugooc, ma areku rumanɛ ci colai, ka obonta ŋume o Joowo.

Inoko zin kitiŋgaz kuluugit kɔɔtɔ Bezala. Mã kavɔ karum ŋinite, kakɔ kɛɛnyca naana ŋinti ka kidiŋdiŋanti naaga Jook baal atiritan aneet iitene o kapirnanɛ e. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o korkorya ki aneet vitɛnanɛ o kakɔyɛ dook.”
Anycek ni niigi Jakob joowanɛ o adilya dook been buk awac ugeec dook. Ma akɔ adawek niini kaal nicoko moloktoc o ajɔŋɔz ŋin o kazi Cekam loota.
Mazi aluuk Jakob been lɔgɔz ogin, anyayit ɔl o ajɔŋɔz kutur nice ŋoliin ci appe, ma alaŋ niigi arɔɔŋ koorit nɔɔgɔ.
Ivitak ni Jakob been ɔl ogin dook ŋino kazi Luz abil looce o kazi Kanan. Inoko agayi kutur nice zaara ci kazi Bezal.
Ɛtɛɛnya ni niini ŋinti taabinto ŋinaante, ma akanek ŋinite zaar ci kazi Jook o Bezal, eeci baale ayelzak Jooi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ ŋinaante iitene baal aviri niini gɔtɔni e.
Ma ŋinaante adaak ŋaa o kazi Debora baal gɔɔn azooni Rebeka e. Ma ada niigi nɔɔnɔ moloktoc loota Bezala ŋinaante. Ma akanek ŋinito zaar ci kazi Moloktoc o Luwanto.
Baale rak amayuwun Jooi Jakob Bezala ŋina waanbaal aviri niini gɔtɔni e. Mazi bodo abadaak niini Bezal vurta e, eyelizak Jooi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ, ma amayuk nɔɔnɔ bodo ŋina.
Ma anek Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kazi zaar ugun laadun nɛ Jakob. Bar zin inoko kakateyin ineet zaar ci kazi Israyil.”
Ma amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Keen naana Jook o kanyei dɔyiz dook. Zaacɛ, nyak dɔl ci meelik ka izi borit ci aritan boryowa. Ma buk een baati alaatu.
Ŋaan kanyin ineet looc ci baal katerkedei Ibrayim been Aizak noko. Ma ŋaan kanyi buk ŋinito dɔl ki dɔl cugun vurte cun.”
Mazi awɔ Jooi ŋinaante, ipik Jakob bɛ kibil tɔp, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook ŋaati aḏuutɛkɛ bɛ nico nyaan been maal ci kiŋiroco.
Mazi awɔ Jooi ŋinaante, ipik Jakob bɛ kibil tɔp, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook ŋaati aḏuutɛkɛ bɛ nico nyaan been maal ci kiŋiroco.
Ma akatek ni niini waanice ŋinito zaar ci kazi Bezal.
Ma iitene oman uluugit Jakob been ɔl o kɔrɔk onin Bezala. Mazi ka kurumit niigi Evrat, izi ŋinti ka kotoyai Recal, ma aam nɔɔnɔ dole ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Mazi ŋaan atɔɔt nɔɔnɔ dole ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔ, enek ŋaa o gɔɔn agama gɔnɔgi dɔl Recal nɛ, “Má anyei ŋoliin. Inoko tedec ookca ŋɛɛrun oma.”
Mazi akɔ ookcai niini, adavyai ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma akanek ŋɛɛrin nico zaar ci kazi Benoni o kazi kɛŋ cin nɛ piryakzɛt onan. Bar baatinɛ akanek nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Bɛnjimɛn o kazi kɛŋ cin nɛ aziit onan azo.
Adaak ni Recal. Ma ada ɔl nɔɔnɔ gɔl o akɔ ki Evrat kabanyca. Inoko ŋinito waanico kazi zaar nɛ Bɛzilɛm.
Ma apik Jakob bɛ kibil tɔp ŋinaante ka kizi gi ci gɔɔn aadanɛ niini Recal. Ŋaan abil bɛ nici tɔ ŋinaante zɛɛ been inoko o.
Uluuk ni Jakob ŋinaante bodo, ma akɔ aal vaaco o wun kazi Eder libire ci gɔl.
Mazi akɔ abaak Jakob looce nice, iŋiliz Robɛn ŋaa o baatin aavtiz kazi Bila. Iziik ni baatinɛ zɔɔz nico, ma abor nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Anyak Jakob lɔgɔz amɔtɔ ram. Lɔgɔz ci ŋaa onin kazi Leya nɛɛn Robɛn ki Simiyan ki Livai ki Juda ki Isikar been Zibolon. Zin Robɛn abuu gonogin dook.
Lɔgɔz ci ŋaa onin kazi Recal nɛɛn Josev ki Bɛnjimɛn.
Lɔgɔz ci ŋaa onin aavtiz kazi Bila een gabaren o Recal nɛɛn Dan been Navtali.
Lɔgɔz ci ŋaa onin aavtiz kazi Zilpa een gabaren o Leya nɛɛn Gad been Acar. Aritai lɔgɔz nici dook looce o kazi Mesopatamiya.
Zin ook Jakob ole o baatin Aizak ŋaao kazi Mamra ajɔŋɔz Ebiron ŋaa baal abaai jijitinɛ Ibrayim been baatin Aizak e.
Mazi akɔ een irkitowa o Aizak eet tɔrkɔc (180), adaak niini kanyatiz, ma ada nɔɔnɔ lɔgɔz oginɛ kazi Esɔ been Jakob.
Mazi akɔ een irkitowa o Aizak eet tɔrkɔc (180), adaak niini kanyatiz, ma ada nɔɔnɔ lɔgɔz oginɛ kazi Esɔ been Jakob.
Ceegi dɔl ci dɔl o Esɔ o akanonek nɔɔgɔ zaara o kazi Edom.
Arɔca niini ŋaai ogin ole o kazi Kanan. Kazi ŋaa onin een abuu nɛ Ida. Niini tinati Elon o ɔl o kazi Ititaz. Bodo ŋaa oma kazi zaar nɛ Olibama niini tinati Anaa ween ŋɛɛrti Zibon o ɔl o kazi Ititaz.
Ŋaa oma kazi zaar nɛ Basmat niini tinati Ismayil, ma een ŋɔɔni Nebat.
Ida ookca Elivaz. Aje Basmat ookca Rul.
Olibama ookca Juc ki Jalam been Kora. Nicigi dook lɔgɔz o Esɔ aritai looce o kazi Kanan.
Ma akɔyi Esɔ ŋaai ogin ki lɔgɔz ogin ki bɛɛnyigin kibeen ɔl o kɔrɔk onin dook been tiin ki ɛɛza o abala looce nice dook, ma aluuk ŋaati gɔtɔnɔn Jakob, ma akɔ looce oman.
Aluuk niini o, eeci lɔɔci ci abaai niini been Jakob o alaŋ alɛɛnɔ ki nɔɔgɔ dook, eeci abale niigi ɔrɔɔt.
Ook ni abaak Esɔ biyene o ŋino kazi Edom.
Ceegi zin dɔl ci dɔl o Esɔ ween jijiti ɔl o kazi Edom. Aritai niigi looce ween biyɛn kazi Siir.
Zaar zin cigeec nɛɛn ceegi. Elivaz niini ŋɛɛrti Esɔ o arita ŋaawe onin kazi Ida. Maje Rul ŋɛɛrti Esɔ o arita ŋaawe onin kazi Basmat.
Iiya ni Elivaz itira lɔgɔz ogin een tur kazi Teman ki Omar ki Zivo ki Gatam been Kenaz.
Bodo ŋaa o Elivaz aavtiz kazi Tima aritak nɔɔnɔ ŋɛɛrin ci kazi Amilek. Nicigi dɔl ci dɔl o ŋaa o Esɔ kazi Ida nɛɛn.
Maje Rul iiya anyawun niini lɔgɔz wec ci kazi Nakat ki Zera ki Cama been Miza. Nicigi dɔl ci dɔl o ŋaa o Esɔ kazi Basmat.
Bodo ŋaa o Esɔ kazi Olibama een tinati Anaa ween ŋɛɛrti Zibon ookca niini lɔgɔz iiyu, Juc ki Jalam been Kora.
Ceegi baatigi boryok ci dɔl o dɔl o Esɔ. Ŋɛɛrti Esɔ ween abuu kazi Elivaz izi niini baati boryok o kazi Teman ki Omar ki Zivo ki Kenaz,
ki Kora ki Gatam been Amilek. Nicigi dook dɔl ci dɔl o ŋaa o Esɔ kazi Ida.
Ŋɛɛrti Esɔ o kazi Rul iiya izi baati boryok o kazi Nakat ki Zera ki Cama been Miza. Nicigi dook dɔl ci dɔl o ŋaa o Esɔ kazi Basmat.
Maje Olibama arita niini boryok o kazi Juc ki Jalam been Kora.
Boryowa nicigi dook dɔl ci dɔl o Esɔ.

Ceegi zin dɔl ci dɔl o Siir ween borit o ɔl o kazi Orit baal laadun abaak niini baale looce nice e. Dɔl ci dɔl ogin nɛɛn Lotan ki Cobal ki Zibon ki Anaa ki Dicon ki Ezer been Dican. Niigi dook lɔgɔz ci Siir. Ivita ni niigi iziti ooti ci boryok o kazi Orit looce o kazi Edom.

Ceegi zin dɔl ci dɔl o Siir ween borit o ɔl o kazi Orit baal laadun abaak niini baale looce nice e. Dɔl ci dɔl ogin nɛɛn Lotan ki Cobal ki Zibon ki Anaa ki Dicon ki Ezer been Dican. Niigi dook lɔgɔz ci Siir. Ivita ni niigi iziti ooti ci boryok o kazi Orit looce o kazi Edom.
Lɔgɔz ci Lotan nɛɛn Ori been Iman. Maje Timan niini ŋɔɔni Lotan.
Dɔl ci dɔl o Cobal nɛɛn Alvan ki Manaat ki Ebal ki Cevo been Onam.
Zibon niini anyak lɔgɔz ram ci kazi Olya been Anaa. (Anaa nɛɛn baal ajowa lɔtitoc o anyak maam o abur balala iitene baal owawi niini zigire o baatin e.)
Anaa iiya izi niini baati Dicon ween jijiti boryok o kazi Imdan ki Ecban ki Tiran been Ceran. Anaa buk anyak ŋɔɔni ci kazi Olibama.
Anaa iiya izi niini baati Dicon ween jijiti boryok o kazi Imdan ki Ecban ki Tiran been Ceran. Anaa buk anyak ŋɔɔni ci kazi Olibama.
Ezer iiya izi niini jijiti boryok o kazi Bilaan ki Zavan been Okan.
Dican iiya izi jijiti boryok o kazi Uz been Oran.
Ceegi zin zaar o boryok o kazi Orit o looc o kazi Edom, Lotan ki Cobal ki Zibon ki Anaa ki Dicon ki Ezer been Dican.
Ceegi zin zaar o boryok o kazi Orit o looc o kazi Edom, Lotan ki Cobal ki Zibon ki Anaa ki Dicon ki Ezer been Dican.
Ceegi zaar ci alaat o abal looc o kazi Edom waanbaal ŋaan kanyayi Israyil alaat e.
Bela ween ŋɛɛrti Bozor abal niini looc o kazi Edom, ma een kutur cin adikir nɛɛn ŋino kazi Dinaba.
Mazi adaai Bela e, irigiz nɔɔnɔ Jobab ween ŋɛɛrti Zera o looc o kazi Bozra.
Arigiz Jobab Acam o looc o kazi Teman.
Arigiz Acam Adad ween ŋɛɛrti Bedad o looc o kazi Avit. (Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn baal amɔk ɔl o kazi Midiyan oroonte o kutur o kazi Mowab e.)
Arigiz Adad Samla o looc o kazi Masrika.
Arigiz Samla Cul o looc o kazi Ribot.
Arigiz Cul Balanan ween ŋɛɛrti Acbor.
Arigiz Balanan Adad o looc o kazi Pawu. (Ŋaa cin nɛɛn o kazi Mitabel ween tinati Matrid ween tinati Mizab.)
Zin Esɔ niini jijiti boryok o looc o Edom kazi Timan ki Alva ki Jetet ki Olibama ki Ɛlaa ki Pinon ki Kenaz ki Timan ki Mibzar ki Magdel been Iram. Ma loocok o abaai niigi dook akanonek zaara ugeecik.
Zin Esɔ niini jijiti boryok o looc o Edom kazi Timan ki Alva ki Jetet ki Olibama ki Ɛlaa ki Pinon ki Kenaz ki Timan ki Mibzar ki Magdel been Iram. Ma loocok o abaai niigi dook akanonek zaara ugeecik.
Zin Esɔ niini jijiti boryok o looc o Edom kazi Timan ki Alva ki Jetet ki Olibama ki Ɛlaa ki Pinon ki Kenaz ki Timan ki Mibzar ki Magdel been Iram. Ma loocok o abaai niigi dook akanonek zaara ugeecik.
Zin Esɔ niini jijiti boryok o looc o Edom kazi Timan ki Alva ki Jetet ki Olibama ki Ɛlaa ki Pinon ki Kenaz ki Timan ki Mibzar ki Magdel been Iram. Ma loocok o abaai niigi dook akanonek zaara ugeecik.
Ma amɛna Jakob abaak looce o kazi Kanan ŋaabaal abaai baatinɛ baale e.
Ceeni zin zɔɔz ci akati dɔl o Jakob.
Mazi akɔ een Josev irkitowa amɔnki torgɛrɛm, otowawɔ niini ɛɛzai been gɔtɔnɔgi o ŋaai o baatin aavtiz kazi Bila been Zilpa. Ma iitene oman iiya uduwak Josev baatin kaal o gɛr agɔɔn gɔtɔnɔgja.
Maje Jakob arɛɛz Josev ɔrɔɔt kujuk lɔgɔz ogin oogi, eeci aritai niini waanu izɔi niini matuwoc. Ma arɔɔŋak niini nɔɔnɔ rum ci anyak golnya ci alina ɔrɔɔt.
Mazi acin gɔtɔnɔgja baatineeŋ arɛɛz Josev ɔrɔɔt kujuk nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ, amartɔi niigi Josev ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ calaŋ amici niigi ki nɔɔnɔ zinzeetine ci vɔɔr.
Ma baaline oman uwunozɛ Josev. Mazi akɔ aduwak niini gɔtɔnɔgi wunozyak nicoko, amartɔi niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiyit di wunozyak ci kawunozei ce.
Bar kizik naaga dook katɛɛt labi mana. Ma iŋaaz kaŋaya ci labi ci kateedi naana o keelit jena tɔp. Ma avu aliya kaŋaya cugooc o cigan o, ma alocak nɔɔgɔ ooti.”
Enektek ni gɔtɔnɔgja nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Awaaŋ! Yo abaaban niina kizik katin een alaan cinaaŋ?” Amartɔi ni niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ wunozyak cigin o.
Ma iitene oman uwunozɛ Josev bodo, ma aku anek gɔtɔnɔgi nɛ, “Kuwunozɛ bodo. Kizik kacin ii ki nyelok been monyony ceen amɔnki codoi aloca ooti aneeta ŋuma.”

Ma aduwak buk niini wunozyak cigin noko baatin, bar agernyek baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Wunoza nici akati kɛŋ cinɛ naa? Yo abaaban kizik katin naana ki yaatun kibeen gotonogu kavunakin ineet, ma kalocana ooti ŋaatun?”
Enico anyaktek Josev gɔtɔnɔgja tɛl ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, maje baatinɛ azooni zɔɔz nico ziniza.
Ma iitene oman ooti gɔtɔnɔgi Josev ɛɛza ŋaati ajɔŋɔz Cekam.
Enek ni Jakob Josev nɛ, “Karooŋnyin bitɔ Cekama ŋaao owawi gotonogu ɛɛza.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Josev nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abona. Ŋaan kakɔ.”

Ma anek baatinɛ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ ka cin gotonogu mã aavtiz yaak, ka buk cin mã ɛɛl ɛɛzana dook tɔ. Mazi ook icinu nɔɔgɔ, bada ka ija duwayan.” Itiŋa ni niini ŋaao abaai niigi kazi Ebiron ka kook Cekama ŋaao owawi gɔtɔnɔgja ɛɛza.
Mazi akɔ arum Josev Cekam, icinun ɛɛti oman nɔɔnɔ ŋaati olla awɔyi anoti ḏoritot kɛŋ, ma ajin ɛɛti nici nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋ dim naa?”
Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni niini nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Karooŋ gɔtɔnɔga cigan owa ɛɛza ŋina. Duwayan da mã aga ŋinti aavtizɛ.”
Anek ɛɛti nici nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ɔtɔɔzɔ inoko. Kazii uyene nɔɔgɔ anɔ nɛ, Kɔɔtɔ ŋaao kazi Dozan.” Iviri ni Josev gɔtɔnɔgi zooc zɛɛ ma akɔ ajowa nɔɔgɔ ŋaati kazi Dozan noko.
Bar mazi acina niigi nɔɔnɔ rɛɛna, otoŋomit gi ci ka kurukti nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
Anɔ nɛ, “Eet o wunozyawu nɛɛn ci aku neke.
Ivita kɔɔtɔ kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak, ma kajukek ṯuuk ci akɔm maam. Ŋaan kavɔ kanek ɔl nɛ, Uruk nɔɔnɔ kelegiti ci mooti kadaak. Ka di kicinit gitaz ci aku wunozyaye cigin o.”
Mazi azii Robɛn gi nico, orooŋun niini gɔl ci ɛɛlanɛ Josev. Ma anek gɔtɔnɔgi nɛ, “Kotoŋit nɔɔnɔ calaŋ karuk kadaak.
Bar olla kujuktek nɔɔnɔ ṯuuk korok nɔkɔ.” Aduwa niini zɔɔz nico o, eeci arɔɔŋ ka tedec kabada kiiya kaara nɔɔnɔ ṯuuwa ka kanyek nɔɔnɔ kimiire kook ŋaati baatineeŋ.
Mazi akɔ arum Josev gɔtɔnɔgi, uburuca niigi nɔɔnɔ rum onin alina.
Ma avɔyi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ, ma avɔ ajukek ṯuuk ci akɔm maam.
Mazi avɔ aavtiz loota ka kadaktɔ, icinit niigi tajɛr ci modɛn o kazi Ismayil ɛɛrɔna looce o kazi Gilid avu avɔ Masirɛ. Atik niigi nyakalɛtɛ zooye kibeen karkarɛt.
Enek ni Juda gɔtɔnɔgi nɛ, “Inoko gitaz ci kajowa ŋaati kamonyi gɔtɔna cinai noko naaga maany kadaak, ma karɔɔt?
Kɔɔtɔ bar kataaltɔi nɔɔnɔ ole ci kazi Ismayil noko. Alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati karui naaga maany nɔɔnɔ kadaak, eeci niini gɔtɔna ona biyetu ɛlɛ.” Agamta ni gɔtɔnɔgja zɔɔz nico, maje Robɛn aziitɔ.
Mazi avɔ arum tajɛra nicigi ŋinti ona aavtiyɛ niigi o, aarta gɔtɔnɔgja nɔɔnɔ ṯuuwa, ma ataalek nɔɔnɔ tajɛr nicoko zurtenene ceen eetom. Ooti tajɛra nicigi nɔɔnɔ Masirɛ.
Mazi akɔ abadaak Robɛn ṯuuk, ajowa Josev iziitɔ ṯuuwa. Ɛrɛɛc ni niini rumanɛ ogin ŋaati aluwi gɔtɔni.
Ma amiironek gɔtɔnɔgi, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Izii dole ṯuuwa tɔ. Ka yo kutugu ku?”
Otodoŋit ni niigi bawot, ma agoonek rum o Josev biye.
Ooti ni niigi rum ŋaati baatineeŋ, ma avɔ alaba nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kajowana rum nico ḏorta. Yo alaŋ een rum o ŋɛɛrun gi?”
Iiyez ni niini rum, ma azi nɛ, “Ii, nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn. Uruwun bai inoko kelegiti ŋɛɛran Josev, ma aŋodotan nɔɔnɔ.”
Ɛrɛɛc ni Jakob rumanɛ ogin, ma aborcek rumanɛ ci zɔrzɔr luwanto, ma atik ciiroc ɔɔwa. Ma alu daayiz ci ŋɛɛrin o iinya ci meelik gɛr.
Ma azoozek nɔɔnɔ lɔgɔz oginɛ been bɛɛnyigin dook, bar alaŋ azii niini nɔɔgɔ. Azi niini nɛ, “Abon kalu ŋɛɛran nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma kadaai imin.” Ma alu didi niini ŋɛɛrin iinya dook nɔkɔ.
Maje Masirɛ ŋinaante ɔɔt ataaltek tajɛra Josev eet ci kazi Potivar ceen alaan ci ɔl o abɛk ceez o alaan o adikir kazi Vɛɛro.
Ma iinyaye niceke otoŋ Juda gɔtɔnɔgi, ma akɔ aromɛ niini kibeen eet ci kazi Aira ci kutur o kazi Adulam.
Ŋinaante urumtɔ Juda ki dole ceen tinati eet ci kazi Cuwa ceen borit ci ɔl o kazi Kanan. Iriyi ni niini dole nico.
Anyawɔ ni niini, ma ookca logoz, ma akanek Juda nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Eer.
Ma irkitowe ogɛn anyawɔ bodo ŋaa, ma ookca logo oma, ma akanek zaar ci kazi Onaan.
Ma bodo irkitowe ogɛn anyake niini, ma ookca logoz, ma akanek zaar ci kazi Cela. Ma aritai logoti nici e, abaak Juda ŋaao kazi Akziba.
Mazi akɔ adikir ŋɛɛrti Juda o kazi Eer, ɔrɔcak niini nɔɔnɔ dole ci kazi Temar.
Maje Jooi abor baayiz ci Eer o, eeci agɔɔn niini kaal ci gɛr, ma aruk niini nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
Enek ni Juda ŋɛɛrin o kazi Onaan anowa Eer nɛ, “Abon arigiz ŋaa ci gotonon bɔi noko. Oromtɛ ki nɔɔnɔ ka vada gotonu.”

Maje Onaan aga dɔlya ci koca arita niini o alaŋ een dɔl cigin. Mazi gɔɔn oogin niini ki ŋaa ci gɔtɔnɔn o, alaŋ arɔɔŋ koromtɛ ki nɔɔnɔ gole ci ka kitirakɛ nɔɔnɔ dɔl, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini kavada gɔtɔni.
Otobor ni Jooi gi ci agɔɔn niini noko, ma aruk Jooi nɔɔnɔ kadaak.

Enek ni Juda alawan cin kazi Temar noko nɛ, “Miire, bitɔ ole o baatun, ka bitɔ aavu ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adikir ŋɛɛran ci kazi Cela o.” Aduwa niini zɔɔz nico o, eeci aŋole niini azi nɛ “Mã aromɛ Cela been nɔɔnɔ, adaai oca buk kiyo gɔtɔnɔgja o.” Imiire ni Temar ook ole uneeŋ.
Ma iinyaye ogɛn adaak Juda ŋaa oninɛ. Mazi odotiz niini luwante ci ŋaa cin noko, ɔtɔɔzɔ niini orkorit been laŋotin o kazi Aira ɔɔt looce o kazi Timana ŋaao azeeci ɔl aza ogin ima.
Ma akɔ anek ɛɛti oman Temar nɛ, “Baati eet unun akɔ Timana ka kook kɛzɛɛc aza ogin ima.”

Aara ni niini rumanɛ ogin boyizetu, ma aborcek rumanɛ oogi, ma abuŋ ŋum ruma. Ma akɔ aavi loota araane o kutur o kazi Eniyam gole o akɔ Timana, eeci agawun niini inoko ŋɛɛrti Juda ween tutur kazi Cela idikira, ma ŋaan kanyozek niini nɔɔnɔ kizi eet cin.
Mazi aku acin Juda nɔɔnɔ, abaaban izi nɛ, “Ŋaa nici inoko waaŋnyai gi, eeci abuŋ ŋum.”
Bar alaŋ niini aga nicini alawan onin o. Ma anyaŋonek niini nɔɔnɔ gɔl kabanyca, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋ kanyin naagin mã koca koogin ki ineet?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋ tɛ niina nyan naa mã koogin ki ineet?”
Ma anek Juda nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan kakɔ kitoonakin nyɔɔn ɛɛzaye ogan.”
Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni niini nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Abona. Mã anyan gi ci kagam rak ka kɛrɛwɔi zɛɛ ma itoonakan nyɔɔn, kagama koca.”
Ijinun ni Juda nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Gitaz ci arooŋnyan kanyin ineet ka rɛwɔi o?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nyan adoŋoc cun noko been kɛɛt cun omtinto noko.”
Anyek ni niini nɔɔnɔ kaal nicoko dook, ma oogin ki nɔɔnɔ. Ma gole nico anyawɔ Temar.
Mazi akɔ ɔlɔ, ook aara rum o abuŋi ŋum e, ma aborcek ɛlɛ rumanɛ ogin zɔrzɔr boyizetu.
Ma iitene oman itoona Juda laŋotin Aira ka kanyaak ŋaa baal agam kaal ogin e nyɔɔn. Bar ŋaan kojowa niini ŋaa nico.
Ma ajin niini ɔl ci mac oogi kuture ci kazi Eniyam noko anek nɛ, “Waaŋnyai o gɔɔn adete gɔla ŋina o ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm waaŋnyai ŋina laadun.”
Imiire ni niini, ma akɔ anek Juda nɛ, “Ŋaan kojowa nɔɔnɔ. Anekan ɔl ci mac ŋinite nɛ, Akɔm gɔɔn waaŋnyai ŋinaante laadun.”

Enek ni Juda Aira nɛ, “Anyek zin nɔɔnɔ kooyi kaal niceke labak, eeci alaŋ karɔɔŋ naaga katarartet ɔl ageet. Karooŋ laadun kuruwek naana nɔɔnɔ nyɔɔn, Mazi akɔm ŋinti kajowan nɔɔnɔ o, anyek kook labak.”
Mazi akɔ een nyɛlɔwɛ iiyu, enek ɛɛti oman Juda nɛ, “Alawani unune kazi Temar izi waaŋnyai, ma inoko o bar anyake.”
Iricanek ni Juda ɔl gi ci anek nɛ, “Ooti nɔɔnɔ tuuwa ka ɔɔtɔ avaadit kadaak ŋinaante.”
Mazi avɔyi ɔl nɔɔnɔ didi ka kɔɔt kavaadit, itoonek niini baati eeto molok ci anek nɛ, “Kanyake eete ci kaal coko. Orooŋit eet ci adoŋoc nico been kɛɛt nico.”
Iiyezun ni Juda adoŋoc onin been kɛɛt, ma azi nɛ, “Alɛɛm niini. Kabaci gi nico naana ŋaaten nɔɔnɔ, eeci ŋaan kanyek nɔɔnɔ ŋɛɛran o kazi Cela kizi eet cin.” Enice ŋaan Juda kataŋguzɔ ki nɔɔnɔ bodo.
Mazi ka kizi ŋinti ka kotoyai Temar, bar tɛ anyak niini codɛ kɛŋa.
Ɔɔwa rak acin ɔl aziit ci dole codoi, ma agam ŋaa o gɔɔn agama gɔnɔgi dɔl aziit, ma acap aziit boŋitote ci meeri. Ma azi nɛ, “Nicini dole ween abuu nɛɛn.”

Bar imiirɔi bodo niini aziit, ma ookcai gɔtɔnnya nɔɔnɔ ɔɔwa. Ma anek ŋaa ci gɔɔn agama gɔnɔgi dɔl o dole nɛ, “Nici gɔl ci ka aamai gotonu abuuzɛt?” Akatek ni niini nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Paraz ween kɛŋ cin nɛɛn amiin.
Ma ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ otoyai gɔtɔnnya o anyak boŋitot o meeri aziita e, ma akanonek nɔɔnɔ zaara ci kazi Zera o kazi kɛŋ cin nɛ meerik.
Inoko zin aavi Josev Masirɛ. Ataalozozek baale niini Potivar ween alaan o ɔl o abɛk ceez o Vɛɛro.
Abaak niini, ma aliŋliŋ ceeze o alaan nico. Maje bar Jooi aromɛ ki nɔɔnɔ, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kobona kazaacɛ bonati oninɛ kook ki taden.
Mazi acin Potivar Josev aromɛ ki Jook, ma atirit Jooi nɔɔnɔ kaale o agɔɔn dook nɔkɔ,
ereezun niini nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi gabaren cin doon ci ka kabal kaal o kɔrɔk onin dook.
Zin ŋaaten Josev amayuk Jooi kɔrɔk o Potivar kibeen manɛɛn ogin buk.
Ma ooŋnek Potivar kaal ogin dook Josev kabal calaŋ aŋonyek niini ɛlɛ. Bar olla aavi, ma adake, ma akɔm gi oma ci ka kutugu.
Maje Josev niini logo ceen molyai ci alina ɔrɔɔt.
Mazi acin ŋaa o Potivar linat cin o, orooŋun nɔɔnɔ ka kɛlɛɛmtɔ.
Maje bar Josev ajura, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaani cane kazi Potivar o arekan aneeta ziniz ɔrɔɔt, ma ooŋnekan niini aneeta kaal ogin dook kabal naana.
Ma kanyei alaazɛt ci atobɔ ki alaazɛt onin. Ma akɔm niini gi calaŋ anyan kabal bar ineet doon. Zin ku ka koca kutugu gi ci gɛr ŋume onin been Jook o?”
Gɔɔn tup nɔkɔ ilalek niini Josev, maje Josev ajura ŋaati ka kɛlɛɛmtɔi ki nɔɔnɔ, ma buk alaŋ niini arɔɔŋ kaavtiyɔ ki nɔɔnɔ ŋaatodoi.
Ma iitene oman ook Josev ceeza ka kook kiliŋliŋ liŋliŋɔn onin. Maje gabara ogɛn azeetɔ.
Odoma ni ŋaa nici agamun Josev rum, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ija koromtɛ.” Ivir ni Josev, ma akɔ bitaala kodotek rum onin ŋaa azɛɛn.

Mazi acin ŋaa nɔɔnɔ odotek nɔɔnɔ rum ŋaati iviri nɔkɔ, otowa gabara ogin, ma aku anek nɛ, “Icinit di! Josev ween Ibiro baal anyaa ɛɛti onane e arɔɔŋ kiiya kiminaŋnyan. Akunakan ceeze onan, ma arɔɔŋ kotorowan kanyan kizi ŋaa cin. Ma kagereny molowe ci appe.

Mazi acin ŋaa nɔɔnɔ odotek nɔɔnɔ rum ŋaati iviri nɔkɔ, otowa gabara ogin, ma aku anek nɛ, “Icinit di! Josev ween Ibiro baal anyaa ɛɛti onane e arɔɔŋ kiiya kiminaŋnyan. Akunakan ceeze onan, ma arɔɔŋ kotorowan kanyan kizi ŋaa cin. Ma kagereny molowe ci appe.
Mazi aziiŋnan kagereny nɔkɔ, ɔdɔkɔny ook bitaala kodotek rum looc.”
Ma agam ŋaa rum nico zɛɛ ma akɔ aku ɛɛti kɔrɔk.
Enek ni niini eet nɛ, “Josev ween Ibiro een miroi akunakan uyen aneet ceeze onan, ma arɔɔŋ komomozan kanyan kizi ŋaa cin.
Bar mazi kagereny nɔkɔ, ɔdɔkɔny ook bitaala kodotek rum cin noko looc ŋina.”
Mazi azii Potivar zɔɔz nico, otobor nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma akɔ arek niini Josev ceez o cabiinto gɔɔn arek Vɛɛro ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o gɛr. Ma acabje Josev ŋinaante ŋinti wun kal.
Maje Jooi aromɛ ki nɔɔnɔ ceeze o cabiinto ŋinaante, ma amayuk nɔɔnɔ. Ma atalnɛ buk alaani o ceez o cabiinto ŋaati Josev.
Zin giye nico anyek niini Josev kɛbɛk kaal o ɛɛl ceeze o cabiinto dook. Ma anyek buk niini nɔɔnɔ kozooti ɔl o acabje.
Ma alaŋ alaani ci ceez ci cabiinto noko abut kaal o acin Josev, eeci Jooi aromɛ ki Josev, ma atirit niini nɔɔnɔ kaale o agɔɔn niini dook.

Maje waanice anyak gabara ceen ram titiny ole o Vɛɛro. Codoi ŋaatineeŋ anyaak gɔɔn alaan dayiin ki nyaantanɛ. Maje codoi aak niini ḏɔkɛn. Ma iitene oman utuguzɔ gabara nici gi ci gɛr anyek Vɛɛro kotobor nɔŋ.
Ma akɔ arek niini nɔɔgɔ ceez o cabiinto o buk acabin Josev.
Ma akɔ arek niini nɔɔgɔ ceez o cabiinto o buk acabin Josev.
Ma acabje niigi ŋinaante ŋinti wun ɔrɔɔt, ma anyek alaani o ceez o cabiinto Josev kɛbɛk nɔɔgɔ.
Ma iitene oman baal uwunoztɛ gabara ceen ram noko ceeze o cabiinto ŋinaante.
Mazi akunak Josev nɔɔgɔ ŋeere, acin niini nɔɔgɔ alaca eleeti.
Ma ajin nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Naa alacanu eleeti nɔkɔn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kawunozina bilija. Bar zin inoko akɔm eet ci ka koobeyet keŋti ci wunozyak nicoko.”
Ma anek Josev nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Jook doon ci aga keŋti ci wunozyawu. Uduktayaŋ di nuun wunozyak cugoocok o.”
Enek ni gabarɛnti baal gɔɔn anyaak alaan dayiin ki nyaantanɛ e nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kacin wunozeye cigan o kɛɛt ci anyak oto iiyu. Ma aduŋna bɔlɔwa ci colai otone nicoko, ma buk aduŋna kɛbɛrɛ, ma abiir.
Enek ni gabarɛnti baal gɔɔn anyaak alaan dayiin ki nyaantanɛ e nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kacin wunozeye cigan o kɛɛt ci anyak oto iiyu. Ma aduŋna bɔlɔwa ci colai otone nicoko, ma buk aduŋna kɛbɛrɛ, ma abiir.
Maje naana kanyei kooz o alaano aziita. Kodoca ni kɛbɛrɛ nicoko, ma kamacowe maam cigeec o kooz nico, ma kakɔ kanyi alaan.”
Enek ni Josev nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ziik kɛŋ ci wunozak cugun o ce. Oto ci keetu een iiyu o kɛŋ cinɛ akati iinya ceen iiyu.
Tiŋeere ma idica iinya iiyu cabiinta, aborcin alaani, ma uuŋnin ineet giye o agoon. Ma amiironekin niini ineet liŋliŋɔn unun bitɔ liŋliŋ labak.
Zin tiŋeere mã eelit kaala nicigi dook tɔ, aadawan buk niina aneeta. Duwak alaan ka buk koborcan niini aneeta.
Baale laadun naana kagamnyai looce o ɔl o kazi Ibiro, ma akɔm gi ci gɛr kagoon ka waan kacabɔi Masirɛ ŋina.”

Iziik ni gabarɛnti ci baal gɔɔn aḏɔk ḏɔkɛn ci alaano o zɔɔz ci aduwa Josev o, ma amenek nɔɔnɔ kɛŋ ci wunozyawu o ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma anek niini Josev nɛ, “Kawunoze buk bilija naana. Bar kizik kanyei ɔɔwa gilanya ci ḏokenu een iiyu.
Maje gilawi ci ataadonek gɔnɔgi tadena o anyak ḏɔkɛn ci alaano kɛŋa. Ma avu kibaali, ma adak ḏɔkɛn nicoko.”
Anek Josev nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ziik kɛŋ ci wunozak cugun o ce. Ma gilanya ceen iiyu o keŋti cigeec akati iinya ceen iiyu.
Tiŋeere ma idica niina iinya iiyu, aduŋnanin alaani cabiinta, ma akɔ ateedanin ɔɔ bitaala, ma arimiz ɛlɛ cun o kɛɛta ka kadayit kibaali.”
Mazi akɔ adicai iinya iiyon, utugu Vɛɛro kɔnyit ci iinya ogin tiryanto. Ma awak niini ɔl o mayan anowɔ ki nɔɔnɔ dayiin. Ma aborca gabara baal acabje een ram e.
Ma amiirɛnɛ gabaren baal gɔɔn aliŋliŋ nyaantanɛ kibeen dayiin e liŋliŋonte onin.
Maje gabaren baal gɔɔn aḏɔk ḏɔkɛn e ɛtɛɛda ɔɔ bitaala, ma arimiz ɛlɛ cin o kɛɛt tadena. Ma agooni kaala nicigi dook ebaal aduwan Josev e.
Maje gabarɛnti o gɔɔn anyaak alaan nyaantanɛ kibeen dayiin alaŋaan niini aada Josev giye baal aduwak nɔɔnɔ e.
Ma vurte ci ooti irkitowa raman uwunozi alaani o Masiro kazi Vɛɛro, kizik abil niini liile o kazi Nil otoga.
Ma acin tiin ci adii agirgir eleeti een torgɛrɛm aduŋna liila, ma avu agɛ dɔwɔna.
Ma bodo anowa tiin nicoko gɔnɔgja ogɛn ceen torgɛrɛm ci mɔdɔtik tuŋkar eleeti, ma avu ɛɛl liiltoga ŋaati ajɔŋɔz gɔnɔgi oke.
Ma akuu tiina ci mɔdɔtik noko gɔnɔgi o adii e. Enico icinɛ alaani ooŋnyai.
Mazi bodo ɔɔŋ, uwunozɛ bodo. Enico acin niini kaaza ci labinu een torgɛrɛm ci appintik abiir kaŋayace codoi.
Ma bodo acin kaŋayace nico ɛlɛ kaaza ceen torgɛrɛm ci amuduwez, ma alɔŋnyai ŋoote ci abur.
Ma akuu labina ci amuduwez noko gɔnɔgi ci appintik o. Icinɛ ni bodo alaani, ma abaaban wunozyak nicoko.

Ma ŋeere abarit alaan ziniz kapuk kapuk. Giye nico itoon ni niini otok kook ŋaritɛ been ole o agɛny een arinya o Masiro ka kivitak niigi nɔɔnɔ. Ivita ni ɔl nicigi, ma aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ wunozyak cigin o. Bar akɔm ŋaatineeŋ eet ci oobek nɔɔnɔ kɛŋ ci wunozyak nicoko.
Mazi akɔ acin gabarɛnti o gɔɔn aliŋliŋek alaan dayiin zɔɔz nico, enek niini alaan nɛ, “Waanico kaada gi o gɛr baal kagoon e.
Baale aborneket niina ageeta nɔŋ aneeta been gabaren baal gɔɔn aḏɔk ḏɔkɛn e. Ma areket ceez o cabiinto.
Ma baaline oman ceeze o cabiinto ŋinaante kuwunoztewa naaga dook.
Maje logoti ween Ibiro een gabaren o Potivar acabje buk. Ma kaduwaka naaga nɔɔnɔ wunozyak cigaacak o. Oobeyet ni niini ageeta keŋti cigeec.

Ma vurta eelit didi kaala nicigi dook ebaal oobeket niini ageeta e. Ma iiya didi imiirozekan niina aneeta liŋliŋɔn onan ebaal aduwan niini e, ma arui eet o aḏɔk ḏɔkɛn kadaak ebaal aduwakɛ niini nɔɔnɔ e.”
Mazi azii Vɛɛro zɔɔz nico, itoonek Josev otok kiiya. Taman nɔkɔ anyaakta ɔl nɔɔnɔ ceeze o cabiinto. Akoca niini zɛɛr, ma aborcek rumanɛ ci colai. Iiyak ni alaan.
Ma anek alaani nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kawunoze bilija, bar zin akɔm eet ci aduwakan kɛŋ ci wunozyak nicoko. Ma aduwakan ɔl azi nɛ, Oobei gɔɔn niina ɔl keŋti ci wunozyawu.”
Abɛdɛkɛ Josev nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ een aneeta nɛɛn ci kaga keŋti ci wunozyawu o, bar Jook nɛɛn o aduwakan aneet keŋti cigeec.”
Oobek ni alaani nɔɔnɔ wunozak cigin o anek nɛ, “Kawunoze kizik kabil liil ci kazi Nil noko otoga.
Ma kacin tiin ci adii agirgir eleeti een torgɛrɛm aduŋna liila, ma avu agɛ liiltoga.
Ma bodo anowa tiin nicoko gɔnɔgja ogɛn ci mɔdɔtik tuŋkarik ci ŋaan laadun kicin Masirɛ ŋina.
Ma avu akuu tiina ci mɔdɔtik tuŋkarik noko gɔnɔgi ci adii agirgir eleeti o.
Ma bar ŋaan mɔdɔtɛ nɔkɔ. Enico kizɛ bɛk kicinɛ.
Mazi bodo atɛɛdanan ooŋnya, kuwunozɛ bodo kizik kacin kaaza ci labinu een torgɛrɛm aduŋna kaŋayace codoi.
Bodo kaŋayace nico ɛlɛ aduŋna kaaza ceen torgɛrɛm ci amuduwez alɔŋa ŋooti ci abur.
Ma akuu kaaza nicigi gɔnɔgi ci appintik o. Mazi kaduwai wunozyak nicoko ŋarit kibeen ɔl ween arinya, bar akɔm ŋaatineeŋ ci oobekan keŋti cigeec kina.”
Enek ni Josev alaan nɛ, “Wunozyawa nicigi dook ramana akati kɛŋ cineeŋ nɔɔgɔ dook gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Ayelzakin Jooi ineet gi ci ka kutugu niini.
Ma tiina ceen torgɛrɛm adii o akati kɛŋ cineeŋ irkitok ceen torgɛrɛm. Buk kaaza ci labinu appintik abiir o akati irkitok ceen torgɛrɛm noko. Nɔɔgɔ dook adoye kɛŋ cineeŋ, ma akati bonat ci loocu.
Ma tiina ceen torgɛrɛm mɔdɔtik o been kaaza ci amudut o akati kɛŋ cineeŋ irkitok oogi bodo ceen torgɛrɛm ci anyayi lɔɔci tarjo ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
Abil zin kiyo kaduwakin noko. Ayelzakin Jooi ineet gi ci ka kutugu niini katin.
Anyak katin lɔɔci dayiin ci meelik irkitok torgɛrɛm Masirɛ ŋina.
Ma vurte nice aku bodo tarjo ci appe irkitok torgɛrɛm kiliita ɔl nyɛrizi ci irkitok baal een torgɛrɛm e.
Eeci tarjo nica tarjo ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt.
Ayelzakin zin Jooi ineet kaal nicoko wunozyai lak ram o, eeci aga niini tiŋeere agɔɔn nɔkɔ didi. Ma anyek tiŋeere niini kaal nicoko kakatai kataman.
Abon zin aŋɛra niina eet ceen arit agɛny ka kabal looc nico.
Abona buk aŋɛra alaat ceen inyaati cugun ka kiyaŋtek ɔl lɛlɛn ci labinu codoi lelenete ween tur labine o abiirna lɔɔci nici dook. Tugu gi nico irkitowe ceen torgɛrɛm anyayi lɔɔci dayiin o.

Ricanek nɔɔgɔ niinalya kuluta labi nicoko irkitowe ci abon o dook. Ricanek buk nɔɔgɔ kiyaŋit dayiin nicoko kuturyowɛ dook, ma abɛk juruŋ ka labina nicigi kitiritit ɔl irkitowe ci ɛɛnɛ lɔɔci tarjo katin e. Mã agoon nɔkɔ, alaŋ koca ɔl katin akaran.”

Ricanek nɔɔgɔ niinalya kuluta labi nicoko irkitowe ci abon o dook. Ricanek buk nɔɔgɔ kiyaŋit dayiin nicoko kuturyowɛ dook, ma abɛk juruŋ ka labina nicigi kitiritit ɔl irkitowe ci ɛɛnɛ lɔɔci tarjo katin e. Mã agoon nɔkɔ, alaŋ koca ɔl katin akaran.”
Agama ni Vɛɛro kibeen alaat o anowɔ ki nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz ci aduwak Josev nɔɔgɔ o.
Ma anek Vɛɛro ɔl nɛ, “Inoko kacin naana Josev anyak vɔŋiz o Joowo, ma akɔm eet oma ci abon kujuk nɔɔnɔ liŋliŋonte nico.
Enek ni niini Josev nɛ, “Inoko eyelizayin Jooi ineet kaal nicoko dook. Akɔm zin ŋina eet ci agɛny kujukin ineet.
Inoko karooŋ kanyin ineet bal looc can o, ka ɔl ci looc can noko dook kiziiktin ineet. Akɔm eet ci ajukin ineet dɔyiza, bar aneeta doon o kadikir ŋaatun alaazɛta.
Inoko zin kanyin naana ineet izi alaan ci ɔl ci Masiro noko dook.”
Aara ni alaani nyapokodec onin alaazetu, ma aborcɛkɛ Josev aziit. Ma aborcɛkɛ buk niini nɔɔnɔ rum ci alina, ma arikɛ kalbɛn ceen warki alɛm.

Ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kavool codoi kavoolete ogin agurut jɔmanɛ ka gɔɔn kɔtɔwi. Ma anyek buk nɔɔnɔ ɔl cigin abɛk ka gɔɔn kɔtɔɔzɔ nɔɔnɔ ɔɔwa kegerenycek ɔl, ma amadak ɔl gɔla ŋaati awɔyi niini. Izi ni Josev alaan ci abal Masir dook kizi niini inyaa ci Vɛɛro.
Ma anek Vɛɛro nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko keen naana ɔɔ. Een niina inyaa can. Akɔm zin eet calaŋ azii zɔɔz cun ole ci Masiro o dook.”
Akatek ni niini Josev zaar ci Masiro kazi Zavinat Pania. Ma arɔcak nɔɔnɔ ŋaa ci kazi Asenat ceen tinati Potiviri o gɔɔn arogomek joowanɛ o Masiro kuture o kazi Ilipoliz.
Akana Josev liŋliŋɔn ci alaazetu noko ŋaati ɛɛnɛ nɔɔnɔ irkitowa eetoma kamɔtɔ (30). Itiŋa ni niini ole o alaano, ma eerononek kuturyok o Masiro dook ka kook kicin liŋliŋonok ŋinaante.
Ma irkitowe o abon een torgɛrɛm anyawun lɔɔci dayiin ci meelik ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma alota Josev labi ci meelik irkitowe ceen torgɛrɛm abon noko, ma itaŋ piimanɛ kuturyowɛ dook.
Ma itaŋ niini labi ci meelik ɔrɔɔt kotobtɔ meelitina kibeen kazac o liilu alaŋ kanim kekeebit.
Mazi ŋaan kivita irkitowa o ka kanyayi lɔɔci tarjo o appe, itira Josev lɔgɔz cigin een ram ŋaawe onin kazi Asenat een tinati Potiviri o gɔɔn arogomek joowanɛ.
Ma akanek niini ŋɛɛrin ceen abuu o zaar ci kazi Manasa. Kɛŋ cin kazi nɛ iliitayan, eeci iliitai Jooi nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt onin kibeen baabani o abaabani niini kɔrɔk o baatin.
Ma akanek ŋɛɛrin ci anowa gɔn ceen abuu o zaar ci kazi Iviram. Kɛŋ cin kazi nɛ mɛɛlɛ dɔlya, eeci anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ dɔl looce baal apirnanɛ e.
Mazi aṯornɛkɛ irkitowa o abon een torgɛrɛm baal anyayi lɔɔci o Masiro nyɛriz e,
akatai bodo irkitowa ween torgɛrɛm ka kiiyai tarjo o appe baal aduwa Josev e. Anyayit ni loocowa dook tarjo ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma anyak dayiin Masira doon.
Mazi akɔ akanai magiz Masirɛ, ivita ɔl o Masiro dook utuluzek alaan uneeŋ ka kanyek niini nɔɔgɔ dayiin. Enek ni Vɛɛro nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ ŋaati Josev ka ɔɔtɔ utuguz gi ci olla aduwakuŋ niini igeet.”
Maje magiz ɛbɛyɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kadala looc o Masiro dook. Okolun ni Josev piimanɛ, ma ataalek ɔl o Masiro dook labi.
Ma buk avunak ɔl loocowɛ dook Masir ka kivita kataalit niigi labi ŋaati Josev, eeci izi magiz appe kizi gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt loocowɛ dook.
Mazi akɔ azii Jakob anyak Masira labi, enek niini ŋɛɛrigin nɛ, “Naa alaŋ atultulyu naa?
Kazii azi ɔl nɛ, Anyak labi Masirɛ. Ɔɔtɔ ataalta labi ci kavu karogzi eleeti.”
Itiŋgazɔ ni gɔtɔnɔgi Josev o baatin een amɔtɔ ɔɔtɔ Masirɛ ka kɔɔt kataalta labi.
Ma alaŋ anyek Jakob gɔtɔni Josev o yaatin kazi Bɛnjimɛn korkorit ki nɔɔgɔ, eeci aŋole niini karabɔŋ anyak gi ci gɛr agoononek nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante.
Orkorit ni lɔgɔz ci Jakob o kibeen ɔl oogi ci buk avɔ Masirɛ ka kɔɔt kataalta labi, eeci anyak Kanan tarjo ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
Maje waanice Josev izi niini alaan ci looc o Masiro laadun, ma ataalek niini labi ɔl o avu loocowe dook. Ivita ni buk gɔtɔnɔgja, ma avu aloca ooti ŋaatin.
Mazi acin Josev gɔtɔnɔgi, iiyez niini nɔɔgɔ, ma agɔɔn niini ɛlɛ kiyo alaŋ aga nɔɔgɔ o. Ma ajin nɔɔgɔ ŋaati aŋɔzyakɛ anek nɛ, “Avunu niiga ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Keegina ɔl ci kavuna looce o kazi Kanan. Karooŋnya kivita kataalta dayiin.”
Mayo nuun iiyezun Josev nɔɔgɔ o, alaŋ niigi iiyez nɔɔnɔ.
Aada ni Josev wunozyak baal awunozinɛ akati nɔɔgɔ, ma aduwak nɔɔgɔ e. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Eeginu roote ci avu arootu kutur cinaaŋ o ka ivita akatetu.”
Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm, Manygɔn. Alaŋ een nɛɛn. Kavuna kiyo buk ɔl dook ci avu ataal dayiin ŋaatun o.
Naaga dook keegina gɔtɔn ci adoye baatinaaŋ. Alaŋ keegina roote. Keegina ɔl ci kabonana.”
