Bar anek Josev nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm! Avunu ka ivita orootit kutur cinaaŋ o ka ivita akatetu.”

Anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manygɔn, keegina baale laadun naaga dook amɔnki ram. Keegina lɔgɔz ci eet codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ looce o kazi Kanan. Gɔtɔna codoi baale adaawa, maje ceen tutur o aromɛ inoko o kibeen baatinaaŋ.”
Abɛdɛkɛ Josev nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abil kiyo kanekuŋ nɛ, Eeginu roote o.
Inoko zin karooŋ ka kicinawuŋ. Inoko kazooz naana ŋaati kitoonɛ zaar o alaan o adikir abal looc nico. Alaŋ niiga awoyu been nɛɛn zɛɛ ma akɔ aku gotonu cunooŋ een tutur o ŋina.

Abon aavtiyu niiga dook ceeze o cabiinto ŋina, bar itoonit ŋaatunooŋ eet codoi ka kook kanyaa gotonu nice ka zin kiiya kicin naana mã aleemnyu didi. Mã alaŋ aku gotonu cunooŋ een tutur o, kagawuŋ koca didi eeginu roote.”
Ma anyek niini nɔɔgɔ kaavtiyɔ ceeze o cabiinto iinya iiyu.
Mazi akɔ adicai iinya ceen iiyu noko, anyaaktak ɔl nɔɔgɔ Josev ma aku anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Giye o kaŋolinɛ naana Jook, alaŋ karukuŋ igeet adaayit mã agoonu gi co.
Mã eeginu ɔl ci abonanu didi, anycek gotonu codoi ŋaatunooŋ kacabɛ ŋina ka ceegi kooti labi ɔlɔ ka kɔɔt kɛɛlta ɔl magiza.
Abon zin anyaakaŋ gotonu ceen tutur o ka kagawuŋ aleemnyu didi niiga zooze ci aduwanu o, ka zin calaŋ karukuŋ naana igeet adaayit.”
Agamta ni niigi zɔɔz nico.

Ma anɔ niigi maany nɛ, “Icinit di! Akunaket piryakzɛt nici giye baal kagɔɔnɛkɛ naaga gɔtɔna onai Josev gi o gɛr e. Baale ma ilaleket niini ageet ka waan kotoŋit naaga nɔɔnɔ, bar alaŋ karɔɔŋ kiziiyit nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn. Gi ci zin kapirnanɛ naaga inoko o nɛɛn.”
Ma anek Robɛn gɔtɔnɔgi nɛ, “Kuduwayuŋ waanice igeet kanekuŋ nɛ, Má agooneku dole gi ci gɛr. Bar alaŋ aziiŋnaŋ. Inoko zin kipirta giye o adaayi niini.”
Aje Josev azii kaal ci azɔɔz niigi o nɔkɔ. Maje niigi alaŋ aga azii Josev nɔɔgɔ o, eeci azɔɔz niigi zooze uneeŋ.
Mazi akɔ azii Josev zoozok ci azɔɔzɔnɛ niigi o dook, ook bitaala, ma akɔ alu ŋinaante. Mazi akɔ abadaan niini ziniz, abada bodo, ma aku aŋɛra Simiyan, ma acap nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna ŋina.

Ma aricanek Josev ɔl ogin kibitizit kaboot ci gotonogin o labinɛ. Ma amiirɔnɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ guruc ugeec kaboote ugeec eecitɔ calaŋ niigi aga. Ma anyek niini buk nɔɔgɔ dayiin ci alɛɛnɔ ki nɔɔgɔ keronnye cineeŋ o.
Aryek ni gɔtɔnɔgja kaboot ci labinu noko zigire ugeec, ma awɔ.
Mazi avɔ oogin niigi baalin gɔla, ɔkɔl ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ kaboon arɔɔŋ ka kanyek zigir dayiin, ma bar ajowa guruc ogin kaboon otoga.
Ma awo niini gɔtɔnɔgi anek nɛ, “Abadayan guruca ogane. Kajowa kaboona eecitɔ.” Ivirit ni nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ŋoliinta, ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Ma Jooi gitaz ci agooneket noko?”
Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni. Mazi avɔ arum baatineeŋ Jakob, oobtek niigi nɔɔnɔ kaal o agoononek nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante dook.
Ma anek buk niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaani ci Masiro o azoozeket ageeta ŋɔzyanta gɛrzɛ, ma aneket nɛ, Keegina roote.
Ma kabedeka naaga nɔɔnɔ kaneka nɛ, Alaŋ keegina roote. Keegina ɔl ci kabonana.
Keegina baale naaga dook amɔtɔ ram. Keegina lɔgɔz ci eet codoi. Gɔtɔna codoi adaawa, maje ceen tutur o aromɛ ki baatinaaŋ Kananakti.

Bar abedeket alaani nici ageeta aneket nɛ, Alaŋ kagayuŋ naana igeet eeginu ɔl ci abonanu. Anycek eet codoi ŋaatunooŋ koromtewa ki aneet ŋina ka ceegi kooti labi ɔlɔ ka kɔɔt keela ɔl ci ka kakaranit neke.

Ka zin ɔɔtɔ anyaaktayaŋ aneet gotonu ceen tutur o ka kiiya kicin. Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, kagawuŋ koca naana igeet alaŋ didi arootinu. Mazi didi tiŋeere kaku kacinuŋ naana igeet eeginu ɔl ci abonanu, kamiironekuŋ koca gotonu cunooŋ o, ma buk kanyuŋ koca igeet ivita gɔɔn ataalit kaal ŋina karabɔŋ ataalinu labak.”
Mazi avɔ aara niigi labi kabootɛ, ojokta niigi dook guruc ugeec kabootɛ. Anyayit ni Jakob kibeen lɔgɔz cigin o dook ŋoliin giye nico.
Ma anek baatineeŋ nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ dim aneet kokoloz dɔl cigan o dook? Josev ki Simiyan ɔɔt many, ma bodo inoko arooŋnyu ooti Bɛnjimɛn. Anyaakaŋ piryakzɛt nico nɔkɔ naa?”
Enek ni Robɛn baatin nɛ, “Mã alaŋ kabadanɛ Bɛnjimɛn, ŋaan arui lɔgɔz ogan een ram kadaayitɔ. Anyek nɔɔnɔ kaavu aziite can. Ŋaan kabadanɛ naana nɔɔnɔ.”

Bar anek Jakob nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ ŋɛɛran orkoryu ki ineet. Adaak baale gɔtɔnnya o yaatin. Izi logo ci anyigjai dook nɛɛn niini. Inoko naana kanyata. Mã orkoryu, ma akɔ akunak nɔɔnɔ gi ci gɛrzɛ gɔla, arukan koca aneet baabani kadaak.”
Enice ɛbɛyɛ magiz Kananakti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Mazi avɔ adica ɔl o kɔrɔk o Jakob labi ci baal ataalyai Masirɛ o dook, enek Jakob lɔgɔz ogin nɛ, “Imiirte bodo ɔɔtɔ ataalta labi oogi Masirɛ.”
Bar anek Juda nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aricaneket waanice alaani o Masiro gi ci azi nɛ, Abon avunu ŋaati anyaanu gotonu ween tutur.
Inoko zin mã agama niina kɔrkɔrta ki ŋɛɛrun, kavoya koca, ma kataalana labi.
Mazi alaŋ agama, alaŋ naaga kavoya, eeci aneket alaani nica ageeta nɛ, Má avunu mã alaŋ anyaanu gotonu ween tutur.”
Enek ni Jakob nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Naa agoonekaŋ gi ci gɛr nɔkɔn? Aduwaku laadun nɔɔnɔ gotonu ci miliny o naa?”

Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kaduwaka nɔɔnɔ o, eeci ajinet niini ageeta zoozok ci meelik. Ajinet aneket nɛ, Baatunooŋ ŋaan arogi? Anyaku niiga gotonu oma? Ma kabedeka naaga nɔɔnɔ jinenok cigin o. Alaŋ bar kagaya arooŋnyet niini ageeta ka kanyaaktaya nɔɔnɔ gɔtɔna o.”
Enek ni Juda baatin nɛ, “Nyan dole aneet kɔrkɔrta. Nyet ka kotooza taman ka calaŋ akaran ɔl magiz.
Ŋaan kazoonɛ naana Bɛnjimɛn. Mã anyak daayiz, ŋaan kadaaŋna naana ki nɔɔnɔ. Mã alaŋ kabadakin naana nɔɔnɔ yaak, anyek toriin kaavu ŋaatan.
Inoko da toŋawet kotooza, kabadawa waan inoko lak ram.”

Ma anek baatineeŋ nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã izi gɔl dook nɛɛn nici, ɔɔtɔ. Idiziyit zin buk niiga alaan nico ŋaati avoyeku nɔɔnɔ kaal o abon ɛɛl looce nico. Ootɛkɛi nɔɔnɔ mutul ki lɛtɛ ki karkarɛt ki agɛrɔ been manac.
Ooti buk guruc lɛlɛn ram ka ɔɔtɔ imiirtɔzɛkɛi nɔɔnɔ guruc baal ajowanu kaboote ugoocok e. Karabɔŋ bar da abac niigi.
Iyiitit gotonu ooti alaane nice taman.

Abon bai Jooi o anyak dɔyiz dook anyek ziniz ci alaan nice uwucek niiga ka coma bac abadakuŋ niini igeet Bɛnjimɛn kibeen Simiyan ci acabje ŋinaante neke. Maje naana mã kakuluz dɔl cigan noko, abon labak. Anyek kɔɔtɔ, eeci akɔm gi ci ka kutugu.”
Ooti ni lɔgɔz o Jakob dizkenok been guruc ci meelik, ma avɔyi buk niigi Bɛnjimɛn Masirɛ. Mazi avɔ arum looc, ɔɔt eyeltek eleeti Josev.
Mazi acin Josev Bɛnjimɛn, enek gabara ogin abɛk ceez nɛ, “Ooti ɔl nicoko ɔlɔ. Ɔɔtɔ otodoŋit taŋ ka kook kadaktowa buk naana kibeen nɔɔgɔ tedec waaz.”
Utugu ni gabarɛnti eci ona aduwakɛ Josev nɔɔnɔ o, ma akɔyi gɔtɔnɔgi Josev ɔlɔ.

Mazi akɔyi gabarɛnti nɔɔgɔ ɔlɔ, anyayit niigi ŋoliin, ma abaaban anɔ nɛ, “Anyaanet inoko ɔl ageet ŋina zooze ci guruc ci baal kajowa kabootɛ o. Arɔɔŋ ka kivita koŋoztozeyet ŋina ka kaamtawet zigire, ka kanycet ageet ɛlɛ kiziti mirɔk cigeec.”
Zin giye nico ivitak niigi gabaren o abɛk ceez tatok, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ,
“Manygɔn, kivitawa naaga ŋina rak baale lak codoi kavu kataala dayiin.
Mazi kamiirena waanice, kɔɔt kojoktowa kabootɛ guruc ogaacak baal kataalina e. Inoko zin kabadaya guruc niceke dook.
Ma kanyaana buk guruc oogi ci ka kataaltaya dayiin bodo. Alaŋ kagaya naaga ŋɛnɛɛn ci da amiironeket guruc kabootɛ o.”

Enek ni gabarɛnti nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má aŋolinu looc gaga. Anycaŋu baale guruc ugooc baal ataalinu e aneet ɛlɛ. Jook unooŋ een Jook o baatunooŋ nɛɛn ci amiironekuŋ igeet guruc kabootɛ o ka kizi guruc cugoocok.” Udunai ni niini Simiyan ceeze o cabiinto, ma aku anyek nɔɔgɔ.
Ma akɔyi gabarɛnti nici gɔtɔnɔgi Josev ceeza, ma akɔ anyek nɔɔgɔ maam ci oonyi zɔɔ, ma adayiz niini zigire ugeec.
Aarta ni niigi kaal o ka kidizikti Josev kaboote ugeec. Ma arɛwi nɔɔnɔ, eeci agaac niigi Josev aku tedec ka kiiya kadaktɔ ki nɔɔgɔ ole cin o.
Mazi akɔ aku Josev kɔrɔk, anycek niigi nɔɔnɔ dizkenok cigin o, ma aloca ooti ŋaatin.
Ma azaa niini nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Baale aduwakaŋ baatunooŋ ci izi matuwoc. Inoko abil niini ku? Ŋaan ɔɔŋ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, ŋaan baatinaaŋ ɔɔŋ.” Ma bodo aloca niigi ooti ŋaatin.
Mazi acin Josev dole o yaatin een tutur kazi Bɛnjimɛn, enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gotonu baal aduwakaŋ een tutur e nɛɛn nici?” Ma anek niini Bɛnjimɛn nɛ, “Amayukin Jooi ineet ŋɛɛran.”
Ma ooŋ Josev nɔɔgɔ taman nɔkɔ, eeci ateedi nɔɔnɔ ziniz ŋaaten gɔtɔni, ma arɔɔŋ kook kutulu. Ook ni niini ceeze oman, ma akɔ alu ŋinaante.
Mazi akɔ adotiz luwanta, ɛɛk kɛbɛrɛ, ma aduŋnak bitaalin, ma agam ɛlɛ calaŋ alu. Ma aduwak niini gabara kanyaakta dayiin.

Ma adake Josev tarabeze cin doon. Bodo gɔtɔnɔgja adake niigi tarabeze oman. Aje Masira o adake ŋinaante aŋɛra niigi eleeti kaavtiyɔ doon, eeci adiŋdiŋan niigi eleeti, ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kɔzɔltɔ ki ɔl ci Ibiro o, eeci apɛz niigi nɔɔgɔ kizi kaal ci labak.
Ma anyek Josev gɔtɔnɔgi kaavtiyɔ zedinta akana abuuwa zɛɛ been tir tutura. Mazi acin niigi eleeti azedi nɔkɔ, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti giye ci anyekɛ Josev nɔɔgɔ kaavtiyɛ nɔkɔ o.
Ma aŋerek ɔl nɔɔgɔ dayiin tarabeze ci Josev o, ma anyaak ɔl Bɛnjimɛn dayiin lak tur kujuk gɔnɔgi. Ma adake niigi dook, ma awodɛ ki Josev, ma atalnɛ niigi dook.

Otoŋomek ni Josev gabaren ween alaan o abɛk ceez onin gi ci anek nɛ, “Bitizek ɔl nicoko kaboot ugeec dayiine ci meel alɛɛnɔ ki nɔɔgɔ ŋaati atiki. Buk miirozɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ guruc ugeecik e dook, arikɛ gɔɔn giten guruc cigin o kaboon onin otok.
Doma buk kooz onan een warki, arek kaboon ci gɔtɔni uneeŋ een tutur been guruc ogin labinu e.” Ma agɔɔn niini eci aduwakɛ Josev nɔɔnɔ o.
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna anyek Josev nɔɔgɔ been zigire ugeec kɔtɔɔzɔ.
Mazi ŋaan awɔ niigi ŋaati ajɔŋɔz kutur nɔkɔ, enek Josev gabaren nɛ, “Iyiik viri ɔl oke zooc. Mazi akɔ amɔda nɔɔgɔ, jin enek nɛ, Uwuyu bonat gerzitina naa?
Agorozu kooz o alaan onan een warki naa? Nici kooz ci gɔɔn awodɛn niini, ma acin niini kooze nico kaal ci ka kivita katin. Agoonu niiga gi ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt.”
Mazi akɔ arɔba gabarɛnti nici nɔɔgɔ, uduwak didi niini nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz nico.
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Naa Manygɔn? Aduwaket zɔɔz ci gɛr nɔkɔn? Ŋaan naaga kutuguza gi ci abil nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
Iiten baale aga niina kabadaya naaga guruc baal kajowana kabootɛ e, ma kavu kanyin ineet. Mayo zin ku bodo ka kɔgɔrɔztɔ kaal ci ceez ci alaano o?
Manygɔn, mã ajowa eet codoi ŋaatinaaŋ ci anyak kooz nico, abon arui nɔɔnɔ kadaak, ma agam koogi ŋaatinaaŋ kizi mirɔk cugun.”
Izi ni niini nɛ, “Abona. Kagama zɔɔz nico. Zin tedec eet ci agɔrɔz kooz o doon ci kanyi nɔɔnɔ kizi gamnyai can. Maje ceegi awɔ tedec niigi yaak.”
Taman nɔkɔ aryek niigi kaboot looc, ma akɔl gɔɔn giten kaboon onin.
Ma arooŋnyi gabarɛnti ci Josev noko kidicilim, akana abuuwa, ma akɔyi been tir tutura. Ma ajoyai koozi kaboone o Bɛnjimɛn eecitɔ.
Mazi avɔ acin niigi gi nico, ereecit niigi rumanɛ ugeec ŋaati aluwi, ma arek kaal zigire, ma amiiri kibeen gabaren ci Josev o.
Mazi abadaak Juda been gɔtɔnɔgi kɔrɔk o Josev bodo, ajowa niigi Josev ŋaan aavi ceeza. Ma avaci niigi eleeti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma.
Ma anek Josev nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gitaz ci agoonu noko? Alaŋ niiga agayu ɛɛti ci abil ki naana ajowa gi ci abil nɔkɔ ŋarizɛta o?”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Juda nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kayo kenekteyin nɛ? Kayo kadaŋta gi nico ku? Ɔbɔra Jooi gerzitin cinaaŋ o laadun. Inoko zin naaga dook kizita gamnyak cugun. Alaŋ een gamnyai ɛɛti ci ona ajoyai koozi ŋaatin o doon.”
Bar anek Josev nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ naana kagoon nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Karooŋ naana eet ci ona ajoyai koozi ŋaatin o doon kizi gamnyai can. Aje niiga amiironeku baatunooŋ labak.”
Ook ni Juda ŋaati Josev, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Manygɔn, Kozoozɔ da ki ineet zinize ci vɔɔr. Má abornekan nɔŋ, eeci een niina alaan ci atobonu ki Vɛɛro.
Manygɔn, iiten baale ajinet aneket nɛ, Anyaku baatunooŋ karabɔŋ een gotonu oma?

Ma kabedekin naaga ineet kanekin nɛ, Ii, Kanyaka baatinaaŋ ci izi matuwoc, ma kanyaka gɔtɔna ci baatinaaŋ een tutur ci aritai niini ŋaati izɔi baatinaaŋ matuwoc. Maje dole ci yaatin een abuu adaak baale. Ɔdɔwɛ niini ŋaati yaatin ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Ma arɛɛz baatinaaŋ nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Eneyet ni waanice niina ageeta nɛ, Anyaaktayaŋ nɔɔnɔ kiiya kicin.
Ma kabedekin naaga ineet kanekin nɛ, Alaŋ logoti nici ooŋ baatinaaŋ. Mã koca agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, adaai koca baatinaaŋ.
Ma aneket niina ageeta waanice nɛ, Alaŋ koca bodo kacinuŋ igeet ŋina mã alaŋ anyaanu gotonu nice.
Mazi waanice kamiironeka baatinaaŋ e, kɔɔt kuduktaya naaga nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz nico.
Ma bodo aduwaket niini ageeta kabadawa ŋina ka kivita kataalta dayiin.

Ma kabedeka naaga nɔɔnɔ kaneka nɛ, Alaŋ kavoya, eeci alaani o Masiro alaŋ arɔɔŋ kicinet ageeta ŋinaante bodo dooke coma kɔrkɔrana kibeen gɔtɔna ceen tutur o. Mazi anyet ageeta kɔrkɔrta ki gɔtɔna ceen tutur o, kavoya labak.
Ma aneket baatinaaŋ ageeta nɛ, Agayu niiga Recal ween ŋaa onan aritakan niini aneet lɔgɔz ram nɔkɔ.
Codoi okolozɛ ook many, karabɔŋ da inoko uruyit nɔɔnɔ kɛlɛgɛ.
Mazi koca avoyu niiga Bɛnjimɛn, ma akunak nɔɔnɔ gi ci gɛrzɛ gɔla, arukan koca luwa kadaak, eeci kizɛ matuwoc.
Manygɔn, inoko zin mã alaŋ kamiironɛkɛ dole nico baaba, adaai koca niini, eeci arɛɛz niini dole ɔrɔɔt.
Manygɔn, inoko zin mã alaŋ kamiironɛkɛ dole nico baaba, adaai koca niini, eeci arɛɛz niini dole ɔrɔɔt.
Iiten baal kavuna e kanei naana nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Toŋa dole kaavu azeene cigan. Mã alam gi ci gɛr akunak nɔɔnɔ, ŋaan iinakan aneet.
Manygɔn, inoko zin abon karigiz naana dole nico kizi gamnyai cun. Anyek nɔɔnɔ kimiirye kibeen gɔtɔnɔgi.
Kayo kimiirozek baaba ku mã alaŋ korkorya been dole? Alaŋ karooŋ kicin baaba ŋaati akunakɛ nɔɔnɔ gi ci gɛrzɛ.”

Ɛtɛɛdɛ ni Josev ziniz ɔrɔɔt, bar alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini kutulu ŋaati acini gabara oginɛ nɔɔnɔ, ma anyek niini nɔɔgɔ kudunit bitaala, ka kaavtiyɔ niigi doon kɔkɔm eet oma ci aromɛ ki nɔɔgɔ, eeci arɔɔŋ niini kɔbɔrak gɔtɔnɔgi ɛlɛ.
Utulu ni Josev molowe ci alɛlɛ, makacin iziiyit ɔl o Masiro nɔɔnɔ, ma avɔ kaviyawa been Vɛɛro ole onin.
Ma anek Josev gɔtɔnɔgi nɛ, “Aneeta Josev nɛɛn nici. Ŋaan baaba arogi?”
Bar mazi azii gɔtɔnɔgja zɔɔz nico, abaritit niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma adali kɔkɔm gi ci abariz.
Enek ni Josev nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Izaktayaŋ ijonun ŋaato.” Mazi izaya, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aneeta gotonu unooŋ Josev baal ataaleku Masir e nɛɛn nici.
Má zin aŋolinu looc giye baal ataalinaŋ aneet e gaga, eeci bar da Jook nɛɛn ci agɔɔn gi nico o ka kitoonawan niini aneet igeet ɔɔwa ka kiiya kitirit ɔl magiza ŋina.
Izi inoko irkitowa ci magizo idicai ram. Ŋaan zin ɛɛl irkitowa ci magizo een tur ɔɔwa.
Itoonanan Jooi aneet igeet ɔɔwa ka kiiya kɛɛlawuŋ, ka korogit dɔlya ci dɔl ugooc.
Alaŋ een igeet nɛɛn ci itoonanaŋ aneet ŋina o, bar Jook nɛɛn o anyaanan aneet ŋina. Ma anyan kizi inyaa ci Vɛɛro, ka kabal loocok o Masiro dook ŋina.
Inoko iyiiyit imiirte ɔɔtɔ ŋaati baaba ka ɔɔtɔ enektek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Azi ŋɛɛrun o kazi Josev nɛ, Anyan Jooi aneet kabal looc o Masiro dook. Ijak zin Masir ŋaato kataman.
Ija ka baak looce o kazi Gocen ka jɔŋɔzan. Luuga korge unun dook.
Ŋaan kaku kazuunin naana ineet ŋaato. Inoko ŋaan ɛɛl irkitowa ci magizo een tur ɔɔwa. Alaŋ zin karooŋnyuŋ igeet akaranit ŋinaante.”
Ma anek bodo Josev gɔtɔnɔgi nɛ, “Inoko niiga dook been Bɛnjimɛn buk iiyeztaŋ aneet keen Josev nɛɛn.
Ɔɔtɔ zin uduktak baaba alaazɛt ci kanyei naana Masirɛ ŋina o. Oobtek nɔɔnɔ kaal ci acinu noko dook. Iyiiyit zin ka ɔɔtɔ uluuktai nɔɔnɔ kiiya ŋina.”
Enico otorkot niini gɔtɔni o kazi Bɛnjimɛn, ma alu. Ma alu buk Bɛnjimɛn ŋaati atorkodɔn.
Ma atorkot buk niini gɔtɔnɔgi dook, ma acoco nɔɔgɔ ŋalyamɔ ŋaati aluwi. Ma vurta ozooztek gɔtɔnɔgja nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ arum mɔlɔyi o avuni gɔtɔnɔgi Josev Vɛɛro, atalɔ niini been alaat o miliny buk giye nico.
Ma anek Vɛɛro Josev nɛ, “Duwak gotonogu karyek kaal zigire ka kimiirtozek Kanan.
Anyek nɔɔgɔ kɔɔt kanyaakta baatunooŋ ki kɔrɔk dook kurtɛnta kivita ŋina. Ŋaan kaku kanyi naana nɔɔgɔ ŋinti abon abaai Masirɛ ŋina. Ma kanyi buk nɔɔgɔ dayiin ci alɛɛnɔ.
Duwak buk nɔɔgɔ kooti kavoolɛt o agurut jɔmanɛ ka kɔɔt kanyaaktai niigi baatunooŋ ki ŋaai kibeen dɔl o miliny.
Má anyi nɔɔgɔ kiinonit kaal ugeec ooŋnek looc liga, eeci kaal ci tiŋeere kanyi naana nɔɔgɔ Masirɛ ŋina o abon ɔrɔɔt kujukit kaal ci ooŋnek niigi looc ŋinaante o.”
Ɔɔtɔ ni utuguzɔ lɔgɔz o Jakob eci adawakɛ Vɛɛro nɔɔgɔ o. Anyek Josev nɔɔgɔ kavoolɛt o agurut jɔmanɛ been dayiin ci ka kadayit gɔla.
Ma anyek buk nɔɔgɔ dook rumanɛ ci colai. Maje Bɛnjimɛn anyek nɔɔnɔ zurtɛnɛn ceen eet tur lak iiyu (300) been rumanɛ ci colai een tur.
Ma itoonek niini baatin zigire amɔtɔ ci akɔyɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ kaalyan o abona dook ci ataala niini mɛlɛgɛnyaye o Masiro. Bodo zigire ceen amɔtɔ atik niigi gora been ḏɔkɛn kibeen dayiin ci keronnyo.
Anyek ni niini gɔtɔnɔgi kɔtɔɔzɔ, ma ilot niini nɔɔgɔ calaŋ ayɔwɔ gɔla.
Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi ɔɔtɔ ŋaati baatineeŋ Kananakti.
Ma avɔ anek niigi baatineeŋ nɛ, “Ŋaan Josev arogi. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn ci abal Masir o.” Bar aŋɛja Jakob, ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ kiziik zɔɔz cineeŋ o.
Mazi avɔ oobek niigi nɔɔnɔ kaal o aduwak Josev nɔɔgɔ, ma acin buk niini kavoolɛt ci itoonak Josev nɔɔnɔ Masirɛ o, abada nɔɔnɔ ziniz, ma agama zɔɔz nico.
Ma azi nɛ, “Ŋaan bar arogi ŋɛɛran Josev. Inoko zin koroga naana, ma katalnɛ. Abona zin kakɔ kacin naana nɔɔnɔ maŋaan kadaak o.”
Acap ni Jakob kaal ogin dook, ma iŋaaz akɔ ŋaao kazi Biirsaba. Ma akɔ ataap Jook o baatin Aizak todoyoita ŋinaante.
Ma baal otowo Jooi nɔɔnɔ wunozyai enek nɛ, “Jakob, Jakob.” Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Woo. Aneeta ce.”
Enek ni Jooi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aneeta Jook o baatun gi. Má aŋoli ŋaati akɔyɛ Masirɛ gaga. Bitɔ labak. Ŋaan katin kanyi dɔl ci dɔl cugun kizi boryok ci meelik ŋinaante.
Ŋaan kazuunin naana ineet ŋaati akɔyɛ looce nice o. Má aŋoli looc gaga, eeci ma akɔ adaai ŋinaante, ŋɛɛrun Josev tɔ. Ma ŋaan kabadanɛ naana dɔl ci dɔl cugun looc nico.”
Uluugit ni Jakob ki ɔl ogin ŋaati kazi Biirsaba noko. Ma arek lɔgɔz oginɛ nɔɔnɔ kibeen ŋaai kibeen dɔl o miliny kavoolɛt o agurut jɔmanɛ baal itoonak Vɛɛro nɔɔnɔ e.
Ma aluugi niigi buk tiin ki ɛɛza been kaal ugeec anyak looce o kazi Kanan dook, ma avɔyi Masirɛ.
Ma aloŋan Jakob ɔl ogin dook, ŋɛɛrigin ki dɔl o ŋɛɛrigin, bɛɛnyigin ki dɔl o bɛɛnyigin.
Ɔl zin o kɔrɔk o Jakob ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ avɔ Masirɛ nɛɛn ce.
Robɛn ween abuu ki dɔl ogin kazi Anoc ki Palu ki Ezron been Karmi.
Simiyan ki dɔl ogin kazi Jimul ki Jamin ki Oda ki Jakin ki Zowar been Cawel ween logo o ŋaa o looc o Kanan.
Livai ki dɔl ogin kazi Gircon ki Kotat been Mirari.
Juda ki dɔl ogin kazi Cela ki Paraz been Zera. Aje ŋɛɛriginɛ o kazi Eer been Ona adaayitɔ waanice niigi Kananakti. Zin Paraz anyak dɔl ram ci kazi Ezron been Amul.
Isikar ki dɔl ogin kazi Tola ki Pua ki Jacub been Cimron.
Zebulon ki dɔl ogin kazi Sered ki Elon been Jaleel.

Nicigi dook lɔgɔz o arita ŋaa o Jakob kazi Leya een abuu looce o kazi Mesopatamiya. Itira buk niini waanice bɛɛnyin ci kazi Dina. Zin dɔlya o Leya been dɔl o dɔl ogin dook een eetoma kamɔtɔ ki tiin iiyu (33).
Anyak buk Jakob lɔgɔz oogi ci kazi Gad ki dɔl ogin kazi Zevon ki Aagi ki Cuni ki Ezbon ki Eri ki Arod been Areli.
Acar ki dɔl ogin kazi Imona ki Icva ki Icvi ki Berya been ŋɔɔni lɔgɔz nicoko ci kazi Sera. Ma Berya anyak dɔl ram ci kazi Ibar been Malkil.
Zin dɔlya nicigi dook dɔl ci Zilpa ween ŋaa o Jakob aavtiz been dɔl ci dɔl ogin. Eegin niigi dook amɔnki tɔrkɔnɔm (16).
Aje ŋaa o Jakob kazi Recal arita niini dɔl ram o kazi Josev been Bɛnjimɛn.
Ma Josev ci abaak Masirɛ o anyak niini lɔgɔz ram ci kazi Manasa been Iviram o arita niini ŋaawe onin kazi Asenat een tinati Potiviri.
Maje dɔlya o Bɛnjimɛn kazi zaar cigeecik nɛ Bela ki Bekar ki Acbel ki Gera ki Naaman ki Eyi ki Rooco ki Mupim ki Upim been Arid.
Dɔlya ci Recal o been dɔl ci dɔl ogin dook een amɔnki wec (14).
Anyak buk Jakob lɔgɔz oogi ci kazi Dan been ŋɛɛrin Ucim.
Navtali ki dɔl ogin kazi Jazeel ki Guni ki Jezar been Cilem.
Zin dɔlya nicigi dook dɔl ci Bila ween ŋaa o Jakob aavtiz been dɔl ci dɔl ogin. Eegin niigi dook torgɛrɛm.
Dɔlya ci Jakob aluugi o dook een eet iiyu ki tiin tɔrkɔnɔm (66), bar ŋaai o ŋɛɛrigin alaŋ akeebonek.
Mazi karom dɔl nicoko kibeen dɔl o Josev aritai Masirɛ, eegin niigi dook eet iiyu kamɔtɔ (70).
Itoon ni rak Jakob ŋɛɛrin o kazi Juda karayɛ kook kuduwak Josev ka kiiyak Josev nɔɔnɔ ŋaao akɔ aali niini kazi Gocen.

Mazi akɔ arum ɔtɔgi nici Josev, otoodun niini kavool onin agurut jɔmanɛ, ma akɔ ŋaati kazi Gocen noko ka kɔɔt kurumtɔ ki baatin ŋinaante. Mazi akɔ acin Josev baatin, otorkot niini nɔɔnɔ azɛɛnɛ dook, ma aluwek nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma anek Jakob ŋɛɛrin nɛ, “Inoko naana katalnɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Inoko mã kadaai ŋaati kicinin ineet o, alal ziniz ɔrɔɔt.”
Enek ni Josev ɔl o kɔrɔk o baatin nɛ, “Anycaŋ kook kuduwak Vɛɛro kenek nɛ, Ivita ɔl o kɔrɔk o baaba dook Kananakti. Ivitayan niigi aneet ŋina.
Zin niigi laadun ɔl ci tiinu. Uluuktai niigi tiin ki kaal ugeec dook ŋina.

Mazi awoyuŋ Vɛɛro igeet, ma ajinuŋ anekuŋ nɛ, Gɔɔn laadun niiga aliŋliŋnyu naa?, enektek niiga nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Keegina naaga ɔl ci tiinu. Mã aneku nɔkɔ, anyuŋ koca igeet abaayit Gocena ŋina.” Aduwak Josev ɔl o baatin gi nico o, eeci ɔl o Masiro alaŋ arɔɔŋ ɔl ci abal tiin koromtɛ ki nɔɔgɔ.

Mazi awoyuŋ Vɛɛro igeet, ma ajinuŋ anekuŋ nɛ, Gɔɔn laadun niiga aliŋliŋnyu naa?, enektek niiga nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Keegina naaga ɔl ci tiinu. Mã aneku nɔkɔ, anyuŋ koca igeet abaayit Gocena ŋina.” Aduwak Josev ɔl o baatin gi nico o, eeci ɔl o Masiro alaŋ arɔɔŋ ɔl ci abal tiin koromtɛ ki nɔɔgɔ.

Ooyi ni Josev gɔtɔnɔgi ceen tur ka kook keyelek Vɛɛro. Ma akɔ anek Josev Vɛɛro nɛ, “Baaba kibeen gɔtɔnɔga ivita niigi dook looce o kazi Kanan. Aluuganɛ niigi tiin ki ɛɛza kibeen kaal o abal dook. Inoko aal ŋaao o kazi Gocen.”

Ooyi ni Josev gɔtɔnɔgi ceen tur ka kook keyelek Vɛɛro. Ma akɔ anek Josev Vɛɛro nɛ, “Baaba kibeen gɔtɔnɔga ivita niigi dook looce o kazi Kanan. Aluuganɛ niigi tiin ki ɛɛza kibeen kaal o abal dook. Inoko aal ŋaao o kazi Gocen.”
Ijin ni Vɛɛro gɔtɔnɔgi Josev enek nɛ, “Aliŋliŋnyu gɔɔn laadun niiga liŋliŋɔn jaŋ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Keegina naaga ɔl ci kabala tiin kiyo jijitigaacak baale e.
Karooŋnya rak naaga kivita kabaakta ŋina, eeci ɛbɛɛyɛ tagizi ɔrɔɔt looce ci kazi Kanan neke, ma buk ɔkɔma artɛ ci ka kegeec tiina ŋinaante. Inoko zin tiritet. Nyet kabaakta ŋaati kazi Gocen noko.”
Enek ni Vɛɛro Josev nɛ, “Gi ci avunakin baatune ki gotonogu noko abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Inoko zin Masira izi buk looc cineeŋ.

Anyek nɔɔgɔ kabaayit ŋaati kazi Gocen noko labak, eeci een looc ci abon amadi. Inoko zin buk karooŋ mã anyak ŋaatineeŋ ɔl ci towawiinto abon azooni tiin juruŋ, anyek buk koca nɔɔgɔ kabalteyan tiin ogan.”
Anyaa ni buk Josev baatin kiiyak Vɛɛro ka kiiya kicin niini nɔɔnɔ. Ma akɔ amayuk Jakob nɔɔnɔ.
Ma ajin Vɛɛro Jakob anek nɛ, “Anyei irkitok izɔk?”

Abɛdɛkɛ Jakob nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyei irkitok eet tɔrkɔnɔm kamɔtɔ (130), ma irkitowe nicoko dook kaluugi gɔɔn nɔkɔ kɔkɔm irkit ci kabaayɛ rɛm. Kanyei irkitok ci miliny tɛr, ma gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma irkitowa ci kabaayɛ noko dook alaŋ een irkitok ci meel kiyo baal abaai jijitigane e.”
Amayuk ni bodo Jakob Vɛɛro zɛɛ ɔtɔɔ ni niini.
Ma anyek Josev baatin kibeen gɔtɔnɔgi kabaayitɔ ŋaati kazi Gocen o kojoŋozit niigi ŋino kazi Ramsis ebaal aduwakɛ Vɛɛro nɔɔnɔ e. Ŋinitana waanice ŋinti abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ looce o Masiro dook.
Ma anyek Josev gɔtɔnɔgi kibeen ɔl o kɔrɔk o baatin dook dayiin ci alɛɛnɔ ki nɔɔgɔ.
Ma ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ iiya tarjo ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ci akɔmni dayiin loocowe dook. Ma apirna ɔl o Masiro been ɔl o Kanan buk.
Ataalek ni Josev ɔl dook labi. Ma gole nico olota niini guruc dook ole o Kanan kibeen Masirɛ buk, ma akɔ arek ceez o Vɛɛro.
Mazi akɔ adicai guruca ɔla dook, ivitak ɔl ween Masir Josev, ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Idicai guruca ogaacak dayiino. Nyet dayiin. Má anyet kakaranta.”
Enek ni Josev nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã idicai guruca, anyaakta tiin. Ŋaan kaku kabalyekuŋ labinɛ.”
Anyaakta ni ɔl didi tiin ki ɛɛza ki jɔmanɛ ki zigire ka kivita kabaliyai niigi labi irkite nice.

Ma irkite co ivita ɔl bodo, ma avu anek Josev nɛ, “Inoko akɔm gi ci karoodin ineet. Idicai guruca ogaacak dook. Buk tiin ogaacak dook ooyɛ niina, ma ɔkɔma bodo gi ci kanyaka ka kabaliyaya labi. Izi eleeti cigaacak o doon ki manɛɛn.
Má anyet zin kadaakta karanɔn. Taalet ageeta ɛlɛ kibeen manɛɛn ogaacak ka kizita naaga gabara ci Vɛɛro ka buk manɛɛna ogaacak kizi cigin. Abon anyet labi ci ka korogta ka buk koḏokta oogi manɛɛni.”
Zin tarjowe nico ataalak Josev Vɛɛro manɛɛn o Masiro dook, eeci ɛbɛɛyɛ magiz Masirɛ ɔrɔɔt.
Ma buk iziti ɔl dook gabara ci Vɛɛro.
Maje ŋino abaai ɔl o ŋaryiinto ŋaan Josev kataala, eeci anyek Vɛɛro nɔɔgɔ dayiin tup nɔkɔ.
Enek ni Josev ɔl nɛ, “Inoko zin naana kataalawuŋ igeet dook ki manɛɛn ugooc ka iziti kaal ci Vɛɛro. Ooti zin ḏowo coko ka oḏoyit manɛɛni.
Zin tiŋeere iitene o teedinto, eŋerit labi ci ateedanu o lak tur. Odomta lɛlɛn codoi lelenete ceen tur noko anycek Vɛɛro. Maje lɛlɛn ceen wec o itaŋtek eleeti ugooc ka adayit oogi ka ogɛn kizi ḏowo.”
Enektek ni niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko zin niina orogozet ageeta. Ŋaan zin keegina gabara ci Vɛɛro labak.”

Iricanek ni Josev ɔl o Masiro dook ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ka gɔɔn kɛŋɛrtak niigi Vɛɛro labi cigin o irkitok dook, ma agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ. Ɛmɛda ni bar zɔɔz nici ibil kodot zɛɛ been inoko o. Maje ɔl o ŋaryiinto alaŋ niigi agɔɔn nɔkɔ.
Abaayitɔ ni ɔl o Israyil looce o Masiro ŋaao kazi Gocen zɛɛ makacin iziti niigi botoro ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma arit buk niigi zɛɛ makacin azaace kizi mɛɛlɛ gɛr.
Ma abaak Jakob Masirɛ irkitok amɔnki torgɛrɛm zɛɛ ma een irkitowa oginɛ tiryanto eet torgɛrɛm ki tiin torgɛrɛm (147).
Mazi ka kizi ŋinti ka kanyati niini, otowa ŋɛɛrin Josev, ma aku anek nɛ, “Mã areezan niina aneeta didi, zuuti gi ci tiŋeere alaŋ adayan aneet looce ci Masiro o ŋina.
Mã kadaai ŋina, bitan zɛɛ ma akɔ adayan ŋaao adawin jijitigane.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Josev nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan kagoon eci aduwanɛ o.”
Ma azi Jakob bodo nɛ, “Agoon dim tiŋeere didi nɔkɔ?”
Anek Josev nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ii, baaba. Kagoon didi tiŋeere nɔkɔ.”
Anyek ni Jakob Jook zany ŋaati ɔɔŋɛ kɛrca.
Ma vurta iitene oman enektek ɔl Josev nɛ, “Amɔɔr baatune.” Ooyi ni niini lɔgɔz ogin kazi Manasa been Iviram ka kɔɔt kicinit niigi jijitineeŋ.
Mazi azii Jakob iiya ŋɛɛrin Josev, agamun ɛlɛ, ma iŋaaz kaavu jena kerce onin.
Ma anek niini ŋɛɛrin Josev nɛ, “Baale ayelzakan Jooi o anyak dɔyiz dook ɛlɛ ŋaao kazi Luz looce o Kanan, ma amayukan.
Ma anekan nɛ, Kanyin katin dɔl ci meelik ka dɔlya ci dɔl cugun kiziti boryok ci meelik. Ma kanyi nɔɔgɔ katin looc nico kizi cineeŋ kabaakti niigi kodot.”

Ma anek Jakob bodo Josev nɛ, “Ma Iviram kibeen Manasa ceen lɔgɔz cugun aritai Masirɛ waan o ŋaan naana kiiyakɛ Masir e, ɛɛl niigi kiyo dɔlya ogane o. Atobɔ niigi kibeen lɔgɔz ogan kazi Robɛn kibeen Simiyan.
Matɛ katin arita niina lɔgɔz oogi bodo, alaŋaan nicaga een cigan. Izi niigi cugun doon. Ŋaan zin akunak nɔɔgɔ mayuwɛnɛt cineeŋ ŋaati Iviram kibeen Manasa.

Kagoon kaal nicoko ka kaadai yaatun Recal baal adaai Kananakti ŋaao ajɔŋɔz Evrat iinyaye baal kabadanɛ keronnye o kakunɛ looce o kazi Mesopatamiya e. Zin baale daayizi oninɛ awucnekan aneet ɔrɔɔt.” (Ŋinti kazi Evrat neke utuye inoko bodo zaara ci kazi Bɛzilɛm.)
Maje waanice Jakob alaŋaan kɛbɛrɛ acinɛ juruŋ, eeci anyat niini ɔrɔɔt. Ma icayan Josev lɔgɔz ogin een ram kojoŋozit Jakob. Ma ajin Jakob Josev anek nɛ, “Lɔgɔz ci ŋɛnɛ nici?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Josev nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Lɔgɔz ogan baal anyan Jooi Masirɛ ŋina e nɛɛn.”
Enek ni Jakob nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Iicayai zin nɔɔgɔ ŋaato kamayuk.”
Anyek ni Josev nɔɔnɔ dɔl, ma atorkot niini nɔɔgɔ, ma acoco ŋalyamɔ.
Maje waanice Jakob alaŋaan kɛbɛrɛ acinɛ juruŋ, eeci anyat niini ɔrɔɔt. Ma icayan Josev lɔgɔz ogin een ram kojoŋozit Jakob. Ma ajin Jakob Josev anek nɛ, “Lɔgɔz ci ŋɛnɛ nici?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Josev nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Lɔgɔz ogan baal anyan Jooi Masirɛ ŋina e nɛɛn.”
Enek ni Jakob nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Iicayai zin nɔɔgɔ ŋaato kamayuk.”
Anyek ni Josev nɔɔnɔ dɔl, ma atorkot niini nɔɔgɔ, ma acoco ŋalyamɔ.
Maje waanice Jakob alaŋaan kɛbɛrɛ acinɛ juruŋ, eeci anyat niini ɔrɔɔt. Ma icayan Josev lɔgɔz ogin een ram kojoŋozit Jakob. Ma ajin Jakob Josev anek nɛ, “Lɔgɔz ci ŋɛnɛ nici?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Josev nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Lɔgɔz ogan baal anyan Jooi Masirɛ ŋina e nɛɛn.”
Enek ni Jakob nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Iicayai zin nɔɔgɔ ŋaato kamayuk.”
Anyek ni Josev nɔɔnɔ dɔl, ma atorkot niini nɔɔgɔ, ma acoco ŋalyamɔ.
Ma anek Jakob Josev nɛ, “Alaŋ baale kaga kacinin bodo, bar inoko Jooi anyan korok zɛɛ makacin kicinin ineet ki dɔl cugun buk.”
Aara ni Josev dɔl baatin anyɔtɔi, ma akat kozoŋtin, ma aloca ɔɔ baatin ŋuma.

Amayuk ni Jakob ŋɛɛrin Josev anek nɛ, “Abon bai Jooi o jiji Ibrayim kibeen baaba Aizak amayuk lɔgɔz cugun noko. Abon bai Jooi o azuunan aneet, ma ayelekan golok zɛɛ been iiten nico noko amayuk nɔɔgɔ. Abon bai toonnyaiti o Joowo baal ɛɛlanan aneet kaale o gɛr dook amayuk nɔɔgɔ. Abon bai agayi zaara ogane been zaar o jiji Ibrayim kibeen o baaba Aizak ŋaaten lɔgɔz nicoko. Abon bai abitiz niigi looc nico dolene cigeec arita.”

Arek ni Josev ŋɛɛrin o kazi Iviram baatin aziit ci kaŋeto. Aje ŋɛɛrin ceen abuu kazi Manasa o arekɛ baatin aziit ci azo. Bar Jakob abaric azɛɛn, ma arek aziit ci azo o ɔɔ ci Iviram ceen tutur o, ma ataadek aziit ci kaŋeto o ɔɔ ci Manasa ceen abuu o.

Amayuk ni Jakob ŋɛɛrin Josev anek nɛ, “Abon bai Jooi o jiji Ibrayim kibeen baaba Aizak amayuk lɔgɔz cugun noko. Abon bai Jooi o azuunan aneet, ma ayelekan golok zɛɛ been iiten nico noko amayuk nɔɔgɔ. Abon bai toonnyaiti o Joowo baal ɛɛlanan aneet kaale o gɛr dook amayuk nɔɔgɔ. Abon bai agayi zaara ogane been zaar o jiji Ibrayim kibeen o baaba Aizak ŋaaten lɔgɔz nicoko. Abon bai abitiz niigi looc nico dolene cigeec arita.”

Arek ni Josev ŋɛɛrin o kazi Iviram baatin aziit ci kaŋeto. Aje ŋɛɛrin ceen abuu kazi Manasa o arekɛ baatin aziit ci azo. Bar Jakob abaric azɛɛn, ma arek aziit ci azo o ɔɔ ci Iviram ceen tutur o, ma ataadek aziit ci kaŋeto o ɔɔ ci Manasa ceen abuu o.

Amayuk ni Jakob ŋɛɛrin Josev anek nɛ, “Abon bai Jooi o jiji Ibrayim kibeen baaba Aizak amayuk lɔgɔz cugun noko. Abon bai Jooi o azuunan aneet, ma ayelekan golok zɛɛ been iiten nico noko amayuk nɔɔgɔ. Abon bai toonnyaiti o Joowo baal ɛɛlanan aneet kaale o gɛr dook amayuk nɔɔgɔ. Abon bai agayi zaara ogane been zaar o jiji Ibrayim kibeen o baaba Aizak ŋaaten lɔgɔz nicoko. Abon bai abitiz niigi looc nico dolene cigeec arita.”

Arek ni Josev ŋɛɛrin o kazi Iviram baatin aziit ci kaŋeto. Aje ŋɛɛrin ceen abuu kazi Manasa o arekɛ baatin aziit ci azo. Bar Jakob abaric azɛɛn, ma arek aziit ci azo o ɔɔ ci Iviram ceen tutur o, ma ataadek aziit ci kaŋeto o ɔɔ ci Manasa ceen abuu o.

Amayuk ni Jakob ŋɛɛrin Josev anek nɛ, “Abon bai Jooi o jiji Ibrayim kibeen baaba Aizak amayuk lɔgɔz cugun noko. Abon bai Jooi o azuunan aneet, ma ayelekan golok zɛɛ been iiten nico noko amayuk nɔɔgɔ. Abon bai toonnyaiti o Joowo baal ɛɛlanan aneet kaale o gɛr dook amayuk nɔɔgɔ. Abon bai agayi zaara ogane been zaar o jiji Ibrayim kibeen o baaba Aizak ŋaaten lɔgɔz nicoko. Abon bai abitiz niigi looc nico dolene cigeec arita.”

Arek ni Josev ŋɛɛrin o kazi Iviram baatin aziit ci kaŋeto. Aje ŋɛɛrin ceen abuu kazi Manasa o arekɛ baatin aziit ci azo. Bar Jakob abaric azɛɛn, ma arek aziit ci azo o ɔɔ ci Iviram ceen tutur o, ma ataadek aziit ci kaŋeto o ɔɔ ci Manasa ceen abuu o.
Mazi acin Josev baatin arek aziit ci azo o ɔɔ ci Iviram ceen tutur o, inyigit niini gi nico. Ma aara niini aziit ci baatin o oowe ci Iviram o, ma arek ɔɔ ci Manasa o.
Ma anek niini baatin nɛ, “Alaŋ een nɛɛn baaba. Logo ween abuu nɛɛn ce. Arek aziit cun azo o ɔɔ cin o.”

Bar ujura baatinɛ, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kaga gi ci kagoon o nɔkɔ. Ŋɛdɛt katin Manasa niini baati bor ci meel. Bar zin katin tuturi niini adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk gɔtɔni. Katin dɔlya ciginɛ een bor ci meel gɛr.”

Amayuk ni niini nɔɔgɔ iiten nice anek nɛ, “Ɔl ci Israyil noko katin awo zaar cugooc ŋaati amayuwi niigi ɔl oogi. Azi katin niigi nɛ, Abon bai Jooi anyuŋ otobtɔ kibeen Iviram been Manasa.” Zin giye nico anyewun Jakob Iviram karayɛ kizi ɔɔ ŋaati Manasa.
Ma anek Jakob Josev nɛ, “Inoko acinan aneet kadadjai. Ŋaan zin aromenu niina ki Jook, ma ŋaan katin amiirenin niini ineet looce o jijitugun.
Kanyin zin ineet looc o abon kazi Cekam baal kɔɔra naana ole o kazi Amorit dilanyaye ogan e. Kanyin ŋinite ineet, alaŋ een gotonogu.”
Ma vurta iitene oman otowa Jakob lɔgɔz ogin dook anek nɛ, “Olotai niiga dook lɔgɔz ogane ka kiiya kuduwayuŋ gi ci katin akunakuŋ igeet ce. Iziiktaŋ aneet o karitanuŋ kazi zaar cigan nɛ Israyil.”
Ma vurta iitene oman otowa Jakob lɔgɔz ogin dook anek nɛ, “Olotai niiga dook lɔgɔz ogane ka kiiya kuduwayuŋ gi ci katin akunakuŋ igeet ce. Iziiktaŋ aneet o karitanuŋ kazi zaar cigan nɛ Israyil.”
Ma amayuk Jakob Robɛn anek nɛ, “Niina Robɛn ween abuu dolene ogan een niina logo onan karitanin ɔɔwa waan baal ŋaan kiŋaanɛ e nɛɛn. Zin giye o ɛɛnɛ niina abuu, anyei niina dɔyiz logoze cigan o dook.

Atobonu niina ki tawan ci ariik maama ɔrɔɔt. Alaŋ zin bar niina tiŋeere een titiny ɔrɔɔt juk gotonogu, eeci baale alaŋ aŋole kuwen onan aneet baatun, ma ataŋguzu kibeen ŋaa onan kaavtiya. Makacin anyaayan alyaan ɔla.”
Amayuk bodo Jakob Simiyan been Livai anek nɛ, “Niiga ramantiya Simiyan been Livai eeginu gɔtɔn, ma atobɔ igeet zinzeeti cugooc o teny. Uruktu baale niiga ɔl dilanyai kadaayitɔ gaga nɔkɔ.
Alaŋ naana kareez baabaninok cugooc gɔɔn abaabanu oroonok o, ki minaŋɔn cunooŋ gɔɔn aruku ɔl kadaayitɔ gaga o. Alaŋ buk kagama gi o gɔɔn ateedu niiga tiin culu rɔkɔlit.
Otoruŋ zin Jooi igeet giye ci gɔɔn aminaŋnyu, ma anyaku bolŋac ci aruku ɔl kadaayitɔ gaga o. Ma buk katoryuŋ naanalya igeet azaantozek loocok ci Israyil noko dook.”
Amayuk bodo Jakob Juda anek nɛ, “Niina Juda anaatin katin gotonogu dook ineet, ma atitinyin ɔrɔɔt. Amogi katin niina modɛn ci amarninin ineet, ma buk katin gotonogu aŋolinin ineet.
Abil katin niina Juda kiyo taŋaryai o gɔɔn aruk kelegit kadaak, ma amiironek ŋin onin ɔɔŋɛ, ma oodi, ma ɔɔŋ loota, ma akɔm eet ci anim kɔjɔŋɔz nɔɔnɔ o.

Anyei katin niina kɛɛt ci alaazetu nɔkɔ, ma agam katin dɔlya ci dɔl cugun alaazɛt nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma aku ɛɛti ween alaan adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma anyak alaazɛt dook. Katin modɛna o loocok dook atitiny nɔɔnɔ, ma azɔɔz gi cin doon.
Acabi katin niina zigir cun keene o abon gɔɔn agɔɔnanɛ ɔl nyaantanɛ. Buk katin uuny niina rumanɛ cugun nyaana giye o ɛɛnɛ niina botoroc ɔrɔɔt.
Een katin niina molyai ci rɛgɛ kɛbɛrɛ, eeci anyei niina dayiin ki nyaantanɛ ci meelik. Nyigita cugune noko katin vɔɔrɛ pɛr giye ci aamɛ iira ci meel.”
Amayuk bodo Jakob Zebulon anek nɛ, “Niina Zebulon abaai katin liiltoga. Ma liil ɔtɔgi nici een katin ŋinti ɛɛlni kavoolɛta o liilo. Maje lɔɔci cune noko akɔ katin zɛɛ ma arum Sidon.”
Ma amayuk bodo Jakob Isikar anek nɛ, “Niina Isikar abil katin niina kiyo zigiri o adɔi gɔɔn ma arɔɔŋ karyekɛ ɔl ijo ka kitik, bar ɔɔŋ loota o.
Bar mazi acin kɔrɔk kibeen looc ci aavɛ noko abona, atik bodo kaal labak. Een katin niina gabaren ci atultul tup nɔkɔ calaŋ ayubuz.”
Ma amayuk bodo Jakob Dan anek nɛ, “Niina Dan katin abal ɔl cugun, ma katin ɔl cugune noko atobɔ niigi ki bor ci Israyil abal buk gotonogu ogɛn o.
Atoroban gɔɔn katin niina ɔl kiyo kowat o gɔɔn adete gɔla ka kɛtɛŋɛt jɔm zooc ka ɛɛti o atɔɔt jɔm nico kuruk looc kɔbɔrbɔr o.”
Ɛgɛrɛny ni Jakob, ma ilalek Jook gɛrɛnya azi nɛ, “Jook o adiŋdiŋ, inoko kareyin naana ineet ka ɛɛlawan.”
Ma amayuk Jakob bodo Gad anek nɛ, “Niina Gad aŋozonekin katin ineet agoryawa, bar zin katin atooi niina nɔɔgɔ.”
Amayuk bodo Jakob Acar anek nɛ, “Niina Acar katin lɔɔci cune abaayɛ o abiirna kaal ci meel abon. Dayiin cugune o katin aganɔ ŋaati anyonekɛ alaat.”
Ma amayuk bodo Jakob Navtali anek nɛ, “Niina Navtali katin abil kiyo alyaz o gɔɔn olla awɔ tuuwa labak, ma anyak jɔrɔ ci alina o.”
Ma amayuk bodo Jakob Josev anek nɛ, “Niina Josev abil katin niina kiyo kɛɛt o gɔɔn aduŋna liiltoga appintik oto, ma abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci meel o.
Zin katin modɛna ci amarninin ineet agaŋnyakin, ma ooryin ineet pareni.

Bar zin katin parena cugune amɔk cigeecik o. Katin Jooi onane aneeta Jakob dɔyize onin amɔk doyizok dook anyek azɛɛn cugun o kodoyit ŋaati agamɛ paren. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn ween bɛ o aroodinɛ ɔl o Israyil kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr akunak nɔɔgɔ. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn ween bɛkcoi cineeŋ.

Jook o baatun nɛɛn o ŋaan atiritin ineet. Anyak niini dɔyiz dook. Ŋaan zin amayukin niini ineet. Ŋaan amayukin niini ineet tiilɛza ki liilowɛ kibeen tiine ci meel. Arita katin ŋaai cugune o dɔl ci meel, ma irokta niina nɔɔgɔ juruŋ.

Amayukin katin Jooi ineet ɛɛva kaal ci meel. Ayelekin katin niini ineet biyɛn baal ɛɛl tɔ ŋinaante laadun kina tamma e. Mayuwɛnɛt oninɛ ibil nɔkɔ izi nɛɛn kiyo biyɛn nici o. Abon bai anyin Jooi ineet mayuwɛnɛt cin noko, eeci ɛŋɛrawin niini ineet bil doon gotonogin dook.”
Ma amayuk bodo Jakob Bɛnjimɛn anek nɛ, “Niina Bɛnjimɛn abil katin niina kiyo kɛlaŋi o mooti gɔɔn olla aruk kɛlɛk tup nɔkɔ o.”

Nici zin gɔl o amayuwi Jakob lɔgɔz ogin nɛɛn. Iiya ni ɛɛti codoi gɔɔn logoze nicoko izi baati borit codoi boryowe o Israyil een amɔtɔ ram. Amayuk zin Jakob lɔgɔz ogin mayuwente ci gɔɔn aganɔ ki codoi ŋaatineeŋ dook.
Mazi akɔ adadjai Jakob ka kadaak, itivatek niini dɔl ogin gi ci azi nɛ, “Inoko izi ŋinti ka kɛtɛɛdi. Ma kadaai, ɔɔtɔ adayaŋ boote o jijitigan,

Bɔɔt nica abil mane o kazi Makvila libire ci akɔ ki jen e ŋaao kazi Mamra looce o kazi Kanan. Ataala baale laadun Ibrayim bɔɔt nice kibeen mana buk ŋaati Evron ween borit o ɔl o kazi Ititaz ka kizi bɔɔt cin dawiinto.
Nica zin ŋinbaal adawin Ibrayim kibeen ŋaa onin kazi Sara, kibeen buk Aizak ki ŋaa onin kazi Rebeka e nɛɛn. Ma buk vurta kiiya kadawɛ naana ŋaa onan kazi Leya.
Karooŋnyuŋ zin buk igeet adayaŋ aneet boote nice.”
Aduwa Jakob gi nico, ma ɛtɛɛt ecodoi nɔkɔ.
Mazi akɔ acin Josev ɛtɛɛt baatinɛ, iitak niini baatin, ma alu ŋaati acoci nɔɔnɔ.
Ma vurta uduwak niini ŋanbiyɛt kuḏuutek baatin agɛrɔ gole o kɛɛr uneeŋ ka calaŋ ame. Utuguzɔ ni niigi nɔkɔ.
Ma aḏuutek niigi Jakob agɛrɔ iinya eet ram, eeci nici iinya o gɔɔn laadun aḏuutɛkɛ ɔl agɛrɔ ɔl ci adaai nɛɛn. Ma aluwek ɔl o Masiro Jakob iinya eet iiyu kamɔtɔ.
Mazi akɔ adicai iinya ci luwanto o, enek Josev ɔl o Vɛɛro nɛ, “Itiritaŋ di. Ooti otok ci kitoonei Vɛɛro ce.

Iitene baale aricanekan baaba gi ci ka kook kadawi naana nɔɔnɔ Kananakti. Uduktakaŋ zin Vɛɛro gi nico ka kanyan gɔl ci kakɔ kiyaŋɛ baaba ŋinaante. Ma kook kiyaŋa baaba, ŋaan kabada.” Ooti ni ɔl molok nico ŋaati Vɛɛro.
Ma itoona Vɛɛro otok ci anek Josev nɛ, “Bitɔ itaŋ baatun ŋinaante labak eci da aricanekin niini ineet o.”
Itiŋa ni Josev ka kook kiyaŋ baatin Kananakti.
Ma ɔrkɔr niini kibeen gɔtɔnɔgi been ɔl o kɔrɔk o baatin dook. Ma ooŋnonek looc ɔlɔ ŋaao kazi Gocen dɔlya o miliny ki tiin been ɛɛza doon.
Ma ɔrkɔr buk niini kibeen ɔl ween alaat Masirɛ been ɔl o Vɛɛro mayan. Atɔɔt ɔl ogɛn kavoolɛt o agurut jɔmanɛ, maje ogɛn atɔɔt jɔmanɛ. Ma awɔ niigi dook kizi kolen ci appe.
Ɔɔtɔ ni zɛɛ ma avɔ arum ŋino gɔɔn uurtanɛ ɔl labi kazi Atat ajɔŋɔz liil o Jordan looce o Kanan. Omonit ni niigi ŋinaante, ma aluwek bodo Jakob iinya torgɛrɛm.

Mazi acin ɔl o looc o kazi Kanan nɔɔgɔ alu nɔkɔ, izitɔ nɛ, “Naa iboobi ɔl ci Masiro o ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔn?” Zin luwante nico akatek ɔl ci Kanan o ŋinite zaar ci kazi Abilmizram. Kɛŋ cin kazi nɛ luwa o Masiro.
Utuguzɔ ni didi lɔgɔz o Jakob gi baal aricanek baatineeŋ nɔɔgɔ e.
Ooti niigi baatineeŋ, ma avɔ itaŋ boote baal ataala Ibrayim ŋaati Evron ka kizi ŋintineeŋ dawiinto e.
Mazi akɔ iyaŋ Josev baatin, imiirte niini ki gɔtɔnɔgi been ɔl baal ɔrkɔra e dook ɔɔt Masirɛ.
Ma vurte o ipirai Jakob, anyayit gɔtɔnɔgi Josev ŋoliin, ma anɔ nɛ, “Bar bɔŋ katin Josev aborneket nɔŋ, ma acaca kaal baal kagoonek naaga nɔɔnɔ gɛr e?”

Itoontek ni niigi Josev otok ci anek nɛ, “Baale ma ŋaan arogi baatinai e, aneket nɛ, Abona aduwaku Josev ka kotoŋ kaal baal gɛr agooneku niiga nɔɔnɔ e calaŋ aada. Ɛɛlawet zin da tooŋ kaal ci gɛr baal kabacana ŋaatun o, eeci keegina buk naaga gabara ci Jook o baatun.” Mazi akɔ arum Josev ɔtɔgi nici, utulu.

Itoontek ni niigi Josev otok ci anek nɛ, “Baale ma ŋaan arogi baatinai e, aneket nɛ, Abona aduwaku Josev ka kotoŋ kaal baal gɛr agooneku niiga nɔɔnɔ e calaŋ aada. Ɛɛlawet zin da tooŋ kaal ci gɛr baal kabacana ŋaatun o, eeci keegina buk naaga gabara ci Jook o baatun.” Mazi akɔ arum Josev ɔtɔgi nici, utulu.
Ma iitene oman ivitak gɔtɔnɔgja nɔɔnɔ, ma avu akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma, ma anek nɛ, “Keegina naaga gabara cugun.”
Enek ni Josev nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má aŋolinaŋ gaga. Alaŋ keen naana Jook ka kapayeyuŋ igeet gerzitin.
Agoonekaŋ didi waanice niiga gi ci gɛr, bar zin Jooi abali gi nice kizi gi ci abon ka korogoz ɔl ci meelik magiza.
Akɔm zin niiga gi ci ka ɔtɔŋɔltɛ. Ŋaan kazuunuŋ naana igeet ki dɔl ugooc.” Zin gole nico itilo Josev gɔtɔnɔgi, ma oobek kaal nɔɔgɔ zɛɛ makacin alalit zinzeeti labak.

Abaayit ni Josev been ɔl o kɔrɔk o baatin dook Masirɛ ŋinti wun kal. Ma arogi niini zɛɛ ma acin dɔl o ŋɛɛrin ween abuu kazi Iviram ki dɔl ci dɔl ogin. Ma buk icin niini dɔl ci Macir ween ŋɛɛrti ŋɛɛrin o kazi Manasa.

Abaayit ni Josev been ɔl o kɔrɔk o baatin dook Masirɛ ŋinti wun kal. Ma arogi niini zɛɛ ma acin dɔl o ŋɛɛrin ween abuu kazi Iviram ki dɔl ci dɔl ogin. Ma buk icin niini dɔl ci Macir ween ŋɛɛrti ŋɛɛrin o kazi Manasa.

Mazi akɔ adadjai Josev, ma agawun niini izi ŋinti ka kadaai, enek gɔtɔnɔgi nɛ, “Izi inoko ŋinti ka kadaai. Ŋaan zin azuunuŋ Jooi igeet. Ŋaan katin aaranuŋ niini igeet looce nico, ma akoyuŋ looce baal aterkedek niini Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob e.”
Anyek ni Josev nɔɔgɔ kitoonit Jook giye ci ka kuzuuti zɔɔz o aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ baal anek nɛ, “Iitene ci katin akoyuŋ Jooi looce nice, abona buk avoyu amɛ ogan ka ɔɔt itaŋit ŋinaante.”

Enico ɛlɛ ɛtɛɛt niini. Aje irkitowa oginɛ waanice izi eet tur kamɔtɔ (110). Ma aḏuutek ŋanbiyɛta nɔɔnɔ agɛrɔ ka calaŋ ame. Artek ni ɔl nɔɔnɔ loidoŋ o adikir gɔɔn itaŋi ɔl gɔnɔgi o adaai, ka kibil niini kɛrɛ iiten ci katin avɔyi niigi Kananakti.
Matthew: Zaar ci ɔl ween jijitigi Yesu ween Kiristo ween dole ci dɔl o Devid ween ŋɛɛrti Ibrayim o karɛ naaga ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ ka kiiya nɛɛn ce.
Ibrayim baale baati Aizak. Aizak baati Jakob. Jakob baati Juda ki ŋɛɛrigin oogi.
Juda baati Paraz kibeen Zera ween yaatineeŋ nɛɛn Tamar. Paraz baati Ezron. Ezron baati Raam.
Raam baati Aminadab. Aminadab baati Nacon. Nacon baati Salmon.
Salmon baati Bowaz baal kazi yaatin nɛ Reyab. Bowaz baati Obɛd baal kazi yaatin zaar nɛ Ruz. Obɛd baati Jesi.
Jesi baati alaan o kazi Devid.
Devid baati Solomon. Yaatinɛ baale rak ŋaa ci eet o kazi Oraya.
Solomon baati Riyoboyam. Riyoboyam baati Abija. Abija baati Asa.
Asa baati Jeyozivat. Jeyozivat baati Joram. Joram baati Uziiya.
Uziiya baati Jotam. Jotam baati Eyaz. Eyaz baati Izakiya.
Izakiya baati Manasa. Manasa baati Amoon. Amoon baati Josiya.
Josiya baati Jikoniya ki gɔtɔnɔgi baal aritai waan baal agamin ɔl o Israyil, ma avɔyi ɔl nɔɔgɔ looce o kazi Babilan e.
Zin vurta mazi akɔ agamnyi ɔl o Israyil, ma avɔyi ɔl nɔɔgɔ Babilana, Jikoniya ook izi baati Sɛlitil. Sɛlitil baati Zarubabel.
Zarubabel baati Abiyud. Abiyud baati Iliyakim. Iliyakim baati Azɔr.
Azɔr baati Zadok. Zadok baati Acim. Acim baati Eliyud.
Eliyud baati Eliyezar. Eliyezar baati Maatan. Maatan baati Jakob.
Jakob baati Josev ween eet o Meri ween yaati Yesu ween Kiristo.

Izi zin bulowa ci ɔɔtɔ dook amɔtɔ wec akanai ŋaati Ibrayim zɛɛ been Devid. Bodo akanai ŋaati Devid zɛɛ been iiten baal agamin ɔl, ma avɔyi ɔl nɔɔnɔ Babilana e bulok amɔtɔ wec. Bodo akanai iinyaye baal agamin ɔl e zɛɛ been iiten baal aritan Kiristo e bulok amɔtɔ wec.
Zin Yesu Kiristo aritai gole ci abil kete. Baale yaatin Meri agam ɛɛti ci kazi Josev ka kiriyi. Mazi ŋaan kitivica niini nɔɔnɔ, bar ajowa Meri ɛlɛ anyake dolece ci anyononek Vɔŋize o Joowo.
Maje Josev baale niini eet ci abon, ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ kɔbɔrak ɔl nyayiin ci Meri o, bar abaaban olla arɔɔŋ kotoŋ nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ yɔɔt calaŋ akɔlak alyaan.

Mazi ŋaan abaaban niini gi nico, iiyak nɔɔnɔ toonnyaiti ci Joowo wunozyai, ma aku anek nɛ, “Josev, borit o tatok o Devid, má abur Meri ŋaati avicanɛ kizi ŋaa cun gaga, eeci dole ci anyak niini kɛŋa noko anyek nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo.
Arita tiŋeere logoz, ma akanei zaar ci kazi Yesu, eeci aku niini ka kiiya kɛɛla ɔl ogin baciinowɛ.”
Akatai ni didi kaal nicigi kɛzɛdjai dook kɛlɛɛmtɛ ebaal aduwakɛ Jooi nyakaŋan zooze o anɛ nɛ,
“Anyake katin kabarzɛci oman gole ci abiirni ɔl ooti, ma arita logoz, ma akanonek katin nɔɔnɔ zaara ci kazi Imanawil.” Kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ Aavi Jooi Ŋaatinai.
Mazi akɔ aŋaaz Josev ooŋnyai, iiya didi ook itivica Meri eona aduwaki toonnyaiti o Joowo nɔɔnɔ e.
Mazin iinya ci baal anyayin Meri neke dook ŋaan koromtɛ Josev ki nɔɔnɔ kizi ŋaa ki eet zɛɛ ma akɔ ookcai. Mazi ookcai dole, akatek Josev nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Yesu.
Aritai zin waanice Yesu kuture o kazi Bɛzilɛm looce o kazi Judiya irkite o ɛɛnɛ Erod alaan. Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ivita ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o gɔɔn iiyez kaal monyonyɛ libire ci jenu o ivitak Jerusalɛm.
Ma avu ajine azi nɛ, “Aavi logoti o aritai ka kizi alaan unooŋ Juz ŋaaḏaŋ? Ayelzai monyatot oninɛ kicinta libire ci jenu kabaaka naaga e. Zin kanowana ka kiiya kidiŋdiŋanta nɔɔnɔ.”
Mazi akɔ azii Erod ween alaan kibeen ɔl dook Jerusalɛma zɔɔz nico, ivirit nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma awa Erod alaat o ceez o Joowo been alaat o demziinto ŋaatodoi, ma ajin nɔɔgɔ gɛnyiza anek nɛ, “Kiristo aritai dim katin ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aritai katin niini kuture o kazi Bɛzilɛm looce o kazi Judiya. Anyak baale nyakaŋan ci ayɛɛt zɔɔz ci anɛ Jooi nɛ,
Ineeta kutur o kazi Bɛzilɛm o abil Judiya adiŋdiŋ niina ɔrɔɔt, eeci aritai katin ŋaatun alaani ci ka kiiya kabal ɔl ogan Israyil.”

Otowa ni Erod ɔl o avu libire o jenu e ka kɔɔt kozoozɔ ki nɔɔgɔ ŋaatineeŋ doon, ma aku ajin niini nɔɔgɔ iiten ci da acini niigi monyatot ci tiryan ci dole ci ka kizi alaan ci Juz o. Ma aduwak niigi nɔɔnɔ iiten ci baal acini niigi monyatot o.
Ma anek Erod nɔɔgɔ gɛnyiza nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ zin orooŋit dole nico Bɛzilɛma juruŋ zɛɛ mazi ajowanu, ivita buk uduktayaŋ aneeta ka kook kidiŋdiŋan buk naana nɔɔnɔ.”
Mazi adotiz zooze ci ona aduwak alaani nɔɔgɔ o, ɔtɔɔzɔ. Ma gɔla icinit niigi bodo monyatot baal rak acin e ɛlɛ.
Ma atalnɛ niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma oontanɛ monyatot nici nɔɔgɔ ŋuma nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma akɔ abil ŋaati ona aavɛ dole o ɛlɛ.

Ŋinaante mazi avɔ niigi ceeza eecitɔ, acin dole ki yaatin Meri, ma akani niigi kozoŋti looc adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ. Okolit ni kaboot ugeec anyak e, ma anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ kaal ci titiny, warki ki karacɛnɛn been karkarɛt.
Uduwak ni Jooi nɔɔgɔ wunozyai gi calaŋ amiirɔnɛkɛ Erod. Ma ŋeere imiirte didi niigi gole oman ɔɔt looce uneeŋ calaŋ adiir Erod.

Ma vurte o imiirtɔi ɔl nica, iiyak toonnyaiti ci Joowo Josev wunozyai, ma aricanek gi ci anek nɛ, “Tiŋa je! Dɔkɔnyi dole ki yaatin biti Masirɛ. Bitɔ aavu ŋinaante zɛɛ ma kanekin nɛ, Bada bodo, eeci tiŋeere Erod arɔɔŋ dole ka kuruk kadaak.”
Itiŋa ni Josev ecodoi nɔkɔ iyiit dole ki yaatin baaline nico ɛlɛ ooyi Masirɛ.
Ma akɔ abaak ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adaai Erod. Zin gi nici agooni o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal azi Jooi nyakaŋane onin nɛ, “Kotowa ŋɛɛran Masirɛ ka kimiirozek looc baal aritan e.”

Mazi akɔ aga Erod ɔl baal avu libire o jenu e alaba da bar nɔɔnɔ, otobor nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma aricanek takirnya kɔɔt kuruyit dɔl o miliny macik anyak irkitok ram been o miliny tɛr ŋaan aritai Bɛzilɛma been vitɛnane o ajɔŋzɔ dook. Agɔɔn Erod nɔkɔ o, eeci aduwak ɔl baal avu libire o jenu e nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Izi irkitowa ci ɔɔtɔ iiten baal kacina monyatot e zɛɛ been inoko o ram.” Gi ci zin aruyi Erod dɔl ci miliny anyak irkitok ram been o ŋaan kurumit irkitok nicoko o nɛɛn.
Zin giye o aruwɛn dɔlya kadaayitɔ Bɛzilɛma ɛlɛɛmnyai zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Jirimaya e didi.
Azi baale niini nɛ, “Iziiyɛ mɔlɔyi ci aluwɛki Recal dɔl ogin kuture o kazi Rama nunun. Aboobi niini nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma alaŋ ajaki been nɛɛn, eeci dɔlya oginɛ dook adaayitɔ.”
Mazi akɔ adaai Erod, iiyak toonnyaiti ci Joowo Josev wunozyai Masirɛ.
Ma aku anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tiŋa je. Miirɔi dole kibeen yaatin biti looce o Israyil. Eeci ɔl baal arɔɔŋ kuruyit dole kadaak e adaayitɔ.”
Itiŋa ni Josev iyit dole ki yaatin abadakɛ looc o Israyil.

Bar mazi akɔ azii bodo niini Arkiloz irigiz alaazɛt o baatin Erod abalun Judiya, ɔtɔŋɔlɛ niini ŋaati akɔ abaai ŋinaante. Zin buk itilo Jooi nɔɔnɔ gɔla wunozyai laadun ka calaŋ akɔ Judiya. Ook ni niini abaak looce o kazi Galili.
Aruwek niini kɔrɔk looc kuture onin kazi Nazarɛt. Itiroyai ni Yesu ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adikir, ka kɛlɛɛmɛ gi baal aduwa nyakaŋani azi nɛ, “Katin aga ɔl dook niini eet ci Nazarɛt.”
Ma vurta irkitowe ogɛn iiya ɛɛti ci kazi Jɔn o oonyi, ma akana niini uuwayi balala looce o kazi Judiya.
Agɛrɛny niini iinya dook anek ɔl nɛ, “Otoŋit baciinok ugooc gɛr agoonu, eeci baliin o Joowo izi ajɔn.”
Jɔn zin nɛɛn baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya e. Azi baale niini nɛ, “Agɛrɛny ɛɛti oman balala azi nɛ, Idimdimantek Manyi gɔl onin. Amadek nɔɔnɔ golok ogin keelit tɔp.”
Ma Jɔn nici waanice aborcek niini rumanɛ ci agɔɔnnyai imane ci nyakaletu. Ma anyak kavali ceen ruceen barkɔnya, ma adak niini giroc ki lɛtɛ kizi dayiin cigin nɛɛn.
Ma avunak ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ Jerusalɛma ki Judiya buk kibeen vitɛne o ajɔŋɔz liil o kazi Jordan dook.
Ma avu abad niigi mony baciinowe ugeec, ma oony niini nɔɔgɔ liile nico.

Mazi acin Jɔn ɔl o kazi Parici kibeen ɔl o kazi Sajuzi avunak nɔɔnɔ ka kivita kicinit kaal ci agɔɔn niini o, enewun nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Igeet dɔl ci kokonyawu coko! Ŋɛnɛɛn ci ilotuŋ ka odokonyit bornɛt noŋe o Joowo ka kiiya tiŋeere neke o?
Abon zin agoonu kaal ci abon ci ayelza gi ci utuŋtu niiga kaal o gɛr didi.
Má bar anonu nɛ, Keegina dɔl ci dɔl o Ibrayim. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, Jooi anyak dɔyiz ci ookci biyɛn nico kiziti dɔl ci Ibrayim labak.
Eelnu niiga kiyo kɛɛna. Olla zin inoko mɛlɛyi o payiin o Joowo ɛrɛwɔ ka kɛɛcawuŋ loota kiyo kɛɛca kɛɛt o. Gɔɔn zin laadun kɛɛt calaŋ arek kɛbɛrɛ ci abon, atɛɛdjak looc, ma akanonek goo.

Kuunyuŋ zin inoko naana igeet maami doon ka keyelizyai badi mony o baciinok ugooc. Bar anyak eet oma ci ŋaan aku ka kiiya kotoony ɔl oogi ŋaatunooŋ Vɔŋize o Joowo, ma apayek oogi goo. Adikir niini ɔrɔɔt kujukan aneet. Ma alaŋ kaganona kanyayek naana nɔɔnɔ caava ogin zoonu.
Anyaa niini luli ci arekɛ labi ŋɔɔt ka kɛŋɛr labi ki jululu. Ma arek labi kɛbɛrɛ karat, maje jululu avaat gooye o alaŋ adiiti been nɛɛn.”
Ma iitene nice iiya Yesu looce o kazi Galili. Aku akɔ ŋaati Jɔn ka kook kotoony Jɔn nɔɔnɔ liile o kazi Jordan.
Maje Jɔn arɔɔŋ kujura ŋaati oonyi nɔɔnɔ, eeci aga niini anyak Yesu dɔyiz ci appe kujuk nɔɔnɔ. Ma anek Jɔn nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati kuunyin naana ineet, bar karooŋnyin ineet toonyan aneet.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Anyek kibil kiyo kaduwakin noko. Abon kagɔɔn naaga nɔkɔ rak ka koolyai gi o arooŋekan Jooi aneet kutugu.” Agama ni Jɔn zɔɔz nico, ma oony nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ adotiz toonyɛnta, ɔyɔyai Yesu maami, ma akole tammu kɛŋ, ma acin niini Vɔŋiz o Joowo ŋaati akunakɛ looc kiyo yɛɛlac o, ma aku abil ŋaatin.
Ma azi mɔlɔyi ci aku Joowa tammu tadena nɛ, “Ŋɛɛran onan kareez nɛɛn nici. Katalnɛ naana ŋaatin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
Iyit ni Vɔŋizi o Joowo Yesu ooyi balala ka kook kicina Loryenti nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ aavi niini ŋinaante kɔkɔm dayiin iinya eet ram been baalinok eet ram, aburek nɔɔnɔ magiz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Iiyak ni Loryen nɔɔnɔ, ma aku anek nɛ, “Mã een didi ŋɛɛrti Joowo, towo di biyɛn nicoko kizi dayiin.”
Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Alaŋ ɛɛti ci deer arogni dayiin doon, bar buk arogni niini zoozok o aduŋna otoge o Joowo.”
Itiŋawi ni bodo Loryen Yesu ŋinaante ooyi Jerusalɛma, ma akɔ atɔɔdi ceez o Joowo taden.

Ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã een ŋɛɛrti Joowo didi, kul di ŋinaanto taak tɔdɔ, eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Ŋaan itoona Jooi toonnyak ogin ka kivita katabuŋtawin niigi ineet calaŋ iinai looc kuruktin biyɛn zɔɔ.”
Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Azi buk waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Má acina Jook ween Manyi unun.”
Itiŋawi ni Loryen Yesu ŋinaante bodo ooyi biye ci wun kal, ma akɔ ayelek nɔɔnɔ diŋdiŋɔn o baliin o loocu dook.
Ma anek niini Yesu nɛ, “Mã akanɛ kozoŋti looc, ma adiŋdiŋanan aneet, kanyin koca kaal ci acin noko dook kizi cugun.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ineet Loryen, nyɛyɛ ŋaatan! Azi waragɛ o Joowo nɛ, Idiŋdiŋanit Jook ween Manyi unooŋ. Iliŋliŋtozek nɔɔnɔ doon.”
Ɔɔtɔ ni didi Loryen ŋaatin, ma avu toonnyawa o Joowo, ma avu atirit Yesu.

Ma iitene oman mazi akɔ azii Yesu acabit ɔl Jɔn, itiŋa niini imiirozek kutur o kazi Nazarɛt abil Galiliya, ma ŋaan buk kook komon ŋinaante ŋinti wun, bar idicek ook abaak kuture o kazi Kapernam abil liil o Galili otoga ŋaati ajɔŋɔzɔ ki loocok o kazi Zebulon been Navtali.

Ma iitene oman mazi akɔ azii Yesu acabit ɔl Jɔn, itiŋa niini imiirozek kutur o kazi Nazarɛt abil Galiliya, ma ŋaan buk kook komon ŋinaante ŋinti wun, bar idicek ook abaak kuture o kazi Kapernam abil liil o Galili otoga ŋaati ajɔŋɔzɔ ki loocok o kazi Zebulon been Navtali.
Ma akɔ uuwak niini ŋinaante ka kɛlɛɛmɛ gi baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya baal anɛ nɛ,
“Loocok o kazi Zebulon kibeen Navtali noko ɛɛl liil o Jordan baagita looce o kazi Galili abaayi ɔl o Juz kibeen buk modɛn oogi.
Ma ɔl o abaak muure o anyak daayiz ŋinaante acin iima vooritin ci appe ɔrɔɔt.”
Ma iitene nice akata Yesu uuwayi onin anek ɔl nɛ, “Otoŋit baciinok ugooc, eeci baliin o Joowo izi ajɔn.”
Ma iinyaye niceke mazi akɔ awɔ Yesu liil o Galili otoga, icin niini ɔl ceen ram adete cabaya, Saiman o kazi Pitɔr kibeen Andoru ween gɔtɔni.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ivita korkorit ki aneet. Ŋaan kakɔ kademezuŋ igeet ka edetit ɔl ci deer ka gɔɔn anyaaktak nɔɔgɔ Jook.”
Enico ɛlɛ otoŋtek niigi cabayɛt ugeec e looc, oneec nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi ŋaan awɔ niigi ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ, acin Yesu bodo ɔl oogi ceen gɔtɔn een ram, Jemis ki Jɔn. Aromɛ niigi kibeen baatineeŋ ci kazi Zebedi kavoola. Acap cabayɛt juruŋ ka kedetit. Ma awa Yesu nɔɔgɔ.
Enico ɛlɛ otoŋtek niigi kavool kibeen baatineeŋ looc, ma ɔrkɔr kibeen Yesu.
Ma azɔp Yesu Galili dook adɛmɛz ɔl ceezine o ɔl o Juz lotento, ma uuwak kaviyak o abon akati baliin o Joowo, ma arogoz niini ɔl ci olla ajowa moorizowe ci meelik keŋti gɛr.

Ma avɔ kaviyawa ciginɛ o kɔɔt kiziiktɛ looce o kazi Siriya rɛɛna many. Ma anyaak ɔl nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante ɔl ci anyak moorizok kɛbɛrɛ dook ka kiiya korogoz niini nɔɔgɔ. Ma arogoz didi niini ɔl nicoko dook, mayo nuun een ɔl o anyak miniŋ ci Loryento ki ɔl ci abice ki ɔl ci rɛbrɛbik arogoz buk.
Ma ano nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meel Galiliya ki Dekapolisa ki Jerusalɛma ki Judiya been ɔl o abaak liil o Jordan baagita.
Mazi akɔ acin Yesu kɔlɛ ci meel avunak nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, ɔtɔɔt bɛ, ma akɔ aavi loota bɛ ɔɔwa. Ma avu aliya nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ kau.
Ma akana niini demziin ci adɛmzi nɔɔgɔ azi nɛ,
“Amayuwi ɔl o arɔɔŋ gɔl o Joowo, eeci baliin o Joowo izi cineeŋ.
Amayuwi ɔl o abad mony zinzeetinɛ kaale ugeec agɔɔn, eeci tiŋeere azoozek Jooi nɔɔgɔ.
Amayuwi ɔl o acɛlbɛzan eleeti, eeci tiŋeere ajowa niigi kaal o aterkedek Jooi nɔɔgɔ.
Amayuwi ɔl o arɔɔŋ kuzuuti zɔɔz o Joowo doon kujuk kaal dook loota, eeci ŋaan atirit Jooi nɔɔgɔ kutuguzɔ kaal ci abon.
Amayuwi ɔl o awucnek gɔnɔgja ogɛn, ma alaŋ acaca kaal o gɛr agoonek ɔl nɔɔgɔ, eeci buk tiŋeere awucnek niigi Jook.
Amayuwi ɔl o iimi zinzeeti ŋaaten Jook, eeci tiŋeere acin niigi Jook.
Amayuwi ɔl o aliŋliŋ ganɔn ɔla, eeci tiŋeere anyek Jooi nɔɔgɔ kizi dɔl cigin een didi.
Amayuwi ɔl o agide giye o agɔɔni kaal o aricanek Jooi nɔɔgɔ kutuguzɔ, eeci baliin o Joowo izi cineeŋ.
Amayuwenu niiga, eeci gɔɔn amezu dominɛt ki gidɛn o akanuŋ ɔl igeet vɔlɔŋa giye o anuyaŋ niiga aneet.
Amayuwenu niiga ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci azoonekuŋ Jooi vɔyit ci appe ɔrɔɔt tammu tadena. Agaac zin buk baale nyakaŋanɛta o Joowo amɛz gidɛn kiyo niiga noko.

Eelnu niiga kiyo mɛlɛ o ɔla dook loota ŋina. Bar zin gɔɔn mã idicai mɛlɛ mokcarɔnti, akɔm bodo gɔl oma ci ka kanycekɛ komokcar been nɛɛn. Izi gɛrzɛ nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma ajukonek tuu kizi gi ci labak, ma arɔc ɔl zɔɔnɛ.
Eelnu niiga kiyo vooritin o modɛni dook loota ŋina. Gɔɔn kuturi ci ɛɛnycai bɛ ɔɔwa, alaŋ aroodi ŋaati acini ɔl been nɛɛn.
Akɔm eet ci atokol lamba muura, ma abuŋ ija. Bar atokol, ma anyek kataraan ceez kɛŋ dook.
Abon zin buk niiga ataranu ɔl dook loota ŋina kaale ugooc abon agoonu ka kanycek niigi baatinai o aavi tammu tadena zany bonate unooŋ.
Má abaabanu aziyu nɛ, Kakun ka kiiya kuulal waragɛ o Joowo. Akɔm! Alaŋ kakun ka kiiya kutugu nɔkɔ, bar kakun ka kɛlɛɛmnyai keŋti ci zoozok o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo keelit tɔp.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔ zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ tammu taden ki tɔdɔ, akɔm lotinowe nicoko ŋintimiliny tɛr aaryai been nɛɛn zɛɛ ma iina kaal o aduwa Jooi waragewe onin dook.

Ma ɛɛti ci acɛlbɛzan lotinɛt ci miliny lotinowe o Joowo, ma bar anyek kizi gi ci miliny labak, ma adɛmɛz gɔnɔgi oogi kutuguzɔ kiyo niini o, acɛlbɛzɛni buk katin niini baliinte o Joowo kizi gi ci labak. Maje ɛɛti ci azooni lotinok nicoko, ma adɛmɛz gɔnɔgi oogi kuzuuti kiyo buk niini o, adiŋdiŋani buk katin niini baliinte o Joowo nɔkɔ.
Kaduwakuŋ zin naana igeet, mã alaŋ abonanu ɔrɔɔt zinzeetine ugooc ujukit bonat ci ɔl o Parici kibeen alaat o ademzek ɔl lotinok, alaŋ avoyu baliinte o Joowo been nɛɛn.
Aziiŋnu baale gɔɔn azi kɛɛrita ogaac nɛ, Má amuny eet ci deer. Mã alam eet ci amony eet ci deer, abon anyaayak rooni.

Bar zin naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã alam eet ci olla abornek gɔn nɔŋ, apawonek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin. Mã anek ɛɛti gɔn nɛ, Olla niina arogi gaga, akɔm gi ci ka doma, abon apawonek buk nɔɔnɔ gerzitin. Maje ɛɛti ci anek gɔn nɛ, Een niina aliyai ci ḏɔmḏɔm, ajukonek niini goo o Loryento.

Zin gɔɔn mã anyak gi ci arooŋ ka taabi Jook ŋaao taabinto, ma anyak da eet oma ci abornekin nɔŋ, toŋek rak gi ci ona anyaai Jook noko looc ŋina, iyiik rak ɔɔtɔ idica ki gotonu gi ci abornekin niini ineet nɔŋ o zɛɛ abada ni ka ija taap Jook.

Zin gɔɔn mã anyak gi ci arooŋ ka taabi Jook ŋaao taabinto, ma anyak da eet oma ci abornekin nɔŋ, toŋek rak gi ci ona anyaai Jook noko looc ŋina, iyiik rak ɔɔtɔ idica ki gotonu gi ci abornekin niini ineet nɔŋ o zɛɛ abada ni ka ija taap Jook.

Mã anyak eet ci arɔɔŋ kooyin ineet rooni, abon aminyu niina ki nɔɔnɔ idica gi nico taman gɔla ŋina ɛlɛ ŋaati ŋaan urumti rooni. Mã alaŋ agoon nɔkɔ, akoyin koca niini ineet alaane o roonnyo, ma ŋinaante anyek alaani nici takirnya kɔɔt kacaptin ineet.
Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, mã ŋaan ruk karama, alaŋ koca oogjai been nɛɛn.
Aziiŋnu baale gɔɔn azi kɛɛrita ugooc nɛ, Má adoma zoocmaz.
Bar zin inoko kaduwakuŋ naana ineet kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã anyak eet ci olla acin ŋaa culu alina, ma arɔɔŋ ziniza kɛlɛɛmtɔ ki nɔɔnɔ, utuguzɔ bar niini zoocmaz ki nɔɔnɔ odota ŋume o Joowo.
Zin mã abacakin kɛbɛrɛci cune azo o gi ci gɛr, kata bitaala kodowiwin kɛbɛrɛci. Abon bar ŋaati adowinin kɛbɛrɛci kujuk ŋaati anyayɛ kɛbɛrɛ dook, ma ajukonek ɛlɛ dook goo o Loryento eecitɔ.
Mã anyin aziiti cune azo o baca baciinok, tɛɛdak bitaalin jukek tuu. Abon bar ŋaati adowinin aziiti kujuk ŋaati anyayɛ azɛɛn dook, ma ajukonek ɛlɛ dook goo o Loryento.
Aziiŋnyu baale gɔɔn azi kɛɛrita ugooc nɛ, Mã atɔɔk ɛɛti ŋaa cin, abon ayɛɛdak niini nɔɔnɔ waragɛ ci aryanto.

Bar zin inoko naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã atɔɔk ɛɛti ŋaa cin gaga nɔkɔ ŋaati alaŋ agami zoocmaza, ma akɔ ariyi ŋaa nico bodo ɛɛti oman, anyek niini ŋaa nico kodoma zoocmaz. Buk ɛɛti ci ariyi nɔɔnɔ o odoma zoocmaz.
Aziiŋnu baale gɔɔn zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Má itoonu zaar o Joowo gaga. Bar mã itoontu Jook, abon didi agoonu gi nico.
Bar zin inoko naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Má itoonu Jook been nɛɛn. Buk má itoonu tammu taden, eeci tammu tadena ŋino abaai Jooi alya nɛɛn.
Buk má itoonu tɔdɔ, eeci tɔdɔwa een ŋino ataadek Jooi zɔɔ nɛɛn. Buk má itoonu Jerusalɛm, eeci een kutur o alaan o adikir nɛɛn.
Má bar buk itoonu eleeti ugooc maany, eeci alaŋ niiga aganeku otoweec imitat codoi ṯɔr ootine cugooc o kizi vɔɔr, karabɔŋ kizi koli.
Olla gɔɔn iziti nɛ, Yɔŋ, karabɔŋ aziyu nɛ, Akɔm! Eeci zoozowa ogɛn ci arooŋnyu udukta neke avu Loryenta.
Iziiktu buk baale azi ɔl nɛ, Mã akana ɛɛti gɔn keberec, akata buk nɔɔnɔ keberec. Mã aliba ɛɛti gɔn nyigitat, ilibta buk nɔɔnɔ nyigitat.
Bar zin naana inoko kanekuŋ nɛ, Mã agoonekin ɛɛti gi ci gɛr, má acaca been nɛɛn. Mã arookin ɛɛti voret ci azo o, towek bodo ci kaŋeto o.
Mã akoyin ɛɛti oman rooni arɔɔŋ kaamawin rum unun zinzeetinu, anyek buk nɔɔnɔ rum unun malkinto.
Mã arooŋnyin takirɛnti oman nyayek nɔɔnɔ ijo cigin dɔyiza ŋintimiliny, nyayek nɔɔnɔ ŋinti wun kal.
Mã anyak eet ci alayin gi ci alayin, ma anyei niina gi nico, anyek nɔɔnɔ labak. Buk mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti gi ci akɔ aliŋliŋi zɛɛ ŋaan abadakin tiŋeere, anyek nɔɔnɔ labak.
Aziiŋnyu baale gɔɔn azi kɛɛrita ugooc nɛ, Ereezit laŋotugooc doon! Otoborit ɔl o amarninuŋ igeet!
Bar zin inoko naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Ereezit buk ɔl o amarninuŋ igeet. Ijintek buk Jook ɔl o agiduŋ.

Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, izitu koca niiga didi dɔl o baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena. Eeci anyek niini ii kuduna, ma ataran ɔl o abon kibeen ɔl o gɛr buk. Ma anyek buk niini tammu taden kitiilak maam ɔl o abon ki ɔl o gɛr dook.
Mã areezu ɔl o areezuŋ igeet doon, alaŋ koca atitinyuŋ Jooi igeet, eeci ɔl o gɛrzɛ agɔɔn gɔɔn buk niigi nɔkɔ.
Mã azaayu laŋotugoocok doon, anyak gi ci utuguzu abon kujuk kaal o agɔɔn ɔl o alaŋ atuwe tɔ? Mayo nuun een ɔl o alaŋ atuwe gɔɔn buk agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ.
Abon zin niiga areezu ɔl dook ɔrɔɔt kiyo buk baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena o.
Egenyit! Má aliŋliŋnyu liŋliŋɔn o Joowo ɔl kɔrgɛna ka olla bar kicinit niigi kaal ci agoonu o. Mã agoonu kaal ci ɛɛl nɔkɔ ɔl kɔrgɛna, alaŋ ajowanu vɔyit ŋaati baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena been nɛɛn.

Zin gɔɔn mã arooŋnyu itiritit eet ci amaat, má abɔraku ɔl dook kiyo gɔɔn agɔɔn ɔl o ayelza eleeti o. Agɔɔn gɔɔn niigi kaal ci abon ceezine o lotento kibeen golowɛ ka katanaazɔ ɔl nɔɔgɔ kaale nicoko. Zin giye nico abon agayu niiga uruktozek nɔɔgɔ vɔyita ugeec dook loota ŋina odota.
Bar zin gɔɔn niiga mã atiritu eet ci amaat, itiritit nɔɔnɔ gole ci laŋotugooc o orkoryu alya alaŋ aga been nɛɛn.
Anycek gi nico kizi gi ci agaya niiga doon. Ŋaan aruwekuŋ igeet vɔyit o agoonu nɔkɔ baatunooŋ o acin kaal nicoko roodinta.

Gɔɔn ma ajinu Jook, má eelnu kiyo ɔl o gɔɔn arɔɔŋ ka keyelizta eleeti ɔla o. Arɛɛz gɔɔn niigi ŋaati ɛɛlni jena ɔl kɔrgɛna ceezine o lotento been golowɛ, ma ajin Jook ka kicinit ɔl nɔɔgɔ. Abon zin agayu niiga uruktozek nɔɔgɔ vɔyita ugeec loota ŋina odota.

Bar zin niiga mã gɔɔn arooŋnyu ijinit Jook, ɔɔtɔ ceezine ugooc eecitɔ, onyoogit karogi. Ijintu ni baatunooŋ o aga kaal dook. Ŋaan anyuŋ niini igeet kaal o arooŋnyu ŋaaten nɔɔnɔ o acin kaal o agoonu niiga roodinta dook.
Gɔɔn mã ajinu Jook, má aduwanu zoozok ci wuntik akɔm keŋti kiyo ɔl o alaŋ atuwe gɔɔn abaaban niigi anɔ nɛ, Coma azii Jooi ŋaryiin cineeŋ wun o.
Má zin eelnu kiyo niigi o been nɛɛn. Eeci baatunooŋ aga kaal o arooŋnyu niiga rogete unooŋ laadun iŋaan buk ijinit niiga nɔɔnɔ.
Zin gɔɔn ma aŋaryinu, aŋaruyɔ gole ci atobɔ kibeen co. Baatinaaŋ o aavɛ tamma, anyek ɔl kidiŋdiŋanit zaar ugun.
Anyek baliin unun kiiya. Anyek rooŋinɛt unun kutuguwe loocowɛ kiyo tamma o.
Nyet dayiin onaaŋ iiten codoi waanico.
Toŋ baciinok ogaacak kiyo kuuŋna kaal o abaca ɔl ŋaatinaaŋ o.
Nyet dɔyiz ka calaŋ acinanet kaala o gɛrzɛ.
Mã ooŋneku niiga ɔl oogi kaal o abaca ŋaatunooŋ, ooŋnekuŋ buk baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena igeet kaal ugooc abacanu.
Mazi alaŋ ooŋneku niiga ɔl oogi kaal o gɛr agoonekuŋ niigi igeet, alaŋ buk koca baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena ooŋnekuŋ igeet kaal o abacanu been nɛɛn.

Gɔɔn mã uuŋnu dayiin ka idiŋdiŋanit Jook, má anyoranu ŋumti kiyo ɔl o gɔɔn arɔɔŋ keyelizta eleeti ɔla o. Gɔɔn niigi ma ooŋ dayiin, alɔŋa eleeti, ma azɔp looc, ka kagaac ɔl nɔɔgɔ ooŋ dayiin ka kidiŋdiŋanit Jook. Abon zin agayu niiga uruktozek nɔɔgɔ vɔyita cigeec loota ŋina odota.

Gɔɔn zin ma ooŋnu niiga dayiin ka idiŋdiŋanit Jook, otoonyit ŋumti, ma avilanu ooti juruŋ, ka calaŋ aga ɔl ogɛn uuŋnu niiga dayiin. Ŋaan agayuŋ igeet baatunooŋ o aga kaal dook. Ŋaan aruwekuŋ niini igeet vɔyit kaale o abon agoonu roodinta dook.

Gɔɔn zin ma ooŋnu niiga dayiin ka idiŋdiŋanit Jook, otoonyit ŋumti, ma avilanu ooti juruŋ, ka calaŋ aga ɔl ogɛn uuŋnu niiga dayiin. Ŋaan agayuŋ igeet baatunooŋ o aga kaal dook. Ŋaan aruwekuŋ niini igeet vɔyit kaale o abon agoonu roodinta dook.
Má itaŋeku eleeti arɔkzɛt loota ŋina, eeci arɔkzɛt ci loocu adak tɔdɔwa ki zizaac, ma agɔrɔz agoryawa.
Abon zin iyaŋeku eleeti arɔkzɛt tammu tadena, eeci ŋinaante alaŋ adak zizaaca ki tɔdɔ, ma akɔm agoryak ci ka kogorozit.
Eeci ŋino iyaŋin arɔkzɛt unooŋ, ŋino buk aavtiyɛ zinzeeti ugooc nɛɛn.
Ma kɛbɛrɛ tokolec ci alyo gi. Mã abon kɛbɛrɛ cugune o, aavi buk ɛlɛ cune o dook vooritina.
Bar mazi gɛrzɛ kɛbɛrɛ cugune o, aavi buk ɛlɛ cune o dook muura, ma muuri nici gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.

Akɔm laadun eet ci aliŋliŋonek alaat ram. Mã agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, arɛɛz koca codoi ŋaatineeŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma amarnin codoi. Karabɔŋ aŋole codoi, ma apɛz codoi. Zin gole nico alaŋ abon ŋaati kaliŋliŋonɛkɛ Jook, ma bodo kaliŋliŋ guruc.
Inoko zin kanekuŋ nɛ, Má iinonu maam ki dayiin o arooŋnyu ka orogti, karabɔŋ een rumanɛ ci ka uburucek eleeti. Eeci rogɛti titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk dayiin, maje ɛlɛ titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk rumanɛ.

Icinit di kibaali o too ŋaati akuli tammu kɛŋa labak. Alaŋ niigi aḏowɛ, ma akɔm nɔɔgɔ labi ci ateedek piimanɛ. Zin baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena nɛɛn o anyek nɔɔgɔ dayiin. Bar zin niiga adiŋdiŋnyu ɔrɔɔt ujukit nɔɔgɔ.
Ŋɛnɛɛn inoko ŋaatunooŋ ci azaac rogɛt cin kizi wun iitene codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ inoninta?
Iinonu zin rumanɛ gaga naa? Icinit di! Koroboli aduŋna ku? Alaŋ niigi aliŋliŋ, ma alaŋ alolak eleeti rumanɛ.
Kaduwakuŋ zin igeet kanekuŋ nɛ, Mayo nuun een Solomon baal een aroi ɔrɔɔt e alaŋ anyak rumanɛ ci alina kiyo gɔɔn koroboli o.
Mazi alinatan Jooi koroboli o gɔɔn alina waanico, ma bodo tiŋeere araaba kɔr o, alaŋ agayu Jooi anyuŋ buk igeet rumanɛ? Anyaku didi tɛ niiga tuwɛn ci miliny ɔrɔɔt giye ci iinonu kaal noko.
Má iinonu zin gi ci aniyu nɛ, Kayo kojokta dayiin ŋaaḏaŋ? Karabɔŋ aniyu nɛ, Kayo kojokta kaal ci kawot ŋaaḏaŋ? Karabɔŋ aniyu nɛ, Kayo kojokta rumanɛ ci kanyak ŋaaḏaŋ?
Eeci kaal nicoko abaaban gɔɔn ɔl o loocu tup nɔkɔ. Bar zin baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena aga nɔkɔ arooŋnyu niiga kaal nicoko dook o.
Bar zin rak ɔɔwa ooritnɔŋ orooŋit baliin o Joowo. Utuguz kaal o abon arooŋekuŋ niini igeet utuguz ŋaan vurta anyuŋ niini igeet kaal nicoko dook.
Má iinonu kaal ci tiŋeertinu, eeci Jooi ŋaan aga niini niceke. Olla utuguz kaal ci tɛ agoonu waanico o doon.
Má apayeku ɔl oogi gerzitin ka calaŋ buk apayekuŋ Jooi igeet gerzitin.
Eeci mã apayeku ɔl oogi gerzitin, apayekuŋ buk Jooi igeet gerzitin nɔkɔ.
Naa zin rican gi ci abil keberece ci gonon o, ma bar alaŋ abaaban rak gi ci appe abil keberece cuno o?
Ku anei gon oma nɛ, Jai kaarawin gi ci anyei kebereca o, ma gi ci appe abil keberece cun o alaŋ rak aara naa?
Zin niina ci adiŋdiŋan ɛlɛ vɔlɔŋa o aara rak gi ci appe abil keberece cun o ɔɔwa zɛɛ mazi icinɔ juruŋ, bitɔ zin aara gi ci abil keberece ci gotonon e.
Má anyeku kaal o abon titiny orze, eeci alaŋ agayu karabɔŋ iiten oma ookconekuŋ igeet ɛlɛ, ma adakuŋ. Má ajukeku ziira ugooc alina kɔcɔcɔbanɛn kɔrgɛn, eeci arocek koca tɔdɔ zɔɔnɛ.
Ijintɔ, ŋaan anyononekuŋ. Ɔrɔɔŋtɔ, ŋaan ajowanu. Ɛtɛrɛnit karogi, ŋaan akolonekuŋ.
Eeci ɛɛti ci ajine, anyononek nɔɔnɔ gi o ajin Joowa. Ɛɛti ci arooŋnyi, ajowa gi o arɔɔŋ Joowa. Maje ɛɛti ci atɛrɛn karogi, akolonek nɔɔnɔ karogi o Joowo.
Inoko ŋaatunooŋ ŋɛnɛɛn ci gɔɔn mã ajin ŋɛɛrin ḏokoc, anyek bar niini nɔɔnɔ bɛ?
Karabɔŋ mã ajin niini nɔɔnɔ kulugit, anyek bar kowat?
Mayo nuun eeginu gɛrzɛ noko, agayu kaal ci abon anyeku dɔl ugooc nɔkɔ. Zin bar baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena anyek ɔl o ajin nɔɔnɔ kaal ci abon ɔrɔɔt kujukuŋ igeet.
Utuguzek ɔl oogi buk kaal o arooŋnyu niiga nɔɔgɔ kutuguzeyuŋ igeet. Nici kɛŋ o lotinok o Mosis been zoozok o nyakaŋanetu nɛɛn.
Oneec zin gɔl o lodoci akɔ araane o lodoci. Ma gɔl nici gɔl o akɔ tammu tadena nɛɛn. Ano zin gɔl nico ɔl ci miliny tɛr, eeci adɔi ɔrɔɔt.
Maje gɔl o akɔ gooye o Loryento alɔɔlɔ niini ɔrɔɔt. Ma ano gɔl nico ɔl ci meelik gɛr, eeci aboke ɔrɔɔt.
Egenyit nyakaŋanete o voloŋo. Gɔɔn ma kacin nɔɔgɔ eci bitaalu gononɛ kiyo ɛɛzana ween aza o. Maje bar zinzeeti ugeec eecitɔ ɛɛl kiyo guzule o.
Ŋaan zin agayu nɔɔgɔ kaale o agɔɔn. Kaga zin gɔɔn laadun kɛɛna ceen tirɔ alaŋ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci kiŋirowu. Buk larbɔɔ alaŋ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci gemenyowu.
Ma kɛɛt ci abon abiirna buk kɛbɛrɛ ci abon. Maje kɛɛt ci gɛrzɛ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci gɛr amadowez.
Ma kɛɛt ci abon alaŋ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci gɛr. Maje buk kɛɛt ci gɛrzɛ alaŋ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci abon.
Ma kɛɛn o alaŋ anyak kɛbɛrɛ ci abon keene o gɔɔn aḏok ɔl atɛɛdjak looc, ma ajukonek goo.
Ŋaan zin agayu nyakaŋanɛt o voloŋo kaale ugeec agɔɔn.
Alaŋ ɔl dook o awuyan aneet azi nɛ, Manyi, Manyi, aridonek katin baliin o Joowo. Avɔ ŋinaante ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o arooŋek baaba o aavi tammu tadena nɔɔgɔ kutuguzɔ doon.

Mazi iitene ci aku katin e ɔl ci meel avu anekan nɛ, Manyi, Manyi, baale gɔɔn kaduwaka ɔl kaviyak o Joowo zaare ugun. Buk baale gɔɔn kaarana miniŋ o Loryento ɔla zaare ugun. Ma kagoona kaal ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye zaare ugun.”
Kanei zin katin naana nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Alaŋ kagayuŋ igeet been nɛɛn. Ɛnyɛktɛ ŋaatan ŋina lorye ci oŋenu coko.
Ma ɛɛti ci azii zoozok cigan noko, ma azooni zinize onin dook, atobɔ niini kibeen eet ci agɛny ɛɛnyɛt ceez cin kutur ɔɔwa.
Mazi atiil tammu ɔrɔɔt, ma ariya tawani, ma ivaan ŋɔɔti ɔrɔɔt, alaŋ ceez nici aruk looc been nɛɛn, eeci ɛɛnyci kutur ɔɔwa.
Maje ɛɛti ci azii zoozok cigan noko, ma alaŋ azooni, abil niini kiyo ɛɛti ci tarbal ɛɛnyɛt ceez nyarata o.
Mazi atiil tammu ɔrɔɔt, ma ariya tawani, ma ivaan ŋɔɔti ɔrɔɔt, aruk ceez nici looc kɔɔyɔyɛ lai, eeci ɛɛnyci nyarat kɛŋa.”
Mazi akɔ adica Yesu demziin nico, ibiirit ɔl dook ooti tɛt gole cin ademzin noko.
Eeci alaŋ demziin cinɛ o atobɔ ki demziin o alaat ugeec gɔɔn ademzek nɔɔgɔ lotinok, bar adɛmzɛ niini kizi eet o didi anyak alaazɛt.
Mazi alocai Yesu bɛ tadena, unuya nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meel gɛr.
Ma akunak ɛɛti ci anyak mɔɔriz o gidaŋ nɔɔnɔ, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma, ma azi nɛ, “Manyi, mã arooŋ rogozan kizi maya, rogozan.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Karooŋ kuruguzin.” Ma itoon Yesu aziit, ma uum nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, “Izi zin maya.” Enico ɛlɛ izi mɔɔrizi oninɛ e ḏim. Orok didi niini kobona kigirgir ɛlɛ kiyo da alaŋ amɔɔr o.

Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ziiyan di. Má akɔ aduwai zɔɔz nico eet oma, bar bitɔ yelek ɛlɛ alaan o ceez o Joowo ka kook kicinin niini ineet. Buk bitɔ taap Jook ebaal aduwan lotinowa o Mosis, ka kagayin ɔl dook didi urugu niina mɔɔrize baal amɔɔrni e.
Mazi akunak Yesu kutur o kazi Kapernam, iiya urumtɔ ki alaan ci takirnya o Rom. Ma ilalek alaani nici Yesu arɔɔŋ tirtɛn.
Azi nɛ, “Manyi, amɔɔr gabarɛnti cane ɔlɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ɔɔŋ niini onyite codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, ma alaŋ anim kitiŋa jena. Apirnanɛ nɔɔnɔ balcɔnti ci amɔɔrni noko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan kakɔ kanyi nɔɔnɔ kizi maya.”
Ma anek alaani nici Yesu nɛ, “Akɔm Manyi. Alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati akunakɛ niina kɔrɔk can o. Kaga nɔkɔ olla mɔlɔyi ci aduwa niina ŋina arogoz tedec gabaren can noko.

Kanyei buk naana alaat oogi ci adikir ŋaatan alaazɛta, ma kazii naana zoozok cigeec. Ma bodo buk naana keen alaan ci adikir takirnyai, ma aziiŋnan niigi aneet. Mã kanei co nɛ, Bitɔ kete, akɔ. Mã kanei ce nɛ, Ija, aku. Buk mã kanei gabara ogan nɛ, Utuguz gi co, agɔɔn.”
Mazi azii Yesu gi nico, ibiir nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek ɔl ona ano nɔɔnɔ e nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ŋaan baal rɛɛn ŋaan kicin ole o Israyil dook eet ci atuyan ɔrɔɔt kiyo ɛɛti nici noko!
Abon aadanu gi ce. Avu katin ɔl ci meel atuyan aneet libire ci jenu o, ma avu ogɛnɛ libire ci nyagjo o. Ma avu aavtiz niigi dook loota kibeen Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob baliinte o Joowo.

Maje bar ɔl o Israyil ogɛn o waan aganɔ ŋaati avɔyi baliinte o Joowo, ma bar alaŋ arɔɔŋ kutuyan aneet, atoowonek katin niigi muur bitaala rɛɛna many, ma alu niigi ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adak nyigit kirkic kirkic balcɔnta kibeen badi mony.”
Enek ni Yesu alaan nico nɛ, “Bitɔ ɔlɔ. Ma gi o atu niina ŋaan agoononekin ineet.” Ma ziite ci azɔɔzɔnɛ niigi neke ɛlɛ urugun gabarɛnti o alaano nico.
Mazi akɔ Yesu ole o Pitɔr, amɔda inyik o Pitɔr amɔɔr. Anyak tadiwɔn ci ɔɔŋɛ onyite codoi nɔkɔ.
Mazi uum Yesu nɔɔnɔ aziit, izi maya enico ɛlɛ, ma iŋaaz, ma akɔ agoonek nɔɔnɔ dayiin.

Ma yomana anyaaktak ɔl Yesu ɔl ci meel gɛr ci anyak miniŋ o Loryento eleetinɛ. Mazi aduwa Yesu olla zɔɔz ci aduwa, aduŋna miniŋa ci Loryento noko ŋaatineeŋ ecodoi nɔkɔ. Ma arogoz niini ɔl ci amɔɔr noko dook.
Zin giye o agɔɔni niini gi nico, ɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya zooze o anɛ nɛ, “Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o aarawet ageet moorizok ogaac.”
Mazi acin Yesu kɔlɛ ci meel aliya nɔɔnɔ noko, enewun nuyak ogin nɛ, “Kabaayizit liil kɔɔtɔ baagita.”
Ma akunak alaani ci gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Juz nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Gayoi, inoko kɔrɔɔŋa naana kunuwin ineet. Olla ŋinti akɔyɛ o kɔrkɔr.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Anyak kireerwana looknya, ma anyak kibaali ceezi, maje bar naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto alaŋ kanyei ŋinti ka kaavɛ loota ka kuyubuzi.”
Bodo azi ɛɛti oman ole o gɔɔn ano nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gayoi, karooŋ kunuwin ineet. Nyan zin rak kimiirozek kɔrɔk ka kook kiyaŋ baaba iitene ci adaaŋni.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm! Nowawan aneet inoko o. Anyek ɔl o alaŋ atuwi kiyaŋit gɔnɔgi o adaai.”
Ma vurta otoodit Yesu ki nuyak ogin kavool o liilu.
Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɔmɔdak nɔɔgɔ ŋɔɔti ci appe ɔrɔɔt liil kɛŋ. Ma ayɛlyɛlanak ŋɔɔti nici maam kavool ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Maje Yesu ɔɔŋ daa.
Ma iiŋka nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, Manyi, Tiŋa je! Ɛɛlawet! Kizita toronyɛ ka kadaakta.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Naa? Abarinu naa? Anyaku dim tuwɛn ci miliny tɛr nɔkɔn?” Itiŋa ni niini jena, ma agernyek ŋɔɔt ki maam kajaŋantɛ. Ma ajaŋani didi tiv enico ɛlɛ.
Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ dook ooti tɛt, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ma laadun eet ci abil ku nici? Ma nuun een ŋɔɔt kibeen maam azii nɔɔnɔ!”

Mazi abaawonek Yesu looc o ɔl o kazi Gadariin liil baagita, ɔɔt urumtɔ niini kibeen ɔl ceen ram ci avu bɔɔtwane o gɔɔn iyaŋi ɔl gɔnɔgi o adaai. Ɔl nicigi anyak miniŋ ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt ootinɛ. Aam nɔɔgɔ maŋɔnnya kiziti kɛlɛk o too ɛlɛ, ma akɔm eet ci anim kono gɔl ci aavtiyɛ niigi o.
Ma agɛrɛny niigi enico ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Joowo, arooŋ ŋaatinaaŋ naa? Akun ka ija uulalet ageeta iŋaan iiteni o payiinto ɔɔwa?”
Maje ŋinaante anyak kɔcɔcɔbanɛn ci agɛ vorora liil otoga.
Ma ilalek miniŋa ci ɔl nicoko o Yesu anek nɛ, “Inoko zin mã arɔɔŋ aarawet ageeta bitaala, nyet koota kɔcɔcɔbanene niceke.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Udunta zin. Ɔɔtɔ.” Ma aduŋna niigi ole ceen ram noko, ma avɔ kɔcɔcɔbanɛnɛ. Enico ɛlɛ ɔdɔkɔnyca kɔcɔcɔbanɛna vorora, ma iinak liil kutudude niigi dook lai.
Odokonyit ni ɔl o oowa kɔcɔcɔbanɛn e odokonyit ɔɔtɔ korogjowɛ, ma avɔ aduwak ɔl zoozok nicoko kutur kɛŋa dook.
Ma avu ɔl dook kutura ka kivita kicinit Yesu. Mazi avu acin nɔɔnɔ, ilaltek niigi nɔɔnɔ kɔtɔɔ looce cineeŋ o.”
Ma atɔɔt Yesu kavool, ma abaayiz liil amiironek kutur onin kazi Kapernam.
Ma ŋinaante ɔdɔŋtak ɔl ogɛn nɔɔnɔ eet ci rɛbrɛbi ɔɔŋ kuwena nɔkɔ. Mazi acin Yesu tuwɛn cineeŋ o, enek eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, “Ŋɛɛran, talɔ! Aaryai baciinowa ugune.”
Enico abaabanit alaata o ademzek ɔl lotinok zinzeetine ci aborni nɔŋ zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Ma dim ɛɛti nici anyek ɛlɛ kizi Jook?”
Maje Yesu aga kaal ci abaaban niigi o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abaabanu dim kaal ci gɛr zinzeetinɛ naa?
Mayo aboke jaŋ? Kizi nɛ, Aaryai baciinowa ugune, yo da kizi nɛ, Tiŋa jena, tɔ?
Inoko zin karooŋ keyeleyuŋ igeet naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kanyei dɔyiz ci kaaranɛ baciinok ɔla.” Enico enek niini eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, “Tiŋa je! Doma kuwen cun o. Tɔ, bitɔ ɔlɔ.”
Ma iŋaaz didi ɛɛti nici, ma awɔ akɔ ɔlɔ.
Mazi acin ɔl gi nico, anyayit ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anaat Jook giye ci anyekɛ eet ci deer alaazɛt ci abil kiyo ci anyek eet nico noko.

Ma vurta otoŋ Yesu ŋinito ɔɔtɔ. Mazi ŋaan awɔ gɔla nɔkɔ, icin Matiyu o gɔɔn alota guruc ole o ataalinɛ kaal mɛlɛgɛnyai aavi loota maktabe onin. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nowawan.” Enico ɛlɛ itiŋa Matiyu, ma ano nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ adake Yesu ole o Matiyu, anyak buk ɔl ci meelik ŋinaante ole o gɔɔn alota guruc kibeen ɔl oogi ole o gɔɔn alaŋ azooni lotinok o Juz. Ma avu azɔlɔ niigi kibeen Yesu ki nuyak ogin ŋaatodoi.
Mazi acin ɔl ogɛn ole o kazi Parici gi nico, enektek nuyak o Yesu nɛ, “Ma dim alaani cunooŋ o azɔlɔ ki ɔl ci gɔɔn alot guruc ki ɔl ci gɛr o naa?”
Mazi azii Yesu gi nico, ɛbɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Gɔɔn ɔl calaŋ amɔɔr alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi akim. Bar arɔɔŋ akim ɔl ci amɔɔr doon.

Ɔɔtɔ ojokta kɛŋ ci zɔɔz o aduyai waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, Alaŋ karooŋ kɛlɛk ceen todoyok o doon, bar karooŋ zinzeeti bonat ka kagama todoyok cugoocok o. Mazin naana alaŋ kakun ka kiiya kotowo ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o abon, bar kakun ka kiiya kotowo ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o gɛr.”

Ivitak ni ivitak Yesu nuyawa o Jɔn o oonyi, ma avu ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Gɔɔn naaga kibeen ɔl o Parici kuuŋna dayiin iiten oma ka kidiŋdiŋanta Jook. Ma bar nuyawa cugune o adake niigi iinya dook labak o naa?”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ŋaan karomena naana kibeen nuyak cigan o alaŋ rak niigi akat culum. Mazi tiŋeere iiya iiteni o ka kaaryai naana ŋaatineeŋ, ŋaan zin akat niigi culum, ma abor dayiin.
Akɔm laadun eet ci abutanek rum ci rɛɛn gɔn ci colai, eeci mã agɔɔn nɔkɔ, arɛɛcai koca kujuk we.
Akɔm buk eet ci arek iira buru ci rɛɛn. Mã agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, adɛ koca iirana, ma alip buru. Abon zin arek niini iira buru ci colai ka calaŋ alibe.

Mazi ŋaan aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ gi nico nɔkɔ, iiyak nɔɔnɔ alaani codoi alaate o ceez o Juz lotento, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc Yesu ŋuma, ma ilalek nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Adaak bɛɛnyan! Bar zin kaga mã akun, ma ataadei nɔɔnɔ aziit, arogi koca.”
Itiŋgazɔ ni Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin dook oneec eet nico.
Mazi ŋaan awɔ niigi gɔla nɔkɔ, iiya ŋaa ci anyak mɔɔriz ci maam o ŋaanu irkitok amɔtɔ ram calaŋ gɔɔn rak ɛɛl. Ma aku uum niini Yesu rum eci bawuco.
Eeci anek niini ɛlɛ maany nɛ, “Mã olla inoko kuum rum cin malkinto noko karugi koca.”
Mazi abuudi Yesu, acin ŋaa nico, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bɛɛnyan, má anyei ŋoliin gaga. Uruguzin ineet tuwɛn unune.” Enico ɛlɛ urugun didi ŋaa nici.
Idicek ni niigi ɔɔtɔ korge o alaano e, Mazi avɔ arum kɔrɔk, ajowa dole ona amɔɔr e adaawa. Maje ɔl alu ŋinaante.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Udunit ɔɔtɔ bitaala. Alaŋ dole adaai, olla ɔɔŋ labak.” Mazi azii ɔl gi nico, atararti niigi nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi avɔ aduŋna ɔl dook, ook niini ceeza, ma akɔ agam dole aziit, ma iŋaaz dole enico ɛlɛ.
Ma adiica awaŋi ci gi ci agɔɔn niini noko looc nice dook.

Mazi akɔ iŋaaz Yesu ŋinaante, iziiyit ɔl ceen ram ruben Yesu aku adiir ŋintineeŋ o. Mazi aku Yesu, oneec niigi nɔɔnɔ. Ma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Devid, anyek da kuwuceyin rubenzɛt cinaaŋ noko. Kolet da kɛbɛrɛ kicintowa.”
Mazi akɔ arum Yesu kɔrɔk oma, ivitak ɔl ci ruben noko nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko atuyu kizik tedec naana karuguzuŋ igeet didi?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, kagaya anyei niina dɔyiz ci aruguzet ageeta.”
Itiŋa ni Yesu, ma uum nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ azi nɛ, “Anyek zin kibil eci ona atuyu niiga o.”
Enico ɛlɛ izi kɛbɛrɛ ugeec wak icintɔ. Ma aricanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Má avɔ aduwaku eet oma gi nico.”
Bar mazi awɔ niigi, ɔɔt uduktak ɔl kutura dook zɔɔz ci ona agɔɔn Yesu o.
Mazi ka kɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu ki nuyak ogin, anyaaktak bodo ɔl nɔɔnɔ eet ci adiiti alemeti, eeci anyak miniŋit.
Mazi aara Yesu miniŋit eete nico, ozoozun niini enico ɛlɛ kibiirit ɔl dook ooti tɛt. Ma anɔ niigi nɛ, “Ŋaan baal rɛɛn laadun ŋaan kicinit Israyila ŋina gi ci abil nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
Maje bar ɔl o Parici anɔ nɛ, “Anyek nɔɔnɔ dɔyiz ci aaranɛ miniŋ ɔla noko alaani o miniŋu.”
Ma azɔp Yesu kuturyok o looc nice dook adɛmɛz ɔl ceezine o Juz lotento, ma uuwak kaviyak o baliin o Joowo abon. Ma arogoz ɔl moorizok keŋti dook.
Mazi acin niini ɔl ci meel avunak nɔɔnɔ noko, icirit nɔɔnɔ ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Eeci avir nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti, ma anyak ŋoliin kaale o gɛr avunak nɔɔgɔ kiyo ɛɛzana o akɔm tuwayoi o.
Ma anek Yesu nuyak ogin yabziinta nɛ, “Icinit di! Anyak mana labi ci meel gɛr, maje bar naaga ci ka keteedit mana o, keegin kidicɛ tɛr.
Kijinit zin eet o mano ka kitoonayet ɔl oogi bodo kiiya kitirititet ageet teedinta.”
Ma awa Yesu nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram dook ŋaatodoi, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ dook dɔyiz ci ka kaartai miniŋ ɔla, ma arogzi ɔl moorizok keŋti dook.
Zaar zin o nuyak ween amɔtɔ ram nɛɛn ce. Saiman o kazi zaar oogi nɛ Pitɔr, ki gɔtɔni o kazi Andoru, ki Jemis, ki gɔtɔni o kazi Jɔn o eegin lɔgɔz o eet o kazi Zebedi,
ki Pilip, ki Bartalamu, ki Tomaz, ki Matiyu baal gɔɔn alot guruc o meeryo e, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz, ki Tadeyos,
ki Saiman baal gɔɔn oorinɛ looc onin Israyil e, been Judaz Iskariyot baal ka kataalɔi Yesu e.
Mazi ka kitoon Yesu nuyak ceen amɔtɔ ram nicoko, itilo nɔɔgɔ rak anek nɛ, “Má avoyu loocowe o ɔl o alaŋ eegin Juz, karabɔŋ een kuturyowe ci ɔl o Samariya been nɛɛn.
Bar ɔɔtɔ korogjowe ci ɔl o Israyil atobɔ ki ɛɛza ci akoloni.
Ɔɔtɔ uuwayit iziti nɛ, Izi baliin o Joowo ajɔn.

Orogozit zin ɔl o amɔɔr, ɔdɔŋta ɔl o adaai daayiza, orogozit ɔl o anyak mɔɔriz o gidaŋ, aarta miniŋ ɔla. Kiyo anyuŋ Jooi igeet dɔyiz nico kɔkɔm gi ci aruweku nɔɔnɔ o, ɔɔtɔ buk niiga utuguz kaal nicoko nɔkɔ kɔkɔm gi ci aruwekuŋ ɔl igeet.
Má ayiitu guruc been nɛɛn.
Má buk ayiitu kaboot ci eeronu. Olla iyiitit rumanɛ ki caava ci anyaku eleetine o doon kibeen kɛɛn ci omtinto. Eeci eet ci aliŋliŋ ŋaan anyononek nɔɔnɔ kaal o arɔɔŋ dook ka kɛɛrɔni.
Mã avoyu kuture ci avoyu, orooŋit eet ci abon atalnanuŋ ka itiktɔi. Aavtiyu ni ole nico zɛɛ ma alam awoyu ŋina.
Mã avoyu ole ci avoyu, enektek rak ɔl ɔɔwa nɛ, Abonanu ɔl ci kɔrɔk nico? Ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ.
