Abon agayu gi ce. Inoko gɔɔn kizi gi ci agawa ɛɛti iiten ci ka kiiyakɛ agoryaiti ceez onin, acinɛ koca calaŋ ɔɔŋ ka calaŋ anyek agoryai waŋi ci aku agorzin.
Abon zin buk niiga eelnu nɔkɔ. Iziti vililɛ tup, eeci kakun naana tiŋeere Ŋɛɛrti Eeto iitene calaŋ agawanu.”
Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Gabaren jaŋ yo ci abon aliŋliŋonek alaan onin juruŋ? Gabaren ci abon nɛɛn o anyek alaani oninɛ nɔɔnɔ kabal gabara o miliny dook ka gɔɔn keŋerek niini nɔɔgɔ dayiin ugeec juruŋ.
Ajowa zin tiŋeere gabarɛnti nici vɔyit ci liŋliŋɔn onin iitene ci abadaan alaani oninɛ, ma ajowa nɔɔnɔ agɔɔn liŋliŋɔn juruŋ kibil ebaal aduwakɛ niini nɔɔnɔ e.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã agɔɔn nɔkɔ, anyek koca alaani nici kaal ogin dook kagam gabarɛnti nici.
Bar mazi een gabarɛnti nici eet ci gɛr, anek koca ɛlɛ maany nɛ, Alaŋ tiŋeere alaani cane o abada kataman.
Ma arɔɔk gɔnɔgi ci miliny o, ma adake niini labak, ma awot nyaantanɛ kibeen ɔl o abaaki.
Mazi abada tiŋeere alaani ci gabaren nico o iitene calaŋ niini agawan.
Aku aruk niini gabaren nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma apayek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin, eeci alaŋ agɔɔn liŋliŋɔn o anyonek nɔɔnɔ juruŋ. Akɔ zin tiŋeere niini ŋaati akɔ aluwi zɛɛ ma adak nyigit.”
Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Abil baliin o Joowa kete. Anyak baale dɔl ceen amɔtɔ adoma lambɛt cigeec, ma aduŋna avɔ bitaala ka kɔɔt kurumtek eet ci rociinto gɔl.
Ma dolene nicoko ceen tur ŋaatineeŋ tarbalɛ, maje bodo ceen tur agɛny ɔrɔɔt.
Adoma dɔlya ceen tur tarbalik o avɔyi lambɛt kɔkɔm maal oma ci anyayek.
Maje dɔlya ci agɛny o avɔyi lambɛt ugeec kibeen bodo maaltanɛ oogi burwɛtɛ.
Bar ɛɛti ci rociinto o alaŋaan aku taman, ma arɛ dɔlya nɔɔnɔ ŋinti rɛɛn zɛɛ makacin ataŋguzɔ.
Ma baalin kɛŋa ɛgɛrɛny ɛɛti oman azi nɛ, “Eet o rociinto e ce. Ivita urumtek gɔl.”
Ma iŋaaz dɔlya dook amɔta, ma apɛrpɛran lambɛt ugeecik e juruŋ.
Ma anek dɔlya ci tarbal o gɔnɔgi ci agɛny o nɛ, “Anycetu da maaltanɛ ci miliny. Idicai maaltanɛ lambete cigaacak o.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ dɔlya ci agɛny o nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Izi buk maaltanɛ ci kanyaka o kidicɛ tɛr. Alaŋ kalɛɛnɔ ki ageet dook. Odokonyit ɔɔtɔ ataalta mɛlɛgɛnyai kataman.”

Odokonyit ni didi dɔlya ci ona tarbal noko ka kɔɔt kataala maaltanɛ. Mazi avɔ niigi mɛlɛgɛnyai, urum ɛɛti o rociinto e looc. Iiya ni orkorit niini kibeen dɔl ween tur agɛny e ɔɔtɔ ceeze o tiŋkawiinto, ma anyook karogi.
Ma vurta ivita dɔlya o tarbal e. Ma avu aruk karogi azi nɛ, “Manyi, manyi, koleyet da ceez koota eecitɔ.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti ci rociinto o nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Aavtiz bitaala ŋinaante. Alaŋ kagayuŋ naana igeet.”
Izi ni Yesu nɛ, “Egenyit zin, eeci alaŋ agayu iiten karabɔŋ een ziit ci kakunɛ.”
Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Ma baliin o Joowo abil kete. Anyak baale eet ci arɔɔŋ kɛɛrɔn. Mazi ka kɔɔtɔ, otowa gabara ogin, ma aku aduwak nɔɔgɔ kuzuuti kaal ogin dook juruŋ.
Ma anyek gɔɔn co ŋaatineeŋ liŋliŋɔn ci aganɔ ki nɔɔnɔ. Anyek eet co guruc ceen 5000. Ma anyek bodo eet co guruc ceen 2000. Ma anyek bodo eet co guruc ceen 1000. Ɔtɔɔ ni niini.
Odoma gabarɛnti o anyonek nɔɔnɔ guruca ween 5000 e, ook iliŋliŋi guruc nicoko zɛɛ makacin bodo anyaa guruc ceen 5000 oogi bodo.
Bodo buk gabarɛnti o anyonek nɔɔnɔ guruca ween 2000 e, ook iliŋliŋi guruc nicoko zɛɛ makacin bodo anyaa guruc ceen 2000 oogi.
Maje gabarɛnti o anyonek nɔɔnɔ guruca ween 1000 e, ook adawek guruc nicoko looc itaŋa.
Ma irkitowe ogɛn abada alaani uneeŋ ka kiiya kigiilit ki nɔɔgɔ guruc ogin baal anyek nɔɔgɔ e.

Mazi avɔ agiil guruc, anyaak gabarɛnti baal anyonek guruca ween 5000 e alaan guruc oogi ceen bodo ni 5000, ma aku anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyan baale guruc ceen 5000. Inoko zin kiliŋliŋa guruc oogi ceen 5000 bodo.”

Ma anek alaani nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Een niina gabaren ci abonanin ziniz. Aliŋliŋ juruŋ. Zin giye o aliŋliŋɛ guruc baal miliny e juruŋ, ŋaan kanyin ineet guruc ci meel bodo ka liŋliŋi. Inoko ija ka kozolit ki ineet talniin can o.”
Ma aku bodo gabarɛnti baal anyonek nɔɔnɔ guruca ween 2000 e, ma aku anek alaan nɛ, “Anyan baale guruc ceen 2000. Inoko zin guruc oogi ceen 2000 kiliŋliŋa ce.”

Ma anek alaani nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Een gabaren ci abonanin ziniz. Aliŋliŋ juruŋ. Zin giye o aliŋliŋɛ guruc baal miliny e juruŋ, ŋaan kanyin ineet guruc ci meel bodo ka liŋliŋi. Inoko ija ka kozolit kibeen ineet talniin can o.”
Iiya ni bodo gabarɛnti baal anyonek guruca ween 1000 e. Ma aku anek alaan nɛ, “Manygɔn, Kagayin naana ineet een eet ci gɔɔn adoknin aziiti, ma ateedi niina kaal ci ɛɛva ɔl ogɛn.
Kotoŋolewin zin, ma kakɔ karoodi guruc baal anyan e kadawei looc. Orɛ zin nɔɔgɔ ce.”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ alaani nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina gabaren ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt, ma adaaŋnin buk ɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt. Mã da agayan niina aneet kateedi gɔɔn kaal ci ɛɛva ɔl ogɛn, abon waan zin aliŋliŋɛ guruc cigan o labak ka kojowa bodo azaace.”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ alaani nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina gabaren ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt, ma adaaŋnin buk ɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt. Mã da agayan niina aneet kateedi gɔɔn kaal ci ɛɛva ɔl ogɛn, abon waan zin aliŋliŋɛ guruc cigan o labak ka kojowa bodo azaace.”
Ma anek alaani gabara ogin nɛ, “Aamta guruc nicoko ŋaatin, ɔɔtɔ anycek gabaren ona anyak guruc ween 5000 e.
Eeci mã anyak ɛɛti kaal ci meel gɛr, anyonek bar bodo nɔɔnɔ ci meelik ɔrɔɔt. Maje ɛɛti ci anyak kaal ci miliny tɛr, aamnyai bar ŋaatin nici kavɔ nɔkɔ dook.
Inoko zin gabaren ci gɛr noko ujuktek nɔɔnɔ bitaalin muur ŋinaante, ka kook kutulu ŋinaante zɛɛ ma adak nyigit.”
Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Iiten ci kabadanɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ki toonnyak ogan titinyonte onan, kaku kaavi lecere onan alaazetu.
Ma alotakan katin ɔl o loocu dook aneeta. Ma kaku kaŋer nɔɔgɔ dook lɛlɛn ram kiyo gɔɔn aŋɛra ɛɛti o ɛɛzawu aza bawɔnɛ o.
Kari zin tiŋeere ɔl o atuyan aneet libir onan azo. Ma kari ɔl o alaŋ atuyan aneet kaŋeta.
Ma tiŋeere kanei naana alaani ɔl ci ona aavtiz aneet libire ci azo o nɛ, “Ivitak niiga o amayukuŋ baaba baliin onin baal agɔɔnakuŋ niini igeet laadun kinatamma e.
Baale adakan magiz, ma anyaŋ dayiin. Baale arukan kɔr, ma anyaŋ maam kowodɛ. Baale keen kernoi, ma atalnanaŋ korogjowe ugooc.
Baale kawɔ ŋaḏinyiny, ma anyaŋ rumanɛ. Baale kamoor, ma atiritaŋ. Baale kacabje, ma avu gɔɔn acinaŋ.”
Zin katin ɔl ci ona abon noko abɛdɛkan niigi aneet azi nɛ, “Manyi, ma da kacinin adakin magiz, ma kanyin dayiin waŋa? Ma da kacinin arukin kɔr, ma kanyin maam waŋa?
Ma da kacinin eeron, ma katalnanin korogjowɛ waŋa? Ma da kacinin awɔ ŋaḏinyiny, ma kanyin rumanɛ waŋa?
Ma da buk kacinin amoor karabɔŋ acabje, ma kavɔ kacinin waŋa?”
Kabɛdɛkɛ zin tiŋeere naana alaani nɔɔgɔ kanei nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma kaal o gɔɔn abon agooneku niiga gɔtɔnɔga cigan cɛlbɛz noko, bar agoonekaŋ niiga aneeta.”

Kookconei zin katin naana alaani ɔl o ɛɛl aneeta kaŋeta e, ma kanei nɛ, “Ɛnyɛktɛ ɔtɔɔz ŋaatan ŋina niiga ci apayekuŋ Jooi gerzitin o. Ɔɔtɔ gooye o abil been nɛɛn baal agɔɔnnyak Loryen kibeen toonnyak ogin e.
Baale adakan magiz, ma alaŋ anyaŋ dayiin. Baale arukan kɔr, ma alaŋ anyaŋ maam kowodɛ.
Baale keen kernoi, ma bar alaŋ atalnanaŋ korogjowe ugooc. Baale kawɔ ŋaḏinyiny, ma alaŋ anyaŋ rumanɛ. Baale kamoor, ma kacabje, ma alaŋ avu atiritaŋ.”

Abɛdɛkan zin tiŋeere niigi aneet azi nɛ, “Manyi, ma da kacinin adakin magiz, karabɔŋ arukin kɔr, karabɔŋ een kernoi, karabɔŋ awɔ ŋaḏinyiny, karabɔŋ amoor, karabɔŋ acabje sijina, ma alaŋ katiritin waŋa?”
Kabɛdɛkɛ zin tiŋeere naana alaani nɔɔgɔ kanei nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti o gɔɔn alaŋ atirit eet codoi ole ci cɛlbɛz noko, alaŋ atiritan niini aneet.”
Zin tiŋeere ɔl nicoko apawonek nɔɔgɔ goo o abil been nɛɛn. Maje ɔl o abon avɔ niigi rogete o abil been nɛɛn.”
Mazi adica Yesu demziin ci kaal nicoko dook, enek nuyak ogin nɛ,
“Agayu niiga tiŋeere ece iiten o Juz gɔɔn aadanɛ vardaŋinɛt. Zin iitene nice naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kakɔ kanyononei ɔl o ka kɔɔt kotodoyan aneet keete ween talakec.”
Ivitak ni alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen alaat o Juz kɔrɔk o Kayavas ween alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo.
Ma avu abaaban niigi gɔl ci ka kagamti Yesu gɛnyiza, kɔkɔm eet ci aga, ka kɔɔt kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
Ma anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaati kagɔɔni gi nico iinyaye ci vardaŋinto o, gɛrzɛ ŋaan ayoket ɔl ageet.”
Ma iitene oman aavi Yesu ole o eet o kazi Saiman baal amɔɔr mɔɔriz o gidaŋ e Bezaniya.
Mazi ŋaan adake nɔkɔ, iiyak nɔɔnɔ ŋaa ci anyaa ketezewoc ci abiz karacoc ci ataala guruce ci meelik ɔrɔɔt. Ma aku atitiny niini Yesu ŋaati aḏuutɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ karacoc nico nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ.
Mazi acin nuyawa gi ci agɔɔn ŋaa nici noko, otoborit niigi nɔŋ. Ma aŋɔmtɔ anɔ nɛ, “Ma laadun ŋaa nici aminaŋi karacoc nico gaga naa?
Alaŋ abon waan bar ataalanɛ karacoc nico guruc ci meelik ka kanyozek guruca ɔl o amaat?”
Maje Yesu aga gi ci azɔɔz niigi noko nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aŋomotu dim ŋaa nico naa? Ma gi ci agoonekan niini aneet noko gi ci abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ŋaatan.
Ma ɔl ci amaat o ŋaan aromenu tiŋeere niiga ki nɔɔgɔ ŋina iinya dook. Maje naana alaŋ bodo karomɛ ki igeet tiŋeere tup.
Aḏuutekan niini karacoc o adimanan niini aneet ka kɛrɛwa dawiin.
Inoko zin anycaŋ kuduwayuŋ gi ce. Tiŋeere gɔɔn ma akɔ uuwaki kaviyawa o Joowo loocowɛ dook, aadjai buk gi ci ona agɔɔn ŋaa nicini noko.”
Ɔɔtɔ ni Judaz Iskariyot ween nuyai codoi nuyawe ween amɔtɔ ram ook alaate o ceez o Joowo.
Ma akɔ anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã kayelekuŋ gɔl ci agamnyu Yesu, anyaŋ koca naa?” Anycek ni niigi nɔɔnɔ guruc ceen eetom kamɔtɔ.
Akata ni Judaz iinyaye niceke orooŋun gɔl ci ka kɛyɛlɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
Ma iitene o akanan lotɛn o vardaŋinto gɔɔn adayi ɔl ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar, ivitak nuyawa Yesu, ma avu anek nɛ, “Mayo arooŋnyet koota kutuguzeyin dayiin ci vardaŋinto ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anyak eet oma kutura ŋinaante. Ɔɔtɔ enektek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Azi alaani o demziinto nɛ, Izi iiten ci ka kadakta naana ki nuyak ogan dayiin o vardaŋinto ole cun e.”
Ɔɔtɔ ni didi nuyawa utuguzɔ kiyo ona aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ o, ma avɔ agɔɔn dayiin o vardaŋinto ŋinaante.
Ma yomana ivita Yesu ki nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram, ma aavtiz loota ka kadaktɔ.
Ma dayiinɛ ŋina enek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ataalinan tiŋeere ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ aneet.”
Mazi azii nuyawa gi nico, ivirit nɔɔgɔ dook zinzeeti. Ma ajin ceeni gɔɔn ŋaatineeŋ Yesu anek nɛ, “Aneeta gi? Manyi, aneeta gi?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔ tiŋeere ataalinan ɛɛti ci kazola ki nɔɔnɔ dayiin ŋina noko ɛlɛ.
Zin naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaan kadaai ebaal aduwan waragɛ o Joowo laadun e. Bar zin nɔŋ ci kol eete ci akɔ ataalinan aneet o. Abon da bar niini alaŋ aritai dook.”
Buk Judaz o ka kook kataalɔi Yesu e ijin buk nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, aneet gi?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa o.”
Mazi ŋaan adake niigi nɔkɔ, odoma Yesu ḏokoc, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt ḏokoc nico, ma aŋerek nuyak, ma azi nɛ, “Adayit. Nicini ɛlɛ onan nɛɛn.”
Bodo adoma diic ci nyaanu, ma anyek Jook zany, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Owodit niiga dook.
Nicigi biye ogan ayelza terkediin o Joowo aḏuutonek looc ka kutuyɔ ɔl ci meel, ma aaryai baciinowa ugeec.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ bodo naana kawodɛ ŋaatodoi ki igeet zɛɛ ma kavɔ kawudɛ baliinte o baaba.”
Artek ni niigi beniin codoi, ma iŋaaz avɔ biye o kazi Kiŋiroc.
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Adotekaŋ tija looc, ma aviryu niiga dook, eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Karui tiŋeere eet o towawiinto kazaantɛ ɛɛzana.
Zin tiŋeere ma kitiŋa naana daayiza, karake ŋaatunooŋ kakɔ Galiliya.”
Enico itiŋa Pitɔr, ma anek Yesu nɛ, “Alaŋ bai naana kooŋnekin looc been nɛɛn! Yo nuun avir nuyawa dook, alaŋ naana kavir.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, adaŋnyan tija lak iiyu zɛɛ ma arɔk toloci o oowu.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ bai naana kadaŋnyin been nɛɛn, mayo nuun mã ka kadaayit ki ineet.”
Ma buk aduwa nuyawa dook gi ci aduwa Pitɔr o.
Ivita ni Yesu ki nuyak ogin. Mazi avu arum ŋinti kazi Gezemani biye o kazi Kiŋiroc, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aavtiz ŋina rak ŋinti ŋaan kakɔ kaŋaryinɛ o.”
Ma akɔyi niini Pitɔr ki lɔgɔz o Zebedi kazi Jemis been Jɔn. Maje nɔɔnɔ avir ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kanyei naana ziniza inoni ci appe ɔrɔɔt ci ajonini daayizi. Aavtiz zin niiga ŋina ebeyit eleeti ŋaryiinta.”
Ma akɔ niini ŋintimiliny, ma akani ŋum looc, ma aŋaryɛ azi nɛ, “Baaba, mã anyak gɔl oma, aara piryakzɛt ci ka kiiyayan noko ŋaatan. Alaŋ een zin bar eo karɔɔŋɛ naana, bar tugu eo arɔɔŋɛ niina.”
Mazi abadaak nuyak ween iiyu e, amada nɔɔgɔ ataŋguzɔ. Ma anek niini Pitɔr nɛ, “Ma niiga dook iyontiya alaŋ atamanu kicintɛ ki aneet ziit codoi ṯɔr o naa?
Iziti vililɛ. Aŋaruyɔ ka calaŋ acinanuŋ Loryen zinzeeti zɛɛ ma agoonu oŋɛ. Eeci zinzeeti ugooc arɔɔŋ kutuguzɔ kaal ci abon, maje bar eleeti cugooc o alaŋ anyak dɔyiz.”
Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ imiirozek Yesu ŋaryiin. Ma akɔ ajin Jook anek nɛ, “Baaba, mã alaŋ piryakzɛt ci ka kiiyayan noko aaryai, tugu eo arooŋ niina labak.”
Mazi abada ŋaryiinta, amada bodo nuyak ataŋguzɔ, eeci adoŋ niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Bodo amiiri niini, ma akɔ aŋaryɛ aduwa zɔɔz we ɛlɛ.
Ma abadaak nuyak, ma aku anek nɛ, “Ŋaan dim ooginu nɔkɔ? Izi zin ziiti o ka kanyozekɛ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ɔl o oŋenu ajɔn.
Itiŋgaz, kɔtɔɔz. Icinit di, iiya ɛɛti o ka kook kataaloyan.”
Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz Yesu nɔkɔ, urum Judaz looc ɔrkɔra kibeen ɔl ci meel gɛr ci itoona alaata o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o Juz baayizo. Awoya niigi dilanyai ki kɛɛni.
Maje uyen Judaz enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Tedec mã acinu eet ci kacoco ŋalyamoc o, nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn agamit.”
Mazi aku arum Judaz looc, ook ŋaati Yesu ecodoi nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Abona, alaan o demziinto.” Ma acoco nɔɔnɔ ŋalyamoc.
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Laŋo, tugu gi ci arooŋ tugu o labak.”
Ivita ni ɔl, ma agam Yesu.
Ma avoca nuyaiti codoi nuyawe o aromɛ ki Yesu o kabaz tibila, ma atɛɛda gabarɛn ci alaan o ceez o Joowo itat por.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bil di! Arek kabaz cun noko tibil. Eeci ɔl o gɔɔn akat ɔl dilanyai dook adaai buk katin niigi dilanyai.
Alaŋ agayu mã inoko kawo baaba, itoonakan toonnyaye ogin ci meelik enico ɛlɛ kiiya kitiritan o?
Mazi koca avu atiritan toonnyawa aneet, ka zin zɔɔz o waragɛ o Joowo kɛlɛɛmnyai ku?”
Enek ni Yesu kɔlɛ dook nɛ, “Naa avunakaŋ kɛɛni ki dilanyai ka ivita agamtaŋ kiyo keen agoryai o naa? Karomɛ gɔɔn naana ki igeet tup kadɛmzɛ ceeze o Joowo, ma ŋaan agamtaŋ.
Bar zin kaala nicigi dook iina o ka kɛlɛɛmnyai zoozowa baal ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta e.”
Enico odokonyit nuyawa dook ŋina lai, otoŋtek Yesu doon looc.
Ooti ni ɔl ci ona agam Yesu o nɔɔnɔ ole o alaan o ceez o Joowo kazi Kayavas ŋaa ona alotɛn alaata o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok kibeen ɔl o Juz baayizo e.

Mazi avɔyi niigi Yesu, unuwun Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ vurta rɛɛna zɛɛ ma avɔ arum kɔrɔk ci Kayavas ona avɔyi ɔl Yesu o. Ook ni aavu niini loota oromtɛ ki ɔl o abɛk ceez o alaano kɔrɔk kɛŋa ka kicin gi ci arɔɔŋ kutuguzek ɔl Yesu o.
Maje alaata o ceez o Joowo ki ɔl o roonnyo dook arɔɔŋ gɔl ci ajowan gi ci gɛr abaca Yesu ka kɔɔt kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
Bar zin ɔkɔm gi ci gɛr ajowa niigi ŋaatin kina, yo nuun akat ɔl ci meelik gɛr nɔɔnɔ vɔlɔŋa o. Ma vurta itiŋgazɔ ɔl raman jena.
Ma anek ɔl o roonnyo vɔlɔŋa nɛ, “Kaziiŋna iiten baale azi ɛɛti nici nɛ, Kanim naana kɔɔyɔk ceez ci Joowo noko, ma bodo kenyeeti iinyaye ceen iiyu.”
Mazi azii Kayavas zɔɔz nico, itiŋa jena, ma anek Yesu nɛ, “Anyei gi ci arooŋ bariz zoozowe ci aduwa ɔl nici noko tɔ?”
Maje Yesu ajaki niini labak cin. Ma bodo anek alaani Yesu nɛ, “Inoko didi zaare o Jook o arogi duwayet mã een niina Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo ɛlɛ nɛɛn.”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa niina o. Inoko zin kaduwakuŋ igeet ci aavtiyu ŋina noko dook, acinaŋ tiŋeere niiga aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati kaavɛ aziite o Joowo azo, ma kabada tiŋeere ŋaati kawoyanɛ diizwani tamma.”

Mazi azii alaani zɔɔz nico, otobor nɔŋ, ma arɛɛc rumanɛ ogin maany, ma azi nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici amomoz Jook giye ci anyekɛ ɛlɛ kizi Jook noko. Inoko iziiktu niiga dook zɔɔz ci aduwa niini noko. Alaŋ bodo karɔɔŋ cudanɛ oogi.
Inoko zin arooŋnyu niiga apaktek nɔɔnɔ naa zooze nico?”
Ma azi niigi dook nɛ, “Abac niini gi nico ɔrɔɔt. Abon adaai.”
Otortek ni niigi nɔɔnɔ amot, ma arɔɔk.
Ma adoma ɔl ci ona aruk nɔɔnɔ voret noko, ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kiristo, aga ri niina kaal dook. Ŋɛnɛɛn ci arookin o?”
Maje Pitɔr aavi bitaala kɔrɔk kɛŋa. Ma aku dole ceen gabaren ci alaan o ceez o Joowo, ma anek Pitɔr nɛ, “Orkoryu ri buk gɔɔn niina kibeen Yesu ci Galili noko.”
Ma bar adaŋnyi Pitɔr ɔl dook kɔrgɛna ŋina anek dole nico nɛ, “Alaŋ kaga gi ci aduwa o been nɛɛn.”
Ma iŋaaz niini ŋina, ma akɔ araan otoga. Bodo icin dole ceen gabarɛn oman nɔɔnɔ, ma anek ɔl nɛ, “Ɔrkɔr gɔɔn buk ɛɛti nici ki Yesu o Nazarɛt.”
Bodo ni adaŋnyi Pitɔr azi nɛ, “Didilɛ kateedona zɔɔ, alaŋ kaga eet ci aduwa o been nɛɛn.”
Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ivitak ɔl o ɛɛl ŋinaante e Pitɔr, ma avu anek nɛ, “Niina alya een eet codoi ole o Yesu, eeci azooz kiyo niigi o.”
Ma abarzek bodo Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ mã kaduwa vɔlɔŋ, adaakan koca tammu. Alaŋ kaga eet nico.”
Enico ɛlɛ ɔrɔk toloci.
Ma aada Pitɔr gi baal anek Yesu nɛ, “Adaŋnyan tiŋeere lak iiyu zɛɛ ma arɔk toloci e.” Udun ni niini ook bitaala, ma akɔ alu ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna ivita alaata o ceezi o Joowo dook kibeen alaat o Juz abaabanit gɔl ci ka kurukti Yesu kadaak.
Acabit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn, ma avɔyi alaane ween Romen kazi Pailat.
Mazi akɔ acin Judaz apaktek ɔl Yesu daayiz, uwucek nɔɔnɔ gi nici ɔrɔɔt, ma abad mony. Ma amiironɛkɛ alaat guruc baal een eetom kamɔtɔ anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ ka kɛyɛlɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ Yesu e.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kabaca oŋec giye ci kanyuŋ eet ci abon noko, eeci inoko arooŋnyu uruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak.”
Ma ɛbɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm ageeta zɔɔz cinaaŋ. Nicini zɔɔz cun doon.”
Ujukek ni Judaz guruc ceez o Joowo kɛŋ. Ma adun, ma akɔ acabek alɛm kɛɛt.
Ɛvɛrta ni alaata o ceez o Joowo guruc ci ona ajukek Judaz ceez kɛŋ noko, ma anɔ nɛ, “Nicigi guruc ci biyetu. Alaŋ zin abon keere ona ŋaati karomi ki guruc o ceez o Joowo.”
Ma agama niigi dook ka kataalai guruc nicoko mana ci eet o gɔɔn ɛɛnyɛt ijunya ka kizi ŋinti gɔɔn adawi niigi ɔl ceen modo, matɛ gɔɔn adaai niigi Jerusalɛma.
Gi zin ci awɛ ɔl mana nice kizi Mana ci Biyetu zɛɛ been inoko o nɛɛn.
Zin gi baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Jirimaya e ɛlɛɛmnyai didi. Azi baale niini nɛ, “Ooti ɔl o Israyil guruc baal een eetom kamɔtɔ baal arɔɔŋ niigi ka kataalai nɔɔnɔ e,
ma avɔ ataalanɛ mana ci eet ci ɛɛnyɛt ijunya kiyo baale aduwakan Jooi e.”
Iiya ni ijin Pailat Yesu enek nɛ, “Ineet alaan o Juz nɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa niina o.”
Maje giye o akɔlaki alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Juz mayan nɔɔnɔ rooni vɔlɔŋa akɔm niini gi ci abariz kina.
Ma anek Pailat nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ kaal ci akanin ɔl ineet noko azii?”
Bar Yesu akɔm gi ci abariz kina. Ma giye nico ibiir alaan ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt.
Maje gɔɔn baale laadun ma aku iiteni o aadanɛ ɔl o Juz vardaŋinɛt, ɔɔga alaani eet codoi ole o acabje ci tɛ olla arɔɔŋ ɔl nɔɔnɔ kɔɔgjai.
Zin iitene nice anyak eet ci gɛr acabji giye ci amonyi niini ɔl, ma aga ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ kazi zaar cigin nɛ Barabas.
Mazi avɔ alotai kɔlɛ dook, ijin Pailat nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ kɔɔgayuŋ Barabas yo kɔɔgayuŋ da Yesu o kazi Kiristo?”
Maje Pailat aga nɔkɔ anyaak alaata ci Juz nɔɔnɔ Yesu o, eeci amadik niigi nɔɔnɔ gaga nɔkɔ, kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr agɔɔn.

Mazi ŋaan aavi Pailat roonnya nɔkɔ, itoonak ŋaa oninɛ ɔlɔ nɔɔnɔ otok ci azi nɛ, “Má agoonei eet nico gi ci gɛr been nɛɛn, eeci kapirna bilija avunakan wunozya ci akati nɔɔnɔ, ma awucnekan niini ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
Maje alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Juz baayizo ayɔɔta ɔl ceen kɔlɛ o ka kuduktak Pailat kɔɔga Barabas. Maje Yesu abon apawonek nɔɔnɔ daayizi.
Ma ajin Pailat kɔlɛ anek nɛ, “Mayo ole ceen ram noko arooŋnyaŋ kɔɔgayuŋ jaŋ?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Karooŋnyin ɔɔgayet Barabas.”
Ma bodo ajin Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma Yesu ci kazi Kiristo o kutuguwek naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi dook Pailat anek nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ talakeca kadaak.”
Abɛdɛkɛ bodo Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abaca niini gitaz?”
Bar enico egerenyit niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ.”

Mazi akɔ acin Pailat ɔkɔma gɔl ci ɔɔganɛ Yesu, ma otoborit ɔl dook nɔŋ nɔkɔ, abaaban izi nɛ, karabɔŋ tedec agɔɔn ɔl gi ci gɛr, odoma ni maam otoony azɛɛn nɔɔgɔ ŋuma, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔmnan aneet gi can daayize ci eet nico o. Gi cunooŋ doon nici. Alaŋ naana kawoyɛ tɔ.”
Mazi aduwa Pailat gi nico, egerenyit niigi dook aziti nɛ, “Anyek biye cigin o kivitayet ageeta ki dɔl ci dɔl cigaacak labak.”
Ɔɔgak ni Pailat nɔɔgɔ Barabas. Ma aduwak ɔl rak korooyit Yesu zɛɛ anyek ni nɔɔnɔ kɔɔt kotodeec niigi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec.
Ooti ni takirnya Yesu ole o alaano, ma avɔ aliya niigi dook nɔɔnɔ.
Ma aburuca nɔɔnɔ rumanɛ ogin, ma aborcɛkɛ rum ci meeri.

Ma agɔɔna nyigirgir ceen bila, ma avu aborcɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ. Ma anyek kɛɛt kanyak aziite ci azo o kiyo kɛɛt o gɔɔn anyak ɛɛti ween alaan o. Ma avu amomoz niigi nɔɔnɔ akanek kozoŋtin kiyo alaani o. Ma azi nɛ, “Rok bai nɔkɔ kodot, alaan o Juz.”
Ma oortek niigi nɔɔnɔ amot, ma aama kɛɛt we bodo, ma arooi nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ.
Mazi ijezit kaal ci ona amomozi niigi nɔɔnɔ noko dook, uburuca rum ci meeri noko, ma arikɛ nɔɔnɔ rum onin laadun e. Ooti ni niigi nɔɔnɔ kutur bitaala ka kɔɔt kotodeec kadaak talakeca.
Mazi aduŋni niigi nɔɔnɔ, urumtɔ gɔla kibeen eet ci kazi Saiman ci looc ci kazi Sariin. Adaŋtek ni niigi nɔɔnɔ kitik kɛɛt ci Yesu een talakec o.
Ma avunak niigi ŋinti kazi Golgoza. Ma kɛŋ ci zaar ci kazi Golgoza noko kazi nɛ amɛn ci oowu.
Ma ŋinaante anycek niigi Yesu nyaan ci acanɔ ki agɛrɔ ci akaka. Mazi atar niini, otobor alaŋaan awot.
Otodooc ni niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante. Ma aŋerek rumanɛ ogin eleeti ŋaati agɔɔni maadico.
Mazi akɔ odotiz, aavtiyɔ niigi ŋinaante ebeyit nɔɔnɔ.
Maje keete ci ona adodinɛ Yesu noko tadena ayeedi niigi gi ci ona aruyi ɔl nɔɔnɔ o azi nɛ, “Nicini Yesu ween alaan o Juz.”
Ma anyaa buk bodo niigi ɔl ceen agoryak een ram, ma avu adɔdɔ codoi nɔɔnɔ eci azo o, maje codoi adɔdɔ eci kaŋeto o.
Maje ɔl ci olla awɔ gɔla ararni Yesu zɛɛ ma arurut ooti, ma amomoz nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ,
“Ma baale azi nɛ, Ka ɔyɔk ceez o Joowo, ma bodo ɛɛnyca iinyaye ceen iiyu. Rogoz zin di ɛlɛ. Mã een ŋɛɛrti Joowo didi, duna di keete ci adodinɛ noko looc.”
Maje buk alaata o ceez o Joowo, ki alaat o ademzek ɔl lotinok, been ɔl o Juz baayizo amomoz buk niigi nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ.
Ma anɔ nɛ, “Arogoz niini ɔl oogi doon, ma bar alaŋ anim korogoz ɛlɛ cin o maany. Alaŋ een niini alaan o Israyil nɛɛn? Mã aduŋnak looc keete ceen talakec adodinɛ noko, katu koca naaga dook nɔɔnɔ.
Atu niini Jook, ma atarkat gi ci azi nɛ, Een niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo. Kicinit zin di mã ɛɛla Jooi inoko nɔɔnɔ.”
Mayo nuun een ɔl ween agoryak adɔdɔ ɔl ki nɔɔnɔ e amomoz buk nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ abil ii boloca, izi lɔɔci dook dildil kizi muur ziik iiyu.
Ma ziiye ween iiyu yomana ɛgɛrɛny Yesu molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Eli, Eli, Lema Sabaktani?” Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico azi nɛ, Jook onan, Jook onan. Ooŋnan naa?
Mazi azii ɔl ogɛn ole ci ɛɛl ŋinaante gi nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Awo bɔŋ niini Ilija.”
Ma adɔkɔny ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ, ma akɔ adoma kaviyoi, ma ajukek nyaan, ma akat moroka, ma itoonek nɔɔnɔ ka kococo.
Maje bar ɔl ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Bil rak di, kicinit karabɔŋ aku arogoz Ilija nɔɔnɔ.”
Ɛgɛrɛny ni Yesu bodo molowe ci appe, ma atɛɛt enico ɛlɛ.
Ma areeci rum o gɔɔn aŋerin ceez o Joowo kɔrgɛna enico ɛlɛ, akanai tadena been tir loota. Maje lɔɔci amɔɔt kirakirak, ma alibe biyɛn taza.
Ma akoli looknya o gabara o Joowo titiny baal gɔɔn adaai e. Ma aŋaaz ci meelik ŋaatineeŋ daayiza korogit.
Ma aduŋna niigi looknyai. Mazi iŋaaz Yesu daayiza, ɔtɔɔzɔ niigi ɔɔt Jerusalɛma, ma avɔ acin ɔl ci meel gɛr nɔɔgɔ.
Mazi acin alaani o takirnyawu kibeen takirnya ogin abɛk Yesu e looc mɔɔtiz kibeen kaal nicoko dook, otoŋole niigi looc ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ ɛɛti nici tɛ ŋɛɛrti Joowo gi.”
Maje ŋinaante anyak ŋaai ci meel gɛr baal anowa Yesu Galiliya, ma atirit nɔɔnɔ e. Agɛlɛm niigi Yesu rɛɛna.
Ma ŋaai nici awɔyi Meri o kutur o kazi Magdala, ki bodo Meri ween yaati Jemis been Josev, kibeen yaati Jemis ki Jɔn.
Ma yomana iiya ɛɛti ceen aroi kazi zaar nɛ Josev ci aluuga baale Arimatiya. Niini buk nuyai ci Yesu.
Ma akɔ ajin Pailat ka kanyek nɔɔnɔ Yesu kook kada. Ma aricanek Pailat ɔl ka kanycek Yesu Josev.
Odoma ni Josev ɛlɛ o Yesu atakucek rum ci vɔɔr colai.
Ma akɔ arek bɔɔt onin baal agoonak niini ɛlɛ maany biya e, zɛɛ anyaa ni bɛ ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma aku anyoogi bɔɔt otok. Zɛɛ ɔɔtɔ ni niini.
Maje Meri o Magdala ki Meri oma bodo aavtiz ŋinaante agɛlɛm bɔɔt rɛɛna.
Ma ŋeertine co ɔɔtɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo ki ɔl o Parici ŋaati Pailat.
Ma avɔ anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manygɔn, azi baale voloŋoiti nici iinyaye baal ŋaan arogni e nɛ, Kiŋaaz bodo iima daayiza iinyaye ceen iiyu.

Inoko zin karooŋnyin anyek takirnya kɔɔt kebeyit bɔɔt juruŋ zɛɛ ma adicai iinya ceen iiyu baal aduwa niini o, ka calaŋ avɔ agɔrɔz nuyawa oginɛ, ma avɔ anek ɔl nɛ, Itiŋa niini daayiza. Mã agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ, izi koca vɔlɔŋ cineeŋ o appe ɔrɔɔt bar kujuk baal aduwa niini e, ma uulalet.”
Ma anek Pailat nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek zin takirnya kɔɔt kebeyit bɔɔt juruŋ.”
Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi ɔɔt boote o adawin Yesu e, ma avɔ agiir bɔɔt otok dook lai juruŋ ka kɔkɔm eet ci akɔl, ma ooŋnek takirnya ŋinite kebeyit.
Ma iitene o yubzento ŋeere ririwɔna ook Meri o Magdala been bodo Meri oma ka kɔɔt kicinit bɔɔt.
Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɔtɔɔmɔ lɔɔci dook kirakirak. Ma akunak toonnyaiti ci Joowo looc tamma, ma aku aara bɛ baal anyoogi ɔl bɔɔt otok e, ma aavɛ.
Maje ŋum ci toonnyai nico o alanyit kiyo abadi bɔrɔyɛ o, ma vɔɔrɛ rumanɛ ciginɛ o pɛr.
Ma aruk takirnya o abɛk bɔɔt e kulurkuluri, kabaritit, ma iina kataŋguzɔ kiyo ɔl o adaai o.
Ma azoozek toonnyaiti ŋaai anek nɛ, “Má aŋolinu looc gaga. Kaga nɔkɔ avu arooŋnyu Yesu baal adɔdi talakeca e.
Azee zin niini tɔ ŋina. Itiŋa daayiza ebaal aduwan niini e ɛlɛ. Ivita di icinit ŋinbaal ɔɔŋɛ e ce.

Iyiiyit zin inoko taman ɔɔtɔ uduktak nuyak ogin enektek nɛ, Itiŋa niini daayiza. Ma inoko arayɛ ŋaatunooŋ ook Galiliya. Avɔ tedec acinu niiga nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante. Inoko zin gi ci kaduwakuŋ dook nɛɛn nici.”
Iyiit ni ŋaai nici ɔtɔɔzɔ bɔɔta ŋina ŋoliinta, maje ŋaato atalnɛ. Ma adɔkɔny ka kɔɔt kuduktak nuyak.
Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɔbɔryak Yesu nɔɔgɔ boyoŋyoŋ, ma anek nɛ, “Abonanu. Abil ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ.” Ma avunak niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma avu atorkot zɔɔ, ma adiŋdiŋan.
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má aŋolinu looc gaga. Ɔɔtɔ uduktak nuyak kivita kɔɔt Galiliya. Ŋaan avɔ acinan niigi aneet ŋinaante.”
Mazi ŋaan awɔ ŋaai gɔla nɔkɔ, odokonyit takirnya ogɛn takirnyaye ona abɛk bɔɔt e ɔɔtɔ Jerusalɛma, ma avɔ aduwak alaat o ceez o Joowo kaal ona acin niigi agooni e dook.
Mazi azii alaata gi nico, ulute niigi dook ki alaat o Juz ŋaatodoi, ma abaabana zɔɔz codoi. Ivita ni otoloyit takirnya anycek guruc ci meelik gɛr.
Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã ajinuŋ ɔl, enektek nɛ, Ivita nuyawa o Yesu ogorozit nɔɔnɔ bɔɔta baal ŋaati koogina.
Mã arum alaan zɔɔz nici, ŋaan kavɔ kazoozona ki ageeta. Má anyaku ŋoliin gaga zooze nico.”
Agamta ni takirnya guruc nicoko, ma avɔ aduwa vɔlɔŋ eona aduwakɛ alaata e. Zin vɔlɔŋ cineeŋ noko uteec ɔl o Juz zɛɛ been waanico o.
Ma avɔ nuyawa ween amɔtɔ codoi biye o abil Galiliya ŋaabaal aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ ka kooti e.
Mazi avɔ acin niigi Yesu, ŋinaante idiŋdiŋanit nɔɔnɔ. Maje ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ ŋaan bakbayɛ nɔkɔ.
Ma icayak Yesu nɔɔgɔ ajonun, ma anek nɛ, “Anyozozeyan alaazɛt dook tammu tadena been loota aneet.
Ɔɔtɔ zin ole o loocok dook ka anycek nɔɔgɔ kiziti nuyak cigan. Otoonyit nɔɔgɔ zaare o baaba ki zaare ogan aneet ŋɛɛrin been zaare o Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
Ɔɔtɔ edemezit nɔɔgɔ ka kuzuuti kaal ci karicanekuŋ naana igeet noko dook. Abon zin niiga agayu karomɛ tiŋeere naana ki igeet tup nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci.”
Mark: Nici kanaan ci kaviyak o colai akati Yesu Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo.
Akanai zin ebaal ayɛɛdi nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya zɔɔz o aduwa Jooi waanbaal anɛ nɛ, “Ŋaan tiŋeere kitoon gabaren can rak karayɛ ineet ɔɔwa ka kook kidimdimɛn gɔl.
Ma aku agɛrɛny ɛɛti nici balala azi nɛ, Idimdimantek eleeti gɔl o Manyi. Amadek nɔɔnɔ golok ogin keelit tɔp.”
Zin mazi aku Jɔn e, iiya abaak niini balala, ma uuwak gi ci ka kabadai ɔl oŋɛnɛ ka kotoonycɛ niigi ka kaara Jooi oŋɛ ugeec.
Zin enice ivitak ɔl dook Jɔn looce o kazi Judiya ki kuture o kazi Jerusalɛm ka kiziiyit nɔɔnɔ, ma avu abɔra niigi oŋɛ ugeec, ma oony Jɔn nɔɔgɔ liile o kazi Jordan.
Maje Jɔn waanice amalik rum ci agɔɔnnyai imane ci nyakalo been kavali ceen ruceen barkɔnya. Ma adak niini giroc been lɛtɛ ci ajowa tuuwa.
Ma uuwak niini waanice zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Vurte can anyak tiŋeere eet ci aku ci adiŋdiŋ kujukan aneet. Ma alaŋ kaganona naana ŋaati kaborcanɛ nɔɔnɔ caava ogin zoonu, eeci adiŋdiŋ niini ɔrɔɔt ŋaatan.
Inoko kuunyuŋ naana igeet maami doon, aje bar niini ŋaan aku uunyuŋ igeet Vɔŋize o Joowo.”
Ma iinyaye niceke iiya Yesu kuture o kazi Nazarɛt abil looce o Galili, ma akɔ oony Jɔn nɔɔnɔ liile o kazi Jordan.
Mazi akɔ aduŋna Yesu maami, enico ɛlɛ ɔkɔlɛ tammu kɛŋ, ma acin niini Vɔŋiz o Joowo akunak nɔɔnɔ kiyo yɛɛlac o.
Ma azi mɔlɔyi ci aku tamma nɛ, “Een niina ŋɛɛran o kareezin nɛɛn. Katalnɛ naana ŋaatun ɔrɔɔt.”
Enico ɛlɛ itoonek Vɔŋizi o Joowo Yesu balal.
Ma akɔ aavi niini balala ŋinaante iinya eet ram, ma acina Loryenti nɔɔnɔ. Maje ŋinaante anyak kɛlɛk ci too, bar zin ivita itiritit toonnyawa o Joowo nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ acap ɔl Jɔn, itiŋa Yesu ook Galiliya, ma akɔ uuwak kaviyak o Joowo ŋinaante.
Ma anek niini ɔl nɛ, “Inoko iiya iiteni, ma izi buk baliin o Joowo ajɔn. Otoŋit zin oŋɛ ugoocok agoonu, bar ivita utuweec kaviyak o Joowo abon.”
Mazi akɔ awɔ Yesu liile o kazi Galili otoga, icinun niini ɔl ceen ram, Saiman kibeen gɔtɔni ci kazi Andoru. Adɛt niigi kuluk cabaya.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Unuyawaŋ. Ŋaan kakɔ kademzekuŋ naana igeet gɔl ci ka edetakɛ ɔl Jook.”
Enico ɛlɛ otoŋit niigi cabayɛt ugeec, ma ano nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi iicak niigi ŋintimiliny, icin bodo Yesu Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Zebedi ki gɔtɔni o kazi Jɔn. Aavtiz niigi kavoole abutan cabayɛt ugeec.
Mazi acin Yesu nɔɔgɔ, otowa enico ɛlɛ. Ma ooŋnek niigi baatineeŋ Zebedi kavool ki ɔl o liŋliŋonto, ma ano niigi Yesu.
Ma avunak Yesu ki nuyak nicoko kutur o kazi Kapernam. Ma iitene o yubzento kazi Sabit, ook Yesu ceeze o lotento, ma akɔ adɛmɛz niini ɔl ŋinaante.
Ma abiir ɔl o azii nɔɔnɔ ooti gole ci adɛmzi niini nɔɔgɔ o, eeci demziin cinɛ o alaŋ atobɔ ki demziin ci alaat o ademzek ɔl lotinok, bar adɛmzɛ niini kizi eet o didi anyak dɔyiz.
Ma ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ, iiya ɛɛti ci anyak miniŋ ci Loryento ceez o lotento, ma agɛrɛny miniŋa nici eete nico molowe ci appe azi nɛ,
“Yesu o kutur o Nazarɛt, arooŋ ŋaatinaaŋ naa? Akun o ka ija uulalet? Kagayin naaga ineeta nɔkɔ akun niina Joowa.”
Ma agernyek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ajaktɔ. Udunta bitaala eete nico.”
Ma amɔɔni miniŋa nici eet nico kabarit kɛdɛkɛdɛk, ma agɛrɛny niini molowe ci appe, ma aduŋna miniŋa nici ŋaatin.
Ma abiir ɔl ooti tɛt, ma ajinɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Mayo gitaz nici? Demziin ci colai? Ɛɛti nici anyak dɔyiz ci agɛrnyɛkɛ miniŋ o Loryento, ma azii niigi nɔɔnɔ.”
Taman nɔkɔ iziiyit ɔl gi ci agɔɔn Yesu noko looce o Galili dook.
Mazi aduŋna Yesu ki nuyak ceeze o lotento, ɔɔtɔ niigi ole o Saiman ki Andoru. Ma ɔrkɔr buk niigi ki Jemis been Jɔn.
Maje inyik o Saiman amɔɔr anyak tadiwɔn ci ɔɔŋɛ kuwena nɔkɔ. Taman nɔkɔ mazi arum Yesu ŋinite, uduktak ɔl nɔɔnɔ mɔɔriz cin o.
Ook ni Yesu ŋaatin, ma akɔ agam nɔɔnɔ aziit, ma adɔŋa kaavu jena. Enico ɛlɛ izi maya, ma agoonek niini nɔɔgɔ dayiin.
Mazi akɔ ii loota yomana, anyaaktak ɔl Yesu ɔl ci meelik amɔɔr kibeen buk ɔl ci anyak miniŋ ci Loryento.
Ma avu ɔl dook kuture nice, ma alotonek ceez ci ona aavɛ Yesu o reerun.
Ma arogoz niini ɔl ci meelik anyak moorizok keŋti dook. Ma atɔɔk niini miniŋ ci Loryento ole ci meelik. Ma alaŋ anyek niini miniŋ o Loryento kozoozit, eeci aga niigi nɔɔnɔ niini ŋɛnɛɛn.
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna icinɛ Yesu, ma adun akɔ ŋaati akɔm ɔl, ma akɔ aŋaryɛ niini doon ŋinaante.
Ma vurta itiŋgazɔ Saiman kibeen gɔnɔgi oogi, ma avɔ arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi avɔ ajowa niigi nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Ajal ɔl dook arooŋnyin ineeta.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abon rak kavɔ naaga kuturyowe ogɛn ajonun ŋaato ka kook buk kuuwak ŋinaante, eeci nici gi o kakunai naana laadun nɛɛn.”
Ɔɔtɔ ni niini, ma akɔ ɔzɔp looc o Galili dook. Uuwak ceezine o lotento, ma atɔɔk miniŋ o Loryento ole ci meelik ŋinaante.
Ma akunak ɛɛti ci anyak mɔɔriz ci gidaŋ Yesu, ma aku aavek nɔɔnɔ loota kɔpɔkpɔk, ma ilalek anek nɛ, “Manyi, mã arooŋ rogozan kizi maya, rogozan.”
Ma awucnek Yesu zɔɔz nici, ma ataadek nɔɔnɔ aziit, ma anek nɛ, “Nyan kitiritin. Inoko ɔkɔma mɔɔriz nico ŋaatun.”
Taman nɔkɔ izi didi ɛɛti nici maya mɔɔriza kigirgir ɛlɛ oninɛ.

Ma aricanek Yesu eet nico anek nɛ, “Má akɔ aduwai eet oma gɔla gi nico. Bar dicek bitɔ yelek ɛlɛ alaan o ceez o Joowo ka kagayin ɔl dook didi inoko izɛ niina maya. Buk bitɔ taap Jook eo aduwan lotinowa o Mosis.” Anyek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ kɔtɔɔ.

Ma aricanek Yesu eet nico anek nɛ, “Má akɔ aduwai eet oma gɔla gi nico. Bar dicek bitɔ yelek ɛlɛ alaan o ceez o Joowo ka kagayin ɔl dook didi inoko izɛ niina maya. Buk bitɔ taap Jook eo aduwan lotinowa o Mosis.” Anyek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ kɔtɔɔ.

Bar mazi akɔ niini ɔlɔ, ook enek ɔl ci meelik nɛ, “Yesu nɛɛn o anyan aneet kizi maya.” Ma giye nico alaŋaan Yesu ayelzak ɔl ɛlɛ kuturyowɛ. Bar aavu niini balala ka kɔɔt ɔl o avu kuturyowɛ dook ŋaatin ŋinaante.
Mazi amiironek Yesu Kapernam iinyaye ogɛn, iziiyit ɔl nɔɔnɔ iiyak kɔrɔk.
Ma alotai ɔl ci meelik ŋinaante, ma abitiz ceez eecitɔ kibeen bitaala buk kɔkɔm ŋinti karek zooc kina. Uuwayek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz o Joowo.
Ma avu ɔl ceen wec anyaak Yesu eet ci rɛbrɛbi.
Mazi avɔ acin niigi mɛɛlɛ ɔl, ma akɔm gɔl ci ka kurumti eet nico Yesu, otoodi niigi nɔɔnɔ ceez taden, ma avɔ akɔl ceez ɔɔ, ma abɔranɛ nɔɔnɔ ceez ɔɔ kuwena kolocak Yesu ŋaati ona aavɛ o.
Mazi acin Yesu nɔɔgɔ atuwe ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔ, enek eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, “Ŋɛɛran, aaryai oŋɛ ugune.”
Maje ŋinaante anyak ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek gɔnɔgi lotinok, ma abaaban niigi zinzeetinɛ gi ci anɔ nɛ,
“Azɔɔz ɛɛti nici nɔkɔ naa? Amomoz niini Jook. Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anim kaara oŋɛ? Alaŋ een Jook doon?”
Maje Yesu aga baabani cineeŋ o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔ ma abaabanu gi nico nɔkɔ o naa?
Yo aboke ŋaatunooŋ ŋaati kanɛkɛ eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, Aaryai oŋɛ ugune, yo da aboke ŋaati kanɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, Tiŋa jena. Doma kuwen cun o, tɔ.
Karooŋ zin inoko keyeleyuŋ igeet ka agaac niiga keen naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto, ma kanyei dɔyiz loota ŋina ci kaaranɛ oŋɛ ɔla been ci karogozɛ ɔl mɔɔrizɔi.”
Enico enek niini eet ci rɛbrɛbi noko nɛ, “Tiŋa jena. Doma kuwen cun o. Bitɔ ɔlɔ.”

Ma iŋaaz didi niini jena ɔl kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ, ma adoma kuwen onin, ma awɔ. Mazi acin ɔl eet o rɛbrɛbi e awɔ didi, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti, ma anaat Jook, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ŋaanbaal rɛɛn laadun ŋaan kicinit gi ci abil nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.”
Zin imiirozek Yesu bodo liil o Galili. Ma avunak ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ, ma adɛmɛz niini nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante.

Mazi odotiz niini demziinta, iicak bodo kidicilim, ma gɔla icin niini Livai ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz aavi ŋaao meeryo, eeci gɔɔn laadun niini eet ci alot meeri. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ija, nowawan aneet.” Ma iŋaaz Livai, ma ano nɔɔnɔ.

Ŋintimiliny ɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin ɔɔtɔ ole o Livai ka kɔɔtɔ kadayit dayiin o baalinu ŋinaante. Ma avu buk ɔl ci meelik ole o gɔɔn alot meeri kibeen ɔl o oŋenu oogi, ma ano Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin, ma avɔ azɔlɔ kibeen nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante.
Mazi avɔ acin alaata o Parici demziinto Yesu azɔlɔ kibeen ɔl o meeryo been ɔl o oŋenu oogi, ijinit niigi nuyak ogin enektek nɛ, “Azɔlɔ Yesu ki ɔl nicoko naa?”

Mazi azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn ɔl calaŋ amɔɔr alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi akim. Maje ɔl o amɔɔr arɔɔŋ niigi akim. Alaŋ zin laadun kakun naana ka kiiya kotowa ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o abon, bar kakun ka kiiya kotowa ɔl o oŋenu.”

Ma iitene oman otoŋit nuyawa o Jɔn kibeen ɔl o Parici dayiin ka kidiŋdiŋanit Jook. Ivita ni ɔl ogɛn, ma avu ajin Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma dim gɔɔn nuyawa o Jɔn kibeen ɔl o Parici ooŋ dayiin, maje bar nuyawa cugune o alaŋ ooŋ buk niigi dayiin o naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko gɔɔn ma iiŋkayi ɔl, anyek niigi bacok kaavtiyɔ magizɛt? Bar kanɛ, Akɔm! Ŋinti ŋaan rak aromɛn niigi kibeen eet ci rociinto o dook, alaŋ rak niigi aavtiz magizɛt.
Bar zin ŋaan aku iiteni ci ka kaaryai ɛɛti ci rociinto o ŋaatineeŋ. Mazi aku iiteni nica, ŋaan zin aavtiz niigi magizɛt.”
Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm eet ci abutanek rum ci rɛɛn gɔn ci colai. Mã koca agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, arɛɛcai koca rum ci rɛɛn o gone ci colai o kizi vɔlɔŋ ɔrɔɔt bar kujuk reecinɛt baal oowu e.”

Ma anek Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm buk eet ci arek iira buru ci rɛɛn. Mã koca agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, adɛ koca iirana, ma alip buru. Ma aḏuuti iirana, ma alibe burwɛ buk. Bar abon arek ɛɛti iira buru ci colai.”
(Aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ zoozok nicoko o ka keyelizak niini nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz calaŋ abon ŋaati aromi niigi zoozok o Joowo colai kibeen kɛɛranɛ ugeec rɛɛn.)
Ma iitene o kazi Sabit yubzento awɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin, ma avɔ abatak manɛɛn ci labinu. Ma aduula nuyawa oginɛ labi ci miliny, ma arom.
Ma anek ɔl ci Parici Yesu nɛ, “Cin di nuyak cugun o! Abacit niigi lotinɛt o azi nɛ, Má aliŋliŋnyu iitene o yubzento.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan ekeebit niiga zɔɔz baal agɔɔn Devid iitene baal adayi nɔɔgɔ magiz e?

Waanice adak magiz nɔɔnɔ kibeen ɔl ogin ɔrkɔr. Ɔɔtɔ ni ceeze o Joowo, ma avɔ adak ḏɔkɛn baal gɔɔn ataabi ɔl Jook e. Ma gi nici agooni waanbaal ɛɛnɛ ɛɛti o kazi Abazar alaan ci adikir ceeze o Joowo. Ma kɛɛrite ogaac alaŋ ḏɔkɛn ci taabinto noko ɔl ci gaga adak, bar adak alaata o ceez o Joowo doon. Adak zin waanice Devid ḏɔkɛn niceke labak, ma buk anyek niini oogi ɔl ogin ɔrkɔr.”
Ma anek Yesu ɔl o Parici nɛ, “Agɔɔna zin laadun Jooi iiten ci yubzento o ka kitirit ɔl ci deer. Alaŋ bar agɔɔna Jooi ɔl ci deer ka kuzuuti iiten ci yubzento o.
Zin naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keen Manyi ci kaal dook kurum buk iiten ci yubzento o.”
Ma iitene oman mazi akɔ Yesu ceeze o lotento, anyak buk eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti ŋinaante.

Maje ɔl ci Parici ogɛn aavtiz ŋinaante arɔɔŋ niigi gɔl ci ka kɔkɔltakɛ Yesu rooni mã anyak niini gi ci abac. Ivita ni ataŋaamtek niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ka kicinit mã didi atirit niini eet nico iitene ci yubzento o.
Enek ni Yesu eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti noko nɛ, “Ija. Bil ɔl ŋuma ŋaato.”

Ma ajin Yesu ɔl anek nɛ, “Mayo gɔɔn lotinowa ogaac aziineket kutuguz gitaz iitene ci yubzento o? Kitiritit ɔl yo kɛgɛrɛzanit da? Korogozit ɔl yo kuulalit da?” Mazi azii niigi zɔɔz nico, olla azi paŋ, kɔkɔm gi ci abariz.

Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nɔɔgɔ bornɛt nɔŋa. Bar bodo iinon ziniza nɔɔgɔ, eeci adɔi nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti kak. Ma anek niini eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti noko nɛ, “Zɔlan aziit cun o.” Mazi ɔzɔlan ɛɛti nici aziit, obona aziiti oninɛ labak.
Enico ɛlɛ udunitɔ ɔl o Parici ceeze o lotento, ma avɔ abaaban niigi kibeen ɔl o alaan o kazi Erod gɔl ci arui Yesu kadaak.

Ma avɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin liile o kazi Galili. Ma ano kɔlɛ ci appe nɔɔnɔ. Maje ɔl nicigi avu looce o kazi Galili ki Judiya ki Jerusalɛm ki Idumiya ki Tayor ki Sidon kibeen baagite o liil o kazi Jordan. Avunak niigi dook Yesu o, eeci azii niigi kaal o agɔɔn niini.

Ma avɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin liile o kazi Galili. Ma ano kɔlɛ ci appe nɔɔnɔ. Maje ɔl nicigi avu looce o kazi Galili ki Judiya ki Jerusalɛm ki Idumiya ki Tayor ki Sidon kibeen baagite o liil o kazi Jordan. Avunak niigi dook Yesu o, eeci azii niigi kaal o agɔɔn niini.
Mazi acin Yesu kɔlɛ appe ɔrɔɔt, ma ɛɛt nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, uduwak niini nuyak ogin kanyaakta nɔɔnɔ kavool o liilu kizi ajɔn, ka mã ayɔɔt ɔl nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt, ka kɛɛlai ɛlɛ.
Agɔɔn nɔkɔ o, eeci uyene atirit niini ɔl ci meelik amɔɔr, ma giye nico ivita ɔl o amɔɔr dook, ma ayɔɔtɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci arɔɔŋ kuumit niigi nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi olla acin ɔl o anyak miniŋ ci Loryento nɔɔnɔ, iina niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛŋa, ma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Een niina ŋɛɛrti Joowo nɛɛn.”
Ma aricanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Má ayelzanaŋ aneeta ŋaati awuyaŋ kizi ŋɛɛrti Joowo.”
Ma vurta otoodozek Yesu biyɛn, ma ŋinaante otowa ɔl ci arɔɔŋ niini. Ma avunak niigi nɔɔnɔ.
Ma aŋɛra ŋaatineeŋ ɔl ceen amɔtɔ ram kizi toonnyak cigin ka gɔɔn korkorit ki nɔɔnɔ, ka buk gɔɔn kitoon kɔɔt kuuwayit zɔɔz o Joowo.
Ma anyek niigi nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz ci ka kɔtɔɔkti miniŋ o Loryento ɔla.
Zaar zin ci toonnyak ceen amɔtɔ ram baal aŋɛra niini o nɛɛn ce. Saiman o kazi zaar oogi nɛ Pitɔr,
ki Jemis ki gɔtɔni o kazi Jɔn o eegin lɔgɔz o Zebedi (Akanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ dook ramantiya zaar ci kazi nɛ Ɔl o Aŋozonek Zɔɔz),
ki Andoru, ki Pilip, ki Bartalamu, ki Matiyu, ki Tomaz, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz, ki Tadiyaz, ki Saiman o gɔɔn ɔɔrinɛ looc onin ole o Rom,
been Judaz Iskariyot baal ka kiiya kataalɔi Yesu e.
Ma vurte nice ook Yesu ɔlɔ. Ma bodo alotak ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ ki nuyak ogin zɛɛ makacin ɔkɔma nɔɔgɔ waŋi ci adayin.
Mazi azii atenowa oginɛ kaal nicoko, ɔɔtɔ niigi ŋaatin ka kɔɔt kanyaaktak nɔɔnɔ kɔrɔk, eeci anɔ ɔl ogɛn nɛ, “Anyawun niini maŋɔn.”
Mazi buk avu alaata o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok Jerusalɛma, izitɔ nɛ, “Anyak niini alya Loryen. Anyewun nɔɔnɔ alaani o miniŋu kazi Baalzibol dɔyiz ci ka kɔtɔɔyi niini miniŋ o Loryento ɔla.”
Otowa ni Yesu ɔl, ma aduwak nɔɔgɔ yabziinta gi ci anek nɛ, “Alaŋ Loryenti atɔɔk gɔn oma ci buk een Loryen kiyo niini o.
Gɔɔn mã aŋɛrɔ ɔl ci looc codoi, ma ɔɔrɔ niigi maany, alibe lɔɔci nici lai.
Buk mã aŋɛrɔ ɔl ci kɔrɔk codoi, ma ayɔwɔ niigi maany, kɔrɔgi nici alibe.
Zin buk mã aŋɛr Loryenti miniŋ ogin, ma ayɔwɔ niigi maany, adicai koca dɔyizi cinɛ o.
Akɔm laadun eet ci akɔ agɔrzɛ ceeze ci eet ci mooti adɔi, dooke coma koca rak adɔɔn niini nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ ka zin vurta kiiya kooyi niini kaal ci eet ci mooti adɔi noko.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, anim Jooi kotoŋ oŋɛ o abaca ɔl ŋaatin dook kibeen buk zoozok ugeec gɛr gɔɔn amomozɛnɛ.
Maje eete ci amomoz Vɔŋiz o Joowo, alaŋ Jooi ooŋ oŋec nico ŋaatin been nɛɛn, eeci abaca niini oŋec ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ibil nɔkɔ izi nɛɛn.”
Aduwa Yesu zɔɔz nico o, eeci azi ɔl ogɛnɛ nɛ, “Anyak niini miniŋit ci Loryento alya.”
Zin ivita gɔtɔnɔgi Yesu kibeen yaatin, ma avu ɛɛl bitaala, ma itoon niigi eet oma kutuwak nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
Maje kɔlɛ ci appe aavtiz loota aliya Yesu, ma aku anek ɛɛti nici Yesu nɛ, “Yaatun kibeen gotonogu ci areyin bitaala neke. Arooŋnyin niigi ineet.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Yaai ŋɛnɛ? Ɔl cigaŋ ci een gɔtɔnɔga o?”
Ma acin niini ɔl ci aavtiz loota alya nɔɔnɔ o, ma azi nɛ, “Nicigi gɔtɔnɔga kibeen yaatigan.
Ma ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o arɔɔŋ Jooi, eegin niigi yaatigan ki dɔl ci yaai.”
Ma iitene oman adɛmzɛ Yesu liil o Galili otoga. Ma avu ɔl ci meelik gɛr alotak nɔɔnɔ. Makacin ook niini kavoola liila tɔ, ma akɔ aavi loota ŋinaante. Maje ɔl dook aavtiz dɔwɔna.
Ma adɛmɛz niini nɔɔgɔ ŋaati ayabzi zoozok yabziinowe ci meelik. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ,
“Iziiktɔ di! Anyak baale eet ci akɔ ḏowɛn.
Mazi akɔ aḏowɛ, iitazak ḏowo ogɛnɛ ŋinten gɔl, ma avu kibaali, ma avɛra ḏowɛn nicoko dook lai.
Maje ḏowo ogɛnɛ iinak tɔdɔ ŋinten biyɛn, ma aduŋna kataman nɔkɔ, eeci akɔm tɔdɔ ci meel.
Mazi aaranɛ kɔr, araabjai lai, eeci akɔm tɔdɔ ci ka kuruktɛkɛ agɛrɔ looc juruŋ.
Bodo ḏowo ogɛnɛ iinak bila, bar mazi aduŋna, eedit bila nɔɔgɔ, makacin alaŋaan anyak kɛbɛrɛ.
Maje ḏowo ogɛnɛ iinak tɔdɔ ci abon, ma aduŋna juruŋ, ma adikir, ma abiirna kɛbɛrɛ. Ceegi anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci miliny. Ceegi anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik kidicilim. Maje ogɛn anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik ɔrɔɔt.”
Zin enek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã anyaku iin, abon aziiŋnu zoozok nicoko juruŋ.”
Mazi azaani ɔl, aavu Yesu niini doon. Ma avunak nuyawa oginɛ kibeen buk ɔl oogi nɔɔnɔ, ma avu ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ keŋti ci zoozok nicoko.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyozozeyuŋ igeet gɛnyizi ci ka agayi baliin o Joowo. Maje ɔl ogɛn azii gɔɔn niigi zoozok yabziinta.
Bar alaŋ aga niigi zoozok nicoko keŋti cigeec juruŋ. Waan tɛ kagaac, atu waan niigi Jook, ma aara Jooi oŋeeti ugeec.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ agayu kɛŋ ci yabziin nico? Mã alaŋ agayu kɛŋ ci yabziin nico, ka zin tiŋeere agaac yabziinok o ŋaan kuduwayuŋ dook ku?
Kɛŋ zin ci yabziin nico nɛɛn ce. Ma ḏowo ci aḏok ɛɛti o zɔɔz o Joowo nɛɛn.
Ma ɔl ogɛnɛ atobɔ niigi ki gɔl kɛŋ o iinak ḏowo e. Eeci ma azii niigi zɔɔz o Joowo, taman nɔkɔ aku Loryen, ma aara zɔɔz o Joowo zinzeetine ugeec.
Ma ɔl ogɛnɛ atobɔ ki tɔdɔ ween biyɛn e. Eeci ma azii niigi zɔɔz o Joowo, agama niigi labak talniinta.
Bar alaŋ akɔ zɔɔz nici zinzeetine ugeec eecitɔ juruŋ, ma alaŋ atuwe ŋinti wun. Mazi avunak piryakzɛt nɔɔgɔ tuwente uneeŋ, ooŋ niigi tuwɛn enico ɛlɛ.
Ma ɔl ogɛnɛ atobɔ ki tɔdɔ o anyak bila e, eeci nicigi azii zɔɔz o Joowo,
Maje bar ŋaato iinon bodo niigi kaal o loocu, ma arɔɔŋ niigi kaal o arokzetu dook, ma kaal nicigi dook avɔ zinzeetine ugeec, ma adaal zɔɔz o Joowo zɛɛ makacin ɔkɔma nɔɔgɔ tuwɛn.

Ma ɔl ogɛnɛ atobɔ ki tɔdɔ o abon e, eeci azii niigi zɔɔz o Joowo, ma atuwe juruŋ. Ma anyek tuwɛn cineeŋ noko nɔɔgɔ kiziti ɔl ci abon kiyo labina o anyaa kɛbɛrɛ o miliny, ki kɛbɛrɛ o meelik kidicilim, kibeen kɛbɛrɛ o meelik ɔrɔɔt e.”
Ma anek Yesu ɔl bodo yabziinte oman nɛ, “Gɔɔn mã avaat ɛɛti lamba, alaŋ abuŋ ija, karabɔŋ buk alaŋ arek kɛrca loota. Bar arek niini lamba tarabeza taden.
Zin gi o aroodi inoko, katin abɔryai. Buk gi o abuŋe inoko, katin ayelzai.
Zin mã anyaku iin, iziiyit zoozok nicoko juruŋ.”

Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aryek zinzeeti zoozok ci ona aziiknu noko juruŋ. Acaca tiŋeere Jooi kaal o gɔɔn agooneku niiga ɔl oogi gole ci atobɔ kibeen kaal o agooneku niiga nɔɔgɔ. Ma bar acaca niini ŋaatunooŋ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk niceke.
Eeci ɛɛti ci anyak gi ci anyak anyonek bodo nɔɔnɔ ci appe. Maje ɛɛti ci akɔm gi ci anyak, mayo nuun anyak niini ci miliny, aamnyai koca bar nici ŋaatin.”
Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziinte oman nɛ, “Ma baliin o Joowo atobɔ kibeen eet ci aḏowɛ mane cin.
Mazi adica ḏowɛn, ook niini aavu ɔlɔ labak. Ma aduŋna labina niigi doon, ma iŋaaz, bar alaŋ niini aga iŋaaz labina ku.
Ma tɔdɔwa alya anyek labi kudunta, ma abiir. Rak ɔɔwa anyek nɔɔgɔ kanyayit kaŋaya. Ma bodo anyek kobolbolanit, ma vurta aduŋna ooti, ma abiir kanyayit kɛbɛrɛ.
Mazi avɔ adɔi, atɛɛda niini nɔɔgɔ ecodoi nɔkɔ, eeci izi iiten ci teedinto.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kayo kayabiztek baliin o Joowo gitaz? Atobɔ yo niini kibeen naa?
Atobɔ zin baliin o Joowo kibeen keberec o motoŋtoco miliny tɛr gɔɔn aduŋna mana o.
Mazi akɔ aduŋna, iŋaaz ma adikir ɔrɔɔt kujuk kɛɛn dook, ma akanek oto ci appintik, ma ɛɛnyci kibaali ceezi.”
Ma aduwak Yesu ɔl zoozok yabziinowe ogɛn bodo. Aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ zoozok waakcaye ci meel ka kiziiyit juruŋ.
Aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ zoozok dook yabziinta, bar mazi aromɛ niini kibeen nuyak ogin doon, oobek nɔɔgɔ zoozok keŋti labak.
Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ yomana enek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Abon di kavɔ liil baagita.”
Ma adotek nuyawa kɔlɛ looc, ma atɔɔt kavool. Maje uyene Yesu arayɛ ook kavoola laadun. Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi dook kibeen nɔɔnɔ. Buk anyak kavoolɛt oogi ci ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔgɔ.
Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ iiya ŋɔɔti ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ayɛlyɛlanek maam kavool zɛɛ ma arɔɔŋ abiz kavooli.
Maje Yesu ɔɔŋ kavool vurta aruk ɔɔ ruma. Ma iiŋka niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Gayoi, alaŋ abaaban zɔɔz ci ka kadaakti naaga o?”
Ma iŋaaz Yesu, ma agernyek ŋɔɔt anek nɛ, “Bil.” Bodo anek liil nɛ, “Tivanɛ.” Makacin didi ibil ŋɔɔti, ma azi maama jaŋ.
Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Aŋolinu naa? Ŋaan dim akɔmnuŋ igeet tuwɛn nɔkɔ?”
Bar enico anyayit niigi ŋoliin ci appe ɔrɔɔt. Ma anɔ nɛ, “Mayo ɛɛti nici abil ku? Akɔ zɛɛ ma een nuun ŋɔɔt kibeen liil azii buk zɔɔz cin!”
Abaayizit ni Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin liil o kazi Galili, ma avɔ baagite o looc o ɔl o kazi Garazin.
Mazi aduŋna Yesu kavoola, taman nɔkɔ iiyak nɔɔnɔ ɛɛti ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento.
Anyak ɛɛti nici miniŋit nico alya, ma akɔ gɔɔn abaak niini bɔɔtwane o ɔl o adaai. Ma akɔm ɔl ci ka koolit nɔɔnɔ cabiinta been nɛɛn.
Acap gɔɔn ɔl nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn kibeen zɔɔ ziiyi lak ci meel gɛr, bar enicoko dook aŋaak niini ziik nicoko.
Tup nɔkɔ agɛrɛny niini waazinok ki baalinok bɔɔtwani ki biyɛnɛ. Ma atatac ɛlɛ biyɛnɛ.
Mazi acina niini Yesu rɛɛna, adokonyonek nɔɔnɔ, ma akɔ akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ kɛŋa.
Ma anek Yesu miniŋit ci Loryento o nɛ, “Duna eete nico.”
Ma agɛrɛny miniŋit molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Yesu ŋɛɛrti Jook o adikir, arooŋ ŋaatan gitaz? Kalayin ineet zaare o Joowo ka calaŋ uulalan.”
Ma anek Yesu miniŋit ci Loryento o nɛ, “Duna eete nico.”
Ma agɛrɛny miniŋit molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Yesu ŋɛɛrti Jook o adikir, arooŋ ŋaatan gitaz? Kalayin ineet zaare o Joowo ka calaŋ uulalan.”
Ma ajin Yesu miniŋit nico anek nɛ, “Kazi zaar cugun nɛ?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kazi zaar cigan nɛ Kɔlɛ, eeci keegina naaga mɛɛlɛ.”
Ma ilalek miniŋa Yesu ɔrɔɔt ka calaŋ atooyek niini nɔɔgɔ looc oma.
Maje ŋinaante anyak kɔcɔcɔbanɛn ci meelik gɛr agɛ biya.
Ma ilalek miniŋa ci Loryento noko Yesu anek nɛ, “Nyet koota kɔcɔcɔbanene niceke ka kɔɔt kabaakta eleetine ŋaatineeŋ.”

Anyek ni didi Yesu nɔɔgɔ kudunta eete nico kɔɔtɔ kɔcɔcɔbanɛnɛ, ma avɔ didi niigi ŋaatineeŋ. Ma avira kɔcɔcɔbanɛna voroora, ma iinak liil kutudude dook lai. Maje kɔcɔcɔbanɛna nicigi dook een eet tur lak eetom (2000).
Odokonyit ni ɔl ona oowa kɔcɔcɔbanɛn e, ma avɔ aduwak ɔl o eevyi manɛɛni kibeen ɔl dook kutura zɔɔz nico. Ma avu ɔl dook ka kivita kicinit gi ci akanai o.

Mazi avunak ɔl Yesu, bar amada niigi eet baal gɔɔn anyak miniŋ o Loryento meelik e aavi loota ŋinaante. Anyawun niini rum alya, ma buk obona nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ oninɛ labak. Anyayit ni niigi dook ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Maje ɔl ona icinit gi o agoononek eet nico kibeen kɔcɔcɔbanɛn ɔɔwa e, uduktak buk niigi gɔnɔgi gi nico.
Ilalek ni niigi Yesu kɔtɔɔ looce cineeŋ o.
Mazi atɔɔt Yesu kavool, ilalek ɛɛti ci ona anyak miniŋ ci Loryento noko Yesu ka korkorit kibeen nɔɔnɔ.
Bar ujura Yesu ŋaati ɔrkɔri ki nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Bitɔ ɔlɔ atenowe ugun ka bitɔ duwak nɔɔgɔ gi ci abon atiritin Manyi ineet noko.”
Ɔtɔɔ ni ɛɛti nici, ma akɔ azɔp kuturyok ween amɔtɔ aduwak ɔl gi ona agoonek Yesu nɔɔnɔ e. Ma abiir ɔl dook ooti zooze nico.
Mazi amiironek Yesu baagit, ivitak kɔlɛ ci appe nɔɔnɔ liiltoga.
Ma ŋinaante iiya alaani ci ceez o lotento. Kazi alaan nico zaar nɛ Jairas. Mazi acin niini Yesu, iiya aavek nɔɔnɔ loota kɔpɔkpɔk.
Ma ilalek nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ anek nɛ, “Bɛɛnyan o miliny amɔɔr ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔɔŋ kadaak. Ija da taadek nɔɔnɔ aziit ka korok.”
Orkorit ni Yesu ki nɔɔnɔ.
Maje kɔlɛ ci appe ɔrɔɔt ano buk nɔɔnɔ, ma iiciwɔ ɔl nɔɔnɔ kabanyɔi zɛɛ makacin oyootit nɔɔnɔ.
Maje ŋinaante anyak ŋaa ci amɔɔr maam o ŋaanu irkitok amɔtɔ ram.
Amɔɔr niini ɔrɔɔt, ma azɔp akimanɛ ci meel gɛr irkitok dook, ma ŋaan kizi maya nɔkɔ, bar azaaci mɔɔrizi ɔrɔɔt.
Mazi azii niini zɔɔz o arogzi Yesu ɔl o amɔɔr, iiya buk niini, ma akɔ kɔla eecitɔ, ma icaya zɛɛ ma apadan Yesu eci bawuco, ma uum nɔɔnɔ rum.
Agɔɔn nɔkɔ o, eeci abaaban niini azi nɛ, “Mã nuun inoko kuum rum cin o ɛlɛ doon, keen koca maya.”
Mazi didi uum niini Yesu rum, eelit maama enico ɛlɛ, alaŋaan aduŋna. Makacin agawun niini ɛlɛ onin izi didi maya.
Maje Yesu aga nɔkɔ uduna ŋaatin dɔyizi ci miliny, ma ookconek kɔlɛ enico ɛlɛ, ma azi nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci uum rum can o?”
Ma anek nuyawa nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aga niina iiciwonun ineet ɔl ci meelik gɛr noko. Ajinei zin ku azi nɛ, Ŋɛnɛɛn ci uum rum can o?”
Maje Yesu agɛlɛm nɔɔgɔ dook arɔɔŋ kicin ŋɛnɛɛn ci uum nɔɔnɔ o.
Maje ŋaa nicini aga gi o agooni alye onin. Iiya ni niini ŋoliinta kabarit kɛdɛkɛdɛk, ma aku aavek Yesu loota kɔpɔkpɔk, ma aduwak nɔɔnɔ gi ci ona agɔɔn niini o.
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bɛɛnyan, anyin tuwɛn unun ineet izi maya inoko. Zin tɔ talniinta. Alaŋ mɔɔrizi nici abadakin bodo.”
Mazi ŋaan azɔɔzɔ Yesu kibeen ŋaa nico nɔkɔ, ivita ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o Jairas, ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Adaak dole unune. Má ŋaan amila gayoi gaga.”
Mazi azii Yesu zɔɔz ci aduwa ɔl nicigi o, enek niini Jairas nɛ, “Má anyei ŋoliin gaga. Tuwɔ labak.”
Mazi ka kook niini ole o Jairas, alamun ɔl o ano nɔɔnɔ e dook, ma ɔrkɔr niini ki Pitɔr ki Jemis kibeen Jɔn ween gɔtɔni Jemis doon.
Mazi avɔ ajɔŋɔz niigi kɔrɔk o Jairas, azii niini ɔl luwa. Iboobi niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma akɔ niini kɔrga eecitɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Naa? Aluyu naa? Dole alaŋ adaai, bar olla ɔɔŋ niini labak.”
Bar apɛz ɔl zɔɔz cin o. Otooyek ni niini nɔɔgɔ dook bitaalin. Ma akɔyi baati doleco been yaatin kibeen nuyak ogin een iiyu, ma avɔ ceeze ci ɔɔŋɛ dole o.
Ma agam niini dole aziit, ma anek otoge uneeŋ nɛ, “Talita koom.” Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico kazi nɛ, Bɛɛnyan, tiŋa jena.
Enico ɛlɛ itiŋa didi dole jena, ma awɔ. Maje irkitowa ci doleco tiryanto een amɔtɔ ram. Ma abiir ɔl ona ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ e dook ooti ɔrɔɔt.
Ma aricanek niini nɔɔgɔ ɔrɔɔt ka calaŋ aduwak ɔl oogi gi nico. Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek dole gi ci adak.”
Ma vurta ɔtɔɔ Yesu imiirozek kutur onin kazi Nazarɛt. Ɔrkɔr kibeen nuyak ogin.

Ma iitene o yubzento kazi Sabit ook ɛdɛmɛz niini ɔl ceeze o lotento. Mazi azii ɔl ci meel demziin cin o, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti tɛt. Ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti nicini ajowa kaal nicoko ŋaa? Gɛnyiz taz ci anyonek nɔɔnɔ o? Ma liŋliŋɔn ci atɛɛt ɔl biye noko ajowa niini ku?

Alaŋ een eet o gɔɔn abaac kɛɛn o nɛɛn? Alaŋ een niini ŋɛɛrti Meri? Alaŋ een niini gɔtɔni Jemis ki Josev ki Judaz been Saiman? Alaŋ een ŋɔɔnɔgi nɛɛn o gɔɔn karomɛ ŋina o?” Zin giye o agawi niigi nɔɔnɔ, otoborit niigi demziin cin.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn laadun nyakaŋan atitiny ɔl nɔɔnɔ loocowe dook, maje bar ɔl o kutur onin been atenok ogin ɛlɛ alaŋ atitiny nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.”
Zin giye nico alaŋaan Yesu anim kutugu kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ŋinaante, bar olla ataadek niini azɛɛn ɔl ci miliny amɔɔr, ma arogoz nɔɔgɔ.
Ma abiir Yesu ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt, giye ci ɔl o kutur onin ɛlɛ alaŋ atuwi zɔɔz onin o.
Ma azɔp Yesu korogjok adɛmɛz ɔl vitɛnane niceke.
Ma awa niini nuyak ween amɔtɔ ram, ma itoon nɔɔgɔ korkorit gɔɔn raman, raman. Ma anyek nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz ci atɔɔi miniŋ o Loryento ɔla.
Ma aricanek niini nɔɔgɔ gi ci anek nɛ, “Má avoyu dayiin ki guruc been kaboot ci anyaku kaal. Bar olla anyayit kɛɛn ci omtinto doon.
Ooti caava kibeen rumanɛ ci anyaku eleetinɛ o doon kɔkɔm bodo oogi.
Mã atalnanuŋ ɔl ŋaaman, aavtiz ole nico zɛɛ ma awoyu looce nico.
Mã anyak ŋinti alaŋ atalnanuŋ ɔl igeet, ma alaŋ azii niigi zɔɔz cunooŋ o, otoŋit ŋinito. Utuduŋta tɔdɔ zɔɔnɛ ka keyeliza gi nici gi o aborni niigi zɔɔz onan.”
Mazi akɔ aṯornɛkɛ Yesu zɔɔza, ɔtɔɔzɔ ki nuyak, ma avɔ uuwayek ɔl gi ci anek nɛ, “Eteedɔi oŋɛ ugooc.”
Ma atɔɔk niigi miniŋ o Loryento ole ci meelik, ma avuut ɔl ci meelik amɔɔr ooti maala, ma arogoz nɔɔgɔ.

Ma adala awaŋi ci kaal o agɔɔn Yesu ɔl dook, makacin iziik buk alaani o kazi Erod kaal nicoko dook, eeci azi ɔl ogɛnɛ nɛ, “Bar bɔŋ nicini Jɔn o oonyi nɛɛn urugun bodo daayiza. Gi ci inoko agooninɛ kaala ci atɛɛt ɔl biye noko nɛɛn.”
Ma bodo azi ɔl ogɛnɛ nɛ, “Bar bɔŋ Ilija gi.” Maje ɔl ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Coma een nyakaŋan ci Joowo atobɔ kibeen nyakaŋanɛt o rɛɛn.”
Mazi azii Erod gi nico, izi nɛ, “Inoko ɛɛti nici Jɔn baal oony ɔl baal kanyi takiren kɛtɛɛda ɔɔ e nɛɛn. Urugun inoko bodo niini daayiza.”
Azi Erod nɔkɔ o, eeci baale anyek niini takirnya kagamit Jɔn, ma arek sijin. Agɔɔn niini gi nico o, eeci waanice aama niini Pilip ween gɔtɔni ŋaa onin kazi Erodiyas.
Iiya ni Jɔn o oonyi, ma anek Erod nɛ, “Gɛrzɛ gi ci aamanɛ gotonu ŋaa cin noko.”
Otoborek ni Erodiyas Jɔn nɔŋ, ma arɔɔŋ kuruk nɔɔnɔ kadaak, bar akɔm gɔl ci aruyi, eeci Erod alaŋ agama gi nico.
Aŋole niini Jɔn giye o ɛɛnɛ Jɔn eet ci Joowo abon. Ebewun ni Erod nɔɔnɔ, ma arɛɛz ŋaati aziikni kaal ci uuwak Jɔn, mayo nuun gɔɔn iima amadik niini nɔɔnɔ o.

Ma vurta ojowa Erodiyas gɔl ci ka kurui Jɔn, eeci iitene oman awa Erod alaat o akumawo, ki alaat o takirnyawu, been ɔl o Galili een arɔk ka kivita kadayit kɔnyit ci aadanɛ niini iiten onin baal aritan e.
Iiya ni tinati Erodiyas, ma aku arogom ɔl kɔrgɛna zɛɛ makacin ataltɔ Erod kibeen kernok ogin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma anek niini dole nɛ, “Mã anyak gi ci arooŋ, duwayan ka kanyin.”
Ma aterkedek niini nɔɔnɔ bodo gi ci anek nɛ, “Olla gi ci ajinan aneet, kanyin. Yo nuun arooŋ keŋereyin alaazɛt can o kɔrgɛna, kanyin labak.”
Udun ni dole ook bitaala, ma akɔ ajin yaatin anek nɛ, “Kijin baaba naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Erodiyas nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Jin baatun kɛtɛɛdayin ɔɔ o Jɔn o oonyi.”
Abada ni dole enico ɛlɛ, ma aku anek Erod nɛ, “Karooŋ ɔɔ o Jɔn o oonyi. Nyaayan kodooca ŋina inoko ɛlɛ.”
Mazi azii Erod zɔɔz nico, iinon zɔɔz nico, ma avir ziniz ɔrɔɔt, bar akɔm gi ci ka kɛɛla, eeci uyen eterkedek niini dole zɔɔz ci adɔi kak kernok kɔrgɛna.
Kataman nɔkɔ itoon niini takiren ka kook kɛtɛɛda Jɔn ɔɔ ka kanyaa. Ook ni takirɛnti sijina, ma akɔ atɛɛda Jɔn ɔɔ didi.
Ma anyaa ɔɔ kodooca, ma aku anyek dole. Ook ni dole anyek yaatin.
Mazi azii nuyawa o Jɔn gi nico, ivita ooti niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔɔt adaaca.
Mazi abada nuyawa keronnya, ivita uduktak niigi Yesu kaal o avɔ agɔɔn niigi dook kibeen kaal o adɛmɛz.

Maje iitene nice anyak ɔl ci meelik avunak Yesu zɛɛ ma alaŋ ajowa niini been nuyak ogin waŋi ci ka kadaktɔi. Enewun ni Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Kɔtɔɔz kɔɔtɔ ŋaati akɔm ɔl ka ɔɔtɔ uyubuzit ŋintimiliny ŋinaante.”
Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi kavoola ka kɔɔtɔ ŋaati akɔm ɔl.

Mazi awɔ, icinit ɔl ci meelik nɔɔgɔ. Ma giye o agayi niigi Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin, ivirtozek niigi kuturyowɛ dook ŋinti avɔyi niigi o, ma avir niigi baagitok dook zɛɛ ma avɔ arak ŋinite iŋaan niigi kurumit.
Mazi aduŋna Yesu kavoola, acin niini kɔlɛ ci appe ɔrɔɔt, ma awuci nɔɔnɔ ziniz ŋaatineeŋ ɔrɔɔt, eeci acin nɔɔgɔ ɛɛl kiyo ɛɛzana o akɔm tuwayoi o. Ma ademzek niini nɔɔgɔ kaal ci meel gɛr.
Ma yomana ivitak nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Izi lɔɔci baalin, ma buk een ŋiniti balal.
Anyek ɔl kazaantɛ kɔɔt korogjowe ci kajɔŋzɔ noko ka kɔɔt kataala kaal ci adak.”
Ma bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anycek nɔɔgɔ dayiin niiga alya.”
Ma anek niigi Yesu nɛ, “Alaŋ kanyaka guruc ci alɛɛnɔ ki dayiin cigeec dook.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaku inoko dayiin ceen ku? Ɔɔtɔ di icinit.”
Mazi avɔ acin, ivita enektek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kanyaka ḏɔkɛn ceen tur kibeen kuluk ram nɔkɔ.”
Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ eŋerit ɔl kiziti kotorɛ. Anycek nɔɔgɔ kaavtiyɔ loota artene ci colai noko.”
Mazi aavtiz niigi loota, een gɔɔn kotoritin ceeni eet ram kamɔtɔ (50), maje ceegi een eet tur (100).
Odoma ni Yesu ḏɔkɛn ceen tur o kibeen kuluk ceen ram o, ma acin tammu taden, ma anyek Jook zany. Ɛtɛɛt ni ḏɔkɛn, ma anyek nuyak ka keŋertek ɔl. Ma buk aŋerek kuluk nuyak ka keŋertek ɔl.
Ma adake kɔlɛ oke dook zɛɛ ma apiiyani.
Ma abitiz nuyawa gilanya ceen amɔnki ram tɔc dayiine ci anyigzai kulugɛ kibeen ḏɔkɛni.
Ma ɔl ci adak dayiin noko o een ɔl ci mac doon eet tur lak eet ram kamɔtɔ (5000).
Kataman nɔkɔ enek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Ɔtɔɔz kavoola araktɛ ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Bezediya liil baagita.” Aavu ni Yesu niini doon ka rak kazaan kɔlɛ.
Mazi azaani kɔlɛ, ɔtɔɔ ni niini ook biya ka kook kaŋarowɔ.
Mazi akɔ arara lɔɔci yomana, urum kavoolɛ liil kɛŋ. Maje Yesu ŋaan aavi dɔwɔna niini doon.
Ma acin niini nɔɔgɔ apirna ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ wolinta, eeci atirginyɔ ŋɔɔt. Mazi agɔr tammu, iiyak Yesu nɔɔgɔ ŋaati awoyanɛ maam tadena. Arɔɔŋ niini ka kiiya kidicek.
Mazi acin niigi nɔɔnɔ awɔ maam tadena nɔkɔ, abaabanit izitɔ nɛ, “Coma bar een miniŋit.”
Ma acin niigi dook nɔɔnɔ ŋoliinta, ma agɛrɛny ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Kataman nɔkɔ ozoozek Yesu nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Agamit zinzeeti kodoyit. Aneeta Yesu gi. Má aŋolinu looc gaga.”
Iiya ni niini ɔtɔɔt kavool ki nɔɔgɔ. Taman nɔkɔ itivanɛ ŋɔɔti. Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ dook ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci ŋaan bakbayɛ nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti nɔkɔ.
Mayo nuun icinit niigi gi baal anyekɛ niigi dayiin o miliny kizi mɛɛlɛ e, ŋaan kagaac niigi dɔyiz o Yesu nɔkɔ.
Mazi avɔ arum baagit o looc o kazi Genezaret, acabit kavool gɔgɔla ŋinaante.
Mazi aduŋna kavoola, kataman nɔkɔ agaac ɔl Yesu.
Ma avironek ɔl korogjok ugeec. Ma avɔ adɔŋak niigi ɔl o amɔɔr kuwanɛ ŋinti aavɛ Yesu o.

Ma ŋinti olla akɔyi Yesu kuturyowe o miliny, karabɔŋ een kuturyowe o adikir, anyaa ɔl gɔnɔgi o amɔɔr, ma avu arek looc mɛlɛgɛnyai. Ma ilalek ɔl ci amɔɔr o Yesu ka olla nuun kuumit niigi nɔɔnɔ rum. Zin didi ɔl o uumit rum onin orogit moorizoye ugeec.
Ma alotak ɔl o Parici kibeen ɔl o demziinto avu Jerusalɛma Yesu.
Ma acin niigi nuyak o Yesu adake iŋaan kotoonyit azɛɛn keere uneeŋ.
Eeci gɔɔn ɔl o Parici kibeen ɔl o Juz oogi alaŋ adake iŋaan kotoonyit azɛɛn giye o agami niigi kɛɛranɛ o jijitigeec.
Gɔɔn ma anyaa dayiin mɛlɛgɛnyai, alaŋ adak iŋaan rak kotoonyit. Ma azooni buk niigi kɛɛranɛ ci meelik oogi kiyo onyɛn ci diicitu ki ijunya been alawɛt e.
Ivita ni ijinit ɔl o Parici kibeen ɔl o demziinto Yesu enektek nɛ, “Dim nuyawa cugune o gɔɔn alaŋ azooni kɛɛranɛ o jijitigaac o naa? Adake gɔɔn niigi calaŋ oony azɛɛn o naa?”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Igeet ɔl ci abuuku eleeti coko, aduwa da baale nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya zɔɔz ceen didi giye ci akanuŋ igeet. Ayɛɛt baale niini zɔɔz ci aduwa Jooi azi nɛ, Gɔɔn ɔl nicigi adiŋdiŋanan aneet utugetinɛ doon. Maje zinzeeti cigeec o adɛyai ŋaatan many.
Alaŋ zin niigi aganɔ ŋaati adiŋdiŋanan aneet, eeci arican niigi demziin ci kɛɛranɛ ugeecik ɔrɔɔt kujuk demziin ci zɔɔz onan.”
Ma anek Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alɛɛm zin da Izaya didi. Alaŋ niiga azoonu lotinok o Joowo, bar azoonu kɛɛranɛ ci ɔl ci deer.
Abaabanu niiga kiziik bar agenyu giye ci aburnu lotinok o Joowo, ma bar azoonu kɛɛranɛ cugooc o.
Ayɛɛt Mosis baale zɔɔz baal aricanek Jooi nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, Tɔŋɔlɛ baatun ki yaatun. Mã adɔm ɛɛti baatin ki yaatin, abon aruk ɔl nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
Maje bar niiga ademzonu anonu nɛ, Ma alam gi ci ka kitirti ɛɛti baatin karabɔŋ een yaatin, abon anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Alaŋ katirituŋ igeet, eeci kanyeya gi nico Jook.
Zin gole nico imilmilantu niiga nɔɔnɔ calaŋ atirit baatin ki yaatin.
Ma buk gole nico epeztu niiga zɔɔz o Joowo kizi gi ci labak kaale cugooc ademzeku ɔl noko. Ma anyak buk kaal oogi ci meel gɛr atobɔ kibeen nicoko gɔɔn agoonu niiga.”
Zin bodo otowa Yesu ɔl, ma aku anek nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di niiga dook ka agaac zɔɔz ci ka karooŋ kuduwayuŋ ce.
Akɔm laadun gi ci adak ɛɛti ci deer otoga, ma anyek eet kizi gɛrzɛ ŋume o Joowo kina. Bar zin gi o gɛr gɔɔn aduŋna zinize ci eet ci deer nɛɛn o agɛrɛzan nɔɔnɔ.
Mã anyaku iin, iziiyit zɔɔz nico juruŋ.”
Ma vurta ook Yesu ceeza otoŋek kɔlɛ looc, ma avunak nuyawa nɔɔnɔ, ma avu ajin kɛŋ ci demziin nico.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ agayu kɛŋ ci demziin nico niiga buk? Abon waan agayu niiga dayiin o avɔ eet ci deer kɛŋa alaŋ anyek eet kizi gɛrzɛ ŋume o Joowo.
Eeci dayiin alaŋ avɔ ziniza, bar avɔ kɛŋa ma aduŋnak bitaalin.” Aduwa Yesu gi nico o arɔɔŋ ka keyelek ɔl gi o abonan dayiin dook ŋaati kadayi.
Ma anek bodo Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Bar zin gi o gɔɔn aduŋna eet ziniza nɛɛn o anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi gɛrzɛ ŋume o Joowo.

Eeci zinize ci eet ci deer o aduŋnan baabani ci gɛrzɛ, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kutugu kaal ci gɛr kiyo waaŋ, ki agɔr, ki monyɛnɛt, ki zoocmazit, ki ziniz appinzɛt, ki labaan, ki madkɛn, ki ŋomtiin, ki eleeti doŋi, kibeen tarbalzɛt.

Eeci zinize ci eet ci deer o aduŋnan baabani ci gɛrzɛ, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kutugu kaal ci gɛr kiyo waaŋ, ki agɔr, ki monyɛnɛt, ki zoocmazit, ki ziniz appinzɛt, ki labaan, ki madkɛn, ki ŋomtiin, ki eleeti doŋi, kibeen tarbalzɛt.
Aduŋna kaal nici dook zinize ci eet ci deer, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi gɛrzɛ ŋume o Joowo.”
Zin itiŋa Yesu ook looce ci ajɔŋɔz kutur o kazi Tayor. Mazi akɔ arum ŋinite, ook ceeze oman eecitɔ, ma akɔ aavi ŋinaante, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini keyelizak ɔl ɛlɛ, bar zin ojokta niigi nɔɔnɔ.
Ma ŋinaante iziiwun buk nɔɔnɔ ŋaa oman ci anyak bɛɛnyin miniŋit ci Loryento. Iiyak ni niini nɔɔnɔ, ma aku aavek loota kɔpɔkpɔk.
Maje ŋaa nici niini dole ci modo o kazi Garik, ma aritai niini kuture o kazi Venosiya o abil looce o kazi Siriya. Ilalek ni niini Yesu ka kɔtɔɔk miniŋit o Loryento dolece cin o.
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nyan rak aneet kitirit ɔl ogan, eeci alaŋ abon ŋaati kajukɛkɛ dayiin ci dolenu o orze.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didi Manyi, ŋɛdɛt aleem zɔɔz nico, bar zin gɔɔn buk orze avɛr zurzuryak ci iina ŋaati adayin dɔlya labak.”
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Giye o uduwayɛ zɔɔz ci aleem, ɔtɔɔyɛ miniŋit o Loryento dolece unun. Bitɔ ɔlɔ labak.”
Mazi akɔ ŋaa ɔlɔ, amada dole ɔɔŋ kɛrca. Akɔma didi miniŋit o Loryento ŋaatin.
Ma iŋaaz Yesu kuture o kazi Tayor, ma akɔ adiir kutur o kazi Sidon been kuturyok ween amɔtɔ, ma akɔ alocak liil o kazi Galili.
Ma ŋinaante anyaaktak ɔl nɔɔnɔ eet ci adiiti iina, ma alagonyi aati calaŋ azɔɔz. Ma ilalek niigi nɔɔnɔ ka kataadek eet nico aziit ka kitirit kizi maya.
Alakada ni Yesu eet nico doon ɔla. Ma akɔ azuwek azɛɛn iin ci eet nico o, ma oortek amot aziit, ma uum aat.
Ma acin tammu tadena, ma akɔla ziniz, ma anek nɔɔnɔ otoge uneeŋ nɛ, “Avta.” Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico azi nɛ ziiwɔ.
Makacin didi ɔkɔltɛ eet nico iina oginɛ, ma buk oogji aati kɔzɔɔz labak enico ɛlɛ.
Ma aricanek Yesu ɔl dook anek nɛ, “Má aboranu zɔɔz nico.” Bar ma aricanek niini nɔɔgɔ calaŋ abɔra zɔɔz ci abil nɔkɔ, bar avɔ aduwa niigi gi nico ɔrɔɔt.

Ma ɔl o azii zɔɔz nico abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt, ma anɔ nɛ, “Kaala ci agɔɔn Yesu noko dook abon ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma een nuun ɔl ci adiiti iina anyek niini nɔɔgɔ kiziiktɔ. Buk ɔl o adiiti alemeti anyek nɔɔgɔ kozoozit labak.”
Ma ŋintimiliny iinyaye ogɛn olotak bodo kɔlɛ ci appe Yesu. Mazi akɔ adicai dayiin ugeec, otowa Yesu nuyak ogin, ma anek nɛ,
“Inoko awuci ziniz ole nicoko, eeci karomena ki nɔɔgɔ iinya iiyu, makacin idicai dayiin ugeec anyak.
Mã kitoonei nɔɔgɔ korogjok magizɛt nɔkɔ, avɔ koca aval gɔla, eeci ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ avu rɛɛna.”
Ma anek nuyawa nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mazin yo balale nico ka kojokta dayiin ci alɛɛnɔ ki ɔl nicoko ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko anyaku ḏɔkɛn ceen izɔk?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyaka ḏɔkɛn ceen torgɛrɛm.”
Uduwak ni niini kɔlɛ kaavtiyɔ loota. Ma adoma ḏɔkɛn ceen torgɛrɛm noko, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt ḏɔkɛn, ma anyek nuyak ka keŋeryek ɔl. Ma aŋerek niigi ɔl.
Anyak buk niigi kuluk ci miliny. Ma anyek bodo Yesu Jook zany kuluge nicoko, Ma anyek nuyak ka keŋertek ɔl buk.
Ma adake ɔl nicigi dook zɛɛ makacin ipiiyantɛ. Ma alota nuyawa zurzuryak ci anyigzai o, ma abitiz gilanya torgɛrɛm.
Maje ɔl ci ona adak dayiin noko o een eet tur lak eet ram (4000). Azaanun ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ kɔɔt korginɛ.
Ma ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ otoodit niini ki nuyak ogin kavool, ma abaayiz liil avɔ looce o kazi Dalmanuta.
Zin ivitak ɔl ci Parici ogɛn Yesu, ma avu adaŋɔ ki nɔɔnɔ. Arɔɔŋ niigi kicinta Yesu, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ ka kutugu nɔɔgɔ liŋliŋɔn ci atɛɛt biye ci aku Joowa.
Ma akɔla Yesu ziniz, ma azi nɛ, “Akɔ ma arooŋnyu icinit liŋliŋɔn ci ateeduŋ biye o naa? Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ kayelekuŋ igeet liŋliŋɔn ci ateeduŋ biye been nɛɛn.”
Ma ooŋnek niini nɔɔgɔ looc, ma atɔɔt kavool, ma akɔ liil baagita.
Mazi awɔ niigi, erektek nuyak dayiin ŋinaante, ma bar ajowa ḏokoc codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ kavoola.
Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Egenyit gerzitine o ɔl o Parici kibeen gerzitin o Erod o atobɔ ki nyigit o gɔɔn adɛni ḏɔkɛna o.”
Bar nuyawa alaŋ aga kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ci aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ o, ma aŋɔmtɔ anɔ nɛ, “Aduwa bɔŋ Yesu gi nico o, eeci akɔmnet ḏɔkɛn.”
Maje Yesu aga ŋomtiin cineeŋ o nɔkɔ, ma ajin nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Aŋomotu zɔɔz ci akɔmnuŋ ḏɔkɛn o naa? Ŋaan dim niiga agayaŋ aneet nɔkɔ? Ŋaan bakbayɛ igeet zinzeeti nɔkɔ?
Anyaku kɛbɛrɛ, ma alaŋ acinenu. Anyaku iin, ma alaŋ aziiŋnenu.
Alaŋ aadanu ḏɔkɛn baal kanyi ɔl ween eet tur lak eet ram kamɔtɔ (5000) e? Mazi baale ipiiyantɛ niigi e, alotanu waanice gilanya izɔk dayiine o anyigzai?”
Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kalotana gilanya amɔtɔ ram.”
Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abon buk aadanu ḏɔkɛn baal kanyi ɔl ween eet tur lak eet ram (4000) e. Mazi baale ipiiyantɛ niigi e, alotanu gilanya izɔk dayiine o anyigzai?”
Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kalotana gilanya torgɛrɛm.”
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan zin agayaŋ nɔkɔ o naa?”
Mazi avunak Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin kutur o kazi Bezediya, anyaaktak ɔl nɔɔnɔ eet ci ruben, ma ilalek niigi nɔɔnɔ ka kuum eet nico ka kɔkɔl nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ.
Ma agam niini eet ci ruben noko aziit, ma aduŋni akɔyi kutur bitaala. Ma ŋinaante otorek amot nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ, ma ataadek nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Inoko anyak gi ci acin?”
Ma adɔŋ ɛɛti ci ruben noko ɔɔ, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ii, kacin ɔl awɔ, bar olla ɛɛl kiyo kɛɛna o.”
Ma bodo ataadek Yesu azɛɛn nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ. Enico ɛgɛlɛm bodo ɛɛti looc, ma acin kaal dook juruŋ, eeci ɔkɔltɛ nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ wak.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko bitɔ ɔlɔ. Má amiironei kutur.”
Zin ɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin ɔɔtɔ korogjowe o ajɔŋɔz looc o kazi Sisiriya Vilipai. Mazi ŋaan awɔ gɔla nɔkɔ, ijin Yesu nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Gɔɔn dim yo azi ɔl nɛ, Keen naana ŋɛnɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Azi gɔɔn ɔl nɛ, Een Jɔn o oony ɔl. Maje ɔl ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, Een Ilija. Ma bar ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, Een nyakaŋan codoi nyakaŋanete o Joowo.”
Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma niiga gɔɔn aniyu nɛ, Keen ŋɛnɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina Kiristo.”
Iricanek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ ka calaŋ aduwak ɔl oogi zɔɔz nico.

Ma adɛmɛz Yesu nuyak ogin anek nɛ, “Iiten oma naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kapirna ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kaale ci meelik. Ma abornan tiŋeere aneet alaata o miliny ki alaat o adikir ceeze o Joowo been ɔl o demziinto buk. Arukan tiŋeere niigi aneet kadaak. Bar zin iinyaye ceen iiyu kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
Oobek ni niini nuyak dook zɔɔz nico kagaac niigi dook juruŋ. Mazi azii Pitɔr zɔɔz nico, akata Yesu doon, ma akɔ aricanek nɔɔnɔ gi ci anek nɛ, “Má azi nɔkɔ.”
Bar ookci Yesu, ma agɛlɛm nuyak, ma agernyek Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Nyɛ ŋaatan Loryen co, eeci baabani cune o alaŋ aku Joowa, bar baabani ci eet ci deer.”
Otowa ni Yesu kɔlɛ kibeen nuyak, ma aku anek nɛ, “Mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti konowan aneet, abon areyek nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ oninɛ, ma abon agama gidɛn ki piryakzɛt ŋaati anuyan niini aneet.
Eeci ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ korogoz ɛlɛ onin, bar akoloz. Maje ɛɛti ci akoloz ɛlɛ onin ŋaatan kibeen kaviyawe o Joowo, bar arogoz.
Mayo zin inoko mã anyak ɛɛti kaal o loocu dook, ma bar akoloz rogɛt ci ɛlɛ onin, bonat inoo?
Mã adaak ɛɛti, akɔm bodo gi ci ka kabadakɛ nɔɔnɔ rogɛt onin.
Zin ma anyak ɛɛti alyaan ŋaatan ki zooze onan ole ci loocu gɛr noko, katin buk naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kanyei alyaan ŋaatin iitene ci kabadana naana been toonnyak o Joowo titinyonte o Joowo e.”
Ma anek bodo Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, anyak ɔl oogi ŋaatunooŋ ŋina ci katin alaŋ adaai iŋaan kicinit niigi dɔyiz o baliin o Joowo.”
Ma vurta iinyaye ceen tɔrkɔnɔm ooyi Yesu Pitɔr ki Jemis been Jɔn bɛ tadena, ma avɔ aavtiz niigi doon ŋinaante. Mazi ŋaan aavtiz nɔkɔ, otowo Yesu ɛlɛ nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ.
Makacin rumanɛ oginɛ iziti vɔɔrɛ pɛr kizi kiyir kiyir kujuk rum ci vɔɔr loota ŋina.
Ma acin nuyawa Ilija ki Mosis baal adaayitɔ baale e azɔɔzɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
Ma anek Pitɔr Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, kavu tɛ ŋina juruŋ. Nyet kɛtɛɛnycawa kaal ceen ceezi kabili kɔr een iiyu, ka codoi kizi cun, codoi ci Mosis, codoi ci Ilija.”
Aduwa Pitɔr gi nico calaŋ aga, eeci niigi dook anyak ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt.
Ma aku diizoc, ma aku abil nɔɔgɔ tadena, ma azi mɔlɔyi ci Joowo diizoce nico nɛ, “Nicini ŋɛɛran o kareez nɛɛn. Iziiyit nɔɔnɔ.”
Taman nɔkɔ icinit nuyawa izi nɔɔnɔ Yesu doon, ɔkɔma Ilija ki Mosis.
Mazi aduŋna niigi bɛ tadena, iricanek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Má avɔ aduwaku ɔl gi ci ona acinu noko zɛɛ ma kakɔ kiŋaaz naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto daayiza.”
Oroodit ni didi nuyawa gi nico zinzeetinɛ, maje ŋaato ajinɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Ŋaazi daayiza akati kɛŋ cinɛ gitaz?”
Ma ajin niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma dim gɔɔn ɔl o demziinto azi nɛ, Arayai katin rak ɔɔwa Ilija ŋaati Kiristo o, naa?”
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didi ŋɛdɛt arayai rak Ilija ka kiiya kidimdiman gɔl o Kiristo. Azi waragɛ o Joowo nɛ, Katin Ŋɛɛrti Eeto abor ɔl nɔɔnɔ, ma apirna niini ɔrɔɔt.
Bar zin kaduwakuŋ igeet, Ilija iiya odota, ma utuguzek ɔl nɔɔnɔ kaal ci gɛr eo arɔɔŋi niigi kiyo ayeedi waragewe o Joowo o.”
Mazi avɔ arum Yesu ki nuyak ceen iiyu o nuyak ogin oogi, acin kɔlɛ ci aliya nɔɔgɔ, ma adaŋɔ ɔl ci demziinto kibeen nɔɔgɔ.
Mazi acin ɔl nicigi dook Yesu, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma adokonyonek niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma avɔ azaa.
Ma ajin Yesu nuyak anek nɛ, “Ma dim adaŋonu kibeen ɔl nicoko naa?”
Ma azɔɔz ɛɛti codoi ole ceen kɔlɛ noko anek Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, kanyaakin ŋɛɛran ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento, ma adiiti ɔtɔgi calaŋ azɔɔz.
Gɔɔn ma agam nɔɔnɔ miniŋit nici, arui looc, ma aduŋna kavucaci otoga, ma adak nyigit, ma aciizɛn ɛlɛ. Kajin uyene nuyak cugun noko ka kotooyit miniŋit nico ŋaatin, bar alaŋ anim niigi kotooyit.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Igeet ɔl ci akɔmnuŋ tuwɛn coko. Kayo koromtɛ naana kibeen igeet zɛɛ been inin ka utuyɔ? Ka kɛmɛz zɔɔz cunooŋ zɛɛ been inin? Anyaaktayaŋ zin di logo nico ŋaato.”
Ma anyaak niigi nɔɔnɔ logo nico. Mazi acin miniŋit ci Loryento noko Yesu, taman nɔkɔ avic logoz, ma arui looc kɔbɔrbɔr kuduv ɔtɔgi.
Ma ajin Yesu baatin anek nɛ, “Akanan gi nici baal waŋa?”
Ma anek baati logoto nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Anyaa gi nico kidiczɛta nɔkɔ laadun.
Lak ci meelik gɛr ci gɔɔn ajukɛkɛ miniŋit nici nɔɔnɔ goo karabɔŋ een liil arɔɔŋ ka kuruk kadaak. Inoko kilalekin anyek ziniz kobona ŋaatinaaŋ. Tiritet miniŋte nico mã anim.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Naa akɔba azi nɛ, Mã anim o? Ɛɛti ci atu Jook anim kutugu kaal dook.”
Taman nɔkɔ enek baati logoto Yesu nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt naana katuwe. Tiritan zin tuwente can miliny noko ka kutuwɔ juruŋ.”
Mazi acin Yesu kɔlɛ alotak nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, egerenyek miniŋit ci Loryento noko anek nɛ, “Niina miniŋit o adiiti logo nico otok, duna ŋaatin. Má abadai bodo nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.”
Ma agɛrɛny miniŋit nici, ma avic logoz kataval ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, makacin uduna. Ma ɔɔŋ logoti kazacanɛ kiyo ɛɛti o adaak o. Ma anɔ ɔl ci meelik nɛ, “Adaak ri logoti.”
Maje bar Yesu agam logoz aziit, ma adɔŋa kaavu jena.
Mazi akɔ Yesu ɔlɔ, ɔɔt ijinit nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ɛɛnɛ nɔɔgɔ doon anek nɛ, “Matɛ uyene akɔmneket ageeta ŋaati katooka miniŋit nico naa?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Miniŋit nici alaŋ aaryai gaga. Ool nɔɔnɔ ŋaryiin doon.”
Ma iŋaaz Yesu ki nuyak ogin ŋinaante, ma avɔ adiir looc o kazi Galili. Maje Yesu alaŋ arɔɔŋ kagaac ɔl ogɛnɛ nɔɔnɔ ŋinti aavɛ.
Eeci arɔɔŋ niini waŋi ci ka kɛdɛmɛzi nuyak. Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iiten oma agamnyan ɔl aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto, ma avɔ arukan kadaak. Bar iinyaye ceen iiyu kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
Maje bar nuyawa alaŋ aga kɛŋ ci demziin ci aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ o. Bodo ŋaato aŋole ŋaati ajini niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛŋ ci demziin nico.
Mazi avu arum niigi Kapernam, ɔɔtɔ korge oman. Ŋinaante ijin Yesu nuyak enek nɛ, “Gitaz ona adaŋonu gɔla e?”
Ma ajaki niigi jaŋ, eeci uyene ŋɛdɛt adaŋɔ gɔla arɔɔŋ kagaac ŋɛnɛɛn ci titiny ŋaatineeŋ.
Aavu ni Yesu loota, ma awa nɔɔgɔ dook amɔtɔ ramana, ma anek nɛ, “Mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti kizi titiny, abon anyek niini ɛlɛ onin kizi cɛlbɛz ɔla dook, ma een gabaren ci ɔl dook.”
Enico odoma Yesu dole ci miliny, ma aku anyek kibil nɔɔgɔ ŋuma ŋaati ataadekɛ niini nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn, ma anek nuyak nɛ,
“Ma ɛɛti ci atalna dole ci miliny kiyo nici noko zaare ogan, atalnanan buk niini aneet. Ma ɛɛti ci atalnanan aneet, alaŋ bar atalnanan aneeta doon, bar buk atalna niini Jook o itoonanan aneet.”
Ma anek Jɔn nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gayoi, iiten baale anyak eet ci kacina atɔɔk miniŋ o Loryento zaare ugun, ma kalamnya naaga nɔɔnɔ, eeci alaŋ een niini nuyai kiyo naaga o.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má alamnyu nɔɔnɔ gaga, eeci ɛɛti ci agɔɔn kaal ci adɔi kiyo nici o zaare ogan, alaŋ amarninan niini aneeta.
Ma ɛɛti calaŋ amarninet ageet, niini laŋotinai.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci anyuŋ maam owodit giye o eeginu niiga nuyak cigan, ajowa katin buk niini gi ci abon Joowa.”
Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Mã anyek ɛɛti dole ci miliny kiyo nici noko kabaca oŋec, aganɔ koca ɛɛti nici ŋaati acabonɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ golu alɛm, ma ajukonek liil kotododɛ kook many.
Zin mã abacakin aziiti oŋec, tɛɛda. Mayɛ bar ŋaati akɔyɛ rogɛta aziite codoi kujuk ŋaati anyayɛ azɛɛn dook, ma ajukonei goo o abil been nɛɛn.
Zin mã abacakin aziiti oŋec, tɛɛda. Mayɛ bar ŋaati akɔyɛ rogɛta aziite codoi kujuk ŋaati anyayɛ azɛɛn dook, ma ajukonei goo o abil been nɛɛn.
Mã abacakin zɔɔci oŋec, tɛɛda. Mayɛ bar ŋaati akɔyɛ rogɛta zooce codoi kujuk ŋaati koca ajukonɛkɛ goo o abil been nɛɛn.
Mã abacakin zɔɔci oŋec, tɛɛda. Mayɛ bar ŋaati akɔyɛ rogɛta zooce codoi kujuk ŋaati koca ajukonɛkɛ goo o abil been nɛɛn.
Mã abacakin kɛbɛrɛci oŋec, kata bitaalin. Mayɛ bar ŋaati akɔyɛ baliinte o Joowo keberece codoi kujuk ŋaati koca ajukonɛkɛ goo o abil been nɛɛn.
Ma ŋin o gooyo anyak kuluut ci adak ɔl, ma alaŋ adaai nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Buk goo ci avaat nɔɔgɔ o alaŋ adiiti nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
Avaadi katin ɔl dook gooya zɛɛ ma amokcar kiyo mɛlɛ o.
Ma mɛlɛ abona, bar mã idicai mokcarɔni, akɔm bodo gɔl ci kanyekɛ komokcar. Anyayit zin bonat o atobɔ kibeen mɛlɛ. Abaayit niiga dook laŋotizɛta been ganɔnta.”
Ma vurta itiŋa Yesu ook looce o kazi Judiya, ma akɔ abaayiz liil o kazi Jordan. Ma ŋinaante alotak kɔlɛ nɔɔnɔ bodo, ma adɛmɛz niini nɔɔgɔ eo gɔɔn adɛmzi ɔl laadun.
Ma avunak nɔɔnɔ ɔl ogɛn ole o Parici arɔɔŋ ka kicinta nɔɔnɔ. Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo gɔɔn lotinowa ogaac aziiknek eet kɔtɔɔk ŋaa cin labak?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma da baale Mosis zooze nico anekuŋ nɛ?”
Ma azi niigi nɛ, “Aneket Mosis nɛ, Mã arɔɔŋ ɛɛti kɔtɔɔk ŋaa cin, abon labak, olla zin abon ayɛɛdak niini nɔɔnɔ waragɛ ci ŋeronto.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ayeedekuŋ Mosis zɔɔz nico o, eeci adoknuŋ igeet zinzeeti kak, ma alaŋ arooŋnyu iziiktɔ.
Maje laadun waanbaal ɛɛnycanɛ Jooi looc e, ɛɛnyca niini eet ci mac ki ŋaa.
Zin nici gi o gɔɔn ooŋni ɛɛti yaatin ki baatin, ma akɔ aromɛn ki ŋaa onin o nɛɛn.
Ma gole nico alaŋaan bodo niigi eegin ram, bar iziti ɛlɛ codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
Zin giye o oromi Jooi ɔl nicoko kodoye, akɔm bodo eet ci deer ci ka kɛŋɛr nɔɔgɔ.”
Mazi avɔ aavtiz nuyawa ki Yesu niigi doon ceeza, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã atɔɔk ɛɛti ŋaa cin, ma arɔca bodo ŋaa oma, adoma niini zoocmaz.
Buk mã aaryai ŋaa eete cin, ma akɔ arik bodo eete oman, adoma niini zoocmaz.”
Ŋinaanto anyaaktak ɔl ogɛnɛ Yesu dɔl ci miliny ka kamayuk niini nɔɔgɔ. Maje nuyawa bar agernyek ɔl nicoko kɛdɛyai.
Mazi acin Yesu gi nico, otobor nɔŋ, ma anek nuyak nɛ, “Anycek dɔl kivitayan aneet. Má alamnyu nɔɔgɔ, eeci baliin o Joowo abilnek ɔl ci anyek eleeti kiyo dɔlya ci miliny noko.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti calaŋ agama baliin o Joowo zinize onin kiyo dole o miliny o, alaŋ akɔ niini baliinte nico been nɛɛn.”
Ma alotek Yesu dɔl kɛŋ, ma ataadek nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn, ma amayuk.
Mazi iŋaaz Yesu keronnye onin, ivirak ɛɛti oman nɔɔnɔ, ma aku akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ kɛŋa. Ma ajin anek nɛ, “Gayoi o abona, mayo kutugu naa ka kojowa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn?”
Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔ ma awuyan kizi eet ci kabona o naa? Akɔm eet ci abon. Jook doon ci abon.
Aga niina lotinok o Joowo azi nɛ, Má amony eet ci deer. Má adoma zoocmaz. Má agɔrzɛ. Má avoloŋ. Má adayɛ ɔl looc. Tɔŋɔlɛ baatun ki yaatun.”
Ma anek ɛɛti nici Yesu nɛ, “Gayoi, lotinok nicoko dook kazoonɛ baale kidiczɛta e laadun.”

Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nɔɔnɔ talniinta, ma anek nɛ, “Anyak zin gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ci abon agoon. Bitɔ taalɔi kaal ugun anyei dook ka ŋerek guruc ɔl o amaat, ka ija nowawan niina aneet. Ŋaan akɔ katin jowa niina arɔkzɛt tamma.”
Mazi azii ɛɛti nici zɔɔz nico, alaca ɛlɛ, ma awɔ ŋaati inoni ziniza gi nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci anyak niini kaal ci meelik.
Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nuyak ogin, ma anek nɛ, “Ɔl ceen arɔk adɔi kak ŋaati avɔyi niigi baliinte o Joowo.”
Ma abiir nuyak ooti zooze nico. Bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Dɔl ogan, adɔi kak ŋaati akɔyi ɛɛti baliinte o Joowo.
Ɔl ceen arɔk adɔi ɔrɔɔt ŋaati avɔyi baliinte o Joowo kiyo alaŋ nyakale adunyonek nyibira ŋino vɔlɔŋ o.”
Enico mazi azii nuyawa gi nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma ajinɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Mazi yo ŋɛnɛɛn ci ka kɛɛlyai korok?”
Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci deer alaŋ anim korogoz ɛlɛ dɔyize cin doon, bar Jook nɛɛn o arogoz nɔɔnɔ, eeci kaala dook Joowa alaŋ adɔi.”
Itiŋa ni Pitɔr, ma anek Yesu nɛ, “Mazin yo naaga ci kotoŋteya kaal ogaacak dook looc, ma kivita kunuyin ineet, kakana inin?”

Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci ooŋ kɔrɔk cin, karabɔŋ een gɔtɔnɔgi ki ŋɔɔnɔgi, karabɔŋ een baatin ki yaatin, karabɔŋ een dɔl cigin, kibeen mana cin giye ci atuyan niini aneet, ki giye ci akati kaviyak o Joowo, ajowa niini loota ŋina kaal ci meelik kujuk kaal ci ooŋ niini o lak eet tur. Ajowa niini gɔtɔnɔgi, ŋɔɔnɔgi, yaatigin, dɔl been manɛɛn. Ma buk ajowa niini piryakzɛt liŋliŋonte nico, bar zin katin ŋaan ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.

Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci ooŋ kɔrɔk cin, karabɔŋ een gɔtɔnɔgi ki ŋɔɔnɔgi, karabɔŋ een baatin ki yaatin, karabɔŋ een dɔl cigin, kibeen mana cin giye ci atuyan niini aneet, ki giye ci akati kaviyak o Joowo, ajowa niini loota ŋina kaal ci meelik kujuk kaal ci ooŋ niini o lak eet tur. Ajowa niini gɔtɔnɔgi, ŋɔɔnɔgi, yaatigin, dɔl been manɛɛn. Ma buk ajowa niini piryakzɛt liŋliŋonte nico, bar zin katin ŋaan ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
Ma ɔl o titiny inoko, eegin niigi katin kaal ci labak. Maje ɔl o cɛlbɛz inoko, katin niigi titinyɛ.”

Ma awɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak avɔ Jerusalɛma. Arayin niini nuyak ɔɔwa, maje nuyak baraŋɛ nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti nɔkɔ. Buk ɔl ci ano nɔɔnɔ o anyak ŋoliin. Ma awa bodo Yesu nuyak ogin amɔtɔ ramana ka kuduwak nɔɔgɔ doon kaal o ka kivitak nɔɔnɔ.

Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di! Inoko kavɔ naaga Jerusalɛma. Zin tiŋeere ŋinaante kakɔ kanyonei naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto alaat o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto. Ma avɔ apayekan niigi aneeta daayiz. Ma avoyan ole ween modɛn.
Ma avɔ ararnan ɔl nica aneet, ma oortekan amot, ma arukan nyaboyɛn, ma vurta ɔɔt ni uruktan kadaak. Bar zin iinyaye ceen iiyu, ŋaan kiŋaaz bodo daayiza.”
Ma avunak Jemis ki Jɔn ween lɔgɔz o Zebedi Yesu, ma avu ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Gayoi, karooŋnyin da tuguweyet gi ci karooŋnya ce.”
Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ kutuguweyuŋ naa?”
