Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Katin waanci aavɛ niina lecere unun alaazetu baliinte o Joowo titiny tammu tadena, karooŋnya koromtɛ naaga kibeen ineet ŋaati anyekɛ gɔɔn eet codoi ŋaatinaaŋ kaavu ineet aza, maje codoi aavi ineet kaŋeta.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ agayu niiga gi ci ajinaŋ o. Animnyu kini niiga ipirta kiyo tiŋeere kakɔ kapirna naana o? Ma buk kini animnyu daayiz kiyo tiŋeere kakɔ kadaai naana o?”
Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ii, kanimnya labak.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt zin avɔ apirnanu kiyo tiŋeere kapirna naana o, ma avɔ adaaŋnu kiyo kakɔ kadaai naana o.
Bar zin gi ci ka kaavɛ ŋaatunooŋ ɛɛti codoi aneet aza, maje codoi aavi kaŋeta o, alaŋ een gi can ka kanyuŋ. Eeci ɛŋɛra Jooi ɔl ci ka kaavtiyɔ vitɛnane nicoko laadun.”
Mazi azii nuyawa ween amɔtɔ gi nico, otobortek niigi Jemis ki Jɔn nɔŋ.
Otowa ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ dook ŋaatodoi, ma anek nɛ, “Agayu niiga alaata o ɔl o alaŋ atu Jook, abal niigi ɔl ugeec dɔyiza.
Ma zin gi nici alaŋ ŋaatunooŋ abil nɔkɔ. Mã ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ kizi titiny ŋaatunooŋ, abon niini een gabaren ci gonoginu.
Mã ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ karayɛ ɔɔwa, abon niini een gabaren ci ɔl dook.
Eeci yo nuun een aneet ɛlɛ Ŋɛɛrti Eeto, alaŋ kakun ka kiiya kiliŋliŋtozeyan ɔl aneet, bar kakun ka kiliŋliŋozek nɔɔgɔ, ma kadaai ka korogoz ɔl ci meel.”

Ma bodo avunak niigi kutur o kazi Jeriko. Mazi awɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ki kɔlɛ kuture nico, anyak eet ci ruben aavi gɔl kabanyca ŋinaante alaye. Kazi eet nico zaar nɛ Bartimeyas. Niini ŋɛɛrti eet ci kazi Timayos.
Mazi azii niini nici Yesu ween eet o Nazarɛt, ɛgɛrɛny izi nɛ, “Yesu ween ŋɛɛrti Devid, tiritan da!”
Ma agernyek ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ ka kajawɔ. Bar enico agɛrɛny niini ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk we azi nɛ, “Ŋɛɛrti Devid, tiritan da!”
Ibil ni Yesu, ma anek ɔl nɛ, “Utuyayaŋ di nɔɔnɔ kiiya.”
Ma avɔ awa niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Talɔ! Tiŋa je. Awoyin Yesu.”
Ma ajukek niini rum onin malkinto looc, ma iŋaaz jena taman, ma akunak Yesu.
Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋ kutuguweyin naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini noko nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Gayoi, karooŋ kɔlan kɛbɛrɛ kicinɔ bodo.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ zin. Anyin tuwɛn unune ineet cinɔ.” Kataman nɔkɔ ɔkɔltɛ nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ oginɛ, ma ano niini Yesu gɔla.

Mazi avɔ ajɔŋɔz niigi Jerusalɛm, ɔɔtɔ niigi rak biye o kazi Kiŋiroc ajɔŋɔz kuturyok o kazi Bezpeja ki Bezani. Ma itoon Yesu nuyak ram anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ kuture ci kazi Bezpeja abil igeet ɔɔwa neke. Mazi avɔ arumnyu, ajowanu tedec jɔrɔn ci zigiro ci ŋaan laadun kotoodit ɔl acabje ŋinaante. Ɔɔkta ka anyaaktayaŋ ŋina.

Mazi avɔ ajɔŋɔz niigi Jerusalɛm, ɔɔtɔ niigi rak biye o kazi Kiŋiroc ajɔŋɔz kuturyok o kazi Bezpeja ki Bezani. Ma itoon Yesu nuyak ram anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ kuture ci kazi Bezpeja abil igeet ɔɔwa neke. Mazi avɔ arumnyu, ajowanu tedec jɔrɔn ci zigiro ci ŋaan laadun kotoodit ɔl acabje ŋinaante. Ɔɔkta ka anyaaktayaŋ ŋina.
Mã anyak eet ci ajinuŋ anekuŋ nɛ, Ɔɔganu naa? Enektek nɛ, Arɔɔŋ Manyi. Ŋintimiliny ŋaan abadakuŋ.”
Mazi avɔ niigi ŋinaante, amada didi jɔrɔn ci zigiro acabje ɔlɔ araan otoga gɔl kabanyca.
Mazi ɔɔga niigi zigir, enektek ɔl ogɛn ole ci ɛɛl ŋinaante nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gitaz ci agoonu noko? Ɔɔganu jɔrɔn ci zigiro noko naa?”
Ma aduwak niigi nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ona aduwa Yesu e. Otoŋit ni ɔl nici nɔɔgɔ kooti zigir.
Ma anyaak niigi Yesu zigir. Ma avu ataadek nuyawa rumanɛ ugeec malkinto zigir bawuc, ma aavɛ Yesu tadena.
Maje ɔl ci meelik ogɛn avetek rumanɛ ugeec malkinto gɔl. Maje ogɛnɛ atɛɛda bɔlɔk ci anyarnyar ḏorta, ma avu avetek gɔl kɛŋ.
Maje ɔl o arayin Yesu ɔɔwa o kibeen ɔl ci anowa nɔɔnɔ vurta o agɛrɛny anɔ nɛ, “Katanaaz Jook! Abon bai amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ o aku zaare o Joowo.
Abon bai amayuk Jooi nɔɔnɔ o ka kiiya kabal looc kiyo baale jijitinai Devid e.”
Ook ni Yesu Jerusalɛma, ma akɔ ceeze o Joowo, ma akɔ agɛlɛm niini kaal dook. Ma yomana imiirye niini ki nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram ɔɔt kuture o kazi Bezani.
Mazi abada niigi Bezaniya ŋeere, adawun Yesu magiz.
Ma acin niini rɛɛna kɛɛt ceen moneec anyak bɔlɔk ci meel ɔrɔɔt. Ma akɔ niini ka kook kicin karabɔŋ abiir. Mazi akɔ arum, bar acin een bɔlɔk doon, eeci alaŋ een iinya o gɔɔn abiirni monɛna nɛɛn.
Enek Yesu moneec nico nɛ, “Alaŋ bodo niina abiir kadak ɛɛti oman kɛbɛrɛ cugun nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.” Maje nuyawa azii zɔɔz nico nɔkɔ.

Mazi avɔ arum niigi Jerusalɛm, ook Yesu kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo eecitɔ, ma akɔ atɔɔwa ɔl o gɔɔn ataalinɛ kaal kaluwawa eecitɔ kibeen ɔl o ataali. Ma uup tarabɛzɛt ci ɔl o gɔɔn abali guruc. Ma ajuk lɛcɛrɛ ci ɔl o gɔɔn ataalinɛ yɛɛla.
Ma alaŋ anyek bodo niini eet oma kiiya kabatak kaluwa o ceez o Joowo ŋaati iloli kaal cigin.
Ɛdɛmɛz ni niini ɔl enek nɛ, “Azi Jooi waragewe onin nɛ, Awɛ ceez cane o kizi ceez ci ŋaryiinto modɛni dook, bar niiga anyceyu kizi ŋinti avu aroodinɛ agoryawa.”
Mazi azii alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto zɔɔz nico, orooŋit niigi gɔl ci ka kurukti Yesu kadaak. Amadik niigi nɔɔnɔ o, eeci abiir ɔl dook ooti demziinte onin.
Ma yomana itiŋgazɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak otoŋit Jerusalɛm.
Ma iitene co ŋeere mazi avu awɔ gɔla, icinit niigi moneec baale araabjai dook agɛrɔi buk.
Ma aada Pitɔr gi baal agɔɔn Yesu e, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Gayoi, cin di moneec baal ator e araabjai lai.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abon anyaku tuwɛn Joowa.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã anyak ɛɛti tuwɛn Joowa, ma anek niini bɛ nico nɛ, Piyai! Jukozek liil! Ma alaŋ anyak niini ziniza baabanok ram, gi nici agooni koca nɔkɔ.
Zin giye nico kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã anyak gi ci ajinu Jook ŋaryiinta, agaac nɔkɔ gi nici ŋaan anyonekuŋ igeet. Zin ŋaan anyuŋ Jooi didi gi nico.
Ma aŋaryinu, abon uuŋnu kaal o gɛr anyayeku ɔl oogi zinzeetinɛ ka buk Jooi ween baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena kotoŋ oŋeeti ugooc.”
Ma aŋaryinu, abon uuŋnu kaal o gɛr anyayeku ɔl oogi zinzeetinɛ ka buk Jooi ween baatunooŋ o aavi tammu tadena kotoŋ oŋeeti ugooc.”
Mazi abadaak niigi bodo Jerusalɛm, ook Yesu kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ma avunak nɔɔnɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo ki ɔl o demziinto kibeen ɔl o adikir baayizo.
Ma avu ajin nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim ŋɛnɛɛn ci anyin ineet alaazɛt ci atɔɔyɛ ɔl balawaz ceeze o Joowo o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Buk naana kajinuŋ igeet zɔɔz codoi ce. Mã abarzekaŋ jinɛn can o gole ci alɛɛmanu, kaduwakuŋ buk koca naana igeet alaazɛt can o aku ŋaaḏaŋ.
Uduktayaŋ di, baale ŋɛnɛɛn baal anyek Jɔn dɔyiz ci aku oonyi ɔl e? Anyek Jooi yo ɛɛti ci deer da?”
Ma adaŋɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Inoko mã kazi nɛ, Anyek baale Jɔn dɔyiz baal oonyɛnɛ Jooi, azi koca Yesu nɛ, Ma da alaŋ zin atuwenu naa?
Buk mã kazi nɛ, Anyek Jɔn dɔyiz nice ɔl ci deer, aborneket koca ɔl ageet nɔŋ.” Aŋole niigi o, eeci ɔl ci meel aga niigi Jɔn baale nyakaŋan didi.
Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni niigi Yesu enektek nɛ, “Alaŋ kagaya eet ci da anyek Jɔn dɔyiz o.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ zin buk kaduwakuŋ naana igeet dɔyiz ci kagɔɔnɛ naana kaal nicoko o.”

Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziinta nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ci aḏok kɛɛn ci gɔɔn agɔɔnanɛ ɔl nyaantanɛ mana. Olok ni mana juruŋ. Ma adawa look ci ka gɔɔn kamacoyek ɔl kɛbɛrɛ ci keenu o. Ma ɛɛnyca vaaco ci appe ka kɛbɛkti ɔl mana. Anyek ni niini mana ɔl ci ka keevit ka mã abiir kɛɛna, ka keŋerit ki nɔɔgɔ. Ɛɛrɔn ni niini ook looce oman.
Mazi awɔ abiir kɛɛna, itoonek niini gabaren cin ɔl o aliŋliŋ mana ka kiiya kiyiitek nɔɔnɔ kɛɛn kɛbɛrɛ cigin.
Mazi aku arum gabarɛnti nici ɔl ci aliŋliŋ mana o, agamit niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma aruk, ma anyek kimiire nɔkɔ kɔkɔm kaal ci akɔyi kina.
Bodo itoona ɛɛti o mano gabaren oma, ma avu aruk ɔl o aliŋliŋ mana gabaren nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kanyak tuben ɔɔwa, ma amomoz nɔɔnɔ.
Bodo itoona niini gabaren oma. Enico uruyit niigi gabaren nico kadaak. Ma agoonek niigi kaal nicoko gabara ci mɛɛlɛ, oogi aruk korogit, oogi aruk kadaayitɔ.
Maje ɛɛti ci mano noko anyak ŋɛɛrin codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ci arɛɛz ɔrɔɔt. Ma azi niini nɛ, “Atitiny tiŋeere niigi ŋɛɛran.” Itoonek ni niini nɔɔgɔ ŋɛɛrin.
Mazi avɔ acin ɔl ci liŋliŋonto noko nɔɔnɔ, izitɔ nɛ, “Nicini ŋɛɛrti eet o mano nɛɛn. Ivita kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak ka kuula kaal dook kizi cigaac.”
Agamit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma aruk kadaak, ma avɔ ajukek tuu mana bawuca.”

Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mazi yo inoko ma akɔ abada ɛɛti ci mano o agoonek ɔl nicoko naa? Bar kanɛ aku koca niini ma aruk ɔl ci baal aliŋliŋ mana noko dook kadaayitɔ. Ma anyaa ɔl oogi ka kivita kiliŋliŋit mana.
Kaga nɔkɔ ekeebtu niiga waragewe o Joowo zɔɔz o azi nɛ, Ma bɛ o abor ɔl o gɔɔn ɛɛnyɛt ceezi biyɛnɛ, ma apɛz kizi gi ci labak, bar bɛ o titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk biyɛn o enyciinto dook nɛɛn.
Jook zin nɛɛn o agɔɔn gi nico, ma gi nici gi ci panypany keteedet biye ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
Mazi azii alaata o Juz yabziin nico, orooŋit kagamit Yesu, eeci aga niigi ariik niini nɔɔgɔ yabziinte nico. Bar bodo aŋole niigi kɔlɛ. Ɔtɔɔzɔ ni niigi otoŋit nɔɔnɔ.
Ma itoonek alaata o Juz Yesu ɔl oogi ole o Parici kibeen ole o Erod ka kɔɔt kijinit nɔɔnɔ zoozok ci ajin ka mã abarzek niini nɔɔgɔ gɛrzɛ, ka kagamit nɔɔnɔ.

Ma avunak niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma avu anek nɛ, “Gayoi, kagayin naaga ineet gɔɔn azooz zoozok ci alɛɛma. Ma alaŋ aŋole baabani ci ɔl oogi, ma alaŋ buk ari niina ziniz titinyɔn ci eet ci deer. Duwayet di, mayo abon ŋaati karuweka meeri alaan o kazi Sizar, yo gɛrzɛ da?”
Maje Yesu aga cinaan cineeŋ o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Arooŋnyu icintawaŋ naa? Anyaakta di zin gurucoc ceen ziit anycaŋ kicin.”
Ma anyek didi ɔl nɔɔnɔ gurucoc, ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ŋum ceeni kibeen zaar ci ayeedonek gurucoc nico ci ŋɛnɛ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋum o alaan o kazi Sizar kibeen zaar ogin.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anycek zin Sizar gi o akati nɔɔnɔ. Maje gi o akati Jook, anycek Jook” Mazi azii niigi Yesu azi nɔkɔ, olla apaŋantɛ paŋ.
Ma bodo avunak Yesu ɔl ogɛn ole o kazi Sajuzi gɔɔn abaaban niigi azi nɛ, Ɔl o adaai alaŋ bodo iŋaaz daayiza. Ma avu ajin niigi Yesu anek nɛ,
“Gayoi, baale ayeedeket Mosis lotinok ci azi nɛ, Mã adaai ɛɛti, ma ooŋna ŋaa cin iŋaan kanyak dɔl, abon arigiz gɔtɔnnya ci arogi o ŋaa ka kitirak dɔl ka kavada nɔɔnɔ.
Zin baale anyak gɔtɔn ceen torgɛrɛm. Ma arɔcɛ abuuwi, ma adaai iŋaan kitirak ŋaa dɔl.
Irigizun ni gɔtɔnnya ci anowa nɔɔnɔ o ŋaa. Bodo buk adaak niini iŋaan kitirak ŋaa dɔl. Ma arigiz bodo gɔtɔnnya o anowa nɔɔnɔ ŋaa, ma adaai buk iŋaan akɔm ŋaa dɔl.
Ma azɔp daayizi nici kibeen ŋaa nico lɔgɔz ceen gɔtɔn noko zɛɛ makacin idicai niigi dook torgɛrɛma kɔkɔma dɔl ci arita. Ma vurta adaawun buk ŋaa.
Duwayet zin di, katin ma iŋaaz ɔl daayiza, ŋaa nici akati ŋaatineeŋ ŋɛnɛɛn? Ŋaabaal ɔzɔbtɔi niigi dook ŋaa nico.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abacu niiga gi nico ɔrɔɔt, eeci alaŋ agayu waragɛnya o Joowo kibeen dɔyiz onin.
Katin ma iŋaaz ɔl daayiza, alaŋ bodo arɔcɛ, bar eelit niigi kiyo toonnyawa o Joowo o.
Zin giye ci akati ŋaazi daayiza, baale uduwak Jooi Mosis iitene baal abilni Mosis lugurgoce o alanyit e gi ci anek nɛ, Keen naana Jook o Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob.
Alaŋ een zin niini Jook ci ɔl o adaai, bar Jook ci ɔl o arogi. Zin Ibrayim ki Aizak been Jakob yo nuun adaayitɔ o, ŋaan niigi arogi nɔkɔ. Abacu niiga zɔɔz nico.”

Ma aku ɛɛti codoi ole o demziinto, ma aku azii ɔl ŋaati adaŋɔn kibeen Yesu. Mazi acin niini Yesu alɛɛma kaal o ajin ɔl nɔɔnɔ dook nɔkɔ, ijin buk niini nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Mayo lotinowɛ dook lotinɛt jaŋ ci titiny ɔrɔɔt?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Lotinɛt ci titiny ɔrɔɔt nɛɛn o azi nɛ, Iziiktɔ ɔl o Israyil, Manyi onai nɛɛn Jooi doon, ma adoyi niini ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
Ereezit zin Jook ween Manyi unooŋ zinzeetine ugooc dook, ki rogete unooŋ dook, ki baabaninte unooŋ dook, kibeen dɔyize unooŋ dook.
Bodo lotinɛt ci titiny ano gɔɔn nico nɛɛn o azi nɛ, Ereezit ɔl o abaawonu kiyo areezu eleeti ugooc o. Akɔm zin bodo lotinɛt ci titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk lotinok ceen ram noko.”
Ma anek ɛɛti ci demziinto noko Yesu nɛ, “Gayoi, aleem didi niina gi ci azi nɛ, Adoyi Jooi ween Manyi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, ma akɔm bodo Jook oma o.

Abon didi karɛɛz naaga Jook zinzeetine ogaac dook, kibeen baabaninowe ogaac dook, kibeen doyizowe ogaac dook. Abon buk karɛɛz ɔl o kabaawɔ kiyo karɛɛz naaga eleeti ogaac o. Lotinowa nicigi dook titinyɛ kujuk todoyok o kavaat gooya kibeen taabinɛt oogi o kagoonek Jook.”

Mazi acin Yesu eet nico abarzek nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz aritun nɔkɔ, enek nɛ, “Alaŋ adɛyai niina baliinte o Joowo.” Enico akɔma eet ci anim bodo kijin Yesu. Otoŋole niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ajini, eeci atɛɛza niini nɔɔgɔ.
Ma vurta mazi adɛmzɛ Yesu ceeze o Joowo, enek niini niini ɔl nɛ, “Abac alaata o demziinto zɔɔz o azi nɛ, Kiristo niini Ŋɛɛrti Devid.
Eeci baale anyek Vɔŋizi o Joowo Devid kizi nɛ, Anek Jooi Manyi onan nɛ, Aavu niina libire can azo o zɛɛ ma kanyin rocek modo ugun amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.
Mazi awo Devid alya Kiristo kizi Manyi cin. Zin bodo Kiristo een ŋɛɛrti Devid ku?”
Ma atalnɛ ɔl ci meelik ɔrɔɔt ŋaati aziiŋni demziin o Yesu.
Ma adɛmɛz niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Egenyit ole o demziinto gɔɔn awɔ rumanene ci wuntik alina, ma arɛɛz zaawanɛt ci atitinyi ɔl nɔɔgɔ mɛlɛgɛnyai.
Ma arɛɛz niigi ŋaati aavtiyɛ lecerene ci titiny ceezine o lotento. Ma arɛɛz vitɛn ci titiny aavtiyɛ ŋaati gɔɔn alotɛn ɔl azɔli dayiin.
Adak gɔɔn niigi kaal ci ŋaai o bɔi, ma ayelza eleeti ŋaati aŋaryin ŋinti wun. Zin ɔl nicigi katin ajowa niigi Joowa payiin ci gɛr ɔrɔɔt.”
Mazi aku aavi Yesu loota ŋaao ajɔŋɔz loidoŋ o gɔɔn arek ɔl muci o ceez o Joowo, icinun niini ɔl ŋaati aaranɛ guruc. Ma acin niini ɔl ci meelik ole ween arɔk aara guruc ci meelik.
Iiya ni ŋaa ci bɔyɛ amaat, ma aku aruk milinyɛt ceen ram.
Otowa ni Yesu nuyak ogin, ma anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ŋaa ci bɔyɛ amaat noko uruk niini guruc ci meelik kujuk ɔl dook.
Eeci ɔl ogɛn aruk niigi guruc ci aŋɛra guruce ugeec meelik, maje ŋaa nici aara niini guruc ogin dayiino dook.”
Mazi aduŋna Yesu ceeze o Joowo, enek nuyaiti codoi nuyawe ogin nɛ, “Gayoi, cin di ceez ci Joowo noko kibeen biyɛn ci eenycinɛ noko alina ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Acin ceez ci Joowo appe noko. Oyoki katin kazaantozek biyɛn nici dook looc, kɔkɔm codoi ataadonek gɔn.”
Mazi akɔ aavi Yesu biye o kazi Kiŋiroc ŋaati acini ceez o Joowo, ivitak nɔɔnɔ Pitɔr ki Jemis ki Jɔn kibeen Andoru, ma avu ajin nɔɔnɔ ŋaati aavɛ doon.
Anek nɛ, “Duwayet di ma kaala nici agooni tiŋa. Duwayet buk, tiŋeere ma ka kakatai kaala nici, kaga ku izi iiteni cineeŋ ajɔn o?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Egenyit! Má anyeku eet oma kalabawuŋ.
Anyak katin ɔl ci meelik azɔɔz zaare cigan avu katin azi nɛ, Aneeta Kiristo nɛɛn. Alabek zin katin niigi ɔl tuu.
Mazi katin aziiŋnu oroonok ci ajɔn kibeen awaŋ ci oroonok ci rɛɛn, má anyeku zinzeeti kivirit, eeci kaal nici ŋɛdɛt katin agooni, bar zin ŋaan rak koṯorɛi lɔɔci.
Katin ɔl ci looc oma ɔɔr ɔl ci looc oma. Ma amɔɔt tɔdɔwa kirakirak loocowe ogɛn, ma anyak loocowa tarjo. Zin nicigi kanaan ci looc libento, ma abil olla kiyo wucezi o gɔɔn aami ŋaa dole o.

Egenyit zin niiga alya. Agamnyuŋ katin ɔl igeet, ma avoyuŋ ceezine o roonnyo. Ma adookuŋ ceezine o lotento. Ma avoyuŋ alaate o abal ɔl. Zin giye o atuyaŋ niiga aneet, animnyu katin niiga uduktak nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz onan een didi.
Zin rak ɔɔwa ma ŋaan koṯorɛi lɔɔci, uuwawonek rak kaviyawa o Joowo modɛn dook.

Zin ma agamnyuŋ ɔl igeet, ma avoyuŋ roonnyi giye o atuyaŋ niiga aneet, má anyeku zinzeeti kivirit giye ci ka udukta. Ma iiya iiteni nica olla udukta zɔɔz ci anyuŋ Jooi igeet, eeci alaŋ azoozu niiga dɔyize cunooŋ doon, bar Vɔŋiz o Joowo nɛɛn o ŋaan anyuŋ igeet ozoozit.
Buk katin gɔɔn ɛɛti ce akɔyi gɔtɔni daayiza. Maje ɛɛti ce akɔyi ŋɛɛrin daayiza. Maje buk dɔlya amarnin baatigeec ki yaatigeec, ma avɔyi nɔɔgɔ daayiza.
Ɔl dook katin amarninuŋ igeet, eeci atuyaŋ niiga aneet. Zin ɛɛti ci agam ɛlɛ zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci arogoz Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
Abon agayu kɛŋ ci zɔɔz oma ce juruŋ. Ma acinu katin ceeze o Joowo manyilibe o gɛr ɔrɔɔt, abon ɔl o Judiya avironek biyɛn.
Mã aavi ɛɛti ceez tadena, abon aduŋna, ma adɔkɔny enice calaŋ akɔ ceeza tɔ ka kook kodoma kaal ogin.
Mã aavi ɛɛti mana, abon avir enice calaŋ abadaak kɔrɔk ka kodoma rum cin malkinto.
Nɔŋ ci gɛr katin ŋaane o anyake iinyaye niceke, kibeen ŋaane o arɔkti.
Ijinit Jook ŋaryiinta ka calaŋ iina kaal nica lɔɔla.
Eeci iinyaye niceke anyak lɔɔci libɛn ci ŋaan laadun kiita ŋaan baal ɛɛnycanɛ Jooi looc e zɛɛ been inoko o. Ma alaŋ buk katin bodo iina gi ci abil nɔkɔ.
Mã da calaŋ atɛɛt Jooi iinya niceke kizi kidicɛ, akɔm koca eet ci arogi. Bar zin giye o ka korogti ɔl oginɛ aŋɛra, anyewun niini iinya niceke kizi kidicɛ.
Zin iitene nice mã anyak eet ci anekuŋ nɛ, Icinit di Kiristo ceeni, karabɔŋ anekuŋ nɛ, Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn caana, má aziiŋnu nɔɔnɔ.
Eeci katin anyak ɔl ci anyek eleeti kizi Kiristo kibeen ɔl ci anyek eleeti kizi nyakaŋanɛt. Ɔl nicigi katin agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ka kalabtai ɔl o aŋɛra Jooi.
Egenyit zin, eeci kuduwayuŋ kaal nicoko dook maŋaan kakati o.
Bar zin iinyaye ci ano looc libɛn nice ookci ii kizi koli, ma alaŋ nyɛlɔyi alanyit.
Maje monyonya iina tammu tadena, maje kaala o ɛɛl tammu bɔbɔra amɔɔt, ma ookci.
Zin iitene nice ŋaan acinan katin ɔl aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati kakunɛ diizwani dɔyize ci appe kibeen titinyɔnta.
Ma kitoon katin toonnyak o Joowo kɔɔt kuluta ɔl o ɛŋɛra Jooi looc libirɔ dook.”
Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Ojokta niiga zɔɔz nico keete ween moneec. Gɔɔn mã uvurutit oto oginɛ, ma aryek bɔlɔk ci colai, kaga izi ŋinti ka kiiyai lɔɔlɔ.
Zin buk mã acinu libɛn nico, agaac niiga kizɛ naana ajɔn ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ka kiiya.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ɔl ogɛnɛ katin ole ci arogi inoko o alaŋ adaai zɛɛ ma acin libɛn nico ŋaati iinanɛ.
Tammu taden kibeen tɔdɔ katin adicai, maje zɔɔz onane abil kɛlɛɛmnyai nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
Akɔm eet ci aga iiten ci katin iinanɛ kaala nici o. Buk toonnyawa o Joowo alaŋ aga. Naana alya Ŋɛɛrti Joowo alaŋ buk kaga. Bar aga baaba doon.
Ebeyit zin eleeti eeci alaŋ agayu iiten nice aku tiŋa.

Atobɔ zɔɔz nici kibeen zɔɔz o eet o ɛɛrɔn o. Mazi ka kɛɛrɔn, aricanek niini gabara ogin zɔɔz ci ka kuzuuti kɔrɔk. Ma anyek gɔɔn gabaren co liŋliŋɔn cin doon. Ma aricanek buk niini eet o abɛk araan ka kɛbɛk araan juruŋ.
Egenyit zin! Iziti vililɛ, eeci alaŋ agayaŋ niiga aneet kakun tiŋa. Karabɔŋ kakun yomana, karabɔŋ een baalin kɛŋa, karabɔŋ een ŋaati amamani tammu, karabɔŋ een ŋeere.
Zin mã kakunakuŋ boyoŋyoŋ, abon kajowanuŋ eeginu vililɛ calaŋ ooginu.
Ma gi ci kaduwakuŋ igeet noko, kaduwai buk ɔl dook. Kiziti vililɛ.”

Inoko eelit iinya raman ci ka kulutɔi ɔl ka kadakti dayiin o aadanɛ vardaŋinɛt. Buk iiteni nici iiten o gɔɔn adayi niigi ḏɔkɛn calaŋ amokcar. Orooŋit ni alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto gɔl ci ka kagamti Yesu ka kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak kɔkɔm eet ci aga.
Ma anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ abon ŋaati kagɔɔni nɔkɔ iitene ci aadanɛ ɔl vardaŋinɛt o, eeci koca ayoket ɔl.”

Maje Yesu aavi kuture o kazi Bezani adake ole o Saiman baal anyak mɔɔriz o gidaŋ e. Mazi ŋaan adake nɔkɔ, iiyak nɔɔnɔ ŋaa oman anyaa ketezewoc ci anyak karacoc o kazi narat ci ataalyai guruce ci meelik ɔrɔɔt. Ma alip ŋaa nici ketezewoc inyaa, ma aḏuutɛkɛ niini Yesu karacoc nico ɔɔ.
Bar ŋinaante otoborit ɔl ogɛn nɔŋ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Mayo aminaŋi laadun karacoc gaga naa?
Abon waan ataalinɛ karacoc nico ka kojowa guruc ci meelik ka kanyek ɔl ci amaat.” Ozoozit ni niigi ŋaa nico ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔɔŋ kanyaaktak nɔɔnɔ alyaan.
Ma bar anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Amilanu ŋaa nico zɔɔza gaga naa? Otoŋit nɔɔnɔ. Agoonekan niini aneet gi ci abon.
Aromenu niiga kibeen ɔl ci amaat o ŋina. Mã arooŋnyu itiritit nɔɔgɔ, ŋaan atiritu, maje naana alaŋaan bodo kaavɛ ŋaatunooŋ been nɛɛn.
Ma ŋaa nici agɔɔn gi ci anim niini kutugu. Aḏuutekan niini aneet karacoc o ka kidimdiman dawiin onan ma ŋaan kadaak o.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, tiŋeere loocowe o uuwayi ɔl kaviyak o Joowo dook, aduwa buk ɔl gi ci abon agɔɔn ŋaa nicini noko, ma aada ɔl nɔɔnɔ giye nico.”
Ɔtɔɔ ni Judaz Iskariyot ween nuyai codoi nuyawe ween amɔtɔ ram ook alaate o adikir ceeze o Joowo ka kook kuduwak nɔɔgɔ gɔl ci agami niigi Yesu.
Mazi avɔ azii niigi gi nico, ataltɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mã aduwaket gɔl ci kagamnya Yesu, kanyin koca guruc.” Orooŋun ni Judaz gɔl ci ka kɛyɛlɛkɛ nɔɔgɔ Yesu.

Ma iitene o oowu iinyaye o gɔɔn adayi ɔl o Juz ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar, otodoŋit niigi nyɔɔ ci ka kaadai vardaŋinɛt. Ma ajin nuyawa Yesu anek nɛ, “Koota yo ŋaaḏaŋ ka koota kidimdimanta dayiin ci kaadanɛ vardaŋinɛt?”
Otowa ni Yesu nuyak ram, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ Jerusalɛma. Avɔ arumonu tedec ŋinaante kibeen eet ci anyak maam ija. Oneec zin nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ arum ɛɛti ci anuyu noko kɔrɔk, enektek eet ci korgu o nɛ, Anekin gayoiti nɛ, Abil ceez ci ka koota kadakta ki nuyak ogan dayiin o kaadanɛ vardaŋinɛt ŋaaḏaŋ?
Ŋinaante ŋaan ayelekuŋ niini ceez ci ɛɛnyci gɔn tadena ci anyak kaal dook o karɔɔŋ naaga kadakti dayiin. Ɔɔtɔ zin utuguz dayiin cigaac ŋinaante.”
Ma iŋaaz nuyawa avɔ Jerusalɛma, ma avɔ didi ajowa kaal dook e ona aduwakɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ e. Ma adimdiman niigi dayiin o aadanɛ vardaŋinɛt.
Ma yomana ivita Yesu kibeen nuyak ween amɔtɔ ram ɔɔtɔ ŋaa ona agooninɛ dayiin e.
Mazi avɔ adake, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ataalinan tiŋeere ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ igeet ɛlɛ ci kazɔlɔ noko.”
Ma abaaban nuyawa gi nico zinzeetinɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek gɔɔn ceeni Yesu nɛ, “Ci aduwa o aneeta gi? Aneeta gi?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ igeet ci eeginu amɔtɔ ram kazɔlɔ kodooce codoi noko akɔ tiŋeere ataalinan aneet.
Mazin naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaan kadaai eo aduwan waragɛ o Joowo laadun. Bar zin nɔŋ ci kol eete ci ataalinan aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto alaatɛ o. Maya da bar niini ŋaati alaŋ aritan been nɛɛn.”
Mazi ŋaan adake niigi nɔkɔ, odoma Yesu ḏokoc, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt ḏokoc nico, ma aŋerek nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Adayit. Nicini ɛlɛ onan nɛɛn.”
Bodo adoma diic ci anyak nyaan, ma anyek Jook zany, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ kowodit.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Nicigi biye ogan aḏuuti ka kojokta ɔl ci meel bonat. Ma biyeta nici idica terkediin baal aterkedek Jooi ɔl ogin aŋɛra niini e.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ bodo kawudi nyaan nico nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma kakɔ kawudi nyaan ci colai baliinte o Joowo.”
Ebenit ni niigi enico beniin ci Joowo, ma awɔ avɔ biye o kazi Kiŋiroc.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Niiga dook aviryu tedec otoŋteyaŋ looc. Eeci azi Jooi waragewe onin nɛ, Karui tiŋeere eet o towawiinto kazaantɛ ɛɛzana.
Zin tiŋeere mã kitiŋa naana daayiza, kakɔ Galiliya ɔɔwa ŋaatunooŋ. Ŋaan zin kavɔ karumɔ ki igeet ŋinaante.”
Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Mayo nuun avir ɔl dook, alaŋ naana kavir ŋaatun kotoŋeyin looc been nɛɛn.”
Ma anek Yesu Pitɔr nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, adaŋnye tija zɛɛ been lak iiyu iŋaan kɔrɔk toloci lak ram.”
Maje bar Pitɔr aduv ɔrɔɔt azi nɛ, “Mayo nuun ka kadaayit ki ineet, alaŋ bai kadaŋnye nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.” Ma aduwa buk nuyawa dook zɔɔz nico.
Mazi avunak niigi ŋino kazi Gezemani, enek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Aavtiz ŋina. Kakɔ rak naana kaŋaryɛ ŋaate.”
Ma akɔyi niini Pitɔr ki Jemis ki Jɔn. Ma akunak nɔɔnɔ inoni ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kanyei naana ziniza inoni ci appe ɔrɔɔt ci ajonini daayizi. Aavtiz zin niiga ŋina ebeyit eleeti ŋaryiinta.”
Ma iicak niini kidicilim, ma abayek ɛlɛ looc, ma ajin Jook ka kozooti nɔɔnɔ calaŋ apirna daayiza.
Ma ajin Jook azi nɛ, “Baaba, aboke kaala dook ŋaatun. Nyɛyi zin piryakzɛt ci ka kiiyayan noko ŋaatan. Bar zin tugu eo arɔɔŋɛ niina, alaŋ een eo karɔɔŋɛ naana.”
Mazi abada ŋaryiinta, amada nuyak ween iiyu e oogin. Ma anek niini Pitɔr nɛ, “Saiman, ooginu naa? Akɔmnekuŋ ŋaati abeyinu ŋaryiinta ziit codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ?
Iziti vililɛ. Aŋaruyɔ ka calaŋ acinanuŋ Loryen zinzeeti zɛɛ ma agoonu oŋɛ. Eeci zinzeeti ugooc arɔɔŋ kutuguzɔ kaal ci abon, maje bar eleeti cugooc o alaŋ anyak dɔyiz.”
Bodo amiiri niini, ma akɔ aŋaryɛ aduwa zɔɔz we ɛlɛ.
Mazi abadaak nuyak, amada nɔɔgɔ oogin bodo, eeci adoŋ niigi ɔrɔɔt. Mazi iiŋka niini nɔɔgɔ, alaŋ aga niigi gi ci ka kuduktak nɔɔnɔ.

Ma akɔ bodo ŋaryiin zɛɛ mazi abada ŋaryiinta eceen lak iiyu o, amada nuyak bodo oogin. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan dim ooginu ayubuzu nɔkɔ? Odot zin. Iiya ziiti o ka kipirai. Inoko kanyozozeya naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ɔl o oŋenu.
Itiŋgaz! Kɔtɔɔz! Icinit di, eet o ka kataaloyan nica izi ajɔn.”

Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz Yesu nɔkɔ, urum Judaz Iskariyot looc. Ɔrkɔra niini ki kɔlɛ ci anyak kabazwa ci wuntik kibeen kɛɛn ceen ŋolonɛt. Ma ɔl nicoko itoona alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo ki ɔl o demziinto kibeen ɔl o baayizo titiny.
Maje Judaz uyene uduwak ɔl nicoko gi ci anek nɛ, “Ɛɛti ci kakɔ ŋaatin, ma kacoco nɔɔnɔ ŋalyamoc zaawinta o, eet ci arooŋnyu o nɛɛn. Agamit nɔɔnɔ, ma abeku juruŋ ka calaŋ avir ŋaatunooŋ.”
Iiya ni Judaz, ma akɔ ŋaati Yesu, ma azaa niini Yesu azi nɛ, “Gayoi.” Ma acoco nɔɔnɔ ŋalyamoc.
Ma avu ɔl ci ona ɔrkɔra ki nɔɔnɔ o, ma agam Yesu.
Ovoca ni ɛɛti codoi ole o aavtiz ŋinaante kabaz tibila, ma aruk gabaren ci alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo kɛtɛɛda itat, por.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔ ma avunakaŋ kabazwani ki ŋolonɛtɛ kiyo avunaku eet ceen agoryai o naa?
Tup nɔkɔ gɔɔn karomɛ ki igeet ceeze o Joowo adikir ŋaati kadɛmzinɛ, ma ŋaan agamtaŋ niiga aneet. Bar zin inoko gi o aduwa waragɛ o Joowo baale didi ibil tɔ.”
Zin ivirit nuyawa dook otoŋtek Yesu doon looc.
Ma ano logoti codoi Yesu. Maje logoti nici amalik rum codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Mazi arɔɔŋ kagamit ɔl nɔɔnɔ,
bar ibica niini nɔɔgɔ kodotek rum cin malkinto o looc, ma adɔkɔny ŋaḏinyiny nɔkɔ.
Ma avɔyi ɔl Yesu korge o alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo. Ma alotai alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto ki ɔl o baayizo titiny.
Maje Pitɔr ano Yesu rɛɛna, ma akɔ kaluwawe o kɔrɔk o alaan o adikir. Ma akɔ aavɛ goo aromɛ niini kibeen ɔl o abɛk kɔrɔk o alaano.

Ma ŋinaante odomta alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo kibeen ɔl o roonnyo dook orooŋit bacok ci aduwa zɔɔz ci gɛr akati Yesu ka kapaktɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz. Bar akɔm bacok ci ajowa niigi aduwa gi ci alɛɛma ci akati Yesu, eeci ɔl ci meelik aduwa vɔlɔŋ ci akani niini nɔɔnɔ, bar molokwana cigeec o alaŋ atobɔ.

Ma ŋinaante odomta alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo kibeen ɔl o roonnyo dook orooŋit bacok ci aduwa zɔɔz ci gɛr akati Yesu ka kapaktɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz. Bar akɔm bacok ci ajowa niigi aduwa gi ci alɛɛma ci akati Yesu, eeci ɔl ci meelik aduwa vɔlɔŋ ci akani niini nɔɔnɔ, bar molokwana cigeec o alaŋ atobɔ.

Gɔɔn iŋaaz ɔl ogɛnɛ jena, ma aduwa vɔlɔŋ ci akatni Yesu azi nɛ, “Kaziikna iiten baale nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, Kooyoi iiten oma ceez ci Joowo baal ɛɛnyca ɔl ci deer noko. Ma bodo kɛɛnyca naana oma iinyaye ceen iiyu nɔkɔ calaŋ ɛɛti ci deer anim kɛtɛɛnya.”

Gɔɔn iŋaaz ɔl ogɛnɛ jena, ma aduwa vɔlɔŋ ci akatni Yesu azi nɛ, “Kaziikna iiten baale nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, Kooyoi iiten oma ceez ci Joowo baal ɛɛnyca ɔl ci deer noko. Ma bodo kɛɛnyca naana oma iinyaye ceen iiyu nɔkɔ calaŋ ɛɛti ci deer anim kɛtɛɛnya.”
Buk bodo molokwana ci ɔl nicoko o alaŋ atobɔ.
Itiŋa ni alaani o adikir ceeze o Joowo, ma ajin Yesu anek nɛ, “Akɔm dim niina gi ci abariz kaale ci aduwa ɔl nicigi noko?”
Maje Yesu ajaki, kɔkɔm gi ci abariz. Bodo ajin alaani nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina Kiristo ween Ŋɛɛrti Joowo nɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aneet nɛɛn. Iiten oma acinaŋ aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kaavɛ libire o azo o Jook o Adɔi, ma ŋaan acinaŋ katin niiga aneet ŋaati kakunɛ diizwani tammu tadena.”
Enico ɛrɛɛc alaani nici rum onin maany bornɛt nɔŋa, ma azi nɛ, “Alaŋaan bodo karɔɔŋ bacok ci ka kuduktayet gi ci gɛr agɔɔn ɛɛti nici.
Inoko iziiktu niiga momoz cin amomozi niini Jook o. Mayo zin inoko apayeku niiga nɔɔnɔ naa?”
Ma azi niigi dook nɛ, “Aganɔ niini kibeen daayiz.”
Ma oortek ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ nɔɔnɔ amot, maje ɔl ogɛnɛ abuŋ nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ ruma, ma aruk, ma bodo ajin anek nɛ, “Ɔl cigaŋ ci arukin o?” Ma anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔl o beyiinto, ma aruk niigi buk nɔɔnɔ.
Maje Pitɔr ŋaan aavi kaluwawa nɔkɔ. Iiya ni dole ci aliŋliŋonek alaan o adikir.
Mazi acin Pitɔr ŋaati aavɛ goo noko, ɛgɛlɛm niini nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt, ma anek nɛ, “Orkoryu ri buk gɔɔn niina kibeen Yesu ci Nazarɛt noko.”
Bar adaŋnyi niini azi nɛ, “Alaŋ kazii zɔɔz ci aduwa o.” Ma adun niini akɔ abil araan tatoga. Taman nɔkɔ ɔrɔk toloci.
Mazi acin dole bodo Pitɔr, uduwak ɔl ci aavtiz ŋinaante enek nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici nuyai ci Yesu.”
Bar Pitɔr adaŋnyi bodo.
Ŋintimiliny enektek ɔl ci aavtiz ŋinaante o Pitɔr nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt niina een nuyai ci Yesu, eeci een buk niina eet ci Galili.”
Enico uduwa Pitɔr ŋaati itooni Jook gi ci azi nɛ, “Kaduwa naana gi ci kaleem. Alaŋ kaga eet ci aduwanu o. Mã kalabanuŋ, adakan koca Jooi.”
Taman nɔkɔ ɔrɔk toloci bodo, ma aada Pitɔr zɔɔz baal aduwak Yesu nɔɔnɔ baal anek nɛ, “Adaŋnyan tiŋeere niina aneet lak iiyu iŋaan kɔrɔk toloci lak ram e.” Mazi aada niini zɔɔz nico, utulu ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.

Ma ŋeere olotai alaata o adikir ceeze o Joowo taman kibeen ɔl o demziinto kibeen ɔl o baayizo titiny, ma avu abaaban niigi dook gi ci ka kutuguzek Yesu. Acabit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn, ma avɔyi alaane o kazi Pailat. Niini eet ci ɔl o Rom, ma abal Judiya.
Ma ajin Pailat Yesu anek nɛ, “Ineet alaan o ɔl o Juz nɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa niina o.”
Bodo alaata o ceez o Joowo aduwa kaal ci gɛr meelik akati Yesu.
Ma ajin Pailat bodo Yesu anek nɛ, “Akɔm dim gi ci abariz? Alaŋ azii kaal ci gɛr akanin ineet aduwa ɔl noko dook?”
Buk enico ɔkɔm Yesu gi ci abariz. Makacin abaraŋɛ Pailat ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt.
Maje waanice gɔɔn ma een iiten o adayi ɔl o Juz dayiin o aadanɛ vardaŋinɛt, aboroc Pailat eet codoi ole o acabje ci tɛ arɔɔŋ ɔl nɔɔnɔ koborocai.
Ma enice anyak eet ci kazi Barabas ci acabje kibeen gɔnɔgi oogi giye ci aborni niigi akuma, ma ayɔwɔ ki takirnya zɛɛ makacin uruyit niigi ɔl koogi kadaayitɔ.
Olotai ni kɔlɛ, ma avu ajin Pailat ka koborcak niini nɔɔgɔ eet oma eonin gɔɔn agɔɔni laadun iinyaye o gɔɔn aadanɛ ɔl vardaŋinɛt.
Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ kɔɔgayuŋ alaan o Juz?”
Maje Pailat aga niini alaata o ceez o Joowo anyaa Yesu giye ci olla amadiyi niigi nɔɔnɔ gaga nɔkɔ.
Bar alaata o ceez o Joowo otoŋomtek kɔlɛ dook ka kijinit Pailat kotoŋ Yesu, ka koborocak nɔɔgɔ Barabas.
Ma ajin bodo Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma eet ci awuyu kizi alaan ci ɔl o Juz o arooŋnyaŋ kutuguwek nɔɔnɔ naa?”
Ma ɛgɛrɛny niigi bodo anɔ nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ kadaak keete ween talakec.”
Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Naa? Agɔɔn niini gi ci gɛr jaŋ?”
Bar enico agɛrɛny niigi ɔrɔɔt kujuk we azi nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ kadaak keete ween talakec.”
Mazin giye o arɔɔŋi Pailat kɔlɛ kataltɔi, ɔɔgak niini nɔɔgɔ Barabas. Ma anyek Yesu kuruyit takirnya nyaboyɛn zɛɛ ma vurta anyek nɔɔnɔ takirnya kɔɔt kotodeec kadaak keete ween talakec.
Ma ayit takirnya Yesu avɔyi ŋaa uneeŋ abaayi kaluwawe o kɔrɔk o Pailat. Ma alotai niigi dook.
Ma avu aborcɛkɛ Yesu rum ci meeri, ma agɔɔna nyagirgir ceen bila, ma arekɛ nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ.
Ma azaa niigi nɔɔnɔ momozɛnta anek nɛ, “Abona alaan o ɔl o Juz. Rok bai nɔkɔ kodot.”
Ma anyɔnɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati aruyi ɔɔ keete ci miliny, ma oortek amot, ma bodo akani kozoŋti looc adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ momozɛnta.
Mazi odotiz niigi momozente nico, uburuca ŋaatin rum ona arikɛ nɔɔnɔ e, ma aborcɛkɛ rumanɛ ogin laadun. Ma avɔyi nɔɔnɔ kutur bitaala ka kɔɔt kotodeec keete ween talakec.

Ma gɔla urumtɔ niigi kibeen eet ci kazi Saiman ci looc o kazi Sariin. Niini baati Alikzandar ki Ruvas. Mazi anowa niini gɔl akunak Jerusalɛm, agamit takirnya nɔɔnɔ, ma adaŋek kitik kɛɛt ween talakec o ka kɔɔt kotodoyi niigi Yesu.
Ma anyaak niigi Yesu ŋinti kazi Golgoza o akati kɛŋ cinɛ amɛn ci oowu.
Ma anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ nyaan ci acanɔ kibeen agɛrɔ o kazi mir, ma abor Yesu ŋaati awudi.
Otodooc ni niigi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec. Ma aar niigi maadico ci ka kiitazakɛ gɔɔn eet co rum cinɛ rumanene o Yesu.
Adɔdɔ niigi nɔɔnɔ ziiye ween tɔrkɔc ŋeere.
Ma ayɛɛt niigi zɔɔz o apayek niigi Yesu azi nɛ, “Nici alaan o ɔl o Juz.” Ma amadanek zɔɔz nico waragɛwa talakec ci adodinɛ Yesu o tadena.
Ma buk adɔdɔ niigi agoryak ceen aamnyok een ram keene ween talakɛn. Arek codoi Yesu aza, maje codoi arek kaŋeta.
Ma buk adɔdɔ niigi agoryak ceen aamnyok een ram keene ween talakɛn. Arek codoi Yesu aza, maje codoi arek kaŋeta.
Mazi acin ɔl ci olla awɔ gɔla Yesu, ararni niigi nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ ma arurut ooti, ma amomoz anek nɛ, “Aa. Een ri eet baal azi nɛ ka ɔyɔk ceez o Joowo, ma bodo ɛɛnyca iinyaye ceen iiyu e nɛɛn.
Rogoz zin di ɛlɛ. Duna keete nico.”
Ma ararni buk alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o demziinto Yesu anɔ nɛ, “Arogoz niini ɔl oogi doon, bar alaŋ anim korogoz ɛlɛ onin maany.”
Ma anek niigi Yesu nɛ, “Mã een didi niina Kiristo ween alaan o Israyil nɛɛn, duna keete nico. Mã agoon nɔkɔ, katuyin koca naaga ineet.”
Bodo agoryawa o adɔdi ki nɔɔnɔ keene ween talakɛn e amomoz buk niigi Yesu.
Mazi akɔ abil ii boloca, otoozyai lɔɔci dook kizi muur zɛɛ been ziik iiyu yomana.
Mazi akɔ een ziik iiyu, ɛgɛrɛny Yesu molowe ci appe otoge uneeŋ azi nɛ, “Eloi, eloi. Lama Sabaktani.” Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico azi nɛ, Jook onan, Jook onan, ooŋnan naa?
Mazi azii ɔl ogɛn ole o aavtiz ŋinaante zɔɔz nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Iziiyit di! Awo niini Ilija.”

Ma adɔkɔny ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ, ma ajukek tovot nyaan ci amokcar, ma akat moroka, ma itoonek Yesu ka kococo. Ma anek ɛɛti oman gɔnɔgi nɛ, “Kereec di ka kicinit karabɔŋ aku Ilija ka kaarak nɔɔnɔ looc.”
Enico ɛgɛrɛny Yesu bodo molowe ci appe, ma atɛɛt.
Ma areeci rum o gɔɔn abilɛnɛ ɔl ceez o Joowo, akani reecinɛt tadena zɛɛ been tir loota.
Maje alaani ci takirnyawu abil ajɔŋɔz ŋinti ona adodinɛ Yesu o. Mazi acin niini gɔl o adaakni Yesu been gernyi onin, izi nɛ, “Didilɛ ɛɛti nici tɛ Ŋɛɛrti Joowo gi.”
Buk ŋinaante anyak ŋaai ci agɛlɛm Yesu rɛɛna. Ma ŋaane nicoko aavtiz tɔ Meri o looc o kazi Magdala, ki Salomi, kibeen Meri ween yaati Josev ki Jemis o miliny.
Ma ŋaai nici baale gɔɔn ano niigi Yesu Galiliya, ma atirit nɔɔnɔ. Ma buk anyak ŋaai ci meel oogi ci baal ɔrkɔra ki Yesu avunak Jerusalɛm.

Ma iiteni nica iiten o gɔɔn aṯornɛkɛ ɔl o Juz liŋliŋɔnta, ma apɛrpɛrani niigi eleeti, eeci tiŋeere een iiten o yubzento kazi Sabit. Mazi ka kizi lɔɔci yoman, iiya ɛɛti ci kazi Josev ci looc o kazi Arimatiya. Niini alya eet ci abon gɔɔn atitiny ɔl nɔɔnɔ ole o roonnyo, ma buk niini arɛ kuni o baliin o Joowo. Ook ni niini ŋaati Pailat moozɛta, ma akɔ ajin nɔɔnɔ ka kook kaara ɛlɛ o Yesu talakeca ka kook kada.

Ma iiteni nica iiten o gɔɔn aṯornɛkɛ ɔl o Juz liŋliŋɔnta, ma apɛrpɛrani niigi eleeti, eeci tiŋeere een iiten o yubzento kazi Sabit. Mazi ka kizi lɔɔci yoman, iiya ɛɛti ci kazi Josev ci looc o kazi Arimatiya. Niini alya eet ci abon gɔɔn atitiny ɔl nɔɔnɔ ole o roonnyo, ma buk niini arɛ kuni o baliin o Joowo. Ook ni niini ŋaati Pailat moozɛta, ma akɔ ajin nɔɔnɔ ka kook kaara ɛlɛ o Yesu talakeca ka kook kada.
Ma abiir Pailat ɔɔ giye ci adaayi Yesu kataman o, ma awa alaan o takirnyawu, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ ka kuduwak mã adaak Yesu.
Mazi akɔ azii Pailat adaak Yesu didi, anyewun Josev kook kaara ɛlɛ o Yesu talakeca.
Ma ataala Josev rum ci abon, ma akɔ aara niini ɛlɛ o Yesu keete ween talakec, ma aku atuuzek rum nico. Ma akɔ arek bɔɔt ci adayai biya, ma abɔrbɔrana bɛ ci appe, ma anyoogi bɔɔt otok.
Maje Meri o looc o kazi Magdala kibeen Meri yaati Josev agɛlɛm ŋinti aronek ɛlɛ ci Yesu o nɔkɔ.
Mazi akɔ aṯornɛkɛ iiteni o yubzento kazi Sabit, ɔɔtɔ Meri o looc o Magdala ki Salomi kibeen Meri ween yaati Jemis, ma avɔ ataala karkar ci aŋɔl madiz ka kɔɔt kuḏuutek ɛlɛ o Yesu bɔɔta.
Ma iitene o yubzento ŋeere ririwɔna ɔtɔɔzɔ ɔɔta bɔɔta.
Mazi ŋaan awɔ gɔla nɔkɔ, izitɔ nɛ, “Mayo tedec apiyaket bɛ o appe o bɔɔt otoga ŋɛnɛ?”
Bar mazi avɔ agɛlɛm bɔɔt, acin bɛ ipiyai kizi vɔlɔŋ bɔɔt ɔtɔgi nɔkɔ.
Mazi avɔ niigi bɔɔta eecitɔ, acin eet ci ŋaan een logoz ci aavi bɔɔt libire ci azo o anyak niini rum ci vɔɔr. Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt.

Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má anyeku kibiirtuŋ ooti gaga. Kagayuŋ nɔkɔ arooŋnyu Yesu o Nazarɛt baal adɔdi keete ween talakec e. Urugun zin niini bodo daayiza. Aziitɔ ŋina. Icinit di ŋin baal arek ɔl nɔɔnɔ e nici.
Bar ɔɔtɔ ka ɔɔt uduktak nuyak ogin kibeen Pitɔr buk. Ɔɔtɔ enektek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Arayɛ Yesu ŋaatunooŋ ook Galiliya. Ŋaan avɔ acinu tedec niiga nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante kiyo baale aduwakuŋ niini igeet e.”
Udunta ni niigi bɔɔta, ma adɔkɔny, eeci abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti, ma aŋole looc ɔrɔɔt. Ma ŋaan buk kuduktak niigi ɔl oogi zɔɔz nico, eeci anyak niigi ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt.
Mazi akɔ iŋaaz Yesu daayiza iitene o yubzento ŋeere, eyelizak niini ɛlɛ rak ɔɔwa Meri o looc o Magdala baal atɔɔk Yesu ŋaatin miniŋ o Loryento een torgɛrɛm e.
Ook ni niini uduwak nuyak o Yesu ŋaati aavtiyɛ aluwi daayiz onin.
Bar mazi akɔ azii niigi zɔɔz o orogi Yesu bodo, ma ayelzakɛ ɛlɛ ŋaa nico ŋaan niigi kutuweec zɔɔz nico nɔkɔ.
Ma bodo vurta eyeliza Yesu ɛlɛ alye ci awɔ doon ole ceen nuyak een ram ci avu Jerusalɛma.
Ma amiiri ɔl nicigi, ma avɔ aduwak gɔnɔgi, bar ni buk ɔl nici alaŋ atu zɔɔz nico.

Ma vurta eyelizak ni niini ɛlɛ nuyak ween amɔtɔ codoi ŋaati adayin. Ma agernyek niini nɔɔgɔ giye ci bakbayini zinzeeti, ma akɔmni tuwɛn o, eeci alaŋ atu niigi zɔɔz ci ɔl o icinit nɔɔnɔ ŋaao orogi niini daayiza.
Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ ozobit loocok dook uuwaktek kaviyak o Joowo modɛn dook.
Mã ɛɛti ci atuwe, ma oonyi, arogi niini waanma. Maje ɛɛti calaŋ atuwe apawonek waanma nɔɔnɔ gerzitin.
Ma ɔl o atuwe kanyi waanma naana nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz ci atɔɔyi miniŋ o Loryento ɔla zaare ogan. Ma kanyi buk nɔɔgɔ dɔyiz ci azɔɔzi utugetine ci ŋaan laadun niigi kagaac.
Mã adɔŋa niigi kowanya azɛɛnɛ, alaŋ adak kowanya nɔɔgɔ. Mã awot agɛrɔ o aruk ɔl kadaayitɔ, alaŋ adaai. Mã ataadek azɛɛn ɔl ci amɔɔr, arogi ɔl nici mɔɔrizɔi.”
Mazi akɔ odotiz Manyi Yesu zɔɔza, odoŋek Jooi nɔɔnɔ tammu tadena, ma akɔ aavi niini libire o Joowo azo.
Itiŋgazɔ ni nuyawa, ma avɔ uuwak loocowe dook. Ma atirit Manyi nɔɔgɔ, ma ayelzai uuwayi uneeŋ kizi didi kaale o atɛɛt ɔl biye agɔɔn niigi.
Luke: Tipoliz o kareezin, eteyeedit baale ɔl ci meelik kaal baal agooni ŋaatinai ŋina e.
Eteyeedit niigi kaal baal aduwaket ageet ɔl baal icinit niigi alya keberene ugeec kaal nicoko ŋaati agooninɛ e. Arak kaal nicoko cinɛnta niigi, makacin waanice uuwayit niigi zɔɔz nico.
Nyakaraŋatoi o adikir, kiiya zin buk naana kɛdɛmɛza kaal nicoko dook juruŋ ŋinti wun ɔrɔɔt. Inoko zin kayeedekin naana ineet waragɛ ci kazeden kaal nicoko.
Kagoon zin nɔkɔ o, ka ga niina gi ween didi baal edemezu laadun e juruŋ.

Baale irkitowe baal ɛɛnɛ Erod alaan o looc o kazi Judiya e, anyak eet ci kazi Zakeriya ceen alaan ci miliny ceeze o Joowo. Niini borit ci ɔl o kazi Abija o gɔɔn aliŋliŋ ceeze o Joowo. Zakeriya anyak ŋaa ci kazi Ilizibɛz ceen buk niini borit ci ɔl o aliŋliŋ ceeze o Joowo.
Ma waanice abaak Zakeriya kibeen Ilizibɛz baayiz ci abon ŋume o Joowo, ma azooni niigi dook lotinok o Joowo.
Maje nɔɔgɔ akɔm dɔl cigeec, eeci waanice Ilizibɛz awɔ koliin zɛɛ makacin iziti niigi dook matuwo.
Ma iitene oman izi waŋi ci Zakeriya ka kook kiliŋliŋi ceeze o Joowo eo gɔɔn anyɔnɛ niigi liŋliŋɔn laadun.
Aŋɛra ɔl nɔɔnɔ keere uneeŋ gɔɔn agɔɔni maadico ka kook kutururek karkar goo ŋaao taabinto. Ook ni niini ceeze o Joowo eecitɔ.
Maje ɔl dook aŋaryɛ ceez bitaala ŋinti ona akɔ arurɛkɛ niini karkar goo o.
Mazi ŋaan akɔ arurek Zakeriya karkar goo nɔkɔ, iiyak toonnyaiti ci Joowo nɔɔnɔ, ma aku abil ŋino taabinto libire ci azo o.
Mazi acin Zakeriya nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, ɔtɔŋɔlɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.

Bar anek toonnyaiti nici nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zakeriya, má aŋolinan gaga, eeci kanyaakin kaviyak Joowa. Iziiwun Jooi ŋaryiin unun. Aritakin tiŋeere ŋaa cune kazi Ilizibɛz noko logoz. Zin mazi aritai, katek zaar ci kazi nɛ Jɔn.
Atalnɛ katin niina tiryante cin o, ma buk atalnɛ ɔl ci meel.
Eeci niini tiŋeere titiny ɔrɔɔt ŋume o Joowo. Ma alaŋ awot nyaan been nɛɛn. Akunak tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋizi o Joowo iŋaan aavi yaatin kɛŋa nɔkɔ.
Alama katin niini ɔl ci meel ole o Israyil ka kivita kiziiyit Manyi ween Jook uneeŋ.

Arayai katin niini ɔɔwa ŋaati Manyi, ma anyak dɔyiz ci abil kiyo baal anyak nyakaŋani o kazi Ilija e. Arom bodo katin niini dɔl ki baatigeec ŋaatodoi. Abadaan tiŋeere niini ɔl o alaŋ azooni zɔɔz o Joowo kivita kabaabanit baabaninok ci ɔl o abon. Aku tiŋeere atom niini ɔl ka kidimdimanit eleeti kereec kuni o Manyi.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Zakeriya toonnyai nico anek nɛ, “Ka zin yo naana kaga zɔɔz nico een didi o ku? Inoko naana ki ŋaa onan kidikirta naaga dook kizita matuwo.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aneeta Gabriyal o gɔɔn kabil ŋume o Joowo nɛɛn nici. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o itoonanan aneet ka kiiya kuduwayin ineet zɔɔz ci abon noko.
Zɔɔz nici katin didi abil tɔ iitene o arek Jooi, bar zin giye o alaŋ atuwɛ zɔɔz ci kaduwakin o, alagunyin rak Jooi inoko ineet aat calaŋ azooz zɛɛ been iiten ci abilni zɔɔz nici tɔ.”
Agooni gi nici ceeza eecitɔ, maje ɔl ona ɛɛl bitaala e ŋaan arɛ Zakeriya nɔkɔ. Bar alaŋ aga niigi gi ci alam nɔɔnɔ ŋinti rɛɛn ceeza eecitɔ o.
Mazi akɔ aduŋnak niini bitaalin, alaŋaan azoozek nɔɔgɔ, eeci alagonyɛ aati. Enico ɛlɛ agaac niigi icinun Zakeriya ceeza eecitɔ gi ci itoona Jooi. Ma azoozek niini nɔɔgɔ azɛɛnɛ doon.
Mazi akɔ aṯornɛkɛ iinya ci liŋliŋɔn onin ceeze o Joowo, imiire ook ɔlɔ.
Ma iinyaye ci miliny nɔkɔ obona ŋaa oninɛ Ilizibɛz anyawɔ, ma aavi ceeza nɔkɔ nyɛlɔwɛ tur calaŋ aduŋnak bitaalin.
Ma aduwa Ilizibɛz gi ci azi nɛ, “Nicini dɛtɛn ci anyan Jooi. Aarawan niini aneet alyaan baal kawɔyɛ koliin e.”
Mazi akɔ een Ilizibɛz nyɛlɔwɛ ci anyayin tɔrkɔnɔm, itoona Jooi bodo toonnyai o kazi Gabriyal kiiyak kutur o kazi Nazarɛt abil looce o kazi Galili.
Anyaak niini molok ci Joowo dole ci kazi Meri ci agam nɔɔnɔ ɛɛti ci kazi Josev ka kiriyi kizi ŋaa cin. Ma ɛɛti ci kazi Josev noko dole ci dɔl ci alaan o kazi Devid.
Ma akunak toonnyaiti Meri, ma aku azaa anek nɛ, “Abona? Amayuwin Jooi ineet.”
Mazi azii Meri zɔɔz nico, anyawun ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt. Ma abiir ɔɔ zooze ci azaawi toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ o.
Ma anek toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Meri. Má anyei ŋoliin gaga, eeci iiyayin dɛtɛni o Joowo ineet.
Anyake tiŋeere, ma ookca logoz. Katek zin tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Yesu.
Tiŋeere niini titiny ɔrɔɔt. Ma awɛ kizi ŋɛɛrti Jook o adikir. Anyek tiŋeere Jooi nɔɔnɔ kizi alaan ci adikir kiyo baale jijitinɛ Devid e.
Ma een tiŋeere niini alaan ci ɔl o Israyil nɔkɔ kodot, ma alaŋ alaazɛt cinɛ o aṯornɛkɛ nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.”
Ma anek Meri toonnyai nɛ, “Inoko naana ŋaan keen dole ci ŋaai. Ka zin yo kanyak dole ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ toonnyaiti nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan akunakin Vɔŋize o Joowo. Buk dɔyizi o Joowo ŋaan aavi ŋaatun. Zin giye nico awɛ tiŋeere dole nici kizi ŋɛɛrti Joowo.
Cin di atenoi unun kazi Ilizibɛz baal azi ɔl nɛ, Alaŋaan bodo tiŋeere niini arit e. Inoko anyawun niini nyɛlɔwɛ tɔrkɔnɔm ci anyayin kizi matuwoc nɔkɔ
Eeci akɔm gi ci akɔmnek Jook ŋaati agɔɔni.”
Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni Meri nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Keen naana gabaren ci Joowo. Anyek kutuguwozeyan gi nici kiyo ona aduwakan o labak.” Enico ɔtɔɔ toonnyaiti ci Joowo noko ḏim.
Ma iinya ci miliny nɔkɔ itiŋa Meri, ma ayiik akɔ kuture o abil biyɛnɛ looce o kazi Judiya.
Mazi akɔ arum kɔrɔk o Zakeriya, azaawun Ilizibɛz.
Mazi azii Ilizibɛz zaawinɛt ci azaawi Meri nɔɔnɔ o, ɔtɔɔmɔ dole kɛŋa. Ma akunak Ilizibɛz Vɔŋizi o Joowo.
Ma agɛrɛny molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Amayukin Jooi ineet kujuk ŋaai dook, ma buk amayuk Jooi dole ci anyei kɛŋa noko.
Ma naana keen ŋɛnɛɛn ci akɔ ma akunakan niina yaati Manyi onan aneet ceeze can o?
Uyene akɔ mazi olla kazii zaawinɛt unun e, ɔtɔɔmɔ dole kɛŋa talniinta enico ɛlɛ.
Amayuwin zin Jooi ineet, eeci atu niina zɔɔz baal aduwakin niini ineet e abil didi tiŋeere tɔ.”
Ma abɛn Meri beniin ci azi nɛ, “Kanaati Jook zinize onan dook.
Atalnɛ ziniz cane o ŋaaten Jook ween ruguzoi onan,
eeci aadawan niini aneet gabaren onin o keen cɛlbɛz labak. Inoko zin waanico zɛɛ been iinyaye ci avu e utuyan bulowa ci ŋaan avu e dook aneet kizi ŋaa ci amayukan Jooi,
eeci agoonekan Jooi o anyak dɔyiz dook aneet kaal ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o awɔ doon.
Ayelza niini gi o awucnɛkɛ ɔl o aŋole nɔɔnɔ bulok ki bulok.
Eyeliza niini dɔyiz ci ibaati ogin, ma azaan ɔl o adɔŋ eleeti baabaninowe ugeec.
Ma iinanɛ alaat o loocu dak, ma adɔŋ ɔl o cɛlbɛzik kɔɔt ki taden.
Anyɛrizan niini ɔl o adak magizeeti kaale ci abon, ma anyek ɔl ween arɔk kɔɔt katamaatit.
Atirit niini ɔl o Israyil een gabara ogin kiyo baale aterkedek niini jijitigaac e.
Baale enek Jooi nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Awucnekan katin Ibrayim kibeen dɔl ci dɔl ogin dook nɔkɔ kodot.”
Ma aromɛ Meri ki Ilizibɛz ŋinaante nyɛlɔwɛ iiyu. Itiŋa ni imiire ook ɔlɔ.
Mazi avɔ aṯornɛkɛ iinya o Ilizibɛz nyayiinto, otowa niini logoz.
Mazi azii atenowa kibeen ɔl o abaawɔ ki nɔɔgɔ tirtɛn o anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ, ataltɔ buk niigi dook kibeen Ilizibɛz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Mazi akɔ een dole iinya turge, ivita niigi ka kivita keteedit nɔɔnɔ kul keere uneeŋ Juz. Ma arɔɔŋ kakatek atenowa dole zaar o baatin kazi Zakeriya.
Bar azi yaatinɛ nɛ, “Akɔm, kazi zaar cigin nɛ Jɔn.”
Ma anek ɔl nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Atenowe ugooc dook akɔm eet ci anyak zaar nicoko.”
Ijinit ni niigi baati doleco azɛɛnɛ doon ka kɛtɛyɛɛdak nɔɔgɔ zaar ci arɔɔŋ kakatek dole.
Ma ajin Zakeriya ɔl kanycek nɔɔnɔ waragɛ ci ka kɛtɛyɛɛdi dole zaar, ma aku ayɛɛt azi nɛ “Kazi zaar cigin nɛ Jɔn.” Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ dook ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Enico ɛlɛ ɔɔgɛ Zakeriya aati kɔzɔɔz labak, ma anaat Jook.
Ma anyaak zɔɔz nici ɔl o abaawɔ ki nɔɔnɔ dook ŋoliin, ma adala kaviyawa nicaga looc o Judiya abil biyɛnɛ dook.
Ma ɔl dook baal iziiyit kaviyak nicoko e, abaaban niigi zinzeetinɛ ɔrɔɔt, ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Ma dim tiŋeere dole nicini abil ku?” Azi nɔkɔ o, eeci aga niigi dɔyizi o Joowo didi aavi ŋaatin.
Iiyak ni Vɔŋizi o Joowo Zakeriya ceen baati Jɔn o, ma adiŋdiŋɛn niini Jook beniinta azi nɛ,
“Abon kanaat Manyi ween Jook o Israyil. Iiyak niini ɔl ogin, ma ɔɔga nɔɔgɔ kabaayitɔ yaak.
Anyaayet niini ageet ruguzoi ci adikir ceen dole ci dɔl o Devid ween gabaren onin.
Uduwa niini zɔɔz nico baale laadun nyakaŋanete ogin azi nɛ,
ka kiiya korogozet niini ageet modɛni, kibeen dɔyize o ɔl o amarninet ageet dook.
Zin giye nico eyeliza niini gi o awucnɛkɛ jijitigaac nɔɔnɔ, ma buk aada niini gi baal aterkedek niini nɔɔgɔ e.
Baale eterkedek niini jijitinai Ibrayim zɔɔz ci ka kɛɛlayet modɛni, ma anyet niini ageet kiliŋliŋtozek nɔɔnɔ kɔkɔm ŋoliin.
Baale eterkedek niini jijitinai Ibrayim zɔɔz ci ka kɛɛlayet modɛni, ma anyet niini ageet kiliŋliŋtozek nɔɔnɔ kɔkɔm ŋoliin.
Ma buk anyet ageet kobonta ŋume onin ŋinti ŋaan rak karogni noko dook.
Maje niina Jɔn dole onane awɛ katin izi nyakaŋan ci Jook o anyak diŋdiŋɔn dook. Eeci arayinɛ rak katin niina Manyi ɔɔwa ka dimdimanek nɔɔnɔ gɔl onin
Aduwai tiŋeere niina ɔl ogin zɔɔz o ka korogozi Jooi nɔɔgɔ gole o ka kaarai niini nɔɔgɔ baciinok ugeec.
Agɔɔn Jooi onai nɔkɔ o, eeci areezet niini ageet, ma iina nɔɔnɔ ziniz. Itoona tiŋeere niini ŋɛɛrin kiiya kuduna kiyo gɔɔn aduŋna ii ririwɔna o
Ma anyaak tiŋeere niini vooritin ɔl dook o aavtiz muura daayiza. Ma amadet tiŋeere niini ageet kɔtɔɔz tɔp gole ci ganonto.”
Maje dole iroktai juruŋ kɔdɔk kak Vɔŋize o Joowo. Mazi akɔ adikir, itiŋa ook balala, ma akɔ abaak ŋinaante zɛɛ been iiten baal aku akanan liŋliŋɔn onin ole o Israyil e.
Ma iinyaye niceke itoon alaani o Rom adikir kazi Agostos molok kook ole o loocok ogin dook ka keteyeede ɔl o abaak loocowe o abal niini dook zaara.
Akanai yeedinɛt ci zaaru noko iinyaye o ɛɛnɛ Kiriniyas alaan o abal looc o kazi Siriya.
Imiirtozek ni ɔl dook kuturyok ugeec ka gɔɔn ɛɛti kook kɛtɛyɛɛt zaar kuture onin ɛlɛ.

Itiŋa ni Josev kuture o kazi Nazarɛt abil looce o kazi Galili, ook kuture o kazi Bɛzilɛm looce o kazi Judiya ŋaabaal aritan alaani o kazi Devid e. Akɔ niini ŋinaante o, eeci een niini borit ci tatok o Devid.
Orkorit ni niini kibeen Meri o agam ka kiriyi. Maje Meri anyake. Avɔ niigi dook ka kɔɔt keteyeedit zaar ŋinaante.
Mazi avɔ arum Bɛzilɛm, amun Meri dole.
Otowa ni niini logo onin een abuu, ma abuŋ rumanɛn, ma abayek looc luwawa giye ceen taava gɔɔn ɛɛlni artɛ ci maalawu, eeci akɔm ŋinti ka kɔɔt kataŋguzɛ ḏoorya.
Ma iitene nice anyak ɔl ci tuwawinto ci gɔɔn abɛk ɛɛza baal looce nice tuuwa.
Ma akunak toonnyaiti ci Joowo nɔɔgɔ. Ma ayelzak Jooi nɔɔgɔ diŋdiŋɔn onin ŋaati atarani nɔɔgɔ baal, makacin ɔtɔŋɔltɛ niigi looc ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Bar anek toonnyaiti ci Joowo noko nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má aŋolinu looc gaga. Eeci kakunakuŋ ka kiiya kuduwayuŋ igeet zɔɔz ci abon ci ka katalɔi ɔl dook ɔrɔɔt.
Itiryai waanico kuture o Devid ruguzoiti cunooŋ. Niini Kiristo ween Manyi onai.
Gɔl zin ci ka agayi zɔɔz nico een didi nɛɛn ce. Ɔɔtɔ zɛɛ mazi ajowanu dole o abuŋe rumanɛn, ma abawonek taava o, nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn.”
Taman nɔkɔ anai toonnyawa ci Joowo meelik boyoŋyoŋ, ma aromonek toonnyai ona oowu e. Ma abene niigi dook anaat Jook azi nɛ,
“Kanaatit Jook o aavi tammu tadena. Abil ganɔn loota ole o arɛɛz niini.”
Mazi avɔ amiiri toonnyawa avɔ tammu tadena, izitɔ ɔl ci tuwawinto o nɛ, “Kɔɔtɔ di Bɛzilɛma ka kɔɔt kicinit gi ci agooni aduwaket Jooi o.”
Iyiiyit ni niigi ɔɔt Bɛzilɛma, ma avɔ ajowa Meri kibeen Josev. Maje dole abawonek looc taava.
Mazi avɔ acin ɔl ci tuwawinto noko dole, uduktak niigi Meri kibeen Josev zoozok ona aduwak nɔɔgɔ toonnyaiti o Joowo akati dole e dook.
Maje ɔl dook o azii kaal ci aduwa ɔl ci tuwawinto noko, abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti kaale nicoko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Maje bar Meri abaaban kaal nicoko dook, ma azooni ziniza.
Ma amiiri ɔl o tuwawinto ŋaati abɛni beniinok ci anaati Jook kaale o azii kibeen kaale o acin niigi, eeci didi eelit tɔ ebaal aduwaki nɔɔgɔ toonnyaiti e.
Mazi adica dole iinya turge, eteedit ɔl nɔɔnɔ kul keere uneeŋ Juz. Ma akanek nɔɔnɔ zaar ci kazi Yesu ebaal aduwaki toonnyaiti o Joowo nɔɔgɔ iŋaan buk Meri kanyawɔ e.

Mazi izi iiten o gɔɔn avɔ ataabi ɔl Jook ŋaati aritan dole eo aduwan lotinowa o Mosis, ɔɔt Josev been Meri ceeze o Joowo ka kɔɔt kataabit Jook yɛɛlaye ceen ram karabɔŋ een joroye ceen ram ci yɛɛla o korgu. Ma buk avɔyi niigi dole ka kɔɔt kanycek nɔɔnɔ Jook eo ayeedinɛ lotinowe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Anycek lɔgɔz ween abuunya Jook ka kiziti niigi dɔl cigin aliŋliŋonek nɔɔnɔ.”

Mazi izi iiten o gɔɔn avɔ ataabi ɔl Jook ŋaati aritan dole eo aduwan lotinowa o Mosis, ɔɔt Josev been Meri ceeze o Joowo ka kɔɔt kataabit Jook yɛɛlaye ceen ram karabɔŋ een joroye ceen ram ci yɛɛla o korgu. Ma buk avɔyi niigi dole ka kɔɔt kanycek nɔɔnɔ Jook eo ayeedinɛ lotinowe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Anycek lɔgɔz ween abuunya Jook ka kiziti niigi dɔl cigin aliŋliŋonek nɔɔnɔ.”

Mazi izi iiten o gɔɔn avɔ ataabi ɔl Jook ŋaati aritan dole eo aduwan lotinowa o Mosis, ɔɔt Josev been Meri ceeze o Joowo ka kɔɔt kataabit Jook yɛɛlaye ceen ram karabɔŋ een joroye ceen ram ci yɛɛla o korgu. Ma buk avɔyi niigi dole ka kɔɔt kanycek nɔɔnɔ Jook eo ayeedinɛ lotinowe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Anycek lɔgɔz ween abuunya Jook ka kiziti niigi dɔl cigin aliŋliŋonek nɔɔnɔ.”

Maje waanice iinyaye niceke anyak eet ci kazi zaar nɛ Simiyan ci abaak Jerusalɛma. Niini eet ci abon, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook ɔrɔɔt. Ma aavi Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaatin, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ niina adaai rak iŋaan cin Kiristo ween ruguzoi o ka kitoona Jooi.” Ma giye nico areyi waanice niini ka kicin ruguzoi o ka kiiya korogoz ɔl o Israyil.

Maje waanice iinyaye niceke anyak eet ci kazi zaar nɛ Simiyan ci abaak Jerusalɛma. Niini eet ci abon, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook ɔrɔɔt. Ma aavi Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaatin, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ niina adaai rak iŋaan cin Kiristo ween ruguzoi o ka kitoona Jooi.” Ma giye nico areyi waanice niini ka kicin ruguzoi o ka kiiya korogoz ɔl o Israyil.
Ma iitene nice ooyi Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɔɔnɔ ceeze o Joowo. Ma akɔ arumɔ niini ki Josev been Meri avɔyi niigi dole ceeze o Joowo ka kɔɔt kutuguzek nɔɔnɔ kaal o aduwa lotinowa o Joowo.
Ɔdɔŋ ni Simiyan dole azɛɛnɛ, ma anyek Jook zany azi nɛ,
“Manyi, Inoko nyan kadaak labak. Katalnɛ ɔrɔɔt, eeci utugu gi baal aterkedekan e.
Kicina naana keberene ogan ɛlɛ ruguzoi o itoona niina ka kiiya korogoz ɔl loota.
Utugu niina gi nico kicinit modɛna dook.
Ma ruguzoiti nici vooritin ci ka keyelek modɛn o alaŋ een Juz gɔl unun, ma anyaak ɔl o Israyil titinyɔn.”
Ma abiir Meri kibeen Josev ooti kaale ci aduwak Simiyan dole noko.

Ma amayuk Simiyan nɔɔgɔ, ma anek niini Meri nɛ, “Aŋɛra Jooi dole nico o ka kɔdɔŋ ɔl o agama nɔɔnɔ, ma iinanɛ ɔl o abor nɔɔnɔ ole o Juz. Ayelza tiŋeere niini Jook, ma bar abor nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meel tiŋeere.
Zin giye nico abɔryai tiŋeere baabani o gɛrzɛ aroodi zinzeetine ci ɔl ci meel. Maje niina Meri giye nico katin akati culum ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kiyo anyei tuben ziniza o.”

Buk ŋinaante anyak ŋaa ceen matuwoc ceen nyakaŋan ci kazi zaar nɛ Ana. Niini tinati eet ci kazi Vanuwel ceen borit ci ɔl o kazi Acar. Ariyi ɔl nɔɔnɔ, ma anyak kibeen eet irkitok torgɛrɛm nɔkɔ adaak ɛɛti.
Ma aavi niini kizi bɔyɛ nɔkɔ irkitok eet wec ki tiin wec (84). Ma ŋaan kotoŋ niini ceez o Joowo been nɛɛn. Adiŋdiŋan gɔɔn niini Jook baalinok ki waazinok ŋaryiinta ŋaati alaŋ adayin.

Ma iitene ci baal anyaakɛ Josev ki Meri dole ceez o Joowo neke, iiya buk Ana oromozek nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante, ma anaat niini Jook Ma azɔɔz kaal ci akati dole. Aduwak niini kaal nicoko ɔl dook o arɛ Jook ka korogoz ɔl o Israyil.
Mazi avɔ adica Josev kibeen Meri kaal o aduwa lotinowa o Joowo dook, imiiriye niigi ɔɔt kuture uneeŋ kazi Nazarɛt abil looce o kazi Galili.
Maje dole iroktai juruŋ kɔdɔk ma agɛny ɔrɔɔt, ma aavi mayuwɛnɛt o Joowo ŋaatin.
Gɔɔn irkitok dook avɔ Josev kibeen Meri Jerusalɛma iitene o gɔɔn alotɛn ɔl o Juz ka kaadai niigi iiten baal avardaŋi toonnyaiti o Joowo ceezi ugeec e.
Mazi akɔ een Yesu irkitowa amɔtɔ ram, ooti Josev kibeen Meri nɔɔnɔ Jerusalɛma bodo eo gɔɔn avɔyi niigi laadun.
Mazi akɔ adicai iinya ci lotento noko, itiŋgaza niigi abada kɔrɔk. Maje bar tɛ Yesu otoŋozek looc Jerusalɛma calaŋ baatinɛ ki yaatin aga ŋaan aavi niini Jerusalɛma o.

Bar abaaban niigi anɔ nɛ, “Coma aavitɔ ole baal ɔrkɔra ki nɔɔgɔ noko.” Ma adica niigi iiten codoi calaŋ arumɔnɛ ki Yesu nɔkɔ zɛɛ makacin orooŋit niigi nɔɔnɔ ole ugeec een atenok kibeen ole ween laŋotigeec.
Ma ŋaan kojokta niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma vurta imiirtozek niigi Jerusalɛm ka kɔɔt korooŋit nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante.
Mazi avɔ adica niigi iinya iiyu rooŋinta, ivita ojokta nɔɔnɔ aromɛ kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok ceeze o Joowo. Aziirar niini nɔɔgɔ, ma buk ajin niini nɔɔgɔ zoozok.
Maje ɔl dook ci azii zoozok ci abarzek niini nɔɔgɔ gɛnyiza noko, abiir ooti ŋaatin ɔrɔɔt.

Mazi acin baatinɛ ki yaatin nɔɔnɔ aromɛ kibeen ɔl nicoko nɔkɔ, ibiirit buk nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt. Ma anek yaatinɛ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Dole onan, agooneket gi nico naa? Cin di, aneeta kibeen baatun aviryet zinzeeti ŋaatun ɔrɔɔt, ma kagenygenya karooŋnyin.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kodi! Naa tɛ akɔ zɛɛ ma agenygenyu arooŋnyaŋ o? Alaŋ agawu kaavɛ naana ceeze o baaba ŋina o?”
Bar niigi alaŋ aga kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ci aduwa niini noko akati inin.
Enico uduna Yesu iiya orkorit ki nɔɔgɔ ɔɔt Nazarɛta. Ma azii niini nɔɔgɔ kaale o aduwak niigi nɔɔnɔ kutugu dook. Maje yaatinɛ azooni kaal nicoko dook ziniza.
Ma aroktai Yesu juruŋ, ma buk agɛny ɔrɔɔt. Ma atalnɛ Jooi kibeen ɔl buk ŋaatin.

Ma iinyaye niceke anyek Jooi Jɔn ween ŋɛɛrti Zakeriya kook kuduwak ɔl zɔɔz onin balala. Maje waanice irkitowa ci abali alaani o Rom kazi Tibiriyas looc nice dook izi amɔnki tur. Buk enice ɛlɛ Pantas Pailat alaan ci looc o kazi Judiya. Maje Erod alaan ci looc o kazi Galili. Maje gɔtɔnnya o kazi Pilip alaan ci ŋino kazi Itoriya kibeen ŋino kazi Tirakonitis. Maje Lisanas alaan ci abal ŋino kazi Ebilin. Maje Anas kibeen Kayavas niigi alaat ci adikir ceeze o Joowo Jerusalɛma.

Ma iinyaye niceke anyek Jooi Jɔn ween ŋɛɛrti Zakeriya kook kuduwak ɔl zɔɔz onin balala. Maje waanice irkitowa ci abali alaani o Rom kazi Tibiriyas looc nice dook izi amɔnki tur. Buk enice ɛlɛ Pantas Pailat alaan ci looc o kazi Judiya. Maje Erod alaan ci looc o kazi Galili. Maje gɔtɔnnya o kazi Pilip alaan ci ŋino kazi Itoriya kibeen ŋino kazi Tirakonitis. Maje Lisanas alaan ci abal ŋino kazi Ebilin. Maje Anas kibeen Kayavas niigi alaat ci adikir ceeze o Joowo Jerusalɛma.
Ma azɔp Jɔn waanice loocok o ajɔŋzɔ ki liil o kazi Jordan dook. Uuwawek niini ɔl zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Otoŋit oŋɛ ugooc. Abadaak gɔl o Joowo. Ivita abadit mony ka otoonycɛ, ka kaara Jooi oŋɛ ugooc.”
Ma uuwayi o Jɔn aku kibil ebaal ayɛɛdi nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya e, azi baale niini nɛ, “Anyak katin eet ci agɛrɛny balala azi nɛ, Idimdimantek Manyi gɔl onin. Amadek nɔɔnɔ golok ogin keelit tɔp.

Golowa o lukudik dook abon aronek tɔdɔwa kiziti kiltoŋɛ kataadjai. Maje biyɛn dook abon alibe kiziti rabrabɛ. Maje golowa o ŋɔlŋɔlik abon agooni keelit tɔp. Maje golowa ween coorom abon agooni kigirgirit.
Ka zin kicinit tiŋeere ɔl dook rogzɛn o Joowo.”

Mazi waanice uuwak Jɔn nɔkɔ, ivitak ɔl ci meel nɔɔnɔ ka kiiya kotoony niini nɔɔgɔ. Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Igeet dɔl ci kokonyawu coko! Ŋɛnɛɛn ci ilotuŋ igeet ka odokonyit bornɛt noŋe ci Joowo ka kiiya tiŋeere neke o?

Abon zin agoonu kaal ci abon ci ayelza gi ci utuŋtu niiga kaal o gɛr didi. Má bar anonu nɛ, Keegina dɔl ci dɔl o Ibrayim. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, Jooi anyak dɔyiz ci ookci biyɛn nicoko kiziti dɔl ci Ibrayim labak.
Eelnu niiga kiyo kɛɛna o. Olla zin inoko mɛlɛyi o payiin o Joowo ɛrɛwɔ ka kɛɛcawuŋ loota kiyo kɛɛca kɛɛt o. Gɔɔn zin laadun kɛɛt calaŋ arek kɛbɛrɛ ci abon, atɛɛdjak looc, ma akanonek goo.”
Mazi azii ɔl zɔɔz nico, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abon zin yo inoko kagoona naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma anyak ɛɛti rumanɛ ram, abon anyek codoi gɔn ci amaat rum. Ma anyak ɛɛti dayiin, abon buk aada gɔnɔgi.”
Ma avunak Jɔn ɔl o gɔɔn alot meeri ka kivita kotoonycɛ. Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, duwayet di buk gi ci abon ka kutuguza naaga.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Má alotanu ɔla meeri ci appe kujuk o aduwakuŋ alaata o akumawo.”
Ma buk ajin takirnya ogɛn nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo buk naaga kutuguza naa? Duwayet di buk gi ci ka kutuguza naaga.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Má aamanu ɔl guruc olezɛta. Buk má aŋanyu ɔl oogi gaga nɔkɔ vɔlɔŋa. Anycek zinzeeti kɛlɛɛntɔ ki guruc ci liŋliŋɔn cunooŋ o.”
Mazin giye baal waanice arɛwi ɔl kuni o Kiristo, akɔ mazi uuwak Jɔn kaal nicoko, abaabanit niigi zinzeetinɛ anɔ nɛ, “Bar bɔŋ nici Kiristo o karɛ naaga ɔl o Israyil nɛɛn.”

Enek ni Jɔn nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko kuunyuŋ naana igeet maami doon, bar zin iima ŋaan aku ɛɛti ci adikir ɔrɔɔt kujukan aneet yo nuun een caava ogin zoonu alaŋ kaganona ki aneet ŋaati koborcanɛ. Oony zin tiŋeere niini ɔl oogi ŋaatunooŋ Vɔŋize o Joowo, maje oogi apayek goo.
Kɛɛl naaga ŋaatin kiyo labina o. Anyak zin niini aziita kɛɛt ci uurtanɛ labi, ma arek ŋɔɔt, ma arek labi kɛbɛrɛ piim. Ma avaat tinyonyu gooye calaŋ aditi been nɛɛn.”
Ma uuwayek Jɔn ɔl kaviyak o Joowo golowe ci meelik gɛr.

Ma iinyaye niceke aama alaani o kazi Erod gɔtɔni ŋaa cin kazi Erodiyas. Ma buk waanice agɔɔn niini kaal ci gɛr meel. Ɔbɔrak ni Jɔn Erod kaal o gɛr agɔɔn niini dook kibeen buk gi ci aamanɛ niini gɔtɔni ŋaa o. Enico acabun Erod Jɔn, ma azaac bodo niini gerzitin onin giye ci acabi nɔɔnɔ o.

Ma iinyaye niceke aama alaani o kazi Erod gɔtɔni ŋaa cin kazi Erodiyas. Ma buk waanice agɔɔn niini kaal ci gɛr meel. Ɔbɔrak ni Jɔn Erod kaal o gɛr agɔɔn niini dook kibeen buk gi ci aamanɛ niini gɔtɔni ŋaa o. Enico acabun Erod Jɔn, ma azaac bodo niini gerzitin onin giye ci acabi nɔɔnɔ o.

Mazi akɔ oony Jɔn ɔl dook, iiya buk Yesu. Ma buk oony Jɔn nɔɔnɔ. Mazi ŋaan aŋaryɛ nɔkɔ, ɔkɔlɛ tammu taden, ma akunak Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɔɔnɔ kiyo yɛɛlac o. Ma aku tammu tadena mɔlɔyi ci azi nɛ, “Een niina ŋɛɛran onan kareezin nɛɛn. Katalnɛ naana ŋaatun ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”

Mazi akɔ oony Jɔn ɔl dook, iiya buk Yesu. Ma buk oony Jɔn nɔɔnɔ. Mazi ŋaan aŋaryɛ nɔkɔ, ɔkɔlɛ tammu taden, ma akunak Vɔŋizi o Joowo nɔɔnɔ kiyo yɛɛlac o. Ma aku tammu tadena mɔlɔyi ci azi nɛ, “Een niina ŋɛɛran onan kareezin nɛɛn. Katalnɛ naana ŋaatun ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
Mazi akɔ een Yesu irkitowa eetoma kamɔtɔ, akata niini liŋliŋɔn onin. Ma anyek ɔl nɔɔnɔ kizi ŋɛɛrti Josev ween ŋɛɛrti Eli,

Ma abada Yesu liile o Jordan ŋaati abizni tɔc ki Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ma akɔyi Vɔŋizi nɔɔnɔ balala.
Ma akɔ anyak niini ŋinaante iinya eet ram ci acinan Loryen nɔɔnɔ. Iinyaye niceke dook akɔm niini gi ci adak been nɛɛn. Mazi akɔ adica niini iinya nicoko, adawun magiz.
Iiyak ni Loryen nɔɔnɔ, ma aku anek nɛ, “Mã di een ŋɛɛrti Joowo didi, towo di bɛ nico kizi ḏokoc.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Alaŋ ɛɛti ci deer arogni ḏokoc doon.”
Bodo akɔyi Loryen nɔɔnɔ bɛ tadena, ma akɔ ayelek nɔɔnɔ lak codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ looc kibeen modɛn ci loocu noko dook.
Ma anek Loryen nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Cin di. Ŋaan kanyin alaazɛt ci abalɛ modɛn ci loocu nico noko dook, eeci kaala nicigi dook anycozeyan aneet. Olla tɛ mã karooŋ kanyek eet oma, kanyi labak.
Inoko zin mã adiŋdiŋanan aneet, kanyin koca ineet bal kaal nicoko dook kizi cugun.”
Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Idiŋdiŋanit Manyi ween Jook unooŋ, ma buk abon aliŋliŋoneku nɔɔnɔ doon.”
Enico ooyi Loryen Yesu Jerusalɛma, ma akɔ atɔɔdi ceez o Joowo, ma akɔyi zɛɛ been ŋinti aṯornɛkɛ e, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Mã een ŋɛɛrti Joowo didi, kul di ŋina taak tɔdɔ.
Eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Ŋaan itoona Jooi toonnyak ogin ka kivita katabuŋtawin niigi ineet calaŋ iinai looc kurukin biyɛn zɔɔ.”
Eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Ŋaan itoona Jooi toonnyak ogin ka kivita katabuŋtawin niigi ineet calaŋ iinai looc kurukin biyɛn zɔɔ.”
Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Má acina Jook ween Manyi unun.”
Mazi akɔ odotiz Loryenti cinanowe ci acinan Yesu noko, otoŋek niini nɔɔnɔ looc ɔtɔɔ, ook bodo ɛrɛ gɔl oma ci ka kabadakɛ Yesu.
Abadaak ni Yesu Galili dɔyize o Vɔŋiz o Joowo. Ma aziiknɛ kaviyawa oginɛ looc nice dook.
Ma adɛmɛz niini ɔl ceezine o Juz lotento, ma atitiny ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ.
Zin iiyak Yesu Nazarɛt ŋinbaal aroktan niini. Ma aku akɔ ceeze o lotento iitene o yubzento kazi Sabit eonin gɔɔn akɔyi laadun. Ŋinaante itiŋa jena ka kekeebek ɔl waragɛ o Joowo.
Ma anyek ɔl nɔɔnɔ waragɛ o nyakaŋan o kazi Izaya. Mazi akɔl waragɛ, ajowa ŋino ayeedi azi nɛ,

“Aavi Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaatan, eeci ɛŋɛrawan niini aneet ka kuduwak ɔl o amaat zɔɔz o abon. Itoonanan niini aneet ka kiiya kuduwak ɔl o acabje gɔl o ka kɔɔgjai niigi, ka buk kɔkɔl ɔl o ruben kɛbɛrɛ, ka kiiya koboroc ɔl o agide kɔtɔɔzɔ labak, ka kiiya kuduwak ɔl irkit o ka korogozi Jooi ɔl ogin.”

“Aavi Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaatan, eeci ɛŋɛrawan niini aneet ka kuduwak ɔl o amaat zɔɔz o abon. Itoonanan niini aneet ka kiiya kuduwak ɔl o acabje gɔl o ka kɔɔgjai niigi, ka buk kɔkɔl ɔl o ruben kɛbɛrɛ, ka kiiya koboroc ɔl o agide kɔtɔɔzɔ labak, ka kiiya kuduwak ɔl irkit o ka korogozi Jooi ɔl ogin.”
Onyook ni Yesu waragɛ, ma anyek eet o aliŋliŋ ceeze o lotento, ma aavi niini loota. Maje ɔl ci aavtiz ceeza o agɛlɛm niigi dook nɔɔnɔ.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Eelit didi zoozowa ci aduwa waragɛwi ci Joowo noko waanico tɔ, kiyo aziiŋnu noko.”
Ma anaat niigi dook nɔɔnɔ, ma abiir nɔɔgɔ; ooti zoozowe ci amadi aduwa niini noko. Ma ajinɔ niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Mayo niini alaŋ een ŋɛɛrti Josev gi?”

Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kaga ŋɛdɛt arooŋnyu uduktayaŋ olit unooŋ gɔɔn aziyu nɛ, Mã een akim, rogoz niina ɛlɛ unun maany. Ma buk arooŋnyu enekteyaŋ nɛ, Tugu buk kaal baal kaziiŋna agoon Kapernama e kuture cina o ŋina.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔm laadun nyakaŋan ci adiŋdiŋan ɔl kuture onin ɛlɛ.
Iziiktaŋ di juruŋ! Baale irkite o nyakaŋan o kazi Ilija anyak ŋaai ci bɔi een Israyil meel gɛr. Ma waan o ɛɛnɛ lɔɔci kɔr irkitok iiyu kibeen nyɛlɔwɛ tɔrkɔnɔm e, adak ɔl tarjo ci appe looce nice dook.
Bar Jooi ŋaan kitoon Ilija kook ŋaawe codoi ŋaane nicoko, ma bar itoon niini nɔɔnɔ kook ŋaawe ci bɔi oman ci abaak kuture o kazi Zarɛpaz looce o kazi Sidon.

Buk baale irkite o nyakaŋan o kazi Ilica, anyak ɔl ci meel gɛr een Israyil amɔɔr dɔbanɛ. Ma ŋaan korogoz Jooi codoi ŋaatineeŋ, ma bar waanice akɔ arogoz niini eet o kazi Naaman baal abaak looce o kazi Siriya e doon.”
Mazi azii ɔl ci aavtiz ceeze ci lotento noko zoozok nicoko, otoborit nɔŋ.
Enico itiŋgazɔ niigi jena, ma aduŋnan Yesu ceeza ŋina, ma avɔyi nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been kutur uneeŋ abil bɛ tadena ka kɔɔt kujuktek nɔɔnɔ ŋolol ŋinaante.
Bar Yesu aara ɛlɛ nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna nɔkɔ, ɔtɔɔ.
Ook ni Yesu kuture o aavi Galiliya kazi Kapernam, ma akɔ adɛmɛz ɔl ceeze o lotento ŋinaante iitene o yubzento kazi Sabit.
Ma abiir ɔl ooti demziinte cin o, eeci demziin cinɛ o anyak dɔyiz.

Maje ceeze ci lotento noko anyak eet ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento. Ma agɛrɛny miniŋit nici eete nico azi nɛ, “Yesu o Nazarɛt, arooŋ ŋaatinaaŋ naa? Akun ka ija uulalet? Kagayin naana ineet nɔkɔ akun Joowa.”

Maje ceeze ci lotento noko anyak eet ci anyak miniŋit ci Loryento. Ma agɛrɛny miniŋit nici eete nico azi nɛ, “Yesu o Nazarɛt, arooŋ ŋaatinaaŋ naa? Akun ka ija uulalet? Kagayin naana ineet nɔkɔ akun Joowa.”
Ma agernyek Yesu miniŋit ci Loryento noko anek nɛ, “Jawɔ tiv! Duna bitaala eete nico!” Uruyi ni miniŋit nici eet nico looc ɔl kɔrgɛna ŋina, ma aduŋnak bitaalin kɔkɔm gi ci gɛr agoonek eet nico.
Mazi akɔ acin ɔl gi nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Mayo dim zɔɔz taz nici ci azɔɔzɛkɛ niini miniŋ ci Loryento dɔyiza, ma aduŋnan o?”
Ma aziiknɛ kaviyawa o akati Yesu looc nice dook.
Enice udun Yesu ceeze o lotento ook ole o Saiman. Maje inyik o Saiman anyak ɛlɛ baritɔn ɔrɔɔt. Uduktak ni ɔl Yesu mɔɔriz ci inyigo noko.

Ŋinaanto ook Yesu, ma abil kuwen ci ɔɔŋɛ ŋaa noko libira, ma azoozek mɔɔriz nico kudunak bitaalin. Enico ɛlɛ uduna didi mɔɔrizi nici bitaala, ma iŋaaz inyik ci Saiman noko jena, ma aliŋliŋek nɔɔgɔ dayiin.
Ma yomana mazi akɔ ii loota, anyaaktak ɔl Yesu ɔl dook o amɔɔr moorizok keŋti dook. Ma aku ataadek niini azɛɛn nɔɔgɔ dook, ma arogi niigi dook moorizowe ugeec pocok.

Ma buk aara niini miniŋ ci Loryento ole ci meel, ma agɛrɛny miniŋa azi nɛ, “Een niina ŋɛɛrti Joowo didi.” Maje Yesu agernyek nɔɔgɔ kajaktɔ, ma didi ajaki niigi, eeci aga niigi nɔɔnɔ een Kiristo o arɛ ɔl o Juz nɛɛn.
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna itiŋa Yesu ook tuuwa niini doon. Ma arɔɔŋ ɔl nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ mazi avɔ ajowa nɔkɔ, orooŋit kalamit nɔɔnɔ kaavu calaŋ awɔ ŋaatineeŋ o.
Bar anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abon kakɔ kuuwai kaviyak o abon akati baliin o Joowo kuturyowe ogɛn buk, eeci nici gi baal laadun itoonakan Jooi aneet e nɛɛn.”
Ook ni uuwak niini ceezine o lotento looce o kazi Judiya dook.
Ma iitene oman abil Yesu liil o kazi Genezaret otoga. Ma avunak nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meel zɛɛ ma ajukɔ, eeci arɔɔŋ niigi kiziiyit zɔɔz o Joowo.
Ma acin Yesu kavoolɛt ceen ram ɛɛl dɔwɔna. Maje ɔl ci detiinto o udunta ɔɔt otoonyit cabayɛt.
Ma akɔ Yesu atɔɔt kavoolete nicoko o Saiman. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Toyooteyan di liil kɛdɛyai dɔwɔna kidicilim.” Aavu ni niini kavoola ŋinaante, ma adɛmɛz ɔl.
Mazi akɔ adotiz niini demziinta, enek Saiman nɛ, “Tɔyɔɔt kavool kook boloca ka ɔɔt ujuktek cabayɛt cugooc o liil ŋinaante ka agamit kuluk.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, ŋaan ona kadetina baalin dook e, akɔm gi ci kagamana kina. Bar zin giye o aduwaket niina, ŋaan kacinana bodo.”
Mazi avɔ ajuk niigi cabayɛt didi, agamit kuluk ci meel ɔrɔɔt kook zɛɛ ma arɔɔŋ atɛɛt cabayɛt.
Makacin alakada niigi gɔnɔgi o aavtiz kavoole o abil dɔwɔna e ka kivita kitiritit nɔɔgɔ. Ma avu abitiz niigi kavoolɛt dook ramantiya tɔc ci arɔɔŋ adodɛ.
Mazi acin Saiman gi nico, iiya akati kozoŋti looc Yesu ŋuma, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, dɛyai ŋaatan, eeci keen naana eet ci gɛr oŋenu.”
Ma abiir Saiman kibeen gɔnɔgi ci ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔnɔ o ooti tɛt kuluge ci meelik agama niigi noko.
Buk Jemis kibeen Jɔn ween lɔgɔz o Zebedi o gɔɔn adete kibeen Saiman abiir ooti giye nico.
Ma anek Yesu Saiman nɛ, “Má anyei ŋoliin. Inoko alaŋaan bodo adeti niina kuluk, bar akatai waanico ka detek ɔl Jook.”
Utugurtak ni niigi kavoolɛt dɔwɔn, ma ŋinaante otoŋtek kaal ugeec dook looc, oneec Yesu.
Mazi akunak Yesu kutur oma, iiya ɛɛti ci amɔɔr mɔɔriz o gidaŋ ɔrɔɔt. Mazi acin niini Yesu, aavu loota kɔpɔkpɔk, ma ilalek nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, Mã arooŋ rogozan kizi maya, rogozan.”
Ma adɔŋa Yesu aziit, ma uum nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Karooŋnyin rok. Inoko zin rogɔ.” Enico ɛlɛ urugun didi niini mɔɔrize onin.

Iricanek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Má akɔ aduwai eet oma gi nico, bar iyiik kataman bitɔ yelek ɛlɛ alaan o gɔɔn anyek Jook kaal o ataabi ɔl ka kagawin niini ineet obona. Biti zin buk taabinɛt o gɔɔn orogi ɛɛti mɔɔriza kiyo aduwa lotinowa o Mosis o, ka kagayin ɔl urugu didi.”
Bar enico adala kaviyawa o Yesu ŋinite dook ɔrɔɔt, ma avunak ɔl ci meel nɔɔnɔ ka kivita kiziiyit zoozok ogin, ka buk korogoztɛ niigi moorizowe ugeec.
Maje Yesu akɔ gɔɔn balala lak ci meelik gɛr, ka kook kaŋarowɔ ŋinaante niini doon.

Ma iitene oman adɛmɛz Yesu ɔl. Maje ɔl o kazi Parici kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok aavtiz buk niigi tɔ ŋinaante. Avu niigi kuturyowe o Galili dook ki kuturyowe o Judiya dook been Jerusalɛma. Maje Yesu arogoz ɔl o amɔɔr dɔyize o Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
Ivitak ni nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci adɔŋa eet ci ŋanyŋany kuwena. Arɔɔŋ niigi kooti nɔɔnɔ ŋaati Yesu ceeza eecitɔ, maje ɔl ceeza eecitɔ mɛɛlɛ gɛr.
Mazi acin niigi gɔl kaŋkaŋ nɔkɔ giye o meelini ɔl ceeza, otoodi eet ci amɔɔr noko ceez taden, ma avɔ abɔr ceez kuwet, ma abɔranɛ nɔɔnɔ ceez tadena kolocak looc ɔl kɔrgɛna ŋaati ona aavɛ Yesu o.
Mazi acin Yesu tuwɛn cineeŋ o, enek niini eet ci ŋanyŋany noko nɛ, “Laŋo, aaryai baciinowa ugune.”

Mazi azii ɔl o Parici e kibeen ɔl o demziinto zɔɔz nico, abaabanit niigi izitɔ nɛ, “Ma dim niini ŋɛnɛɛn ci aduwa zɔɔz ci ayayizi Jook noko? Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anim kaara baciinok? Aara ri baciinok Jooi doon. Amomoz ri ɛɛti nici Jook.”
Maje Yesu aga baabani cineeŋ o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔ ma abaabanu kaal nicoko nɔkɔ o naa?
Mayo aboke jaŋ kenek nɛ, Aaryai baciinok ugune, yo da kenek nɛ, Tiŋa jena, tɔ?
Inoko zin abon kayelekuŋ naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto kanyei dɔyiz ci kaaranɛ baciinok loota ŋina.”
Enek ni niini eet ci ŋanyŋany noko nɛ, “Kanekin nɛ, Tiŋa jena. Doma kuwen cun o. Bitɔ ɔlɔ.”
Enico ɛlɛ itiŋa ɛɛti o ŋanyŋany e jena nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn ŋina. Odoma kuwen onin ona ɔɔŋɛ e, ɔtɔɔ ŋaati anaati Jook, ook ɔlɔ.
Mazi acin niigi gi nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ dook ooti. Ma anaat Jook ŋoliinta, ma anɔ nɛ, “Kicinit zin kaal ci ateedet biye waanico.”
Ma vurta udun Yesu ceeza ook bitaala. Ma acin eet ci kazi Livai ci gɔɔn alot meeri aavi ŋaa onin gɔɔn aliŋliŋi. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nowawan.”
Ma iŋaaz Livai kodotek kaal ogin dook ki liŋliŋɔn onin buk looc, ma ano Yesu.
Ma akɔ agoonek Livai Yesu dayiin ci meelik ole onin, ma awa buk niini gɔnɔgi oogi ci meelik ole o meeryo been buk ɔl oogi. Ma avɔ azɔlɔ niigi dook ki Yesu.

Maje bar ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o Parici kibeen gɔnɔgi o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Mosis anyori giye nico, ma ajin niigi nuyak o Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma dim niiga azolonu ki ɔl ci alot meeri o been ɔl ci oŋenu o naa?”
Mazi azii Yesu gi nico, ɛbɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Gɔɔn ɔl ci akɔm mɔɔriz ŋaatineeŋ alaŋ arɔɔŋ akim. Bar zin gɔɔn arɔɔŋ akim ɔl o amɔɔr doon.
Alaŋ zin naana kakun o ka kiiya kotowa ɔl ci abon, bar kakunai ɔl o anyak baciinok ka keteedɔi niigi baciinok ugeec.”

Ma anek ɔl ogɛn Yesu nɛ, “Gɔɔn nuyawa o Jɔn ooŋ dayiin, ma aŋaryɛ ka kidiŋdiŋanit Jook. Buk nuyawa o Parici agɔɔn nɔkɔ. Maje bar nuyawa cugune o alaŋ agɔɔn nɔkɔ. Adake gɔɔn niigi, ma awodɛ iinya dook labak o naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mã ŋaan ɛɛti o rociinto aavitɔ o, alaŋ rak bacowa ooŋ dayiin.
Bar zin tiŋeere ma iiya iiteni o aaryanɛ niini ŋaatineeŋ, enice ŋaan ooŋ niigi dayiin kibeen wodɛn.”

Ma aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin oma anek nɛ, “Akɔm laadun eet ci arɛɛc rum ci colai ka kubutani gɔn ci rɛɛn. Mã agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, uulali koca niini rum ci colai o gaga nɔkɔ, eeci rum ci colai o kibeen gɔn ci rɛɛn o alaŋ aganɔ.
Akɔm buk eet ci arek iira buru ci rɛɛn. Mã agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, adɛ koca iirana, ma alip buru kuḏuute iirana, ma akoloz niini iira kibeen buru buk.
Abon zin aronek iirana buru ci colai.
Inoko zin bar ɔl ogɛn arɛɛz demziin uneeŋ rɛɛn doon, ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi demziin ci colai o. Anɔ niigi nɛ, Abon demziin onaaŋ rɛɛn.”
Ma iitene o yubzento kazi Sabit ɔtɔɔ Yesu, ma akɔ abatak manɛɛn ci labinu. Ma aduula nuyawa oginɛ labi, ma aŋinya azɛɛnɛn, ma adak.
Mazi acin ɔl o Parici nɔɔgɔ agɔɔn nɔkɔ, ijinit enektek nɛ, “Agoonu gi calaŋ aziikneket lotinowa kutuguz iitene nico o naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan da niiga ekeebit waragewe o Joowo zɔɔz baal agɔɔn alaani o kazi Devid kibeen ɔl ogin ɔrkɔr waanbaal adayi nɔɔgɔ magiz e?

Iitene nice akɔ niini ceeze o Joowo, ma akɔ adoma ḏɔkɛn o gɔɔn ataabi ɔl Jook, ma adak, ma anyek buk oogi ɔl ogin ɔrkɔr. Agayu niiga waanice ḏɔkɛn niceke alaŋ ɛɛti ci gaga adak, bar adak alaata o agam ceez nice doon.
Mazin naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keen Manyi ci iiten o yubzento nɛɛn.”
Bodo iitene ceen Sabit oman ook Yesu ceeze ci lotento, ma akɔ adɛmɛz ɔl ŋinaante. Maje ɛɛti ci dɔkɔm aziiti ci azo o aavi buk ŋinaante.
Ma adɛt ɔl o Parici kibeen alaat o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Mosis Yesu ka kicinit karabɔŋ arogoz niini ɔl iitene ceen Sabit o, eeci arɔɔŋ niigi gɔl ci ka kagamti nɔɔnɔ.
Maje Yesu aga baabanok cigeecik o nɔkɔ, ma anek niini eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti noko nɛ, “Tiŋa jena. Ija. Bil ɔl kɔrgɛna ŋaato.” Itiŋawa ni ɛɛti, ma aku abil ɔl kɔrgɛna.
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kajinuŋ di igeet. Ma lotinowa ogaac aziikneket kutuguz naa iitene ceen Sabit o? Kutuguz kaal ci abon, yo da kutuguz kaal ci gɛr? Korogozit eet, yo kuruyit da kadaak?”
Ma agɛlɛm niini nɔɔgɔ dook. Ma anek eet ci dɔkɔm aziiti o nɛ, “Zɔlan aziit cun o.” Mazi azɔlan niini aziit, obona aziiti oninɛ labak.
Bar enico otoborit niigi nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma abaaban niigi dook gi ci ka kutuguzek Yesu.
Ma iitene oman ook Yesu bɛ tadena ka kook kaŋarowɔ. Ma akɔ adica baalin dook ŋaryiinta ŋinaante.
Mazi akɔ aaliz tammu, otowa niini nuyak ogin, ma aŋɛra ŋaatineeŋ ɔl ceen amɔtɔ ram, ma akanek nɔɔgɔ zaar ci kazi toonnyak.

Ma zin ɔl ci baal aŋɛra niini noko Saiman o akanek niini zaar o kazi Pitɔr, ki gɔtɔni Saiman Pitɔr o kazi Andoru, ki Jemis, ki Jɔn ween gɔtɔni Jemis, ki Pilip, ki Bartalamu, ki Matiyu, ki Tomaz, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz, ki Saiman baal gɔɔn oorinɛ looc onin akumawe o Rom e, ki Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Jemis, ki Judaz Iskariat baal ka kiiya kataalɔi Yesu e.

Ma zin ɔl ci baal aŋɛra niini noko Saiman o akanek niini zaar o kazi Pitɔr, ki gɔtɔni Saiman Pitɔr o kazi Andoru, ki Jemis, ki Jɔn ween gɔtɔni Jemis, ki Pilip, ki Bartalamu, ki Matiyu, ki Tomaz, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz, ki Saiman baal gɔɔn oorinɛ looc onin akumawe o Rom e, ki Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Jemis, ki Judaz Iskariat baal ka kiiya kataalɔi Yesu e.

Ma zin ɔl ci baal aŋɛra niini noko Saiman o akanek niini zaar o kazi Pitɔr, ki gɔtɔni Saiman Pitɔr o kazi Andoru, ki Jemis, ki Jɔn ween gɔtɔni Jemis, ki Pilip, ki Bartalamu, ki Matiyu, ki Tomaz, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz, ki Saiman baal gɔɔn oorinɛ looc onin akumawe o Rom e, ki Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Jemis, ki Judaz Iskariat baal ka kiiya kataalɔi Yesu e.

Mazi abada Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin bɛ tadena, iiya ibil niini ŋaaten raco. Ma avunak nɔɔnɔ nuyawa ci meel nuyawe ogin. Maje buk ŋinaante anyak ɔl ci meel avunak nɔɔnɔ looce o kazi Judiya, kibeen Jerusalɛma, kibeen kuture o kazi Tayor been Sidon o abil liiltoga.
Avunak niigi Yesu ka kiiya kiziiyit zɔɔz onin. Ma buk arɔɔŋ ka korogoztɛ niigi moorizowe ugeec. Buk ɔl o agit voŋizowa o Loryento avunak nɔɔnɔ, ma arogoz niini nɔɔgɔ.
Ma arawɔnɛ ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ ŋaati uumi, eeci anyak dɔyiz ci aduŋna alye cin o ci arogni ɔl dook.
Ma agɛlɛm Yesu nuyak ogin, ma anek nɛ, “Amayuktewu niiga o amaanu, eeci baliin o Joowo izi cunooŋ.
Amayuktewu niiga o adakuŋ magizeeti inoko, eeci katin anyernu. Amayuktewu niiga o aluyu inoko, eeci katin ararnu.
Amayuktewu niiga ŋaati amarninuŋ ɔl igeet, ma atookuŋ, ma adomnyuŋ, ma anekuŋ nɛ, Eeginu gɛrzɛtɛ giye o atuyaŋ niiga aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto.
Ataltɔ zin ma avunakuŋ kaal ci ɛɛl nɔkɔ. Iitene nice orogomit talniinta, eeci itaŋonekuŋ igeet vɔyita ci appe ɔrɔɔt tamma. Eeci buk baale jijitigeec agoonek nyakaŋanɛt kaal nicoko.
Bar zin izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet ɔl o eeginu botoro inoko, eeci uulawu niiga arɔkzɛt unooŋ loota ŋina.
Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet o anyernu inoko, eeci katin adakuŋ magizeeti. Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeet o ararnu inoko, eeci katin aluyu tildik tildik.
Izi nɔŋa wole ŋaatunooŋ igeeta o gɔɔn adiŋdiŋanuŋ ɔl dook inoko, eeci baale buk jijitigeec adiŋdiŋan nyakaŋanɛt o voloŋo nɔkɔ.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko zin kanekuŋ nɛ, Ereezit ɔl o amarninuŋ igeet. Utuguzek niiga nɔɔgɔ kaal ci abon.
Abaricek niiga ɔl o gɔɔn atoryuŋ utugeti ci amadi. Buk ijintek Jook ɔl o gɔɔn agoonekuŋ kaal ci gɛr.
Mã arukin ɛɛti voret co, towek bodo voret co. Mã akɔyi ɛɛti rum cun malkinto, má abornei nɔŋ, bar anyek bodo rum oma labak.
Anyek ɔl dook kaal ci olla ala niigi ŋaatun. Mã akɔyi ɛɛti gi cun, má bodo ajin ka kabadakin.
Utuguz ɔl juruŋ kiyo buk arooŋnyu niiga nɔɔgɔ kutuguzuŋ igeet juruŋ o.
Mã areezu niiga ɔl o gɔɔn areezuŋ igeet doon, utuguzu koca niiga gitaz ci abon o? Akɔm kina! Eeci ɔl o oŋenu arɛɛz buk niigi ɔl o gɔɔn arɛɛz nɔɔgɔ.

Mã agooneku kaal ci abon ɔl o gɔɔn agoonekuŋ igeet kaal ci abon doon, utuguzu niiga gitaz ci abon o? Akɔm kina! Eeci ɔl o baciinowu agɔɔn gɔɔn buk niigi nɔkɔ. Alaŋ zin niiga ka waan eelit kiyo niigi o.

Mã anyeku ŋabolo ɔl o ka tiŋeere bodo kabadakuŋ igeet kaal nicoko doon, utuguzu koca niiga gitaz ci abon o? Akɔm kina! Eeci ɔl o oŋenu anyek buk niigi gɔnɔgi o oŋenu ŋabolɛt ka bodo tiŋeere kabadakɛ nɔɔgɔ.

Bar zin naana karooŋnyuŋ igeet ereezit ɔl o amarninuŋ. Utuguzek nɔɔgɔ kaal ci abon. Anycek ɔl ŋabolɛt labak. Má zin bar bodo areyu nɔɔgɔ ka kabadakuŋ, eeci ŋaan tiŋeere aruwonekuŋ igeet vɔyita ci appe, ka buk iziti niiga dɔl ci Jook o tammo. Arɛɛz niini ɔl o alaŋ anyek nɔɔnɔ zany kibeen buk ɔl o agɔɔn kaal o gɛr.
Abon awucnekuŋ ɔl igeet kiyo buk awucneku niiga Jook ween baatunooŋ o.”

Ma amɛna Yesu demziinte onin azi nɛ, “Má apayeku ɔl gerzitin karabɔŋ akanu ɔl oogi zɔɔza, ka buk calaŋ apayekuŋ Jooi igeet gerzitin. Otoŋit ɔl o gɔɔn agoonekuŋ igeet kaal ci gɛr, ka buk kotoŋeyuŋ Jooi igeet kaal o gɛr agoonu.

Anycek ɔl kaal labak, ka buk kanyuŋ Jooi igeet kaal o arooŋnyu. Ma kaala ci anyuŋ Jooi igeet o mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk kaal o anyeku niiga ɔl oogi. Mã ayabzaku eet kaal kizi kidicɛ, ayabzakuŋ buk Jooi igeet kaal kizi kidicɛ. Mazi ayabzaku eet kaal kizi mɛɛlɛ, ayabzakuŋ buk Jooi igeet kaal kizi mɛɛlɛ.”
Ma aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Akɔm laadun eet ci ruben buk ci ayit gɔɔn ci ruben kiyo niini o. Mã agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ, iinak koca niigi dook look.
Akɔm gɔɔn laadun eet ci ŋaan adɛmzɛ ci adikir kujuk alaan o adɛmɛz nɔɔnɔ. Bar zin ma idica niini demziin onin, ŋaan aku atobɔ niini buk kibeen alaan o adɛmɛz nɔɔnɔ.
Naa zin rican gi ci abil keberece ci gotonon o, ma bar alaŋ abaaban rak gi ci appe abil keberece cun o?

Ku anei gon oma nɛ, Jai kaarawin gi ci anyei kebereca o, ma gi ci appe abil keberece cun o alaŋ rak aara naa? Zin niina ci adiŋdiŋan ɛlɛ vɔlɔŋa o aara rak gi ci appe abil keberece cun o ɔɔwa, zɛɛ mazi icinɔ juruŋ, bitɔ zin aara gi ci abil keberece ci gotonon e.”
Ma azi bodo Yesu nɛ, “Akɔm gɔɔn laadun kɛɛt ci abon ci abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci gɛr. Alaŋ buk kɛɛt ci gɛrzɛ abiirna kɛbɛrɛ ci abon.
Gɔɔn laadun kaga naaga kɛɛt keberene ogin abiirna. Alaŋ ɛɛti adoca keberec ci moneeco keete ceen karadac, ma alaŋ buk adoca ɛɛti gɛmɛnyɔ keene ceen bila.
Ma ɛɛti ci abon aduwa kaal ci abon kaale o anyak niini zinize onin abon. Maje ɛɛti ci gɛrzɛ aduwa kaal ci gɛr kaale o anyak niini zinize onin gɛr. Eeci ɔtɔgi aduwa kaal o anyak ziniz eecitɔ.”
Ma azi bodo Yesu nɛ, “Ma dim gɔɔn niiga awuyaŋ aneet aziyu nɛ, Manyi, Manyi, maje ŋaato alaŋ arooŋnyu utuguz kaal o kaduwakuŋ o naa?

Ma zin ɛɛti ci iiyayan aneet, ma iziik zɔɔz onan, ma ozooti, atobɔ niini kibeen eet ci ɛɛnyɛt ceez kutur ɔɔwa. Ada niini looknya kizi wuntɛ kal, ma aruwek zɔɔrɛn looc kodoyit kak, ma iitir ceez kitiirwani kɔdɔk. Mayo nuun aku tawani ci appe, alaŋ ceez cinɛ noko aruk looc, eeci ɛɛnyci niini kɔdɔk kak ŋaati kutul.

Ma zin ɛɛti ci iiyayan aneet, ma iziik zɔɔz onan, ma ozooti, atobɔ niini kibeen eet ci ɛɛnyɛt ceez kutur ɔɔwa. Ada niini looknya kizi wuntɛ kal, ma aruwek zɔɔrɛn looc kodoyit kak, ma iitir ceez kitiirwani kɔdɔk. Mayo nuun aku tawani ci appe, alaŋ ceez cinɛ noko aruk looc, eeci ɛɛnyci niini kɔdɔk kak ŋaati kutul.

Maje ɛɛti ci azii zɔɔz onan, ma alaŋ azooni, atobɔ niini kibeen eet ci ɛɛnyɛt ceez cin kɔkɔm zɔɔrɛn, ma alaŋ aruwek azanɛ looc kodoyit, ma alaŋ buk iitir ceez kitiirwani ka kɔdɔk. Mazi aku tawani, aruyi ceez nico looc enico ɛlɛ, ma oyoki kuulalɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
Mazi akɔ adotiz Yesu zoozowe nicoko, ɔtɔɔ ook kuture o kazi Kapernam.
Maje ŋinaante anyak alaan ci takirnya o Rom. Alaani nici anyak gabaren cin arɛɛz ɔrɔɔt. Maje gabarɛnti nici amɔɔr ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kizi daayizoi.
Mazi azii alaani nici kaal o agɔɔn Yesu, itoonun niini ɔl oogi ole o Juz mayan kɔɔt kutuya Yesu ka kiiya korogoz gabaren cin o.
Ivitak ni niigi Yesu, ma avu ilalek nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ka kitirit eet nico. Anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici eet ci abon ɔrɔɔt. Aganɔ ŋaati atirtɛ niina nɔɔnɔ.
Eeci areezet niini ageet Juz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o ɛɛnycaket ageeta ceez onaaŋ gɔɔn lotento ŋina o.”
Itiŋa ni Yesu orkorit kibeen nɔɔgɔ. Mazi avɔ ajɔŋɔz kɔrɔk, itoona bodo alaani laŋotigin oogi kiiya kenektek Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, má bai amila ɛlɛ gaga, eeci alaŋ aganonu ŋaati akunakɛ kɔrɔk can o.
Ma buk alaŋ naana alya kaganona ŋaati kakunakin ineet. Olla zin duwa zɔɔz ci aduwa ka korok gabarɛnti cane o.

Buk ŋaatan ɛlɛ anyak alaat oogi ci adikir ŋaatan. Ma buk bodo naana kadikir takirnyaye ogan. Mã kanei co nɛ, Bitɔ kete, akɔ. Mã kawa oma kanei nɛ, Ija ŋaato, aku. Mã buk kaduwai gabaren gi ci kanei nɛ, Tugu gi nico, agɔɔn.”

Mazi azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, ibiir nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ ɔrɔɔt. Ma abuut ɔl ona anowa nɔɔnɔ e, ma anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ŋaan gɔɔn laadun kojowa eet ci anyak tuwɛn nɔkɔ. Yo nuun een ole o Israyil ɛlɛ ŋaan kojowa eet ci abil nɔkɔ.”
