Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abon ɔrɔɔt. Aliŋliŋ juruŋ. Een niina gabaren ci abonanin. Zin giye o iliŋliŋayɛ guruc oogi guruce baal miliny tɛr e, kanyin tiŋeere ineet kuturyok amɔtɔ ka bal niina izi alaan cineeŋ.”
Ma aku bodo gabarɛnti ci ano gɔn o, ma azi nɛ, “Manyi, kiliŋliŋa guruc ceen eet tur lak tur (500) guruce baal anyan e.”
Ma anek niini gabaren nico nɛ, “Kanyin tiŋeere ineet kuturyok tur bal izi alaan cineeŋ.”
Ma aku bodo gabarɛnti ceeni, ma azi nɛ, “Manyi, guruc baal anyan e ce. Kacabi iiten baale ruma, ma kitaŋ karoodi.
Kaŋolinin ineet, eeci een niina eet ci adoŋnin aziiti. Adoma gɔɔn kaal culu, ma ateedi manɛɛn calaŋ ɛɛva niina.”

Ma anek alaani nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Een niina gabaren ci gɛr. Kacabjin tedec zoozowe cugun aduwa noko ɛlɛ. Mã da ma agayan keen eet ci adoŋnan aziiti, ma kadoma kaal culu, ma kateedi manɛɛn calaŋ een cigan, alaŋ zin da amelŋeny guruc cigan o ka ma kakun kajowa azaace naa?”

Ma anek alaani nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Een niina gabaren ci gɛr. Kacabjin tedec zoozowe cugun aduwa noko ɛlɛ. Mã da ma agayan keen eet ci adoŋnan aziiti, ma kadoma kaal culu, ma kateedi manɛɛn calaŋ een cigan, alaŋ zin da amelŋeny guruc cigan o ka ma kakun kajowa azaace naa?”
Enek ni alaani ɔl o aromɛ kibeen nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aamta nɔɔnɔ guruc nicoko, anycek gabaren ona anyak guruc ween eet tur lak amɔtɔ e (1,000).”
Bar anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, anyawun uyen niini laadun eet tur lak amɔtɔ (1,000).”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã anyak ɛɛti kaal ci meelik, bar anyonek nɔɔnɔ ogɛn bodo kizi mɛɛlɛ ɔrɔɔt. Maje ɛɛti ci akɔm gi ci anyak, mayo nuun anyak ci miliny tɛr, aamnyai bar ŋaatin nici kavu nɔkɔ.
Inoko zin anyaaktayaŋ ɔl baal amarninan aneet, ma alaŋ arooŋnyan kizi alaan cineeŋ e dook. Anyaakta ka ivita uruyit nɔɔgɔ kadaayitɔ aneet ŋuma ŋina.”
Aduwa Yesu zɔɔz nico, ma vurta arawɔi ɔl ooyi Jerusalɛma.
Mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz ŋino kazi Bezpeja kibeen Bezani biye o kazi Kiŋiroc, itoonun niini nuyak ram karaktɛ.
Ma anek rak nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ korgine ci igeet ɔɔwa neke. Ajowanu tedec ŋinaante zigir ceen jɔrɔn ci ŋaan laadun kɔtɔɔt ɛɛti oman acabje ŋinaante. Ɔɔtɔ ɔɔkta ka anyaaktayaŋ aneet ŋina.
Mã anyak eet ci ajinuŋ anekuŋ nɛ, Ɔɔganu zigir nico naa? Enektek nɛ, Arɔɔŋ Manyi nɔɔnɔ.”
Ɔɔtɔ ni niigi, ma avɔ ajowa kaal dook eona aduwakɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ e.
Mazi avɔ ɔɔga zigir, ijinit ɔl ci zigiro o nɔɔgɔ enektek nɛ, “Ɔɔganu zigir cinaaŋ naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arɔɔŋ Manyi nɔɔnɔ.”
Ooti ni niigi zigir ŋaati Yesu. Ma avɔ arekɛ nɔɔnɔ rumanɛ bawuc, ma anyek Yesu kɔtɔɔt.
Mazi akɔ awɔ Yesu zigira, etevetɛkɛ ɔl nɔɔnɔ rumanɛ ugeec gɔl.
Mazi akɔ ajɔŋɔz niini Jerusalɛm ŋaao alocanɛ gɔl biye o kazi Kiŋiroc, egerenyit nuyawa oginɛ dook kɔla ŋaati anyekɛ Jook zany, ma anaati nɔɔnɔ kaale o meel adiŋdiŋ acin niigi.
Ma agɛrɛny niigi azi nɛ, “Amayuk Jooi alaan o aku zaare ogin. Abil ganɔni tamma, ma anyak titinyɔn Jooi o adiŋdiŋ.”
Ma azɔɔz ɔl ogɛn ole o Parici kɔla tɔ anek Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, gerenyek nuyak cuguno kajaktɔ.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kaduwakuŋ igeet, mayo nuun ajaki niigi, biyɛn alya agɛrɛny ni koca ɔrɔɔt nɔkɔ.”
Mazi awowonek Yesu Jerusalɛm, acin kutur, ma aluwek azi nɛ, “Matɛ nuun ga gɔl o ka jowai ganɔn iiten nico ɛlɛ doon, abon koca. Bar zin inoko o alaŋ aga.
Mazi awowonek Yesu Jerusalɛm, acin kutur, ma aluwek azi nɛ, “Matɛ nuun ga gɔl o ka jowai ganɔn iiten nico ɛlɛ doon, abon koca. Bar zin inoko o alaŋ aga.
Aku zin tiŋeere iiteni ci aliyanin modɛna o amarninin ineet kabanyɔ dook, kɔkɔm ŋinti aduŋnɛ.
Oyokin tiŋeere niigi ineet kibeen ɔl cugun noko dook lai kɔkɔm tegeremoc codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ataadonek gɔn. Agooni gi nici o, eeci ŋaan ga niina iiten o iiyai Jooi niini alya ka kiiya kitiritin ineet.”
Enico ook Yesu ceeze o Joowo, ma akɔ atɔɔwak ɔl dook o ataalinɛ kaal kaluwawa ŋinaante bitaalin.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ayeedi waragewe o Joowo zɔɔz ci anɛ Jooi nɛ, Ceez cane o agayi kizi ceez ci ŋaryiinto, maje bar niiga ivita utuguzu kizi ŋinti aroodinɛ agoryawa.”
Ma iinyaye niceke akɔ gɔɔn adɛmɛz Yesu ɔl ceeze o Joowo iinya dook. Maje alaata o ceez o Joowo, ki ɔl o demziinto, been alaat o ɔl o Juz arɔɔŋ kuruyit nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
Bar akɔm gɔl ci ka kurukti niigi nɔɔnɔ, eeci ɔl dook gɔɔn alotak nɔɔnɔ, ma avu azii zoozok ogin. Ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kobolozit zɔɔz codoi ṯɔr zoozowe ci aduwa niini noko.
Ma iitene oman ademzek Yesu ɔl kaviyak o Joowo abon ceeze o Joowo. Ivitak ni nɔɔnɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo, ki ɔl o demziinto, been ɔl o adikir baayizo.
Ma avu anek nɛ, “Duwayet di, ma dɔyiz ci agɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko dook noko ajowa ŋaa? Ŋɛnɛɛn ci anyin ineet dɔyiz nico o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anycaŋ zin di buk kijinuŋ naana igeet. Baale dɔyizi o Jɔn o oonyi aku Joowa, yo aku da eete ci deer?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anycaŋ zin di buk kijinuŋ naana igeet. Baale dɔyizi o Jɔn o oonyi aku Joowa, yo aku da eete ci deer?”
Ŋinaanto adaŋtɔ niigi maany izitɔ nɛ, “Kayo kiziti nɛ? Mã kazi nɛ, Aku Joowa, azi koca nɛ, Alaŋ zin da baale atuyu Jɔn naa?
Bodo mã kazi nɛ, Aku ole ci deer, avacet koca kɔlɛ nici dook ageet biyɛnɛ zɛɛ ma kadaai, eeci atu niigi Jɔn anyek kizi nyakaŋan.”
Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni niigi Yesu enektek nɛ, “Alaŋ kagaya ŋinti da akuni dɔyizi ci Jɔn o.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ zin buk naana kaduwakuŋ igeet dɔyizi can kagɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko dook o.”

Uduwak ni Yesu ɔl yabziin ci anek nɛ, “Anyak baale eet ci aḏowa kɛɛn ci amadi kɛbɛrɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma anyek niini ɔl oogi keevit mana nico ka ma abiir, ka keŋerit niini been nɔɔgɔ. Ɛɛrɔn ni niini ook ŋaati rɛɛn many.
Ma iinyaye o teedinto, itoonak niini gabaren cin ɔl o keevinto ka kiiya kooyɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ cigin. Bar ɔl ci keevinto noko uruyit gabaren nico, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ kimiire nɔkɔ kɔkɔm gi ci akɔyi.
Bodo akɔ itoona niini gabaren oma, bar ɔl ci keevinto noko ŋaan amɛna bodo aruk buk gabaren nico. Ma amomoz nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt, ma anyek kimiire nɔkɔ kɔkɔm gi ci akɔyi.
Bodo aku itoonek niini nɔɔgɔ gabaren oma, ma avu aruk niigi nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ zɛɛ ma atooyek bitaalin.
Abaabanun ni ɛɛti ci mano noko izi nɛ, “Kayo kutugu ku? Abon kitoonei nɔɔgɔ ŋɛɛran onan kareez ɛlɛ. Kaga nɔkɔ aŋole tiŋeere niigi nɔɔnɔ.”
Bar mazi avɔ acin ɔl ci keevinto noko nɔɔnɔ, izitɔ nɛ, “Nicini ŋɛɛrti eet o mano nɛɛn. Abon karuk nɔɔnɔ kadaak ka kaala ciginɛ o dook kizi cigaac.”
Agamit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma avɔ aruk kadaak mana bawuca.”
Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko zin tiŋeere ɛɛti ci mano noko aku agoonek ɔl nicoko naa?
Bar kanɛ aku tiŋeere niini, ma aku aruk ɔl ci keevinto noko kadaayitɔ, ma anyek mana ɔl oogi.”
Mazi azii ɔl yabziin nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ ri bai abil nɔkɔ.”

Ɛgɛlɛm ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Mazi yo zɔɔz o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo akati naa? Azi niini nɛ, Ma bɛ o abor ɔl o gɔɔn ɛɛnyɛt ceezi biyɛnɛ, ma apɛz kizi gi ci labak, bar bɛ o titiny ɔrɔɔt kujuk biyɛn o eenycinto dook nɛɛn.
Ma ɛɛti ci iinak bɛ nici aduuli yivyiv. Maje ɛɛti ci iinak bɛ nico nɔɔnɔ uurti kututut.”
Ma arɔɔŋ ɔl o ademzek ɔl lotinok kibeen alaat o ceez o Joowo kagamit Yesu ziite nice, eeci aga niigi ariik niini nɔɔgɔ zooze nico, bar olla eeci aŋole niigi ɔl.

Orooŋit ni gɔl ci ka kagamti nɔɔnɔ. Ma avɔ atɔlɔk ɔl oogi guruci, ka kɔɔt kedetit Yesu ŋaati agɔɔni eleeti kizi ɔl ci abon, ka kalabta nɔɔnɔ kijinit kaal gɛnyiza zɛɛ mazi anyak gi ci gɛr aduwa, ka kooti nɔɔnɔ rooni alaane o Rom.
Ma avu anek roote nici Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, kagayin naaga ineet kaala ci aduwa niini, ma ademez o dook kaal ci alɛɛmnyai. Ma akɔmnin ineet tɛl, bar ademez ɔl gɔl o Joowo een didi.
Inoko zin di duwayet. Mayo aganɔ ŋaati karuwɛki alaan o Rom meeri, yo akɔm da?”
Maje Yesu aga zɔɔz cineeŋ adɛti niigi nɔɔnɔ o nɔkɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ,
“Anycaŋ di gurucoc kicin. Ma riritɔni kibeen zaar ci anyak gurucoc nici o ci ŋɛnɛ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ci Sizar.”
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek zin Sizar kaal o akati nɔɔnɔ. Maje Jook anycek kaal o akati nɔɔnɔ.”
Buk enico ɔkɔm zɔɔz ci ka kagamti niigi nɔɔnɔ ɔl kɔrgɛna ŋina. Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti zooze ci abarzek niini nɔɔgɔ o, olla kapaŋantɛ kɔkɔm gi ci aduwa.

Ma avunak ɔl ogɛn ole o kazi Sajuzi Yesu. Niigi ɔl o gɔɔn adaŋnye azi nɛ, Alaŋ bodo ɔl iŋaaz daayiza. Ma avu ajin niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ayeedeket baale Mosis lotinɛt ci azi nɛ, Mã adaai ɛɛti ci ɔrɔcɔ maŋaan akɔm ŋaa cin o dɔl, abon gɔtɔnnya ci ŋaan arogi o anyak ŋaa cin o ka kitirak nɔɔnɔ dɔl.

Ma avunak ɔl ogɛn ole o kazi Sajuzi Yesu. Niigi ɔl o gɔɔn adaŋnye azi nɛ, Alaŋ bodo ɔl iŋaaz daayiza. Ma avu ajin niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ayeedeket baale Mosis lotinɛt ci azi nɛ, Mã adaai ɛɛti ci ɔrɔcɔ maŋaan akɔm ŋaa cin o dɔl, abon gɔtɔnnya ci ŋaan arogi o anyak ŋaa cin o ka kitirak nɔɔnɔ dɔl.
Anyak zin baale ɔl ceen gɔtɔn een torgɛrɛm. Ɔrɔcɔ ni ceen abuu o, ma adaai iŋaan kitira dole. Iiya ni anyawun gɔtɔnnya ci anowɔ ki nɔɔnɔ o ŋaa, ma adaai buk nici iŋaan kitirak ŋaa dole.
Anyak zin baale ɔl ceen gɔtɔn een torgɛrɛm. Ɔrɔcɔ ni ceen abuu o, ma adaai iŋaan kitira dole. Iiya ni anyawun gɔtɔnnya ci anowɔ ki nɔɔnɔ o ŋaa, ma adaai buk nici iŋaan kitirak ŋaa dole.
Ma bodo buk aku agɔɔn gɔtɔnnya ceen kɔrgɛn o nɔkɔ. Ma akɔrkɔranɔn niigi dook ŋaa nɔkɔ zɛɛ been tir logote ceen tutur o. Ma adaai niigi dook kɔkɔm dɔl ci arita.
Ma vurta adaak buk ŋaa.
Mayo zin tiŋeere ma iŋaaz ɔl daayiza, ŋaa nici akati ŋɛnɛɛn giye o niigi dook torgɛrɛma anyakti ŋaa nico?”
Ma abarzek Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arɔcɔ ɔl loota ŋina inoko o doon.
Maje bar ɔl o tiŋeere iŋaaz daayiza, ma avɔ rogete o abil been nɛɛn, alaŋ bodo niigi arɔcɔ.
Ma alaŋ buk bodo niigi adaai, eeci otobtɔ niigi ki toonnyak o Joowo. Iziti niigi dɔl ci Joowo giye o tiŋeere iŋaani niigi daayiza.
Ma ɔl o adaai iŋaaz bodo tiŋeere niigi daayiza. Uduwa baale Mosis gi nico waragewe o Joowo ŋaabaal acini niini lugurgoc o alanyit e. Ma awo niini Jook azi nɛ, Jook o Ibrayim, ki Aizak, been Jakob.
Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico akati gi o alaŋ ɛɛnɛ Jooi Jook ci ɔl ci adaai, bar niini Jook ci ɔl ci arogi, eeci ɔl dook ŋaatin arogi.”
Ma abɛkɛkɛ ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o ademzek ɔl lotinok nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, abarzeket gi ci abon.”
Azi nɔkɔ o, eeci otoŋole niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma alaŋaan arɔɔŋ kijinit niigi bodo nɔɔnɔ gi oma.
Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim gɔɔn niiga anonu nɛ, Kiristo niini katin dole ci dɔl o Devid o, ku?
Kajine o, eeci azi Devid alya waragewe onin beniinowu nɛ, Anek Jooi Manyi onan nɛ, Aavu libire can azo o zɛɛ ma kanyin ineet rocek modo ugun amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.
Kajine o, eeci azi Devid alya waragewe onin beniinowu nɛ, Anek Jooi Manyi onan nɛ, Aavu libire can azo o zɛɛ ma kanyin ineet rocek modo ugun amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.
Mazi awo Devid niini alya Kiristo kizi Manyi cin o, ka zin bodo kizi dole ci dɔl cigin ku?”

Mazi ŋaan azii ɔl dook zɔɔz nico nɔkɔ, enek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Egenyit ole o ademzek ɔl lotinok. Arɛɛz niigi gɔɔn ŋaati aborcɛki rumanɛ ci alina, ma arɛɛz ŋaati azaawi ɔl nɔɔgɔ titinyɔnta ŋaati awɔyi golowɛ, ma gɔɔn avɔ arayek niigi eleeti lɛcɛrɛ o abon ceezine o lotento been vitɛnane o gɔɔn azɔli ɔl dayiin.

Mazi ŋaan azii ɔl dook zɔɔz nico nɔkɔ, enek Yesu nuyak ogin nɛ, “Egenyit ole o ademzek ɔl lotinok. Arɛɛz niigi gɔɔn ŋaati aborcɛki rumanɛ ci alina, ma arɛɛz ŋaati azaawi ɔl nɔɔgɔ titinyɔnta ŋaati awɔyi golowɛ, ma gɔɔn avɔ arayek niigi eleeti lɛcɛrɛ o abon ceezine o lotento been vitɛnane o gɔɔn azɔli ɔl dayiin.
Ma buk gɔɔn avɔ aavtiz niigi ki ŋaai o bɔi ka kadakti nɔɔgɔ looc. Ma arɔɔt gerzitin uneeŋ ŋaati ajini Jook ŋinti wun kal kɔlɛ kɔrgɛna. Bar zin katin payiin cineeŋ gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk ɔl dook.”
Mazi akɔ Yesu ceeze o Joowo, acin ɔl ween arɔk ŋaati avu ajukɛkɛ guruc loidoŋ o ceezu.
Ma acin buk niini ŋaa ci bɔi amaat ajukek milinyanɛ ceen ram loidoŋ nico.
Izi ni Yesu nɛ, “Kaduwakuŋ igeet, anyek ŋaa ci bɔyɛ noko Jook guruc ci meel kujuk ɔl oke dook.
Eeci ɔl oke dook anyek Jook kaal ci anyigjai arokzete uneeŋ. Maje bar niini amaat ɔrɔɔt, ma anyek Jook guruc ogin ona anyak e dook.”
Maje nuyawa o Yesu ogɛn anaat linat o ceez o Joowo, eeci ɛɛnycai niini biyene ci alina, ma anyak kaal ci alina ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ci gɔɔn anyek ɔl Jook.
Bar anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kaal ci acinu noko dook, anyak iiten oma ci alibɛn niigi dook lai kɔkɔm bɛ codoi ṯɔr ataadonek gɔɔn tadena.”
Ijinit ni nuyawa Yesu enektek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ma dim kaala nicigi akanai tiŋa? Ma katin ma izi iiteni nica ajɔn, kagaya ku?”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Iziti vililɛ! Má anyeku ɔl koogi kalabtawuŋ. Eeci iima avu ɔl ci meel zaare cigan, ma avu anekuŋ nɛ, Aneeta Kiristo nɛɛn ce. Inoko iiya iiteni. Bar zin niiga má aziiŋnu zɔɔz cineeŋ o been nɛɛn.
Mazi iziiktu oroonok kibeen looc yawyawitin, má rak aŋolinu looc gaga, eeci kaala nici ŋɛdɛt rak akanai ɔɔwa nɔkɔ, bar zin looc dican alaŋ ɔrkɔra ki kaal nicoko ecodoi nɔkɔ.”
Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Ɔɔrɔ waanma modɛna olla yaka. Kuturi ce ki kutur co ɔɔrɔ. Alaani ce ki alaan co ɔɔrɔ.
Ma amɔɔt waanma tɔdɔwa vitɛnane ogɛn kirakirak, ma anyak lɔɔci tarjo ki moorizok ci gɛr vitɛnane ci meelik, ma ayelzai tammu kɛŋa kaala ci anyek ɔl kanyayit ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt.
Zin maŋaan rak kakatai kaala nicigi, agamnyuŋ tiŋeere ɔl igeet, ma agiduŋ, ma akɔlakuŋ rooni, ma arekuŋ sijin, ma avoyuŋ alaatɛ, eeci atuyaŋ niiga aneet.
Bar zin nici waŋi cunooŋ ka uduktakɛ niigi nɔɔgɔ kaviyak o Joowo abon.
Anycek zin niiga zinzeeti kalalit labak calaŋ abaabanu gi ci aniyu nɛ, Kayo kɔɔtɔ kuduktak nɔɔgɔ naa?
Eeci tiŋeere iitene nice ŋaan kanyuŋ naana igeet zɔɔz ganiin ki dɔyiz ci atɛɛzanu ɔl o amarninuŋ igeet dook kapaŋantɛ, kɔkɔm gi ci aduwa.
Ma iinyaye niceke iirikuŋ tiŋeere baatugooc, ki yaatugooc ɛlɛ, ki gotonogu, ki atenok ugooc, been laŋotugooc, ma aruk niigi oogi ŋaatunooŋ kadaayitɔ.
Amarninuŋ waanma ɔl dook igeet, eeci anuyaŋ aneet.
Bar zin akɔ ma akɔm ŋaatunooŋ imitat ci oowu adoi ṯɔr iina been nɛɛn.
Mã amezu piryakzɛt labak, ajowanu koca tiŋeere rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.”
Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma acinu takirnya ci modɛn oogi ivita ilikta Jerusalɛm, agaac niiga iiya libɛn oninɛ izi ajɔn.
Abon zin ɔl o abaak Judiya adokonyonek biyɛn. Maje ɔl o abaak Jerusalɛma, abon aluuk ŋinaante. Ma ɔl o adɛyai Jerusalɛma, abon aavtiz calaŋ avunak.
Eeci nicaga iinya o acacinɛ Jooi nɛɛn, ka kɛlɛɛmnyai zoozowa dook o aduyai waragewe o Joowo.
Nɔŋ ci kol zin tiŋeere iinyaye niceke ɔrɔɔt ŋaane o anyake been ŋaane o arokti. Eeci akunak tiŋeere libɛn ci appe ɔrɔɔt looc nice giye o abornɛkɛ Jooi ɔl niceke nɔŋ.
Aruwe katin ogɛn dilanyai, ma agamnyi ogɛn kɔɔt kacabtɛ loocowe ogɛn. Ma abal Jerusalɛm ɛlɛ modɛna ogɛn zɛɛ ma akɔ adicai irkitowa ci baliin cineeŋ o.”

Ma azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Iiten ci akuni Ŋɛɛrti Eeto e, anyak katin kaal ci ayelzai iiwa, ki nyelowa, been monyonyɛ. Maje loota ŋina apalpalani katin maama liilowɛ, ma amacucɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ keteede modɛn o loocu dook biyɛta, ma akunak nɔɔgɔ ŋoliin ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Aruk tiŋeere ɔl kulurkuluri katavalitɔ ki ŋoliin ŋinti ŋaan rak arɛwi niigi kaal ci gɛr ka kakatai loota neke. Eeci tiŋeere kaala o ɛɛl tammu bɔbɔra amɔɔt, ma ookci.
Keyelizai ni naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati kakuni diizoca dɔyiza been diŋdiŋonte ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
Mazi akanai kaala nicigi, itiŋgaz jena odoŋit ooti ki taden, eeci ɛlyaan unooŋ izi ajɔn.”
Ma uduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin ci anek nɛ, “Abaabanit di kɛɛt ween moneec kibeen buk kɛɛn oogi.
Gɔɔn mã acinu bɔlɔk ugeec itilizit, agayu izi lɔlɔŋumi ajɔn.
Buk zin gole nico ma acinu kaal nicoko akatai, agaac izi baliin o Joowo ajɔn ka kiiya.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, iina tiŋeere kaala nici dook iŋaan kidicai ɔl nicigi dook.
Adicai katin tammu taden ki looc, maje zɔɔz cane o abil kɛlɛɛmnyai nɔkɔ zɛɛ been nɛɛn.

Egenyit eleetine ugooc ka calaŋ atalvanyanuŋ zinzeeti baayinɛt ci awudu nyaantanɛ gil, kibeen gi ci anyeku zinzeeti kivirit kaale ci akati rogɛt unooŋ looce nico zɛɛ makacin iiyayuŋ iiteni nica boyoŋyoŋ calaŋ agayu.
Eeci atoroban tiŋeere iiteni nica ɔl loocok dook kɛrɛk nɔɔgɔ kiyo gɔɔn atoroban kelegit curi o.
Egenyit zin ijinit Jook tup ka anyayit dɔyiz ci avardaŋnyu kaalyan ci avunak looc neke dook zɛɛ ma avɔ arumnyaŋ aneeta Ŋɛɛrti Eeto.”
Ma adica Yesu iinya niceke dook adɛmɛz ɔl waaz ceeze o Joowo. Ma yomana awɔ akɔ ooŋnyak biye o kazi Kiŋiroc.
Ma avunak gɔɔn waanice ɔl dook ceez o Joowo ŋeere ririwɔna ka kivita kiziiyit niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ademzin.

Mazi akɔ ajɔn iiteni o gɔɔn adayi ɔl o Juz ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar o gɔɔn aadanɛ niigi iiten baal avardaŋi toonnyaiti o Joowo ceezi ugeec looce o Masiro e, ivita alaata o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok orooŋit gɔl ci ka komonyci Yesu calaŋ ɔl aga, eeci aŋole niigi ɔl.

Mazi akɔ ajɔn iiteni o gɔɔn adayi ɔl o Juz ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar o gɔɔn aadanɛ niigi iiten baal avardaŋi toonnyaiti o Joowo ceezi ugeec looce o Masiro e, ivita alaata o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok orooŋit gɔl ci ka komonyci Yesu calaŋ ɔl aga, eeci aŋole niigi ɔl.
Enico ook Loryen zinize o Judaz o kazi Iskariyot ween nuyai codoi nuyawe o Yesu een amɔtɔ ram.
Ɔtɔɔ ni niini, ma akɔ azɔɔz ki alaat o ceez o Joowo been alaat o takirnya o abɛk ceez o Joowo gɔl ci ka kanyaakɛ niini nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
Ataltɔ ni niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma aterkedek niigi nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz ci ka kanycekɛ guruc.
Agama ni Judaz zɔɔz cineeŋ o, ma akɔ arɔɔŋ gɔl ci ka kakatakɛ nɔɔgɔ Yesu kɔkɔm eet ci aga.

Mazi akɔ een iiten o gɔɔn adayi ɔl ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar, ma atɔŋdi niigi mirkici o ŋaan miliny o aadanɛ iiten o vardaŋinto, itoon Yesu Pitɔr ki Jɔn anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ orooŋit ŋinti ka utuguzi dayiin cigaac kaadanɛ iiten ci vardaŋinto o.”

Mazi akɔ een iiten o gɔɔn adayi ɔl ḏɔkɛn o alaŋ amokcar, ma atɔŋdi niigi mirkici o ŋaan miliny o aadanɛ iiten o vardaŋinto, itoon Yesu Pitɔr ki Jɔn anek nɛ, “Ɔɔtɔ orooŋit ŋinti ka utuguzi dayiin cigaac kaadanɛ iiten ci vardaŋinto o.”
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Koota kutuguza ŋaaḏaŋ?”

Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di juruŋ. Avoyu tedec zɛɛ ma kutura ŋinaante arumonu kibeen eet ci anyak iju ci maamu. Oneec zin nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been kɔrɔk ci akɔyi o. Ɔɔt zin enektek eet ci ceez nico o nɛ, Anekin gayoiti nɛ, Abil ceez ci ka kiiya kadakta ki nuyak ogan dayiin o vardaŋinto ŋaaḏaŋ?

Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di juruŋ. Avoyu tedec zɛɛ ma kutura ŋinaante arumonu kibeen eet ci anyak iju ci maamu. Oneec zin nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been kɔrɔk ci akɔyi o. Ɔɔt zin enektek eet ci ceez nico o nɛ, Anekin gayoiti nɛ, Abil ceez ci ka kiiya kadakta ki nuyak ogan dayiin o vardaŋinto ŋaaḏaŋ?
Ŋaan zin ayelekuŋ tedec niini ceez ci alɔlani ci ɛɛnyci gɔɔn tadena, ma anyak kaal o ceezu dook, ka zin ɔɔtɔ utuguzi dayiin.”
Mazi avɔ niigi, ɔɔt didi ojokta kaal dook eona aduwakɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ e. Utuguzɔ ni dayiin.
Mazi izi ŋinti ka kadaktɔi, ivita Yesu kibeen toonnyak ogin oogi, ma avu aavtiz niigi dook loota ka kadaktɔ.
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ii baale laadun karooŋ naana iiten nico kiiya ka kozolit ki igeet dayiin ci vardaŋinto noko iŋaan kiiyayan piryakzɛt o.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ bodo kazɔl ki igeet dayiin ci ɛɛl kiyo nici noko zɛɛ ma kavɔ kazɔl dayiin o vardaŋinto een didi baliinte o Joowo.”
Odoma ni Yesu jayitot ci nyaanu, ma anyek Jook zany, ma azi nɛ, “Odomta jayitot nico iribanit niiga dook.
Eeci alaŋ bodo kazɔl naana ki igeet nyaan nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma aku baliin o Joowo.”
Bodo adoma ḏokoc, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ kadayit, ma anek nɛ, “Nicini ɛlɛ onan anyonekuŋ igeet nɛɛn. Utuguz zin gɔɔn nɔkɔ ŋaati aadanaŋ aneet.”
Mazi adotiz dayiinta, anyek bodo Yesu nɔɔgɔ jayitot ci nyaanu ewe anek nɛ, “Ma jayitot nicini terkediin o colai o ka kɛɛlayuŋ Jooi igeet biyete ogan aḏuuti ŋaatunooŋ.
Mazin ɛɛti o ka kook kiiriyan aneet, karomena ki aneet ŋina ɛlɛ.
Maje naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto abon kadaai ebaal arek Jooi laadun, bar zin nɔŋ ci kol eete ci iirikan aneet o.”
Mazi azii niigi gi nico, ijintɔ niigi maany iziktɔ nɛ, “Ma dim ŋɛnɛɛn ŋaatinai ci ka kook kutuguwek nɔɔnɔ gi nico o?”
Ma akanai daŋɔn nuyawɛ maany giye ci akati ŋɛnɛɛn ci adikir ŋaatineeŋ.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Gɔɔn alaata o loocu anyak dɔyiz ole ugeec abal. Ma awɛ niigi kizi ɔl ci titiny.
Bar zin ŋaatunooŋ alaŋ abon ŋaati agoonu buk niiga nɔkɔ. Ma ɛɛti ci adikir ŋaatunooŋ, abon niini abadaan ɛlɛ kizi kidic. Maje ɛɛti ci arayinuŋ igeet, abon anyek ɛlɛ kibil kiyo gabarɛnti o.

Yo gɔɔn adikir ɛɛti jaŋ? Adikir ɛɛti ci aavi loota olla arɛ dayiin kanyaayai o, yo da adikir ɛɛti ci anyaak nɔɔnɔ dayiin o? Ma ɛɛti ci aavi loota arɛ dayiin o eet o adikir nɛɛn. Bar zin inoko naana ŋaatunooŋ ŋina kabil kiyo gabarɛnti o.
Igeet nɛɛn o amɛnanu karomɛ ki aneet iinya dook gidente onan.
Kanyuŋ zin tiŋeere naana igeet alaazɛt kiyo buk anyan baaba aneet o.
Kadake tiŋeere naana ki igeet, ma kawodɛ ki igeet baliinte onan. Ma aavtiyu katin niiga lecerene o ka apakti boryok o Israyil een amɔtɔ ram.”
Ma azi Manyi Yesu nɛ, “Saiman, Saiman, ziik di. Ojowa Loryen gɔl ci ka kitivanyuŋ igeet kiyo gɔɔn ivanyit ŋaa labi o.
Bar zin kijineyin naana ineet Jook ka calaŋ iina niina tuwente unun. Ka zin iitene ci abadakan niina aneet e, ka itiir gotonogu o tuwento kodoyit.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, kagama buk naana cabiin ci kacabin ki ineet, ma kadaai been ineet labak.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kaduwakin ineet Pitɔr, akɔ tija adaŋnyan niina aneet lak iiyu iŋaan kɔrɔk toloci.”
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iiten baale mã kitoonuŋ igeet kɔkɔm guruc, ki kaboot ci dayiino, been caava e, anyak gi ci ɔɔt atamaatu tɔ?”
Abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm kina.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko zin kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã anyak ɛɛti guruc karabɔŋ een kaboon ci dayiino, abon adoma kanyak. Mã akɔm eet kabaz ci wun, abon ataalinɛ rum ka kataala kabaz.

Kaduwakuŋ igeet gi nico o, eeci iiya iiteni o ka kɛlɛɛmnyai gi baal akanan aneet baal aduwa nyakaŋanɛta waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Akeebek katin ɔl nɔɔnɔ ɔl ween libjok.” Mazin didi kaala dook o ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta akanan aneet avɔ zɛɛ iina.”
Ma anek nuyawa nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, cin di. Kanyaka ŋaato kabazwa ci wuntik ram.”
Abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mɛɛlɛ nicigi alya.”
Ma iŋaaz Yesu kutura, ma akɔ biye o kazi Kiŋiroc eonin laadun. Ma ɔrkɔr buk nuyawa ki nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi avɔ arum ŋinite, enek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Ijinit Jook ka calaŋ iinanu kaale o acinanuŋ.”
Ma ooŋnek niini nɔɔgɔ looc, ma icak kidicilim, ma akɔ akani kozoŋti looc ajin Jook azi nɛ,
“Baaba, nyɛyi da piryakzɛt nico ŋaatan. Matɛ arooŋ, nyɛyi. Bar zin alaŋ een giye ci karɔɔŋɛ naana, bar olla tugu eo arɔɔŋɛ niina.”
Iiyak ni nɔɔnɔ toonnyaiti ci Joowo, ma aku anyek nɔɔnɔ dɔyiz.
Ma acirit nɔɔnɔ ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma abedonek ŋaryiin lak ci meel gɛr. Ma amolok kakat molowot tɔdɔ kiyo biyeta o.
Mazi adotiz ŋaryiinta, itiŋa imiirozek toonnyak, ma akɔ amɔda nɔɔgɔ bar oogin. Apirna niigi, eeci acirit nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ɔrɔɔt giye ci aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ o.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ooginu naa? Itiŋgaz ijinit Jook ka calaŋ iinanu kaale o acinanuŋ.”
Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz Yesu nɔkɔ, ivita kɔlɛ ci meelik. Arayan nɔɔgɔ Judaz ween nuyai codoi nuyawe ween amɔtɔ ram. Ma akunak niini Yesu, ma aku acoco nɔɔnɔ ŋalyamoc zaawinta.
Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Judaz, aku iirikan niina aneet Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaati acucuyan ŋalyamoc?”
Mazi acin nuyawa oginɛ gi ci ka kakatai noko, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Manyi, keteŋeda nɔɔgɔ kabazwani labak?”
Ma iŋaaz codoi ŋaatineeŋ, ma aŋɛdɛt gabaren ci alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo kɛtɛɛda itat ci azo o por.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bil di! Má ŋaan bodo abɛdɛkɛ.” Ma uum niini eet nico itat, ma alal nɔɔnɔ itati enico ɛlɛ.
Ijin ni Yesu alaat o ceez o Joowo, ki alaat o takirnya o ceez o Joowo, been ɔl o adikir avu ka kivita kagamit nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Akɔ ma avunakaŋ kabazwani kibeen kɛɛni kiyo avunaku libjoi o naa?
Baalyo karomɛ naana ki igeet ceeze ci Joowo noko tup nɔkɔ, ma ŋaan agamtaŋ. Inoko zin nici waŋi cunooŋ ajowanu niiga baliinte o Loryento.”
Agamit ni niigi Yesu, ma avɔyi ole o alaan o adikir ceeze o Joowo. Maje Pitɔr ano nɔɔgɔ vurta rɛɛna kidicilim.
Maje kɔrɔk kɛŋa ŋinaante anyak ɔl ci aavtiyɛ goo. Iiya ni Pitɔr, ma aku aromonek nɔɔgɔ aavɛ buk goo.
Mazi acin dole ceen gabaren ole nice Pitɔr aavɛ goo nɔkɔ, ɛgɛlɛm niini nɔɔnɔ, ma azi nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici buk gɔɔn ɔrkɔr ki Yesu.”
Ma adaŋnyi Pitɔr azi nɛ, “Dole, alaŋ kaga eet nico been nɛɛn.”
Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ iiyezin ɛɛti oman nɔɔnɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Een ri buk niina nuyai codoi nuyawe o eet nico.”
Abɛdɛkɛ bodo Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm ŋɛr, alaŋ keen nuyai cin.”
Bodo ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ ɛbɛɛyɛ ɛɛti oman ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Ɛɛti nici nuyai ci Yesu gi, eeci niini buk een eet ci Galili.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Eet onaaŋ, alaŋ naana kaga zɔɔz ci aduwa o.” Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz niini nɔkɔ, ɔrɔk toloci.
Ma abuudi Manyi Yesu, ma agɛlɛm nɔɔnɔ. Aada ni Pitɔr zɔɔz o Manyi Yesu baal anɛki nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Adaŋnyan tiŋeere lak iiyu iŋaan kɔrɔk toloci e.”
Ma adun Pitɔr akɔ kɔrɔk bawuca, ma aku alu ŋinaante ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Maje ɔl ci baal abɛk Yesu o, amomoz nɔɔnɔ. Abuŋ niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ, ma aruk, ma bodo ajin anek nɛ, “Duwayet di! Ŋɛnɛɛn ci arukin o?”
Maje ɔl ci baal abɛk Yesu o, amomoz nɔɔnɔ. Abuŋ niigi nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ, ma aruk, ma bodo ajin anek nɛ, “Duwayet di! Ŋɛnɛɛn ci arukin o?”
Ma aduwak buk niigi nɔɔnɔ zoozok ci meelik ɔrɔɔt ci adɔmi niigi nɔɔnɔ.
Ma ŋeere olotai ɔl o mayan baayizo, ki alaat o adikir ceeze o Joowo, been ɔl o ademzek ɔl lotinok. Anyaaktak ni ɔl nɔɔgɔ Yesu.
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Duwayet di, ma dim niina een Kiristo nɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo nuun inoko kaduwakuŋ, alaŋ atuyaŋ been nɛɛn.
Buk inoko mã kajinuŋ naana igeet gi oma, alaŋ abarzekaŋ.
Bar zin akatai waanico naana Ŋɛɛrti Eeto ŋaan kakɔ kaavi aziite o Joowo azo.”
Ma azi niigi dook nɛ, “Een zin bɔŋ niina Ŋɛɛrti Joowo?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwanu niiga o.”
Mazi azii niigi zɔɔz nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Alaŋaan bodo karɔɔŋ bacok, eeci kiziiyit naaga alya zoozok ogin otoge onin ɛlɛ.”
Ma iŋaaz ɔl dook, ma avɔyi Yesu alaane o kazi Pailat.

Ma avɔ akana niigi kaal ci aŋanyi nɔɔnɔ, azi nɛ, “Kajowana eet nico ademzek ɔl gɔl ci gɛr. Anek niini ɔl nɛ, Má aruweku alaan o Rom adikir meeri. Ma bodo buk azi nɛ, Niini alya Kiristo nɛɛn. Anyek niini ɛlɛ kizi alaan.”
Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma niina een alaan o Juz nɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Nɛɛn ci aduwa niina o.”
Enek ni Pailat alaat o ceez o Joowo been kɔlɛ dook nɛ, “Akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa eete nico ka kapayek nɔɔnɔ.”

Mazi azi Pailat nɔkɔ, egerenyit niigi, bar ɛbɛɛktɛ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Eet nico gɔɔn arumuz ɔl dook Judiya ŋina kɔɔyɔktɔ demziinte onin. Akana iiten baale laadun Galiliya zɛɛ makacin inoko iiya urumet ageet ŋina.”
Mazi azii Pailat gi nico, ijinun ɔl enek nɛ, “Ma dim ɛɛti nici eet ci Galili?”
Mazi akɔ aga niini Yesu eet ci Galili, itoonek nɔɔnɔ Erod o abal looc nice. Maje buk waanice Erod alya aavi Jerusalɛma.

Mazi akɔ acin Erod Yesu, atalɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, eeci gɔɔn da azii niini kaviyak o akati Yesu rɛɛna, ma arɔɔŋ gɔl ci acini nɔɔnɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Arɔɔŋ niini kicin Yesu ŋaati agɔɔni kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye keberene ogin ɛlɛ.
Ijin ni niini Yesu kaal ci meel ɔrɔɔt. Maje bar Yesu akɔm gi codoi ci abarzek nɔɔnɔ.
Ma iŋaaz alaata o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o gɔɔn ademzek ɔl lotinok o Juz, ma aduwa kaal ci akani Yesu vɔlɔŋa.
Omomozit ni Erod been takirnya ogin Yesu, ma aminaŋi nɔɔnɔ. Ma aborcɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ rum ci alina momozɛnta, ma avɔyi nɔɔnɔ bodo ŋaati Pailat.
Maje rak baale Pailat ki Erod amarnɔ. Ma iitene ci baal agami ɔl Yesu neke, izitɔ bodo laŋoten.
Otowa ni Pailat alaat o ceez o Joowo, ki ɔl o mayan baayizo, kibeen buk ɔl oogi ŋaatodoi.
Ma aku anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iiten baale rak anyaakaŋ eet nico aniyu nɛ, Ademzek niini ɔl gɔl ci gɛr. Mazi ona kajin nɔɔnɔ igeet kɛbɛrɛn ŋina noko, akɔm gi ci gɛr kajowa ŋaatin ebaal aduwanu niiga e.
Ma buk Erod akɔm gi ci gɛr ajowa ŋaatin giye ci abadaket niini nɔɔnɔ ageet ŋina o. Akɔm zin ɛɛti nici gi ci gɛr agɔɔn ka kurukti naaga nɔɔnɔ kadaak.
Ŋaan zin olla kanyi takirnya kuruyit nɔɔnɔ nyaboyɛn zɛɛ ka koboroc kɔɔtɔ.”
Maje gɔɔn laadun iitene o vardaŋinto ɔɔgak Pailat nɔɔgɔ eet codoi ole o acabje.
Mazi azii kɔlɛ zɔɔz ci Pailat noko, egerenyit niigi dook azi nɛ, “Ruwɔ eet nico kadaak, bar ɔɔgayet Barabas.”
Maje ɛɛti ci kazi Barabas noko, acabji niini zooze ci da ayɔwɔn ɔl kutura, ma aruwɛn ɛɛti oman kadaak.
Maje Pailat arɔɔŋ kɔɔk Yesu kɔtɔɔ. Ma ajin niini kɔlɛ bodo zɔɔz ci ka kɔɔgi Yesu.
Bar enico egerenyit niigi dook iziti nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ kadaak! Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ kadaak talakeca!”

Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔgɔ eceen lak iiyu o anek nɛ, “Agɔɔn dim ɛɛti nici gitaz ci gɛrzɛ o? Akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa ŋaatin ka kapayɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz. Olla zin karooŋ nɔɔnɔ kɔrɔɔyɛ nyabowa doon zɛɛ ka kɔɔgɛ kɔtɔɔ.”
Bar enico egerenyit niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk we azi nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ talakeca!” Nɔkɔ zɛɛ makacin apawun Pailat Yesu eci arɔɔŋi niigi o.
Bar enico egerenyit niigi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ kujuk we azi nɛ, “Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ talakeca!” Nɔkɔ zɛɛ makacin apawun Pailat Yesu eci arɔɔŋi niigi o.
Ma ɔɔgak nɔɔgɔ eet o arɔɔŋ niigi baal acabje yowonte o ayɔwɔn ɔl kutura, ma aruwɛn ɛɛti oman kadaak e. Ma anyek niini nɔɔgɔ Yesu ka kɔɔt kutuguzek niigi nɔɔnɔ gi o arɔɔŋ kutuguzek.

Ooti ni niigi Yesu. Mazi ŋaan awɔ gɔla nɔkɔ, urumtɔ ki eet ci kazi Saiman ci aluuga looce o kazi Sariin. Iŋaana niini ɔlɔ arɔɔŋ kiiyak Jerusalɛm. Agamit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ dɔyiza, ma anyek kitik kɛɛt ceen talakec o konowi Yesu vurta.
Ma ano kɔlɛ ci meel gɛr Yesu. Buk kole nico anyak ŋaai ci ɔrkɔr ki nɔɔgɔ ci aluwek Yesu.
Mazi azii Yesu ŋaai nicoko alu nɔkɔ, ubuut niini nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Ŋaai o Jerusalɛm, má aluwekaŋ aneet, bar utuluzek eleeti cugooc o ki dɔl ugooc.
Eeci avu waanma iinya ci anɛ ɔl nɛ, Amayuk bar da Jooi ŋaai o awɔ koliin o ŋaan laadun kanyayit dɔl.
Ma buk azi tiŋeere niigi iitene nice nɛ, Alaŋ kini iinaket biyɛn nici bar komonycet kɔɔtɔ ḏim ni.
Eeci mã agoononekan aneet kaal ci gɛrzɛ noko, bar tiŋeere igeet agoononekuŋ kaal ci gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk can o.”
Mazin waanice avɔyi niigi Yesu kibeen ɔl ceen agoryak een ram ka kɔɔt kurukte buk niigi kadaayitɔ been nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi avu arum ŋinti kazi Amɛn ci Oowu, otodeec niigi Yesu kibeen ɔl ceen ram noko ŋinaante. Adɔdi codoi Yesu libire ci azo o, maje codoi adɔdi nɔɔnɔ libire ci kaŋeto o.
Ma aŋaryɛ Yesu azi nɛ, “Baaba, aara nɔɔgɔ oŋec nico labak, eeci alaŋ aga niigi gi ci agɔɔn o.”
Ma aŋerek takirnya eleeti rumanɛ o Yesu ŋaati agɔɔni niigi maadico.

Maje kɔlɛ ɛɛl agɛlɛm kaal ci agooni noko dook. Maje bar ɔl o Juz adikir amomoz Yesu anɔ nɛ, “Arogoz ri gɔɔn niini ɔl oogi. Mã een didi niini Kiristo o aŋɛra Jooi nɛɛn, anyek zin di kɛɛla ɛlɛ cin o maany.”
Buk takirnya amomoz nɔɔnɔ. Anyaak niigi nɔɔnɔ nyaan ci gɛr acaŋkai, ma avu arikɛ otok.
Ma anek nɛ, “Mã een didi alaan o Juz nɛɛn, ɛɛla di ɛlɛ cun o.”
Maje kɛɛt ceen talakec adodinɛ Yesu o ayeedonek zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Nicini alaan o Juz.”
Maje ɛɛti codoi ole ween agoryak adɔdi ki Yesu e amomoz buk niini Yesu azi nɛ, “Alaŋ een niina Kiristo? Ɛɛla zin ri ɛlɛ cun o kibeen buk ageeta.”
Egerenyek ni gɔɔn ceeni nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Alaŋ aŋole Jook? Apawoneket ageet daayizi kiyo niini o.
Bar zin payiin cinai o alɛɛmnyai kaale ogaac kagɔɔn, maje ɛɛti nici akɔm gi ci gɛr agɔɔn kina.”
Ma abuut niini Yesu, ma anek nɛ, “Má anyi kibiirin ɔɔ. Aadawan buk tiŋeere aneet iitene ci abadanɛ aku ɛɛnɛ alaan e.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, tedec waanico ɛlɛ karomɛ naana ki ineet ŋaao rogeto.”
Ma waaz iilya idiitɛ ii kalimik kizi lɔɔci dook muur gilinyik zɛɛ been ziik ween iiyu yomana.
Ma areeci rum o gɔɔn aŋerin ceez o Joowo kɔrgɛna cac.
Ma agɛrɛny Yesu ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ azi nɛ, “Baaba, karekin vɔŋiz onan aziit unun.” Aduwa zɔɔz nico, ma atɛɛt enico ɛlɛ.
Maje alaani ci takirnyawu aavi ŋinaante acin kaal nicoko nɔkɔ, ma anaat niini Jook azi nɛ, “Didilɛ, ɛɛti nici bar da eet ci abona ɔrɔɔt.”
Mazi acin kɔlɛ ci ona aavtiz ŋinaante o dook kaal nicoko, imiirtozek korogjok ugeec ŋaati agami ooti iinoni Yesu.
Maje ɔl ween laŋoten o Yesu dook, been ŋaai baal anowa nɔɔnɔ Galiliya e, aŋaamnek niigi dook kaal nicoko rɛɛna nɔkɔ.

Maje waanice ŋinaante anyak eet ci kazi Josev ci abaak kuture o kazi Arimatiya abaai ɔl o Juz. Niini eet ci abona ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma arɛ niini waanice kuni o baliin o Joowo. Buk niini alya alaan codoi ole o roonnyo. Bar zin waanice alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini kaal ci gɛr arɔɔŋ kutuguzek gɔnɔgja Yesu o.

Maje waanice ŋinaante anyak eet ci kazi Josev ci abaak kuture o kazi Arimatiya abaai ɔl o Juz. Niini eet ci abona ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma arɛ niini waanice kuni o baliin o Joowo. Buk niini alya alaan codoi ole o roonnyo. Bar zin waanice alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini kaal ci gɛr arɔɔŋ kutuguzek gɔnɔgja Yesu o.
Ook ni niini alaani o kazi Pailat, ma akɔ ajin nɔɔnɔ ka kanyek Yesu kook kada.
Mazi akɔ aziiknek Pailat nɔɔnɔ kooyi Yesu, ook aara nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec, ma aku amanocek rum ci abon zɛɛ ook ni arek bɔɔt ci abil biya ci ŋaan laadun akɔm eet ci adaai arek ɔl been nɛɛn.
Maje waanice iiteni nica iiten ween jima ka tiŋeere kizi iiten ci ɔl o Juz yubzento kazi Sabit.
Odomta ni ŋaai baal ɔrkɔra kibeen Yesu Galiliya e, orkorit buk ki Josev ɔɔt bɔɔta, ma avɔ acin ŋinti aronek Yesu o.
Ma amiironek niigi korogjok, ma avɔ agɔɔna karacɛnɛn ki karkarɛt ci ka kɔɔt kuvuudi ɛlɛ o Yesu bɔɔta. Ma iitene ween Sabit ayubuz niigi eo aduwan lotinowa.
Ma iitene o yubzento ririwɔna oloyit ŋaai ooti karacɛnɛn ki karkarɛt baal agɔɔna e bɔɔta.
Mazi avɔ arum niigi ŋinite, bar acin bɛ baal abuŋi ɔl bɔɔt otok e aaryai bɔɔt otoga.
Mazi avɔ bɔɔta eecitɔ, ajowa ɛlɛ o Manyi Yesu iziitɔ.
Ma abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti giye nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Mazi ŋaan ɛlɛ niigi apaŋani nɔkɔ, bar acin ɔl ceen ram ci anyak rumanɛ ci vɔɔr pɛr eelnek nɔɔgɔ libira.
Ma aloc ŋaai ooti, eeci aŋole ɔl nicoko ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Ma anek ɔl nici nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Avu arooŋnyu eet ci arogi ŋaati ɔl ci adaai o naa?
Azee zin niini ŋina tɔ. Itiŋa daayiza. Aada zɔɔz baal aduwakuŋ niini igeet iitene baal aavɛ Galiliya e.
Waanice azi niini nɛ, Tiŋeere Ŋɛɛrti Eeto anyononek azɛɛn ci ɔl o oŋenu, ma avɔ adɔdɔ niigi nɔɔnɔ talakeca, ma iŋaaz niini bodo daayiza iinyaye ceen iiyu.”
Aada ni ŋaai didi zɔɔz onin baal aduwa e.
Imiirte ni niigi, ma avɔ aduwak kaal nicoko dook nuyak ween amɔtɔ codoi kibeen buk ɔl o aromɛ ki nɔɔgɔ ŋinaante.
Ma ŋaai nicigi waanice awoyi Meri o looc o kazi Magdala, ki Jowana, ki Meri ween yaati Jemis. Ma avu aduwak niigi been buk ŋaai oogi toonnyak kaal nicoko.
Maje toonnyawa bar apɛz gi ci aduwa ŋaai noko kizi gi ci labak, ma alaŋ arek niigi zinzeeti juruŋ.
Itiŋa ni Pitɔr, ma adɔkɔny akɔ bɔɔta. Ma ŋinaante mazi ululi ka kɛgɛlɛm bɔɔt eecitɔ, bar acin rumanɛ doon, akɔm bodo gi oma kina. Ma amiiri akɔ ɔlɔ kibiir ɔɔ giye nico tɛt.
Ma iitene nice ɛlɛ itiŋgazɔ nuyawa ceen ram ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Ɛmɛyaz. Maje kuturi nica adɛwɔ ki Jerusalɛm kidicilim.
Ma gɔla imicit niigi ozoozit zɔɔz ci akati kaal ci baal agooni Jerusalɛma neke.
Mazi ŋaan azɔɔzɔ nɔkɔ, iiya Yesu alya, ma aku ɔrkɔr kibeen nɔɔgɔ.
Acin ŋɛdɛt niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋaati ɔrkɔri o nɔkɔ, bar anyak gi ci agargarɛn nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ calaŋ iiyez nɔɔnɔ.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma dim gitaz ci azoozu gɔla ŋaan oke zɛɛ o?”
Ma ɛɛl niigi ŋaati anyorani ŋumti.
Ma ajin ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci kazi Kiliyopas nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een eet ci aavɛ Jerusalɛma maŋaan da ga kaal ci baal agooni iinya nicoko noko niina doon nɔkɔ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kalakaz da ci utuguze o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kaal baal agoononek Yesu o Nazarɛt e. Niini waanice nyakaŋan ci anyak dɔyiz ci appe ɔrɔɔt zɔɔza kibeen kaale o agɔɔn buk, ma agayi niini Joowa kibeen ɔla buk.
Ma bar ivita agamit nɔɔnɔ alaata o ceez o Joowo been alaat ogaacak abal ɔl, ma avɔyi nɔɔnɔ rooni ka kapawozek nɔɔnɔ daayizi zɛɛ makacin didi ɔɔt otodowit niigi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec.
Maje naaga laadun kabaabana kaniya nɛ, Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o ka kiiya kɛɛla ɔl o Israyil. Bar zin inoko ɔɔt iinya iiyon ci adaai.

Ma adoma ŋaai cigaacak ogɛn alowonek bɔɔt uyen ŋeere ririwɔna, ma avɔ ajowa ɛlɛ onin iziitɔ bɔɔta. Ma avu ateedet niigi ageeta biye giye ci azi nɛ, Acin niigi toonnyak ci Joowo, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Yesu oroga.

Ma adoma ŋaai cigaacak ogɛn alowonek bɔɔt uyen ŋeere ririwɔna, ma avɔ ajowa ɛlɛ onin iziitɔ bɔɔta. Ma avu ateedet niigi ageeta biye giye ci azi nɛ, Acin niigi toonnyak ci Joowo, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Yesu oroga.
Bodo buk ivita ɔɔtɔ ɔl cigaacak ogɛn bɔɔta. Mazi avɔ abada, avu azi nɛ, Abil didi eona aduwan ŋaai e. Ŋaan kicinit buk niigi ɛlɛ o Yesu bɔɔta.”
Enewun ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma niiga eeginu tarbalɛ, ma alaŋ atuyu kaal baal aduwa nyakaŋanɛta e taman nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
Udukta niigi baale laadun iziti nɛ, Kiristo abon rak apirna kaale nicoko dook iŋaan kook diŋdiŋonte onin.”
Ma oobek Yesu nɔɔgɔ zoozok o akati nɔɔnɔ aduyai waragenyaye o Joowo dook, akana waragewe o ayɛɛt Mosis zɛɛ ma aṯornɛkɛ waragenyaye o ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta dook.
Mazi avɔ ajɔŋɔz niigi kutur ona laadun avɔyi e, utugu Yesu ɛlɛ kiyo ɛɛti o arɔɔŋ kidicek o.
Ma alam niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Má adicei! Taŋu ŋaatinaaŋ ŋina, eeci izi lɔɔci baalin.” Ook ni niini ka kataŋu ŋaatineeŋ.
Mazi avɔ aavtiz loota ka kadaktɔ, odoma Yesu ḏokoc, ma anyek Jook zany, ma atɛɛt, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ.
Enico ɛlɛ okole nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ ugeecik, makacin agaac bar tɛ nici Yesu nɛɛn. Ŋinaanto izi Yesu ḏim nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ.
Ma anɔ ɔl nicigi nɛ, “Uyen laadun ma kɔrkɔra ki nɔɔnɔ gɔla, ma oobeket niini zoozok o akati waragɛ o Joowo e, akanet zɔɔz nica zinzeeti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.”
Ma iŋaaz niigi enico ɛlɛ, ma amiironek Jerusalɛm, ma avɔ amɔda nuyak ween amɔtɔ codoi been gɔnɔgi ci tuwento oogi alotɛ ŋaatodoi.
Ma anek nuyawa nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Itiŋa didi Manyi daayiza! Eyelewun ɛlɛ Saiman.”
Uduktak ni buk ɔl ci ona een ram o gɔnɔgi kaal ona acin gɔla e, ki zɔɔz o agayi niigi Yesu ŋaa ona atɛɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ ḏokoc e.
Mazi ŋaan oobek ɔl nici gɔnɔgi zɔɔz nɔkɔ, bar acin niigi Yesu ɛlɛ ibil nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna. Ma azi nɛ, “Abonanu.”
Ma ateedi nɔɔgɔ biyeta kanyayit ŋoliin ci appe ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, bar abaaban niigi anyek nɔɔnɔ kizi miniŋit.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaku ŋoliin naa? Ma da niiga abaabanu kizik bar alaŋaan kiŋaaz daayiza korok bodo?
Egelemit zin di tobɛ ci kanyei azɛɛnɛ ki zɔɔnɛ o ka agayaŋ niiga didi nici aneeta ɛlɛ nɛɛn. Uumtaŋ buk ka agayaŋ juruŋ, eeci miniŋiti alaŋ anyak ɛlɛ ki amɛ kiyo acinaŋ kanyei naana o.”
Azi nɔkɔ, ma ayelek nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn ki zɔɔ.
Mazi ŋaan anyek niigi kizi lutɛt nɔkɔ giye o aromi niigi talniin been ooti biirɛz, enek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaku yo gi ci kadei tɔ ŋina?”
Ma anyek niigi nɔɔnɔ kulugit ci aaki.
Ma adak nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna ŋina.

Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iiten baal ŋaan kɔrkɔri ki igeet e, kuduwayuŋ kaal ci inoko ka kivita kutuguzozeyan aneet noko dook, eeci ka kɛlɛɛmtɛ zoozowa o akanan aneet ayeedi lotinowe o Mosis, ki zoozowe o ayɛɛt nyakaŋanɛta, been waragenyaye o beniinowu.”
Ɔkɔl ni niini nɔɔgɔ ooti ka kagaac zoozok o aduwa waragɛnya o Joowo.
Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ayeedi zin baale gi ci azi nɛ, Kiristo abon rak agide zɛɛ ŋaan bodo iŋaaz daayiza iinyaye ceen iiyu.
Ma abon uuwaki kaviyawa o ka kabadi ɔl mony oŋene ugeec, ka kaara Jooi nɔɔgɔ oŋɛ ugeec zaare ogin, ka kakatai Jerusalɛma zɛɛ ma akɔ adala modɛn dook.
Eeginu zin niiga bacok kaale nicoko dook.
Ŋaan zin kakɔ kitoonakuŋ gi o atɛrkɛt baaba ka kitoonayuŋ igeet. Abon zin rak arewinu Jerusalɛma ŋina zɛɛ ma akunakuŋ dɔyizi o Joowo.”
Itiŋa ni Yesu Jerusalɛma arawɔi nɔɔgɔ ooyi ŋaati kazi Bezani. Ma ŋinaante ook odoŋun niini azɛɛn, ma amayuk nɔɔgɔ dook.
Mazi ŋaan amayuk niini nɔɔgɔ nɔkɔ, ɔdɔŋɛ niini ki tammu taden. Otoŋek nɔɔgɔ looc ook niini tamma.
Idiŋdiŋanit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma abadaak Jerusalɛm talniinte ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
Ma aavtiz gɔɔn niigi waanice iinya dook ceeze o Joowo anyek Jook zany.
John: Baale da laadun kinatamma e zɔɔz tɔ, ma zɔɔz nici aromɛ kibeen Jook. Mazin da zɔɔz nici Jook nɛɛn.
Aromɛ baale laadun kinatamma e niini kibeen Jook.
Ma ɛɛnycai kaal dook ŋaatin, ma akɔm gi codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ calaŋ ɛɛnycai ŋaatin.
Ma waanice zɔɔz nici rogɛt nɛɛn, ma rogɛti nici anyaak ɔl vooritin.
Ma vooritin nici iiya otokol muur, ma ŋaan muuri kidiit nɔɔnɔ been nɛɛn.
Anyak baale eet ci itoona Jooi ci kazi zaar nɛ Jɔn.
Aku niini ka kiiya kizi bacoi ci vooritino ka kutuweec ɔl dook vooritin nico.
Mazin niini alya alaŋ een vooritin nɛɛn, olla niini bacoi ci vooritino.
Mazin nici vooritin ween didi baal akunak looc ka kiiya kotokol ɔl dook e nɛɛn.
Aavi waanice zɔɔz nici tɔ loota laadun, ma ɛɛnycai lɔɔci ŋaatin, ma bar ŋaan lɔɔci kaga nɔɔnɔ.
Akunak niini ɔl ogin maany, ma ŋaan ɔl oginɛ alya kagamta nɔɔnɔ.
Maje ɔl o agama nɔɔnɔ, ma atu zaar ogin anyek niini nɔɔgɔ dook dɔyiz kiziti dɔl ci Joowo.
Alaŋ eegin niigi dɔl ci Joowo gole o aritan ɛɛti ci deer, bar eegin niigi dɔl cigin tiryante o Joowo.

Ma zɔɔz nici otowɛ izi eet ci deer, ma iiya abaak niini ŋaatinai. Anyak niini dɛtɛn ki bonat ci appe. Kicinta naaga alya diŋdiŋɔn onin baal anyonek nɔɔnɔ giye o ɛɛnɛ niini ŋɛɛrti Joowo o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
Uuwak waanice Jɔn ween bacoi onin azi nɛ, “Eet baal kaduwakuŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Anowanan tiŋeere ɛɛti ci adiŋdiŋ ŋaatan e nɛɛn nici. Eeci aavi niini tɔ baale laadun iŋaan naana kitiryai e.”
Mazin dɛtɛne onin adikir kojokta naaga dook mayuwɛnɛt ci appe.
Anyaa baale Jooi lotinok ŋaaten Mosis, maje dɛtɛni kibeen zɔɔz ween didi ajoyai ŋaaten Yesu Kiristo.
Akɔm laadun eet ci icinun Jook. Bar ŋɛɛrin o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ o atobɔ ki nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o anyewun nɔɔnɔ kagawɛ.
Ceeni zin bacokzɛt o Jɔn iitene baal itoonakɛ ɔl o Juz Jerusalɛma nɔɔnɔ alaat o ceez o Joowo been ɔl o kazi Livai ka kɔɔt kijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ kenektek nɛ, “Ma dim ineet ŋɛnɛɛn?”
Mazin Jɔn ŋaan kadaŋɔ, bar waanice aduwak niini nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci abil tɔp anek nɛ, “Alaŋ keen naana Kiristo o ka kiiya nɛɛn.”
Ma ajin bodo niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ineet zin ŋɛnɛɛn? Ineet Ilija?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm.”
Ma bodo ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een bɔŋ nyakaŋan gi?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm.”
Ma vurta enektek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ineet zin ŋɛnɛɛn? Duwayet ka kɔɔt kuduktaya naaga ɔl ci ona itoonanet o zɔɔz ci akanin ineet.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Keen naana molok ci kuuwai balala ebaal aduwan nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya anɛ nɛ, Anyak tiŋeere molok ci uuwak balala azi nɛ, Amadek Manyi gɔl onin kibil tɔp e.”
Ma ajin bodo ɔl o Parici nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ,
“Zin mã alaŋ een niina Kiristo, ma alaŋ een Ilija, ma buk alaŋ een nyakaŋan, oony zin ɔl naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Koony naana ɔl maami doon, bar zin anyak eet oma ŋaatunooŋ ci ŋaan niiga agaac.
Aku anowanan tiŋeere niini aneet vurta, ma alaŋ kaganona naana ŋaati kaborcanɛ nɔɔnɔ caava ogin zɔɔnɛ.”
Ma kaala nicigi dook agooni ŋaao kazi Bezani liil o kazi Jordan libire ci jenu e ŋaabaal oonyi Jɔn ɔl e.
Ma iitene co icinun Jɔn Yesu akunak nɔɔnɔ, ma azi nɛ, “Icinit di nyɔɔn o Joowo aku ka kiiya kaara baciinok o loocu nici.
Eet zin baal kaduwakuŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Anowanan tiŋeere ɛɛti ci adiŋdiŋ ŋaatan e nɛɛn nici, eeci aavi niini tɔ baale laadun iŋaan naana kitiryai e.
Mazi naana alya ŋaan nɔɔnɔ kaga, olla zin naana kakun, ma koonyɛ maami o ka kagaac ɔl o Israyil nɔɔnɔ.”
Ma buk aduwa Jɔn zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Kacin iiten baale Vɔŋiz o Joowo akunak looc tamma kiyo yɛɛlac o, ma aku aavi ŋaatin.

Ma naana alya ŋaan nɔɔnɔ kaga, bar zin Jooi o itoonanan aneet ka kiiya kotoony ɔl maami anekan nɛ, Acin tiŋeere Vɔŋiz o Joowo akunak looc tamma, ma aku aavi eete oman. Mazin ɛɛti nici eet o ka kotoony ɔl Vɔŋize o Joowo nɛɛn.”
Ma azi Jɔn nɛ, “Kicina naana alya kaal nicoko. Inoko zin kanekuŋ nɛ, Ɛɛti nici ŋɛɛrti Joowo nɛɛn.”
Ma iitene co bodo aromɛ Jɔn kibeen nuyak ogin een ram.
Mazi acin niini Yesu ŋaati awɔyi, izi nɛ, “Nyɔɔn o Joowo nica.”
Mazi azii nuyawa ceen ram noko zɔɔz nico, oneec niigi Yesu.
Mazi abuudi Yesu, acin nɔɔgɔ anowa nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyu naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Rabai, aavɛ ŋaa?” (Ma kɛŋ ci zaar nico kazi nɛ alaan o demziinto.)
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ivita ka icinit ŋinti kaavɛ o.”
Maje ziiti izi ziik wec yomana. Ma ɔrkɔr niigi kibeen nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been ŋin o aavɛ niini. Ma aromɛ niigi kibeen nɔɔnɔ iiten nice dook.
Ma nuyawe ceen ram azii zɔɔz ci aduwa Jɔn, ma ano Yesu noko codoi ŋaatineeŋ Andoru ween gɔtɔni Saiman Pitɔr.
Kataman nɔkɔ ojowa Andoru gɔtɔni o kazi Saiman, ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kujuktawa Masaya.” (Ma kɛŋ ci kazi Masaya o kazi nɛ Kiristo ween ruguzoi.)

Ooyi ni niini Saiman ŋaati Yesu. Ma agɛlɛm Yesu Saiman, ma anek nɛ, “Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔn, inoko akatozeyin ineet zaara ci kazi Sivas.” (Ma zaara ci kazi Sivas o kibeen zaar ci kazi Pitɔr o akati kɛŋ cinɛ bɛ.)

Ma iitene co ook Yesu looce o kazi Galili. Ma gɔla urumtɔ kibeen eet ci kazi Pilip. Maje Pilip laadun eet ci kutur o kazi Bezediya. Buk Andoru kibeen Pitɔr abaak kuture nice. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nowawan.”

Ma iitene co ook Yesu looce o kazi Galili. Ma gɔla urumtɔ kibeen eet ci kazi Pilip. Maje Pilip laadun eet ci kutur o kazi Bezediya. Buk Andoru kibeen Pitɔr abaak kuture nice. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nowawan.”
Ma akɔ Pilip ŋaati Natanyɛl, ma anek niini nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kojoktawa eet baal ayɛɛt Mosis waragewe o lotinowu, ma ayɛɛt buk nyakaŋanɛta e. Niini Yesu ween ŋɛɛrti Josev o kutur o kazi Nazarɛt.”
Ma ajin Natanyɛl Pilip anek nɛ, “Ma dim anyak gi ci abon didi ka kiiya Nazarakti?”
Mazi akɔ acin Yesu Natanyɛl akunak nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ, izi nɛ, “Eet zin ween Israyilen didi akɔm ŋaatin vɔlɔŋ nɛɛn nici.”
Ma ajin Natanyɛl Yesu anek nɛ, “Agayan ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kicinin uyene ŋaa ona aavɛ loota raa moneeca iŋaan Pilip kotowawin e.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Natanyɛl nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, een niina ŋɛɛrti Joowo. Ma een alaan o Israyil.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Utuwɔ, eeci kanekin nɛ, kacinin uyen ŋaa ona aavɛ raa moneeca e? Ŋaan zin bar tiŋeere acin kaal ci adiŋdiŋ kujuk nicoko.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ dook nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, acinu tiŋeere niiga tammu taden akoli, ma acinu toonnyak o tammo avɔ tammu tadena, ma avunak looc ŋaaten Ŋɛɛrti Eeto.”
Ma iinyaye ceen iiyu anyak tiŋkawiin kuture o kazi Kana abil looce o kazi Galili. Maje yaati Yesu aavi buk ŋinaante.
Ma awo buk ɔl Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin ŋaati tiŋkawiinto noko.
Mazi akɔ adicai nyaani, enek Yesu yaatinɛ nɛ, “Ɔkɔma ɔl nyaan.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ een zɔɔz cun. Ŋaan rak aneet iiteni onanɛ kiiya ka keyelek ɔl diŋdiŋɔn onan.”
Ma anek yaati Yesu ɔl ceen gabara o nɛ, “Olla gi ci aduwakuŋ niini igeet odomta utuguz.”
Maje ŋinaante anyak ijunya ceen tɔrkɔnɔm ci ɛɛnycai biyene ci gɔɔn arek ɔl o Juz maam ci ka kutuguzi niigi kɛɛr uneeŋ toonyento. Akɔyi gɔɔn iju codoi burwɛt eetoma karabɔŋ een eetoma kamɔtɔ.
Ma anek Yesu gabara nɛ, “Ibitizit ijunya nicoko maami.” Ibitizit ni niigi ijunya maami tɔc.
Enek ni Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Otogoca zin inoko ci miliny anycek eet ween abuu o tiŋkawiinto.” Otogocak ni zin didi niigi nɔɔnɔ.

Mazi akɔ atar ɛɛti ceen abuu ci tiŋkawiinto noko maam ci utuye kizi nyaan noko, alaŋ aga ŋinti akuni nyaani nici o. Maje gabara ona agɔca maam e aga niigi nɔkɔ. Otowa ni ɛɛti ceen abuu ci tiŋkawiinto o eet ci arɔcɛ o.

Ma aku anek nɛ, “Gɔɔn ɔl dook anyaak rak kernok nyaan ci abon o ɔɔwa zɛɛ mazi ook abaaktɛ ɔl, anyaaktak ni niigi nɔɔgɔ nyaan o acaŋkai. Maje bar niina itaŋ rak nyaan ci abon o kibil zɛɛ anyaa ni vurta.”
Nicini zin gi o atɛɛt ɔl biyɛ agɔɔn Yesu ɔɔwa kuture o kazi Kana looce o kazi Galili nɛɛn, ma ayelzai waanice titinyɔni oninɛ. Makacin utuweec nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ.
Mazi akɔ adicai tiŋkawiin nici, ɔtɔɔzɔ Yesu ki yaatin kibeen gɔtɔnɔgi been nuyak ogin ɔɔtɔ kuture o kazi Kapernam, ma avɔ amɔn ŋinaante iinya ci miliny.
Mazi ka kiiya iiteni o ɔl o Juz gɔɔn aadanɛ niigi iiten baal vardaŋinto e, itiŋa Yesu ook Jerusalɛma.
Mazi akɔ arum niini kaluwa o ceez o Joowo, amada bar ɔl ci ataalinɛ tiin kibeen ɛɛza ki yɛɛla ŋinaante. Maje buk ɔl o abali guruc aavtiz loota ŋinaante tarabɛzɛtɛ.

Mazi acin niini nɔɔgɔ agɔɔn kaal nicoko, ook utuguwa nyabok ceen loro, ma aku aruwa ɔl ki tiin ki ɛɛza, ma atɔɔwak nɔɔgɔ dook bitaalin. Ma uup tarabɛzɛt kazaantɛ guruca ci ɔl o abali guruc e dook lai.
Ma agerenyek niini ɔl o ataalinɛ yɛɛla anek nɛ, “Udunti yɛɛla nicoko bitaala. Má anyeku ceez ci baaba o kizi ŋinti taalinto.”
Aada ni nuyawa oginɛ zɔɔz o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Ma reezinɛt o ceez unun avaadan aneet ziniz kiyo goo o.”
Abadaak ni alaata o ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ, ma avu ajin anek nɛ, “Gitaz ci ateedet biye agooneket ka kagayin naaga ineet anyei alaazɛt ci agɔɔnɛ gi ci abil nɔkɔ o.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Oyoyit ceez ci Joowo noko. Ŋaan bodo keenyeti iinyaye ceen iiyu.”
Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Eenyeti iinyaye ceen iiyu ku? Ceez baal adica irkitok eet ram ki tiin tɔrkɔnɔm eenycinta e.”
Zin waanice ceez ci Joowo aduwa Yesu o bar akati ɛlɛ onin maany.
Mazi akɔ iŋaaz Yesu daayiza e, aada nuyawa oginɛ uduwa baale niini gi nico. Utuweec ni niigi waragɛ o Joowo akati nɔɔnɔ kibeen zɔɔz o aduwa Yesu.
Ma ŋaabaal aavɛ Yesu Jerusalɛma iitene o vardaŋinto e, utuweec nɔɔnɔ ɔl ci meelik gɛr kaale o atɛɛt ɔl biye baal icinit niigi agɔɔn niini e.
Maje bar Yesu alaŋ arek nɔɔgɔ ziniz juruŋ, eeci aga niini ɔl dook nɔkɔ.
Ma alaŋ arɔɔŋ niini eet ci aku aduwak nɔɔnɔ zɔɔz ci akati eet oma, eeci niini alya aga kaal o ɛɛl zinzeetine ugeec nɔkɔ.
Anyak baale eet ceen Pariciwen ci kazi zaar nɛ Nikodimos. Niini alaan ci Juz.

Ma baaline oman iiya ook ŋaati Yesu, ma akɔ anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, kagayin naaga ineet nɔkɔ een niina alaan ci demziinto itoonnyai Joowa. Eeci akɔm eet ci agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye kiyo ci agoon niina noko, dooke coma aavi Jooi ŋaatin.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, akɔm eet ci acin baliin o Joowo, dooke coma aritai bodo niini kizi colak.”
Ma ajin Nikodimos nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ka kitiryai ɛɛti ci idikir kizi colak bodo ku? Ka kimiirozek yaatin kɛŋ, ma bodo aritai?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, mã alaŋ aritai ɛɛti maami kibeen Vɔŋize o Joowo, alaŋ baliin o Joowo ajowa been nɛɛn.
Mã ɛɛti ci aritai alye ci eet o deer, anyak niini ɛlɛ ci eet o deer. Maje ɛɛti ci aritai Vɔŋize o Joowo anyak niini Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
Má anyi zin bar kibiirin ɔɔ giye ci kanekin nɛ, Abon aritanu niiga dook iziti colaye bodo o.
Gɔɔn ŋɔɔti akɔla, ma iim olla libir ci tɛ arɔɔŋ niini. Ŋɛdɛt zin kazii molok ci olla ivaani o. Bar alaŋ kaga aku libire jaŋ, ma aku akɔ ki inin. Abil zin buk ɛɛti ci aritai Vɔŋize o Joowo o nɔkɔ.”
Ma ajin Nikodimos Yesu anek nɛ, “Ka dim kibil gi nici nɔkɔ o ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Een niina alaan ci demziinto ole o Israyil. Alaŋ zin gi nico aga ku?
Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, naaga kaduwana kaal o kagaya, ma koobja kaal o kicinta. Maje bar niiga alaŋ arooŋnyu agamta zɔɔz onayaŋ.
Mayo ma kaduwakuŋ kaal ci loocu, ma alaŋ agamanu o, ma tedec ma kuduwakuŋ kaal ci tammu tadenu ka agamta ku?
Akɔm zin laadun eet ci ook tamma, bar Ŋɛɛrti Eeto o aavi tamma nɛɛn o iiya tamma.
Zin kiyo baale adɔŋ Mosis kowat ween ziit kɛɛta balala e, adoŋnyi buk tiŋeere Ŋɛɛrti Eeto nɔkɔ.
Ka ɛɛti ci atu nɔɔnɔ calaŋ adaai, bar ka kojowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
Ma giye o arɛɛzi Jooi looc ɔrɔɔt, anyek ŋɛɛrin o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ, ka ɛɛti ci atu nɔɔnɔ calaŋ adaai, bar ka niini kojowa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
Ma Jooi alaŋ itoonak ŋɛɛrin looc ka kiiya kapayek looc gerzitin, bar ka korogoz looc.
Ma zin ɛɛti ci atu ŋɛɛrti Joowo alaŋ bodo nɔɔnɔ apawonek gerzitin, maje eet calaŋ atu nɔɔnɔ apawozek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin odota, eeci alaŋ niini atu ŋɛɛrti Joowo o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
Apayek zin Jooi looc gerzitin o, eeci iiyak vooritin looc, maje bar ɔl arɛɛz muur kujuk vooritin, eeci agɔɔn niigi kaal ci gɛr.
Ma ɔl o gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o gɛr abor niigi vooritin, ma alaŋ avunak vooritin been nɛɛn, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kaal ugeec gɛr agɔɔn keyelizyai.
Maje ɛɛti ci agɔɔn kaal o arɔɔŋ Jooi dook akunak niini vooritin ka kayelizyai kaala o abon agɔɔn niini, eeci agɔɔn niini kaal o arɔɔŋ Jooi.”
Ma vurta itiŋgaza Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin, ɔɔtɔ looce o kazi Judiya. Ma avɔ amɔn ŋinaante, ma oony ɔl.
Maje buk waanice Jɔn oony ɔl ŋaao kazi Anon o ajɔŋzɔ ki ŋin o kazi Salim, eeci mɛɛlɛ maama ŋinaante. Ma avunak ɔl nɔɔnɔ tup nɔkɔ ŋinaante, ma oony niini nɔɔgɔ.
Ma kaala nici agooni iŋaan Jɔn kacabɛ e.
Ma iitene oman adaŋtɔ nuyawa o Jɔn ogɛnɛ kibeen eet ceen Juz giye ci akati kɛɛranɛ ugeec gɔɔn oonyi eleeti ka kobontai Joowa.
Makacin ivitak niigi Jɔn, ma avu anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, eet baal arumonu liile o Jordan baagita baal azi nɛ, Niini Kiristo e, inoko oony ɔl, ma avunak ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ. Yo zin gi nici abon?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Jɔn nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm laadun eet ci anyak dɔyiz mã alaŋ anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
Ma zin niiga alya iziiktu zɔɔz baal kuduwakuŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Alaŋ keen naana Kiristo, bar olla kitoonnyai nɔɔnɔ ɔɔwa e.
Iziiktɔ di! Gɔɔn laadun nyatarani akati eet o aviica nɔɔnɔ. Maje laŋoti eet o aviica nyataran atalnɛ niini ŋaati aziiŋni eet o aroce molok. Inoko zin naana katalɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Abon zin adiŋdiŋ Yesu ɔrɔɔt, maje naana keen cɛlbɛz.
Ma ɛɛti o aku tamma adikir niini kujuk ɔl dook. Ma ɛɛti o loocu niini eet ci loocu, ma azɔɔz niini kaal o loocu doon. Maje bar ɛɛti o aku tamma adikir niini ole dook.
Eeci aduwa niini kaal o icinun kibeen kaal o iziiwun tamma, ma bar akɔm eet ci agama zɔɔz cin o.
Maje zin ɛɛti ci agama zɔɔz cin o niini bacoi ci ayelza gi o Jooi alaŋ ɛɛnɛ voloŋnyoi.
Ma ɛɛti o itoona Jooi nɔɔnɔ anyaa niini zɔɔz o Joowo, eeci abitiz Jooi nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋize onin.
Arɛɛz Jooi ŋɛɛrin, ma anyek kaal dook nɔɔnɔ kanyak niini aziite onin.
Ma ɛɛti ci atu ŋɛɛrin ajowa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Maje bar ɛɛti calaŋ ŋɛɛrin agama, alaŋ rogɛt acin, bar bornɛt nɔŋ o Joowo aavi ŋaatin.”
Iziiyit ni ɔl o Parici awaŋ ci azi nɛ, Oony Yesu nuyak ci meel kujuk Jɔn.
Mazin bar giye ween didi Yesu alye onin akɔm eet ci oony, bar oony ɔl nuyawa oginɛ.
Mazi akɔ azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, otoŋ Judiya, ma abadaak Galili.
Ma gɔla iiya idiir niini looc o kazi Samariya.
Ma ŋinaante ook niini kuture o kazi Sikar o ajɔŋzɔ ki mana baal anyek Jakob ŋɛɛrin o kazi Josev e.
Maje ṯuuwi o Jakob aavi ŋinaante. Aavu ni Yesu loota ŋinaante uyubuz ṯuuk otoga, eeci apirna niini ki weet. Maje ii ibilun boloca.
Maje nuyawa oginɛ araktɛ ɔɔtɔ kuture nico ka kɔɔt kataalta dayiin.
Iiya ni ŋaa ceen Samariyen arɔɔŋ kiiya kɔtɔgɔc maam. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Nyan da maam ci kawudi.”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nici Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma niina alaŋ een eet ci Juz? Ma naana alaŋ keen ŋaa ci Samariya? Ajinan zin maam ku?” (Azi ŋaa nici nɔkɔ o, eeci gɔɔn laadun ɔl o Juz alaŋ azɔlɔn diicit ci maamu kibeen ɔl ci Samariya.)
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã aga niina gi o gɔɔn anyek Jooi ɔl, ma agayaŋ buk niina aneet ci kajinin maam o keen ŋɛnɛɛn, abon waan ajinan ka kanyin ineet maam ci rogeto.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mazin yo ma alaŋ anyei abala ci ka tɔgɔcai maam, ma wun ṯuuwi o, ka zin jai maam ci rogeto o ŋaaḏaŋ?
Anyet baale ageeta ṯuuk nico jijitinaaŋ Jakob. Awot baale ṯuuk nico niini alya ki dɔl ogin ki tiin ogin. Ma zin yo niina adiŋdiŋ juk Jakob?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci awot maam nicoko aruk nɔɔnɔ kɔr bodo.
Maje ɛɛti ci awot maam o kanyi naana nɔɔnɔ, alaŋ aruk kɔr bodo been nɛɛn. Eeci maama ci kanyi naana nɔɔnɔ o ɛɛl alye cin o kizi zawanec ci anyek nɔɔnɔ rogɛt ci abil been nɛɛn.”
Enek ni ŋaa nici nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaan, nyan da maam nicoko ka calaŋ bodo arukan kɔr ka buk calaŋ bodo kabada kiiya kɔtɔgɔc maam ŋina.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ towa eet unun ivita ŋina.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔmnan eet.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Didi zin aleema zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Akɔmnin eet o.
Eeci arii baale lak tur, ma zin ɛɛti ci aavtiyu ki ineet inoko o alaŋ een eet cun. Aduwa zin didi niina zɔɔz ci aleem.”
Ma anek ŋaa Yesu nɛ, “Alaan, kacinin ineet een inoko nyakaŋan.
Baale jijitigaacak adiŋdiŋan Jook biye nico, maje bar niiga Juza aniyu nɛ, Abon een Jerusalɛm ŋinti ka kidiŋdiŋanti Jook nɛɛn.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ziiyan di aneet! Aku tiŋeere iiteni calaŋ bodo adiŋdiŋani ɔl baaba biye nico karabɔŋ een Jerusalɛma doon.
Adiŋdiŋanu niiga ɔl ci Samariya o gi calaŋ agayu, maje naaga kadiŋdiŋana gi ci kagaya, eeci rogzɛn aku ŋaaten Juz.

Aku zin tiŋeere iiteni, bar zin buk iiteni nica iiya laadun, ka zin ɔl o adiŋdiŋan Jook didi kidiŋdiŋanit nɔɔnɔ ween baaba vɔŋize onin kibeen zooze ween didi. Eeci arɔɔŋ Jooi ɔl kidiŋdiŋanit nɔɔnɔ gole nico.
Jooi niini vɔŋiz, ma ɔl o adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ abon adiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ vɔŋiza kibeen zooze ween didi.”
Ma anek ŋaa nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kaga ŋɛdɛt tiŋeere aku Masaya ween Kiristo. Zin tiŋeere mã iiya niini, ŋaan aku aduwaket kaal dook.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aneeta Kiristo ɛlɛ nɛɛn ci kazɔɔzɔ ki ineet noko.”

Mazi ŋaan azɔɔzɔ Yesu ki ŋaa nɔkɔ, abada nuyawa oginɛ. Mazi acin niigi Yesu azɔɔzɔ ki ŋaa nico, ibiirit nɔɔgɔ ooti giye nico ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Bar akɔm ŋaatineeŋ ci anek ŋaa nɛ, “Arooŋ ŋaatin naa?” Karabɔŋ ajin Yesu anek nɛ, “Azoozonu ki ŋaa nico naa?”
Otoŋek ni ŋaa iju onin maamu e looc, ma amiironek kɔrɔk, ma akɔ anek ɔl dook kuture uneeŋ ŋinaante nɛ,
“Ivita di icinit eet ci aduwakan kaal ogan baal kagoon e dook ce. Bar bɔŋ niini Kiristo nɛɛn?”
Udunta ni niigi korogjowɛ ivita ɔɔt icinit Yesu.
Maje nuyawa anek Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ija, dawɔ.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyei naana dayiin cigan calaŋ niiga agayu.”
Ma ajinɔ nuyawa niigi maany anɔ nɛ, “Anyak tɛ eet ci anyawun nɔɔnɔ dayiin?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Dayiin cigan nɛɛn ci kagɔɔnɛ gi o arɔɔŋ ɛɛti o itoonanan aneet ka kidica liŋliŋɔn onin.
Gɔɔn niiga anonu nɛ, Adica labina nyɛlɔwɛ wec kani kɛtɛɛdjai. Bar zin naana kanekuŋ nɛ, Icinit di manɛɛn. Inoko ibiiritɔ labina ka kɛtɛɛdjai.
Mazin gɔɔn eet ci ateedi aruwonek nɔɔnɔ vɔyita ci liŋliŋɔn onin ka kanyaak niini ɔl rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ma atalnɛ ɛɛti o eevyi kibeen eet o ateedi buk.
Alɛɛm zin olit o azi nɛ, Gɔɔn ɛɛti codoi aḏowɛ, maje ɛɛti oman ateedi.
Kitoonuŋ zin naana igeet ka ɔɔtɔ eteedit manɛɛn calaŋ aḏowanu niiga. Ipirta baale ɔl ogɛn liŋliŋonte nico. Ɔɔtɔ zin niiga ka ɔɔt eteedit manɛɛn ci baal ɛɛva niigi o.”
Utuweec ni ɔl ci meelik ole o Samariya kuture nice Yesu, eeci anek ŋaa nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aduwakan ɛɛti nici kaal ogan baal kagoon e dook.”
Mazi avu arum ɔl ci Samariya noko Yesu, ilaltek niigi nɔɔnɔ kɔmɔn rak ŋaatineeŋ. Ɔmɔn ni Yesu ŋinaante iinya ram.
Mazi adɛmɛz Yesu nɔɔgɔ, utuweec ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ demziinte onin.
Ma anek niigi ŋaa nɛ, “Alaŋ katuwena naaga giye o kaziikna ŋaatun doon, bar katuwena o, eeci kiziikta naaga alya nɔɔnɔ, ma kagawuta buk naaga alya didi niini Kiristo ween ruguzoi o loocu nɛɛn.”
Mazi adica Yesu iinya ram ŋinaante, itiŋa ook Galiliya.
Eeci azi niini nɛ, “Akɔm laadun nyakaŋan ci adiŋdiŋan ɔl looce onin ɛlɛ.”

Mazi akɔ arum Galili, atalta ɔl nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante, eeci icinit niigi kaal baal agɔɔn niini e dook iitene baal alotɛn ɔl Jerusalɛma aadanɛ iiten baal vardaŋinto e, eeci buk waanice niigi aavtiz lotente nice tɔ.
Bodo enice imiirozek Yesu kutur o kazi Kana looce o kazi Galili ŋaabaal ookci niini maam kizi nyaan e. Maje ŋinaante anyak alaan ci amɔɔr ŋɛɛrin ŋaao kazi Kapernam.
Mazi akɔ azii alaani nici Yesu, itiŋawa Judiya, iiyak Galili. Iiyak niini nɔɔnɔ, ma ilalek nɔɔnɔ kook Kapernama ka kook korogoz ŋɛɛrin o arɔɔŋ kadaak ŋinaante.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Niiga mã ŋaan ikivtek kaal ci ateeduŋ biye, alaŋ atuwenu.”
Ma ilalek alaani nici nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan, ija kiyiiyit taman iŋaan kadaak ŋɛɛran.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ labak! Alaŋ ŋɛɛrun adaai.” Utu ni alaani zɔɔz ci aduwak Yesu nɔkɔ o, ma awɔ.
Ma gɔla iiya urumtɔ kibeen gabara ci aliŋliŋ ŋaatin, ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Urugun ŋɛɛrun.”
Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ ka kuduktak nɔɔnɔ ziit ci da mayini dole o. Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Abada nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ baritɔni balawaz ziite o adoi waaz.”
Ma aada baati doleco nici ziit baal anɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ, labak, alaŋ ŋɛɛrun adaai e nɛɛn.” Utuyɔ ni niini kibeen ɔl o kɔrɔk onin dook.
Mazin enico izi lak ram ci agɔɔni Yesu kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye eo abadaan niini Judiya akunakɛ Galili e.
Ma iitene oman anyak ɔl o Juz micit cineeŋ alotɛn Jerusalɛma. Ook ni buk Yesu ŋinaante.
Maje Jerusalɛma ŋinaante anyak lamurḏen ci ajɔŋɔz araan o azawu. Kazi lamurḏen nico zooze o ɔl o Juz nɛ Bazaaz. Anyak lamurḏenti nici ceezi ceen riinya tur.
Maje riinyaye nicoko oogin ɔl ci meelik gɛr ole o rubenik ki ole ci ŋɔɔlik been ole ci rɛbrɛbik.
Eeci waanice gɔɔn toonnyaiti ci Joowo iinyaye ogɛn aku, ma iinak lamurḏen nico, ma amɔɔni maam. Mazi adɔkɔny ɛɛti, ma iinak maam ɔl ɔɔwa iŋaan amɔɔt maama, arogzɛ niini moorizowe ogin dook.
Ma ole nicoko anyak eet ci amɔɔr irkitok eetoma kamɔtɔ ki tiin turge.
Mazi akɔ acin Yesu nɔɔnɔ ɔɔŋ loota nɔkɔ, agawun niini nɔɔnɔ anyak mɔɔriz ŋinti wun ɔrɔɔt. Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋ rogɔ mɔɔrize cun noko?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti ci amɔɔr noko nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan, akɔm eet ci ka kooyan lamurḏenta ŋaati gɔɔn tɛ amɔɔni maama. Gɔɔn maŋaan kawɔ gɔla, arawun bar tɛ ɛɛti oman lamurḏen.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tiŋa je. Doma kuwen cun o, tɔ.”
Kataman nɔkɔ urugun ɛɛti nici, ma adoma kuwen onin, ma awɔ.
Maje waanice iiteni nica iiten o yubzento.
Ma anek ɔl o Juz eet ci ona arogzɛ o nɛ, “Nicini iiten o yubzento. Alaŋ zin aganɔ lotinowe ogaac ŋaati ilolɛ kuwen cun o noko.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɛɛti nici nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anekan ɛɛti ci uyen aruguzan o nɛ, Doma kuwen cun o, tɔ.”
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Eet jaŋ ci anekin nɛ, Doma kuwen cun o, tɔ, o?”
Maje ɛɛti nici alya ŋaan kaga ŋɛnɛɛn ci arogoz nɔɔnɔ o, eeci Yesu ɔɔtɔ ŋaao aavtiyɛ kɔlɛ e.
Ma ŋintimiliny ook ojowa Yesu nɔɔnɔ kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ma anek niini nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko urugu mɔɔriza. Tɛɛdɔi zin baciinok ka calaŋ bodo akunakin gi ci gɛrzɛ ɔrɔɔt kujuk nice.”
Ook ni ɛɛti nici uduwak alaat o Juz gi ci anek nɛ, “Bar tɛ ci arogozan o Yesu gi.”
Gi zin baal laadun amarnin alaata o Juz Yesu, ma arɔɔŋ kurukti niigi nɔɔnɔ kadaak e nɛɛn, eeci aliŋliŋ niini iitene o yubzento.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma baaba gɔɔn laadun aliŋliŋ niini iinya dook nɔkɔ. Abon zin buk naana kaliŋliŋ kiyo niini o.”

Bar enico otobortek alaata o Juz Yesu nɔŋ ɔrɔɔt, ma arɔɔŋ gɔl ci ka kurukti niigi nɔɔnɔ kadaak. Alaŋ een giye ci baal aliŋliŋi iitene ceen Sabit o doon, bar eeci azi Yesu nɛ, Jooi baatin gi, ma atobzek buk niini ɛlɛ Jook.
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔm ŋɛɛrti Joowo gi ci agɔɔn oowe cin doon, bar agɔɔn niini kaal o acin agɔɔn baatinɛ. Mazin kaal o agɔɔn baatinɛ nɛɛn o agɔɔn buk ŋɛɛrin.
Eeci Jooi arɛɛz ŋɛɛrin, ma ayelek nɔɔnɔ kaal o gɔɔn agɔɔn niini dook. Bar zin bodo buk tiŋeere ayelek niini nɔɔnɔ kutugu kaal ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt kujuk nicoko, ka kibiirtuŋ igeet dook ooti.
Kiyo gɔɔn iŋaani Jooi ɔl daayiza, ma anyek bodo nɔɔgɔ korogit o, buk tiŋeere ŋɛɛrin agɔɔn nɔkɔ. Anyek rogɛt eet ci olla tɛ arɔɔŋ niini kanyek.
Akɔm baatinɛ eet ci ka kapak, bar anyewun ŋɛɛrin dɔyiz ci ka kapayi ɔl dook niini.
Ka zin ɔl dook kidiŋdiŋanit ŋɛɛrin kiyo adiŋdiŋan niigi baatin o. Ma ɛɛti calaŋ adiŋdiŋan ŋɛɛrin, alaŋ buk adiŋdiŋan niini baatin o itoona nɔɔnɔ.

Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci azii zɔɔz o kaduwa, ma atu Jook o itoonanan aneet, anyak niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ma alaŋ tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ apawonek gerzitin, bar atayaŋun niini daayiz laadun ook rogɛta.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, aku iima iiteni, bar zin buk iiteni nica iiya laadun. Ma iitene nice azii ɔl o adaayitɔ molok o ŋɛɛrti Joowo, ma ɔl o azii nɔɔnɔ dook arogi.
Zin kiyo Jooi alye onin een gɔl ci rogeto o anyek buk niini ŋɛɛrin kizi gɔl ci rogeto.
Anyewun zin niini nɔɔnɔ alaazɛt ci ka kapai ɔl giye o ɛɛnɛ niini Ŋɛɛrti Eeto.
Anyak tiŋeere iiten ci aku ci aziikni ɔl o adaayitɔ dook looknyai molok onin. Má anyeku zin kibiirtuŋ ooti giye nico.
Mazin iitene nice aduŋna ɔl o da gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o abon looknyai, ma arogi rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Maje ɔl o da gɔɔn agɔɔn kaal o gɛr apawonek nɔɔgɔ gerzitin.

Akɔm zin gi ci kagoon naana oowe can doon, bar kapai naana kaal eo aduwakan Jooi aneet. Ma payiin cane o abil tɔp, eeci alaŋ kataman kutugu gi ci karooŋ naana, bar kagoon eo arɔɔŋi baaba o itoonanan aneet.
Matɛ waan kizi bacoi ci kazɔɔzɛ ɛlɛ cano maany, alaŋ waan kaleem, ma kaala ci kaduwa o alaŋ waan aganɔ ŋaati agamnyan.
Bar zin anyak eet oma ceen bacoi can. Ma kaga naana zɔɔz o aduwa niini ŋaaten aneet zɔɔz ceen didi.
Itoonteyu baale niiga ɔl Jɔn, ma aduwa waanice niini zɔɔz ween didi.
Alaŋ zin karooŋ naana bacokzɛt ci eet ci deer, bar olla kaduwakuŋ zɔɔz nico o ka coma arognu.
Baale Jɔn abil niini kiyo tokolɛci o gɔɔn ataran looc o, ma waanice ataltowu niiga vooritine onin ŋinbaal miliny e.
Bar zin naana alya kanyei bacoi ci adikir kujuk Jɔn. Ma kaala ci kagoon naana o kaal ci anyan baaba aneet ka kutugu. Mazin kaala nicigi bacok cigan gi, ma ayelzakuŋ igeet gi o itoonanan baaba aneet.
Ma baaba o itoonanan aneet niini alya bacoi can. Ŋaan niiga iziiyit molok onin, karabɔŋ acinu ŋum onin.
Azee zin zɔɔz oninɛ zinzeetine ugooc tɔ, eeci alaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet o itoonan niini.
Ɔɔtɔ zin di ekeebit waragɛnya o Joowo, eeci gɔɔn abaabanu niiga aniyu nɛ, Ajowanu rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn ŋaatineeŋ. Ma waragɛnya nicigi alya azɔɔz zɔɔz ci akanan aneet.
Maje bar niiga alaŋ arooŋnyu ivitayaŋ aneet ka ojokta rogɛt.
Alaŋ naana karooŋ titinyɔn ɔla.
Ma buk kagayuŋ naana igeet alaŋ areezu Jook zinzeetine ugooc.
Naana kakun alaazete o baaba, ma ŋaan agamtawaŋ. Bar mã anyak eet oma ci aku alaazete cin doon, agamanu niiga nɔɔnɔ.
Ka zin yo utuyɔ ku, mã areezu niiga ŋaati anaatonu eleetine ugooc maany, maje bar naatinɛt o aku Joowe o adoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ alaŋ arooŋnyu o?
Má abaabanu kizik bar tiŋeere kakɔ kakɔlakuŋ naana igeet rooni ŋaati baaba. Bar zin akɔ akɔlakuŋ tiŋeere igeet rooni Mosis o atuyu niiga nɔɔnɔ zinzeeti ugooc.
Mã da didi utuweec zɔɔz o Mosis, utuyaŋ waan buk aneet, eeci Mosis eteyeedun zɔɔz o akanan aneet.
Mazi yo ma ŋaan agamta zoozok o ayɛɛt niini o, ka zin agamta zoozok ci kaduwakuŋ naana o ku?”
Ma vurte nice abaayiz Yesu liil o Galili ook baagita. (Kazi liil nico zaar nɛ Tiberas.)
Ma ano kɔlɛ ci appe nɔɔnɔ, eeci icinit niigi kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye baal agɔɔn niini arogzi ɔl o amɔɔr e.
Otoodit ni Yesu been nuyak ogin bɛ taden, ma avɔ aavtiz loota ŋinaante.
Maje iiteni o gɔɔn anyayi ɔl o Juz lotɛn uneeŋ vardaŋinto izi ajɔn.
Mazi adɔŋ Yesu ɔɔ, acin kɔlɛ ci meel avunak nɔɔnɔ. Ijinun ni Pilip enek nɛ, “Kayo kataalta dayiin ci alɛɛnɔ ki ɔl nicoko dook ŋaa?”
(Aduwa niini gi nico o arɔɔŋ kicina Pilip. Maje niini laadun aga gi ci ka kutugu nɔkɔ.)
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pilip nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Arɔɔŋ guruc ceen kaboot ram ka nuun kojowa ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ dayiin ci miliny.”
Ma anek Andoru ween nuyai onin een gɔtɔni Saiman Pitɔr nɛ,
“Anyak logo ci anyak ḏɔkɛn ceen tur kibeen kuluk ci miliny een ram ŋaato. Ka zin yo dayiin ci miliny tɛr noko kutuguwek ɔl ci meelik noko naa?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anycek ɔl kaavtiyɔ loota.” Maje ŋinita ŋinti aliz anyak artɛ ci colai. Aavtiyɔ ni ɔl loota. Maje ɔl nici dook een eet amɔtɔ lak tur lɛlɛn tur (5000).
Odoma ni Yesu ḏɔkɛn, ma anyek Jook zany, ma anyek nuyak ogin ka keŋeryek ɔl. Ma adoma bodo kuluk, ma anyek ɔl ewe. Ma adake ɔl dook zɛɛ ma anyɛr.
Mazi ook ipiiyantɛ ɔl dook, enek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Uluta dayiin ci anyigjai o kɔkɔm ci ooŋneku looc.”
Ma alota niigi ŋodota ci anyigjai o zɛɛ makacin ibitizit gilanya amɔtɔ ram ŋodotaye ci anyigjai ḏokene ween tur adak ɔl e.
Mazi avɔ acin ɔl gi ci abiirni nɔɔgɔ ooti agɔɔn Yesu noko, izitɔ nɛ, “Izi didi tɛ nicini nyakaŋan baal ka kiiyak looc e nɛɛn.”
Mazi akɔ aga Yesu arɔɔŋ niigi kagamit nɔɔnɔ ka kanycek kizi alaan dɔyiza, itiŋa ook biyɛnɛ niini doon.
Ma yomana ɔɔt nuyawa oginɛ liila.
Ma avɔ atɔɔt kavool, ma abaayiz liil ka kɔɔtɔ Kapernama. Mazi ŋaan awɔ liil kɛŋa nɔkɔ, izi lɔɔci baalin. Maje Yesu ŋaan kurum nɔɔgɔ.
Maje ŋɔɔti ci appe ivaan, ma ayɛlyɛlan maam ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Mazi ŋaan awɔ niigi liil kɛŋa nɔkɔ, icinit niigi Yesu awoya maam tadena iima nɔɔgɔ. Anyayit ni niigi ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má aŋolinu looc! Aneeta gi.”
Ma atalnɛ niigi, ma atoodek nɔɔnɔ kavool. Ŋintimiliny nɔkɔ urum kavooli dɔwɔn ci ŋin ona avunak niigi laadun e.
Ma ŋeeretine co icinit kɔlɛ baal ooŋnonek looc liil baagita e ɔɔtɔ kavooli baal abil ŋinaante e. Maje niigi aga ŋaan Yesu korkorit been nuyak ogin kavoole nice, bar aga otoŋtek niigi nɔɔnɔ looc.
Maje bodo kavoolɛta ogɛnɛ avu looce o kazi Tiberas zɛɛ ma avu ajɔŋɔz liiltok ŋinbaal adayi ɔl ḏɔkɛn baal anyek nɔɔgɔ Yesu ŋaabaal anyekɛ rak niini Jook zany e.
Mazi avɔ acin ɔl Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin azeetɔ ŋinaante, otoodit niigi kavoolɛt nicoko ɔɔt Kapernama ka kɔɔt korooŋit Yesu.
Mazi avɔ ajowa niigi Yesu liil baagita, enektek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, akunai ŋinito waŋa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, alaŋ niiga arooŋnyaŋ aneet giye ci agayu kaal baal kagoon atɛɛt ɔl biye e, bar arooŋnyaŋ o giye ci ḏɔkɛn baal adaku zɛɛ ma anyernu e.

Má aliŋliŋnyu zin dayiin o gɔɔn ame, bar iliŋliŋit dayiin o ɛɛl kodot ween rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Nici zin dayiin o ka tiŋeere kanyuŋ Ŋɛɛrti Eeto igeet nɛɛn, eeci agama Jooi ween baatinai liŋliŋɔn onin.”
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo zin kutuguza gitaz ci arooŋnyet Jooi ageeta kutuguza o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Liŋliŋɔn o Joowo arɔɔŋ ŋaatunooŋ nɛɛn ci atuyu eet o itoona niini nɔɔnɔ.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko gitaz ci agoon atɛɛt ɔl biye kacina ka kanyet kutuyin ineet o?
Baale adak jijitigaacak dayiin o kazi mana balala kiyo aduwa waragɛwi o Joowo azi nɛ, Anyek baale niini nɔɔgɔ ḏɔkɛn ci tammu tadenu kadayit.”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ḏokoc baal adaku aku tamma e, alaŋ een Mosis nɛɛn o anyuŋ igeet, bar baaba nɛɛn o anyuŋ igeet. Inoko zin bar anyuŋ niini igeet ḏokoc ween didi o aku tammu tadena.
Eeci ḏokoc o anyuŋ Jooi nɛɛn o akunak looc tammu tadena ka kanyek looc rogɛt.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan, nyet zin da gɔɔn ḏokoc nico tup nɔkɔ.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aneeta nɛɛn o keen ḏokoc o rogeto. Ma ɛɛti ci akunakan aneet alaŋ bodo nɔɔnɔ adak magiz. Ma ɛɛti ci atuyan aneet alaŋ bodo nɔɔnɔ aruk kɔr been nɛɛn.
Zin kiyo uyene kaduwakuŋ igeet ka icintaŋ aneet e, bar ŋaan utuyaŋ nɔkɔ.
Mazin ɛɛti o anyan baaba aneet ŋaan akunakan. Ma eet ci akunakan aneet alaŋ naana katooi.
Eeci kakun naana tammu tadena looc o ka kiiya kutugu gi o arɔɔŋ ɛɛti o itoonanan aneet, alaŋ ka kiiya kutugu gi ci ɔɔ can doon.
Gi zin o arɔɔŋ baaba o itoonanan aneet nɛɛn ce. Arooŋnyan niini aneet calaŋ kakuluz eet codoi ole o anyan niini aneet. Bar abon kaŋaanɛ naana nɔɔgɔ daayiza iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.
Arɔɔŋ ɛɛti o itoonanan aneet ɔl dook o acin ŋɛɛrin, ma atu nɔɔnɔ, kojokta rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ŋaan zin kaŋaanɛ naana nɔɔgɔ iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.”
Enico otoŋomit ɔl o Juz Yesu, eeci azi nɛ, Niini ḏokoc ci akunak looc tammu tadena.
Ma anɔ nɛ, “Ma dim nici alaŋ een Yesu ween ŋɛɛrti Josev nɛɛn o kaga naaga dook baatin kibeen yaatin o? Azi zin nɛ, Kakun tammu tadena kakunai looc o, ku?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Otoŋit ŋomtiin cunooŋ o.
Akɔm eet ci akunakan aneet, dooke coma anyaakan nɔɔnɔ baaba o itoonanan aneet, ka zin kitiŋawi naana nɔɔnɔ iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.
Ayɛɛt baale nyakaŋanɛta zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Adɛmɛz waanma Jooi ɔl dook. Ma ɛɛti ci azii baaba, ma ɛdɛmzɛ niini ŋaatin, akunakan aneet.
Alaŋ zin bar zɔɔz nico akati kɛŋ cinɛ gi ci anyawun eet ci icinun baatinai, bar eet o aku Joowa nɛɛn o icinun nɔɔnɔ.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci atuwe ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
Zin aneeta nɛɛn o keen ḏokoc o rogeto.
Baale jijitugooc adayit dayiin o kazi mana baal iina tammu tadena balala e, ma bar niigi waanice ŋaan adaai labak.
Mazin bar nicini ḏokoc o akunak looc tammu tadena ka kadak ɛɛti ci deer, ma alaŋ bodo adaai.
Keen zin naana ḏokoc o rogeto o akunak looc tammu tadena nɛɛn. Ma ɛɛti ci adak ḏokoc nico, orok niini izi nɛɛn. Ma ḏokoc ci kanyi naana nɔɔnɔ o ɛlɛ onan kanyi looc ka kojoktai ɔl rogɛt nɛɛn.”
Zin zooze nico adaŋtɔ ɔl o Juz niigi maany bornɛt nɔŋa anɔ nɛ, “Ma dim ɛɛti nici ka kanyet ɛlɛ cino kadayit ku?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã alaŋ adaku ɛlɛ ci Ŋɛɛrti Eeto o, ma alaŋ awudu biye ogin, alaŋ ajowanu rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
Ma ɛɛti ci adak ɛlɛ can o, ma awot biye cigan o, ajowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn, ma kaŋaanɛ katin naana nɔɔnɔ korok iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.
Eeci ɛlɛ cane o dayiin ween didi, maje biyeta cigane o kodɛn ween didi.
Ma ɛɛti ci adak ɛlɛ can o, ma awot biye cigan o, aavi niini ŋaatan, ma kaavɛ naana ŋaatin buk.
Zin baaba o itoonanan aneet nɛɛn o anyek rogɛt ɔl dook, ma anyan buk niini rogɛt aneet. Mazin buk gole nico kanyi naana rogɛt ɔl o adak ɛlɛ onan.

Nici zin ḏokoc o akunak looc tammu tadena nɛɛn. Alaŋ atobɔ niini kibeen ḏɔkɛn o kazi mana baal adak jijitugooc, ma bodo adaai labak e. Mazin ɛɛti ci adak ḏokoc nico ojowa niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.”
Ma kaal nicoko aduwa Yesu ŋaati adɛmzi ɔl ceeze o lotento kuture o kazi Kapernam e.
Mazi avɔ azii nuyawa ci meel nuyawe ogin zɔɔz nico, izitɔ nɛ, “Demziin nici adɔi kak, ka zin yo tedec kiziik ŋɛnɛ?”
Agawun ni Yesu zɔɔz ci aŋɔmtɔn niigi noko niini doon. Ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Izi igeet zinzeeti gɛrzɛ giye nico?
Ma tiŋeere ma acinu Ŋɛɛrti Eeto amiironek tammu taden ŋinbaal aavɛ niini laadun e ka kibil ku?
Anyaa zin rogɛt Vɔŋizi o Joowo. Maje dɔyizi ci eet ci deer gi ci labak. Mazin zoozowa ci kaduwakuŋ naana o anyaakuŋ igeet Vɔŋiz kibeen rogɛt.
Bar zin ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatunooŋ alaŋ atuwe.” (Ma Yesu niini laadun kinatamma e aga ɔl o tiŋeere alaŋ atuwe kibeen eet o ka kiiya kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ.)
Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Gi zin nɛɛn o kanekuŋ nɛ, Akɔm eet ci akunakan aneet, dooke coma akɔlak nɔɔnɔ gɔl ci ka kiiyakan o baaba e.”
Ma giye nico imiirye nuyawa ci meel nuyawe ogin ki vurut alaŋaan arɔɔŋ korkorit ki nɔɔnɔ.
Ma ajin Yesu nuyak ogin een amɔtɔ ram anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyu buk niiga ɔtɔɔz?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, ka koota ŋaati ŋɛnɛ? Rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn anyei niina.
Kutuyin naaga itoonnyai niina Joowa.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ een aneet nɛɛn ci kaŋeranuŋ igeet ci eeginu amɔtɔ ram noko? Bar anyak zin eet codoi ŋaatunooŋ ceen Loryen.”
Aduwa niini gi nico o ariik niini Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Saiman Iskariat baal ka kook kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ e, ma niini waanice nuyai codoi nuyawe o Yesu een amɔtɔ ram.
Ma vurte nice otono Yesu Galili doon. Alaŋaan arɔɔŋ kɛɛrɔn kook Judiya, eeci alaata o Juz arɔɔŋ kuruyit nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante.
Maje iiteni o gɔɔn aadanɛ ɔl o Juz ceezi baal abaai niigi balala e izi ajɔn.
Ma anek gɔtɔnɔgja nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Toŋ ŋinito. Tɔ bitɔ Judiya ka kɔɔt kicinit nuyawa ugune kaal cugun agoon o.
Akɔm eet ci arɔɔt liŋliŋɔn cin mã arɔɔŋ niini ka kagawɛ juruŋ. Zin giye o agɔɔnɛ kaal nicoko abon ayelei ɛlɛ ɔl dook loota ka kagayin niigi ineet.”
Aduwa niigi gi nico o, eeci ma een nuun nɔɔgɔ ɛlɛ ween gɔtɔnɔgi ŋaan buk kutuwit nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ buk.
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan bai iiteni onane kiiya, olla ŋaatunooŋ iinya dook abon labak.
Ma ɔl o loocu alaŋ amarninuŋ igeet, bar amarninan niigi aneet, eeci kabɔrai naana nɔɔgɔ kaal o gɛr gɔɔn agɔɔn niigi.
Ɔɔtɔ niiga lotɛnta labak. Alaŋ naana kakɔ, eeci ŋaan iiteni onane kiiya.”
Aduwa niini gi nico, ma aavi rak Galiliya.
Mazi akɔ avɔ gɔtɔnɔgja lotɛn Jerusalɛma, unuwun bodo buk niini nɔɔgɔ vurta calaŋ ayelzak ɛlɛ ɔl.
Maje alaata o Juz arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ ole ci ona avunak lotɛn o. Ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Eet we inoo?”
Ma aŋɔmtɔ ɔl ogɛn anɔ nɛ, “Niini eet ci abon.” Maje ceegi anɔ nɛ, “Ku? Alaŋ abon, eeci alabek niini ɔl tuu.”
Bar akɔm eet ci azɔɔz nɔɔnɔ kiziiyɛ, eeci aŋole niigi alaat o Juz.
Mazi ŋaan kidicai iinya o lotento nɔkɔ, ook Yesu kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ma akɔ adɛmɛz ɔl.
Mazi akɔ azɔɔz niini, ibiirit alaat o Juz ooti ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti nici aga kaal nicoko dook ku maŋaan kɛdɛmɛzɔ o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma kaala ci kademzekuŋ naana igeet o alaŋ een cigan, bar kaal ci eet o itoonanan aneet.
Ma zin ɛɛti o arɔɔŋ kutugu gi o arɔɔŋ Jooi, ŋaan aga niini mã een kaala ci kademzekuŋ igeet o kaal ci avu Joowa, karabɔŋ bar kazooz naana oowe can doon.
Bar zin gɔɔn ɛɛti ci azɔɔz dɔyize ci ɛlɛ cin doon, arɔɔŋ niini kojowa titinyɔn ci ɛlɛ onin. Maje bar ɛɛti ci arooŋek titinyɔn eet o itoona nɔɔnɔ, azɔɔz niini gi ween didi, ma akɔm gi ci avɔlŋa.
Baale ŋaan kanyuŋ Mosis igeet lotinok o Joowo, ma bar akɔm ŋaatunooŋ eet codoi ci agama. Arooŋnyan zin uruktaŋ aneet kadaak o naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ kɔlɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Anyei niina Loryen alya. Ŋɛnɛɛn ci tɛ arɔɔŋ kuruyin ineet o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Iiten baale anyak gi codoi adikir kagoon, ma abiirnuŋ igeet dook ooti.
Baale uduwayuŋ Mosis igeet zɔɔz o teedinto. Mazin bar buk nica alaŋ een zɔɔz ci Mosis, bar zɔɔz baal jijitugooc, ma waanice gɔɔn ateedu dɔl iitene ween Sabit.
Mazi da gɔɔn ma abon ŋaatunooŋ labak ŋaati ateedinɛ dɔlya iitene ween Sabit ka calaŋ abaci lotinok o Mosis, abornekaŋ zin aneet nɔŋ ŋaati karogzɛ eet iiten ceen Sabit o naa?
Má apaku zin zoozok olla giye ci akat ɛlɛ eci bitaalu, bar apayit zɔɔz gole ci abil tɔp.”
Ma azi ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o Jerusalɛm nɛ, “Ma dim nici alaŋ een eet o arɔɔŋ alaata nɔɔnɔ kuruyit kadaak e nɛɛn?
Icinit di ŋaati azɔɔzi kɔla labak, ma akɔm eet ci aduwak nɔɔnɔ gi ci gɛr. Agaac bɔŋ alaata izi didi niini Kiristo o ka kiiya nɛɛn?
Ku zin yo koca? Ma kaga naaga dook ŋinti akuni ɛɛti nici o? Bar zin tiŋeere ma aku Kiristo, akɔm eet ci aga ŋinti katin akuni niini o.”

Mazi akɔ adɛmɛz Yesu ɔl kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ɛgɛrɛny niini molowe ci appe izi nɛ, “Inoko dim niiga agayaŋ aneet ŋɛnɛɛn? Yo buk inoko ŋinti kakunɛ o agayu? Alaŋ zin naana kakun dɔyize can doon. Itoonanan aneet baaba ween Jook ween didi. Ma alaŋ niiga agayu nɔɔnɔ.
Bar zin naana kaga nɔɔnɔ, eeci kakun naana ŋaatin. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o itoonanan aneet.”
Zin giye nico orooŋit alaata ka kagamit nɔɔnɔ, bar akɔm eet ci anim kuum nɔɔnɔ, eeci ŋaan iiteni oninɛ kiiya.
Maje ɔl ci meel utuweec nɔɔnɔ, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ma dim tiŋeere ma aku Kiristo, agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye kujuk ci agɔɔn ɛɛti nici o?”
Mazi avɔ azii ɔl o Parici kɔlɛ aŋɔmɔt Yesu nɔkɔ, itoonit niigi kibeen alaat o ceez o lotento takirnya kɔɔt kagamit nɔɔnɔ.
Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Ŋaan rak karomɛ ki igeet ŋintimiliny. Zin ŋaan kakɔ ŋaati baaba o itoonanan aneet.
Arooŋnyaŋ waanma niiga aneet, ma bar alaŋ ajowanaŋ, eeci ŋinti tiŋeere kaavɛ naana e alaŋ niiga animnyu ɔɔtɔ.”
Ma anɔ alaata o Juz niigi maany nɛ, “Ŋinḏaŋ ci dim arɔɔŋ niini ka kooyi zɛɛ ma alaŋ kanim naaga kojoktai nɔɔnɔ o? Arɔɔŋ bɔŋ kook loocowe o abaai ɔl ween Garik ka kook kɛdɛmɛz nɔɔgɔ?
Uyene rak azi nɛ, Katin karɔɔŋ naaga nɔɔnɔ, bar alaŋ kajowa. Ma bodo azi nɛ, Ma ŋinti ka kooyi niini o alaŋ kanim naaga kɔɔtɔ. Ma zɔɔz nici akati kɛŋ cinɛ gitaz?”
Mazi akɔ een iiten o aṯornɛkɛ lotɛn o adikir, itiŋa Yesu jena, ma azɔɔz molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Mã alam eet ci aruk kɔr, anyek nɔɔnɔ kiiyayan ka kowodɛ.
Kiyo azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Mã anyak eet ci atuyan aneet, zinize cino ariik maama ci rogeto.”
Zin Yesu ŋina azɔɔz zɔɔz o akati Vɔŋiz o ka kanyek Jooi ɔl o atu nɔɔnɔ. Maje waanice Vɔŋizi ŋaan kanyozozek ɔl, eeci Yesu ŋaan buk kitiŋa daayiza ka kanyozozek nɔɔnɔ diŋdiŋɔni.
Mazi avɔ azii ɔl ogɛn zɔɔz o Yesu, izitɔ nɛ, “Didi ri ɛɛti nici nyakaŋan ci Joowo gi.”
Maje ɔl ogɛn anɔ nɛ, “Niini ri Kiristo gi.” Bar bodo ogɛn azi nɛ, “Alaŋ Kiristo ka kiiya Galiliya.
Azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, Aku katin Kiristo dolene ci dɔl o Devid. Aritai zin katin niini kuture o kazi Bɛzilɛm baal abaai Devid e.”
Zin giye nico ɛŋɛrtɔ ɔl kɔrgɛna giye ci akati Yesu.
Ɔl ogɛn arɔɔŋ kagamit nɔɔnɔ, bar akɔm eet ci ataadek nɔɔnɔ aziit kagam.
Mazi avɔ amiiri takirnya, ɔɔt ijinit alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Parici nɔɔgɔ enektek nɛ, “Alaŋaan anyaanu naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan baal rɛɛn akɔm eet ci azɔɔz kiyo ɛɛti nici o.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl o Parici nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alabawuŋ niini igeet buk.
Inoko alam eet codoi ŋaatinaaŋ karabɔŋ een alaate o Juz ci atu nɔɔnɔ tɔ?
Ma ɔl ci azii zɔɔz cin o alaŋ aga niigi lotinok o Mosis. Inoko zin niigi anyak toriin o Joowo.”
Ma anek ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci kazi Nikodimos baal rak akɔ ŋaati Yesu e nɔɔgɔ nɛ,
“Gɔɔn lotinowa ogaac alaŋ anyet kapaktek eet gerzitin maŋaan kiziiyit gi ci aduwa niini otoge onin ɛlɛ.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Awaaŋ! Een buk niina eet ci Galili? Kɛɛp zin di waragɛ o Joowo ka ga akɔm laadun nyakaŋan ci ka kiiya Galiliya.”
Enico azaantozek ɔl dook korogjok ugeecik.
Ook ni Yesu biye o kazi Kiŋiroc.
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna abadaak kaluwa o ceez o Joowo. Ma avunak kɔlɛ ci meel nɔɔnɔ, ma aavi niini loota, ma adɛmɛz nɔɔgɔ.
Ma anyaak alaata o adɛmɛz ɔl lotinok kibeen ɔl o Parici ŋaa ci agamnyi zoocmaza. Ma avu anyek niigi ŋaa nico kibil nɔɔgɔ dook ŋuma.
Ma anek Yesu nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, nicini ŋaa ci agamnyi zoocmaza.
Ma zin lotinowa o Mosis azi nɛ, Ŋaa ci agamnyi kiyo nici abon avac ɔl nɔɔnɔ biyɛnɛ zɛɛ ma adaai. Mayo zin inoko niina azi giye nico nɛ?”
Aduwa niigi gi nico o, eeci arɔɔŋ kedetit Yesu ka kojokta gɔl ci agami nɔɔnɔ ka kɔkɔltakɛ rooni. Bar Yesu ululi, ma ayɛɛt looc komolita.
Mazi ŋaan ajin niigi Yesu nɔkɔ, adɔŋ niini ɔɔ, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã anyak ŋaatunooŋ eet ci ŋaan kabaca baciinok, anycek rak nɔɔnɔ kodoma bɛ ɔɔwa ka kavac ŋaa nico.”
Zin ulule bodo, ma ayɛɛt looc komolita.
Mazi avɔ azii niigi zɔɔz nico, iniyit ɔtɔɔzɔ niigi dook kidicilim codoi codoi, akana ole o adikir zɛɛ been o miliny buk. Makacin otoŋtek niigi looc Yesu ki ŋaa we doon.
