Mazi akɔ adɔŋa Yesu ɔɔ, ɔkɔma eet ci acin. Ma anek niini ŋaa nico nɛ, “Ɔl oke ŋaa? Ɔkɔma ŋaatineeŋ eet codoi aavi ka kapayeyin gerzitin?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ŋaa nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm kina, alaan.”
Enek ni Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ zin buk naana kapayekin ineet gerzitin. Bitɔ zin, ma ŋaan bodo abaca oŋɛ.”
Ma azoozek Yesu ɔl bodo anek nɛ, “Keen naana vooritin ci loocu. Mã anuyan ɛɛti aneet, anyak niini vooritin o rogeto, ma alaŋ bodo niini awɔ muura.”
Ma anek ɔl o Parici nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko niina oobi kaal ci akati ɛlɛ unun maany, ma zin kaala ci ɔɔba o alaŋ een didi.”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Mayo nuun koobi kaal ci akati ɛlɛ onan maany, kaala ci kɔɔba o kaal ceen didi. Eeci kaga naana ŋino kakunɛ been ŋinti kakɔyɛ. Maje bar niiga alaŋ agayu ŋino kakunɛ been ŋinti kakɔyɛ.
Apaku niiga zoozok gole o eet o deer, maje naana akɔm eet ci kapaye gi ci gɛr.
Bar mã anyak gi ci kapai naana, payiin cane o payiin ceen didi, eeci alaŋ een aneet doon ci kapai zɔɔz nico o, bar kapaka naana ki baaba o itoonanan aneet.
Ayeedi lotinowe ugooc zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, Mã een bacowa ram, alɛɛmyai zɔɔz nici.
Zin keen naana bacoi ci ɛlɛ onan maany, ma buk baaba o itoonanan aneet, niini bacoi can buk.”
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aavi baatune ŋaa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ niiga agayaŋ aneet, ma alaŋ buk agayu baaba. Inoko tɛ agayaŋ aneet, agayu waan baaba buk.”
Ma kaal nicoko aduwa Yesu ŋaati adɛmzi ɔl kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo ŋaao abilni loidoŋ o muco. Ma akɔm iiten nice eet ci agam nɔɔnɔ, eeci ŋaan iiteni oninɛ kiiya.

Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Iima ŋaan kawɔ naana kooŋnekuŋ looc ŋina. Zin katin arooŋnyaŋ niiga aneet, bar alaŋ ajowanaŋ, ma adaaŋnu niiga waanma iŋaan anyaku oŋɛ nɔkɔ. Ma ŋinti kakɔyɛ naana, alaŋ niiga avoyu.”
Ma anɔ alaata o Juz nɛ, “Ma dim azi nɛ, Alaŋ naaga kanim kɔɔtɔ ŋaati akɔyi niini o. Arɔɔŋ bɔŋ ka kuruk ɛlɛ kadaak?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ. “Eeginu niiga ɔl ci loocu ŋina, maje naana keen eet ci tammu tadenu.
Gi zin ci ona kanekuŋ nɛ, Adaaŋnu waanma niiga iŋaan anyaku oŋɛ o nɛɛn. Zin didi niiga waanma adaaŋnu iŋaan anyaku oŋɛ noko mã alaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet o keen aneet.”
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma niina ineet ŋɛnɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Gi nɛɛn ona kuduwayuŋ rak uyen ɔɔwa e.
Kanyei zoozok ci meel karooŋ kuduwayuŋ, ma kapayekuŋ igeet. Ma ɛɛti o itoonanan aneet alaŋ niini avɔlɔŋ. Zin olla naana kaduwai ɔl o loocu kaal o kaziiŋna ŋaatin.”
Ma ŋaan niigi kagaac aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci akati baatin o.

Enek ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Tiŋeere ma odoŋtu niiga Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keete ween talakec, ŋaan agayaŋu keen naana aneet nɛɛn. Zin enice ŋaan agayu akɔm naana gi ci kagoon dɔyize can doon, bar kaduwa zɔɔz o ayelzakan aneet baaba.
Ma niini o itoonanan aneet aavi ŋaatan. Ma alaŋ uuŋnan niini aneet kaavu doon, eeci gɔɔn kagoon naana gi o atal niini tup.”
Mazi akɔ aduwa niini kaal nicoko, utuweec ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ.
Enek ni Yesu ɔl ci atu nɔɔnɔ o nɛ, “Mã azuunu demziin can o, izitu didi koca niiga nuyak cigan.
Ŋaan zin agayu niiga zɔɔz ween didi, ma zɔɔz ween didi ŋaan ɔɔganuŋ igeet mirɔkzete o baciinowu.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi Yesu anek nɛ, “Keegina naaga dɔl ci dɔl o Ibrayim. Ŋaan baal rɛɛn ŋaan kizita mirɔk ci ɔl oogi. Mayo zin kɛŋ jaŋ ci anɛ nɛ, Ŋaan ɔɔgjanu mirɔkzɛta o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci abaca baciinok niini miroi ci baciinowu.
Ma gɔɔn laadun miroiti alaŋ een eet ci korgu kodot, bar logo o aritak kɔrɔk nɛɛn o abaak niini ɔlɔ kodot.
Mã ɔɔgawuŋ ŋɛɛrti Joowo baciinowe, ooktewu koca niiga didi.
Ŋɛdɛt kagayuŋ naana igeet nɔkɔ eeginu dɔl ci dɔl o Ibrayim o. Ma bar arooŋnyu uruktaŋ kadaak, eeci alaŋ agamanu demziin onan.
Kazooz zin naana kaal o ayelekan aneet baaba, maje niiga agoonu kaal o aduwakuŋ igeet baatunooŋ.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Baatinaaŋ nɛɛn Ibrayim.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Matɛ didi iziti dɔl ci Ibrayim, agoonu waan kaal ci abon kiyo baale niini e.
Bar zin naana kaduwakuŋ igeet zoozok ween didi baal kaziiŋna naana Joowa, ma bar arooŋnyu uruktaŋ kadaak. Mazin baale Ibrayim alaŋ agɔɔn kaal ci ɛɛl nɔkɔ.
Bar zin niiga agoonu kaal o agɔɔn baatunooŋ.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ naana karitana tuuwa. Kanyaka baatinaaŋ codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ween Jook.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kizi da Jooi didi baatunooŋ, areezaŋ waan niiga aneet, eeci kakun naana ŋaatin, ma inoko kaavɛ ŋina. Alaŋ kakun dɔyize can doon, bar nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o itoonanan aneet.
Zin alaŋ aziiŋnu kaal ci kaduwakuŋ o naa? Agoonu nɔkɔ o, eeci alaŋ animnyu uzuuti zɔɔz can o.

Eeginu zin niiga dɔl ceen baatunooŋ nɛɛn Loryen, ma arooŋnyu oneec kaal o arɔɔŋ niini. Niini laadun kinatamma e eet ci monyento. Atɛɛdɔ niini ki leeminɛt zɔɔ, eeci akɔm ŋaatin laadun leeminɛt. Aduwa gɔɔn niini vɔlɔŋ, eeci vɔlɔŋ kɛɛr cin laadun. Niini voloŋnyoi, ma een baati voloŋnyowu.
Maje naana kaduwakuŋ zɔɔz ween didi. Gi zin calaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet o nɛɛn.
Ŋɛnɛɛn inoko ŋaatunooŋ ci agawekan aneet gi ci kabaci? Zin mã kaduwa gi ween didi, alaŋ atuyaŋ naa?
Ma ɛɛti o aku Joowa azii niini zoozok o Joowo. Ma zin niiga alaŋ aziiŋnenu o, eeci alaŋ eeginu dɔl ci Joowo.”
Ma anek ɔl o Juz Yesu bornɛt nɔŋa nɛ, “Een niina eet ceen Samariyen ci anyei Loryen alya.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔmnan Loryen alya. Kadiŋdiŋan naana baaba, maje bar niiga alaŋ adiŋdiŋanaŋ aneet.
Alaŋ karooŋei naana diŋdiŋɔn ɛlɛ maany, bar Jook nɛɛn o arooŋekan aneet diŋdiŋɔn, ma apayek niini gerzitin ɔl o abornan aneet.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã azii ɛɛti zɔɔz can o, alaŋ niini adaai been nɛɛn.”

Ma anek ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko zin kagayin didi anyei niina Loryen alya. Mayo nuun een jijitinaaŋ Ibrayim kibeen nyakaŋanɛt baale adaayitɔ. Maje niina azi nɛ, Mã anyak eet ci azooni zɔɔz can o, alaŋ adaai been nɛɛn.
Ma dim niina ineet ŋɛnɛɛn? Baale baatinaaŋ o kazi Ibrayim kibeen nyakaŋanɛt adaayitɔ labak. Mazi yo niina adiŋdiŋ juk nɔɔgɔ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Matɛ waan kidiŋdiŋan ɛlɛ cano naana maany, alaŋ koca diŋdiŋɔnti cane o een didi. Bar zin adiŋdiŋanan aneet baaba o gɔɔn aniyu niiga nɛ, Jook cunooŋ.
Bar zin niiga ŋaan agaac nɔɔnɔ, maje naana kaga nɔɔnɔ. Matɛ kizi nɛ, Alaŋ kaga nɔɔnɔ, kavoloŋ waan naana kiyo buk niiga o. Bar zin kaga naana nɔɔnɔ, ma kazoonɛ zɔɔz onin.
Baale jijitunooŋ Ibrayim atalnɛ ŋaati ka kicini niini iiten onan kakunɛ. Icinun zin niini, ma atalɔ.”
Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Niina alya ŋaan rak rum irkitok eet ram kamɔtɔ. Icinu zin da Ibrayim waŋa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ŋaan kitiryai Ibrayim e aneeta tɔ.”
Ma zooze nico everya niigi biyɛn arɔɔŋ ka kavaci Yesu kadaak. Uduni ni niini nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ ɔɔtɔ ook bitaala.
Ma iitene oman awɔ Yesu gɔla, ma acin eet ci da aritai kizi ruben nɔkɔ laadun.
Ma ajin nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, ŋɛnɛɛn ci abaca oŋec ci anyek eet nico kitiryai kizi ruben o? Oŋec cin doon yo oŋec da ci baatin ki yaatin?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Rubenzɛt cin o alaŋ anyaa oŋɛci ci abaca niini karabɔŋ een oŋɛci ci baatin ki yaatin. Bar ruben o ka keyelizyai liŋliŋɔnti o dɔyiz o Joowo ŋaatin.
Abon zin kaliŋliŋ naana liŋliŋɔn ci eet o itoonanan aneet iŋaan waazin lɔɔci o. Eeci gɔɔn ma izi lɔɔci baalin, akɔm bodo eet ci aliŋliŋ.
Ma ŋinti ŋaan rak kaavɛ naana loota o keen vooritin ci loocu.”
Aduwa niini zɔɔz nico, ma oortek amot looc, ma aŋɔnya tɔdɔ amotɛ, ma aŋɔnyɛkɛ eet ci ruben noko kɛbɛrɛ.
Ma anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Bitɔ toony ŋum lamurḏente o kazi Siloom.” (Ma kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ itoonɛ.) Ook ni ɛɛti ci ruben noko ŋinaante. Mazi akɔ oony ŋum, izi kɛbɛrɛ oginɛ wak icinɔ.
Mazi akɔ abada, icinit nɔɔnɔ ɔl o abaawɔ kibeen nɔɔnɔ, ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Mayo nici alaŋ een eet o gɔɔn aavi loota alaye o nɛɛn?”
Ma azi ɔl ogɛnɛ nɛ, “Nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ gi.” Maje ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ een nɔɔnɔ, olla atobɔ.”
Abarzek ni niini alya nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Aneeta ɛlɛ nɛɛn.”
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã een ineet nɛɛn, okole zin kɛbɛrɛ ugune ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Anyak eet ci kazi Yesu aŋɔnya tɔdɔ, ma aŋonyekan kɛbɛrɛ, ma anekan nɛ, Bitɔ toony ŋum lamurḏente o kazi Siloom. Mazi kakɔ koony ŋum, kicinɔ.”
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aavi inoko niini ŋaa?”
Ma anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ kaga.”
Ooti ni niigi eet ci baal ruben noko ole o Parici.
Maje iiteni ci baal akɔli Yesu eet ci ruben noko kɛbɛrɛ o iiten o yubzento.
Ma avɔ bodo ajin ɔl o Parici eet ci baal ruben noko anek nɛ, “Okole kɛbɛrɛ ku?”
Ma abarzek niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Aŋonyekan ɛɛti oman tɔdɔ ci acɔkcɔi kɛbɛrɛ. Mazi kakɔ koony ŋum, bar kicinɔ.”
Ma anɔ ɔl ogɛnɛ ole o Parici nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci agɔɔn gi nico noko alaŋ een eet ci aku Joowa, eeci alaŋ niini azooni iiten o yubzento een Sabit.”
Maje ogɛnɛ azi nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci anyak oŋec agɔɔn kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye ci ɛɛl ki nici koca ku?” Ɛŋɛrtɔ ni niigi maany kɔrgɛna daŋɔnta.
Ma ajin bodo ɔl o Parici eet nico anek nɛ, “Ma dim zin niina ci ona akolin ɛɛti nici kɛbɛrɛ o inoko azi nɛ eete nico?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Bar naana kazi nɛ, Niini nyakaŋan gi.”
Maje bar alaata o Juz alaŋ arɔɔŋ kiziiyit zɔɔz ci baal rubenini ɛɛti nici, ma bodo icinɔi o. Makacin ɔɔt utuya baatin ki yaatin.
Ma avu ajin niigi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Nici logo cunooŋ gi? Aritai da niini kizi ruben noko laadun? Mazi bodo icinɔ ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Kagaya naaga niini logo onaaŋ ɛlɛ nɛɛn. Aritai niini kizi ruben.
Bar zin alaŋ kagaya gɔl ci icinɔi inoko o. Alaŋ kagaya eet ci akɔl nɔɔnɔ kɛbɛrɛ o. Ijinit nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ, eeci niini buk eet ci idikirun. Anycek kuduwayuŋ niini alya.”
Aduwa baatinɛ kibeen yaatin zɔɔz nico o, eeci aŋole niigi alaat o Juz. Eeci aga niigi mã azi ɛɛti nɛ, Yesu niini Kiristo nɛɛn, atɔɔk koca alaata o Juz nɔɔnɔ ceeze o lotento.
Gi ci zin anɛ niigi nɛ, “Ijinit nɔɔnɔ,” o nɛɛn.
Ma bodo vurta ivita utuya alaata o Juz eet ci baal ruben noko, ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Duwa gi ween didi ŋume o Joowo, eeci kagaya naaga ɛɛti ci akolin kɛbɛrɛ o eet ci oŋecu.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ zin naana kaga mã een niini eet ci oŋecu karabɔŋ alaŋ anyak oŋec. Olla naana kaga gi codoi. Baale keen ruben, ma inoko kicinɔ.”
Ma ajin niigi bodo nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Agoonekin dim gitaz? Akolin kɛbɛrɛ ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Uyene rak naana kuduwayuŋ, bar alaŋ arooŋnyu niiga iziiyit. Mazin yo bodo arooŋnyu ka kuduwayuŋ naa? Arooŋnyu bɔŋ iziti nuyak cigin buk?”
Ma adɔm niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaan een nuyai cin niina. Keegina naaga nuyak o Mosis.
Kagaya baale naaga azɔɔzɔ Jooi kibeen Mosis. Maje eet nico alaŋ naaga ŋinti akuni o kagaya.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Abiirnan aneet ɔɔ zooze calaŋ agayu niiga eet nico ŋinti akuni o. Bar zin okolan niini aneeta kɛbɛrɛ.
Kaga ri naaga niini Jooi alaŋ azii ŋaryiin ci ɔl o oŋenu. Mazi adiŋdiŋan ɛɛti Jook, ma agɔɔn kaal o arɔɔŋ niini, azii Jooi nɔɔnɔ.
Ŋaan laadun kinatamma kiziiyit eet ci akɔl kɛbɛrɛ ci gɔn ci aritai kizi ruben.
Matɛ ɛɛti nici calaŋ aku Joowa, alaŋ waan kaal nicoko dook agɔɔn.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Aritai niina oŋeca izi ruben nɔkɔ, ma bar arooŋ ija demezet ageeta.” Otooyit ni niigi nɔɔnɔ kudun ceeze ci lotento noko.
Mazi akɔ azii Yesu otooyit ɔl eet baal akɔl niini kɛbɛrɛ e ceeze o lotento, ook urumtɔ niini kibeen nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Mayo inoko niina atu Ŋɛɛrti Eeto?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan, duwayan da, niini ŋɛnɛɛn ka kutu.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Icinu niina nɔɔnɔ uyene laadun. Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn zin ci azoozonu ki ineet noko.”
Ma anek ɛɛti Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, inoko kutuwɔ.” Ma akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma.
Ma azi Yesu nɛ, “Kakunai naana looc nico o ka kanyaa payiin ka kanyek ɔl o ruben kicintɔ, maje o acinɛ ka kiziti rubenɛ.”
Mazi azii ɔl ci Parici ona aromɛ ki nɔɔnɔ o gi ci aduwa niini noko, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Bɔŋ buk naaga keegina rubenɛ?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Waan tɛ iziti rubenɛ, akɔmnuŋ waan oŋɛ. Bar zin giye o aniyu niiga nɛ, acinenu, amɛnanu anyaku oŋɛ nɔkɔ.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti calaŋ akunak tɛɛny eecitɔ araana, ma bar atɔɔda dɔda ŋin oma, ma akɔ tɛɛnya eecitɔ, niini agoryai, ma een aamnyoi.
Maje ɛɛti ci akunak tɛɛny araana, niini eet o towawiinto nɛɛn.
Ma akolek ɛɛti o gɔɔn abɛk tɛɛny eet ci towawiinto noko araan. Ma azii aza oginɛ molok onin, ma awo niini aza ogin zaar, ma arayin nɔɔgɔ ŋaati aduŋni.
Mazi aduŋnan aza ogin bitaala, ma oontanɛ nɔɔgɔ, anowa niigi nɔɔnɔ vurta, eeci aga niigi nɔɔnɔ molok onin.
Alaŋ niigi ano eet ci gaga, bar mã een eet ci gaga, avir niigi nɔɔnɔ, eeci alaŋ aga niigi molok cin.”
Aduwak Yesu nɔɔgɔ yabziin nico, maje bar niigi alaŋ aga kɛŋ cin.
Ma bodo anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, Keen naana araan o tɛɛny o azawu.
Ma ɔl dook baal avu iŋaan naana kiiya e niigi agoryak, ma een aamnyok. Bar zin aza ŋaan kiziiyit nɔɔgɔ.
Keen zin naana araan, ma ɛɛti ci aku ŋaaten aneet ɛɛlyai. Ma aku niini tɛɛny, ma adun, ma ajowa ŋinti agɛwi.
Gɔɔn laadun agoryaiti akunak niini gorziin ki toŋdiin kibeen targanyitin. Zin bar naana kakun ka kiiya kanyek nɔɔgɔ rogɛt korogit juruŋ.
Keen naana eet o towawiinto abon. Ma gɔɔn ɛɛti ci towawiinto alaŋ aŋoli daayiz ci aruwɛn azaye cigin.
Ma ɛɛti ci gɔɔn uuwayi ka kuruktozek vɔyita alaŋ een niini eet o azawu nɛɛn. Mã acina niini kɛlaŋ ci aku, ooŋnek niini aza looc, ma avir, ma aku adak kɛlaŋi aza zɛɛ ma azaan.
Ma ɛɛti ci aliŋliŋ ka kuruktozek vɔyita avir niini labak o, eeci alaŋ een aza nici cigin ɛlɛ.
Keen zin naana eet o towawiinto abon. Kaga naana aza ogan, ma buk agayan niigi aneet.
Kiyo agayan baaba aneet, ma kaga naana nɔɔnɔ o, buk zin naana kaga aza ogan. Ma kagama daayiz ŋaatineeŋ.
Kanyei buk aza oogi calaŋ ɛɛl tɛɛnye nico. Abon zin kanyaa naana nɔɔgɔ buk ka kivita kiziiktan niigi aneet molok onan ka koromtɛ aza dook tɛɛnye codoi, ma oowa nɔɔgɔ dook ɛɛti codoi.
Areezan zin baaba aneet o, eeci kagama naana daayiz. Zin kaga naana ŋaan kaŋaaz daayiza bodo.
Akɔm eet ci anyak dɔyiz ci ka kurukan aneet kadaak, bar kagama daayiz naana oowe onan doon. Kanyei dɔyiz ci kadaaknɛ been ci kiŋaanɛ bodo daayiza. Nici zɔɔz ci aricanekan baaba aneet ka kutugu.”
Zin zooze nico ɛŋɛryɔ bodo ɔl o Juz kɔrgɛna.
Ma anɔ ɔl ci meel ŋaatineeŋ nɛ, “Anyak inoko ɛɛti nici Loryen alya, karabɔŋ bar anyak maŋɔn. Mayo laadun aziiŋnu zɔɔz cin o naa?”
Maje ɔl ogɛn anɔ nɛ, “Akɔm eet ci anyak Loryen alya ci azɔɔz nɔkɔ. Anyak Loryenti dɔyiz ci anyekɛ eet ci ruben kicinɔ?”
Zin iiya iiteni o gɔɔn anyayi ɔl o Juz lotɛn o aadanɛ niigi iiten baal ɛtɛɛnyɔi bodo ceez o Joowo Jerusalɛma e. Maje waanice lɔɔci izi lɔmɔtin.
Ma iitene nice awɔ Yesu riiwe baal ɛɛnyca Solomon e. Ma rii nici ajɔŋɔz ceez o Joowo.
Ma avu aliya ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Ma dim ka kereyowa been inin? Mã een didi niina Kiristo nɛɛn, duwayet juruŋ.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Uyene kuduwayuŋ, bar alaŋ arooŋnyu niiga utuyaŋ. Ma kaala ci kagoon naana zaare o baaba noko ayelza gi o kɛɛnɛ naana Kiristo.
Bar zin niiga alaŋ atuyaŋ o, eeci alaŋ eeginu aza cigan.
Gɔɔn aza ogane aziiŋnan molok onan. Ma kaga naana nɔɔgɔ, ma anuyan niigi aneet.
Kanyi naana nɔɔgɔ rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn, ma alaŋ bodo niigi adaai. Ma akɔm eet ci iraananan nɔɔgɔ aziite onan.
Ma baaba o anyan aneet nɔɔgɔ adikir niini ɔrɔɔt kujuk kaal dook, ma akɔm eet ci anim kiraana nɔɔgɔ aziite onin.
Zin naana ki baaba kadowina.”
Ma giye nico everya bodo ɔl o Juz biyɛn ka kavacit nɔɔnɔ kuruwit kadaak.
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Keyeleyuŋ naana kaal o abon meelik avu ŋaati baaba dook. Mazi yo kaale nicoko jaŋ ci arooŋnyu avacaŋ biyɛnɛ o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl o Juz nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ karooŋnya kavacin giye ci abon agoon, bar karooŋnya kavacin o, eeci amomoz Jook. Een niina eet ci deer labak, ma bar anyi ɛlɛ izi Jook.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ayeedi waragewe o Joowo gi ci azi nɛ, Eeginu niiga dɔl ci Joowo.
Ma kaga naaga laadun waragɛwi o Joowo alɛɛmnyai nɔkɔ kodot. Awo zin Jooi ɔl baal anyek niini zɔɔz onin kiziti dɔl cigin.
Ma zin bar aneeta aŋɛranan Jooi, ma itoonanan kiiyak looc. Mazi kazi nɛ, Keen ŋɛɛrti Joowo, bodo aniyu nɛ, Kamomoz Jook o, ku?
Matɛ waan calaŋ kaliŋliŋ naana liŋliŋɔn o baaba, alaŋ koca aganɔ ŋaati atuyaŋ niiga aneet.
Bar zin mã kaliŋliŋ naana liŋliŋɔn o baaba, mayo nuun alaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet zooze onan kaduwa, abon atuyu liŋliŋɔn onan kaliŋliŋ, ka agaac aavi baaba ŋaatan, ma kaavɛ naana ŋaatin.”
Enico orooŋit bodo niigi kagamit nɔɔnɔ, bar iniwun niini nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ ɔtɔɔ.
Imiire ni Yesu bodo abaayiz liil o kazi Jordan, ma akɔ ŋaabaal oonyi Jɔn ɔl e, ma akɔ amɔn ŋinaante.
Ma ŋinaante ivitak ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ, ma avu anɔ nɛ, “Baale Jɔn akɔm kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye agɔɔn, zin bar kaal baal aduwa niini akati eet nico e eelit didi dook tɔ.”
Zin waanice ŋinaante utuweec ɔl ci meelik nɔɔnɔ.
Ma enice anyak eet ci amɔɔr kazi zaar nɛ Lazaros. Abaak niini kuture o kazi Bɛtani, ma aromɛ niini ki ŋɔɔnɔgi ci kazi Meri been ci kazi Marta ŋinaante.
Ma Meri nici nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn baal ka kiiya kuvuut Manyi karacoca, ma ɛɛk zɔɔ imanɛ e.
Ma itoonek ŋɔɔnɔgi Lazaros Yesu otok ci anek nɛ, “Manyi, laŋotun unun gɔɔn areez amɔɔr ɔrɔɔt.”
Mazi akɔ azii Yesu zɔɔz nico, izi nɛ, “Mɔɔrizi nici alaŋ een daayiz, bar ka kanyaak Jook zany, ka zin buk kanyozozek ŋɛɛrti Joowo zanyi.”
Maje waanice Yesu arɛɛz Marta kibeen Meri been Lazaros ɔrɔɔt.
Bar mazi akɔ azii niini mɔɔriz o Lazaros, omonun rak niini ŋaati baal aavɛ o iinya ram.
Ma vurta enek nuyak ogin nɛ, “Kimiirte di bodo kɔɔtɔ Judiya ka kɔɔtɔ Bɛtaniya.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaan o demziinto, iiten baale arɔɔŋ ɔl o Juz kavacin biyɛnɛ ŋinaante. Ma bodo inoko arooŋ ka bitɔ ŋinaante?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Inoko gɔɔn alaŋ anyak waazini codoi ziik amɔtɔ ram? Mazin ɛɛti ci awɔ waaz alaŋ niini adiri, eeci vɔɔr lɔɔci.
Mazi awɔ niini baal, adiri, eeci alaŋ vɔɔr lɔɔci.
Inoko zin laŋotinai Lazaros ɔɔŋ. Karooŋ zin kook kitiŋka kicinɛ.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, matɛ ɔɔŋ, ŋaan zin ri tedec acinɛ labak.”
Ma ɔɔŋnya ci aduwa Yesu o daayiz o Lazaros nɛɛn. Maje bar nuyawa alaŋ aga. Bar abaaban niigi anɔ nɛ, “Coma ɔɔŋ labak.”
Ɔbɔrak ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ enek nɛ, “Adaawun Lazaros.
Katalnɛ zin naana giye ci akanuŋ igeet, eeci alaŋ kaavɛ waanice naana ŋinaante ka korogoz nɔɔnɔ. Ma daayizi nica iina o ka atuyaŋ niiga aneet. Inoko zin kɔɔtɔ ŋaatin.”
Ma anek Tomaz ween codengɔn gɔnɔgi ween nuyak nɛ, “Korkorit buk naaga dook kibeen nɔɔnɔ, ka mã anyak gi ci aku, ka kadaayit naaga dook ki nɔɔnɔ.”
Mazi akɔ arum Yesu looc, amada Lazaros anyawun iinya wec bɔɔta.
Maje kuturi ci kazi Bɛtani noko ajɔŋzɔ ki Jerusalɛm.
Ma avunak ɔl ci Juz meelik Marta been Meri ka kivita kozooztek nɔɔgɔ daayize nico.
Mazi akɔ azii Marta Yesu iiya, itiŋa ook urumek nɔɔnɔ gɔl. Maje Meri ŋaan aavi ceeza.
Ma anek Marta Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, waan da aavu ŋina alaŋ waan gɔtɔna adaai.
Bar zin kaga mã ajin inoko Jook olla gi ci arooŋ, anyin niini ineet.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan iŋaaz tedec gotonu korok bodo.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Marta nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋɛdɛt kaga nɔkɔ. Ŋaan iŋaaz waanma niini daayiza iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Aneeta nɛɛn o kanyi ɔl rogɛt, ma kaŋaanɛ nɔɔgɔ daayiza. Ma ɛɛti ci atuyan aneet mayo nuun adaai, arogi bodo.
Maje ɛɛti ci ŋaan arogi, ma atuyan aneet, alaŋ bodo niini adaai been nɛɛn. Inoko atu zɔɔz nico?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Marta Yesu anek nɛ, “Ii, Manyi. Kutuwin naana ineet. Een niina Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo baal ka kiiyak looc e nɛɛn.”
Mazi akɔ adotiz Marta zooze nico, imiire ook otowa Meri ween ŋɔɔni, ma aku aŋomtek nɔɔnɔ doon gi ci anek nɛ, “Iiya alaani o demziinto. Awuyin zin niini ineet.”
Mazi azii Meri zɔɔz nico, itiŋa ecodoi noko iyiik ook ŋaatin.
Maje Yesu ŋaan korogjok kurum, bar ŋaan aavi ŋaa ona arumɛkɛ Marta nɔɔnɔ gɔl e.

Maje ɔl o Juz ona avu ka kozoozek awɔyi Meri e ŋaan aavtiz ceeza. Mazi acin niigi Meri aŋaaz taman, ma adun akɔ bitaala, oneec niigi nɔɔnɔ, eeci abaaban niigi anɔ nɛ, “Akɔ inoko boote o gɔtɔnɔn e ka kook kutulu ŋinaante.”
Mazi akɔ arum Meri Yesu, acin niini nɔɔnɔ, ma akani kozoŋti looc nɔɔnɔ ŋuma, ma anek nɛ, “Manyi, inoko da aavutɔ ŋina, ŋaan waan gɔtɔna kadaak.”
Mazi acin Yesu Meri kibeen ɔl o Juz alu nɔkɔ, ɛtɛɛdɛ buk nɔɔnɔ ziniz ɔrɔɔt.
Ma ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Adayu ŋaa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, ija ka cin ŋinti kadaya o.”
Utulu ni Yesu.
Ma anɔ ɔl o Juz nɛ, “Icinit di! Arɛɛz niini eet nico ɔrɔɔt.”
Maje ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatineeŋ anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ een eet baal akɔl eet o ruben kɛbɛrɛ e nɛɛn? Inoko tɛ kɔmɔda eet nico iŋaan kadaak, alaŋ waan adaai.”
Zin bodo ɛtɛɛdɛ Yesu ziniz ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ. Iiyak ni bɔɔt ci baal adawin Lazaros o. Maje bɔɔt nico anyoogi ɔtɔgi biye ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
Ma anek Yesu ɔl nɛ, “Ipikta bɛ nico look otoga.”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Marta nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, ame tedec ɔrɔɔt, eeci anyawun niini bɔɔta iinya wec.”
Ma anek Yesu Marta nɛ, “Kuduwayin uyen keneyin nɛ, Mã atuyan aneet, acin tedec diŋdiŋɔn o Joowo.”
Mazi akɔ apiya niigi bɛ, ɔdɔŋ Yesu kɛbɛrɛ, ma acin tammu taden, ma azi nɛ, “Baaba, kanyin zany, eeci gɔɔn aziiŋnan niina aneet.
Ŋɛdɛt kagayin nɔkɔ gɔɔn aziiŋnan niina aneet. Olla zin zoozok nicoko kaduwa o, eeci karooŋ ɔl ci ɛɛl ŋina noko ka kutuyɔ, ma agayan niigi itoonanan niina aneet.”
Mazi akɔ odotiz niini ŋaryiinte nico, otowɛ molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Lazaros, duna bitaala.”
Makacin itiŋa Lazaros, ma aduŋnak bitaalin. Maje azɛɛna kibeen zɔɔ ŋaan acabje rumanɛn nɔkɔ. Maje bodo rum codoi atakuconek nɔɔnɔ ŋum. Ma anek Yesu ɔl nɛ, “Ɔɔkta rumanɛ nicoko ŋaatin ka kɔtɔɔ.”
Mazi avɔ acin ɔl o Juz baal avu azoozek awɔyi Meri e Yesu agɔɔn gi nico, utuweec ci meelik ŋaatineeŋ nɔɔnɔ.
Maje bar ɔl ogɛn ŋaatineeŋ imiirte ɔɔt uduktak ɔl o Parici gi ci agɔɔn Yesu o.
Mazi azii ɔl o Parici ki alaat o ceez o Joowo zɔɔz nico, ulute ŋaatodoi, ma anɔ nɛ, “kayo kutuguz gitaz? Eet nico utugu kaal ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye ɔrɔɔt.
Inoko mã kooŋ kiliŋliŋ kaal nicoko nɔkɔ, atu koca ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ. Ma koca avu alaata o Rom, ma ɔyɔk ceez cinai Joowo o, ma buk koca avu atargany looc cinai o dook.”
Maje ŋinaante anyak eet cinaaŋ kazi Kayavas ceen alaan ci ceez o Joowo irkite nice. Itiŋa ni niini, ma anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm niiga gi ci agayu been nɛɛn.
Alaŋ agayu abon adaai ɛɛti codoi ɔla ka calaŋ adaai ɔl dook o?”
Alaŋ zin bar aduwa niini gi nico oowe cin doon, bar giye baal ɛɛnɛ niini alaan ci adikir ceeze o Joowo irkite nice anyewun Jooi nɔɔnɔ kuduwa gi o ka kiiya kadaai Yesu ka korogozi ɔl o Juz dook.
Alaŋ zin bar ka kadaak ole o Juz doon, bar ka buk kiiya kolota niini dɔl ci Joowo azaanonek loocok o dook kodoyi.
Zin akati iitene nice ɛlɛ orooŋit alaata o Juz gɔl ci ka kurukti Yesu kadaak.
Ma giye nico enice alaŋaan Yesu awɔ keyeleza ɛlɛ Judiya, bar itiŋa niini ook kuture o kazi Iviram ajɔŋɔz balal, ma akɔ amɔn niini kibeen nuyak ogin ŋinaante.
Mazi izi lotɛn o gɔɔn aadanɛ ɔl o Juz iiten o vardaŋinto ajɔn, ɔɔtɔ ɔl ci meelik ole o Juz Jerusalɛma ka kɔɔt kutuguzɔ niigi kaal ugeec gɔɔn toonyento.
Maje ŋaato arɔɔŋ niigi Yesu. Mazi avɔ alotɛ kaluwawe o ceez o Joowo, ijintɔ izitɔ nɛ, “Mayo dim tedec ɛɛti we aku didi?”
Ma buk aricanek alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen ɔl o Parici ɔl zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Mã alam eet ci ajowa ŋinti aavɛ Yesu, abon aku aduwaket ka koota kagamta.”
Mazi ŋaan ɛɛl iinya ceen tɔrkɔnɔm ɔɔwa iŋaan kiiya iiteni o vardaŋinto, ook Yesu kuture o kazi Bezani ŋaabaal arogzi niini Lazaros daayiza e.
Ma avɔ agoonek ɔl nɔɔnɔ dayiin ŋinaante, zɛɛ anyaak ni Marta nɔɔgɔ dayiin. Maje Lazaros aromɛ kibeen ɔl ci ona arɛwa ki Yesu dayiin o dook.
Ma anyaa Meri ketezewoc ci anyak karacoc ci kazi narat ci aŋɔl madiz ɔrɔɔt ci ataalyai guruce ci meelik gɛr. Ma aku aḏuutɛkɛ Yesu zɔɔ, ma apucpucanek imanɛ. Makacin ɔtɔŋɔl ceez dook madiz ɔrɔɔt.
Izi ni azi nuyaiti o Yesu kazi Judaz Iskariat baal ka kiiya kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ e nɛ,
“Matɛ laadun alaŋ ataalinɛ karacoc nico guruce ci meelik ka kanycek ɔl o amaat naa?”
Alaŋ zin bar aduwa gi nico o giye ci arɛɛzi niini ɔl o amaat, bar aduwa o, eeci een niini agoryai. Ma anyak gɔɔn kaboon o guruco niini.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Toŋɔ nɔɔnɔ. Agoonekan niini aneet gi nico o ka kidimdimaneyan aneet iiten o dawinto.
Ma ɔl ci amaat o aromenu ki igeet ŋina iinya dook, maje naana alaŋaan bodo karomɛ ki igeet ŋina been nɛɛn.”

Mazi avɔ azii ɔl ci meel Yesu aavi kuture o kazi Bɛtani, ɔɔtɔ niigi ŋinaante. Alaŋ avɔ niigi ŋinaante o ka kɔɔt kicinit Yesu doon, bar arɔɔŋ buk niigi kɔɔt kicinit Lazaros baal iŋaani Yesu nɔɔnɔ daayiza e.
Makacin abaabanit alaata o ceez o Joowo gɔl ci ka kurukti Lazaros buk,
eeci ɔl ci meel ole o Juz utuweec Yesu giye o itiŋawi niini Lazaros daayiza.
Ma ŋeere iziiyit ɔl ci meel ole baal avunak lotɛn o vardaŋinto e Yesu akunak Jerusalɛm.
Uduulta ni niigi oto ci kɛɛn ween kɛtɛlɛɛn, ma avɔ arumek nɔɔnɔ gɔl ŋaati agɛrnyi anɛ nɛ, “Atanaaz Jook. Amayuk Jooi eet o aku zaare o Manyi. Amayuk Jooi alaan o Israyil.”
Anyaaktak ni ɔl Yesu jɔrɔn ci zigiro, ma atɔɔt kiyo ayeedi waragɛwi o Joowo azi nɛ,
“Ɔl o Jerusalɛm, má anyaku ŋoliin. Icinit di alaan unooŋ ŋaati akunakuŋ igeet joronte ci zigiro.”

Maje waanice rak ɔɔwa e alaŋ nuyawa oginɛ kaal nicoko dook aga. Bar akɔ mazi itiŋa Yesu ook tamma titinyonte onin e, aada nuyawa ayeedi kaala ci akati nɔɔnɔ noko waragewe o Joowo keelit tɔ laadun. Gi zin ci baal adiŋdiŋani ɔl nɔɔnɔ o nɛɛn.
Ma ɔl baal aromɛ kibeen Yesu iitene baal iŋaani niini Lazaros daayiza e, ɔɔt uduktak ɔl gi nico.
Gi zin ci baal avɔ arumɛkɛ ɔl nɔɔnɔ gɔl o nɛɛn, eeci iziiyit niigi gi o adiŋdiŋ agɔɔn Yesu.
Makacin izitɔ ɔl o Parici nɛ, “Icinit di, ɔkɔmeyet. Ɔkɔma gi ci ka kutuguz. Oneec ɔl dook nɔɔnɔ.”
Maje buk waanice anyak ɔl ceen Garik ci avunak Jerusalɛm ka kivita kidiŋdiŋanit Jook iitene o lotento.
Ma avunak niigi Pilip o kutur o kazi Bezediya abil looce o kazi Galili. Ma avu anek nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manygɔn, karooŋnya di kicinta Yesu.”
Ma akɔ Pilip aduwak Andoru. Ɔɔtɔ ni Pilip ki Andoru uduktak Yesu zɔɔz nico.
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Iiya zin iiteni o ka kanyozozɛkɛ Ŋɛɛrti Eeto diŋdiŋɔni ci appe.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã alaŋ kɛbɛrɛci ci labitoto aḏowɛ loota, ma adaai, abil kɔdɔwɛ kizi nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ nɔkɔ. Bar mazi adaai, aduŋna, ma anyaa kɛbɛrɛ ci meelik gɛr.
Ma zin ɛɛti ci arɛɛz rogɛt, iima akoloz. Maje bar ɛɛti ci abor rogɛt looce nico, ajowa tiŋeere niini rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn.
Ma ɛɛti ci arɔɔŋ kiliŋliŋozeyan aneet, abon anowanan niini aneet ka ŋinti kaavɛ naana, aavɛ buk niini. Ma eet ci aliŋliŋonekan aneet, atitiny baaba buk nɔɔnɔ.
Inoko zin aneet awuci ziniz ɔrɔɔt. Kayo zin kizi nɛ? Kizi nɛ, Baaba, rogozan piryakzete nico? Akɔm, eeci nici gi baal laadun kakunɛ e nɛɛn.
Baaba, anyek zin zaar ugun diŋdiŋɔn.”
Iiya ni tamma mɔlɔyi ci azi nɛ, “Kanyeya zaar ogan diŋdiŋɔn, ma ŋaan kamɛna kanyi diŋdiŋɔn nɔkɔ.”
Maje ɔl ona ɛɛl ŋinaante e iziiyit molok nico, ma anɔ nɛ, “Ajul dim tammu?” Maje ogɛnɛ anɔ nɛ, “Akɔm, azɔɔzɔ inoko toonnyaiti ci tammo ki nɔɔnɔ.”
Ma bar anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ mɔlɔyi nici aku giye can, bar aku giye cunooŋ.
Inoko zin izi iiten ci ka kapawozɛkɛ looc gerzitin nɛɛn nici. Ka zin buk alaani o looc nico kɔtɔɔyɛ kook many.
Mazi tiŋeere kɔdɔŋɛ naana keete ween talakec, ŋaan kagura ɔl dook kivitayan aneet.”
Zin aduwa niini gi nico o ayelza kɛŋ ci daayiz onin ka kadaai.

Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kagaya naaga azi waragɛwɛ o Joowo nɛ, Arogi katin Kiristo nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Ma zin niina azi nɛ, Ka kɔdɔŋɛ Ŋɛɛrti Eeto keete ween talakec o ku? Ma dim ceen Ŋɛɛrti Eeto o ŋɛnɛɛn?”

Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ŋaan rak abil vooritin ŋaatunooŋ ŋintimiliny. Emeda zin rak ɔtɔɔz gole nico nɔkɔ ŋinti ŋaan anyaku vooritin o, ka calaŋ akunakuŋ muuri. Eeci ɛɛti ci awɔ muura alaŋ aga niini ŋinti akɔyi o.
Ma ŋinti ŋaan rak anyaku vooritin o, utuweec vooritin nico ka iziti ɔl ci vooritino.”
Mazi akɔ odotiz Yesu zooze nico, ɔtɔɔ niini ŋaatineeŋ iliitai nɔɔgɔ ɛlɛ.
Mayo nuun waanice agɔɔn niini kaal ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn e, ŋaan niigi kuteec nɔɔnɔ nɔkɔ.
Zin didi ibilun zɔɔz baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Izaya e tɔ baal anɛ nɛ, “Manyi, ŋɛnɛɛn dim ci ka kutu zɔɔz ci baal aduwaket noko? Ŋɛnɛɛn ci ka keyelizak Jooi dɔyiz onin?”
Ŋaan zin didi waanice ɔl nica kutuyɔi. Azi buk bodo Izaya nɛ,
“Atooza Jooi nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛ kizi rubenɛ ka calaŋ acinɛ. Ma buk abakbayɛn Jooi nɔɔgɔ zinzeeti ka calaŋ agɛny. Agɔɔn niini nɔkɔ o ka calaŋ abadaak niigi nɔɔnɔ ka korogit.”
Aduwa Izaya zɔɔz nico o, eeci baale icinun niini diŋdiŋɔn o Yesu, ma azɔɔz niini gi ci akati nɔɔnɔ.
Mayo nuun waanice utuweec alaata ci meel ole o Juz Yesu e, bar alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kɔbɔrta tuwɛn uneeŋ kɔla, eeci aŋole niigi ɔl o Parici. Gɛrzɛ ŋaan atɔɔk nɔɔgɔ ceeze uneeŋ lotento.
Eeci arɛɛz niigi naatinɛt o ɔl o deer kujuk o Joowo.
Ma agɛrɛny Yesu moloye ci appe azi nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci atuyan aneet, alaŋ bar atuyan niini aneet doon, bar atu buk niini eet o itoonanan aneet.
Ma ɛɛti ci acinan aneet, icin buk niini eet o itoonanan aneet.
Kakun zin naana ka kizi vooritin ci loocu, ka mã anyak eet ci atuyan aneet ka calaŋ bodo niini aavi muura.
Mã anyak eet ci azii zɔɔz can o, ma alaŋ atu, alaŋ naana kapaye nɔɔnɔ gerzitin. Eeci alaŋ kakun naana o ka kiiya kapayek looc gerzitin, bar ka korogoz.
Ma ɛɛti ci abornan aneet, ma alaŋ agama zɔɔz can o, anyak eet ci ŋaan apayek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin tɔ. Ma zoozowa ci kaduwa naana o ŋaan apayek katin nɔɔnɔ gerzitin iitene ci aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e.
Eeci akɔm gi ci kaduwa naana oowe can doon, bar baaba o itoonanan aneet nɛɛn o ilotekan gi o ka kuduwa.
Zin kaga naana zɔɔz o ilot niini anyaa rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn. Ma gi ci kaduwa naana, kaduwa eo aduwakan baaba aneet.”
Mazi izi ŋinti ka kakatai iiteni o lotɛn o vardaŋinto, agawun Yesu iiya iiteni o ka kitiŋawi niini loota ŋina kooyi ŋaati baatin tamma. Ma waanice gɔɔn arɛɛz niini nuyak ogin ɔrɔɔt koṯorɛi.
Mazi avu Yesu ki nuyak ogin ka kivita kadaktɔ baal, arayɛkɛ tɛ Loryen Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Saiman Iskariat ziniz baabaninɛt ci ka kataalɔi Yesu.
Maje waanice Yesu aga nɔkɔ baatinɛ arekɛ kaal dook aziit onin. Ma aga aku niini Joowa, ma ka bodo kimiirozek Jook.
Itiŋa ni Yesu jena ŋaati dayiinto noko, ma aborca rum onin malkinto, ma adoma rum oma ci miliny pucpucaninto, ma acabek barkɔny.
Ma aḏuutek maam kodooc. Akata ni ŋaati oonyi nuyak ogin zɔɔ, ma ɛɛk bodo rume ci ona acabek barkɔny o.
Mazi akunak Yesu Saiman Pitɔr, ijin Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Manyi, arooŋ dim toonyan niina aneet zɔɔ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ inoko niina gi ci kagoon o aga, bar zin ŋaan aga tedec nuun.”
Ma anek Pitɔr Yesu nɛ, “Alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati oonyan niina aneet zɔɔ been nɛɛn.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Mã alaŋ kuunyin naana ineet zɔɔ, alaŋ koca bodo niina een nuyai can been nɛɛn.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Manyi, má oonyan zin zɔɔ doon, bar toonyan azɛɛn kibeen ɔɔ buk.”

Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Ma ɛɛti ci aranɛ, itiliza nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ dook, ma alaŋ bodo arɔɔŋ raninɛt, olla koca oony niini zɔɔ doon. Inoko zin buk niiga dook itilizawu, olla anyak ŋaatunooŋ eet codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ ci ŋaan een ririny.”
Aduwa Yesu gi nico o, eeci aga niini eet o ka kook kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ. Gi ci zin baal aduwan niini zɔɔz nico o nɛɛn.
Mazi otoony Yesu nɔɔgɔ zɔɔ ugeec odota, aborcek bodo rum onin malkinto, ma abadaak tarabeza ŋin ona dayiinto e. Ma aku ajin niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko zɔɔz ci kagoonekuŋ naana igeet gi nico o agayu?
Gɔɔn niiga awuyaŋ aneet kizi eet ci demziinto, ma awuyaŋ buk kizi Manyi. Didi zin awuyaŋ juruŋ, eeci keen aneet nɛɛn.
Keen didi naana Manyi cunooŋ, ma keen eet cunooŋ demziinto. Kutuunyuŋ zin inoko naana igeet zɔɔ. Abon zin buk gɔɔn niiga oonyonu zɔɔ cugooc o maany.
Mazin kagoonekuŋ naana igeet gi nico o ka buk niiga utuguz nɔkɔ.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, akɔm laadun gabaren ci adikir alaane cin. Ma buk akɔm eet ci itoonyai ci adikir eete o itoona nɔɔnɔ.
Inoko zin agawutu niiga gi nico. Mã avɔ agoonu nɔkɔ, amayukuŋ koca Jooi igeet.

Alaŋ zin kaduwakuŋ zɔɔz nico igeet dook, eeci kaga naana ɔl ogan kaŋɛra. Inoko zin ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz o aduwa waragɛwi o Joowo azi nɛ, Ma ɛɛti o kazola naana ki nɔɔnɔ dayiin ogan, otowɛ niinilya amaroyan aneet.
Kaduwakuŋ zin naana igeet gi nico inoko iŋaan kakatai o, ka tiŋeere ma akanai ka utuyaŋ naana aneet nɛɛn.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci agama eet ci kitoon naana, agamanan buk niini aneet. Mazin ɛɛti ci agamanan aneet o, agama buk niini eet o itoonanan aneet.”
Mazi adotiz Yesu zooze nico, uwucun nɔɔnɔ ziniz ɔrɔɔt, ma abɔrak nuyak ogin gi ci anek nɛ, “Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ataalinan tiŋeere ɛɛti codoi ŋaatunooŋ.”
Ma agɛlɛmɔ nuyawa niigi maany, eeci abiir nɔɔgɔ ooti zooze nico, ma alaŋ aga eet ci ka kataalɔi nɔɔnɔ o.
Maje nuyaiti o gɔɔn arɛɛz Yesu nɔɔnɔ aavi loota Yesu libira.
Ma alakada Saiman Pitɔr nuyai nico, ma anek nɛ. “Jin di Yesu kuduwayin ŋɛnɛɛn ci ariik niini o.”
Icayak ni nuyaiti nici Yesu ijonun, ma ajin anek nɛ, “Manyi, ŋɛnɛɛn dim ci arii o?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Eet nɛɛn o tedec kadoma ḏokoc, ma kacomekɛ wuci, ma kanyi nɔɔnɔ kadak.” Odoma ni niini ḏokoc ocomek wuci, ma anyek Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Saiman Iskariat.
Mazi adoma Judaz ḏokoc nico, ook Loryen nɔɔnɔ ziniza enico ɛlɛ. Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Tugu gi ci arooŋ tugu o taman.”
Bar akɔm eet codoi nuyawe ci ona aavtiz aliya tarabeza o ci aga kɛŋ ci zɔɔz ci aduwak Yesu Judaz o.

Ma zin bar giye o gɔɔn agami Judaz kaboon o guruco, abaabanit nuyawa ogɛnɛ ŋaatineeŋ izitɔ nɛ, Coma arɔɔŋ inoko Yesu nɔɔnɔ kook kataalayet dayiin ci iiten o lotento o, karabɔŋ bar arɔɔŋ nɔɔnɔ kook kitirit ɔl o amaat.
Mazi adoma Judaz ḏokoc, udun enico ɛlɛ ook bitaala. Maje lɔɔci izi baalin.
Mazi akɔ adun Judaz, enek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Inoko zin eyelizai diŋdiŋɔni o Ŋɛɛrti Eeto. Ma buk eyelizai diŋdiŋɔni o Joowo ŋaatin.
Zin ma eyelizai diŋdiŋɔni o Joowo ŋaatin o, adiŋdiŋan buk tiŋeere Jooi nɔɔnɔ taman.

Dɔl ogan, alaŋaan bodo karomɛ naana ki igeet ŋinti rɛɛn. Arooŋnyaŋ zin tiŋeere, bar alaŋ ajowanaŋ. Kiyo baale kaduwai alaat o Juz kanei nɛ, Ŋinti kakɔyɛ naana, alaŋ niiga animnyu ivita e. Kaduwakuŋ zin bodo buk inoko zɔɔz nico igeet.
Inoko zin kanyuŋ lotinɛt ci colai ce. Ɛrɛɛztɔ niiga dook. Kiyo gɔɔn kareezuŋ naana igeet o, ɛrɛɛztɔ buk niiga dook nɔkɔ.
Mã areezonu niiga dook nɔkɔ, agayuŋ koca ɔl dook igeet eeginu nuyak cigan.”
Ma ajin Saiman Pitɔr Yesu anek nɛ, “Manyi, arooŋ dim bitɔ ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma ŋinti kakɔyɛ naana o, alaŋ rak niina inoko anim nowawan, bar zin vurta ŋaan anowanan.”
Ma ajin Pitɔr Yesu anek nɛ, “Manyi, naa akɔma alaŋ kanim kanuyin inoko o? Ma naana katoma kadaak ŋaatun labak.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko dim didi niina anim daak ŋaatan? Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, adaŋnyan tija lak iiyu iŋaan toloci kɔrɔk.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Má anyeku zinzeeti kitiranyit, bar utuweec Jook. Utuyaŋ aneet buk.
Ma ole o baaba anyak ceezi ci meelik gɛr. Inoko zin naana kakɔ ka kook kidimdiman ŋintunooŋ. Matɛ waan kizi gi ci azeetɔ, alaŋ waan kaduwakuŋ.
Mazi kook kidimdimana ŋintunooŋ o odota, ŋaan kabada bodo ka kiiya kooyuŋ igeet, ka ŋinti kaavɛ naana o, aavtiyu niiga buk.
Agayu ri niiga gɔl ci akɔ ŋaati kakɔyi naana o nɔkɔ.”
Ma anek Tomaz nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, alaŋ naaga ŋinti akɔyɛ niina o kagaya. Kagaya yo gɔl ci akɔyɛ niina o ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu Tomaz anek nɛ, “Aneeta nɛɛn o keen gɔl, ma keen didi, ma keen rogɛt. Akɔm eet ci akunak baaba calaŋ aduŋna niini ŋaaten aneet.
Inoko zin mã agawutaŋu niiga aneet o, ŋaan agayu baaba buk. Bar zin buk inoko agawutu nɔɔnɔ, ma icintu.”
Ma anek Pilip nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Manyi, yeleyet da baatun, olla gi ci karooŋnya dook nɛɛn.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Pilip, koromtɛ naana ki igeet ŋinti wun kal. Maŋaan niina gawan nɔkɔ? Ma zin azi nɛ, Yeleyet baatun o, naa? Ma ɛɛti ci icinan aneet, icinun buk niini baaba.

Pilip, alaŋ aga niina kaavɛ naana ŋaati baaba, ma aavi buk baaba ŋaatan o? Ma zoozowa ci kaduwakuŋ igeet o, alaŋ kaduwa naana oowe can doon, bar zin baaba o aavi ŋaatan nɛɛn o agɔɔn liŋliŋɔn onin maany.
Abon zin atuyaŋ niiga aneet zooze o kanekuŋ nɛ, Aavi baaba ŋaatan, ma buk kaavɛ ŋaatin. Mã alaŋ atuyaŋ niiga aneet zooze nico, utuyaŋ kaale o kagoon.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, ma ɛɛti ci atuyan aneet agɔɔn buk niini kaal o kagoon naana ɛlɛ. Ma bar buk agɔɔn niini kaal ci adikir ɔrɔɔt kujuk nicoko, eeci inoko kakɔ naana ŋaati baaba.
Zin olla mã anyak gi ci ajinu niiga zaare ogan, ŋaan kagoonekuŋ naana igeet ka diŋdiŋɔni o baaba keyelzyai ŋaaten ŋɛɛrin.
Mã anyak gi ci ajinaŋ niiga aneet zaare ogan, kagoonekuŋ.
Mã areezaŋ niiga aneet, uzuuti lotinok ogan.
Ŋaan kajin naana baaba ka kanyuŋ igeet tiritoi oma ween Vɔŋiz o Joowo ka oromtɛ ki igeet nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Niini Vɔŋiz ween didi o ayelza leemi o Joowo.
Alaŋ ɔl o loocu agama nɔɔnɔ, eeci alaŋ niigi acin nɔɔnɔ, ma alaŋ aga. Bar zin niiga agayu nɔɔnɔ, eeci aavi niini ŋaatunooŋ, ma aromenu ki igeet.
Alaŋ kooŋnekuŋ igeet looc aavtiz doon, bar ŋaan kabadakuŋ.
Ŋintimiliny alaŋ bodo ɔl ci loocu noko acinan aneet, maje niiga ŋaan acinaŋ, eeci naana karogi, ma ŋaan buk tiŋeere niiga arognu.
Tiŋeere iitene nice ŋaan agayu kaavɛ naana ŋaati baaba, maje niiga aavtiyu ŋaatan, kiyo buk kaavɛ naana ŋaatunooŋ o.
Ma ɛɛti ci agama lotinok ogan, ma azooni, eet o areezan aneet nɛɛn. Ma eet ci areezan aneet, arɛɛz buk baaba nɔɔnɔ. Ma kareez buk naana nɔɔnɔ, ma kayelzai nɔɔnɔ ɛlɛ can o.”
Ma azi Judaz oman calaŋ een Judaz Iskariat nɛ, “Manyi, ka yeleyet ɛlɛ cun o ageeta doon, ma alaŋ ayelzai ɔl ci looc o ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma areezan ɛɛti aneet, azooni niini zɔɔz onan. Ma arɛɛz buk baaba nɔɔnɔ. Ma kavunaka naana ki baaba nɔɔnɔ, ma kabaaka ki nɔɔnɔ ŋaatodoi.
Maje ɛɛti calaŋ areezan aneet, alaŋ azooni niini zɔɔz onan. Ma zin bar zɔɔz ci aziiŋnu niiga kaduwa o, alaŋ een zɔɔz can, bar zɔɔz ci baaba o itoonanan aneet.
Kaduwakuŋ zin zoozok nicoko ŋinti ŋaan karomɛn naana kibeen igeet o.
Ma zin tiritoiti ween Vɔŋiz o Joowo o ka kitoona baaba zaare ogan ŋaan aku ademzekuŋ tiŋeere niini ageet kaal dook, ma buk ŋaan aadakuŋ kaal o gɔɔn kaduwakuŋ naana igeet dook.
Inoko zin kadotekuŋ igeet ganɔn onan. Ma ganɔni cane kanyuŋ igeet o, alaŋ atobɔ ki ganɔn o loocu. Má anyeku zin zinzeeti kitiranyit. Má anyaku ŋoliin.
Iziiktu rak uyene keneyuŋ nɛ, Kawɔ naana, ma bodo kakɔ kabadakuŋ. Inoko zin mã areezaŋ didi niiga aneet, abon atalninu giye ci kakɔyi naana ŋaati baaba o, eeci niini adikir ŋaatan.
Kuduwakuŋ zin kaal nicoko inoko iŋaan kakatai o, ka ma tiŋeere akanai ka utuyaŋ niiga aneet.
Alaŋ zin bodo kazɔɔzɔ naana kibeen igeet ŋinti wun, eeci alaan o loocu nɛɛn ci aku noko. Bar zin akɔm niini gi ci ka kodoma ŋaatan.
Abon zin aga lɔɔci reezi o karɛɛzɛ naana baaba. Ma kagoon kaal dook eo ilotekan niini aneet.
Inoko zin itiŋgaz kɔtɔɔz ŋina.”
Ma anek Yesu nuyak bodo nɛ, “Keen naana kɛɛt dikirɔn. Maje baaba niini eet o keetu nɛɛn.
Mã anyak oton calaŋ abiir ŋaatan, aŋɛɛdak niini tuu. Maje oton o gɔɔn abiir, azɛɛc kitiliza ka kibiir juruŋ.
Inoko zin niiga itilizawu giye o zɔɔz baal kaduwakuŋ e.
Oromtezeyaŋ zin niiga aneet, maje buk naana karomonekuŋ igeet. Akɔm gɔɔn laadun oton ci abiir alye cin doon calaŋ akanonek kɛɛt dikirɔn. Mã alaŋ aromonekaŋ niiga aneet, eelnu buk koca niiga nɔkɔ.

Keen zin naana kɛɛt dikirɔn, maje niiga eeginu oto. Ma ɛɛti ci aromonekan aneet, maje buk naana karomonei nɔɔnɔ, eet o abiir juruŋ nɛɛn. Eeci mã kadɛyai naana ŋaatunooŋ, akɔm niiga doon gi ci ka utuguz.
Mã anyak eet calaŋ aromonekan aneet, atɛɛdjak koca niini looc kiyo kɛɛt otoni o, ma araabjai, ma alotɛ ka kakatozek goo.
Mã oromtozeyaŋ niiga aneet, ma aavu zɔɔz onane ŋaatunooŋ, olla mã anyak gi ci arooŋnyu, ma ajinu Jook, ajowanu.
Mã abiirnu juruŋ, anyaak gi nici baaba diŋdiŋɔn. Ma izitu koca didi niiga nuyak cigan.
Ma naana kareezuŋ igeet kiyo areezan buk baaba aneet o. Uruktek zin zɔɔ looc reezinte can o.
Mã azuunu lotinok cigan o, urukteyu koca zɔɔ looc reezinte onan didi kiyo kazoonɛ naana lotinok o baaba, ma buk karuwei zɔɔ looc reezinte onin o.
Kaduwakuŋ zin naana zɔɔz nico o ka talniin onanɛ kaavu ŋaatunooŋ, ka zin talniin unooŋ kidikir.
Zɔɔz zin can kilotekuŋ ce. Ɛrɛɛztɔ niiga dook kiyo buk kareezuŋ naana igeet o.
Akɔm bodo reezinɛt ci adikir kujuk ci adaakni ɛɛti ŋaati laŋotigin.
Zin mã agoonu niiga kaal ci kilotekuŋ naana igeet o, izitu koca niiga laŋotigan didi.

Inoko zin alaŋaan naana kawuyuŋ bodo igeet iziti gabara, eeci gɔɔn gabarɛnti alaŋ aga gi ci agɔɔn alaani oninɛ. Bar zin inoko naana kutuwuŋ igeet iziti laŋotigan, eeci kuduwayuŋ igeet kaal o kaziikna ŋaati baaba dook.
Alaŋ aŋeranaŋ niiga aneet, bar aneet nɛɛn o kaŋeranuŋ igeet ka ɔɔtɔ ibiirta kɛbɛrɛ ci ɛɛl kodot. Ka zin kanyuŋ baaba igeet gi ci olla ajinu niiga nɔɔnɔ zaare ogan.
Inoko zin kilotekuŋ gi ci kanekuŋ nɛ, Ɛrɛɛztɔ niiga dook.”
Ma anek Yesu nuyak bodo nɛ, “Mã amarninuŋ lɔɔci igeet, agaac amaroyan rak baale ɔɔwa aneet.
Matɛ waan iziti ɔl ci looc nico, areezuŋ waan niini igeet, eeci eeginu ɔl cigin. Bar zin kɛŋɛrawuŋ naana igeet looce nico. Alaŋaan zin bodo eeginu ɔl cigin. Gi ci zin amarninuŋ lɔɔci igeet o nɛɛn.

Aada zɔɔz baal rak kaduwakuŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Akɔm gabaren ci adikir alaane cin e. Zin kiyo amarninan ɔl aneet o, buk tiŋeere amarninuŋ niigi igeet nɔkɔ. Mã da kuzuuti niigi zɔɔz can o, azooni waan buk koca niigi tiŋeere zɔɔz cunooŋ.
Agoonekuŋ zin niigi igeet kaal ci gɛr noko dook giye can, eeci alaŋ aga niigi eet o itoonanan aneet.
Mã da iŋaan kiiya kuduwak naana nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz o Joowo, alaŋ waan niigi aga anyak oŋɛ o. Bar zin inoko o ɔkɔma gɔl ci ka kadaŋti niigi oŋɛ ugeec.
Ma ɛɛti ci abornan aneet, abor buk niini baaba.

Inoko da iŋaan kutugu kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye o ŋaan laadun ɛɛti codoi ŋaatineeŋ kutugu, alaŋ waan niigi aga anyak oŋɛ o. Bar zin inoko icinit niigi kaal o kagoon, ma enico dook amartoyaŋ niigi aneet, ma amarnin buk baaba.
Zin agooni kaala nici o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal ayeedi waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, Amarninan niigi aneeta gaga nɔkɔ giye ci akɔm kɛŋ e.
Zin tiŋeere ma koowa naana ŋaati baaba, ŋaan kakɔ kitoonakuŋ igeet tiritoi ween Vɔŋiz o Joowo. Ma niini Vɔŋiz o aku ŋaati baaba nɛɛn. Ma ayelzak niini ɔl zɔɔz ween didi akanan aneet.
Zin buk niiga ŋaan eeginu bacok cigan, eeci koromtɛ naana kibeen igeet ŋinbaal kakunɛ e dook.”
Ma anek Yesu bodo nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kaduwakuŋ zin zɔɔz nico o, ka mã akunakuŋ igeet piryakzɛt calaŋ ooŋnu tuwɛn unooŋ.
Atookuŋ tiŋeere ɔl igeet ceezine o lotento. Ma buk aku tiŋeere iiteni ci arukuŋ ɔl igeet adaayit, ma bar abaaban niigi kizik aliŋliŋonek niigi Jook juruŋ giye ci arukuŋ igeet o.
Agoonekuŋ niigi kaal nicoko o, eeci alaŋ aga baaba, ma alaŋ agayan buk niigi aneet.
Zin kaduwakuŋ naana igeet kaal nicoko o, ka mã aku iiteni nica ka aada kuduwayuŋ baale naana igeet kaal nicoko laadun.
Ŋaan laadun rak baale kuduwayuŋ igeet kaal nicoko o, eeci karomɛ naana kibeen igeet.
Bar zin inoko ka kook naana ŋaati baaba o itoonanan aneet. Akɔm zin ŋaatunooŋ eet ci ka kijinan kizi nɛ, Akɔ dim ŋaa?
Inoko zin atiranyuŋ igeet zinzeeti o, eeci kanekuŋ nɛ, Kawɔ naana.
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, abon kawɔ naana ŋaatunooŋ, eeci mã alaŋ kawɔ, alaŋ koca akunakuŋ tiritoiti ween Vɔŋiz o Joowo. Bar zin mã kɔtɔwa, ŋaan kitoonakuŋ nɔɔnɔ kiiyayuŋ igeet.

Zin tiŋeere mã aku niini, ŋaan aku ayelek ɔl o loocu gi o otoozi niigi gɛrzɛ baciinowe ugeecik. Ma aku ayelek buk niini nɔɔgɔ kaal ugeec gɛr abaaban niigi bar kizik abon. Ka buk kiiya keyelek niini nɔɔgɔ gi o alaŋ agawi niigi payiin o Joowo ka kiiya.
Zin tiŋeere aku ayelzak Vɔŋiz o Joowo nɔɔgɔ baciinok o, eeci alaŋ atuyan niigi aneet.
Ayelzak buk tiŋeere niini nɔɔgɔ bonat onan giye o kakɔyɛ naana ŋaati baaba, ma alaŋ bodo acinaŋ niiga aneet been nɛɛn.
Ayelzak buk tiŋeere niini nɔɔgɔ gi o alaŋ agawi niigi payiin o Joowo, eeci alaan o abal looc nico apawozek nɔɔnɔ gerzitin laadun.
Kanyei zoozok ci meel karooŋ kuduwayuŋ, bar zin alaŋ rak niiga inoko o animnyu uzuuti zoozok nicoko.

Zin tiŋeere ma iiya Vɔŋizi o Joowo een didi, ŋaan aku ayelekuŋ niini igeet kaal nicoko dook. Alaŋ zin bar niini tiŋeere aku azɔɔz alaazete cin doon, bar aduwa tiŋeere niini kaal o aziikna ŋaati baaba, ma buk aku aduwakuŋ niini igeet kaal o ka kakatai dook.
Anyan niini aneet zany, eeci tiŋeere adoma zɔɔz onan, ma aduwakuŋ igeet.
Ma kaal o baaba dook kaal cigan. Gi zin ci kanekuŋ nɛ, Ŋaan adoma Vɔŋizi o Joowo kaal o kaduwai naana nɔɔnɔ, ma aku aduwakuŋ igeet o nɛɛn.”
Ma anek Yesu nuyak nɛ, “Inoko zin ŋintimiliny alaŋ acinaŋ rak niiga aneet, ma bodo ŋintimiliny ŋaan acinaŋ.”
Ma anɔ nuyawa oginɛ maany nɛ, “Ma dim azi nɛ, Ŋintimiliny alaŋ rak acinaŋ, ŋintimiliny ŋaan acinaŋ bodo o naa? Bodo buk azi nɛ, Kakɔ ŋaati baaba. Mayo zɔɔz nico kɛŋ cinɛ akati naa?
Gitaz ci anɛ nɛ, Ŋintimiliny, o? Alaŋ zin naaga kaga kɛŋ ci aduwak niini zɔɔz nico o.”
Maje Yesu aga nɔkɔ arɔɔŋ kijinit nɔɔnɔ kaal nicoko o. Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma dim gi ci ajinonu o gi ona kanɛ nɛ, Ŋintimiliny alaŋ rak acinaŋ, bodo ŋintimiliny ŋaan acinaŋ e nɛɛn?
Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, tiŋeere niiga aluyu, maje bar lɔɔci atalnɛ. Tiŋeere akanu culum, zin bar culum cunooŋ o ŋaan ookci kizi talniin.
Gɔɔn ŋaa mã ka kotoyai, aam dole, ma abalac ɔrɔɔt. Bar mazi akɔ ookcai, areyek bodo nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt we, ma atalnɛ labak, eeci otoyai.
Atobɔ zin buk gi nici kibeen igeet ci akanu culum inoko o. Ŋaan zin bodo kakɔ kabadakuŋ, ma iitene nice atalninu niiga ɔrɔɔt. Ma talniin nice akɔm eet oma ci ka kaamawuŋ igeet.
Ma iitene nice agayu niiga kaal dook, ma alaŋ bodo ajinaŋ aneet. Didilɛ kaduwakuŋ igeet, mã alam gi ci ajinu baaba zaare ogan, anyononekuŋ.
Zin laadun ŋaan akɔm gi ci ajinu niiga baaba zaare ogan zɛɛ been inoko o. Abon zin ajinu ka kanyozozeyuŋ, ka talniin unooŋ kizi appe.
Inoko gɔɔn kaduwakuŋ igeet kaal nicoko dook yabziinta. Bar zin tiŋeere aku iiteni calaŋ bodo kaduwakuŋ igeet kaal yabziinta, bar enice kabɔrakuŋ naana igeet zɔɔz o akati baaba kiziiyɛ labak.
Ma iitene nice ŋaan ajinu niiga baaba zaare ogan. Alaŋ kanekuŋ nɛ, Ka bodo kijineyuŋ baaba naana.
Eeci baaba areezuŋ igeet giye o buk niiga areezaŋ aneet, ma utuyaŋ kakun naana ŋaatin.
Kakun baale laadun naana ŋaati baaba. Kakunai looc. Bodo zin inoko ka kotoŋ looc kimiire kook ŋaati Baaba.”
Ma anek nuyawa oginɛ nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko zin ɔbɔra zoozok calaŋ aduwa yabziinta.
Inoko zin didi kagayin aga niina kaal dook. Akɔm zin bodo eet ci ka kijinin ineet gi ci ajinin. Mazin giye nico kutuyin naana iiya da didi niina Joowa.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Inoko utuyowu?
Ŋaan zin aku iiteni, ma bar buk inoko o ibilun tɔ laadun, azaanoneku tiŋeere niiga dook korogjok ugooc, ma adotekaŋ looc aneet doon. Alaŋ zin bar kaavɛ naana doon, eeci karomena kibeen baaba.
Kaduwakuŋ naana igeet zɔɔz nico o, ka anyayit ganɔn ŋaati aromonekaŋ niiga aneet. Agiduŋ tiŋeere lɔɔci igeet. Bar zin odoyit, eeci agayu kɔmɔga naana looc.”
Mazi adotiz Yesu zooze nico, adɔŋ kɛbɛrɛ ki tammu taden, ma azi nɛ, “Baaba, inoko zin iiya iiteni. Anyek zin ŋɛɛrun diŋdiŋɔn ka buk kanyin niini ineet diŋdiŋɔn.
Eeci anyan niina aneet alaazɛt ci ka kabali ɔl dook, ka kanyek naana rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn ɔl baal anyan niina aneet e.
Zin rogɛt o abil kodot nɛɛn gi o ka kagayin ɔl dook ineet doon een niina Jook ween didi, ma buk agayan niigi aneet keen naana Kiristo baal itoonanan niina.
Ma zin naana keyeliza diŋdiŋɔn unun loota giye o kidicayɛ liŋliŋɔn baal anyan aneet kutugu e.
Baaba, inoko zin nyan diŋdiŋɔn o abil ŋume unun kiyo baale gɔɔn anyan laadun iŋaan kɛtɛɛnyai lɔɔci e.
Inoko zin keyelizawin ineet ole baal aŋɛra, ma anyan aneet loota ŋina e. Niigi laadun ɔl cugun, ma anyan niina aneet. Uzuuti zin niigi zɔɔz unun.
Ma inoko agaac niigi kaal o anyan niina aneet dook kaal ugun.
Kuduwaya zin naana nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz baal anyan e. Agamta zin, makacin agaac niigi didi kakun naana ŋaatun, ma utuyɔ itoonanan didi aneet niina.
Kaŋaryonei zin naana nɔɔgɔ. Alaŋ bar kaŋaryonei looc, bar kaŋaryonei nɔɔgɔ baal anyan niina aneet e, eeci een niigi ɔl cugun.
Ma kaala oganɛ dook kaal cugun. Maje buk kaala ugune dook kaal cigan. Eyelizai zin diŋdiŋɔni onanɛ ŋaatineeŋ.

Inoko zin naana kakunakin ineet. Alaŋaan bodo kaavɛ loota, bar aavtiyɔ loota niigi doon. Baaba onan adiŋdiŋ, zooti zin niina nɔɔgɔ ci baal anyan aneet o juruŋ dɔyize o zaar ugun ka buk niigi kodoye kiyo kadoye naana kibeen ineet o.

Ma ŋinbaal ŋaan karomena naana ki nɔɔgɔ e, kozootɛ nɔɔgɔ ci baal anyan aneet o juruŋ zaare ugun. Kozootɛ nɔɔgɔ dook, ma akɔm codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci akoloni, bar akoloni ɛɛti baal laadun aduyai waragɛwa e doon ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz unune.
Inoko zin naana kakunakin ineet. Ma zin kaal nicoko kaduwa loota ŋina o ka kanyayit niigi talniin onan zinzeetine ugeec kizi appe.
Kanyeya naana nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz unun. Ma amarɔi lɔɔci nɔɔgɔ, eeci alaŋ niigi een ɔl ci loocu, kiyo buk naana alaŋ keen eet ci loocu o.
Alaŋ zin bar kajinin ineet ka aara nɔɔgɔ loota ŋina, bar kajinin o ka bɛk nɔɔgɔ juruŋ Loryenta.
Kiyo naana alaŋ keen eet ci loocu o, buk niigi alaŋ eegin ɔl ci loocu.
Anyek nɔɔgɔ kizi ɔl cugun zooze unun een didi.
Kitooneya zin buk naana nɔɔgɔ loocok kiyo buk itoonanan niina aneet kiiyak looc o.
Kanyin zin naana ɛlɛ can o ineet ka korogoz nɔɔgɔ, ka kiziti niigi ɔl cugun zooze unun een didi.
Alaŋ zin kaŋaryonei nuyak nicoko doon, bar buk kaŋaryonei ɔl o tiŋeere avu agama zɔɔz onan ŋaatineeŋ.
Baaba, anyek nɔɔgɔ dook kodoye, kiyo kadoye buk naana kibeen ineet o. Ka kagaac ɔl o loocu didi itoonanan niina aneet.
Kanyeya naana nɔɔgɔ diŋdiŋɔn ci atobɔ kibeen o anyan niina aneet, ka zin buk niigi kodoye kiyo kadoye naana kibeen ineet o.
Kaavɛ naana ŋaatineeŋ kiyo buk aavɛ niina ŋaatan o. Ka zin kodoye niigi kiyo buk kadoye naaga o, ka kagaac ɔl o loocu itoonanan niina, ma areez niina nɔɔgɔ kiyo buk areezan aneet o.

Baaba, ineet nɛɛn o anyan aneet ɔl nicoko. Karooŋ zin nɔɔgɔ ka koromtewa ki aneet ŋaao kaavɛ naana ka kicinit niigi diŋdiŋɔn onan baal anyan e, eeci laadun areezan niina aneet iŋaan lɔɔci kɛtɛɛnyai e.
Baaba, ineet nɛɛn o agoon kaal dook kobonta. Ma bar alaŋ ɔl o loocu agayin ineet. Bar kagayin naana doon. Ma agaac buk ɔl nicigi itoonanan didi niina.
Inoko zin keyelizaya zaar ugun nɔɔgɔ, ma ŋaan kamɛna kagoon nɔkɔ, ka buk reezinɛt o areezan niina aneet kibil ŋaatineeŋ, ma buk naana kaavɛ ŋaatineeŋ.”
Mazi akɔ odotiz Yesu ŋaryiinta, itiŋgazɔ niini kibeen nuyak ogin ɔtɔɔzɔ, ma avɔ abaayiz nyarat o kazi Kidiron. Anyak ŋinaante mana, ma avɔ Yesu kibeen nuyak ogin mane nico eecitɔ.
Maje Judaz baal ka kiiya kataalɔi Yesu e aga ŋinite, eeci gɔɔn waanice Yesu kibeen nuyak alotɛ ŋinaante.
Ook ni Judaz ŋinaante ɔrkɔr ki takirnya kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn abɛk ceez o Joowo. Itoona nɔɔgɔ ɔl o Parici kibeen alaat o ceez o Joowo. Anyak niigi azɛɛnɛn tɔlit kibeen dilanya.
Maje Yesu aga kaal ci ka kivita kutuguzozek nɔɔnɔ o nɔkɔ. Mazi avu arum niigi mana, iiyak Yesu nɔɔgɔ, ma anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyu dim ŋɛnɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Karooŋnya Yesu o Nazarɛt.”
Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aneeta ɛlɛ nɛɛn nici.”
Maje Judaz o ka kataalɔi Yesu e, aromɛ kibeen nɔɔgɔ.
Mazi anek Yesu nɛ, “Aneeta ɛlɛ nɛɛn nici,” amiiri niigi kivurut, ma aruk looc.
Bodo ni ajin Yesu nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyu dim ŋɛnɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Yesu o Nazarɛt.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ma uyen kanekuŋ nɛ, Aneeta nɛɛn nici. Matɛ arooŋnyaŋ aneet, anycek rak nuyak ci karomena o kɔtɔɔzɔ.”
Aduwa niini gi nico o ka kɛlɛɛm giye baal anɛ nɛ, “Baaba, akɔm eet ci kakuluz ole baal anyan e.”
Maje Saiman Pitɔr anyak kabaz ci wun, ma avoca tibila, ma aruk gabaren ci alaan o ceez o Joowo kɛtɛɛda itat ci azo o vɔc. Kazi zaar ci gabaren nico o nɛ Malkos.
Ma anek Yesu Pitɔr nɛ, “Bil. Yizek kabaz cun noko tibil. Abaaban niina kizik bar ŋaatun kaŋole naana piryakzɛt ci baal laadun anyan baaba ka kipirai o?”
Enico odomta takirnya kibeen alaan uneeŋ kibeen ɔl o gɔɔn abɛk ceez o Joowo agamit Yesu, ma acap azɛɛn.
Ma avɔyi rak ɔɔwa alaane o kazi Anas ween baati dole o ariyi Kayavas. Maje Kayavas alaan ci ceez o Joowo irkite nice.
Ma zin Kayavas eet baal ilot alaat o Juz anek nɛ, “Abon adaai ɛɛti codoi ole o Juz ka kirigizit ɔl o Juz dook rogɛt,” e nɛɛn.
Oneec ni Saiman Pitɔr kibeen nuyai oma Yesu. Mazi avɔyi ɔl Yesu korge ci alaano o, ook buk nuyaiti ɔlɔ nici eecitɔ, eeci ɛɛti ci korgu o aga nuyai nico.
Maje Pitɔr abil bitaala ajɔŋɔz araan. Ma amiironek nuyaiti ona akɔ kɔrga eecitɔ e araan tatok, ma akɔ aduwak dole o abɛk araan kɔkɔla Pitɔr kiiyak kɔrɔk kɛŋ.
Ma ajin dole nici Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Alaŋ buk niina een nuyai ci eet nico?”
Bar abɛdɛkɛ Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm, alaŋ keen nuyai cin.”
Maje baaline nice alal laju ɔrɔɔt. Ma adoma gabara ki ɔl o abeke avaat goo ci aavtiyɛ zɔlɔmɔi. Ma aku aromonek buk Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ, ma abilnek goo.
Ma ŋinaanto ijinun Anas Yesu kaal ci akati nuyak ogin kibeen demziin onin.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Kabora gɔɔn naana zɔɔz ɔl dook kebereca labak, ma kademez gɔɔn ɔl tup ceezine o lotento kibeen ceeze o Joowo gɔɔn alotɛn ɔl o Juz. Akɔm laadun naana gi ci kaŋomoti been nɛɛn.
Mazin yo ajinan aneet? Bar jin ɔl o gɔɔn aziiŋnan aneet ŋaati kazɔɔzɛ kaal o kaduwai nɔɔgɔ, eeci aga niigi kaal ogan kaduwa.”
Mazi aduwa Yesu zɔɔz nico, apanun ɛɛti codoi ole ci ona abɛk nɔɔnɔ o voret, ma anek nɛ, “Aduwai alaan ci ceez ci Joowo adikir o gi nico?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Mã anyak gi ci kabaci, duwak ɔl dook ŋina kiziiyit gi ci kabaci o. Mazi akɔm gi ci gɛr kaduwa, arukan zin naa?”
Enico itoonek Anas Yesu Kayavas ween alaan o ceez o Joowo, maje azɛɛna ŋaan acabje nɔkɔ.
Mazi ŋaan abilnek Pitɔr goo nɔkɔ, ijinit bodo ɔl ogɛnɛ nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Alaŋ een buk niina nuyai ci eet nico?”
Bar adaŋnyi Pitɔr azi nɛ, “Akɔm! Alaŋ keen naana nuyai cin.”
Maje ŋinaante buk anyak gabaren ci alaan o ceez o Joowo ceen gɔtɔni eet ona atɛɛda Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ itat e. Ma ajin niini Pitɔr anek nɛ, “Alaŋ een ineet nɛɛn o kacinuŋ ki nɔɔnɔ mana e?”
Bodo ni adaŋnyi Pitɔr azi nɛ, “Akɔm, alaŋ een aneet.” Enico orowun toloci.

Ma ŋeere ririwɔna uduntai ɔl Yesu ceeze o Kayavas, iiya itoontek niigi nɔɔnɔ alaan o Jerusalɛm een Romen kazi Pailat. Ivita ni alaata o Juz, ma avu ɛɛl kɔrɔk kɛŋa, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi kanyaaktak eleeti ririny gɛrzɛ ŋaan alam nɔɔgɔ ŋaati avɔ adayi dayiin o aadanɛ iiten o vardaŋinto.
Ma akunak Pailat nɔɔgɔ bitaala, ma aku anek nɛ, “Ma dim eet nico anyaakaŋ o agɔɔn naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Matɛ waan kɔkɔma gi ci gɛr agɔɔn, alaŋ waan kanyaakin ineet.”
Ma anek Pailat nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ooti zin nɔɔnɔ ka ɔɔt apayit niiga alya lotinowe o kɛɛranɛ ugooc.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ gɔɔn naaga kaganona ŋaati karuka ɔl kadaayitɔ.”
Ma gi nici akanai o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz baal aduwa Yesu akati daayiz onin ka kadaai keete ween talakec e.
Imiirozek Pailat ceez, ma awa Yesu, ma aku ajin anek nɛ, “Ineet alaan o Juz nɛɛn?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma dim gi nico ajinan niinalya, yo anyak da eet ci aduwakin kaal ci akanan aneet?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Pailat nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ keen naana eet ci Juz. Ɔl ugun maany kibeen alaat o ceez o Joowo nɛɛn ci anyaanin ineet ŋina o. Ma laadun abaca naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Alaŋ baliin cane abil loota ŋina. Matɛ kibil ŋina, alaminan waan nuyawa ogane calaŋ agamnyan alaata ci Juz o. Bar zin inoko o alaŋ baliin cane abil ŋina.”
Ma ajin Pailat bodo Yesu anek nɛ, “Een zin bɔŋ alaan ci adikir?”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Didi zin. Abil kiyo aduwa niina o. Keen naana alaan. Karitai laadun, ma kakunai looc nico o ka kuuwak zɔɔz ween didi. Ma zin ɛɛti ci agama zɔɔz ween didi azii niini zɔɔz onan.”
Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma zɔɔz ceen didi o nɛɛn gitaz?”
Enico udun Pailat ook ole o Juz e bitaala, ma akɔ anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa eete nico ka kapayɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz.
Ma zin keere unooŋ ɔl o Juz gɔɔn laadun kaborcakuŋ igeet eet codoi ole o acabje iitene o lotɛn o vardaŋinto. Mayo zin inoko arooŋnyu koborocayuŋ alaan cunooŋ adikir o?”
Bar agɛrɛny niigi dook anɔ nɛ, “Akɔm! Má aborca nɔɔnɔ! Bar borocayet Barabas.” Maje Barabas nici waanice niini agoryai ci acabje zooze ci aami ɔl kaal.
Anyek ni Pailat Yesu takirnya korooyit nɔɔnɔ.
Ma agɔɔna takirnya nyagirgir ceen bila, ma aborcɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ ɔɔ, ma bodo aborcɛkɛ rum ci meeri ɛlɛ.
Ma avunak nɔɔnɔ, ma amomoz anek nɛ, “Rogɔ bai kodot alaan o Juz adikir.” Maje bodo ŋaato apan voret azɛɛnɛn.
Ma amiironek bodo Pailat ɔl dook bitaala, ma akɔ anek nɛ, “Iziiyit di, ŋaan kanyaakuŋ Yesu ka agaac akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa ŋaatin ka kapayɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz.”
Uduna ni Yesu bitaalin. Maje ɔɔwa anyak nyagirgir ceen bila noko, ma anyak rum ci meeri noko alya. Ma aku anek Pailat ɔl nɛ, “Icinit di, eet nɛɛn nici.”
Mazi acin alaata o ceez o Joowo kibeen bɛkcok o ceez o Joowo Yesu, egerenyit izitɔ nɛ, “Otodeec nɔɔnɔ! Otodeec nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec?”
Ma anek Pailat nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ooti ka ɔɔt otodeec nɔɔnɔ niiga alya, eeci akɔm naana gi ci gɛr kajowa ŋaatin ka kapayɛkɛ nɔɔnɔ daayiz.”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ ɔl o Juz Pailat anek nɛ, “Kanyaka naaga lotinok cigaacak. Mazin lotinowe ogaacak aganɔ niini ki daayiz, eeci anyek ɛlɛ kizi ŋɛɛrti Joowo.”
Mazi azii Pailat zɔɔz nico, anyawun niini ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt.
Ma bodo amiironek ceez, ma akɔ ajin Yesu anek nɛ, “Ma dim laadun niina akun ŋaaḏaŋ?”
Maje Yesu ajaki, ma ŋaan kabarzek nɔɔnɔ.
Ma anek Pailat nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ arooŋ zoozeyan? Alaŋ agayan kanyei alaazɛt ci kaborcanin kibeen ci kadodoyin keete ween talakec o?”

Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ma da iŋaan kanyozeyin ineet alaazɛt nici Joowa, akɔmnin waan alaazɛt cun ŋaatan. Mazin giye nico ɛɛti o ataalinan aneet ŋaatun, anyak niini oŋec ci adikir ɔrɔɔt kujuk oŋec cun o.”

Mazi azii Pailat zɔɔz nico, ɔrɔɔŋ niini gɔl ci ka kɔɔgai nɔɔnɔ. Maje bar ɔl o Juz agerenyek Pailat anek nɛ, “Mã ɔɔga nɔɔnɔ, alaŋ koca bodo niina een laŋoti alaan o Rom adikir. Eeci ɛɛti ci anyek ɛlɛ kizi alaan ci adikir, amarnin niini alaan o Rom adikir.”
Mazi azii Pailat zɔɔz nico, udunai Yesu bitaalin, ma akɔ aavi niini loota lecere o roonnyo ŋaati agirgir. Kazi ŋinito zooze o Juz nɛ Gabaza.
Maje waanice ŋaan iiteni codoi ɔɔwa ka kizi iiten o lotɛn o vardaŋinto. Maje ii ibilun boloca. Ma anek Pailat ɔl o Juz nɛ, “Alaan zin unooŋ adikir ce.”
Ma agerenyek niigi Pailat anek nɛ, “Ruk kadaak! Ruk kadaak! Tɔdɔ nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec?”
Ma ajin Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Arooŋnyaŋ dim aneet kɔtɔdɔ alaan cunooŋ adikir o keete ween talakec?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ alaata o ceez o Joowo nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Kanyaka naaga alaan o Rom adikir doon. Alaŋ een ɛɛti nici alaan cinaaŋ adikir?”
Enico odoma Pailat Yesu anyewun nɔɔgɔ ka kɔɔt kotodooc nɔɔnɔ talakeca.
Agamit ni takirnya Yesu.
Ma aduŋnan niigi nɔɔnɔ bitaalin, ma anyek kitik kɛɛt ceen talakec. Ma akɔyi zɛɛ been ŋinti kazi Golgoza. Ma kɛŋ ci zɔɔz nico o zooze o Juz kazi nɛ Amɛn ci Oowu.
Ma ŋinaante otodooc niigi Yesu keete ween talakec. Ma buk bodo adɔdɔ niigi ɔl ceen ram keene ceen talakɛn Yesu libirɔi. Maje Yesu adɔdi nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna.
Ma ayɛɛt Pailat zɔɔz keete ci zabal, ma arek kɛɛt nico gɔɔn ceen talakec o tadena. Azi zɔɔz nici nɛ, “Nici Yesu o Nazarɛt ween alaan o ɔl o Juz adikir.”
Ma akɛɛp ɔl ci meel ole o Juz zɔɔz nico, eeci ŋinti adodinɛ Yesu o ajɔŋzɔ kibeen Jerusalɛm. Ma zɔɔz nici ayeedi zooze o ɔl o Juz kibeen zooze o ɔl o Rom kibeen zooze o ɔl ween Garik.
Ma anek alaata o ceez o Joowo Pailat nɛ, “Má ayeedi azi nɛ, Alaan ci Juz adikir, bar tɛyɛɛt izi nɛ, Azi ɛɛti nici nɛ, Keen naana alaan ci Juz adikir.”
Ma bar abɛdɛkɛ Pailat nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ma gi ci kɛtɛyɛɛda naana, ibilun nɔkɔ.”

Mazi akɔ adɔdɔ takirnya Yesu, odomta eŋerit niigi rumanɛ ogin lak wec. Ma adoma gɔɔn takirɛnti ceeni akɔyi cigin. Ma adoma buk niigi rum onin adikir malkinto. Maje rum nici adoye ṯɔr nɔkɔ calaŋ aloli.

Ma anɔ takirnya nɛ, “Alaŋ rum nico karɛɛc, bar kutuguz maadico, ma anyak eet ci iinak ka kooyi kizi cin.” Ma gi nici agooni o ka kɛlɛɛm zɔɔz o aduyai waragewe o Joowo azi nɛ, “Eŋeryek niigi rumanɛ ogan eleeti. Ma agɔɔn maadico rume onan malkinto adikir.” Zin gi nico agɔɔn takirnya.
Maje yaati Yesu ki ŋɔɔni yaatin ki Meri ween ŋaa o Kilopas kibeen Meri o aku kuture o Magdala ɛɛl niigi ajɔŋɔz kɛɛt ceen talakec adodinɛ Yesu o.
Mazi acin Yesu yaatin kibeen nuyai o gɔɔn arɛɛz niini ɛɛl ŋinaante, enek niini yaatin nɛ, “Yaai, inoko nuyaiti nici izi ŋɛɛrun.”
Ma bodo anek niini nuyai nico nɛ, “Nicini yaatun.” Zin iitene nice ɛlɛ odoma nuyaiti nici ooyi Meri ole onin ɔɔt abaayit ki nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante.
Ma vurta mazi agawun Yesu odot liŋliŋɔnti oninɛ, izi nɛ, “Arukan kɔr.” Aduwa niini nɔkɔ o, ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo.
Maje ŋinaante anyak kodooc ci abiz nyaani ci amokcar ɔrɔɔt. Ma ajukek niigi nyaan nici tovot, ma itoonɛkɛ Yesu otok moroka.
Mazi atar Yesu nyaan nico, izi nɛ, “Inoko zin odota.” Ma aliba ɔɔ, ma adaai.

Ijinit ni alaata o Juz Pailat ka kanyek nɔɔgɔ kuduulit ɔl ci ona adɔdi talakɛni o zɔɔ ka kadaayitɔ kataman ka kaaryak looc, eeci alaŋ arɔɔŋ niigi ɔl keelit kɛɛni zɛɛ been iiten ween Sabit, eeci Sabit nica iiten ci adiŋdiŋ ɔrɔɔt.
Uduulit ni takirnya zɔɔ ci ɔl ceen ram ona adɔdi kibeen Yesu o.
Mazi bar avunak Yesu, icinit niigi nɔɔnɔ adaawun. Otoŋit ni nɔɔnɔ calaŋ aduul zɔɔ.
Ma akat takirɛnti codoi Yesu libir dilawa kudunta maama kibeen biye.
(Aneet zin Jɔn o kicina kaal nicoko nɛɛn ci kaduwa zɔɔz nico o, ka buk niiga utuyɔ. Ma kaal ci kaduwa naana o ɛɛl didi tɔ, ma kaga buk naana kaduwa kaal ci alɛɛmnyai.)
Ma kaala nici agooni o ka kɛlɛɛmɛ zɔɔz o aduwa waragɛwi o Joowo. Eeci azi waragɛwi o Joowo nɛ, “Akɔm amene ogin codoi aduuli.”
Bodo azi waragɛwi ŋaaman nɛ, “Acin bodo katin ɔl eet baal akat niigi dilawa e.”

Mazi ɛtɛɛt Yesu, iiya ɛɛti ci kazi Josev ci kutur o kazi Arimatiya. Josev nici waanice nuyai ci Yesu, ma ŋaan bar kɔbɔra tuwɛn onin, eeci aŋole niini alaat o Juz. Iiya ni niini, ma ajin Pailat ka kanyek ɛlɛ o Yesu. Anyewun ni Pailat nɔɔnɔ kooyi ɛlɛ o Yesu labak. Zin didi ook odoma Josev ɛlɛ o Yesu.
Maje buk Nikodimos baal akunak Yesu baal e ɔrkɔra kibeen Josev. Anyaa niini kaal ci meel aŋɔl madiz kiyo karkari o ci kazi zaar nɛ mir kibeen alo.
Odomta ni niigi dook ramana ɛlɛ o Yesu. Ma anyaa rum o gɔɔn abuŋi ɔl gɔnɔgi o adaai, ma aḏuutek karkar nico, ma atakucek ɛlɛ o Yesu. Agɔɔn niigi nɔkɔ o, eeci nici kɛɛr ci ɔl o Juz.
Maje ŋaati baal adodinɛ Yesu o anyak mana ci anyak bɔɔt ci jɔr ŋaan adayai ci ŋaan laadun karyek ɔl eet ci adaai.
Ɔɔt ni aryek niigi Yesu ŋinite, eeci bɔɔt nica ajɔŋzɔ ki ŋinti ona adodinɛ Yesu o. Ma buk ibil iiteni codoi ka tiŋeere kizi iiten ween Sabit.
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna iitene o yubzento, ook Meri o kutur o Magdala boote ci baal arek ɔl Yesu o. Mazi akɔ arum niini ŋinite, acin bɛ baal anyoogi ɔl bɔɔt otok e ipiyai bɔɔt otoga.
Ɔdɔkɔny ni niini kataman ook ŋaati Saiman Pitɔr kibeen nuyai o gɔɔn arɛɛz Yesu. Ma akɔ anek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Aarya ɔl ɛlɛ o Manyi bɔɔta, bar zin alaŋ kagaya naaga ŋinti ɔɔt aryek niigi nɔɔnɔ o.”
Ma iŋaaz Saiman Pitɔr kibeen nuyai nico, ma adɔkɔny avɔ bɔɔta.
Maje nuyaiti nici tiir ŋaati Saiman Pitɔr, makacin ook arawun bɔɔt niini ɔɔwa.
Ma agiriiny bɔɔt ŋaati abilni niini bitaala calaŋ akɔ eecitɔ. Ma acin rum baal atakucek ɔl ɛlɛ o Yesu e doon.
Onowa ni Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ, ma aku akɔ niini bɔɔta eecitɔ enico ɛlɛ. Ma acin rum baal atakucek ɔl ɛlɛ o Yesu e ɔɔŋ loota.
Maje buk rum baal atakucek ɔl Yesu ɔɔ e anyomɛ juruŋ, ma aronek looc kɛdɛyai gɔna.
Ook ni nuyaiti ona ajaar Pitɔr e bɔɔta eecitɔ buk. Mazi acin kaal nicoko, agawun niini itiŋa Yesu daayiza didi.
Ma bar ŋaan niigi kagaac zɔɔz o ayeedi waragewe o Joowo akati ŋaazi o Yesu daayiza nɔkɔ.
Ma enico imiirte nuyawa nici ɔɔtɔ korgine ugeec.
Maje Meri ŋaan abil bɔɔt otoga alu. Mazi ululi ka kigiriiny bɔɔt eecitɔ ŋaati aluwi nɔkɔ,
acin bar toonnyak ci tammo een ram bɔɔta eecitɔ. Anyak niigi rumane ci vɔɔr pɛr, ma aavtiz niigi ŋaabaal arek ɔl Yesu e. Aavi codoi libire ci oowu o, maje codoi aavi libire ci zoonu o.
Ma ajin niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaa nico, alu naa?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ anek nɛ, “Ooti ɔl ɛlɛ o Manyi onan, bar zin alaŋ kaga ŋinti ɔɔt aryek niigi nɔɔnɔ o.”
Aduwa gi nico mazi abuudi, bar acin Yesu abil. Ma bar alaŋ niini aga een Yesu o.
Ma ajin Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ŋaa nico, alu naa? Arooŋ ŋɛnɛɛn?”
Ma bar abaaban niini anyek kizi eet ci aliŋliŋ mane nico, ma anek nɛ, “Manygɔn, mã akɔyɛ ɛlɛ o Manyi onan niina, duwayan da ŋinti ari o ka kook kodoma.”
Ma awo Yesu nɔɔnɔ zaar azi nɛ, “Meri.”
Mazi ookci Meri, acin Yesu, ma anek nɛ, “Robonai,” o akati kɛŋ cinɛ alaan o demziinto.

Ma bar anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Má atorkodan, eeci ŋaan rak kamiire kook ŋaati baaba. Bar bitɔ duwak gɔtɔnɔga ween nuyak enek nɔɔgɔ nɛ, Kamiire kakɔ ŋaati baaba ween buk baatunooŋ ween Jook onan, ma een buk Jook unooŋ.”
Imiiri ni Meri, ma akɔ aduwak nuyak gi o icini niini Yesu kibeen kaal dook ona aduwak Yesu nɔɔnɔ e.
Ma iitene nice yomana ulute nuyawa ŋaatodoi, ma anyoogek eleeti ceez, eeci aŋole niigi alaat o Juz. Iiyak ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ boyoŋyoŋ, ma abil nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna. Ma azaa anek nɛ, “Ibil ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ.”
Mazi adotiz zaawinta, eyelek niini nɔɔgɔ azɛɛn kibeen libir ŋinbaal akanɛ e. Mazi acin nuyawa nɔɔnɔ, ataltɔ ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.
Ma bodo anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ibil ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ. Zin kiyo buk itoonanan baaba aneet o, kitoonuŋ buk naana igeet.”
Mazi adotiz zooze nico, ovoŋek nɔɔgɔ vɔŋiz, ma anek nɛ, “Agamta zin Vɔŋiz o Joowo.
Mã ooŋneku niiga ɔl baciinok ugeec, ooŋnek buk Jooi nɔɔgɔ. Bar mã alaŋ ooŋneku nɔɔgɔ baciinok ugeec, alaŋ buk Jooi ooŋnek nɔɔgɔ baciinok ugeec.”
Ma iitene ci baal ayelzakɛ Yesu nuyak ɛlɛ neke, azee Tomaz o kazi codengɔn tɔ. Niini buk nuyai codoi nuyawe ween amɔtɔ ram.
Mazi akɔ aku niini, uduktak nuyawa nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Kicinta uyen Manyi Yesu.”

Ma bar anek niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Mã ŋaan kicin tobɛ baal akani ɔl nɔɔnɔ azɛɛn lotomarete e, ma kuum naana alya azeene ogan, ma buk kari aziit tobɛn baal akat ɔl libira e, alaŋ bai kagama zɔɔz cunooŋ o been nɛɛn.”

Mazi avɔ iinya ceen torgɛrɛm, ulute nuyawa ŋaatodoi bodo, ma anyoogek eleeti ceez eecitɔ. Maje Tomaz aavi tɔ. Iiya ni Yesu nɔɔgɔ boyoŋyoŋ, ma abil nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna. Ma azaa azi nɛ, “Ibil ganɔn ŋaatunooŋ.”
Ma anek Yesu Tomaz nɛ, “Ija, uum azɛɛn cigan o ka cin. Zuwek buk aziit cun o tobɛn baal akanan ɔl libira e. Má ŋaan bodo een bakbak, bar tuwɔ.”
Ɛbɛdɛkɛ ni Tomaz nɔɔnɔ enek nɛ, “Een didi niina Manyi onan, ma een Jook onan.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Utuwɔ o, eeci icinan. Bar zin abil mayuwɛnɛt ole o atuwe iŋaan kicintan.”
Ma agɔɔn Yesu kaal oogi ci meel atɛɛt ɔl biye nuyak kɛbɛrɛn. Ma kaal nicoko ogɛn ŋaan keteyeede waragewe nico.
Ma zin kaal o ayeedi waragewe nico ayeedi o ka mã atuyu Yesu Kiristo ween ŋɛɛrti Joowo ka ojokta niiga rogɛt o abil been nɛɛn zaare ogin.
Ma vurta eyelizak bodo Yesu ɛlɛ nuyak ogin liile o kazi Tiberas.
Ma waanice aromɛ Saiman Pitɔr, ki Tomaz ween coden, ki Natanyɛl o kutur o kazi Kana abil looce o Galili, ki aneeta Jɔn, ki Jemis o keegina lɔgɔz o Zebedi, ki nuyak oogi ceen ram.
Ma anek Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Kakɔ naana detiin liila.”
Ma anek niigi nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Korkorit naaga dook.” Otoodit ni niigi dook kavool ɔɔtɔ detiin. Bar baalin nice dook akɔm kuluk ci agam kina.
Ma ŋeere ririwɔna iiya Yesu, ma aku abil liil otoga, maje bar nuyawa ŋaan niigi kiyezit nicini Yesu o.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Lɔgɔzɛ, akɔm dim kuluk ci agamnu?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ niigi nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Akɔm kina.”
Enek ni niini nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ujuktek di cabak kavool libir ci azo o ka agamta kuluk.” Mazi ajukek niigi cabak ŋinito, agamun cabai kuluk ci meel ɔrɔɔt calaŋ anim niigi kutugurta.

Ma anek nuyaiti o gɔɔn arɛɛz Yesu Pitɔr nɛ, “Nicini ri Manyi gi.” Mazi azii Saiman Pitɔr zɔɔz nico, odoma rum onin, ma aborcek ɛlɛ, ma iinak liil, eeci uyen aavi niini ŋaḏinyiny, ma ook ni niini ŋaati Yesu.
Maje kavooli ɔjɔŋɔz dɔwɔn, ma awɔla nuyawa ceegi kavool, maje ŋaato agura cabak ona abiz kuluga e, ma avunak dɔwɔn.
Mazi atɔɔdak niigi dɔwɔn, amada zɔlɔmɔ ci agam goo ci anyak kulugit kibeen ḏokoc.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Anyaakta kuluk oogi kuluge ci ona agamanu noko.”
Ma akɔ Pitɔr kavoola, ma akɔ agurak cabak dɔwɔn. Maje cabak abiz kuluga ci adikir een eet tur ki eet ram kamɔtɔ ki tiin iiyu (153), maje bar cabai ŋaan kɛrɛɛci.
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ivita, adaktɔ.” Ma akɔm eet codoi nuyawɛ ci ka kijin nɔɔnɔ kenek nɛ, “Ineeta ŋɛnɛɛn?” Eeci agaac niigi niini Manyi gi.
Ook ni Yesu gooya, ma adoma ḏokoc, ma anyek nɔɔgɔ. Bodo adoma kuluk, ma anyek buk nɔɔgɔ.
Enico izi lak iiyu ci ayelzakɛ Yesu ɛlɛ nuyak ogin vurte baal itiŋawi niini daayiza e.
Mazi adotiz niigi dayiinta, enek Yesu Saiman Pitɔr nɛ, “Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔn, inoko dim areezan didi niina aneet ɔrɔɔt jukɔ gonogu nicoko dook?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, Manyi. Aga ri niina kareezin naana ineet didi o nɔkɔ.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zooti zin aza cigan noko juruŋ.”
Bodo abadaki Yesu nɔɔnɔ jinɛn we ɛlɛ anek nɛ, “Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔn, inoko dim areezan didi?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Saiman Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Ii, Manyi. Aga ri niina kareezin naana ineet o nɔkɔ.”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zooti zin aza cigan noko juruŋ.”
Bodo ni anek Yesu Saiman Pitɔr eceen lak iiyu o nɛ, “Saiman ŋɛɛrti Jɔn, inoko dim niina areezan didi?”
Enico itiranyun Pitɔr ziniz, eeci ijinun Yesu nɔɔnɔ zɛɛ been lak iiyu. Enek ni niini Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, aga kaal dook niina, ma aga kareezin naana ineet didi o nɔkɔ.”
Enek ni bodo Yesu nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Zooti zin aza cigan noko juruŋ.

Didilɛ kaduwakin ineet, baale gɔɔn maŋaan een logoz e, iŋaaz niina, ma acabei rum unun, ma akɔ ŋaati olla arooŋ tɛ niina biti. Bar zin tiŋeere ma izɛ matuwoc, acabjin ɛɛti oman ineet azɛɛn, ma akoyin ŋaati alaŋ arooŋ niina biti.”
Ma zooze nico aduwa Yesu daayiz o katin adaaŋni Pitɔr ka kanyakɛ niini Jook diŋdiŋɔn.
Uduwa ni niini gi nico, ma anek Pitɔr nɛ, “Nowawan zin.”

Mazi abuudi Pitɔr, acin nuyai o gɔɔn arɛɛz Yesu anowa nɔɔgɔ vurta. Nici zin nuyai baal ajɔŋzɔ kibeen Yesu, ma ajin nɔɔnɔ iiten baal adayi niigi dayiin o baalinu anek nɛ, “Ŋɛnɛɛn ci dim ka kataaloyin ineet o?” E nɛɛn.
Mazi acin Pitɔr nɔɔnɔ, enek Yesu nɛ, “Manyi, ma dim tiŋeere ɛɛti ceeni abil ku?”
Ma abɛdɛkɛ Yesu nɔɔnɔ anek nɛ, “Matɛ karooŋ naana nɔɔnɔ korok zɛɛ ma kabada katin, kazi cun nɛ? Ija niina nowawan ineet labak.”
Mazi azii nuyawa zɔɔz nico, abaabanit niigi izitɔ nɛ, “Alaŋaan tiŋeere nuyaiti nici adaai.” Maje bar Yesu alaŋ azi nɔkɔ, bar olla azi nɛ, “Matɛ karooŋ nɔɔnɔ korok zɛɛ ma kabada, kazi cun nɛ?”
Zin aneet Jɔn nɛɛn ci kaduwa kaal nicoko, ma kayeedi o. Kagaya naaga kaala ci kayeedi o kaal ceen didi.
Anyak zin bodo kaal oogi ci meel ci agɔɔn Yesu. Mã da inoko keteyeede kaala nici dook, adala waan waragɛnya looc dook dal.
Acts: Laŋo Tipoliz, baale rak kɛtɛyɛɛda waragɛ oma ci akati liŋliŋɔn o Yesu ki demziin onin dook iinyaye o ŋaan akanan niini liŋliŋɔn e zɛɛ been iiten baal akuli Jooi nɔɔnɔ akɔyi tamma e.
Mazi ŋaan rak niini kook tamma e, iricanek niini dɔyize o Vɔŋiz o Joowo toonnyak ogin baal aŋɛra e kaal ci ka kutuguzɔ niigi.

Ma vurte e itiŋawi niini daayiza e, avu rak loota iinya eet ram, ma ayelzak ɛlɛ nɔɔgɔ lak ci meelik ka kagaac niigi nɔɔnɔ urugun didi. Icinit niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma buk azɔɔz niini ki nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci akati baliin o Joowo.
Mazi avɔ alotɛ niigi dook ŋaatodoi, iricanek niini nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci anek nɛ, “Má uuŋnu Jerusalɛm, bar ereyɔ ŋinaante zɛɛ ma akunakuŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo baal aterkedekuŋ Jooi igeet baal kaduwakuŋ e.
Baale Jɔn oony ɔl maami doon, bar tiŋeere niiga iinyaye ci miliny avu neke oonyenu Vɔŋize o Joowo.”
Mazi avɔ alotɛ toonnyawa ki Yesu iitene oman, ijinit niigi nɔɔnɔ enektek nɛ, “Manyi, ma dim inoko izɛ niina alaan ci abal ɔl o Israyil nɛɛn ka tɔɔk akuma o Rom?”
Ma anek Yesu nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ een nici zɔɔz cunooŋ, bar zɔɔz ci baaba doon o anyan aneet ka kabal Israyil.
Zin tiŋeere ma iiyayuŋ Vɔŋizi o Joowo, ŋaan anyuŋ niini igeet dɔyiz ka iziti niiga bacok cigan Jerusalɛma ki Judiya ki Samariya zɛɛ been vitɛn ci akani tammu zɔɔ looc e.”
Mazi ŋaan azɔɔz nɔkɔ icinit niigi nɔɔnɔ iŋaaz akɔ ki tammu taden nɔɔgɔ kɛbɛrɛn nɔkɔ zɛɛ makacin ibiil diizoc alaŋaan acin bodo.
Mazi ŋaan agɛlɛm niigi tammu taden nɔkɔ, bar acin ɔl ceen ram anyak rumanɛ ci vɔɔrik ɛɛl nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna.
Ma anek niigi nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Ɔl o Galili, eelnu agelemnyu tammu taden nɔkɔn? Yesu ci acinu niiga akuli Jooi akɔyi tammu tadena noko, abada bodo katin icinit kiyo acinu akɔ tamma noko.”
Agooni kaala nicaga biye o kazi Kiŋiroc ajɔŋɔz Jerusalɛm. Ma vurta ivitak niigi Jerusalɛm.

Mazi avɔ arum ŋinite, ɔɔtɔ ceeze uneeŋ ataadonek gɔn tadena Ma ɔl nicigi awoyi Pitɔr, ki Jɔn, ki Jemis, ki Andoru, ki Pilip, ki Tomaz, ki Bartalamu, ki Matiyu, ki Jemis ween ŋɛɛrti Alvayoz, ki Saiman baal gɔɔn oorinɛ ɔl ogin akumawe o Rom e, ki Judaz ween ŋɛɛrti Jemis.
Gɔɔn tup nɔkɔ alotɛ niigi ŋaatodoi aŋaryɛ. Ma buk aromɛ niigi ki ŋaai koogi, kibeen Meri yaati Yesu, kibeen gɔtɔnɔgi Yesu.
Ma iinyaye ogɛn olotɛ ɔl o agama Yesu. Ma alotai ɔl ceen eet torgɛrɛm (120). Itiŋa ni Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ kɔrgɛna ma anek nɛ,
“Gɔtɔnɔga, zɔɔz o waragɛ o Joowo akɔ zɛɛ ayelzai kibil tɔ didi. Baale uduwa Vɔŋizi o Joowo ŋaati Devid zɔɔz ci akati Judaz baal ayita ɔl o avu agam Yesu e.
Ma Judaz baale laadun niini eet cinai, eeci ɛŋɛra waanice Yesu nɔɔnɔ ka kiliŋliŋ kibeen ageet.

Agayu niiga Judaz waanice ataala mana guruce baal anyek ɔl nɔɔnɔ ka kɛyɛlɛkɛ niini nɔɔgɔ Yesu e. Ook zin waanice acabek niini alɛm kɛɛt mane nico, ma iina kɛɛt tadena kɛrɛɛcɛ kɛŋ kudunta koloktɛna, ma adaai.
Iziiyit zin waanice ɔl o abaak Jerusalɛma dook zɔɔz nico. Ma akanek niigi mana nice zaar ci kazi nɛ Akeldama. Ma kɛŋ ci zaar nicoko kazi nɛ mana ci biyetu.”
Ma azi Pitɔr bodo nɛ, “Ayɛɛt baale Devid waragewe o beniinowu zɔɔz ci akati Judaz azi nɛ, “Een katin ceez cinɛ lik kɔkɔm eet ci abaayi.”
Ma buk ayeedi gi ci azi nɛ, “Abon arigiz ŋintin o ɛɛti oman.”

Zin giye nico abon kaŋɛra eet oma ole baal karomɛ ki ageet iinyaye baal ŋaan aavɛ Manyi Yesu ŋaatinai e, akanai iinyaye baal oonyi Jɔn nɔɔnɔ e, zɛɛ been iiten baal akɔyi niini tamma e. Abon kaŋɛra eet nico ka kizi bacoi buk ki ageet ci aduwak ɔl ŋaazi o Manyi Yesu daayiza.”

Zin giye nico abon kaŋɛra eet oma ole baal karomɛ ki ageet iinyaye baal ŋaan aavɛ Manyi Yesu ŋaatinai e, akanai iinyaye baal oonyi Jɔn nɔɔnɔ e, zɛɛ been iiten baal akɔyi niini tamma e. Abon kaŋɛra eet nico ka kizi bacoi buk ki ageet ci aduwak ɔl ŋaazi o Manyi Yesu daayiza.”
Ɛŋɛrta ni niigi ɔl ram. Codoi kazi zaar nɛ Matiyas. Bodo codoi kazi zaar nɛ Josev o kazi Justus Barsabas.

Ma aŋaryɛ niigi azi nɛ, “Manyi, aga niina ɔl dook zinzeeti. Inoko yeleyet eet codoi ole ceen ram noko ci tɛ ɛŋɛra niina laadun ka kirigiz zɔɔ o Judaz, eeci Judaz baale otoŋet ageeta, ma ook gooye o abil been nɛɛn.”

Ma aŋaryɛ niigi azi nɛ, “Manyi, aga niina ɔl dook zinzeeti. Inoko yeleyet eet codoi ole ceen ram noko ci tɛ ɛŋɛra niina laadun ka kirigiz zɔɔ o Judaz, eeci Judaz baale otoŋet ageeta, ma ook gooye o abil been nɛɛn.”
Ma agɔɔn niigi maadico ci ka kɛŋɛrtai eet codoi ole ceen ram noko. Ɛŋɛra ni Jooi Matiyas, ma aromonek niini toonnyak ween amɔtɔ codoi.
Mazi akɔ aku iiteni o kazi Pintikos, ulute ɔl o tuwento dook ŋaatodoi.
Taman nɔkɔ iiya mɔlɔyi ci aku tamma ci atobɔ ki ŋɔɔt ci ivaan ɔrɔɔt, ma aku adala ceez ci ona aavtiyɛ niigi o dook.
Ma acin niigi kaal ci kizik goonya ci alanyit, ma azaanonek nɔɔgɔ dook ooti.
Makacin anyayit niigi dook Vɔŋiz o Joowo ɔrɔɔt. Ma anyek Vɔŋizi nici nɔɔgɔ kozoozit utugetine ci ŋaan laadun kagaac.
Maje ŋinaante anyak ɔl ceen Juz ci gɔɔn adiŋdiŋan Jook. Avu niigi vitɛnane ogɛn, ma avu aavtiz Jerusalɛma.
Mazi azii molok nico, olotai niigi, ma abiir nɔɔgɔ dook ooti, eeci gɔɔn ɛɛti ceeni ŋaatineeŋ azii ɔl o tuwento azɔɔz zooze onin.
Ma abaraŋani nɔɔgɔ dook ooti, ma ajinɔ anɔ nɛ, “Alaŋ een ɔl ci azɔɔz noko ɔl o Galili?
Ku zin yo azɔɔz niigi utugetine ogaac ɛlɛ o?
Ŋaatinai ŋina anyak ɔl ci avu looce o kazi Partiya, ki Midiya, ki Ilam, ki Mesopatamiya, ki Judiya, ki Kapadociya, ki Pontus, ki Asiya,
ki Pijiya, ki Pampiliya, ki Masir, been Libya libir ci ajɔŋzɔ ki Sariin e.

Ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatinai Juz kibeen ɔl o alaŋ een Juz o avu niigi looce o Rom, ma avu agama Jook o ɔl o Juz. Buk ɔl ogɛn avu looce o kazi Karit kibeen Arabiya. Ma azɔɔz niigi otoge ona. Aduwa niigi kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye agɔɔn Jooi.”
Ma olla abaraŋani niigi dook, ma anɔ nɛ, “Mayo gi nici kɛŋ cinɛ gitaz?”
Maje bar ɔl ogɛnɛ ŋaatineeŋ ararni ɔl o tuwento, ma anɔ nɛ, “Abaaki inoko ɔl nici.”

Itiŋa ni Pitɔr jena kibeen toonnyak ween amɔtɔ codoi, ma azɔɔz niini molowe ci alɔɔlɔ anek ɔl nɛ, “Igeeta ɔl o Juz kibeen ɔl o abaaku Jerusalɛma dook, iziiktaŋ di aneet anycaŋ kuduwayuŋ kɛŋ ci gi nico.
Ɔl nicigi alaŋ abaaki kiyo ona abaabanu niiga o. Acinu gɔɔn abaaki ɔl ŋeere iŋaan een ziik tɔrkɔc?
Bar zin nici gi baal aduwa nyakaŋani o kazi Jol e nɛɛn, azi baale niini nɛ,

“Azi Jooi nɛ, Katin iinyaye ci ka koṯorɛi lɔɔci e, kitoonai Vɔŋiz onan ɔl dook. Lɔgɔz ugooc been dɔl ugooc katin uuwak zɔɔz onan. Ma buk katin lɔgɔz ugooc acin ootinɛ kaal o Joowo. Buk katin matuwo ugooc awunozi wunozyak ci avu Joowa.
Kanyi katin Vɔŋiz onan iinyaye niceke gabara ogan mac been o ŋaai buk. Ma uuwak niigi zɔɔz onan.
Kagoon katin kaal ci atɛɛt ɔl biye tamma kibeen loota buk. Ma katin anyak biye kibeen goo kibeen burɛt ci appe.
Katin ii ookci kizi koli. Maje nyɛlɔyi ookci kizi meerik kiyo biyeta o. Agooni kaal nicigi iŋaan rak iiten o adikir akuni Manyi kiiya.
Zin ɛɛti ci awo zaar o Manyi ka kitirit nɔɔnɔ, ŋaan ɛɛlyai niini iinyaye niceke.”

Igeet ɔl o Israyil, iziiyit zoozok ci kaduwakuŋ ce. Yesu o kutur o Nazarɛt nɛɛn o eyelizayuŋ Jooi igeet kizi didi niini eet o itoonnyai Joowa kaale o agɔɔn adiŋdiŋ ateeduŋ igeet biye. Agayu ri niiga kaal nicoko ɛɛltɔ didi, eeci utuguze ŋaatunooŋ ŋina.
Agama Jooi gi o ka agamti niiga Yesu ka urukti niiga nɔɔnɔ kadaak gole ci anyeku ɔl o gɛr kotodoyi nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec. Kaal nicoko dook aga Jooi baale laadun iŋaan naaga kagaac.
Bar zin Jooi anyek nɔɔnɔ kɔmɔk daayiz, ma iŋaani nɔɔnɔ daayiza korok bodo, eeci alaŋ aganɔ ŋaati amɔgi daayizi nɔɔnɔ.
Aduwa baale Devid gi ci akati nɔɔnɔ azi nɛ, “Kacin gɔɔn Manyi onan aneeta ŋuma iinya dook. Ajoŋozan niini aneet tup, gɛrzɛ ŋaan kanyei ŋoliin.
Atalnɛ zin ziniz onane giye nico, ma kazooz talniinta, eeci mayo nuun tiŋeere kadaai o, kaga akɔm gi ci gɛr agoononekan.
Eeci niina Jooi alaŋ ooŋnei vɔŋiz onan looc o daayizo. Alaŋ uuŋ gabaren unun abon kumu loowa.
Eyeleyan baale niina aneeta gɔl o ka kook korogi bodo. Ma giye o karomɛn naana ki ineet, kanyei naana talniin ci appe.”

Gɔtɔnɔga, abon zin kaduwakuŋ igeeta kaal o akati jijitinai o kazi Devid ka agaac juruŋ zoozok baal aduwa niini e. Agayu niiga adaak baale niini. Ma inoko look oninɛ baal adawin e ŋaan abil tɔ ŋina zɛɛ been inoko o.
Baale zin niini nyakaŋan ci aga zɔɔz o aterkedek Jooi nɔɔnɔ. Aterkedek baale Jooi nɔɔnɔ gi ci anek nɛ, “Kanyi katin logo oma dolene ci dɔl cugun kizi alaan ci abil kiyo niina o.”
Icinun ni niini gi o ka kutugu Jooi katin. Ma azɔɔz niini gi ci akati ŋaazi o Kiristo azi nɛ, “Alaŋ ooŋnek Jooi nɔɔnɔ looc o daayizo. Ma alaŋ ɛlɛ oninɛ ame loowa.”
Itiŋawi zin Jooi Yesu daayiza didi. Ma inoko naaga dook kiziti bacok giye nico.

Ooyi Jooi nɔɔnɔ tammu tadena, ma akɔ arek libir onin azo, ma anyek nɔɔnɔ Vɔŋiz o Joowo kiyo baale aterkedek niini nɔɔnɔ e. Mazin ci inoko acinu, ma aziiŋnu noko, Vɔŋiz o Joowo anyet niini ageeta nɛɛn.
Alaŋ een zin Devid nɛɛn o akɔ tamma, bar olla aduwa niini waanice zɔɔz ci akati Yesu azi nɛ, “Anek Jooi Manyi onan nɛ, Avu ŋina aneet aza nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma kanyin rocek ɔl o amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.”
Alaŋ een zin Devid nɛɛn o akɔ tamma, bar olla aduwa niini waanice zɔɔz ci akati Yesu azi nɛ, “Anek Jooi Manyi onan nɛ, Avu ŋina aneet aza nɔkɔ zɛɛ ma kanyin rocek ɔl o amarninin ineet looc zɔɔnɛ.”
Abona zin niiga ɔl o Israyil dook agayu zɔɔz nico juruŋ. Yesu baal adodoyu niiga nɔɔnɔ keete ween talakec e nɛɛn o anyek Jooi nɔɔnɔ kizi Manyi, ma een Kiristo.”
Mazi azii ɔl zɔɔz ci Pitɔr noko, anyayit ŋoliin ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ, ma anek niigi Pitɔr ki toonnyak nɛ, “Gɔtɔnɔga, mayo kutuguza naa?”
Ma anek Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ nɛ, “Abona niiga dook ateedinu oŋɛ ugooc, ka otoonycɛ zaare o Yesu Kiristo, ka kaara Jooi oŋɛ ugooc. Mã agoonu nɔkɔ, anyuŋ koca Jooi igeet Vɔŋiz onin.
Eeci eterkedeyuŋ niini gi ci ka kiiyakuŋ Vɔŋizi oninɛ igeet, kibeen dɔl ugooc, kibeen buk ɔl o abaak rɛɛna dook. Terkediin nici akati ɔl dook o awak Jooi ween Manyi onai ɛlɛ onin.”
Ma uuwayek Pitɔr nɔɔgɔ zoozok golowe ci meel, ma ilotek nɔɔgɔ zɔɔz ci azi nɛ, “Orogozit eleeti ugooc piryakzete o akunak ɔl o ɔɔ nico gɛr abor Jook.”
Makacin iziiyit ɔl ci meelik zɔɔz nico, ma atu Yesu, ma oonyi ɔl ceen eet tur lak eetom kamɔtɔ (3000) iitene nice, ma aromonek niigi ɔl baal atuwe laadun e.
Ma adɛmɛz toonnyawa nɔɔgɔ zoozok o Joowo. Ma aromɛ niigi dook tup kizitɔ laŋoten kibeen ɔl o tuwento dook, ma aromɛ ŋaatodoi zɔlɔnta been ŋaryiinta.
Ma aŋole ɔl dook Jerusalɛma Jook, eeci anyek Jooi toonnyak dɔyiz ci agɔɔni kaal ci meelik ci atɛɛt ɔl dook biye.
Oromtɛ ni ɔl o tuwento dook laŋotizete ci adɔi kak, ma atirtɔ niigi dook kaale ugeec anyak.
Ma ataalinɛ niigi manɛɛn kibeen kaal ugeec anyak, ma aŋɛr guruc o ataala. Ma aŋɛrak gɔɔn niigi eet codoi ŋaatineeŋ ci alɛɛnɔ ki nɔɔnɔ.
Tup nɔkɔ alotɛ niigi ceeze o Joowo, ma azɔlɔ niigi ŋaatodoi ceezine ugeec talniinta.
Ma anyek niigi Jook zany, ma anaat ɔl dook nɔɔgɔ baayize uneeŋ. Ma aromonek nɔɔgɔ tup nɔkɔ ɔl ci colai meel ci orogoz Jooi nɔɔgɔ, makacin azaacun Jooi ɔl o tuwento kizi mɛɛlɛ gɛr.
Ma iitene oman ɔɔtɔ Pitɔr kibeen Jɔn ceeze o Joowo ziiye ween iiyu ŋaryiinto yomana.
