Ma ajinan toonnyaiti anekan nɛ, “Gitaz ci ɛɛnɛ baraŋ o? Ŋaan kaduwakin kɛŋ ci akati ŋaa nico o, kibeen kɛŋ ci akati kelegit ci aavɛ niini anyak ooti torgɛrɛm been oto amɔtɔ noko.

Ma kelegiti ci acin niina noko baale rak arogi labak, makacin bodo iziitɔ. Bar zin inoko izi ŋinti ka kudunai niini loowe o wun ka kiiya kook ŋaao ka kuulalɔi lai. Mazin ɔl o abaak loota baal ŋaan laadun zaara ugeec keteyeede waragewe o rogeto kinatamma e, ateedi tiŋeere nɔɔgɔ biyeta ŋaati acini kelegit nico, eeci baale arogi niini labak, ma inoko o iziitɔ, bar zin katin ŋaan ayelzai bodo.
Arɔɔŋ zin zɔɔz nici ziiknɛn ki gɛnyiz. Kɛŋ zin ci zɔɔz nico nɛɛn ce. Ma ooti ceen torgɛrɛm o biyɛn ween torgɛrɛm aavɛ ŋaa nici nɛɛn. Ma buk akati niigi alaat ceen torgɛrɛm.
Maje alaata ceen tur ŋaatineeŋ aaryai kizeectɔ. Maje codoi ŋaan abil tɔ. Bodo oman ŋaan bar buk laadun kiiya. Mazi aku katin, aku aavi ŋinti miliny tɛr.
Maje kelegiti baal rak arogi, makacin bodo iziitɔ e, een katin niini alaan ci akeebonek gɔnɔgi ween torgɛrɛm e kiziti turge. Bar zin tiŋeere akɔ niini ŋaati uulalin ḏim.
Ma oto ceen amɔtɔ acin noko, alaat ci ŋaan rak kagamit alaazɛt. Bar zin katin anyononek nɔɔgɔ kibeen kelegit alaazɛt loota ziit codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.
Ma anyak niigi dook ŋaati eeginɛ amɔtɔ noko baabani codoi ṯɔr, ma atirit niigi kelegit ka kɔdɔk ɔrɔɔnta.
Ɔɔr zin tiŋeere niigi Nyɔɔn o Joowo. Bar zin tiŋeere amɔk Nyɔɔn been ɔl ogin aŋɛryai atu nɔɔnɔ kelegit nico ki ɔl ogin, eeci Nyɔɔn niini alaan o amɔk alaat dook, ma dɔyizi oninɛ ajuk doyizok dook.”
Ma anekan bodo toonnyaiti nɛ, “Ma liilowa ci acin aavɛ waaŋnyaiti neke modɛn o loocok dook nɛɛn.

Maje oto ceen amɔtɔ noko kibeen kelegit ci acin niina noko, amarnin katin niigi waaŋnyai nico. Avɔyi katin niigi kaal ogin anyak dook, ma ooŋnek nɔɔnɔ looc kaavu ŋaḏinyiny. Ma adak katin niigi ɛlɛ onin, ma avaat vitɛn ci anyigjai o lai.
Jook zin nɛɛn o arom baabani uneeŋ kɔdɔwɛ ka kutuguzɔ gi o arooŋek niini nɔɔgɔ kutuguzɔ. Jook nɛɛn o anyek nɔɔgɔ kanycek alaazɛt uneeŋ kelegit ka kutuguze kaala dook eo arɔɔŋi niini.
Ma ŋaa ci acin noko, kutur o adikir abal alaat o loocu dook nɛɛn.”
Bodo vurta kicina toonnyai oma ci aku tamma. Toonnyaiti nici anyak alaazɛt ci adikir, ma alina niini ɔrɔɔt kataraan looc dook linata.

Ma agɛrɛny molowe ci appe azi nɛ, “Iita! Iita kuturi o appe kazi Babilan! Ilibe didi ḏim! Ɔkɔma ɔl ci abaak ŋinaante kina, bar izi ŋinti abaai voŋizowa o Loryento. Ma buk abaayi kuduvaana been kibaali o gɛr dook.

Eeci gɔɔn kuturi nici agura modɛn dook waaŋzɛta ka kivita kutuguzɔ niigi ki nɔɔnɔ waaŋzɛt o abaayinɛ kiliita nɔɔgɔ lɔɔci lai. Buk alaata o loocu dook utuguzɔ waaŋzɛt been nɔɔnɔ. Ma etenyerit tajɛra o loocu dook nyɛriz ci ajowa gole ci gɛr.”
Bodo kazii molok oma ci aku tamma azi nɛ, “Udunta niiga ɔl ogane kuture nico. Má azolu ki nɔɔnɔ baciinok cigin o. Gɛrzɛ ŋaan ajowanu payiin ci gɛr kiyo niini o.
Agawun Jooi baciinok ogin, eeci baciinowa oginɛ izi mɛɛlɛ zɛɛ makacin urumit tammu taden.

Inoko zin utuguzek buk niiga nɔɔnɔ kaal ci gɛr kiyo baale agoonekuŋ niini igeet e. Acaca kaal o gɛr baal agoonekuŋ niini igeet e lak ram. Ipirtai niiga nɔɔnɔ lak ram kujuk baal apirnanuŋ niini igeet e.

Igidit nɔɔnɔ katamaat ɔrɔɔt ka kotobtɔ kibeen diŋdiŋɔn been arɔkzɛt onin baal anyak e. Eeci gɔɔn abɔlɔl niini azi nɛ, “Keen naana ŋaa ceen alaan. Ma akɔm gi ci ka kiinon kiyo ŋaa ci bɔyɛ o been nɛɛn.”
Zin giye o abɔlɔli niini, oroma piryakzɛt zooc ecodoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ. Ma akunak nɔɔnɔ mɔɔrizi, ma akat culum, ma adak magiz ɔrɔɔt. Ma avaat goo, eeci Manyi Jooi o anyak dɔyiz apayewun nɔɔnɔ gerzitin.”
Zin katin alaata o loocu baal agɔɔn kibeen nɔɔnɔ waaŋzɛt e, alu kiitazɔ tilalɔ ŋaati acini niigi burɛt ci atoozɛnɛ kuturi nica neke.
Ɛɛl tiŋeere niigi rɛɛna, eeci aŋole piryakzɛt cin o, ma anɔ nɛ, “Izi nɔŋa targanyɛ. Izi nɔŋa targanyɛ. Uulalɛ kuturi o appe anyak dɔyiz kazi Babilan ḏim ziite codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.”
Buk ɔl ween tajɛr aluwek tiŋeere nɔɔnɔ, eeci ɔkɔma ɔl ci ka kataalit kaal ugeec.

Ɔkɔma ɔl ci ka kataalit warki ugeec, ki zurtɛnɛn, ki kalbɛ ween kagora azi pilpil, ki ziira, ki rumanɛ o alina, ki rumanɛ o meeri, ki rumanɛ o acabi ŋaai ooti, ki kɛɛn kɛbɛrɛ o alaŋ ajoyai gaga, ki kaal dook o agɔɔnnyai otone o aŋolwanu ki kɛɛni, ki zurtɛnɛnɛ, ki ziiyi, been biyene o appintik alina.

Ma ɔkɔma ɔl ci ka kataalit kaalyan o aŋɔlni dayiin madiz, ki kaal o aburutani ɔl ceezi ka kɔtɔŋɔlti madiz, ki nyaantanɛ, ki ŋɔrɛn, ki tilɛn o vɔɔr, ki labi, ki tiin, ki ɛɛza, ki jɔmanɛ, ki kavoolɛt o agurut jɔmanɛ, been mirɔk o ataalinɛ ɔl.
Ma anek tajɛra nɔɔnɔ nɛ, “Inoko kaala baal gɔɔn arooŋ niina kizi kaal cugun e idicai dook. Buk arɔkzɛt unune been linat unun ɔbɔwɛ lai, ma alaŋ bodo ajowa been nɛɛn.”
Ma ɔl ceen tajɛr baal gɔɔn ajowa arɔkzɛt kuture nico o tiŋeere ɛɛl niigi rɛɛna, eeci aŋole niigi piryakzɛt cin neke. Ma aluwek katin niigi nɔɔnɔ, ma aboobi ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ.

Anɔ tiŋeere niigi nɛ, “Izi nɔŋa targanyɛ! Izi nɔŋa targanyɛ! Iiyak libɛn kutur ci appe noko. Baale gɔɔn anyak niini rumanɛ ci alina, ki rumanɛ ceen jalo, been rumanɛ ci meeri. Ma anyak warki, ki kalbɛ ceen kagora azi pilpil, been ziira.
Ma bar inoko idicai arɔkzɛt oninɛ dook ḏim ziite codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.”
Ma alaata o abal baburɛt o appintik awɔ liilowɛ, ki ɔl o aliŋliŋ baburete nicoko, been ɔl o ɛɛrɔn baburɛtɛ dook adɛyai tiŋeere niigi kuture nice rɛɛna many.
Acin tiŋeere niigi burɛt o atoozɛnɛ kuturi nica, ma agɛrɛny azi nɛ, “Ŋaan laadun baale kibil kuturi ci appe kiyo nici o.”

Ma anyak tiŋeere niigi ciirɛn ootinɛ, ma ɔɔga awac eleetinɛ, ma aboobi azi nɛ, “Izi nɔŋa targanyɛ! Izi nɔŋa targanyɛ kuture o appe! Kuturi nici kutur baal gɔɔn anyet ageet o kaliŋliŋ baburɛtɛ kiziti arɔk e nɛɛn. Bar zin inoko uulalɛ ḏim ziite codoi ṯɔr nɔkɔ.”

Ma azi toonnyaiti nɛ, “Ataltɔ zin niiga ɔl o abaaku tammu tadena, ki ɔl o Joowo, ki toonnyak, been nyakaŋanɛt giye o uulalɔi kuturi nici, eeci apayewun Jooi nɔɔnɔ gerzitin ka kizi gi baal gɔɔn aminaŋnyuŋ niini igeet, ma agoonekuŋ kaal o gɛr e.”
Ɔdɔŋa ni toonnyaiti ci Joowo adɔi ɔrɔɔt bɛ ci kizik golu, ma ajukek liil kocoldok, ma azi nɛ, “Ajukonek iima kuturi ci kazi Babilan appe neke looc kook many kɔkɔm eet ci acin bodo kiyo bɛ nici noko.

Ɔkɔma kuture nice molok ci bodo arui ɔl kidorɛt, ki ɔl ci abo torombɛt, ki ɔl ci abo tavaarɛt, been ɔl ci abene. Ma akɔm ɔl ceen arinya ka kiliŋliŋit kuture nice bodo. Ma akɔm eet ci azii molok ci areyin ɔl, karabɔŋ uurtɛnɛ bodo.

Alaŋ bodo alanyit tɔlita kuture nice been nɛɛn, ma akɔm bodo talniin ci iiŋkawin ɔl. Apawonek zin Babilan gerzitin o, eeci baale tajɛra o kutur nice ajuk tajɛr o loocok dook gerzitina, ma aguv baale kuturi nica modɛn dook tamarzɛta been voloŋe onin.
Eeci buk ajoyai biyeta o nyakaŋanetu, ki biye o ɔl o Joowo, been biye o ɔl baal aruwe kadaayitɔ loota e dook ŋaatin.”
Ma vurta kazii walwalɔn ci kizik gernyi ci ɔl ci meel ɔrɔɔt tammu tadena azi nɛ, “Kanaatit Jook! Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn o eelawet ageet! Anyak niini titinyɔn been dɔyiz dook!
Payiinowa oginɛ een didi, ma ɛɛl tɔp. Apayewun zin niini gerzitin waaŋnyai o agayi baal gɔɔn uulal looc waaŋzɛta e. Apayek zin Jooi nɔɔnɔ gerzitin giye baal aruyi niini gabara ogin kadaayitɔ e.”
Ma bodo agɛrɛny niigi azi nɛ, “Kanaatit Jook, eeci burɛti ci atoozɛnɛ kuturi nici noko uburut nɔkɔ izi nɛɛn.”
Odomta ni alaata ween eetom ki tiin wec been kɛlɛk ween wec akati kozoŋti looc, ma adiŋdiŋan Jook o aavi lecere onin alaazetu azi nɛ, “Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn. Abon kanaat Jook.”
Ma aduŋna lecere ci alaazetu noko mɔlɔyi ci azi nɛ, “Niiga ɔl o aliŋliŋoneku Jook, atanaaz nɔɔnɔ. Dɔlya o kidic been ɔl o mayan o aŋolinu Jook, abon anaatu niiga nɔɔnɔ.”

Bodo ni kazii molok ci kizik molok ci ɔl ci meel ɔrɔɔt ci kizik walwalɔnti cineeŋ o maam o gɔɔn ariiya bɛ tadena o. Ma kizik bar bodo juli o gɔɔn ajuli tammu o. Azi mɔlɔyi nici nɛ, “Atanaaz Jook ween Manyi onai adɔi, ma een alaan o abal kaal dook!
Kataltɔ zin naaga! Katanaaz titinyɔn onin, eeci iiya iiteni o ka kitiŋkawɔi Nyɔɔn. Aje nyatarani oninɛ iyiŋyiŋan buk ɛlɛ awace ogin.
Ma anyozozek nyataran rum ci vɔɔr alina ka koborocek.” (Ma rum cinɛ vɔɔr aborcek noko ayelza kaal o abon agɔɔn ɔl o Joowo.)
Ma anekan toonnyaiti ci Joowo noko nɛ, “Tɛyɛɛt gi ci azi nɛ, Amayuwi ɔl o awak ɔl tiŋkawiin ci Nyoonu o.” Ma anekan bodo toonnyaiti nici nɛ, “Nicigi zoozok o Joowo een didi.”

Mazi kazii zɔɔz nico, kakatɛ kozoŋti looc ka kidiŋdiŋan nɔɔnɔ. Bar anekan niini nɛ, “Bil. Má agoon nɔkɔ. Keen naana gabaren ci Joowo kiyo buk niina o. Ma keen buk gabaren kiyo gotonogu o gɔɔn atu zɔɔz baal anyaak Yesu nɔɔgɔ e. Jook zin doon o abon kadiŋdiŋan naaga nɔɔnɔ, eeci Vɔŋiz onin nɛɛn o anyek ɔl kutuwit Yesu, ma anyek buk nɔɔgɔ kagaac kaal o ka kiitazɔ katin.”

Enico ɔkɔlɛ tammu taden, ma kacin ŋinaante eet ci atɔɔt jɔm ci vɔɔr. Ma eet nico kazi zaar nɛ Iimi Ziniz, ma kazi oogi nɛ Een Didi. Apak niini kaal roonnya keelit tɔp, ma ooryi niini oriin ci abon abil tɔp.
Anyak niini kɛbɛrɛ ci alanyit kiyo goo o, ma anyak kondɛnɛn ci meelik ɔɔwa. Ma ayeedonek nɔɔnɔ zaara ci aga kɛŋ cin niini doon.
Maje rum cin aborcek o aparanonek biyeta. Ma kazi zaar cigin nɛ Zɔɔz o Joowo.
Ma anowa nɔɔnɔ takirnya ci tammu tadenu. Aborcek takirnya nici rumanɛ ci vɔɔr pɛr, ma atɔɔt buk niigi jɔmanɛ ci vɔɔrik pɛr.
Ma aduŋna otoge cin o gina ci lɛɛdi ka kɔmɔgi modɛn o alaŋ ano nɔɔnɔ. Nɔɔnɔ zin nɛɛn o ka kabal nɔɔgɔ keete onin alaazetu een ziit. Ma apayek nɔɔgɔ gerzitin bornɛt noŋe o Jook o adɔi.
Ma ayeedonek rum cin aborcek o been azan zaara ci kazi Alaan o Amɔk Alaat Dook, ma buk kazi Manyi o Amɔk Manyigi Dook.
Ma kacin bodo toonnyai ci tammo abil iiwa. Agɛrɛny niini molowe ci appe anek kuduvaa o amalil tammu tadena dook nɛ, “Ivita adayit lokiro ci ɔl ci aruk Jooi kadaayitɔ ce.
Ivita adayit ɔl ween alaat, ki alaat o takirnyawu, ki takirnya, ki ɔl o atɔɔt jɔmanɛ, ki jɔmanɛ, ki ɔl ween mirɔk been ɔl o alaŋ een mirɔk, ki ɔl o titiny been ɔl o cɛlbɛz.”
Kicina ni kelegit o mooti ki alaat o loocu been takirnya ugeec alotɛ niigi dook ŋaatodoi, ka kɔɔrtɔ ki eet o atɔɔt jɔm o vɔɔr e been takirnya ogin.

Ma agam ɔl kelegit ci mooti noko been nyakaŋan o voloŋo baal agɔɔn kaal o atɛɛt ɔl biye kelegit nico ŋuma e, ma avɔyi cabiin. (Nyakaŋan zin ci voloŋo noko nɛɛn baal alaba ɔl o anyak bayen o kelegto ŋumtene ugeec e. Alaba niini nɔɔgɔ kaale baal agɔɔn atɛɛt ɔl biye e, ka kidiŋdiŋanit niigi riritɔn o kelegit nico.) Ma ajukonek kelegiti kibeen nyakaŋan o voloŋo rogɛtɛt goo ween lɔtɔn abil nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
Maje takirnya ugeec urukte lai ginawe o aduŋna otoge o eet o atɔɔt jɔm o vɔɔr e. Ma adak kuduvaana nɔɔgɔ zɛɛ been paŋ.
Kicina ni toonnyai ci aku tammu tadena. Anyak aziita muvta ci look o wun been nyaramram ci appe ɔrɔɔt.
Ma agam niini kutal ween kowat o kazi zaar nɛ Loryen. Ma adɔɔn nɔɔnɔ nyaramrama ka kacabɛ nɔkɔ irkitok ci eet tur lak amɔtɔ (1000).

Ma ajukek nɔɔnɔ look o wun, ma anyoogek look eecitɔ kɔdɔk ɔrɔɔt ɛlɛ ka calaŋ bodo alaba modɛn zɛɛ ma akɔ adicai irkitowa nicigi. Ma vurte ci katin adican irkitowa nici e, ɔɔgjai rak bodo niini ŋintimiliny.

Kicina ni ɔl ci aavtiz lecerene ci alaazetu, ma anyononek nɔɔgɔ alaazɛt ci ka kapakti ɔl. Ma bodo buk kacin ɔl baal gɔɔn aruwe kadaayitɔ giye o uuwayi niigi zɔɔz o Joowo een didi baal ayelza Yesu e. Baale niigi ŋaan kidiŋdiŋanit kelegit nice been riritɔn onin. Ma ŋaan kagamta bayen onin ka kanyayit ŋumtene ugeec, karabɔŋ een azɛɛnɛ. Itiŋgazɔ zin niigi daayiza ka kabalit looc niigi kibeen Kiristo kiziti alaat irkitok eet tur lak amɔtɔ (1000).
Nici zin ɔl o iŋaaz daayiza ɔɔwa nɛɛn. Maje ɔl o ŋaan kitiŋgazɔ daayiza ŋaazye ci oowu noko, alaŋ rak niigi iŋaaz zɛɛ ma akɔ adicai irkitowa ceen eet tur lak amɔtɔ (1000).

Zin ɔl ci iŋaaz daayiza ɔɔwa o amayuwi niigi ɔrɔɔt, eeci daayizi o vurto alaŋaan bodo anim nɔɔgɔ. Bar iziti niigi alaat ci adiŋdiŋan Jook been Kiristo, ma azɔl niigi ki Jook alaazɛt onin irkitok ceen eet tur lak amɔtɔ noko dook (1000).
Mazi katin akɔ adicai irkitowa ceen eet tur lak amɔtɔ (1000) neke, ɔɔgjai Loryen cabiinte onin.

Zin katin ma aduŋna niini, akɔ alaba modɛn o abaak loocowe dook. Ma ɔl ci akɔ alaba niini neke ano modɛn o kazi Gok been Magok. Alota katin niini modɛn niceke dook ŋaatodoi ka kɔɔrtɔ ki ɔl o Joowo. Ma modɛna nicigi mɛɛlɛ gɛr kiyo kazac o liiltogu o.
Azaanonek katin niigi looc dook, ma aliya ŋino aavtiyɛ ɔl o Joowo been kutur o arɛɛz Jooi. Bar zin katin aku goo tammu tadena, ma avaat nɔɔgɔ dook lai.

Maje Loryen ci baal alaba nɔɔgɔ o ajukonek niini goo ween lɔtɔn o alaŋ adiiti nɔkɔ been nɛɛn. Goo nici goo baal ujukozek kelegiti o gɛrzɛ been nyakaŋan o voloŋo e nɛɛn. Ka zin kipirta niigi ŋinaante baalinok ki waazinok nɔkɔ been nɛɛn.
Kicina ni bodo lɛcɛr ci alaazetu vɔɔr appe ɔrɔɔt. Ma kacin buk eet ci aavi lecere nico o. Ma azi tammu taden kibeen looc ḏim nɔɔnɔ ŋuma, kɔkɔm eet ci acin bodo.

Ma kicin ɔl baal adaayitɔ e dook o titiny kibeen o cɛlbɛz. Itiŋgazɔ ɔl baal gɔɔn adodɛ liilowe e kibeen ɔl baal gɔɔn adayi looknyai e dook korogit. Ma avu ɛɛl niigi dook lɛcɛr ci alaazetu o ŋuma. Ɔkɔlɛ ni waragɛ o rogeto kibeen waragɛnya oogi. Ma apawonek nɔɔgɔ dook kaala ugeec baal gɔɔn agɔɔn e. Ma kaala cigeec noko dook eteyeede da waragenyaye nicoko keelit ebaal da gɔɔn agɔɔni niigi e ɛlɛ.

Ma kicin ɔl baal adaayitɔ e dook o titiny kibeen o cɛlbɛz. Itiŋgazɔ ɔl baal gɔɔn adodɛ liilowe e kibeen ɔl baal gɔɔn adayi looknyai e dook korogit. Ma avu ɛɛl niigi dook lɛcɛr ci alaazetu o ŋuma. Ɔkɔlɛ ni waragɛ o rogeto kibeen waragɛnya oogi. Ma apawonek nɔɔgɔ dook kaala ugeec baal gɔɔn agɔɔn e. Ma kaala cigeec noko dook eteyeede da waragenyaye nicoko keelit ebaal da gɔɔn agɔɔni niigi e ɛlɛ.
Ɔkɔma zin bodo daayiz, ma ɔkɔma buk ŋin o miniŋu. Ujuktozek niigi dook goo o abil been nɛɛn. (Ma goo nici goo ween daayiz o aṯornɛkɛ nɛɛn.)
Zin mã alaŋ ajoyai eet zaara ciginɛ waragewe ci rogeto noko, ajukonek niini goo nico.
Kicina ni tammu taden ci colai ki looc ci colai. Maje tammu taden o rɛɛn been looc o rɛɛn been liilok iziti ḏim.
Ma kacin kutur o Joowo titiny kazi Jerusalɛm Colai. Akunak kuturi nici looc Joowa tammu tadena. Ma adimdiman Jooi kutur nico kiyo kabarzɛci o ayiŋyiŋan ɛlɛ ka kitivicɛ o.

Ma kazii molok ci appe aku lecere o Joowo. Azi mɔlɔyi nici nɛ, “Inoko iiya Jooi ka kiiya koromtɛ ki ɔl o deer. Ka kabaayitɔ niini ki nɔɔgɔ ŋaatodoi ka zin kiziti niigi ɔl cigin. Ma abaak Jooi niini alya ŋaatodoi ki nɔɔgɔ kizi niini Jook cineeŋ.
Ŋaan zin ɛɛya niini nɔɔgɔ tilalɔ keberene ugeec. Ɔkɔma bodo daayiz, ki culum, been luwa ci aluwi ɔl. Ma ɔkɔma buk balcɔn, eeci idicai kaala baal rɛɛn e dook lai.”

Izi ni Jooi o aavi lecere onin alaazetu nɛ, “Inoko kutuguwa kaal dook kizi colayɛ.” Ma anekan buk niini aneeta nɛ, “Tɛyɛɛt kaal nicoko, eeci zoozowa nicigi zoozok ceen didi, ma buk aganɔ ŋaati atuwi ɔl.”
Ma azi nɛ, “Inoko zin odota. Aneet nɛɛn o koontanɛ, ma katirananɛ. Mã anyak eet ci aruk kɔr, ŋaan kanyi nɔɔnɔ maam o ariiya valacece o anyak rogɛt. Kanyi naana nɔɔnɔ maam nicoko kɔkɔm gi ci ataali.
Ma ɛɛti ci amɛz piryakzɛt ajowa niini kaal o abon dook ŋaatan. Ma keen naana Jook onin, ma een niini ŋɛɛran.

Maje zin bar dalaanowa o gɔɔn amiiri ki vurut gole o Joowo, ki ɔl o alaŋ atuwe, ki ɔl o monyento, ki waaŋnyak, ki tamaranya, ki ɔl o adiŋdiŋan joowanɛ o adilyai, ki voloŋnyok, ŋintineeŋ nɛɛn goo o alanyit een lɔtɔn. Nici zin daayiz o vurto aṯornɛkɛ nɛɛn.”
Iiyayan ni toonnyaiti codoi toonnyaye baal een torgɛrɛm baal anyak kodoocɛ ween torgɛrɛm abiz piryakzɛt ki gidɛn o aṯornɛkɛ lɔɔci e. Ma aku anekan nɛ, “Ija ka keyeleyin nyataran o Nyɔɔn o Joowo.”
Iiyayan ni Vɔŋizi wunozyai, ma akoyan toonnyaiti biye ci wun tadena, ma akɔ ayelekan kutur o Joowo adiŋdiŋ kazi Jerusalɛm Colai. Akunak kuturi nici looc Joowa tammu tadena.
Ma alanyit kuturi nici dɔyize o Joowo kook zɛɛ ma azi pilpil kiyo kagorana o alina ɔrɔɔt gɔɔn azi pilpil o. Ma buk liilim kiyo gizazac o.

Ma aliya kutur nico kaluwa ci adikir wun kaal ci anyak araanok amɔtɔ ram. Ma anyak toonnyak ci tammo een amɔtɔ ram abɛk araanok nicoko. Ma ayeedonek araanok nicoko zaara o boryok o Israyil een amɔtɔ ram.

Anyak kuturi nici araanok iiyu kabanyɔi dook. Libire ci akɔ ki jen o anyak araanok iiyu. Libire ci akɔ ki nyagi e anyak araanok iiyu. Libire ci akɔ ki tɛnɛt e anyak araanok iiyu. Libire ci akɔ ki baatikeri e anyak araanok iiyu.
Ma ɛɛnyci kaluwa ci kutur nico o loota biyene ceen kitiirwa een amɔtɔ ram. Ma ayeedonek biyɛn nicoko zaara o toonnyak o Nyɔɔn o Joowo.
Ma toonnyaiti ci azoozekan o anyak kɛɛt ceen warki ci ka kayabizi kutur ki araanok been kaluwa.

Maje kaluwa ci kutur nico o wun kal, ma anyak libirɔ wec ci atobɔ dook tɛbɛzɛk, ma alɔɔlɔ kɛŋ. Mazi akɔ ayabiz toonnyaiti nici kutur nico keete cin yabziinto noko, wun kutur nico kɛŋ kal kurum libir codoi milanɛ ceen 1500. Ma buk wun taden kal kotobtɔ ki milanɛ nicoko nɔkɔ.
Ayabiz buk bodo toonnyaiti kaluwa tiŋtiŋɔn aziita, ma atobɔ tiŋtiŋɔni kibeen aziit lak eet torgɛrɛm ki tiin wec (144).
Ma ɛɛnyci kaluwa nici biyene ci azi pilpil, maje kuturi dook ɛɛnyci warkine ci liilim ɔrɔɔt kiyo gizazac o.
Buk kaluwa cinɛ o dook loota ɛɛnyci biyene ceen amɔtɔ ram ci anyak golnya ci meelik azi pilpil.
Buk kaluwa cinɛ o dook loota ɛɛnyci biyene ceen amɔtɔ ram ci anyak golnya ci meelik azi pilpil.
Ma ɛɛnyci araanowa ciginɛ een amɔtɔ ram o biyene ci vɔɔrik pɛr kiyo kii kɛŋ o. Maje gɔl ci kuturo o ɛɛnyci warkine ci liilim ɔrɔɔt kiyo gizazac o.
Ŋaan zin bodo kicin ŋinti taabinto kuture nico, eeci aavtiz Jooi been Nyɔɔn onin ŋinaante.
Ma ɔl ci abaak kuture nico o alaŋ arɔɔŋ ii, karabɔŋ een nyelok, eeci vooritin o Joowo ataran looc dook ŋinaante. Buk Nyɔɔn alanyit niini kuture nico kiyo tɔl o.
Awɔ zin tiŋeere ɔl o loocu dook vooritine nico. Ma anyaak alaata o loocok dook kaalyan ugeec arokzetu kutur nico.
Ma akole araanowa dook tup nɔkɔ, ma akɔm eet ci anyook nɔɔgɔ been nɛɛn, eeci ɔkɔma muuritin ŋinaante.
Ma tiŋeere anyaayak arɔkzɛt dook ki diŋdiŋɔn o modɛn dook ŋinite.
Ɔkɔma zin bodo kaal ci gɛr kuture nico. Ma buk ɔkɔma voloŋnyok, ki ɔl ci agɔɔn kaal ci gɛr ci ka kɔɔt kuture nico. Avɔ zin kuture nico ɔl o ayeedi zaara ugeec waragewe o rogeto anyak Nyɔɔn doon.
Eyeleyan ni toonnyaiti liil o maam o rogeto. Maama ciginɛ o liilimɛ kiyo gizazac o. Aduŋna liili nici lecere o alaazɛt o Joowo been Nyɔɔn.
Ma ariik liili nici kuture nice gɔl o adikir kɔrgɛna. Ma aduŋna kɛɛna ci rogeto baagitok dook. Ma abiir kɛɛna nici lak amɔtɔ ram irkite codoi. Maje bɔlɔwa ciginɛ o arogoz ɔl moorizowɛ.
Ɔkɔma zin bodo ŋinaante gi ci anyak toriin o Joowo kiyo baale e been nɛɛn. Eeci lɛcɛri o alaazɛt Joowo been Nyɔɔn aavi kuture nice. Buk ɔl o Joowo adiŋdiŋan tiŋeere niigi nɔɔnɔ ŋinaante.
Ma acin tiŋeere niigi ŋum o Joowo, ma ayeedonek tiŋeere zaara oginɛ nɔɔgɔ ŋumti.
Ɔkɔma zin bodo baalin kina ŋinaante, ma akɔm eet ci arɔɔŋ tɔl karabɔŋ een kɔr ci araanɛ, eeci izi Manyi Jooi vooritin cineeŋ. Iziti zin niigi tiŋeere alaat nɔkɔ izi nɛɛn.

Ma anekan toonnyaiti ci Joowo noko nɛ, “Zoozowa nicigi zoozok ceen didi, ma buk aganɔ ŋaati atuwi ɔl. Itoonanan zin Jooi ween Manyi aneet ka kiiya keyelizayuŋ igeet o anuyu nɔɔnɔ kaal o ka kiitazɔ katin.”
Azi Yesu nɛ, “Iziiyit zɔɔz ci kaduwakuŋ o juruŋ. Kakunakuŋ tiŋeere kataman. Amayuwi zin ɛɛti ci agama zoozok o ayeedi waragewe nico.”
Aneet Jɔn nɛɛn o kicina kaal nicoko dook, ma kiziiwa. Ma vurte o kicinɛ kaal nicoko, ma kiziiyɛ, kakatɛ kozoŋti looc ŋume o toonnyai o tammo ayelekan kaal nicoko.

Ma bar anekan niini nɛ, “Má adiŋdiŋanan aneet. Kaliŋliŋonei buk naana Jook kiyo niina been gotonogu ween nyakaŋanɛt been ɔl o azooni zoozok o ayeedi waragewe nico dook o. Jook zin doon o abon adiŋdiŋan.”
Ma bodo anekan nɛ, “Má arɔɔdɛ ɔl zoozok ci Joowo ayeedi waragewe nico o, eeci iiteni o ka kiitazai kaal nici izi ajɔn.
Anyek zin eet ci agɔɔn kaal ci gɛr, kutugu labak. Anyek eet ci agɔɔn kaal ci abon, kutugu.”
Azi Yesu nɛ, “Iziiktɔ di. Abon niiga atalninu, eeci kakun kataman ka kiiya kapayek ɔl kaal ugeec aganɔ baal gɔɔn agɔɔn niigi e.
Aneet nɛɛn o koontanɛ, ma katirananɛ. Keen ɔɔ kaale dook, ma kaṯornɛkɛ kaale dook.”
Amayuwi zin ɔl o oony zinzeeti ugeec kitiliza. Nɔɔgɔ nɛɛn o aganɔ ŋaati adayi kɛbɛrɛ o kɛɛt o rogeto, ma aganɔ ŋaati avɔyi niigi kuture nico eecitɔ.
Ma ɔl o abaak kuture nice alaŋ een ɔl ci gɛr been nɛɛn. Akɔm ŋaatineeŋ tamar, ki waaŋ, ki monyɛnɛt, ma alaŋ adiŋdiŋan niigi joowanɛ o adilyai, ma akɔm vɔlɔŋ.

Azi Yesu bodo nɛ, “Keen naana dole ci dɔl o Devid o keen Kiristo, ma keen coboc o ŋeeretinu vɔɔr ɔrɔɔt. Kitoonekuŋ zin toonnyai onan igeet ɔl o tuwento dook ka kook kuduwayuŋ niini igeet zoozok o ayeedi waragewe nico dook.”
Ma azi Vɔŋizi o Joowo ki nyataran o Nyɔɔn o Joowo nɛ, “Ivita ka agamta zɔɔz nico.” Abon zin buk ɔl o azii zoozok nicoko azi nɛ, “Ivita.”
Ma ɔl o aruk kɔr dook, abon avu ka kivita kowodit niigi maam o rogeto nɔkɔ calaŋ ataal.

Karicanekuŋ zin naana Jɔn igeet dook o iziiktu zoozok ci ayelzaket Jooi ageet waragewe nico noko, mã azaac ɛɛti zoozok nicoko zoozowe cigin doon, azaacek buk Jooi nɔɔnɔ piryakzɛt o ayeedi waragewe nico.
Mã aara ɛɛti zoozok nicoko oogi bitaala, aara buk Jooi tiŋeere ŋaatin kɛbɛrɛ o kɛɛt o rogeto, ma alaŋ anyek niini nɔɔnɔ kook kuture onin titiny ayeedi waragewe nico.
Ma Yesu o ayelzaket ageet kaal ween didi azi nɛ, “Didilɛ, ŋaan kakun kataman.”
Nɔɔnɔ nɛɛn. Ija zin Manyi Yesu.
Abon bai dɛtɛni o Manyi Yesu aavi ŋaatunooŋ igeet dook.
